review_summary:
This huge loft style room with gallery and balcony is situated on the main inner ring. With great transport connections and walking distance from all the bars and clubs, this room would make a perfect crash pad for New Year's. 

There is one single bed downstairs, one sofa bed downstairs and on the loft there is a double bed and another mattress can be added.

You will have full access to the kitchen and bathroom, etc.

Free high-speed wifi, coffee, teas, towels and linen is all included.

reviews_text:
I had a pleasant weekend at Borbala's place. The flat is very cosy and has a beautiful view. It is located in a quite area in Buda, well connected with public transports. Borbala was very flexible concerning the check-out. Recommended 

The host canceled this reservation 71 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Our trip to Budapest was work connected with tight schedule and tricky transportation (very early arrival / very late departure) but Borbala was an amazing host who made everything to help us. She's an amazing person so there's no surprise that her place must have been the same. The location, lot's of sunlight inside and that panorama from the balcony... Just to name a few. If you happen to find her apartment not booked, seek no more! You will remember it forever. Hope to have a chance to meet her again. Wouldn't change that Airbnb to any 5 stars hotel!

Really nice and clean apartment, great view from the balcony. Bori is a really nice person, I can only recommend the place. The location is also great, you can get to all the important parts of the city in minutes. great bars around the block. Nice!

barbara was very, very friendly and greeted us warmly. She is an active and fast replied to all the questions. The house is comfortable and equipped with everything you need really. In particular landscape seen from the terrace is amazing! If I want to go back to Budapest staying in this house. Thanks. borbàra.

Barbola jest przemiłą gospodynią, starająca się dbać o swoich gości. Zastaliśmy nie tylko przygotowane mieszkanie, ale również zaopatrzoną lodówkę.  Mieszkanie ma swój specyficzny klimat. Widok z balkonu, to rewelacja, szczególnie w nocy.
Jesteśmy bardzo zadowoleni z pobytu i polecamy ten dom innym.
review_summary: A sweet cozy apartment in the heart of Buda with an amazing view from a green balcony. Recommended for two people, but three can fit as well! City center is 10mins. Apartment is fully equiped, it gives complete comfort. A home away from home.
house_rules: As it is home away from home, please take care of it with respect. Smoking is allowed only on the balcony.
description:
A sweet cozy apartment in the heart of Buda with an amazing view from a green balcony. Recommended for two people, but three can fit as well! City center is 10mins. Apartment is fully equiped, it gives complete comfort. A home away from home.

This sweet home lies at Naphegy (Sunhill) and as it says the name, it is a very bright place. So is it the apartment, being on the top (3rd) floor . In the house there are only 6 apartments, so it is mainly quiet. 
When you enter the apartment, you turn right and you find the small bathroom and kitchen. From the kitchen window you get a nice view on the houses at the other side of the street. 
By turning left when you enter, you find a big space with the dining room and a huge living space. At the corner of the living room there is the couch with a double bed that accomodates a couple with nice sleeping, if guests would like to have their own space for sleeping, there is a double air mattress that can be used as well. 
From the living room you can go out to the balcony and enjoy the wonderful view on the Buda Castle and the West Walls of the Castle. 
I am sure that you will have an unforgetable time in Budapest when chosing to be my guest :)

Next to the kitchen there is my bedroom, which the guests cannot use by now. It will be closed down. 
To all other places guests have access to, and as the bedroom is only 4 squaremeter, and the whole apartment is 51, guest can enjoy a whole lot of space :)
I will not be there at home, so the apartment will be yours for the time of your visit :)

I will be mostly in Budapest. You can contact me anytime and I try my best to help you out with anything asap.

The neighborhood is very quiet and peaceful. Though it lies really close to the Buda Castle and the Várkert Bazár, it is not a touristic place anymore, there are mostly locals living on lovely Sunhill :)
2 minutes walking there is the Tabán park, which is really nice place, too. 
A lot of locals go there with their dogs or running, playing tennis and football, or just sitting on the bench and sunbath :)

Excellent public transport. Bus nr5, nr16, nr105, nr178, and tram nr56.

reviews_text:
The location is super convenient to public transportation, and Dario is a great, easygoing host. 

Perfect communication, Dario and his housemate were very helpful. Lovely stay. 

Borci maji radi cesky pivo ^^

Dario is a very cool guy. His apartment is very well placed in the city i.e very near to the metro station, making it quite accessible. Basic amenities were quite good, wifi was also provided. Since the checkout time was flexible we were able to enjoy the city very much and then later on collect our bags from his apartment. My group has enjoyed the stay and we would recommend others to stay at this place.

I had a great stay at Dario's. He and his friends were very helpful and fun to hang out with. The flat is very central and easily to reach. The next time I'm in town I'd be happy to stay with them again.

Dario and his roommate was very nice and helpful. Apartment is located close to city center and the blue metro is just downstairs. Had a very nice stay.

What an Airbnb experience at Dario's place. Dario tries to make everything possible happen. He first told me the only rule is that there was no rule. The appartment is a bit old but well located and for the price and Dario's kindness you couldn't be unhappy!Thanks Dario for accepting me at the last minute and contributing to my amazing stay in Budapest !

Great location- close to the major attractions of Budapest and easy access to the public transport. The room is basic as mentioned in the offer, but all I needed was a bed and shower so didn't expect much. Dario is a very nice and helpful guy, he makes me feel welcome from the moment I arrived. Cool atmosphere, friendly people. I'm really glad I booked it!

I must say that Dario is a friendly and kind person... He even took time off to hang with me and showed some few places.
The room, I must say, was within my expectation; I was tight on budget and wanted something "as cheap and simple" as possible and I got it.

It a simple, cozy place; my advice is don't expect a "5*".


I have to say that this Airbnb experience has been one of my best one! I have been doing a lot of times Airbnb before but this time I really felt like I was one of their (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN)! Dario and his flatmate Giovani offered me coffee; showed me around and even cooked for me ! What else could you ask from a host ?
The room was really big and the location of the apartment was perfect, very central; close to supermarkets, bars and everything you would wish!  I really recommend this place If you decide to do a short stay in Budapest and enjoy the city !


Dario is cool ! It was very nice to meet him, the room is exactly like the photos, all service available, excellent location, excellent choose !

Everything was great!

reviews_text:
The apartment is located in a comfortable part of town, and felt very central. We purchased a two day ticket for the hop on bus from Balasz, which could be caught at a bus stop 2 minutes away. The metro train line is also only 2 minutes walk, so it was very convenient.

We stayed in winter which was lovely! The apartment is really well heated, and it took around 10-15 minutes to walk to the Christmas markets which were an absolute highlight.

The area is full of great cafe's and restaurants. We particularly enjoyed Menza up the street and recommend it to any guests (best coffee and breakfast we tried while staying)

And of course the bath was fantastic to have after a long day walking out in the cold. 

A very well located and nice apartment in Budapest.

The apartment is very nice, stylish and cosy. The kitchen has everything that a tourist can need. The bathroom is spacious and clean. Overall staying in this apartment was a great part of our trip to Budapest!

Couldn't recommend balazs apartment enough! It's clean, warm, a value for money and right in the centre! We couldn't have asked for more!
Even though our plane from the uk ran 45 mins late, the transfer to the apartment was still smooth and on time and Emilia was there to meet us and recommend places to go and even provided us with a map! 
If you're coming to Budapest this is the place to stay!
Thanks so much for having us!x

Everything was perfect. The flat was exactly as described, well supplied, very comfortable and the location couldn't be better!
Balázs was very kind and accommodating, just like his friend Klara who welcomed us at the apartment. We had a very great time here at the flat and we really recommended it!
Many thanks Klara and Balazs! :)

Balász was very accommodating. He organised transportation to and from the airport which made for a smooth arrival and departure. The apartment is beautiful, very tastefully decorated and in a perfect, central location for exploring Budapest on foot, we didn't use public transportation at all as a result! I would highly recommend a stay here. 

My friend and I had a very nice stay at Balász's apartment. It was well furnished, tidy and very comfortable - also in a very good spot in Budapest, close to almost all the points of interest in town. Even though Balász didn't greet us, a friend of him kindly showed us the apt and provided us with all the information about the city. 
Recommended!

Although we did not see Balazs, we were made welcome by Emelia. I itiallywe did not have the keys through. O fault of their own.

Balazs friend, Emilia, welcomed me to the flat. She made a lot of recommendations and they were all excellent! The flat itself is so charming and I loved the bath. I also made the mistake of doing my reservation dates wrong, so when the time came to check out I was not ready. They handled it with such grace, thank you Balazs and Emilia!

We did not meet Balazs in person, but we were welcomed perfectly by his friend Elizabeth. Transport from and to the AirPort was arranged, questions we had were answered within the hour. 

The appartment itself matches the pictures exactly so that was beautiful, spacious and wel equipped. Location couldn't be more central. Everything within walking distance.

Thanks for the wonderful stay, we will most certainly advice this appartment to friends.

review_summary: Check this brand new apartment in the Jókai square! This is the real city centre! The flat is in one of the most famous square of Budapest! Shops, bars, restaurants are next to the flat. The most of the sights are in walking distance! :) FROM NOW: A/C in the apartment!!!
house_rules:

description:
Check this brand new apartment in the Jókai square! This is the real city centre! The flat is in one of the most famous square of Budapest! Shops, bars, restaurants are next to the flat. The most of the sights are in walking distance! :) FROM NOW: A/C in the apartment!!!

It is a very good mix that the modern style apartment is in an old and historical building and area. You can enjoy the old atmosphere and the modern lifestyle at the same time.

The apartment is on the 1stfloor of the building but there's an elevator. 
Bathroom with a shower and a toilet, and a fully equipped kitchen with a tiny dining table. 

New and cozy apartment that enjoys a great location right in the city center. All the main tourist spots, restaurants and bars are just steps away. You won´t even need to use public transportation.

The apartment is located in a quite courtyard directly in the city center. The St. Stephan Square with the Basilica, the Hero's square, Parliament, Andrássy boulevard with the opre house and many luxury shops, and other major spots in the historical part of Budapest can be reached within a maximum of 5-10 minutes walk or public transport from the apartment. The famous night life streets (Király street with Gozsdu) are just a 5-minute walk away.

Museums, restaurants, convenience stores, cafés, bars, clubs and parks are just steps away. 

Parking can be found on the streets around, however, the space cannot be guaranteed. The parking is free from 8PM till 8AM (Mon-Fri), weekends are free of charge. Secured paid parking is set just a next to your apartment. This is a paid parking but the rates are very affordable and it´s secured. We´ll provide you with more information and directions upon request.

Children are the most important people in our lives. Cribs and high chairs are available upon request from now on in all of our apartments for our little baby guests! The extra equipment costs just 7EUR/night (cash).

The apartment is equipped with flat screen TV, fridge/freezer, electric cooker, microwave oven, WLAN Internet, electric kettle and hair dryer.

I normally meet guests personally to hand over they keys and provide a brief tour. If required they keys can be left for pickup at an agreed location instead.

The easiest way to come from the airport if you come with our transfer. 
At your request, we can organise a transfer direct from the airport to the flat, when you travel by airplane. It only costs 25EUR/car/one way (or 7.800HUF) (unitl 4 people). A hostess will be waiting for you and see you to the taxi at your convenience, so you won’t have any trouble to find the car :) You have to pay the amount for the driver!
If you would like, we can organise a transfer back to the airport too, which can be arranged at your arrival. To order the transfer please inform me about your flight number and exactly arrival time!

If you would like to use the public transport system, it is also not complicated.
Take the bus nr. 200E until the station Köbánya-Kispest, than travel with the metro line nr 3. until the station Nyugati tér! Change for the tram line 4/6 and come until the station Oktogon!

Warning: Don't change to much money at the airport to pay for the public transport! The exchange rate is extremly bad there!

I organise a lot of tour in Budapest and Hungary too.  F.e.: ruin pub tour, escape rooms, discover Budapest tour, jewish quarter, spa's, Visegrád, Esztergom, etc. Guide: english, german.
I have also pro photographer who can you lead on the tour and take beautiful photos about you and your group. 

At your request, we can organise a transfer direct from the airport to the flat, when you travel by airplane. It only costs 25EUR/car/one way (or 7.800HUF) (unitl 4 people). A hostess will be waiting for you and see you to the taxi at your convenience, so you won’t have any trouble to find the car :) You have to pay the amount for the driver!
If you would like, we can organise a transfer back to the airport too, which can be arranged at your arrival. To order the transfer please inform me about your flight number and exactly arrival time!

The place is good located and the view is just incredible. Great journey. 


wonderful hosting and wonderful apartment

Neighborhood safe and walkable to sights, food, nightlife 

AWESOME ... simple as that!
Take a look at the picture ... see the view from the window? It doesn't get any more central than that. The welcoming was super sweet and I had alot of fun chatting. 
Places like this are the reason I'm not even looking for hotels anymore ... Thank you so much!

Perfect place to stay

Had the best time in a Budapest and this apartment was great. Fantastic location close to all major sites, food, public transport and shops. Eva, Miki and Aron were fantastic hosts. Very responsive, efficient, nice and helpful. We unfortunately lost our keys one day and they moved mountains to help us out within their busy schedule. This apartment or any AirBnB location hosted by them are highly recommended. Thanks so much for a great time in Budapest.

Apartment was very nice and quiet in a great location. The hosts were very accommodating as well.

Hosts were very welcoming even when plans changed they  found a way to welcome us and make it work. Local advice went a long way to settling in. The hosts are easily contacted and fast to reply. The apartment is modest yet clean, tidy and in a great position with an amazing view. Would definitely recommend for anyone wishing to visit Budapest.
availability: 2 nights minimum stay.From Aug 8 - 16, 2017 the minimum stay is 4 nights.
review_summary: In the centre of Budapest next to River Danube and the Parliament i offer a little, but cozy apartment for 1-3 people with picturesque view to River Danube and the Castle. The place is close to main tourist sites and to party places in a very safe environment.
house_rules:
Im not a company so i dont like to limit my guest. There are some basic rules, but the main one is to feel yourself at home:

Smoking is allowed only outside of the building.
No party at the flat.
No loud sounds after 10pm and respect the neighbours.
description:
In the centre of Budapest next to River Danube and the Parliament i offer a little, but cozy apartment for 1-3 people with picturesque view to River Danube and the Castle. The place is close to main tourist sites and to party places in a very safe environment.

The apartment is 30 m2, separated into a big room and small one, a kitchen, a bathroom with toilet, and a hallway. The flat has windows to River Danube and to the Castle.
The flat was redesigned in July 2016.
The place is suitable for 1-3 people. There is a very comfortable sofa for two people (160x200 cm), which can function as a bed or a sofa as well. And one single bed at the smaller room.
The kitchen is well equipped with fridge, micro, electric cooking plate, caffe and tea maker, all cooking stuff.
The apartment has been renewed in the beginning of 2014, and equipped with new furnitures, and is open from July 2014.
The apartment is on the 7rd floor, but there is elevator in the building.

Facilities: 
2 room apartment of 30 m2 
1 bathroom with toilet 
a sofa for two persons in the bigger room and a single bed in the smaller room  
all bed-linen, towels are provided 
wifi
world-wide adapter
fan
fully equipped kitchen 
washing machine
hair dryer
can arrange guided socio-cultural walking tours in Budapest  (if you are looking for the Hungarian reality)

If you arrive by car, there is a paying underground parking lot close to my building, if necessary i can arrange you parking place in advance.

Bicycle rent is very close, i can also arrange bikes for you.

You can reach me by phone, email, Viber or (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN)!
I always try to meet with my guests personally, or ask a friend to help me out. So we handle you the keys, show the place around and make some recommendations if needed, than leave the apartment for you!

Guide:
If you give me your preferencies i can offer various places in advance (restaurants, bars, partyplaces, touristic sites, etc.) and when you check-in i can give you a guide with a selection of local restaurants, pubs, bars, party places, and sights.

Check in/check out:
Check in and check out times are flexible, but please let me know in advance when will you plan to arrive/leave.

Enjoy your stay in Budapest, its a lovely city!

The neighbourhood:
My street is running down to the Danube and located between Chain Bridge and the Houses of Parliament.
The location is in the centre of Budapest, with very good connections to public transports (all metros). You can find everything you need in the neighbourhood.
The area is full of renovated houses from 19th century, so it has a unique atmosphere.

The neighbourhood is safe so you can even walk home at night completely safe.
The Houses of Parliament and the Chain Bridge is in 5 minutes walking time, the major attractions of Budapest can be reached in 15-20 minutes.
With a short walk you can reach the Budapest party quarter, which is full of bars.

Guest registration:
In my price the local tourist tax is included, so i wont charge you any more, but i have to register every guest.
Every month i have to send a disclosure to the municipality, but only with the number of people and nights. And in the meantime i need to write a register about my guest, because if i get a tax investigation i need to have this to prove i sent good figures in the disclosure.

So the datas will only go to my register nowhere else (of course if i get an investigation the hungarian tax authority can check it).

The datas that will need from every guest:
Full name
Date and place of birth
Address
Number of passport or ID
Nationality

review_summary:
This apartment is in the heart of Downtown, Budapest. It is newly renovated and has a compact and well equipped kitchen, a clean, modern bathroom and a cozy dining area. 
The sleeping area is located in a mezzanine-level area which gives more privacy and added lounge space.
The Studio is in an apartment complex, with a common sauna and large terrace: a great recipe for making new friends!
house_rules:
Booking: Please do not exceed the amount of people that you booked for.

Smoking: This is a non-smoking property, please do not smoke inside.

Neighbours: Please watch the noise levels and keep quiet between 22:00 - 07:00, we care about our neighbours.

Family: We treat our guests as family, please take care of our property and treat it with respect.

Borrowing: If you borrow anything from our property, please bring it back as it was.
description:
This apartment is in the heart of Downtown, Budapest. It is newly renovated and has a compact and well equipped kitchen, a clean, modern bathroom and a cozy dining area. 
The sleeping area is located in a mezzanine-level area which gives more privacy and added lounge space.
The Studio is in an apartment complex, with a common sauna and large terrace: a great recipe for making new friends!

The studio features a fully equipped kitchen, a bathroom and a small dining area next to the bed. What makes this place special is its amazingly big terrace and sauna, both are common area which means you'll be making new friends.
The big windows allow the natural light to come in and light the studio in an elegant and relaxing way.
The sleeping area is in a mezzanine-level which is great for privacy and added space.

This studio is part of a bigger apartment complex in which you can rent additional rooms if you are a big group.

The entire apartment is for your use. Please read and respect our house rules.

Upon your arrival we will discuss the exact time and place we should meet, or we can offer you a self check in option. We are generally flexible about the check-in and check-out times, so let us know if you have any special requests. We will do our best to accommodate your needs if the schedule allows it.

The neighborhood features some great restaurants, which will allow you to discover our unique Hungarian cuisine. You will also be able to find a few interesting nightlife spots within a walking distance from the apartment.

The public transportation system of the city is really great and easily accessible.

reviews_text:
Zsolt is a really cool guy and he did everything he could to make our stay wonderful. The neighbourhood is really quiet and lovely. So if you're passing through or you just want a nice apartment that's near the city centre, this is the place for you. :)

Recommended for all travellers, excellent location and very near to the metro station that connects you to everywhere possible. 

Apartment very pleasant and ideal for four people. The host is very friendly and smiling. Perfect for sightseeing. Close to downtown and easily accessible by public transports.

Thank you Zsolt :)

Great clean apartment with a good location close to metro. Thanks for letting us stay so late!

Very nice

Very good apartment !!! Zsolt is very good !!! Thank you very much and see you we have loved Budapest !! :)

Zsolt's appartment was very cleans and nice, everything equiped very well, especially Kitchen! Location of appartment was also great, close to metro station 'Klinikak' 5~7min by walk. We met Sophie, she was very freindly, guided us well and gave us very helpfeul information. Staying at his place was nice experience for us :) 



Great place, close to everything fbig and confortable 

Zsolt's house is one of my best Airbnb experience! I personally don't have the opportunity to interact with Zsolt but we communicate well on the app. Sophie guided us about the house and she is a very nice person. 

The house is near to public transport (both metro and bus station) with an around 10 minutes walk. The house itself is very well designed and clean.
Together with its price, it is definitely a 5 star choice, highly recommended!!!

We had a very pleasant, albeit short, (EMAIL HIDDEN)munication with Zsolt was great prior top our arrival in Budapest and during our stay.  We were met at the apartment by his girlfriend, Sophie, who gave us the rundown of the flat and some useful sightseeing information.

The apartment is indeed very modern and was very neat upon our arrival.  It also has a particularly large living room which would be great for visitors looking for some downtime on longer stays.

The apartment is also walking distance from the metro station and a number of tram stops.

We would definitely recommend Zsolt's apartment for anyone wanting to visit Budapest!
review_summary: Our newly refurbished apartment has a great living room with a dining and TV area as well as a large couch for two people. The bedroom has a comfortable king size bed and a huge wardrobe for all your luggage. Fully equipped kitchen and new bathroom.
description: Our newly refurbished apartment has a great living room with a dining and TV area as well as a large couch for two people. The bedroom has a comfortable king size bed and a huge wardrobe for all your luggage. Fully equipped kitchen and new bathroom.

reviews_text:
David was such a fantastic host even though he was away all through our stay we felt very comfortable to contact him before and during.  I misread the instructions for access and tried to ring, within minutes he had rang me back, answered my questions and got me out of the cold Budapest air before explaining the whole process.  Directions were perfect.  The location is the best I have stayed in, the Christmas markets were just outside our balcony and the fireplace made the room so cosy and welcoming from entry til our departure day.

It was a great apartment! The location was perfect and the view was amazing. 

The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This flat was absolutely perfect!  The location was amazing, and the view was beautiful!  We did not take the elevator the first day because it looked "scary".  It worked very well and there was nothing to be scared of.  It was actually very "vintage" and unique!  There is a dog run in the park across the street, such a pet friendly and perfect place.   Absolutely wonderful experience!  

David replied to messages promptly and finding the apartment and gaining access was very easy. The location is perfect and so central for anywhere you'd want to go in Budapest.
i cannot recommend this apartment enough - you will not be disappointed. 

This appartment couldn't be more central in Budapest! Also it has a Great balcony view 

good location, nice apartment, good host , will explain you everything you need 
Thanks David

Our stay at the appartment was perfect! The location was great and right what we needed. Will definitely book again :-)
review_summary: The flat is in the heart of Budapest. Really the best location with many facilities. From the apart you can reach the most famous places by walk. There is a great view to the park, so it is an absolutely lovely place:) Restaurants, bars, museums, discos, historical places, parks, coffees...

reviews_text:
Charlie is a great host, a very nice and helpfull guy. He gave us hints & tips regarding places to eat, what to visit, where to buy things in the area and helped us with every information we needed/situation we had. The building and the neighbourhood is beautiful, central, perfect to go in any direction of the town. The best part is the Sector (distrikt) 7, which is at a 5 minutes walk. 
Tram, buses and the subway are easily accessible. 
The appartment was very clean, spacious and comfy. It features everything from towels, to plates, fridge, etc.
We'll return for sure to repeat the experience, especially if Charlie will keep the same price. :) 
Thank you for this lovely and smooth experience, Charlie! 

Big hug from Bucharest,
M & D


HIGHLY RECOMMENDED FLAT!!!
The appartement is located very close to the metro and tram stations. Calm. Very bright room. Impeccably clean.
Thank you Charlie for all the information about Budapest that you gave us :)
We spent a really good week-end!

Amazing location, amazing apartment, amazing host - what more could you ask for. Everything it is described and more. Would stay again for sure. Thank you :)

Charlie was a wonderful host, so helpful and available with a lot of great tips.  And the appartment clean and bright, in walking distance with everything. would definetely recommend staying here!

We really enjoyed our stay! The location was perfect, close to the metro and the tram. The building was beautiful and the apartment was great, it had everything you needed. Charlie was a great host and came with very good tips about the city. He could not meet us up but instead Agnes meet us up who was really kind! Tanks for everything!

Charlie was absolutely fantastic so helpful and he gave us plenty of great recommendations of places to eat and to visit. The apartment was terrific, warm and comfortable and brilliantly located in the centre of the city.  5 stars all round! Thank you so much Charlie.

The location is great; quiet yet super easy access to everywhere. Metro, tram, and a big market less than 5min away walking. Well worth staying, definitely feels like home away from home. 

Excellent host. Agnes is the best.

We really loved Charlie's apartment, it had everything to make our stay comfortable. The location is really great, very close to public transport.

Communication with Charlie was perfect! Very polite and respectful host. Apartment is clean, bright and comfortable. It has everything you need.  Location is wonderful for me at least. Also there is many supermarkets near and great transport connection. I would stay again if I came to Budapest third time. Many thanks!
review_summary: One room sunny apartment in the one of the most beautiful house in the centre of Budapest.
house_rules: Smoking is forbidden in the flat, you can do on the balcony. Moreover do not be to noisy, think of the families in the neighbourhood. Many thanks.
description:
One room sunny apartment in the one of the most beautiful house in the centre of Budapest.

This apartment is ideal for any tourists or people coming for leisure as most of the interesting things of the city can be reached in 15 mins on foot.
The connection of the apartment is perfect. The metro and the main tram line (24 hours) is 2 min and the ruin pub area is 5 min on foot (the most popular ruin bar, the Szimpla is 8 min.)
From the Keleti railway station the apartment is 10 min. by public transport. From the airport is 30 min. by taxi and 70 min. by public transport.
The apartment is on the second floor and the house has got two elevator.
The kitchen is well-equipped, you can find there everything you need.
The apartment has one 160 cm wide double bed with a very comfortable matress for two persons and a 140 cm wide sofabed.

You can reach me anytime during your holiday.
I'll give you map,  useful tripguides and lot of information about the city (interesting places, hungarian dishes you must try, best restaurants, bars, shops etc) at the check-in (and before your arrival if you want).
If you have questions please don't hesitate to write me.
Being parents we welcome children with pleasure. We can provide high chair, bed and bath for little children.
I like to help people to feeling good in my country, I can give you tips about where to go and how to get around as cheap as possible.
When going abroad I think it's important to have a clean apartment where I feel at home. Think about a warm welcome by the host(s), a comfortable bed, plenty of towels and a fully equiped kitchen to cook with fresh and local food. That is what I aim to achieve for my guests who visit Budapest.

You can find supermarket, pharmacy, change (one of the best in Budapest) 24hours shop, very good restaurants and a lovely market in 3 minutes from the apartment.

We can provide safety parking place in a yard in 5 min. from the apartment.

Please be aware that we work different price at New Years , Sziget Festival and Formula one. Thank you for understanding.

reviews_text:
David made everything to make us feel like at home! Delicious coffee, tea and even a bottle of wine in the kitchen, clean and beautiful flat. Earlier arrival/departure were not a problem as well.
Highly recommend!!!

The place was awesome. David was very helpful berfore and during our trip. 
The appartment is clean and really close to everything in the center. 
We had a amazing stay in this appartment.

David's place has everything you need to enjoy a citytrip in Budapest. It was perfect to sleep and stay with four persons. David, as a host, communicates efficiently and he made sure to welcome us in person even though we only arrived around midnight. In short: friendly, clean, well accommodated and right at the centre of Budapest! We can definetely recommend this place!

David was an excellent host with very good communication. He met us at the door and made us feel very welcome. The apartment is spacious, clean, and very nicely furnished. I would recommend it to anyone looking to spend some time in Budapest.

David's place is great for anyone who wants to spend some time in Budapest. It is close to everything, yet on a quiet street. David is friendly and responsive and the apartment well equipped. Everything is at least as good as it looks in the pictures and I would happily recommend this place!

All is great! 

David was super nice and easy to reach. He answered our messages or questions within a very short time, and was very helpful. He welcomed us in the apartment, and showed us everything and gave us good advices about what to do and where to eat in Budapest. The apartment was very clean and nice and had everything we needed, except some more air conditioning - it got really hot because of the good weather. The area is pretty quit (though there is a hostel close by that we could hear some noise from the first night), but it is situated very close to centrum and close to different kinds of supermarkets and metro stations.

David was amazing. He made the check in and check out very smooth. Although some problems arose he automatically sorted them out politely and efficiently. Location of the flat is perfect only 10 minutes from central and near many restaurants and food shops. 15 minutes walk to/from Main Station and easily accessible. Would definitely recommend to stay here if you want an authentic and very comfortable stay in Budapest. 

Very kind and generous host. Met us as the station to deliver the key while we waited to get tickets for our next train. Very descriptive in directions and the building. The space was large, comfortable, and had a wonderful shower! Clean and modern with a quick walk to everything we needed to see. 

David is a really friendly guy, who explained me everything. The Apartment is very clean and modern. I enjoyed my stay here
review_summary: Peaceful place next to the ruinpib area. The house so uniq. Everthing is close.  This is a cute aprtment.
house_rules: Smoking inside a flat is not allowed, and in the corridor as well. My/your neighbors would be gratefull if you weren't loud in the building. Small animals are more than welcome. Thanks :)
description:
Peaceful place next to the ruinpib area. The house so uniq. Everthing is close.  This is a cute aprtment.

Rebuilt just now! 3 min. by walk and you are the Soho of Budapest! Everthing is close. The windows see the street that is so qiut! This is a cute apartment.

Rebuilt just now! The building is retro, I'm sure you won't find anything like this. The apartment is really cozy and cute. The kitchen is equipped with everything that you need for cooking. For the morning coffee you don't need to go to the Starbucks :) Free wifi and TV with NETFLIX. The apartment is situated exactly in the center of the city. Everything is near! In the apartment you can find guide books (eng/ger) and maps to find all the places.  I have plug adaptor for English guests.

I have for you: shampoo, soap, towels, hair drier

Come and have a great time in Budapest!

During your stay you can always call me on mobile and via apps.

This area is one of the historical quater. The Soho of Budapest is 3 min. by walk. So close but still silent! Great public transport as well. You can see everything in Budapest if you want.

Metro isn't far and we have non-stop tram which is the most convenient transportation.

Parking: on the street, only on working days: 8-20h 440HUF/hour;

reviews_text:
Fabulous apartment! Such a lovely stay from start to finish. Viktor took time to settle us in and gave some great recommendations!  He and Kata couldn't have been more helpful. The apartment itself is such a gem and would definitely recommend it. Only sad we couldn't stay longer! 

One of the best places I ve ever stayed. The apartm was clean, tidy and it looks the same as in the photos. Viktor gave us great tips for the city and what to do. Kata and him made us feel very welcomed and they were available during the length of our stay. Definitely the best choice for someone who wants to visit Budapest!

The perfect place to stay in Budapest!
The apartment is beautifully renovated and instantly makes you feel at home. The neighborhood is close to everything and we mostly walked around. Thanks Kata & Viktor for the great tips and the hospitality. We'll be back for sure!

Viktor was friendly and efficient, providing lots of useful  information when we arrived. Kata was also very helpful with reservations and information by email. the apartment is decorated with taste and attention to fine detail. The neighborhood is calm and safe and very well served by public transport. Very nice restaurants within walking distance. We couldn't recommend this appartement more. We stayed 4 nights and everything was perfect! Thank you Kata and Viktor. 

Quiet possibly the best place to stay in Budapest! A clean, spacious and relaxing apartment that is in a prime location of all amenities. Victor & Kata were so accommodating and helpful throughout our stay. 100% recommendation.  

The apartment of Viktor and Kata is new renovated, tidy, very lovely arranged and located well downtown. There's everything you need in near distance. Victor is a a really nice host, who gave a us many recommendations for good restaurants and places all over Budapest. He even made an appointment with a local dentist for me because I had an incident with my teeth - it all worked out totally fine. 
We are very happy that we chose his wonderful apartment, it was just a perfect stay in Budapest. 

Viktor met us at the flat and gave us a warm welcome and some great pointers for places to eat & drink in the area, as well as music venues further afield.
The flat is newly renovated (high spec decoration), with a well equipped kitchen and fantastic shower.   And comfy underfloor heating! Plus a desktop Mac on the dining table - v useful.
The apartment building has tons of character and is on a quiet street.   We loved the location in the VIIth district (just around the corner from the New York coffee house) and walked everywhere from there.  Hugely recommend it as a Budapest bolthole for couples!

Our stay in Budapest was lovely, the apartment was is such a great location so close to everything! Viktor and Kata made us feel very welcome, giving lots of tips and places to go. The apartment was even better than the photos and would definitely recommend this place!

Victor and kata's place was better than I imagined.  This was my first air bnb experience and they have set the bar very high!  Victor was so organized and professional and helpful, the character of the space beautifully maintained and yet everything remodeled in such a respectful manner to the integrity of the building. They are thoroughly deserving of a 5 star rating from the coffee and cream, bottled water, toiletries and dish of candy, to the comfortable bed, computer and perfectly placed wall clock.  Every need was anticipated and we thank you for your hospitality!!

We had an excellent stay at Horsfa utca. Apartment is new and very cosy and set in a beautiful old apartment block. Very much recommended AAA
availability: The minimum night stay for this listing varies.
review_summary:
Beautiful and unique apartment in the heart of the city, overlooking a quiet street.
This cozy apartment is a real specialty with its original inner decor, stucco and stained glass.
For 2 people with a big double bed and all you need for a comfortable stay.
Newly renovated to provide the comfort of modernity but to save the beauty of authentic interior.
house_rules: - - Please do not disturb the neighbors! We request you avoid being noisy and respect the privacy of the people, who live in the house. We ask you, not to smoke in the apartment! Please note that we will charge 10 EUR extra fee for late check in after 8pm.  Thank you!
description:
Beautiful and unique apartment in the heart of the city, overlooking a quiet street.
This cozy apartment is a real specialty with its original inner decor, stucco and stained glass.
For 2 people with a big double bed and all you need for a comfortable stay.
Newly renovated to provide the comfort of modernity but to save the beauty of authentic interior.

THE SPACE
In the heart of the city, behind the famous New York Palace Cafe, in an ornate building built in 1897 we have found a real treasure and fell in love with it.
This cozy apartment is a real specialty with its original inner decor, stucco and carvings, high ceilings and beautiful doors and windows.
The apartment is on the 1st floor of the building and it is newly renovated to provide the comfort of a modern home.

We believe the apartment is well equipped to provide a comfortable stay.

KITCHEN 
well equipped with with ceramic glass cooker, kettle, toaster, microwave, Illy coffee machine (with free 100% arabica coffee), tableware, professional knives, dishwasher liquid, kitchen textiles.

BEDROOM AND DINING AREA
Large double bed (160 cm). 
The windows can be completely darkened, bed sheets, linens and pillows provided. 
Armchair,
Sofa, 
Commode,
and dinner table for 4.

BATHROOM with a comfortable shower.
Towels, soap, toilet paper, hairdryer provided.

TOILET separated from the bathroom

OTHER: 
air-conditioning
wardrobe with hangers
full length mirror
free wifi
underfloor heating
safe and cheep parking near the building

We would like to make your stay in Budapest as nice as possible, so don't hesitate to contact us if you need any help or information.

THE NEIGHBORHOOD
The apartment looks over a small and quiet street, but its just 3 minutes walk to the grand boulevard (Erzsébet körút).
Its behind the famous New York Palace Cafe and along Dohány street, you get to the middle of the most inspiring and exciting, upcoming areas of Budapest. The Jewish quarter, Europe's largest Synagogue, the Opera House, Basilica, interesting design shops, boutiques, art galleries as well as a lot of nice cafes, restaurants and the ruin pubs are all within walking distance.

GETTING AROUND
As the apartment is just right in the center, you can reach almost all sights by walk.
Public transport - subway, buses and trams, all a few steps away- puts the entire city within easy reach. 
Just 3 minutes by walk there is a stop of trams Nr. 4 and 6, running 0-24 across the city and connecting Buda with Pest.
Closest metro stations on Blaha square (M2 Line) takes only 3 minutes to reach. 
We are 10 minutes from Nyugati railway station by tram and even closer to Keleti railway station from where you can easily walk.
24/7 secure parking available a few minutes walk from the building.

Please note that we will charge 10 EUR extra fee for late check in after 8pm.

reviews_text: A good place for students and travellers with low expectations. The apartment is cheap and close to Király utca and Andrassy ut. The apartment has a nice small kitchen with a gas cooker and oven, a microwave and fridge. The bathroom has a small bath with shower.
review_summary:
Cozy apartment for couples, friends, lonely travelers. The place is in the center of Budapest with great public transport. The place is near to a few clubs like Instant or 360 BAR but far enough to be quite place.

Otthonos, fényes lakás jó közlekedéssel. Bulizni vágyók részére este is könnyen megközelíthető.

reviews_text:
Great vibe!

Andrea's apartment is perfect. I highly recommend to stay at Andrea's place. The host is very helpful - she recommendeted places to visit and to eat.
The place is even nicer than it's shown on the photos.

Appartamento come da foto bellissimo tornero di sicuro perché merita ed è  stata molto gentile e profesdionale andrea

review_summary: Stylish and industrial, this apartment is situated on a quiet street and is steps away from the main shopping street and landmarks of Budapest. This rental offers hotel features but provides the familiar feel of home. It is fashionably furnished with amenities like flatscreen TV, high-speed Wifi, Netflix, Air Conditioning, Nespresso. This is the art of voyage!
description:
Stylish and industrial, this apartment is situated on a quiet street and is steps away from the main shopping street and landmarks of Budapest. This rental offers hotel features but provides the familiar feel of home. It is fashionably furnished with amenities like flatscreen TV, high-speed Wifi, Netflix, Air Conditioning, Nespresso. This is the art of voyage!

This is the art of voyage.  It's a fully equipped apartment with all amenities you may need just like you would be in a hotel. 
Relax while watching Netflix or listening the JBL booster. Refresh in our stylish bathroom, or just fall asleep in the king size bed. 
You will find: 2 large TVs with netflix and cable channels, hair dryer, iron and board, Nespresso

We are here to help. Let us know by mail, phone, (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN), Viber or in any other forms you prefer, what you are up to. Being locals we can give you the latest hotspots of the city.

The art of voyage appartments are in the middle of the city center. Vaci street (the shopping street) is 2 steps away so is the Danube bank. The market hall, bars and restaurants are withing 5-10 minutes walk.

reviews_text:
I enjoyed my stay with Niki and Vajk a lot, they are really nice, relaxed and helpful hosts - if I had a question I could always ask and they were happy to recommend places, public transport possibilities or clubs and bars. And from time to time I got the chance to try Niki's home-made Hungarian foods that tasted absolutely delicious (I still remember the recipe for the potato gratin and I will make it for my family - if I find sausages similar to the Hungarian ones).
My room was so cozy and homey, it made me feel welcome right from the start. And also it looked just like the pictures - so no bad surprises there! 
When there is  another guest staying in the second room on the top floor, you have to share a bathroom with her and in my three months with Niki and Vajk it was never a problem sharing that bathroom. Even though the bathroom itself is not huge, it has everything one could need in it and still enough space to place your own toiletries there.
I also loved the fact that Manna, Niki and Vajk's cat,  greeted me whenever I came home. She's such a sweet and cuddly bundle of fur :)
The apartment is located on the Buda side of the city which means it is about 15 Minutes by bus into the heart of the Jewish Quarter where all the nightlife is at. But I still think its a great location because it is really quiet. The only thing you do hear are sounds from the train station that is about 5 minutes walk away from the house. Apart from that it is perfect to find some peace and quiet and still be able to reach the city center whenever you feel like going out.
To whoever thinks about staying with Niki and Vajk I'd say: don't hesitate, it's a great room to stay in!

I throughly enjoyed my stay at Vajk's. He and niki are wonderful hosts very warm and welcoming. I had the opportunity to chat with Vajk and you can tell he tries to do what he can to make his guests feel welcomed. There was open communication before and during my stay which made checkin very easy. I felt comfortable and at home a perfect way to relax after a long day of walking and sightseeing. My room was spacious and clean. The bathroom was clean as well and should you need the bus it pass right in front of the apartment's main door. I also loved Monna ,their cat so cute and fluffy:)

Vajk is very friendly! The location is very convenient, with the bus stop just in front of the building. The apartment looks just like the photos. There's a poster of the Pixar movie 'Up' on the room door and the decoration within really did remind me of the adventurous life of Carl and Ellie. :)

Lovely stay!

I always went out for my work , so I didn't really interact with owners. But, it was good to have privacy and to use kitchen to cook!
They were kind hosts when i come to them asking something!

If you are hesitating for the room reservation, you don't have to hesitate.
I recommend you to stay.

We spent a good time at Vajk's. He is very uncomplicated, we changed our booking at late notice and he had no problem with it at all and we could find a solution that benefitted everyone. This was very nice of him!
The room is very nice, big and looks quite cute. The private bathroom is good too. Vajk was very helpful, he gave us a map and offered to help us find something if we need it.
The bus really stops right in front of his place which is really convenient. The buda castle is also easily reachable on foot.
I can recommend you very much to stay at Vajks place!☺


It is ok
Transport facilities

very nice people, they made me feel at home, always willing to help me. the house is beautiful, comfortable, harmony and respect.
i want to go back for more time, because the experience was very  good. im very grateful.

I was really happy and glad during two weeks when I stayed in Vajk's house. Vajk, Niki, and Ili are so kind, helpful and the best host whom I ever met. They welcome their guests with their hearts. The room is totally same with the picture, beautiful and comfortable :D If I could stay in Budapest once again, I definitely would like to stay in his house. I strongly recommend you guys to stay in his house. It will be an awesome experience for you :) Thank you Vajk!

It's a very cozy room with comfortable bed and lovely decoration. The bus stop is right outside the building and actually I did more enjoy walking in Budapest. Vajk is very nice and he provided everything needed. Additionally, the kitty is so cute! My schedule was too full to have more chat with him. Next time I would also like to stay at his home.
review_summary: Convenient athmosphere guaranteed in this sunny room due to 3 windows. 5 minutes walk from Buda Castle, the Danube, railway station and subway that allows direct connection downtown. 2 Big malls are just around the corner.
house_rules:
Smoking is not allowed.
Please behave like you would ask from us to behave at your apartment.
description:
Convenient athmosphere guaranteed in this sunny room due to 3 windows. 5 minutes walk from Buda Castle, the Danube, railway station and subway that allows direct connection downtown. 2 Big malls are just around the corner.

The apartment is on the fourth level in the building. The room is upstairs. It has friendly atmosphere. 
The room is available for a lady or 2 ladies only.

Private use of the bedroom and bathroom upstairs. The kitchen is downstairs.

We live downstairs. We are young and friendly so you can count on our help.

Budapest Airport is appr. 20 minutes away by car and an hour by public transport.

About the environment:

The Castle District, the River Danube is just 5 minutes walk ahead.
You can reach downtown easily by buses, trams and the underground. 
Déli Railway station is by the corner to reach the countryside and Lake Balaton.
There are parks nearby too.

reviews_text:
This apartment is perfect. It is close to many of the attractions and we literally had the Christmas market at our doorstep. It is only minutes from the Danube River, the ruin bars, the pedestrian street, restaurants and the metro is just around the corner. Absolutely wonderful location and the apartment is clean, cozy and quiet. We would love to come back. This is the place to stay in beautiful Budapest. 

Even better than the pictures. It was absolutely perfect for one person to enjoy the best of Budapest. The place opens right onto one of the main squares. Apartment was clean, warm, comfortable and I really liked the art style. One of the airbnbs I wish I could have stayed in much longer. Would recommend to any solo travellers who like having their own cosy space.

Very perfect location. The outside, every day open the Christmas market and police are everywhere.(safety)
Cozy house, calm building , very clean house and nice host!! I really like that place. If I go Budapest one more , I would stay this house again!

Main selling point for me is the location - apartment is right next to the Christmas fair at Vorosmarty and just a few steps away from bus and metro stops so it is very easy to go around for shopping and sightseeing. Room is complete with heating, TV, kitchen, ref, etc. Just good to note that shampoo/shower gel/toilet paper are not provided (I missed to check this when booking). Communication is pretty good. Overall a pleasant stay. 

The aparment was everything we were hoping for and more. The location was perfect, right in the middle of the city but the apartment was still quiet, private and cozy. I would definitely stay here again! 

I and my wife had wonderful stay at Budapest, very good location for tourist to find and stay and hope to introduce this apartment for more tourist to known.

Great central location with good access to a multitude of public of public transport options. Very clean and tidy and would love to have stayed longer.

Gabor is a very nice man. 
The apartment is nice, comfortable ; it is very well located and well served by its metro nearby.
More was a great excuse to go for a chocolate at Gerbeaud...:)

We had such a great time at the apartment! It was clean, cozy and beautiful, and the location... Right in the middle of everything!! Would definitely come back! 

The apartment is excellent! Nice, clean and tidy, modern decoration, all the ammenities needed, and a few steps from the metro station. You can easily walk to all the main attractions in Budapest and you'll find a friendly host to receive you :)
review_summary:
Lovely apartment is located in the heart of the city in Vörösmarty square next to Vaci street  Gerbeaud and Danube river. Few steps away from cafes, restaurants,and the main metro station. 
The flat is newly renovated nice friendly and comfortable decorating with own designed posters of Budapest.
WiFi and air conditioner are available.
We hope you will be happy and satisfied. Look forward to meeting you!
description:
Lovely apartment is located in the heart of the city in Vörösmarty square next to Vaci street  Gerbeaud and Danube river. Few steps away from cafes, restaurants,and the main metro station.
