reviews_text:
Great location, cosy and everything you need.

Good communication until we arrived. We waited for 20 minutes outside on a blistering cold Hungarian winter evening, without an apology from the hostess.

Location was good, close to public transports. The bed was average and hard to get into for someone taller as a child. The shower was still wet when we arrived at 9pm, which was weird. 

We stayed two nights in Budapest at another airbnb for a similar price and had a better experience.

Thanks for the flexibility considering check-in times, though. 

Alexandra's house was exactly as mentioned; it was clean, extremely convenient to get around the city and perfect for my friend and I. We would definitely come back to Alexandra's accommodation if returning to Budapest. 

Alexandra never responded to my initial message, communication was always slow which is fustrating when you are dependent on wifi zones. When she did not arrive in time for our meeting infront of the building and I called her, she told me she was already there (she was not). She brought us up to the apartment then had us wait 15 minutes outside the door to clean, although we had left another friend downstairs to wait for us to drop our bags. A filled garbage bag from the previous guests was left behind. However, location is incredible, especially for the price. Great value, bad host.

Alexandra was very helpful.
The apartment is small, but we only stayed for one night, so it was okay. 
The only problem is that the sleeping section is very low-ceilinged, so you can't stand upright.
The apartment is practical for sightseeing because a lot of Budapest sights are nearby. 
It's also good for nightlife-experience.
 

Alexandra was really and helpful. We arrived Late in the Night but this was no Problem. The Flat is in the best neighboorhood -> jewish district!! We totally can recommend this Appartement! 

The host, Alexandra, greeted us at the building, showed us the apartment and gave us all the basic info. She was easy to reach and communicate with before and during our stay. We loved the apartment! It is very cozy and nice, it has all the amenities you could possibly need and we loved it there. We felt very safe in the building complex. The location (Pest) is amazing, very central and close to everything we needed during our stay. It is close to Vaci and Andrassy streets, the Jewish quarter (great bars and restaurants), a bridge and metro stops. I can't praise the location enough. I would not only recommend this apartment, I would rent it again myself. 

Alexandra was very accomdating as we arrived later then expected. The space is small but was perfect for myself and my partner. The apartment is in a FAB location and is easy to get to from the airport and to get around the city! 

Place is central and about 400 metres to Astoria metro. Round the corner there is a supermarket and the main road also has 24 hour shop. The apartment was quiet and easily accessible. The only real issue we had is the smallness of the place and since the bed is located in a mezzanine the ceiling is very low so you can't stand up properly. While this might not be a problem for many, it's worth keeping in mind if you are old or have back problems. Alexandra was helpful and communication was good. She also  helped in booking us a taxi to airport.

Alexandra was very helpful, answered my emails beforehand and was at the flat to meet me. The flat is small but quiet and good value.
review_summary: A small yet cosy studio centrally located on a quiet street between Astoria and Blaha Luiza metro stations. The place is close to many of Budapest's sights and a stone's throw from the so-called "party quarter" with its famous ruin clubs.
house_rules: I'd like to ask my guests to avoid making excessive noise as there are many elderly people living in the building. Also, I'd like to ask you not to smoke inside the flat, smoking in the courtyard, though, is perfectly acceptable.
description:
A small yet cosy studio centrally located on a quiet street between Astoria and Blaha Luiza metro stations. The place is close to many of Budapest's sights and a stone's throw from the so-called "party quarter" with its famous ruin clubs.

The flat can be a safe haven for a single traveller or a couple, located on a central yet quiet street. 

The place possesses a fully-equipped kitchen, a washing machine and basically everything needed for stay in the town.

I will be happy to provide you with any information on the city and on Hungary. 

The neighbourhood is central yet quiet and safe, separated from the "party district" by a wide street. 

The flat is located between two major transportation hubs: Blaha Luiza square and Astoria metro station. The third one - Deak Ferenc square is also reachable on foot.

reviews_text:
The flat of Peter is cozy and well decorated. We had everything we needed. A hair dryer and an iron were also provided, which I find very nice. The apartment is located on a quite street, but at the same time is right in the center, so we didn't need to use any transportation. Eva (the mother of Peter) send us all the information we needed to get easily to the apartment. When we arrived we found the key in a small safe next to the door, as Eva instructed us. We liked that solution alot, since we were able to leave early, without disturbing anyone. 
The one thing I didn't really enjoy was the poor hygiene in the flat. The dishes and towels were brand-new, but unfortunately not washed before being left for usage. The plates had gray spots and still their Ikea labels on and the towels had the typical odor, that a  brand-new out-of the-factory fabric has. The floor wasn't also very clean. I spilled some water on it and while I was cleaning it with a white napkin, the napkin became gray. 
I really liked the apartment and I think, that if the hosts pay more attention to tidiness, it could be a perfect place to stay while in Budapest.
With best regards, Sally
availability: 2 nights minimum stay.From Dec 30, 2016 - Jan 01, 2017 the minimum stay is 3 nights.
review_summary: Nice apartment in the seventh district of Budapest. The flat is a perfect base to discover the city. Nightlife is also just a few steps away. Tram/bus and subway lines are in 2 minutes reachable. Great for small groups or couples.
description:
Nice apartment in the seventh district of Budapest. The flat is a perfect base to discover the city. Nightlife is also just a few steps away. Tram/bus and subway lines are in 2 minutes reachable. Great for small groups or couples.

The apartment is newly renovated. 
It's comfortable for two or three people (there is a double bed and a comfy sofa bed in the living room). The flat is equipped with fridge, WiFi, TV, microwave, kettle, toaster, moka pot, hair dryer, iron, kitchen ware.

The apartment is in a quiet street next to a recreation park, near Heroes' Square and the Eastern Railway Station. Király Street is the next street. The apartment is next to shopping Lidl, Spar supermarkets, bakeries and restaurants. Nearby hairdressers and beauty salons as well.

The flat is placed just 2 trolley stops from the center. Vorosmarty Square are just a few metro stops away from the apartment. City park is 10 minutes on foot.

reviews_text:
Andras's flat was very nice and convenient. Right next to Andrassy ut, you  have also metro and bus just around the corner. Andras was very responsive and everything went well. I recommend !

Nice place, not a proper bed. Bad smell from drains and last guests cleaned laundry left on rack to dry. Take 76 bus to lehr metro (2 stops) turn right out of apartment building 

i like the automatic checkin and checkout system:) Andras gave me the detailed instruction in advance:)

there is one window only in the bedroom so the air in the kitchen n the bathroom was not so good.

Cosy flat. Responsive and easy-going owner. Good price. 

András was very accurate and polite. The location is perfect - close to metro,shop and the central part of the city. The only thing that disappointed me is that it was not very clean and there was a lot of dust. However we clean it for a short period of time and we were extremely satisfied with the apartment. I definitely recommend it!

The good points are: The automated system - so easy to come to and leave; location (close to metro and pretty central); great TV; modern; and all needs met.  The things that stopped it being a 10 are: bed is a large and quite hard sofa (you can see this in advance and via others comments and so not a huge negative); its small (but big enough as a cook; shower and sleep place); the bedroom/main room is pretty narrow.  For short stays its perfect.  We were granted late checkout too - so helpful host...

The flat conforms to the description : clean, functional, well located (close to Andrassy ut and the metro station). Very good value for money.
We didn't see Andràs but he answered very quickly to our questions by message. 

Small but cosy studio apartment in a great location. Good value and a communicative host. 

The apartment was perfect for two people. It had everything we needed and the location was also great. Using public transportation was easy and there were also many restaurants and bars in a walking distance. We really enjoyed our trip!

Andras was the most attentive host!  When I had difficulty getting into the apartment--all my error not Andras'--he responded quickly.
review_summary: Our private apartment offers a Budapest lifestyle environment with close proximity to the prestigious Andrássy street and it's landmarks. Located few minutes from downtown and in calm nice neighborhood that'll make your stay one to remember.
description: Our private apartment offers a Budapest lifestyle environment with close proximity to the prestigious Andrássy street and it's landmarks. Located few minutes from downtown and in calm nice neighborhood that'll make your stay one to remember.

reviews_text: Appartamento esattamente come nelle foto,cucina ampia e funzionale.. Eccezionale la posizione,situata a due passi dal Danubio e dai principali monumenti..un grazie particolare ad Aliz e Andrea per la loro disponibilità e cortesia.. Consigliatissimo a tutti!.SZIA! :)
availability: On Fridays and Saturdays the minimum stay is 2 nights.
review_summary: The apartment “VALENTINA” is in the heart of Budapest’s walking district and reflects the city's beauty, hospitality and feeling. The street has a lot of intimate cafes and restaurants. Beside that you can choose from many cultural programs l
house_rules:
1. No damaging the apartment's furniture or facilities. Please leave the apartment in the same general condition as you found it on arrival. Any damage caused during your stay must be compensated by you. 
2. No lodging more people than mentioned in this contract is allowed.
3. Noise is forbidden after 21.00h inside the apartment and also in the staircase.
4. Please do not disturb the neighbours when opening or closing the entrance to the building and the apartment. 
This point is particularly important and no concessions will be made.
5. Please lower down the heating and turn off the lights while u are away, for enviromental protection.
6. Please be so kind out of respect for other guests, does not lie down in the shoes on the couch.
7 . There is a free WIFI access in the apartment.
8. Please always lock the doors to your apartment, i.e. the street door, the apartment door and the security gate if available.
9. Please take care of the cleanliness and tidiness of the apartment. At the check out please wash any used dishes and remove any rubbish, leaving the apartment in the same condition as you occupied it.
10. Smoking in the apartment is strictly forbidden.
11. The city tax not included in the total price ( 1 euro/night/person).
description:
The apartment “VALENTINA” is in the heart of Budapest’s walking district and reflects the city's beauty, hospitality and feeling. The street has a lot of intimate cafes and restaurants. Beside that you can choose from many cultural programs l

Apartment VALENTINA is a modern apartment. Located in the city center, close to DANUBE river.
The "VALENTINA" apartment is waiting for you near to Váci Street – main pedestrian street of Budapest,  not far from Erzsébet Bridge on Aranykéz street, on the 7th floor of a tarnished street house with the elevator

It is a studio apartment with a fully equipped kitchen and a bathroom with shower on the 7th floor (28 squaremeters).The living room with one big double sofa, the kitchen, the bathroom with toilet.  TV, free cable, WIFI, a washingmachine, and air conditioning included. All of this ensures that 2 persons will have a good time in our apartment.

We will do everything to make your stay in our apartments comparable to living in your sweet home.

The apartment “VALENTINA” is in the heart of Budapest’s walking district and reflects the city's beauty, hospitality and feeling. The street has a lot of intimate cafes and restaurants. Beside that you can choose from many cultural programs like museums, galleries and sights in the centre of the city or the nearby Budai castle. All of this is within walking distance from us.

Metro and bus stations are only 5 minutes away.

The apartment “VALENTINA” is in the heart of Budapest’s walking district and reflects the city's beauty, hospitality and feeling. The street has a lot of intimate cafes and restaurants. Beside that you can choose from many cultural programs like museums, galleries and sights in the centre of the city or the nearby Budai castle. All of this is within walking distance from us. Metro and bus stations are only 5 minutes away.


 Minimum two nights can be booked. Towels and linen are included. We can arrange the transfer from the airport.

reviews_text:
We had a really nice stay at Lias place! The flat is big, clean and there is everything you need nearby. We enjoyed our stay there.

Wonderful apartment. The location is very good and the furniture is lovely.  

Lilla was a fantastic host, she was very helpful, quick to respond to messages, and flexible with the details regarding checking in and checking out. The apartment was just as it appears in the pictures, it's very clean and located in a fantastic area. If I come back to Budapest I'd definitely stay there again, thanks!

Хорошое расположение, чисто и уютно. Все необходимое в квартире было. Удобно заселяться, так как ключ был в специальном замочке, на окне. Не надо звонить, ждать хозяина. Это удобно) квартира на втором этаже, дом с лифтом. Парковки нету, только на улице или специальный паркгаус, за поворотом на лево.
availability: 1 night minimum stay.From Dec 22, 2016 - Jan 04, 2017 the minimum stay is 5 nights.
review_summary:
Beautiful - modern - newly renovated apt available for rent.  
Sheets, towels, hairdryer, etc all included. Free Wifi. Its located in the very heart of the city, just in the middle of Budapest Soho, easy to get anywhere, groceries, restaurants, bars all next door. 
The Great Synagogue; The Opera House; New York Cafe; Gozsdu udvar; Gerbeaud; Akvárium Klub; Kazinczy utca are all within easy walking distance.
description:
Beautiful - modern - newly renovated apt available for rent.  
Sheets, towels, hairdryer, etc all included. Free Wifi. Its located in the very heart of the city, just in the middle of Budapest Soho, easy to get anywhere, groceries, restaurants, bars all next door. 
The Great Synagogue; The Opera House; New York Cafe; Gozsdu udvar; Gerbeaud; Akvárium Klub; Kazinczy utca are all within easy walking distance.

The apt is located on the 2nd floor -there is an elevator- in a renovated building. Its a spacious -about 55sqm- apt with high ceilings;  well equipped; ideal for both short or longer term travelers.
The living room has 2 large windows facing the street, the bedroom is facing the quiet courtyard.

Facilities:
1 bedroom 
fully equipped kitchen
bathroom with shower, tub and toilet
sheets, linen, towels
high-speed wifi (120 mbit/s)
fully equipped kitchen
washing machine
hair dryer
iron and ironing board

If you arrive by car, there are parking spots close to the building that cost around 15 euros/day, but no parking in the building.

You can always reach me trough airbnb msg-ing; by phone, text or email.

You'll find most of the main tourist attractions very close or you can even reach them by foot. The apartment is within a short walking distance of  the Great Synagogue, the Opera House, Saint Stephen’s Basilica, etc.
Kazinczy street home for many cosy cafes, bars, restaurants and festivals is 50 meters from the building. The popular party quarter, the Soho of Budapest with unique and lovely 'ruin pubs', bars and restaurants are just around the corner. You'll have plenty of opportunities to dine out or go for a drink without having to use a taxi or public transport. The area is highly recommended for fun-loving travellers.
The apartment is in the heart of the city with excellent connections to public transport. Metro line 2 (M2) has a station one minute away from the apartment. The area is very safe so you can walk home at night, and it's also very easy to catch a taxi anytime.

Metro line 2 (M2) has a station one minute away from the apartment. The area is very safe so you can walk home at night, and it's also very easy to catch a taxi anytime.

If you arrive by car, there are parking spots close to the building that cost around 15 euros/day, but no parking in the building.

Check-in/checkout:
Check-in is from 2pm, checkout is until 11am. If you wish to arrive earlier or leave later, let me know in advance and I will let you know if it's possible or not.

reviews_text:
Considering Vivian wasn't int he country during our stay everything went smoothly and she was always really fast at replying and her friend was LOVEly :) They both made our trip feel really nice and chilled. Considering we changed our arrival time at the last minute, they did everything to be accommodating.
The apartment is perfect. Really homely and clean. Everything you could need. Even Netflix!
The location is good. Quiet, but near to main streets and local transport. We walked everywhere around the city during our stay as there's so much to see and take in.
We are both Vegetarians and found some amazing local places to eat near the apartment -  We loved Slow Foodies Restaurant for breakfast and lunch on different days- its a great vegan and veggie place- Really decent healthy but tasty food. Also at the Indian restaurant round the corner called Indigo- great variety of big vegetarian dishes- ask for them hot as they come mild. This was actually one of the best Indian meals we've had. A little bit further was the restaurant Napfényes Étterem -great big portions and local style cuisine. 
All in all, a great host with a great friend and a great apartment. 


Fantastic stay at Vivien's place!
Perfect location and lovely apartment.
Perfect for a couple on a city break.

Walking distance from everywhere. Loved Budapest. 

Thanks to Vivien and her friend Love and family for being so accommodating :)

Amazing place with great atmosphere. Location was perfect! I think its not our last stay in this apartment :)

Neat little place in the middle of everything. The place has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Lots of bars, restaurants and interesting nightlife within a short walking distance. Communication was the best of all my stays with Airbnb. Vivien was not around but her friend was available.  She was there to welcome us and take the keys when we left. Will also add she was extremely nice and very helpful in pointing us in the right direction. This was needed with such a big city with so much to see and do.

Our stay at Vivien's Bohemian Treasure Box was perfect! 

The place is adorable and has a great location for some of the best sites, bars and restaurants in Budapest. Vivien did a great job decorating and organizing the place and it was absolutely spotless with everything we needed in it. 

Vivein went above and beyond as a host to make our stay great! 

I would 100% reccomend anyone to stay here and enjoy one of the most beautiful cities I have ever been to.

Had a very pleasant stay , One lovely flat , very very lovely , nice host. The flat to rent in Budapest ! 

Cute place in a good location. Vivien and her parents were very nice, communicating with them was easy.

My stay was amazing!! Highly recommend this listing! Vivien was prompt with communication from the start and even though she wasn't able to give me the keys personally, her friends stayed in contact me with me and made me feel super welcomed. The flat is clean and perfect for one or two people. I felt the location and building were extremely safe. I walked home alone at 11pm-4am a few times and never felt threatened. It's close to the grocery store, pharmacy, public transport, bars, and restaurants. Vivien was kind enough to provide enough essentials and even messaged me halfway through my trip to check on me. This became home and I miss it already. Thanks for everything! You were most accommodating :) 

We really enjoyed our stay at this great bohemian flat. The flat itself was lovely and well equipped, just as advertised in the pictures. It's really well located for many of the sights and some fun places to go out in the evenings. The communication with Vivien was really easy and suited out requirements perfectly.  Highly recommended :)

First of all I want to say thank you Vivien. Everything was great, I have nothing bad to say, only good. Cosy apartment exactly as on pictures, good location, very clean and doesn't look like hotel apartment. Highly recommend and will book it again when I'll be in Budapest next time.
review_summary: It's like a little treasure box in the middle of the city, where you can always relax but if you are up to some fun, you just have to go down the street and the famous Budapest nightlife will not disappoint you, I guarantee you will love to stay here.
house_rules: I would like to kindly ask you to be quiet after 10PM and please note that smoking is not allowed! Thanking you in advance!
description:
It's like a little treasure box in the middle of the city, where you can always relax but if you are up to some fun, you just have to go down the street and the famous Budapest nightlife will not disappoint you, I guarantee you will love to stay here.

In the heart of Budapest, in a walking distance to some main tourist attractions, you can chill at this cozy modern apartment. I can give a list of the best restaurants nearby, but if you are up to cook, you can also use my fully equipped kitchen.

If you wish to rent out the whole apartment you will have it on your own, if you just need a place to crash send me a message and we can discuss it and I can send you a special offer.

I will welcome you at arrival, give you some tips and list about places I recommend to visit and during your stay I'll be a text message away. If I am travelling while you visit my place, I will ask one of my friends to let you in and show you around.

The 19th century residential building with the classic courtyard and high ceiling give you a real Budapest downtown experience. The apartment is located right next to the so called Broadway which strives with stylish cafés, bars, ruin pubs and restaurants. Also it is located 50 meters from the famous Andrássy avenue (UNESCO World Heritage) with the length of 2,5 km this boulevard connects the City Park and the Heroes Square with the city center and boasts high-end stores, fancy restaurants and cafés. Chain Bridge, Opera, Basilica, Deak Ferenc square, Margaret Island, Synagogue are all within walking distance.

The apartment is in the heart of Pest so you can easily reach all the major attractions by walk, or borrow the two bikes I can let you for free of charge. If you prefer to use the public transport the blue metro line Nyugati station is located by 150 meters walk away or also the red line Arany János station is in 200 meters walking distance.

If the weather is not the best or you are a little tired, there is always an option in my apartment: netflix & chill.

reviews_text:
Peter's apartment was fantastic; Easy to find, great location (walking and public transport accessible) and super clean.  Lots of others have commented on the wifi and indeed I can confirm that the apartment has a very reliable internet connection.  The apartment is very close to the Chain Bridge and therefore an easy walk to the Pest side.  If you are staying for a few days I would recommend getting a metro pass and VodaPhone/T-Mobile Sim card to make your stay that much easier.  All in all, a solid, clean, safe apartment in a great location.  Thanks again Peter.  

We had a fantastic time at Peter's place. It was very clean and well looked after. Very good standard accommodation and well situated. We especially loved the walk over the Chain Bridge in the evening where you could look across at the illuminated buildings, truly wonderful. I would defiantly recommend Peter's to anyone visiting Budapest you will not be disappointed.

It's the second time I stayed in this lovely apartment. I love the location and the size is just ideal for a short stay. It would have been nice to meet someone in person instead of the let in yourself approach. The heat only goes up to 23 degrees, which was just enough, but I prefer if I have the control especially when it is so cold outside.

I am greatful they allowed me to enter before the official check in time.

The location is everything - close to metro, trams, shopping. The apartment was spotless, large, and very thankful it is one the first level. I will definitely return to Budapest and Peter's apartment. ***** (5-star)

Peter's place is in a great location, from where you can really appreciate the grandeur of Budapest as to get to the town centre it's just a short walk across the Chain bridge. The apartment style is elegant and the high ceilings give it a spaciousness that makes it a comfortable for more than just a few nights. Peter's place is great value!  

This place was perfect- close to everything, modern, clean and strong WIFI. Thanks Peter!! 

Very comfortable loft which is great for 2 people. Great location which is in walking distance from most of the tourist attractions. 

Great location. Clean apartment. Spacious and comfortable. 

We had a wonderful stay at Peter's apartment. Very close to public transport and walking distance to most of the things you'll want to see and do in Budapest. The apartment is beautiful, huge and clean. Excellent communication and instructions from Peter, would love to stay here again. Thanks again Peter!!

Perfect location. Less than 10 mins walking distance to Castle Hill, right next to one of the most beautiful bridges and awesome views right around the corner. Very clean, modern apartment with anything that one could need for a stay in Budapest. Peter was a great host and was super accommodating. Very responsive and great with communication! Will definitely love to stay here again next time I am in Budapest!
availability: On Fridays and Saturdays the minimum stay is 3 nights.
review_summary: A luxurious 50 m2 flat located in the heart of Budapest, two minutes walk from the Chain Bridge. Fully renovated in August 2015, equipped with fast Internet and everything else you need to feel at home!
house_rules: No smoking, drugs, any sort of house parties and or pets allowed.
description:
A luxurious 50 m2 flat located in the heart of Budapest, two minutes walk from the Chain Bridge. Fully renovated in August 2015, equipped with fast Internet and everything else you need to feel at home!

The studio is located at a unique historical address, walking distance from all famous sites. The interior was fully renovated in August 2015, providing a grandiose feeling of luxury.

IMPORTANT! The appartment is accessed with a passcode, so guests can arrive any time that suits them (even in the middle of the night!). Once a guest has made the booking, we will send them the building access code and all other details needed to access the studio.

At your disposition:
- High speed Wifi
- Air conditioning
- Heating
- Bathroom essentials
- Towels
- Hair dryer
- Kitchen essentials
- Oven 
- Cooker
- Ironer
- Ironing board
- Washing machine

Guests can always reach us over the Airbnb messanger, which we answer immediately most of the time. We also give our guests our private cell number, on which we can be reached if necessary.

Walking distance:
2 min - Chain Bridge
2 min - Buda Castle
2 min - Zero Kilometer Stone
5 min - Pest 
8 min - Basilica 
8 min - Fisherman's Bishop
20 min - Parliament Building
25 min - Margaret Island

Public transport by foot:
5 min - Battyanyi Ter metro station
12 min - Deak Ference metro station

IMPORTANT!

The appartment is accessed with a passcode, so guests can arrive any time that suits them (even in the middle of the night!).

Once a guest has made the booking, we will send them the building access code and all other details needed to access the studio.

reviews_text:
Great location, and very helpful. We arrived late at night and they were still willing to meet us and show us the apartment. Would recommend to others.

The apt was great. Very beutiful and the hosts were very friendly. The apt is in a great location in the center of the city with lots of great pubs and cafes. We highly recommend staying here and we will probably come back again in the future.

We recommend this apartment, it location is extremely great very close to the centre, and near to a passage with many cafes, taverns and very good ambient.
Also is very quite to rest after a long day walking in Budapest.


I had planned a surprise trip for my girlfriend's birthday to Budapest, and I was lucky enough to have chosen Eyal's place to stay. From the very start he had very good communication with me. His place is the most PERFECT place to stay in Budapest. It's in a quiet side-street, yet as soon as you walk out and around the corner, you're in the center of all the night life, shops, and restaurants. Not to mention his place was very nice, open, & clean. I definitely recommend staying at his place and visiting this wonderful city.

Couldn't be happier with my choice. Good size, super clean, and great location. Airbnb trifecta!

Really great place, perfect location, and Eyal was very sweet and helpful. Definitely recommend it!

Eyal met us when we arrived, showed the flat and explained everything. The flat is really nice, as on the pictures, right in the centre of the city, in a touristic district. When we needed help, we got immediate response from Eyal. 
Strongly recommend.

We stayed in Eyals place and was welcomed by his father. The location was perfect for us, and in walking distance for all the places that we wanted to see. A very safe and nice neighborhood in the heart of the Jewish neighborhood with many nice bars, cafes and restaurants. The flat was as described, and very similar to a hotel room, and  it was very nice to be able to have a hot coffee in morning and the balcony must be perfect in the summertime. I would definitely come back for an other stay in this flat.

Great place and location! Host was always very quick to respond 

Great stay! Very accommodating and super helpful hosts! They went out of their way, even by printing tickets for us when all the copy shops were closed because of All Saints Day. The apartment is in the middle of the best part of Budapest, especially for dinner and drinks. Enjoyed the place and our stay very much! Would highly recommend.
review_summary:
At the best location in Budapest, NEW cozy and bright studio apartment with a balcony. 
We invite you to stay in a fully furnished and equipped place, which obligated to provide you good hospitality :) 
kitchenette with a microwave and refrigerator, coffee maker, kettle and eating utensils. The bathrooms have a shower and washing machine. 
located on the 5th floor in a modern building next to the Gozsdu udavr surrounded by hundred trendy restaurants, cafe's, shops and bars.
house_rules: - Low price parking provided if needed
description:
At the best location in Budapest, NEW cozy and bright studio apartment with a balcony. 
We invite you to stay in a fully furnished and equipped place, which obligated to provide you good hospitality :) 
kitchenette with a microwave and refrigerator, coffee maker, kettle and eating utensils. The bathrooms have a shower and washing machine. 
located on the 5th floor in a modern building next to the Gozsdu udavr surrounded by hundred trendy restaurants, cafe's, shops and bars.

availability: The minimum night stay for this listing varies.
review_summary: Enjoy our elegant home right in the center at parliament. There is no better location in the city, just a few steps from river Danube, Parliament, Chain Bridge, St. Stephan Basilica etc.
house_rules:
According to the Hungarian legal regulations we kindly ask you to send your personal details for registration purpose.We need the following information:
- full name
- address
- birth place
- birth date
- passport number
description:
Enjoy our elegant home right in the center at parliament. There is no better location in the city, just a few steps from river Danube, Parliament, Chain Bridge, St. Stephan Basilica etc.

The apartment is situated in a beautiful building with amazing details. It is newly renovated apartment with a real home feel: spacious, light and fully equipped. You will find everything what you need for a short or even a long break.
There is a big, family kitchen with dining area for four, a family bathroom with a spacious bath tub, toilet and a washing machine.
The living room is very light, airy and has a large sofa bed and some armchairs.
Although the bedroom is small but separate from the living room and has a comfortable bed for a relaxing night.

It is a private flat with no shared space.

Szabadság Square (Szabadság tér) has one of the loveliest parks in downtown Budapest. The square is surrounded by some beautiful and significant buildings, including the U.S. Embassy. Opposite the Embassy is the former Stock Exchange, home to the Hungarian Public Television (MTV) for decades. The building was recently sold, MTV moved to a new location, and according to plans it will be converted to a shopping/residential complex. The Hungarian National Bank, the central bank of Hungary (founded in 1924), is also located here.

Szabadság Square, a calm green spot in the middle of the city, is also a favorite with kids, as there are two playgrounds and a fountain on the side of the park.

Take Subway (M2) from Kossuth tér or Subway (M3) from Arany János utca to reach easily anything in Budapest or you can reach many attractions with a short walk.

reviews_text:
If your looking for somewhere small and private this is the place! Close to the City centre! Just be aware the owners live there with a cat and dog. Also you need to be able to climb up and down stairs as it's a loft double bed! 

Anna's apartment is so cute and in a great location! We arrived to Budapest pretty late at night, but Anna was accommodating and gave us a great suggestion for a ride from the airport. Her apartment was a great place to stay to explore the city and return to a cozy room at the end of the day.

Great place!

Anna's place was so cute and cozy, really clean as well. We were within a few minutes walk from the metro, so it was so easy to reach when we arrived on the train and so easy to get around the city for exploring. The street the flat is on is full of great restaurants and is super lively, though not noisey. Would totally recommend this to anyone and would love to visit again! Also, her kitty and dog are super cute and friendly :)

We loved our trip to Budapest! The apartment is so central and easy to find from the airport. We found it super easy to navigate ourselves by foot to all the major attractions both at night and in the day. Anna's apartment is so warm, clean and cosy - we felt totally at home the moment we arrived (made even better by the beautiful cat). To add to that Anna and her boyfriend provided some wonderful recommendations for food and drinks and were in general totally lovely and welcoming. A great place for a couple to stay for a true Hungarian city break. Thankyou Anna!! (P.s eat as Fecske it's round the corner, totally local food and drink and so cheap but totally amazing- we ate there twice!)

Anna's place is wonderful - totally recommend it! Love the location, she's is a great communicator & her home is perfectly decorated. Felt like I was at adult sleep away camp when climbing the ladder for the bed. Never got to meet Anna but her cat did give me enough love and attention to feel just as welcomed! I would happily stay again.

Loved Anna's place! We felt really at home in her lovely apartment. It was clean, comfortable and exactly what we were after. Great to have our own bathroom and living area too. Will definitely stay again when we return to Budapest!

Me and my boyfriend really enjoyed staying at Annas Place! It was all nice and tidy, towels, hairdryer and shampoo were already in the bathroom and the bed is quite comfortable! Only the blankets were a bit too short for us germans 

everything was Great, the room was cosy and clean. The Communication easy and fast. Would Love to come again!! 

Anne was a very good host. She waited up for arrival when our plane was delayed two hours. The room was very clear and we had everything we needed. I highly recommend this place!
review_summary: Cozy private room and bathroom just for you. :) Althrough it's in the heart of the city, the room is quiet. You can reach almost everything with a few minutes walk, but the public transport lines are also nearby (5 minutes walk).

Great little apartment in the 1st floor and extremely quiet where you will get great rest
Great location very near Margit Island and the Parlament and just 15 min from the Deac Ferenc Square and the Jews quarter
Lidl , Aldi, biggest shopping center in town, Starbacks, Costa coffee , Mc Donalds literally around the corner
Great house with all mod cons you need to have a great stay. Bed in a gallery above the living room,
Ideal for young couples or with 172 kids as the sofa converts into a bed
house_rules:
- Hi everybody. 
- Smoking is allowed but just in designated smoking area. I expect you respect the apartment and the most important to feel like home, so please take off your shoes in order to have our apartment clean but the most important to feel comfortable! Turn off the lights in case you want to leave the apartment, let's make a small effort to protect our environment and save energy!
- Please note that I usually live here so even though I will try to remove as much as possible you will finlace tod some of my belongings. The big wardrobe will remain closed but you will still have a place to leave your clothes of course.
description:
Great little apartment in the 1st floor and extremely quiet where you will get great rest
Great location very near Margit Island and the Parlament and just 15 min from the Deac Ferenc Square and the Jews quarter
Lidl , Aldi, biggest shopping center in town, Starbacks, Costa coffee , Mc Donalds literally around the corner
Great house with all mod cons you need to have a great stay. Bed in a gallery above the living room,
Ideal for young couples or with 172 kids as the sofa converts into a bed

This is lovely flat in a typical Hungarian building. The apartment is located in the 1st floor  and the windows face the inner area. It s extremely quiet and nobody will bother you, I guaranty you. You will have great sleeping time and proper rest. Traffic can not be heard at all.
The building is extremely well located, super convenient, right in front of Nyugati central railway station. 
Public transport is right there few seconds from the house. Tram to everywhere in town, metro station and bus. If you come from the airport you can make it to the house by metro very easily and hassle free.
If you wanna walk, the Margit Island and Parlament are just 10 minutes walking distance. Deak Ferec Ter and Jews district is also 10-15 min walking.
Just 5 min from home you have the biggest shopping mall in town (Westen mall ) and If what you need is some groceries, the Lidl is just 1 min and the Aldi just 4 min walking distance.  Also cafes like Sturbacks, Costa coffee , etc  if what you like is spending some time relaxing having a coffee after a day of walking.
The house has all mod cons you need to spend great few days. If you wanna cook something you will have also sugar , salt, oil and that kind of stuff you do not want to buy when spending just few days somewhere.
The bed is in a  gallery very typical from Budapest. Easy access with the staircase. 
The mattress is very comfortable and sleeping up there will make you feel cozy. TV  with 100 channels , 2-3 in Italian, 1 Spanish, 3 German, Hungarian, and English. Internet connection too.
This flat is ideally perfect for single people, young couples or not that young if you do not mind sleeping in a gallery, and families with 1 kid as the sofa in the living room can be converted in a bed.

availability: The minimum night stay for this listing varies.
review_summary:
This modern, stylish apartment is situated in the very centre of Budapest in the heart of the world famous old Budapest 7th district, a minute away from the  famous and first ruin pub 'Szimpla'. 10 minutes walk from everything: Deák Ferenc tér, Madách tér, ruin pubs, Gozsdu Court with many bars and restaurants, music clubs, etc. At great transportation within easy reach from everything.
The apartment is on the 3rd floor but there is no elevator though, so please consider this before booking.
house_rules:
According to the Hungarian legal regulations we kindly ask you to send your personal details for registration purpose.We need the following information:
- full name
- address
- birth place
- birth date
- passport number
description:
This modern, stylish apartment is situated in the very centre of Budapest in the heart of the world famous old Budapest 7th district, a minute away from the  famous and first ruin pub 'Szimpla'. 10 minutes walk from everything: Deák Ferenc tér, Madách tér, ruin pubs, Gozsdu Court with many bars and restaurants, music clubs, etc. At great transportation within easy reach from everything.
The apartment is on the 3rd floor but there is no elevator though, so please consider this before booking.

reviews_text:
Máté was a great host- he was in contact well before my arrival to go over details and offer very helpful directions/info.
The location of the apartment is excellent- very central and easy to get to!
review_summary: The flat for ideal for 2 people who want a flat which is cosy, comfortable and close to everything from the best party places to most beautiful monuments.
description:
The flat for ideal for 2 people who want a flat which is cosy, comfortable and close to everything from the best party places to most beautiful monuments.

A spacious loft with a big terrace in the heart of Budapest, only 1 minute walk from the famous Váci street and every subway. The building has a great rooftop terrace with the view of the Gellért hill. The apartment satisfies every need, it has high-speed internet, Led TV with 100+ channels, opportunity to wash and cook. The double bed and the sofa are ideal for 2 guests.

everything

You can call me anytime during your holiday.

Heart of the city, every sight can be reached by walk

The apartment is close to all subways and the buses a tourist needs.

reviews_text:
Great place, great location, and great host!

A great place to stay, fantastic location, will return soon, Dr jkj

The place was nice and cosy, Marcell was super communicative. The location is great, central but at the same time in a less busy road which made finding parking easy. Everything is walking distance.

We have not met Marcell but he sent a clear instraction how to get inside the appartments. It is located very close to the historical part of the city, just 10 mins walk to the parlament and 1 min to a metro station.  I would recommend Marcell's appartment but not with a car as free parking is most time occupated and there is possibility to leave a car only after 10 pm. However there are lots of chargeable parking spaces at the streets and some garage with daily rates.

This a lovely and cute flat which was perfect for 4 girls wanting a city break. Right in the centre of Budapest, the location is spot on- close to restaurants, bars and general tourist destinations all within walking distance. Highly recommend.

Everything was great, apt in the city centre, host is very welcoming person, and communication was very smooth and easy. 

 VERY NICE FLAT ... NEW .. CLEAN AND NEAR EVERYTHING ....MARCELL IS VERY KIND ... FREE PARKING IS DIFFICULT TO FIND ....

Everything was great! Marcell was a great host in the way that he was very easy to contact and was always responsive straight away. instructions on how to enter the building and how to acces the apartment were very clear.  Apartment was only a couple of blocks away from public transport and their's also an amazing all you can eat running sushi train around the corner!

Shopping centre and supermarkets near by. Tight squize for 3 people but it did the job. Wifi is excellent and the washing machine also works well. Located near the city but it's a very quite apartment. 

Thanks Marcell!

We had a lovely time staying in this apartment. It is just as the pictures describe, and the location was perfect. It is right next to the train station, a small super market and a bus stop on all the main tour bus routes. 

The apartment was spotlessly clean and comfortable, and in a beautiful building. It was quiet and peaceful inside as the windows open onto an internal light well, rather than the main road. 

Marcel was very helpful and informative, and was always quick to respond to messages. We would definitely recommend this apartment.

The apartment is very nice and clean like in the images, with a fully equipped kitchen and really good Wi-fi. The location is in the center of the city.  Marcell is a great host and he helped us with all the information we needed for our staying in Budapest. I highly recommend the apartment!
review_summary:
Beautiful, modern, newly furnished duplex available for rent. Sheets, towels, hairdryer, etc all included. Free Wifi. In a renovated building, great location, @very center of Budapest, easy to get anywhere, groceries, restaurants, bars all next door.

Modern space in a newly renovated beautiful building with brand new, modern furniture.

Free WIFI in the flat,free parking,fruit plate,coffe,hairdryer, sheets, towels, well equipped kitchen.

More than happy to give advice, recommendation
description:
Beautiful, modern, newly furnished duplex available for rent. Sheets, towels, hairdryer, etc all included. Free Wifi. In a renovated building, great location, @very center of Budapest, easy to get anywhere, groceries, restaurants, bars all next door.

Modern space in a newly renovated beautiful building with brand new, modern furniture.

Free WIFI in the flat,free parking,fruit plate,coffe,hairdryer, sheets, towels, well equipped kitchen.

More than happy to give advice, recommendation

Athough our building is located really in the centre of the city, the flat is absolutely quiet and calm since it is on the 1st floor and faces to the yard.

The building is 1 minutes walk away from Nyugati square and Oktogon square so you can easily access everything you need - restaurants,cafes,pharmacies,bakeries,art and multiplex movies, small shops and shopping malls /Budapest's largest mall is at Nyugati square as well.

The apartment is situated in the centre of the city between Okotgon and Nyugati squares, next to the famous "Nagykörút (Grand Boulevard)" where you can will find the most busy tram lines 4 and 6. With them you can reach easily almost any place in Budapest /Castle of Buda, Margit's Island/. It is on halfway between underground 1 and 3, you can reach both easily on foot so you reach Heroes' Square, Varosliget in minutes.

reviews_text:
Overall our stay was excellent. The flat is in a great location (close to public transit and within walking distance of most major tourist attractions), and the pictures are accurate.  Akos was helpful and responsive to questions and we had no problems during the stay.

Great staying. Close to everything. Check in and out are easy. Other than the toilet is kinda old, and you get water on the bathroom floor bc the shower is in the bathtub. 

Overall really good listing, recommend. 

This is a fantastically bright, spacious and comfortable flat, with steaming hot water for that amazing tub, underfloor heating for when you get out, and excellent wifi.  The location is very central, within easy walking distance of some of the main sights like the Jewish quarter and the Central Market, and very close to the main metro and tram lines.  Akos was super helpful and welcoming from the time we booked, for example arranging for a taxi to pick us up when he heard how late our flight was going to arrive.  We would definitely stay there again!

Everything was great from check in to check out. Akos is very friendly.

Akos was very helpful & courteous. We has a good time, it was a beautiful apartment. Spacious rooms and nice location. Everything was very close by , very key area in Budapest. We recommend Akos always

The apartment is very nice, great location near an area with many restaurants and cafes. The pictures are true, it is specious, clean and well equipped. Great value for the money, would recommend.  Host was easy to communicate with.

Really great location, very central and close to all public transport. The apartment is perfect and clean and we enjoyed our stay. Highly recommended!!! 

Akos was very friendly and helpfull. :) Thank you!

Communicating with Akos is very easy! He replies quickly and helped us with some advise on how to get to the apartment easily and what are the nice places to visit in Budapest, he was also kind enough to let us leave the bag in the apartment while we wait for our train, while we didn't personally meet him, he was such a wonderful host. About the apartment, the design and feel is a bit rustic, you'll find some really old pieces in there which is both an advantage and disadvantage, the bath looks really nice but it has some cracks on it and it was a bit difficult to use it, there is indeed a problem with the drain as the bath smells weird, other than that everything in the apartment is exactly as in the photos, huge! Wifi is stable and they have english channels too! The street where the apartment is situated is filled with restaurants and shops and all the nice places to see are all walkable, metro is also just about 5 minutes away! We didn't have a problem looking for it.

The place is beautiful! It is even more so than in the pictures. We were absolutely smitten as soon as we arrived. Dealing with Akos was really easy and he was very warm. The location is perfect. You can walk everywhere and you are in a really interesting and accessible district. I'm already plotting a visit back to Budapest so that I can stay at Akos' place again!

Flat appears nice on the pictures, but they don't reflect what it is actually like. It is spacious and should be a nice place, however it smells very unsavoury and a lot of the stuff in the kitchen wasn't clean when we arrived. The drains didn't work properly which might have been the reason for the smell.
availability: On Fridays and Saturdays the minimum stay is 2 nights.
review_summary: The apartment situates on the mansard (roof area) of a beautifully restored city palace, excellent location,all sights within walking distance, the famous UNESCO heritage Andrassy Bouleavard and Opera House 1 corner only, restaurants are every corner
description: The apartment situates on the mansard (roof area) of a beautifully restored city palace, excellent location,all sights within walking distance, the famous UNESCO heritage Andrassy Bouleavard and Opera House 1 corner only, restaurants are every corner

reviews_text:
Our stay was nice. Emese is a good host, the appartment is cosy and big enough for 2 people. Thanks

We had a great stay at Emese. She gave us some useful tips to explore the city. The place is lovely and the location is great! The bed isn't very comfortable but despite that we certainly would recommend this appartment!

We enjoyed staying at this place. It is very cosy. And Emese were very nice and helpfull.

Thanks to Emese we had the best staying in Budapest possible! :) She is really a lovely person, easy to communicate with and very helpful. Her place is beautiful, cozy and the location is quiet but quite central - you can have a nice walk by the streets of Budapest to get to the city center. Would highly recommend! Looking forward to my next stay in Budapest and I would definitely take into consideration staying in Emese's place again. Thank you, wish you all the best, xxx

The flat is very small, as you can guess by pictures. Although it is pretty comfortable, and very well located. The only thing is that it is really cold in the apartment and the heating is gas, so I found it a bit dangerous. Hot water is also a small problem, because you have to wait for it and the pressure in the shower is very low. Emese is very kind, answers every question and is very quick. For the cheap price it is a very good deal.


Emese was a great host, she explained everything there is to know about Budapest, she also recommended events to attend. The apartment was great as well, it is positioned really good. All in all our stay was pleasant.

We loved staying at Emese's home! It is a great apartment and had everything we needed. Emese was very responsive to all our questions and needs. The apartment is very cute and cosy. So pleased with our stay there!

I spent 4 fabulous days in Budapest and Emese's flat was like a second home to me. It's small but cosy and I loved getting comfy on the sofa by the gas fire in the evenings.
Emese is a great communicator and was there when I arrived to welcome me and show me around. The flat is in a great location, with little shops and a supermarket for groceries, close to a shopping mall and if you're used to walking, you can get to the centre or to Margaret Island.
Would definitely stay there again!

Emese's apartment is a great choice when staying in Budapest. It has everything one might need. Also, Emese is a great host, who was kindly waiting for us in the apartment at our arrival and provided us with all information we needed. We definitely recommend staying at her place.

Emese is really nice person, she gave us a feel like at our apartment. Everything was perfect - location, flat and also the host. 
I can highly recommend to stay at her and I hope that I get a possibility to be there again.
review_summary: Enjoy the comforts of my studio apartment in the heart of Budapest. It is a stylish, sunny and silent hidden treasure, with ideal location, close to everything you will love about the city. Stay within walking distance with all the major sights, cafés, bars and restaurants, and the "soho", centre of nightlife. Close to the Danube and Margit Sziget (The Central Park of Budapest). Ideal for couples or close friends. As your host, I hope I can share my passion for my favorite city with you!
house_rules:
SAFETY
Please lock both doors when you leave the house.
Please make sure you switch off all electric devices, and the stove when you leave the house.
Please do not sit on the kitchen “table” above the fridge.

PEACE
Please no partying and no loud amusement, all neighbours like to sleep well:)

FRESH and TIDY
Please take your shoes off before entering the room, there is a beautiful light grey carpet:)

RESPECT
Smoking is prohibited!
description:
Enjoy the comforts of my studio apartment in the heart of Budapest. It is a stylish, sunny and silent hidden treasure, with ideal location, close to everything you will love about the city. Stay within walking distance with all the major sights, cafés, bars and restaurants, and the "soho", centre of nightlife. Close to the Danube and Margit Sziget (The Central Park of Budapest). Ideal for couples or close friends. As your host, I hope I can share my passion for my favorite city with you!

You can find me through Airbnb messaging or Viber during your stay.

Újlipótváros is one of the best districts, it is like a little town in the city with many little shops and cafés. So you can find anything you need nearby. Also, the Danube is 10 minutes walk from the apartment, Parliament is also within walking distance. 

IMPORTANT THINGS TO FIND NEARBY:

YOUR MORNING COFFEE: DIY at home, I usually buy Segafredo and there is proper Moka for two:) 
Or try nice cafés 2-5 minutes walking distance in the district.
Lekvár in Visegrádi utca, Double Shot, Green Cup, Panini, Sarki Fűszeres (or 5 other great ones) on Pozsonyi utca, Kino Café on Ditrói Mór u./ József Krt corner. 

LUNCH: If you want something quick, good and cheap, go for lunch menus (12-13.00) anywhere basically, if you are vegetarian, try Nemsüti at Jászai Mari tér 4b, or try Szeráj any time of the day on Szent István krt. 13. 

SHOPPING MALL: Westend City Center is 2 minutes walk, you can find everything there.

GO JOGGING: Margaret Island (10 minutes walk direction Danube)

YOGA TIME: Mandala Yoga is in Kresz Géza utca, just next door

MOVIES: In Westend City Center, the shopping mall next door or find ART Movies ie. Művész and Cirko Gejzir walking distance

PHARMACY: On Visegrádi utca Radnóti Miklós utca corner (1 minute turn right)

Here are some nice walks worth taking: 

Jewish Quarter Walking Tour
(URL HIDDEN)

PUBLIC TRANSPORT: (called BKV)
Check out the schedules here: (URL HIDDEN) 

THE station nearby is called: NYUGATI PÁLYAUDVAR, that is a 2-5 minutes walk from the apartment depending on which means of transportation you choose.

TRAMS:
Nr 4 or Nr 6 is the main tramline that takes you through the city.
Nr 2 to the Parliament: if you walk appr 8 minutes to Jászai Mari tér, you can take tram 2. This is the most scenic tramline along the Danube.

SUBWAY: Metro2 - blue line takes you from Nyugati Pályaudvar to Deák Tér (2 stops).

BOATS: You can also take the boat to go places at Jászai Mari tér by the Danube

TAXIS: find them in the parking lot of Nyugati Pályaudvar. 
The Airport transfer is about 8-9000 HUF/one way.

reviews_text:
The house is really nice!! It's really close to a metrostation. But if you like to walk, it's very doable. Everything was clean and everything we needed was there. Gabor is a great host

Majoros picked me up from the main Railway station (Keleti station). The whole arrival process went smoothly, and without any problems. The apartment is clean, comfortable, well equipped and very functional. 
The only potential issue I could see would be for a person of limited mobility: The sleeping area of the apartment is on a loft. Loft is spacious and comfortable, and easily accessible by ladder. For a healthy adult, this is safe and functional solution. However, I could see that this could be an issue for an mobility-challenged person, or a young child. 
Summary: I highly recommend this place for healthy adults or persons traveling with bigger children, including business travelers. 
There are two metro stations very close to apartment: one about 3 minutes walk from the apartment, another 8. Around the second -8 minutes walk - metro station is also a commercial area, with plenty of restaurants.  


The apartment is tiny but fully furnished (except there is no desk suitable for working at). The neighborhood is frequently described as a bit dodgy but apart from being more rundown than the very center, there is absolutely nothing wrong with it. It's a five minute walk to the subway and trams. Communication, checkin and checkout were completely unproblematic.

A lovely place, very nice host. Totally recommend 

Amazing experience. Loved every minute of it. Really good value, walking distance of everything!! What you see is what you get. 

Gabor's apartment was perfect for our stay in Budapest. The location is great, and better than we had expected, with only a short walk to the centre and ruin bars. The apartment was clean, warm and we felt relaxed and at home immediately. Also the wifi is really fast so great if you fancy a night in.

Would absolutely recommend to anyone. 

Thanks Gabor!

Its was like a hotel.
Thank you so much.

Me and my boyfriend stayed in apartment for 3 nights. Apartment is very nice, tidy and right size for a couple. Gabor was such an amazing host. He answerd on all my 1000 questions and before we come he sent us all info about where we should go to eat,party etc. - very well organised man. 
Even that his apartment is not in the middle of the center u have subway station 3min away and can explore and walk around city anyway. And the good side of not being in center is peace during the night :) 
So thank u Gabor once again for everything :) 
Best regards form Lake Bled, Slovenia
Nika and Dejan

Gabor's apartment is as shown in the pictures. It's very very clean, new, spacious and perfect for 2 or even 4 people. The only BUT we have is that the neightbourhood it's not the best one. At night, when we got back from dinner, there were some drug dealers and prostitutes. We didn't feel very safe or confortable walking around.
Despite of this, we would like to thank Gabor for picking us up at the train station the first day, and for having the apartment in such good conditions. 

I loved staying at Gábors place. He was very kind and welcoming. He was very helpful; he provided us with maps, directions,  and extra page dedicated to extra non touristy places to visit. Any time we asked any questions he was quick to response. The place was clean and as perfect as in the pictures. I would definitely stay here again and would highly recommend this place to all my friends. :)
review_summary:
Beautifully, newly renovated fully equipped, 1 bedroom apartment (27 sqm) in classic house. It is located in walking distance to ruin/party district, in a buzzing heart of Budapest. 
The apartment has a modern design and accommodates up to 3 people in one bedroom. Apartment has a 17sqm and 3,5 m high living room with dining area and with fully equipped kitchen. This high standard apartment is offered for couples, friends and families. I will provide you with towels and hair dryer.
house_rules:
1.Enjoy your time 
2.No pets
3.Please keep your shoes off
4.No smoking
5.Keep clean and tidy
6.Respect neighbours
7. No party
8.No overnight guests
9. Please treat the home as you would your own
10. No illegal and immoral activities
11. Have fun
description:
Beautifully, newly renovated fully equipped, 1 bedroom apartment (27 sqm) in classic house. It is located in walking distance to ruin/party district, in a buzzing heart of Budapest. 
The apartment has a modern design and accommodates up to 3 people in one bedroom. Apartment has a 17sqm and 3,5 m high living room with dining area and with fully equipped kitchen. This high standard apartment is offered for couples, friends and families. I will provide you with towels and hair dryer.

Sunny and friendly 27 sqm apartment with classy design. Come and try the local feeling with an exclusive interior. The apartment is part of an old building with a charming atmosphere. It is on the first floor, so it is ideal for carrying suitcases and bags inside. The bedroom is on the gallery (loft bed), with a double french-bed. The living-room has a couch for one person.

 I will provide you with towels and hair dryer.

The kitchen is fully equipped with anything you may need, please feel free to use everything. Just make sure to reasonably clean up after yourself.

In the bathroom there is a tub so you can have a bath if you wish.

The famous antique row of Budapest, the iconic ruin bars of the old Jewish Quarter are within easy/short walking distance. A huge range of ruin pubs, groceries, delis, coffee shops, restaurants, international newsstand and book shops nearby. Detailed list, description and map on request.


If you need any recommendations, or you don't have any specific plans for your stay, I am happy to give any suggestions where to go and what to do in the city.

You can use the entire apartment without any restriction, of course respecting the house rules.

You can reach me at any time day or night for assistance throughout your stay.

The apartment is not located in the best looking district of Budapest, so if you have such expectations it might not be your right choice. However, if you need a cozy home on a budget price it would be a perfect choice for you.

The famous antique row of Budapest, the iconic ruin bars of the old Jewish Quarter are within easy/short walking distance. Supermarket, tobacco shop, butchery is just around the corner. You can find a market hall, Tesco and a Lidl within 5 minutes walk.

Taxi fare to/from the airport is around 22 Euro, credit card is accepted. Airport Shuttle Minibus costs approx 20-25 Euro for two people, by local bus+metro about 5 Euro.

Upon request I can send you more information and contact details.

If you choose the public transport please take bus 200E from the Airport to Kőbánya-Kispest stop. There change for Metro line 3 and go to Kálvin tér (square). At Kálvin tér change for Metro line 4 and go to II. János Pál pára tér (Pope John Paul II square). From this stop the apartment is only 3 minutes walk away.

The apartment is close to Blaha Lujza square which is a junction and you can reach plenty of buses, subways and trams. You can take tram nr. 4/6 (which operates day and night), Metro nr. 2. and plenty of buses. Furthermore you can take Metro nr. 4. at Pope John Paul II square, what is only 3 minutes walk away.

reviews_text:
My boyfriend and I loved our stay in Budapest. The apartment is clean, modern and stunning. It has a beautiful big bath, and was beautifully decorated for christmas. It is in the most amazing location - literally next to Buda Castle and the Chain bridge. Just 10 minutes walk to the city centre and two different traditional baths. Ildikó and her husband were wonderful. They met us at the apartment - even though we checked in at 1am. They gave us maps, suggestions on where to go and what to do. They were warm and welcoming and left a bottle of Budapest champagne in the fridge! Cannot recommend this place highly enough - one of the best airbnb places we have stayed in. Thanks so much! 

We had a wonderful stay at Ildiko's place. The apartment was clean and just as it looks in the pictures. Ildiko was very easy to get in touch with and was quick with any replies. The apartment has a great location and we wish we could have stayed longer! Would recommend this place to anyone staying in Budapest. Thank you

Ildikò was very nice, helpful and understanding even though she speaks only a little English. She showed us the other entrance to the building, places to go like monuments, supermarkets, restaurants, and baths, and local food. She left fruit and a bottle of Hungarian champagne in the fridge! She tried to satisfy all our needs and replied quickly when we contacted her. The location is perfect, the Royal palace was right above us and only had to cross the Chain bridge to be in the heart of the city. We walked the whole time. Took public transport only to come and go from the airport. The house was clean and had many lights. It was charming and had everything we needed. Only drawbacks were: the only window had to be closed by curtains at all times to have some privacy (if you spend some time at home); the bathtub isn't as easy to enjoy as we imagined. Other than that the experience was great and we couldn't be happier! Thank you so much for the pleasant stay!!

The apartment was in a great location, within walking distance from all of the central tourist sites. Good size for two people, immaculately decorated and very clean. All the amenities you could ask for. Ildiko was great at communicating, and helped us with recommendations and places to visit in the city. Highly recommended.

Charming apartment - perfect for single or couple;  located close to Chain Bridge - could walk everywhere we wanted to go!

Great location. You can walk everywhere. Quiet neighborhood but near the river and everything I wanted to photograph. I would highly recommend this apartment. 

What a stunning apartment, everything was perfect. Ildiko and her husband were so welcoming and friendly, they also gave us lots of tips and tourist info. If you have want to stay in Budapest book this place, location is amazing! Walking distance to everything that you would want to see! I would recommend 100%!

location of the apartment is perfect, it just next to the Chain bridge and very close to most of the popular spots. I would like to say thank you to lldiko and her husband and I will strongly recommend to everyone to stay here when you come to Budapest.

Amazing location, beautiful apartment and everything went smoothly. Really enjoyed our stay and the hosts were very helpful helping us find the place and making us feel welcome. 

Perfect stay in a perfect apartment thats in a perfect location. What more can i say? 

Ildiko was very helpful upon arrival and made us feel very welcoming. 

Our stay in budapest was made to be a very easy one with all the amenities we required plus fast internet and netflix for us to use. 

Only a short walk from many of the sights we wanted to see. 

I would definatly recommend staying here to any couples that wished to visit budapest. You wont be dissapointed.

review_summary:
The 40 sqm apartment is situated in the heart of Budapest.
At the foot of The Chain Bridge, Danube River on the road to the royal Castle of Buda,half a minute from the Funicular train to the Castle, a three minute stroll to Mathew Church,Fishermans Bastion a stone’s throw from the Castle Garden Bazar,a fully renovated elegant apartment awaits you. Short walks Parlament, Opera House, St. Stephen Basilica, Deák square, Andrássy Boulevard, Synagogue, Ruinpubs,Metro,Thermal baths (Rudas,Gellért...)
house_rules:
Do not smoke in the apartment! No excessive noise after 10 pm. and before 8 am ! Early check in, check out is not a problem, if I have no guest staying in the flat the night prior or after your stay, these times can be more flexible.
In the apartment is original and valuable works of art - please take care of them , also the equipments.
Please switch off all electrical and heating equipment when you leave.
Any lost KEY will be with your load (30 EUR).
description:
The 40 sqm apartment is situated in the heart of Budapest.
At the foot of The Chain Bridge, Danube River on the road to the royal Castle of Buda,half a minute from the Funicular train to the Castle, a three minute stroll to Mathew Church,Fishermans Bastion a stone’s throw from the Castle Garden Bazar,a fully renovated elegant apartment awaits you. Short walks Parlament, Opera House, St. Stephen Basilica, Deák square, Andrássy Boulevard, Synagogue, Ruinpubs,Metro,Thermal baths (Rudas,Gellért...)

In a heritage type building, a short stroll from anywhere, the owner has created an elegant apartment in the classical style where you stay in and be part of world heritage in the heart of Budapest. Aside from the “turn of the century” feeling, you’ll find the most modern furnishings in this fully automated, wonderfully-stocked place.  
The living area boasts marble and decorated glass, a complete kitchen and washing machine.  This is the “Art Apartment” and, as such, you will be surrounded by real art objects – refined visual art and statues.

The unit houses 2 + 2 people.  The French bed (160x200) and designer bathtub with gold-plated swan taps lend a feeling of luxury.  In the event of a larger group, a second apartment, “The Bridge and Castle” can be combined in order to accommodate up to 8 guests.  With “The Bridge and Castle”, you get the very best quality in Budapest.

Included – flat screen SMART TV, several foreign language channels and free WiFi - Poweful 120/10/Mbit/sec.

You have the opportunity to discover the real Budapest, sit on the balcony with a glass of wine, walk to the palace in the late evening, or enjoy the countless programmes in the area, the fabulous restaurants and the world-known sights of the Danube shore of Pest.

The casino and thermal baths (Gellert, Lukacs, Rudas, Kraly and Racz) are short walks away.  The nightlife area is a short, romantic stroll away.  A bicycle rental is 50 metres away.  The Buda cross-city streetcar stops 100 metre from the front door.  The traffic centrum of Budapest, the Deak square, is an 8 minute walk away.

You can rent a car and park nearby.  The sightseeing bus stops 30 metres from the hotel.
While in Budapest, visit our newly-renovated apartment and be surrounded by our hospitality.

Taxi, bus 16, bus 105, bus 116, tram 41, tram 19, metro (yellow, red, blue), ship 11

reviews_text:
This hostel is comfortable, located direct in the city centre, so it was not a big deal to reach the place, where I had my course.
I would recommend to everyone, who would like to stay for a few days in Budapest.

It was nice. I didn't have a chance to meet Rita. But her sister was really nice.
The room was exactly like the picture. 
Since it's shared room, you have to tolerate other guests behavior (in my case: snoring)
But, Rita has many information about cool places and event in Budapest. If you stay here, I suggest you to ask her for this information.

I had a fantastic stay at the hostel. Actually, the room and shared spaced were even better than what I was expecting regarding the price : everything was clean,  you can find all you need and the location of the hostel is... just... perfect!! It's in the very center of Budapest, between the Opera and Szent Istvan Bazilika. You couldn't dream of anything better, price and quality-wise.


Cheap, clean in the central.
Recommend to everyone.

Thank you very much for my stayig in Budapest. Everything was excellent!!

It was the most comfortable ever! I really liked staying in this dorm. But there is a sound of a club somewhere at night it made me annoyed.

Great location, within walking distance of so many of the tourist locations and only a 5 minute walk from the Metro station. 
Great facilities too inside the hostel, ensuring a very comfortable stay. 
Would highly recommend.

Clean hostel, young crowd, excellent location. Overall great experience!

Clean hostel with comfy beds. Free luggage storage in rooms was very convenient. Excellent price for the location!

I had a great stay at Rita's place. Very well located between sights, metros, bars and restaurants. Of course some visitors were better than others. Sunday was messy, smelling and not okay. People sleeping in the common area and toilets/showers were dirty and without paper. 

All in all I would recommend everyone to stay at Rita's. Great price, friendly personnel and attractive location.
availability: The minimum night stay for this listing varies.
review_summary: A nice, clean, centrally located hostel at budget prices. The dorms are special, the bunk beds are separated from each other by thin walls, thus giving a kind of semi-privacy to my guests.
description: A nice, clean, centrally located hostel at budget prices. The dorms are special, the bunk beds are separated from each other by thin walls, thus giving a kind of semi-privacy to my guests.

reviews_text:
She welcomed us when we arrived, introduced us to the room and told a few things about the city. I think you get a lot for a price like this. I would definitely recommend it.

Great place! Nothing to complain about :)

My stay at Budapest was really good, fanni was there when we arrived to give keys and other information! Our hotel was clean and well presented.

The flat is in a perfect location. It takes about 10 minutes to get anywhere by feet because it is in the centre of the city. The place was clean and pretty comfortable, except for the sink in the bathroom (it was too small). We also thought there would be towels because it was written in the description, but we found instead two small towels just for hands or face, not so good for the shower. Furthermore the heating system was ok, but when we were cold and we didn't know how to turn it on, we asked fanni and she didn't reply. Just a little bit of comunication would have been appreciated. Anyway we had a great time in Budapest :)

The room was pretty comfy and spacious. As other have said it could be a bit cleaner, but it wasn't too bad. The location is pretty central and I really appreciated having a supermarket really closed by. 

Nice room, all as described. Close to main road and shops but situated in a quieter street. Good value for this price range.

Fantástico! Awesome place!

Fanni was very kind and helpful. The apt was great, it was clean and quiet. I have only one complaint - I don`t think shower was cleaned all over before we arrived and there was only one role of toilet paper. 
But all in all definitely recommended. :)

This was one of my best experiences with AirBnB. Fanni was always accessible, and helpful with: recommendations, booking taxis and making your stay comfortable. If only she could cure my travel partner's snoring! 

The room itself was of a high standard, and in excellent condition, especially for the price you pay. 

The location is good, it's no more than a 15-minute walk to the Danube, and it's easy access to the ruin bars. Szimpla is a stones throw away, for example.

All in all a great stay and would definitely stay again next time I'm in Budapest! 



Fanni met us at the outer door to the place we had booked and told us that there had been an accident in the bathroom that made the room uninhabitable. But not to worry she had another place for us not more than 10 minutes away. There was nothing really that we could do so we went with it and were shown a room in a fourth floor walk up with no elevator. The room seemed decent enough except that there was no bed frame - just two twin beds thrown on the floor with a pillow on each and what looked to be sheet folded at the foot of each bed. 

The bathroom was not attached like it had said it would be in the accommodation we had signed up for and paid money for... 

In our travel fatigue we just nodded to everything Fanni said and said yes this would work. Fanni gave us the keys and quickly departed. Upon further inspection of the room we noticed that in fact they were NOT two twin bed but one box spring and a very crappy mattress. And only one pillow and one pillow case stuffed with stuff. The sheets were not in fact sheets but duvet covers and the fitted sheets on the mattresses were actually mattress protectors. 

The wifi would not work 70% of the time and the bathroom was not attached to the room. Furthermore many of the amenities (like a hairdryer) were not available here nor did Fanni offer to provide one. 

Luckily we spend much of our time exploring Budapest and only came back to sleep. Upon packing up our things the morning of check out we took the mattress protectors (or maybe they were very threadbare sheets?) off the beds and saw BUGS. Freaking out we were worried we would carry a bug-bed infestation back to our home but quickly ascertained they were not bed-bugs.
