NEVERTHELESS - for TWO NIGHTS we had been sleeping in bug infested beds. I received several bites but wrote them off as travel wounds and nothing to worry about. We should have been more observant when the sheets were on but like I said - we were only in the apartment to shower and sleep. Not a lot of time for observation. 

You can bet next time we will be inspecting a room VERY CAREFULLY before agreeing that it is okay and we will NOT be recommending Fanni or her accommodations to any one. 

BOOK WITH CARE. You might not get what you paid for.
review_summary: Hotel Linden is a new space for people who would like to visit Budapest, and stay in the heart of the city. There are 4 rooms (all has private bathroom, and double bed) and a shared kitchen with a fully equipped kitchen cabinet + dining table.
house_rules:
Check in and Check out
Please try to arrive in the discussed time, if not please note me!
description:
Hotel Linden is a new space for people who would like to visit Budapest, and stay in the heart of the city. There are 4 rooms (all has private bathroom, and double bed) and a shared kitchen with a fully equipped kitchen cabinet + dining table.

The apartment has 4 separated rooms all has private bathroom, all of them opens from the rooms. All the rooms has double bed, with fresh, brand new sheets and soft linens. 8 people can stay in the Hotel at one time. There are keys for each rooms. We also provide towels.

It also includes a fully fitted shared kitchen including fridge / freezer, electric cooker, microwave oven, kettle, toast maker and cutlery, you also can ask for iron and hair dryer.

reviews_text:
Renata is a very nice host. She is very social and always willing to provide you with all the information you need during your stay in Budapest. The apartment is very clean, modern and middle in the city centre. There is a separete bathroom for the guest. 

Wir fühlten uns Willkommen in Renatas schönen und sehr sauberen zu Hause. Das Haus besitzt den Charme vergangener Jahre, die Wohnung selbst ist modernisiert und up to date. 
Renata half uns mit allem wo sie nur konnte. Da wir eine kleine Familie sind, lies sie uns in ihren Wohnzimmer schlafen wo sie selber Hand anlegte und umräumte. 
Da wir spontan eine Nacht länger in Budapest bleiben wollten, ihr zu Hause schon weiter vermietet war, tat sie alles um Ersatz zu finden. Es war und sie ist grandios!!
Die Wohnung selbst liegt super Central. Parkplatzsituation wie in allen Städten war grausam, selbst da half sie uns bis zum Schluss.
Das Einzigste womit wir anfänglich zu kämpfen hatten, sie gab uns erst in letzter Minute ihre richtige Adresse. Das war für uns mit Kind und Kegel in dem Moment aufwendig.
Danke Renata, gerne kommen wir wieder!!! Di and Family

Végtelenül kedves és megértő házigazda. A lakása tökéletes! Annak ellenére, hogy a központban helyezkedik el, a közlekedés zajait bentre egyáltalán nem lehet behallani. Bátran ajánlom mindenkinek! :)
review_summary: Hi! Are you ready to discover Budapest? Are you looking for a nice and quiet room in the heart of the city? You have found the right place right now. I have a very beautiful flat for you. Waiting for you :) Greetings : Renata
description: Hi! Are you ready to discover Budapest? Are you looking for a nice and quiet room in the heart of the city? You have found the right place right now. I have a very beautiful flat for you. Waiting for you :) Greetings : Renata

reviews_text:
The accommodation is very good  with a low price. It's location is very convenient and it's easy to take tram and subway. The host will give you useful information for traveling which really help a lot.

That was great experience, the host was kind, friendly and helpful, room was bigger than we expected. Everything is very clean and cosy. Apartment is very easy to find and it also has a great location for tourists - all touristic places are right here.

First of all great location, perfect in my opinion. The room was large and all the facilities all worked. Our bed could have been more comfortable but location made up for it. We met one of the hosts briefly and he was delightful. We needed to leave our bags for a while on the last day and there was no problem - even let us hold on to the key so we could collect them when we were ready. 

Everything fine!

Thank you Peter

The apartment was clean and matched with the price, host was nice. The location of the flat is very good. One of the beds was not comfortable at all but for the money it was OK.

We really enjoyed our stay at Orsi's place. You cannot ask for a better location to stay in Budapest. You're right by the historic parliament building, less than 5 minutes to the metro and less than 2 to the trolley/bus stop. 
The flat was kept very clean. With clean sheets and towels waiting for you. There are 3 rooms in the flat that they also rent out so know that you'll probably have roommates throughout your stay. In the room I stayed the bed was a futon of sorts, comfortable but still not a bed. For the price I would happily sleep on it again. 
Would stay there again. 

If they haven't changed the ad yet, there is not a drier or hot tub. Just a drying rack and a regular bath tub. 

Walkway to the city, new kitchen and bathrooms. Good cleaning. Nice guests and host. It's a pitty with noice from tram.
Small tings to do. Put the washingmachine in level so it doesn't move, waterleakage under kitchen. Change my foam rubber mattress it is to thin to a normal man like me 90 kg.

Good location and great host. I just personally think it's a little over priced for what it is. Over all a good experience though 

We had a lovely stay at Orsi's place. The room was spacious, clean and comfortable, and the apartment was cleaned every day. The location was perfect for sightseeing. We would stay here again. Thank you!
availability: The minimum night stay for this listing varies.
review_summary: The best thing about the room is that it is on the corner of the Parlament so in the middle of the city centre. You can even see the Statue of Liberty on the Gellert Hill from the bedroom. Big room for 4 people. Elevator, supermarket downstairs.
house_rules: The most important rule is to not to disturb the others living in the building and we take this serious, our apartments are located in buildings where the locals from Budapest are living, old people, babies sick and healthy, so the travelers who come and stay in our apartment should respect the building, the people and the most important part of it is not to be loud in the common areas and in the apartment after 8PM, of course you can stay out in the city as long as you wish, just please be very quite returning home and do not party in the apartment, this is the most important thing to share.
description:
The best thing about the room is that it is on the corner of the Parlament so in the middle of the city centre. You can even see the Statue of Liberty on the Gellert Hill from the bedroom. Big room for 4 people. Elevator, supermarket downstairs.

Our Parlament Corner Room is located in the heart of the city, just 200 meters away from the House of Parliament, one of the main sights of the city. The area is mostly pedestrian with a lot of nice restaurants, cozy cafes and as it has a very central location, you can explore all the sights by walks from the apartment.

Our Parlament Corner Room can accommodate 1, 2, 3, 4 persons, as it has 2 double bed. You'll have a convenient location to reach all the sights of the city by foot. The city park with Budapest's best spa complex is an easy walk, as well as all of the other sights. Oktogon's great bars and restaurants will be within arm's reach if you choose Danube View Private Room for your stay in Budapest.

It is located in the historical old town of Budapest, next to the House of Parliament near Kossuth Lajos ter.

The room can accommodate up to 4 people in 2 double beds.

The room has shared bathroom and kitchen, and if you rent the room only, the bathroom and the kitchen will be cleaned everyday by us so you will not even notice you are sharing it.

Of course all the necessary bedding are free of charge (fresh sheets, blankets, pillows, towels as many as you like).

It’s on the 4th floor of an old town palace, and there is an elevator in the building.

Our concept of hosting is unique in the way how we assist our guests in order for them to become a part of this special city. By staying with us you get the chance to discover the city with a perspective of a local. Our aim is to give our Guests a comprehensive insight on how life in Budapest is. In addition to that we firmly believe that each and every person is different therefore we take extra care in dealing with the special needs of our Guests and we have the chance to get to know all the people we are hosting so we can help them the way they need. Our small enterprise consists of apartments which are all set in the heart of the city amidst vibrant cultural and historical surroundings. Please explore our site and see what we can offer You if you choose to visit this wonderful Central European city.

The Parament Corner Room has access to a fully equipped kitchen and dining room and is sharing the bathroom with another room. The room is located within walking distance to all the sights.

You will have your own key to the apartment and to your room, so you can lock it yourself. The apartment has wireless internet and the kitchen is fully equipped, even with a washing machine (of course we will have washing powder, softener etc for you), there will be tea, coffee, sugar for free for you in the apartment and you can cook if you wish as all the equipment will be there for you with the possibility to store your food in the fridge.

There is hairdryer, iron and ironing board in the apartment of course.

Upon arrival we wait for you in the apartment with your key, a map and some other useful information for your stay in Budapest. When you have put down your luggage we will sit down with you and explain the most important things you should know to make your stay more comfortable, like:
- best restaurants, bars, cafes, breakfast places
- best bath houses and museums
- most important and interesting sights and areas to visit
- public transport and taxi system
- where to exchange money
- where are the closest supermarkets, and 24H shops

After all the explanation we disappear until you leave but will be there for you to help in anything like booking a table at a restaurant or if you have any question, you just email, sms, call us and we answer all possible questions and help in any kind of problems.

The Parlament Corner Panorama Room is located in Lipótváros, which is one of the most elegant district of the city, where the Danube is running through with all the beautiful palaces and buildings and the house of Parliament.. Lipótváros has a lot to offer from the House of Parliament to the Basilica and it has some of the city's best restaurants and bars. It is amazing to stroll on the beautiful streets or just have a coffee at a small corner coffee shop, every corner of the district offers you a new surprise.

Sights next to the Parlament Corner Panorama Room: Margaret Island, House of Parliament, Andrássy boulevard + any of the other sights of the city within 15 minutes walk.

The closest bathhouses: Széchenyi Baths and Lukács Baths, both accessible withing 15 minutes.

Near the building downstairs: 24 hours supermarket, coffee shop, local restaurants, pharmacy, exchange office.

The apartment has very good public transportation connection, as it is located close to KOSSUTH LAJOS TER, one of the main hub for public transport in the city where metroline M2 and tramline 2 are crossing each other.

There is 24H bus connection next to the apartment too.

It is important to know that we can receive guests 24H a day, so no problem with any late arrival, check in is from noon and on the day you leave you have to pack your luggage until 11.00, but you can keep your luggage at a safe place during the day in case you leave only later from Budapest.


You can use internet in the apartment free of charge of course and of course the use of laundry is free too. My brother can rent bikes for you too, it costs about 7EUR/day and they bring them to the apartment and you can give it back to them also at the flat when you wish.

reviews_text:
It was best accommodation i've ever visited. Even though i checked in early in the morning because of my flight, they greeted me lovely. Room was clean, quiet and cozy. Nice breakfast every morning, even Erzsébet cooked Goulasch for me. They explained to me all beautiful places in Budapest and answered really fast, if i asked something. They can speak english and german, so we communicated easily. QIf i visit this city again, i will definitely stay here. Highly recommended!
정말 역대급으로 좋았어요. 추천합니다 :)

Hosts are so kind, my stay was just perfect. Highly recommended!

Sara and Erzsebet were both wonderfully hospitable and generous and I had a very pleasant stay for my short time in Budapest. Their kindness was a highlight of my trip, thanks for everything! 

Sára was a great host, I had problems with my flight and I arrived near 1 AM and Sara and her Mom where waiting for me.

Nice place, I recommend for solo travellers.

You have your own space in the house with you bath and wc.

And the breakfast is good, in fact too much for me :p



I cant even find words to describe how wonderful my stay by this family was. Ok, it was rrrrrreeeally super nice, sweet, friendly, homelike levee. Sara's mom treated me like my own mother, always caring, asking how she can help me. Everything was perfect: breakfast, room, bathroom. Thank you for everything, for Hungarian shchi and Palinka too:))))

The private room provides sufficient privacy 
That I don't feel disturbed at all. Sára and Erzsébet are such nice people and take care of everything you might need.
Thank you Sára and help to send my greeting to Erzsébet too!
100% recommended!


Everything was perfect. Best airbnb  experience so far. Sára and her mother made me feel at home (even better). The breakfast was amazing! I'll definitely stay here again! 

Sara's place is great value and spotlessly clean and secure within the apartment complex. There is no elevator so be prepared to lug bags up two flights of steps. Sara's family helped me carry my bags down which was greatly appreciated - I would stay there again

I would recommend this stay to everyone as it felt like being at home. Sara and her mother,Elisabeth, are both really nice, welcoming and helpful. Elisabeth is also a great host, I loved the breakfasts!
If I returned to Budapest, I would definitely love to stay with Sara's family again. 
PS Having a separate toilet and bathroom was also appreciated.

Wonderful place, everything was as described. Sàra meet me but her mother hosted me, she was very hospitality and helped me to experience the best Budapest. I would highly recommend if you want to experience something homely in Budapest.
review_summary: The room is cosy and small, but it contains separated bathroom and toilet. The breakfast belongs to the price. The owners are so welcoming. The flat is near to the Nagyvárad square at the metro line 3. The city center is 5 minutes by subway or 20 minutes walk. The Keleti train station, Népliget bus station and the Liszt Ferenc airport are easily reachable.
description: The room is cosy and small, but it contains separated bathroom and toilet. The breakfast belongs to the price. The owners are so welcoming. The flat is near to the Nagyvárad square at the metro line 3. The city center is 5 minutes by subway or 20 minutes walk. The Keleti train station, Népliget bus station and the Liszt Ferenc airport are easily reachable.

reviews_text:
The flat is very nice and cozy! It is centrally located. The place is perfect for a solo traveler or a couple. 

Fantastic place very central. Clean, has everything you need, including a powerful shower. 

A great base for exploring Budapest. Lovely apartment in a central location. 

Had a very enjoyable time in the apartment. The area is bustling with activities however inside the house you hear nothing so it's very relaxing after the buzz of the city. The shower is amazing. Was happy to hsve this as my home for a for a few days

Superb! Highly recommended :)

Awesome place, best location. One of the best Airbnb places I stayed at.

Great flat in a great location. Zoli was an excellent host and made everything easy.

Conveniently located flat in an area full of bars and restaurant. A stones throw away from the synagogue and metro.
Quiet and peaceful although in a busy area.


Wonderful location in Jewish quarter. Short walk to everything. Apartment looks exactly as pictured. Host was responsive and accommodating. Would definitely stay here again!

We had a great time in Budapest! The communication with Zoli went well, he answered pretty quickly to our questions and he even took care of our transportation from and to the airport. We could leave our luggage at the apartment even before the check-in time and after the check-out time. 

The bed is comfy and big enough for a couple. The kitchen is fully equipped with everything you need. There's even a dishwasher. 

The apartment itself is really in the center of Budapest. We did almost every visit on foot. It's located in the party area of Budapest, but we didn't hear any noise at night as the apartment isn't faced to the street. Which is a big plus. And the air conditioning was a blessing during these hot days in Budapest.  

I would recommend this place to couples and friends, especially for young people. 

At last I want to thank Zoli and his friend Bence for everything.
availability: 2 nights minimum stay.From Dec 28, 2016 - Jan 02, 2017 the minimum stay is 5 nights.
review_summary: We offer you the perfect place to recuperate in after an exhausting day or night of travelling, sightseeing or fun, right in the middle of sights to see and places to have fun. As our guest, Frank put it ‘The area is bustling with activities however inside the house you hear nothing so it's very relaxing after the buzz of the city.’
description:
We offer you the perfect place to recuperate in after an exhausting day or night of travelling, sightseeing or fun, right in the middle of sights to see and places to have fun. As our guest, Frank put it ‘The area is bustling with activities however inside the house you hear nothing so it's very relaxing after the buzz of the city.’

This second floor apartment for 2 boasts of an overall clean feel with warm, modern furnishings. The windows open to quiet courtyard, ensuring privacy and peace and we lay special emphasis on the cleanliness of the space.

ROOMS:
+ anteroom with large closets  (? előszoba és szekrényei használhatóak? Ha jól látom közös a másik lakással)
+ living room/bedroom/open kitchen with double bed
+ bathroom with toilet and shower

We have fast wifi and cable TV at your service, and a well equipped kitchen for your cooking needs. The apartment’s relaxing atmosphere also applies to the bathroom-of-green-mosaic-highlights. You need not worry about bringing along towels or bedlinen, because we provide them fresh and clean.

COMFORT:
+ fresh towels and bed linen for all guests
+ basic amenities (soap, toilet paper, shampoo)
+ hair dryer
+ washing machine
+ iron
+ cable TV
+ high-speed wifi
+ laptop-friendly workspace
+ air conditioning
+ baby cot optional
+ 24/7 assistance by phone and email
+ flexible check-in

The apartment is located in the Jewish District, about 60 metres from Gozsdu Udvar., 100 metres from the Dohány Street Synagogue, and 120 metres from Kazinczy Street. What’s more, there is superb barber shop right in the same building, should you or your travelling companion be in need of beard grooming.    

LOCATION:
+ in the heart of the city, close to fun ruin pubs
+ good public transportation (buses/trams/metro line 2 - 3 mins)
+ ideal for sightseeing and pub crawls

DISTANCES BY FOOT:
Gozsdu Courtyard - 1 mins
Dohány Street Synagogue - 1 mins
Jewish District (and ruin pubs) - 1 mins
Astoria - 3 mins
Deák Ferenc square - 4 mins
Basilica - 6 mins
Chain Bridge - 10 mins
Parliament - 15 mins

DISTANCES BY PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION:
Heroes' Square - 10 mins
Gellért hill - 10 mins
Margaret Island - 15 mins
Buda Castle - 15 mins

Tourist tax is included in the price.

availability: On Fridays and Saturdays the minimum stay is 3 nights.
review_summary: Our apartment is a small nest for couples or single travellers in the downtown of our beautiful capital! Situated in Kertész street among Király and Dob streets below Erzsébet körút. So in the downtown :)
description:
Our apartment is a small nest for couples or single travellers in the downtown of our beautiful capital! Situated in Kertész street among Király and Dob streets below Erzsébet körút. So in the downtown :)

It is a small but very compact apartment where everything is there what you could need!

One of our kind colleguse will let you in and will give you all the instructions what you might need during your stay and don't forget we are online all the time!!!

Here you can find the contemporary nightlife of BP with dozens of bars, ruin pubs, bistros and the most beautifull highligts are in walking distance as well!
for example:
Opera 500meters
Oktogon 250 meters
Basilica 1500meters
Heroes square 2000meters

The approach of the apartment is really easy by tram (4 or 6) or underground (M2 or M3) or by feet from Deák Ferenc tér.

Late night check in charge for 15 EUR after 21:00. We can arrange airport transfer for you as well.

reviews_text:
We had a fantastic stay at Lilla's - the flat was in a brilliant location for exploring Budapest and was surrounded with lots of bars and restaurants just a few minutes walk away. Lilla was a wonderful host, very helpful and replied quickly when we had any questions. 

The host canceled this reservation 30 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Lilla was very responsive. She accommodated us at the last minute. Her place is very conveniently located to the old part of town. The pictures sell it a little more than what it's worth, but still a great place. 

Was a great location to stay in, close to public transport and we generally walked to most places. Apartment was nice and spacious. Thanks for accomodating us Lilla.

Lilla was a great host - she was extremely quick when replying to messages and made check in/out instructions really clear. The appartment is exactly as described/photograph and was perfect for the four of us. A great location for exploring the city with lots of nice restaurants/bars and shops nearby,

Lilla's apartment is perfectly located and great for a weekend break. We were left instructions on how to check in and out, and anything else we needed, Lilla made sure to help. We mostly walked around for the stay and found that the apartment was in a great location for walking to anywhere within the city.

living at lillas appartement was great! we enjoyed living in the city center with a lots of bars and restaurants. Lilla was really helpful und recommented us nice restaurants. The appartement was clean, wlan was good and we are lucky! thank you for this, Lilla!

Listing description accurate however no central heating in winter thankfully an electric radiator was provided. Also electricity wasn't great; most plugs didn't work and power would cut out when using the hair drier. Overall reasonably priced just shame about the heating / electricity. 


The apartment was perfect - had everything we needed, was clean and in a great location. Lots of bars and restaurants close by and we found it easy to walk to everywhere from the apartment. Lilla was always quick to respond to any queries and was very accommodating with our check in and out times. Would happily stay here again and would highly recommend Lilla's apartment to anyone.

The host canceled this reservation 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
availability: 1 night minimum stay.From Dec 25, 2016 - Jan 03, 2017 the minimum stay is 5 nights.
review_summary: Beautiful, modern, newly furnished duplex available for rent. Sheets, towels, hairdryer, etc all included. Free Wifi. In a renovated building, great location, @very center of Budapest, easy to get anywhere, groceries, restaurants, bars all next door.
house_rules: No smoking in the apt please.
description:
Beautiful, modern, newly furnished duplex available for rent. Sheets, towels, hairdryer, etc all included. Free Wifi. In a renovated building, great location, @very center of Budapest, easy to get anywhere, groceries, restaurants, bars all next door.

Modern space in a newly renovated beautiful building with brand new, modern furniture. 

Free wireless internet in the flat, brand new washing machine, hairdryer, sheets, towels, well equipped kitchen.

More than happy to give advice, recommendations, available on the phone or through email 24/7.

In the heart of Budapest's night-life, bars, restaurants, non-stop grocery all steps away. Within  2 minutes walk to the famous Hungarian Opera house, the largest Synagogue in Europe and right by Andrassy street where you can find all high end boutiques.

Subway, trams, trolley is all easily accessible, but most sights, night life are all in walking distance.

reviews_text: Great brand-new apartment, very well equipped, near the city center. Perfect for tourists and business travelers alike. Very spacious living room, beautiful kitchen and a comfortable bed! Also, Krisztian was a great host and communication was seamless. As an Airbnb oldtimer, who spends 150 nights a year in a hotel/apartment, I could say this was one of the best.
review_summary: Karolyi Garden is most probably the the only quiet spot in downtown, just a stone throw away from buzzling Vaci street, Budapest's main pedestrian street. Our nice and modern apartment is overlooking to this quiet oasis of the town center, assuring You to be in easy walking distance of all sights and and still have a decent a peacefull night sleep. A sip of a morning coffee on the terrace hearing the birds singing can easily set the right mood for a long day of city exploration.
house_rules: - Please, respect our neighbours and avoid any noisy activity after 22.00
description:
Karolyi Garden is most probably the the only quiet spot in downtown, just a stone throw away from buzzling Vaci street, Budapest's main pedestrian street. Our nice and modern apartment is overlooking to this quiet oasis of the town center, assuring You to be in easy walking distance of all sights and and still have a decent a peacefull night sleep. A sip of a morning coffee on the terrace hearing the birds singing can easily set the right mood for a long day of city exploration.

You'll find it rewarding to return home walking only a few minutes after a nice eat or drink out and skip the impossible mission of finding a reliable cab in the area. 
Despite downtown location, it is very quiet and provides a very good night sleep thanks to its 2nd floor location, facing Karolyi garden.

It is comfortable for two.

We offer You on top of a fully furnished and equipped apartment some smaller things We appreciate to get whenever we travel:
Complimentary coffee (capsule espresso machine) and tea, free wi-fi, Budapest travel guides, maps, sheets and towels, shampoo, hair-dryer, English books and a good atmosphere :)

I am always at Your disposal in case of any questions!

All downtown sights are within an easy walk:
- Vörösmarty square - 10 mins
- Vaci street - 2 mins
- Great Market Hall - 4 mins
- Kiraly street and Gozsdu courtyard - 10 mins
- Kazinczy street famous ruin pubs - 12 mins
- Andrassy road & Opera building - 10 mins
- Basilica square and Zrinyi street - 15 mins
- Synagogue - 6 mins
- Chain bridge - 15 mins
- Castle hill - 20 mins
- Parliament building - 25 mins

Excellent connection to public transportation:
- Metro line 3 station Astoria is 150m away

reviews_text:
Rokko's place is very nice and very good located. Few minutes to parking place and public transport. Communication was perfect and easy. Can only recomended this place.

Cozy apartment with high ceilings and art influences. 
Close to Keleti station.

We loved Rokko's house! The light, the wide spaces, parquet,warm inside and the cold Budapest outside, silence and relax...all we needed! Rokko's family is sweet and easygoing.We're going to come back soon!

Communication was fast , the owner' s family member has come to meet me at the flat. They gave me direction and were always available if help needed.

Rokkos Apartment is great! We even had to forces ourselves to leave the flat since it was just so cosy there :) It's situated right in the middle between Square of Heroes and the beautiful Keleti Railway Station. You can reach the City Center within 20 Minutes of Walking, or even faster by using the public transport. Rokkos daughter Erika and her Husband providet us with any information we needet. The communication with them was easy at any time before or during our stay. I highly recommend this place for a remarkable stay in Budapest.

Everything was ok. Erika wa a nice host!

Everything went smoothly since the moment we came. We were welcomed by Gabriel, Erika's husband, who gave us some basic info and helped us settle in the flat. The flat is very spacious and quite artistic (a lot of hand-made things and pieces of art around the apartment) which we really liked. The bathroom and the kitchen look brand new, and the flat is fully equipped so you have everything you need for your stay. We liked the location best as it is within a short walking distance from the biggest park in Budapest, the Zoo and the Hero's square (only 4 km away from the center). There is also a big, free, public parking nearby, which is great for those travelling by car. Me and my girlfriend absolutely loved this place and when we come to visit again we will definitely contact our friendly hosts :)

Very good flat! Big and clean

We loved the apartment, and they were very flexible with our arrival time. The apartment is marvelous and well positioned! We could reach everything on our bikes :) We can totally recommend this flat!

Erika, who showed us the appartment was nice. We could check-in early so that was appreciated. The place is near Keletti station which was good for us since we were traveling by train. Everything was clean and confortable enough, albeit a little bit hot in July even with the windows open. To get to the bathroom from the bedroom, we have to go by the livingroom which can be anoying for the people sleeping in the living room (we were 4 guests). We appreciated our stay.
review_summary: Artist style apartment on the 4th floor, placed between the Heroes Square and Keleti Railway Station (7 min walk), one block away from Városliget (well known public park). Sunny (windows on 3 sides of the apartment). Only one lovely neighbor.
description:
Artist style apartment on the 4th floor, placed between the Heroes Square and Keleti Railway Station (7 min walk), one block away from Városliget (well known public park). Sunny (windows on 3 sides of the apartment). Only one lovely neighbor.

Seven minutes walk:
Hosok ter (Square of Heroes) 
Mucsarnok (Kunsthalle)
Szechenyi furdo (Szechenyi thermal bath)
Keleti palyaudvar (Keleti railwaystation)
Metro 2, Metro 4 (Keleti station)

Four minutes walk:
Varosliget (biggest public park in Budapest)

Two minutes walk:
Garai piac (Garay food market)

Whole flat

In case of need my daughter will help you. Living 100 m from my flat.

Free parking on Otvenhatosok tere. Four minutes by walk.

reviews_text:
Great stay!

This place was really good! We were near everything and the flat was really beautifull big rooms and clean. I truly recomend it

the best host I have had in air bnb

We had a lovely experience in Monika's flat! It is located in an amazing place which made it easy to travel around both by walking and the tram. We didn't expect other travellers to be staying in the other rooms but it definitely wasn't a bad surprise!

An amazing stay at Monika's room! She Recomended us a very good restaurant and she was very helpful and always ready to answer back on (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN)! The room has an amazing location, near the jew district where all the nightlife and ruin pubs are.. I will totally get back there :D 

Monika was very helpful and gave us some useful advice about what to do in Budapest. The description of the room was accurate and the flat had all our basic needs. The location was perfect - right in the centre of the Jewish district close to all the ruin pubs. 

Sehr netter Kontakt, alle wichtigen Fragen zur Ankunft wurden jederzeit beantwortet. Die Unterkunft war wie beschrieben und auf den Fotos. Ausserdem befindet sie sich zwischen vielen Bars und Pups.
Alles in allem ein sehr guter Trip nach Budapest
review_summary: NEW!!! Renovated, friendly flat in the center of Budapest with 4 stylishly decorated, separated room with double beds. The flat is perfect for couples or groups waiting to have a nice holiday in the  city.  We also offer the whole flat for rent.
house_rules: Please treat the flat as if it was your own, do not smoke inside the flat and keep the noise down after 10pm. Smoking is not allowed in the flat, but we have place in front of the door where you can smoke.
description:
NEW!!! Renovated, friendly flat in the center of Budapest with 4 stylishly decorated, separated room with double beds. The flat is perfect for couples or groups waiting to have a nice holiday in the  city.  We also offer the whole flat for rent.

In the kitchen and in the bathroom you will find everything you need. There is a free and high-speed wifi in the whole flat.

The flat is located in the heart of the city. Just next to the nightlife zone of Budapest (but in an absolutely safe area). 
There are many shops, pubs, bars and restaurants near the house. 
It is closed to a big supermarket (1 minute) and many food shops are open whole night and the weekend all around.
The Synagogue and the very downtown are just a few minutes walking distance. 
It is very easy to get around in the city from this place.

There is a double bed in the bedroom.

Me or one member of my family will wellcome you when you arrive. 

We are ready to help you with any needs, problems you may have during your Budapest stay. You can reach us in mobile day or night and just call us if you need a hand.

The area is in the heart of Erzsébetváros and also called Jewish district.

You can easily reach with few minutes walking: 
- Oktogon
- Andrassy Avenue
- Király streat
- Liszt Ferenc square
- Opera 
- Budapest Broadway 
- Gozsdu Court (Gozsdu udvar) 
- Great Synagogue 
- Váci streat
- Deák square 
- Europeum Shopping Center

The public transport opportunities are excellent due to the central location of the flat. 
The appartment is really easily reachable from Nyugati (Western) Railway Station. It is only 3 stops with the 4-6 Tram Line which crosses the whole City and the Danube. The house is just a few steps from the stop. 
The M2 Metro Line, busses and the trolley are within 2-5 minutes walk.
If you arrive by car you can find a cheap parking place near to the flat.

reviews_text:
The place was really nice and the view was amazing! It's slightly out of the main areas but has easy transport links that make it very quick and easy to get into town. Had a great stay and would highly recommend it!

Daniel's apartment is so much MORE than it is on the pictures!
If you're a tourist and came to see Budapest's sights, I'd give you one warning... you won't want to leave this place and risk to spend hours sipping wine and admiring the best Parliament view in the city! :)

This was indeed the best place we've stayed in, and we want to thank Daniel and his father for their warm welcome and hospitality. We will come back!

View was amazing!  Daniel and his mother were thoughtful and very helpful. Bed and pillows were a little hard for our taste but the view, convenient location, and ability to save money by cooking our own meals well made up for it. 

Absolutely beautiful apartment in a handy location - we pretty much walked everywhere. Just like the pictures and the view is unbelievable! Daniel met us when we arrived and gave us lots of helpful information. All in all - superb!

The view and the apartment are stunning, but a few things needs to be improve. First we did not feel a warm welcome from the hosts, almost unwelcoming... Leaving a Czech beer in the fridge and  outdated chocolates as gifts are not really impressive either... The matress of the bed needs to be changed, it is used and we did not sleep well. We had no hot water for one complete day (building issue but still unpleasant). I would still recommend the place because it's a top choice for Budapest at that price but with small improvements it will reach perfection. 

We love vacation rentals--Airbnbs---and others. This is now our favorite vacation apartment. It exceeded our expectations (and that is saying something because we are a bit obsessive!). Yes, we are the ones, like you, digging through all of the possibilities, reading all of the reviews, looking at all of the pictures, trying to make the right choice. If you are considering this apartment, choose it. The location, the VIEW, the beautiful space, the fabulous balcony, the VIEW, the washer/dryer, the beer on arrival, the VIEW, the looking across the Danube and seeing the seeing the bats over the Parliament at night, the lift, the very reasonable price, every room tastefully decorated, and the VIEW! And if you are wondering about Budapest, choose it! We loved every minute. We can't wait to go back. When looking online we always wonder if the photos accurately represent the apartment. In this case the pictures don't do justice to the place. Amazing.

The apartment is located within close proximity from the batthyany ter metro and tram station, it's very convenient to use the public transport to explore the city. Daniel has also helped us to book a cab to the airport on our last day which it's much appreciated!

As me and my partner got to the apartment we were greeted by Daniel and his father who showed us around the apartment. Everything was new and modern. The view is incredible! Unfortunately I became ill over the period of our stay and the host was great by helping me get medication and making me feel at ease which was lovely as nobody likes being ill in another country! We had everything we needed at our doorstep, shops, pharmacy, bus stop, the hustle and bustle 15 mins away and you can never get lost as you know your apartment is opposite the parliament! It was very handy. Recommend! 

This apartment has the most beautiful scene I've ever been to

After spending 6 weeks in Europe using Airbnb we left the best until last. This place is amazing and the location is perfect. 
On arrival we were met by the boys and they settled forums in and helped us with a map and some info. At the end of our stay they allowed us to leave our luggage in the apartment and booked us a taxi as we had an evening flight. 
There is a great supermarket nearby and plenty of restaurants close. The train station is a 2 minute walk and you you are 2 stops from the central station. Couldn't recommend highly enough!
description:
The flat is a brand new, modern, beautifully furnished apartment looking over the river Danube and the Parliament. It is located on the Buda side of Budapest within easy reach of all the famous tourist sites, nice bars and restaurants. The flat, accessible with a lift, is on the 7th floor of the building providing amazing views over Pest.

Guests will be able to use all rooms and amenities within the flat. There is a large bathroom with a bath tub and shower and also a separate toilet. Also a large double bedroom, and a beautiful living/dining/kitchen space.

Upon your arrival you will be shown around the flat and will be told all the necessary information. Someone from my family or I will be available via phone or airbnb if there are any problems.

The flat is located on the Buda side walking distance to many popular tourist destinations, such as the Old Jewish Quarter with all its famous ruin bars and restaurants, as well as the Buda Castle and Chain Bridge, and the rest of the city centre.

There is a tram line right in front of the building and buses behind the building taking you to several destinations around the city. There is also a tube/metro stop about 5 minutes walk away. From the airport you can take, a taxi, an airport shuttle bus or public transport to the city centre.

reviews_text:
Zoltan is very friendlyand available , I loved his house and cat. Everything is identical to pictures. Great view from the balcony. Great experience. 

My boyfriend & I stayed for our anniversary and we had a great time. 
Beautiful apartment & bedroom, great hospitality.
Zoltán is really nice, friendly and always open for a chat. He made sure we had a good stay.
Quiet area but really close to the city center.



I really recommend Zoltans' flat. It's very beautifull place with cute cat :). Zoltan as a Host was very nice and he described everything for us, he prepared an instruction with restaurants, places which we can visit and he prepared atractions we could see. We were feeling like in our own home. This place is close to the shop and to the city center. I hope I will back there someday :).

Zoltan's place is comfortable and quiet. Zoltan even prepared couple pages of info for visitors to easy to get around the city. 

Zoltan shares his place generously that makes me feel like home with great Pajkos' company. Highly recommended!!!  

We felt really good and comfortable at Zoltan´s cozy flat.
It is situated in quite zone, just few bus stops from the city center.
Zoltan was very kind and friendly, he gave us a lot of usufull tips where to go...
And a kind of "bonus" of this accomodation was his cute cat Pajkos.
We felt in love with him, inspite of my allergy on cats ,-)
We will recommend this place everyone. Zoltan was perfect host!

Really great place to stay during our 5 day trip in Budapest. Zoltan and his cat Pajsok are great hosts! 



Zoltan place is beautiful, the room is great with pleny space and the bed is really confortable.
The house is a few steps away of a bus stop in the buda side, most of the turistic places are located in pest, so in around 15 min you can get most of them by bus.

Zoltan is really nice, he cares for let you feal confortable at his house and he is always open to help you with tips and moving around the city.

We really recommend the place!

We really like Zoltan´s place. He has beautiful, cozy and stylish flat on perfect location near to city center. 
We are falling in love to his cute cat Pajkos. 
Zoltan was great host and very nice person.
He gave us perfect tips for food and what we can visit.
In his flat was clean and we had all essentials.
We feel perfect like our home and we surelly come back. 
Thank you Zoltan :) 
Kristiana & Oto 



 when we first arrived, he welcome us so much and wanted to help us. That was so kind and generous. He told us so many things about budapest to make us easy to look around budapest! 
 He explains attractions, restaurants, cafes and so on. It was so helpful because we didn't plan many. Also he explains historical stories about budapest. It was so interesting!! 
 He made us great dinner and we talked a lot about ourselves! I think talking about ourselves is what air BnB is all about, so it was so great.
 The cat(pajkos) was so cute!! I won't forget the cutie!!

He was a very nice host and gave us a lot of informations about budapest. The apartment and the room was like the pictures and very clean. Furthermore the place was good to go to the city centre, just 10-15 min with the bus. All in all I would recommend it!
review_summary: Lovely 55 sqm apartment is located in a safe and peaceful residential area of Budapest, only 5 stops by bus from the historical city center. The apartment has a living room and 2 bedrooms, one of them is offered for you to stay.
description:
Lovely 55 sqm apartment is located in a safe and peaceful residential area of Budapest, only 5 stops by bus from the historical city center. The apartment has a living room and 2 bedrooms, one of them is offered for you to stay. 

My lovely 55 sqm apartment is located in a safe and peaceful residential area of Budapest, only 5 stops by bus from the historical city center. The apartment has a living room and 2 bedrooms, one of them is offered for you to stay.  

The apartment is on the top (3rd) floor of a 1960's building and it was renovated recently. There's no elevator. The apartment is on a hill and it has a balcony with a stunning panoramic view over the city and the surrounding hills.

The sunlit apartment has an equipped kitchen with fridge, washing-machine, oven, gas stove, toaster, coffee machine, mixer (...and everything you need to cook). You can also use WiFi, cable TV, home cinema sound system and anything you need and I have (hairdryer, iron). I'll provide you linen and towels, slippers too.

I am a freelance graphic designer, so I'm quite flexible with my time. During the day I usually come and go, working home or having several meetings in the city. In the evenings I meet my friends or do some private programs away from home and most nights I don't sleep at home, so I will give you a lot of privacy. But if you are interested in conversations with me or a dinner together, I'm also open to it, since I'm friendly and talkative. :) I can give you tons of recommendations and provide you with several flyers, booklets, magazines about programs and highlights of the city, and I'm also ready to go out and show you around if you like and I can find time. I truly believe that connection with other people makes our life richer and more meaningful. Sharing is caring - it's my motto.

The neighborhood is very safe and comfortable, one of the most precious areas in the city: fresh air, lots of greens, parks, walking and hiking trails and panoramic views, while the city center is only 10 minutes and the connection is excellent even at night. Although it is a relaxed area, you will find here some restaurants, wine bars, an English speaking cinema, a sport complex with swimming pool and gym, supermarket, shopping center and every Saturday there is a farmers' market, where you can get organic fruits and vegetables, cheese, dairy, meat, wine, etc.

The apartment is easily accessible 24/7 with public transport, but taxi transfer is also an affordable option. (It costs only 6-8 euros from the center.) 

Most highlights of Budapest are very easy to reach:
- Gellért Hill / Citadella - 10 min
- Buda Castle (Royal Palace, Funicular, National Gallery, Budapest History Museum, Fisherman's Bastion - 15 min
- River Danube / Duna Corso - 10 min
- Rudas Bath - 10 min
- Gellért Bath - 15 min
- City Center - 10-15 min

I have a cat in the apartment. He is beautiful and super friendly. :)

reviews_text:
It was a funny experience about this flat. First of all we were staying in a different place than it was shown on the pictures. Very small bedroom, perfect for two but still I was expecting something else. Second thing - it was smelly, because obviously there is a problem with heating system. After we turned off the heater smell of gas was gone and it still was pretty warm inside. There are lots of good things about this flat: perfect location, friendly host, very atmospheric flat with a very nice view, old but again very authentic house. I can call this experience a good one and I would totally stay there again. Thank you!

Comfy flat int the center, our host is a really nice person.
I recommend the accommodation.

Really nice appartement, very very well situated. Tha appartement is clean and exactly as described on Airbnb.
Adrian is a really nice host who did everything to make me feel as home in Budapest, and waited me for the keys because of taxi strike (i was in late).
If i have to come back in Budapest i will probably book this appartement again.

This apartment was wonderful! The location could not be better, right in the center of everything and walking distance to all major landmarks in Budapest. Communication was simple, and Adrian had someone wait outside for me when I arrived to help me get into the apartment. Though it was snowing outside, the heater worked very well and it did not take long to heat the entire room. The space was wonderful, and it was nice having a fridge (though we did not use the rest of the kitchen). The water in the shower was great; I've had places where it got cold quickly but that did not happen here. This was a great value, and I would absolutely recommend this place to anyone planning to visit Budapest for a few days.

I am very grateful to Adrian whom I couldn't meet in person but sent a friend who then again was extremely helpful. The rooms seem to be a bit smaller than they are on photos,you must open the window due to enormous chloride smell when you arrive.I even had to take a pill against headache.still I say that I got a good place in the heart of the downtown at a very affordable price.thanks

Adrian was a nice host, the flat is really convenient for a short stay in budapest as you will not need to walk more than 5 minutes to all the great places in Pest!! A very nice experience here.

Great location and Adrian picked us up from the airport which was convenient.

A few things were disappointing; the flat is on the 4th floor with no lift. I don't remember reading this in the description. The bed was not especially comfortable and the linens provided were insubstantial. The towels smelled like cigarettes.

Again, the location was made this place worth staying 3 nights, but my husband and I were glad to move on to another location.

Adrian was a great host. Perfect location and nice apparment. We liked it there very much, we surely will be going back.

Almost everything was good, expect from the keys (some problems with locking/unlocking the door), but altogether I can say it was great. The quality rapported to the price is excellent! 

Location of the apartment is great, it's close to the city center and metro stations (M3, M4). Adrian was good host, he came at scheduled time and he explained everything about apartment. Apartment is very good for staying a few days, but it's not recommended to stay any longer. It was a little bit dirty, hairs on the towels and in the bathroom and a lot of dust on the shelfs.
review_summary:
Cozy, 2 roomed (living room + bedroom) apartment with own bathroom and kitchen. 
Very central location, easy to reach. Fully and quality refurbished accomodation with brand new furnitures and equipment.
house_rules: This is a non smoking apartment.
description:
Cozy, 2 roomed (living room + bedroom) apartment with own bathroom and kitchen. 
Very central location, easy to reach. Fully and quality refurbished accomodation with brand new furnitures and equipment.

Perfect conditioned, 100 year old, silent building, and totaly refurbished, light and clean apartment in the famocenter of Budapest.
All of the equipments and furnitures are brand new, and the flat has just been refurbished.


Wi-fi and cable TV for free, brand new kitchen equipment, hair dryer, towels and bed linen, ironing facility.
Parking lot can be booked for 20 euro/day.

I am a very discret host :)

The central VII. discrict of Budapest (called "jew disctrict"), is a unique place with historical buildings, crooked streets, and and a very special atmosphere. Now, this place is the center of the hungarian night life: ruin bars, street food places, hostels, theaters and restaurants, etc...
But beside this, the ordinary tourist destinations (castle hill, parliament, gellert hill, baths) can also be reached easily.

Deak Ferenc square (the heart of the hungarian public transport system with M1, M2, and M3, and plenty of bus and tramlines) is 100 m walk from the door. Liszt Ferenc International airport can be reached within 20 minutes.

WI FI password:

reviews_text:
We stayed 3 nights in apartment. Andras helped us to find free parking space just in front of the apartment. Apartment is really clean and warm. It is a great building with amazing view. I highly recommend it to everybody.  You will not want to leave the apartment.  

The place is absolutely stunning and so is the view from the house. Andras & Balint are thorough professionals and go out of their way to help you feel comfortable in the city!
Highly recommended!

We had a lovely time at Andras' apartment. It was centrally located, really nice, had an amazing view and we felt really comfortable. Communication with Andras was really easy and friendly, we can highly recommend his place to anyone!

Thank you Andras!

You can't get a better location to explore Budapest if it is your first time there.  The view out of the apartment is fantastic as well as being below the Buda Castle.  Do not hesitate to book this place!

We had a fantastic time at Andras's place! Fantastic location, clean, comfortable and warm. Both Andras and Balint were extremely helpful and made sure we had everything we needed for a great stay in Budapest.

The location is very great,near most of important view point in Budapest,the hosts are very kind to introduce everything to us.

Very nice appartment.  Has everything you need and a fantastic view. Great location.  Practical information was available.   Always fast answers from the host. 

A nice apartment in a great location.  Just minutes from the Chain Bridge and all the sights. The view was spectacular and there are lots of bars and restaurants close by. Handy after a long day of walking and sightseeing. Andreas and Balint were great hosts who helped us with all our queries, transport and looking after our luggage as we arrived before check in and left after check out.  great value and highly recommended

Amazing views, unique location!!

Couldn't imagine there's a more perfect location to explore this wonderful friendly city. The apartment is fantastic and very comfortable for our family of 5.The views are amazing and the hosts helpful and friendly. Public transport is brilliant and a 24 hour family pass for £10 let's you use trams,trains, boats and buses. I don't think we ever waited more than 2 mins for a connection. It even got us to the airport for 'free' (Metro 3 blue line right to the end stop where a bus 200 E takes you to terminal 2 in 35  mins. Avoid the tourist hop on bus which is expensive (£35 per day for a family)and passes by only every 20 minutes.Every 'tourist place ' we visited was excellent and worth the time spent. One of our favorite city breaks :)
review_summary: The flat is located at the foot of the famous Chain Bridge with a panorama to the Parliament. It has two seperate bedrooms and also a gallery fit for 2 person. Famous venues, restaurants are in walking distance, the Buda Castle is just 5 minutes walk
description:
The flat is located at the foot of the famous Chain Bridge with a panorama to the Parliament. It has two seperate bedrooms and also a gallery fit for 2 person. Famous venues, restaurants are in walking distance, the Buda Castle is just 5 minutes walk

Guests have access for the whole flat

Guests can reach us by phone, email, (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) during their whole stay, regarding any question or wish

The flat has a fantastic panorama for the marvelous Chain Bridge and the famous Parliament, and the River of Danube. Great restaurants next to the flat, on the Buda side as well as on the Pest side. The vital downtown life is just 5 minutes walk, just have to cross the bridge

Bus stop is 2 minutes away from the flat, tram stop is only a minute.

If somebody comes to the Sziget Festival in the summer-by public transportation from the flat- it is only in 20 minutes distance

reviews_text:
The Art House was perfect! It was exactly what we needed. Perfect location, spacious and clean. Luca was also very helpful! Would recommend to everyone!

Luca was very responsive and accommodating. The neighborhood was absolutely perfect for our tourist weekend and felt very safe. The photos on the website are deceiving, but I still think the place was great. I thought that the hosts would be more involved in telling us about things to do in Budapest, but they had a pretty long list of recommendations in a book inside the apartment so that was helpful. Overall this was a fun experience and I would definitely recommend it to others. Just make sure you take warm showers before you get there, because there is no warm water anywhere except the thermal baths across town.

Absolutely perfect for a Budapest-Trip with a few friends.
Great apartment, very well located.
Check-In and Check-Out totally uncomplicated.

Good location but the house not very well equipped as water and tissues
But in conclusion it is good

Great neighbourhood, nice balcony. Quiet appartment in nice building. 
Pity the dishwasher did not work. 

Location is very convenient next to a tram stop and a metro station at the Parliament house which is probably the biggest tourist attraction in Budapest. We had a rental car, and parking garage was located only a couple of blocks away.
Budapest is a beautiful place to visit. The hosts were very accommodating and allowed us to check-in already at noon.
Art House was a good base to explore the sights in Budapest.
Also, a very good restaurant "Hungarian Bistro" was nearby. Please note, table reservation is needed. The place is that busy.
One comment about the apartment: it is located on the third floor and the elevator did not work. For us it was no problem, but for some it could be.

 

Outstanding location: right next to Danube and the beautiful Parliament building. Many restaurants and boat cruises nearby. Chain Bridge, Buda Castle, and St. Stephan's Cathedral are a short walk away. Not too far from the train station either. 2-3k Forints should be sufficient for taxi.

The host is very helpful and accommodating: allowed us to check in early and recommended an excellent restaurant nearby.

One minus was the age of the apartment, but that's expected for the price.

We werent met by Dora or Luca in the end but the colleGue who met us was wonderful.  She told us everything we needed, made sure we had no more questions and that we knew how to contact if there were any problems.  She was there when she said and made us feel welcome.  

Location is fabulous, particularly as its a quieter neighbourhood at night.  Easy to get to the tram right nearby and the underground station.  A market for necessities just on the road.  All in all a fabulous visit!

Spacious apartment situated in a beautiful location with a great view of the Danube river on the balcony - the apartment was 2 minutes walk from parliament building. Local supermarkets and restaurants are a short walk away and close access to the bus, tram and metro stations. Dora and her friend made us feel very welcome and were available for any questions throughout our stay. 

This is a beautiful, huge flat located round the corner from the Houses of Parliament. The balcony extends the length of the flat and is actually a lot larger than the photo showed. There is a view of the Danube from the balcony!  I intend to come back.
Dora always got back to me immediately when I had any queries.
review_summary: Our apartment is located in the heart of Budapest. Terrace and windows look directly to the Danube and the Parlament's beautiful garden. Few minutes walk from the Basilic, Chain Bridge, Buda Castle and the world famous ruin pubs.
description:
Our apartment is located in the heart of Budapest. Terrace and windows look directly to the Danube and the Parlament's beautiful garden. Few minutes walk from the Basilic, Chain Bridge, Buda Castle and the world famous ruin pubs.

This is our second and our favorite airbnb house. The kitchen is very equipped, the living room is spacious. Our paintings are made by a hungarian artist, who is a really good friend of mine. 

balcony with a view
82nm2
big windows, sunny rooms
well equipped kitchen (dishwasher, cooker, oven, toaster,fridge, vent hood, shaker, plates (for 12 person) , glasses, wine glasses, dishes..
unlimited Wifi

You can contact me anytime: phone, mail, viber, messages. We are running bars, and restaurants in the 5th and 7th district, so I can show u the really insider sites of budapest: best breakfast in town, outdoor, indoor facilities, exhibitions, bars, ruin pubs, restaurants, and clubs as well.

The public transport from the apartment is very good , you can go anywhere easily. The metro station is just in the corner.

reviews_text:
I stayed for a month at Krisztina's apartment and highly recommend any guest to consider a stay here. The location is the best, it is in the center of Budapest very close to the Basilica, Chain Bridge and the Shopping district. Transportation is super easy to reach as well if needed but almost all the must see sites and locations are easily walkable. There is a supermarket directly across the street which was very convenient.

The flat is large and true to the pictures. There is a an elevator in the building and the building itself is quiet, set back from the main road so it was not noisy for me. It is an old classical Budapest building and apartment that has good heating, air conditioning, hot water and a gas stove.  I did not use the pull out sofa bed, the full sized bed in the bedroom was comfortable.

Check-in was easy and so was coordinating with Krisztina. She had me checked-in on time when I arrived to the apartments and always responded in a timely fashion.
availability: 3 nights minimum stay.From Dec 16, 2016 - Jan 04, 2017 the minimum stay is 5 nights.
review_summary: My place is close to Széchenyi Lánchíd. You’ll love my place because of the coziness. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
description: My place is close to Széchenyi Lánchíd. You’ll love my place because of the coziness. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

reviews_text:
Spent a weekend with a friend at Edit's beautiful appartment in Budapest. The appartment looked exactly like pictured and had everything we needed for a comfortable stay. The appartment isn't exactly located in the city centre but it is only two stops away by the underground. Perfect for a weekend of sightseeing in Budapest!
We also used the airport pick-up which was just perfect. We were even picked up at 4.30 in the morning on our last day to get to the airport. We loved our stay at this appartment. Thank you!

Beautiful apartment! Would highly recommend the transfer to and from the airport, was so handy! 
Budapest was the prettiest city we had been to and going back to this apartment was just the cherry on top :) cannot give enough praise! 


I didn't have any problems with the host, he's very nice and if you need something he's there at the moment. The apartment is really nice and confortable.

A very lovely flat !  It's not in the center of Budapest, but the flat has a good location to visit the Fishermen’s Bastion and the buda castle.  The tramway and metro station are pretty close so you can easily visit all Budapest. 

What a fabulous apartment in Budapest. My boyfriend and I loved our stay and found the apartment perfect for our three nights in Budapest. It is exactly as described in the advert and more. Clean, spacious and modern with a cosy feel. Great access to the city and a walk to Buda Castle. We would definitely recommend this apartment to anyone visiting the city. 

Edit was an extremely helpful host in the lead up to my arrival, but she gave me all the information I needed beforehand too. The apartment and room is exactly like on the pictures. The room is big with also big windows (enough light coming in). The wifi was great in the flat. The shower was great with a rainshower and good hot water. The location of the apartment was also great. The late check-in and check out organised with no issues. The apartment is stylish, homely, and generally beautiful. I have stayed in several places I would rate 5/5 through Air BnB, but the quality of Edits' apartment, and the effort she puts into making the Budapest experience unforgettable, make Edit the standard against which other hosts should be judged. 
Truly an amazing experience that I would recommend without hesitation.

Overall I felt home in this apartment and its a great place to start your day from this location!

This accommodation was wonderful; we we're able to arrange a private pick- up from the airport, and the apartment was beautiful and spotless. Great location in the heart of Buda. Great service all around, would definitely recommend.

Edit is an amazing and friendly host. So helpful, shared some great tips with us about visiting the city. Responds to all texts and messages immediately. The apartment is modern and nicely maintained, exactly as you see in the pictures, beautiful, nicely decorated and had very good mattress in the bedroom. Great location in Budapest, easy to walk around or use public transportation. The apartment has all the commodities and is extremely clean. Bed was fine, kitchen had all we needed, we can only recommend the place! Thanks! I would recommend this apartment to anybody.

Good service:-)
Everything was fine

The hause is clean and comfortable. We felt like we are in our own hause. It is close to city centre. The owner of the hause is so hospitable. We enjoyed and had a great time. You can find everything that you need in the hause. Thanks to Edit for everything. See you later!
review_summary:
Maros Apartment is a brand new apartment located in the heart of Buda, between Szell Kalman Square and Deli Railway Station, right at Buda Castle.
FREE high speed internet is inside the apartment.
Airport transfer is available.
description:
Maros Apartment is a brand new apartment located in the heart of Buda, between Szell Kalman Square and Deli Railway Station, right at Buda Castle.

FREE high speed internet is inside the apartment.

Airport transfer is available.

Maros Apartment is a brand new 1st floor apartment located in the heart of Buda, right between Szell Kalman Square and Deli Railway Station. 

Szell Kalman Square is just a few minutes away, and from there you can easily reach the Pest side with underground.

Buda Castle is also just a few minutes away from the apartment, so you can simply and quickly reach the most important tourist attraction points in Buda, like: Fisherman's Bastion, Matthias Church, Sandor Palace , Citadella, Liberty Statue.

The apartment offers a unique first class convenience to its visitors. Every piece of furniture and all accessories are represents the highest quality.

Airport transfer (extra cost) is available anytime.

My colleague is handing over the apartment to my guests personally who's job is to make your stay comfortable here. My guests can call and email my colleague anytime.

The apartment offers:

- TV with international channels

- Free high speed internet inside the apartment

- Clean bed sheets and towels 

- Fully equipped kitchen

- Tea preparing facilities 

- Coffee machine with free coffee capsules

- Equipment for the convenient stay - hair dryer, water heater, cutlery, microwave oven...ect

- You will get a bottle of one of my favourite Hungarian wine as a present

- Airport transfer is available anytime (extra cost)

My colleague is handing over the apartment to my guests personally who's job is to make your stay comfortable here. My guests can call and contact my colleague anytime.

Easily and quickly reachable from the apartment:

Szell Kalman Square, Deli Railway Station, Buda Castle, Fisherman's Bastion, Matthias Church, Sandor Palace , Citadella, Liberty Statue

Maros Apartment is a brand new apartment located in the heart of Buda, right between Szell Kalman Square and Deli Railway Station. 

Szell Kalman Square is just a few minutes away, and from there you can easily reach the Pest side with underground.

reviews_text:
Lovely apartment! Perfect for a group of 4. Nice and spacious with a beautiful view. The place was clean and tidy. Buda is the quieter part of Budapest so it was nice and chilled and not far from pest! 

Had an amazing stay in Piroska's apartment. It was even better than the pictures. Perfect facilities and location for a great time in Budapest. The picture of the view does not do it justice as it's breathtaking. She is an amazing host who is very accommodating and helpful. Would recommend and stay again should I come back! 

We had a fantastic time in Budapest. The apartment has the most amazing view! It was clean and very comfortable. We felt at home in Piroska's place. She was very easy to communicate with. The location of the apartment is in walking distance to many great sites. I highly recommend staying here! 

Piroska house very good
Location and view very nice

We had a wonderful time in Piroska's flat ! It was clean, very spacious, with coffee, tea, beverages etc... And the view....... !!!

The building is 100m from the metro/bus/tram station. 100m from a market, 100m from everything ! 

Piroska helped us with check in and informations about the city, we would definitely come back in the future or suggest to friends !

Piroska made our stay in Budapest absolutely fantastic. She was extremely responsive and made the whole process very easy. She was very accomodating and let us check in slightly early, and gave us a very handy list of everything we could possibly need during our stay. Her flat is HUGE and spacious and bright and with an absolutely stunning view. The location is fantastic for exploring the Castle District and Buda side. It is a bit of a walk to the Chain Bridge, but you can be on the Pest side in minutes via the metro. The apartment was clean and well equipped, the bed was comfy and the bathroom clean and spacious (and an AMAZING shower). One of our best Airbnb experiences to date!

We had a very nice stay. Great appartment

Gorgeous apartment located 5 mins walk (in heels!) from an M2 underground station. This means that you can easily the Latin quarter and main sights within an easy 15 minute journey.  

The view from the apartment is fantastic by day and by night and the balcony is perfect for enjoying breakfast or a glass of wine before heading out to town. 

The apartment is big for 2  people and the bedroom is located at the back of the apartment so you don't hear any road noise. The kitchen is really well equipped although to be honest we ate out every night!

Piroska was really good at communicating with us in advance of our trip and during. She provided fantastic travel tips and suggested good restaurants. 

We would definitely recommend this to anyone! You will not be disappointed. 

We had our journey to Budapest from 27.10 to 3.11.
The flat was big and comfortable. 
It has an amazing view on parliament, Danube river and bridges.
The bed and sofa are very comfortable to sleep.
The flat has all important conveniences.
It also has a perfect geographic position next to Batthyany square where are the metro and tram stations. 
On this square is also SPAR market and Italian restaurant.
Very good food and people.
Pasta with salmon is awesome. 
Thank you very much. We had a great trip.

Piroska,köszönöm szépen!

Piroska is the perfect host.  She provides all the nice little - and big - touches that make your stay so special; and she truly cares that you are happy and having a great time.  Her apartment is beautiful: so clean and well-furnished and decorated, and the view is amazing - you can easily sit and watch the river for hours.  This is a fantastic place to stay in Budapest.  Thank you Piroska.
review_summary: Welcome to our 70 sqm premium quality apartment with breathtaking views of the Danube, Parliament and Buda Castle. This fully equipped condo is ideal for 2 or 3, possibly for 4 people, in the heart of Budapest with excellent public transportation. 24 hour check-in!
house_rules:
Smoking only on the front balcony please!
Please do not leve the apartment with a working aircondition!
description:
Welcome to our 70 sqm premium quality apartment with breathtaking views of the Danube, Parliament and Buda Castle. This fully equipped condo is ideal for 2 or 3, possibly for 4 people, in the heart of Budapest with excellent public transportation. 24 hour check-in!

The condo is equipped:

Aircondition
Tv
Strong wifi
Music
Washing machine
Dishwasher
Kitchen stuff
Nespresso coffee machine
Water cleaner 
Hair dryer
Hair iron
Iron

The condo is equipped:

Aircondition
Tv
Strong wifi
Music
Washing machine
Dishwasher
Kitchen stuff
Nespresso coffee machine
Water cleaner 
Hair dryer
Hair iron
Iron

The garbage chute is on every half level of the house.

Please ask for flexible arrival/departure times if you need! Every single information arrives to you in email after the booking!

The magical atmosphere of the Danube bank with all the life is mesmerizing! It's nice to have a glass of wine on the balcony with one most beautiful city sights. A walk along the Danube and over the Chain bridge can be truly romantic while getting lost in the downtown street nightlife is just so much fun. Perfect place to have a nice stay for couples, world citizens, urban hippies, business maniacs. Welcome people:)

Closest metro station is just 150 metres away, at Batthyány square. Also several tram and bus lines stop here. If you come by car, the parking is not free on the streets.

reviews_text:
Lovely apartment. Bernadett was really helpful and waited for us even we had some delay. Apologies once again for making you wait. The apartment was really cosy and clean, perfect to spend a night!

Bernadett is very kind, perfect and quick communication. Her apartment is very lovely and modern, although a little bit small in the heart on Budapest :) 2nd floor - do not expect the elevator. Perfect location for public transport for your sightseeing tours. Also a big part of "must see" is in a walking distance. Great area for nightlife (don´t be surprised when you here the music at 2 a.m. during the weekend, the real party has just started :) :) ). At this place (area) you will definitely feel the "touch of the Budapest everyday life" :)

Great location..right in the same street as some of the best Ruin Bars in Budapest. Bernadett is a great host, very helpful....the apartment, clean and tidy....only comment don't stand up quickly when getting out of bed, the roof a little low!

Cozy apartment with perfect location. Book it without any doubt! Many thanks, Bernadett, for letting us to stay and check out a little later. 

Great location, beautiful apartment! Highly recommended. Loved it there!


I stayed in Bernadette's apartment for 8 nights and found it great value for money. The place is spotless and right in the middle of everything. Everywhere was walking distance from here.

I also arrived very late (1am) and Bernadette was there to give me the keys and provide information. I would rent the apartment again if I return to Budapest.

Bernadett was very nice with us, she ordered a transfer from the airport ! The appartment was just like the pictures, it's very central in the neighbourhood, there is everything next to it, metro, bars, malls..
Thank you :)

Nice, clean and well located apartment. 
I definitely recommend it for your stay!

Pefect location (bars.restaurants,metro and bus stations).Very nice room for two persons. pick it without hesitation!

The apartment is in a very good location, very close to the nice pubs and restaurants. It's a newly done up place so everything is good, clean and functional. Just a word of caution : it's in an old building with no elevator - not a problem but carrying up two huge suitcases can be painful. Other than that Bernadette is a great host and easy to communicate with. Highly recommended!
review_summary: Our brand new, fully-equipped flat of high standards welcome You! My flat is (31sqaremeter) located in the centre, 5 minutes walk from the busy transport access spot of Blaha Lujza square. Despite the nearness of the popular and busy central life, our apartments can ensure a calm and peaceful stay for you. It’s the perfect starting point to discover the sights of Budapest. Several restaurants, pubs, ruin bars on our street, and nearby. Free wifi, air-condition, kitchen, washing machine.
description:
Our brand new, fully-equipped flat of high standards welcome You! My flat is (31sqaremeter) located in the centre, 5 minutes walk from the busy transport access spot of Blaha Lujza square. Despite the nearness of the popular and busy central life, our apartments can ensure a calm and peaceful stay for you. It’s the perfect starting point to discover the sights of Budapest. Several restaurants, pubs, ruin bars on our street, and nearby. Free wifi, air-condition, kitchen, washing machine.

The apartment is supplied with towels, bedsheets. The apartment consists of a separate dining area and a fully-equipped kitchen (owen, microwave, fridge) including washing machine. The bedroom is on the gallery, with a double frenchbed. The livingroom has a pull- out couch for two and a flatscreen TV. Free wifi, air condition.

The Hungarian National Opera House is 900 m, The Synagogue of Dohány street is 800 m, The gorgeous Andrássy street is 1,4 km from our apartment. The Heroes’Square, Museum of FineArts, The Parliament and St István Basilica are also close. Keleti Railway station is 1,2 km, Budapest Liszt Ferenc Airport is 1,9 km.

The Akácfa City Apartment is 5 minutes walk from the busy transport access spot of Blaha Lujza square. 
Airport shuttle - 25euro/4persons in a car, with personalized welcome sign with your name on it, in the taxi driver’s hand in the terminal.

We are situated in a historical building,  on the 2nd floor. Please, be so kind and let us know what time you will arrive, as we do not have a 24h reception service.

reviews_text:
70ies brickhouse, 4th floor, no elevator. Communication was solely via email, we've got a code for entry. Worked very smooth, even without personal touch. Sparkling wine awaited us in the fridge. Place is romantic, well for a couple, too small for more than 2, I guess. The district is a small sleeping hill, well for couples seeking privacy. Parking is easy, but you pay between 8-18 weekdays (blue vending machines on street). Equipment is great, we loved the music boxes and candle light.

Silence place with great view of castles,and like in the forest.Communication is smooth with the owner.Can go to any tourists attractions easily. 

It's a really nice apartment, and can walk to all the scenery spot. And night view of the castle is amazing, you can see the castle when you lie on the bed.
The host also quite nice, and can reply all the questions you have. 

The Apartment was equipped as decribed. Very nice view to Buda castle. Public Transportation Bus and/or Tram 300 - 400 m away.  Apartment fully equipped with everything a Traveller (also Business Traveller) needs. 
Cooled Bottle of Champagne in the Fridge. 
We'll defenitely come back.

This apartment is really convenient and practically furnished. The view from the window and balcony is breath taking especially at night. The Buda Castle and the Old City are in a walking distance.
