Besides there are bus stops just a few steps from the house so you can easily go to the city centre. Andrea is very nice helpful and communicative person! We were welcomed with a bottle of champagne which was very nice and surprising. We recommend this place! 

EVERYTHING WENT SMOOTH 
CHECK IN CHECK OUT WERE HASSLE FREE  

We really enjoyed our stay. Andrea's place is beautiful and the views are stunning. The apartment is fully equipped and very clean. Highly recommended!

Just got back from an amazing stay at Andrea's apartment. We can't say how much we enjoyed our stay and how perfect the apartment was! The little touches like a lovely bottle of fizz and chilled glasses in the fridge, not to mention the amazing views from the balcony. It was spotlessly clean and had everything we needed, and had everything on our doorstep. Thank you! Love Laura and James x

Our stay was great! The apartment is beautiful and well located. Definitely recommend it to others. Thanks, Andrea.

A cozy, welcoming flat on the Buda side of Budapest but close enough to the bridge to the Pest side. Wonderful view from the balcony, lovely neighborhood. Andrea is responsive and accommodating to all needs and wishes. If you don't mind the 4th floor stairs climbing (which we didn't) you'd greatly enjoy your stay here.
availability: 2 nights minimum stay.From Dec 20, 2016 - Jan 03, 2017 the minimum stay is 5 nights.
review_summary:
My place is close to the famous Buda Castle right along the Danube corso. Citadella and the breathtaking Chain-bridge, Castle garden bazaar, Rudas bath, Gellért bath, the city center is just 2 km away. You will enjoy my place because of the exceptional view of the Castle and the cosy and quiet ambiance with freshly redecorated interior. 

My place is ideal for couples, but also perfect for single adventurers, and business travelers.
house_rules: You can smoke on the balkony.
description:
My place is close to the famous Buda Castle right along the Danube corso. Citadella and the breathtaking Chain-bridge, Castle garden bazaar, Rudas bath, Gellért bath, the city center is just 2 km away. You will enjoy my place because of the exceptional view of the Castle and the cosy and quiet ambiance with freshly redecorated interior. 

My place is ideal for couples, but also perfect for single adventurers, and business travelers.

If you need any help during your stay I am more than happy to assist you.

You need just one bus line to get the center and the most important sights!
This is the bus 105, the closest stop just 300m from the flat.

We have ergonomic mattress, will not pain in your back!

FACILITIES: bed linen and towels, WIFI, coffee machine, fridge and cooking facilities, hair-dryer, wash machine

GOOD TO KNOW:
The apartment is on the third floor, no elevator!
Check-in after 2 pm., check-out before 11 am.
Please no smoking inside!

HELP US TO SAVE ENERGY - THINK GREEN!
Always turn off all lights when you leave the apartment or when they are not needed, and please always shut down during unoccupied times the heating, ventilating, and air conditioning (HVAC) equipment!
Thank you!

reviews_text:
A great cozy two bed room apartment in a superb location ... close to great restaurants, walking distance from most major attractions 

The apartment is beautiful in a charming old building. Extremely quiet despite being very central. 

Fabulous little flat, well designed and perfect for a visit to the city. Would definitely recommend! 

We've had a lovely stay at Vitalis' appartment. It was very clean. All basic needs were present. What we really loved was that his place was near the state opera and 10 min walk from the city centre (vorosmart ter). We only had to walk a few minutes to get to the nearest metro. In the neighbourhood you have a couple of good restaurants and down the street you got a some cafés. It made Budapest a wonderful experience.

Greetz from Emmanuel and Sanne (Belgium)

Very nice place to stay with family. Clean, wonderful location, spacious flat. My family really enjoyed staying at Vitalis'.

Vitalis was the perfect host even though we never actually met. He reacts to AirBnB-Messages within seconds and provided all the necessary information for check-in and check-out at exactly the time needed. He was flexible before our stay (I had a changing request which prompted a simple "no problem") and made sure all was well during our stay.
The appartment is cozy, well equipped and clean. There's a fully equipped kitchen which we did not use (too many good restaurants around the corner). Even though it is marketed as one bed room, there is some degree of privacy between the two double beds (no sight contact, second bed in a kind of small attic a few steps up the stairs).
The location is pretty much perfect, close to public transportation, restaurants and small shops.
Extra points for the super beautiful and original (though sadly unrestored) 1900s or 1890s courtyard in the building!

Wonderful place in a great location. Perfect for couples- highly recommended. 

Vitalis was an excellent host from start to finish. He welcomed us into the apartment and provided all the necessary instructions and recommendations to make our stay pleasant and stress-free. The convenient location made it easy to get to all the city's main attractions. Would stay again!

The place was perfect and as described. Location is great and central to everything. Vitalis provided detailed instructions and checked in with us throughout the stay. Had a wonderful time in Budapest and highly recommend this bnb, you won't regret it!!

Everything was wonderful! The apartment was spectacular and very comfortable. It's also within walking distance to everything! I would definitely stay there again. Vitalis was very nice and accommodating.

Vitalis was most accommodating and his communication, right from the word go, was excellent. When we needed advice he was more than happy to guide and recommend. The apartment is warm, welcoming and has everything one needs for a city break, including heating/ AC, coffee machine, hairdryer, iron, tv and radio. 
There are guide books/ maps and on the 2 blackboards there are some top tips for places to visit, as well as bars and restaurants. Along with this there is also a visitors book, where previous guests pop their top tips in too. No need to take towels if you're NOt planning on visiting one of the spars( we used ours for the spars) as they also proved towels etc. 
It's in a fantastic location as you are right in the heart of Pest, within a 5 minute walk of some excellent night life, with the opera house less than 2 minutes away. The Opera house is on Andrassy Ut, which happens to be where all the tour buses stop too. So you really couldn't be in a better spot, and although your on the doorstep to some main attractions, it's really quiet in the apartment, so you can sleep well too. Kerching!!!
This w our first Air b&b experience, and boy we was super impressed, and cannot thank our host enough
availability: The minimum night stay for this listing varies.
review_summary: Relax in our recently designed apartment in the heart of the city. Freshly renovated and equipped. 2min walk from the Opera House and just few steps to Andrássy út the historic and beautiful boulvard of Budapest. Everything is within easy reach.
house_rules:
Be a good ambassador of your country. :)

 Due to the fact that the building is purely residential, guests are expected to respect at all times the peace and privacy of the neighbors.

Principal Rules:

1) Strictly a non-smoking apartment, however there is a covered walkway outside the door where guests can smoke.
2) No pets allowed 
3) We have zero tolerance disturbance policy, so please do not disturb the residents of the building and avoid any noisy behavior after 9:00 pm and before 9:00 AM. We reserve the right to abort the service without refund if any established complain arrives to us from the neighbours. 
4) Guests are not permitted to allow other people into the apartment
5) Any property damage shall be paid in full 
6) I really hope that you enjoy your stay and please let me know if anything is missing or if you have any question. I kindly ask you to use everything in the apartment as it would be yours or as you would expect others using your place and stuff, many thanks.
description:
Relax in our recently designed apartment in the heart of the city. Freshly renovated and equipped. 2min walk from the Opera House and just few steps to Andrássy út the historic and beautiful boulvard of Budapest. Everything is within easy reach.

You can easily reach all the sightseeings from the apartment and in the meantime you are in the artistic center, the coolest and most searched for area in Budapest. You can easily find everything here: cafés, reastaurants, bars (even the famous ruined pubs), museums, currency exchange points, thermal baths, shopping mall, metro line, tram line. Opera House, Deak square and St. Stephen Cathedral just few minutes walk from the apartment.

Everything.

Arrange everything in advance, then I step back and stay available for them.

Modern Gym, All you can eat breakfast bar (8 eur)
and Garage: 20 M
This is a newly renovated apartment. Despite it is completely central location the apartment is very peaceful and quiet because it is in the back of the building so you don’t hear anything from the street noise. Deep sleep is garantied after the busy discovering.
Ruin pubs: 0-15 minutes walk 
Andrássy Avenue: 170 m 
Liszt Ferenc Square: 300 m 
Váci utca: 4 stops by M1 subway line 
Budapest's Antique Row. at Falk Miksa street 2 stops by tram 
Wamp Design Market: Erzsébet tér 3 stops by M1 subway line 
Jewish quarter: 10 minutes walk 
City Park: 4 stops by M1 subway line 
Budapest Zoo: 4 stops by M1 subway line 
Király Street: 250 meters 
Heroe’s Square: 4 stops by M1 subway line

Art & culture 
Budapest Opera House 170 m
Academy of Music.270 m 
Westend Cinema 1 stop by tram 
Mai Manó House of Photography: 250 m 
House of Terror: 600 m 
Museum of Fine Arts: 4 stops by M1 subway line 
Radnóti Miklós theater350 m 
Madách Theater 500 m

Food and drink 
Lots of restaurants around 
Coffee Bar: 30 m 
All you can eat breakfast bar (8 eur): 20 m
Hunyadi tér - food market: 650 m 
Supermarkets 100 m 
Westend shopping center 1 stop by tram

Other services: 
Laundry 150 m 
Banks 100 m 
Pharmacy 240 m

Tram lines (4 and 6): 180 m 
M1 Metro line: 160 m 
Buses 120 m
Rent a bike stations 130 m 
Sightseeing tours bus stops: 120 m 
Nyugati railway terminal: 300 m

5 minutes walk from Nyugati station and 8 minutes from Arany János street and Deák square metro stations.

reviews_text:
The apartment was a gem; clean, modern, functional, airy and stylish. The bicycles were great, we only had a day so we were able to zoom round the city on the many dedicated cycle tracks. There was safe parking nearby. We were right next to the Gellert baths, which looked amazing and we wish we had had more time to visit. The stairs were fine for us...wide with plenty of places to stop for breath. Thank you Gabor and Kata for a fantastic couple of days in Budapest.

What a wonderful place Gabor has to stay in.  He met us as we were walking up to the street from the metro. He was very nice and quick to respond to any questions about getting around town. We also liked the fact that he let us use the bikes to get around on.

Gabor's flat is very pretty and clean, you can find everything you need. It is located in a perfect position to visit Budapest, I reccomend it, if I will come back to Budapest I will surely contact him!

Gabors place is beautifull and well situated. I would recommend his appartment to everyone whos in the search of an well equipped cosy place.

Definitely one of the best airbnb's places I've ever been. The flat is great, clean, well located and beautiful. Gábor and Kata are the perfect hosts. They helped us so much that I don't have words to thank them. No doubt that I'll stay here again in my future visit to Budapest.

Although I never met Gabor, his wife was at the property to greet me. Everything was correct and as advertised. The apartment was clean and decorated with taste and great care. The endless stairs made for perfect exercise, coming and going. A great way to work off the delicious and abundant Hungarian food. The location was close to everything. All in all, a great choice. I would love return to this place and would recommend it without hesitation.

Gabor was waiting outside of his property upon my arrival and made sure I was comfortable and well-acquainted both with his property and the area around it. The apartment was very clean and, for being a bit small, really utilized its space well. I expect to get back to Budapest in the near future and hope to stay here again.

We can warmly recommend to rent this apartment. The pictures are not lying and it was cleaned up nicely. It was also really cozy and neighbourhood was quiet and on nice location just next to Gellert's spa. Two bikes were also included to the rent which we found a nice way to explore the city. The host was friendly and helpful. We could also see that he had also put a lot of effort to make our staying in their apartment comfortable.

It was a pleasure to once again spend some time in Kata & Gabor´s apartment! This is the second time I have stayed at the Minilux apartment and it will sure be more times. 
The apartment is clean, cosy, has cable TV, a bike you can borrow, a nice comfortable big bed and kitchen with all the stuff you'll need (and also very nice hosts!). It is nice to spend time there and relax.
I highly recommend this apartment, you will not be disappointed!

Thanks to Gabor for a great week in Budapest. He is really a great host and always ready to help. 
Apartment is super nice and comfortable. It is close to everything thanks to great location. All the description is 100% true. I've got everything i had planed.
review_summary: If you are looking for a huge flat in the middle of the downtown, then we are not your choice. But if you are satisfied with a small rooftop full of good energies situated ont he (really) best place of the town, then you found Us: Kata and Gabor
description: If you are looking for a huge flat in the middle of the downtown, then we are not your choice. But if you are satisfied with a small rooftop full of good energies situated ont he (really) best place of the town, then you found Us: Kata and Gabor

reviews_text: Great for a city trip or base to check out Hungary. Really worth the money, apartment was perfect!
availability: On Fridays and Saturdays the minimum stay is 2 nights.
review_summary: Apartment is located inside the heart of the city, just a step away from the party district. There are 3 metro lines juts about 50 meters far, several bus and tramway is near. The airport is approachable with one transfer by public transport. Most monuments available by walk or with a short trip by public transport. Several ruin pubs and nightclub are near. A lot of street food and fine dining restaurants are just a step away. The Christmas market takes place in front of the apartment
description: Apartment is located inside the heart of the city, just a step away from the party district. There are 3 metro lines juts about 50 meters far, several bus and tramway is near. The airport is approachable with one transfer by public transport. Most monuments available by walk or with a short trip by public transport. Several ruin pubs and nightclub are near. A lot of street food and fine dining restaurants are just a step away. The Christmas market takes place in front of the apartment

reviews_text:
We had a great stay at Nora's place. It is a really cute apartment with a very nice host. She was on time and helpful. The place is in a good neighbourhood, near the inner city with easy access to public transportation.

Nice secluded 1 bedroom apartment. Felt like a safe neighborhood. Just outside of the inner city but not too far to walk. Felt spacious despite its smaller size.

My friend and I had a beautiful stay at Nora's place. She was on time and helped us finding the house. There's easy access to the city centre and it is perfect for someone who wants to discover Budapest. Highly recommended!

The host is amazing, she managed to get us some transport from the airport and was always avaiable for everything we needed!
The place is small but comfortable and we had a great stay!

Jól éreztem magam, elégedett voltam a lakással, másnak is jó szívvel ajánlanám. Központi, az Oktogon pár perces sétával elérhető, de ugyanakkor csendes és nyugodt.
availability: On Fridays and Saturdays the minimum stay is 2 nights.
review_summary: A cute apartment near Andrassy (Kodaly korond) and the central circle of Budapest. First floor and bright. There are 2 bedroom areas but still it´s a studio flat without any doors inside. The public transport is in walking distance (4 mins) to many tourist attractions. Railway stations and spas can be reached in 15-20 minutes. Oktogon, Hero´s square, Ecocafe, Potkulcs, Millenium Restaurant, Chez Daniel Restaurant is walking distance.
description:
A cute apartment near Andrassy (Kodaly korond) and the central circle of Budapest. First floor and bright. There are 2 bedroom areas but still it´s a studio flat without any doors inside. The public transport is in walking distance (4 mins) to many tourist attractions. Railway stations and spas can be reached in 15-20 minutes. Oktogon, Hero´s square, Ecocafe, Potkulcs, Millenium Restaurant, Chez Daniel Restaurant is walking distance.

This is really close to Kodály Körönd station, reachable by bus 105, and Kodály Körönd station by Millennium metro (1).

reviews_text:
Istvan was super helpful, always asnwered to our questions accurately. The flat is in a supersafe area,there is a Micheline star restaurant in the area, buses, trams and metro nearby. You can feel that you are in Buda :) The flat was very clean, had a lovely coffee machine,utensils, plates. We had a great stay there specially  at Christmas time. Thank you very much for having us again :):) 

Very nice apartment. We stayed there for three nights and all was well. The communication with Ildikó and her friend Steven ran all smoothy via Email and (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN). Even though we arrived very late they managed to leave the keys in a save place so we could pick them up and get in without any trouble. 

3 of us spent 5 nights in this place and it was a great place to come home and relax in! It was in a quiet neighborhood but the bus stop was near by and it didn't take too long to get to the city center! We did do a bit of cooking in the house and found it a bit difficult as it was a quite small kitchen with few pots, tools, etc. 
The house is cute and has a few quirks, as most do but still a great little place! The Wifi was good and we liked the cafe across the street. 

I stayed at Ildika's apartment along with my husband and two kids and concidering that this was our first time experiencing AIRBNB we are more than happy. The pictures of the apartment are true to their word, it is well furnished (we ourselves didn't do any cooking so I'm not certain about the kitchen equipment). The place was clean, warm and although somewhat small, the place was very well organised. The kids absolutely loved the bed - gallery. We truly felt as at home. Although it's not in the centre of the city, public transport took us with speed and ease. Nearby, aproximetly 5 min walk, there is a bus and trollycar station hence we didn't have to go by our car at all. The neighborhood is tranquil and we felt safe. Communicating with the host was excellent, when we called to say we arrived earlier than planned they offered to let us into the apartment before the original time and we were very greatful for that. Also nearby, as was stated, there are free parking spaces so we parked our car there. Over the weekend (when parking is free) we had our car right in front of the building. All in all it was a great experience, we hope to visit again come springtime.

The flat is nice and cozy in a nice, quiet, family friendly area. Everything you might need during your stay is provided. A dodgy wall socket and a flimsy kitchen tap where the only two things that needed to be fixed, and the flat could use some extra cutlery and a decent kitchen knife, however that's just being picky, otherwise the flat is fantastic! Enjoyed our stay and looking forward to coming back to Budapest once again!

Wonderful flat in a very calm location. Public transport is nearby, just 5 mins of walking.

I had very good time at ildiko's apartment.
Very confortable and clean

We had a great time at Ildiko´s apartment. It is really a lovely place for couples or a families with one child. It took us a 20 minutes walk to get to the city center, which was totally fine for us.

We really enjoyed our stay at the small studio! It was cozy and well decorated. Quite limited kitchen supplies (no cooking knives and chopping board...) but other than that it was very comfortable staying there. Both the sofa bed and mezzanine bed were comfortable. Parking can be a bit tricky as there is a limited free parking space but parking is free at night and also it's not that expensive so no problem there. 

Very nice apartment in a nice area (not the central one, but very quiet residental area with a good cafe across the street). Good communication with hosts. The bed is actually a platform, so there is not too much space above the head. However, very good overall experience.
review_summary:
20 minutes from the city centre by bus!
Free parking on every day of the week is available 200m from the flat.

This lovely flat is in one of the greenest neighborhoods of Budapest.

We lived here for many years, with my husband and son, but as we moved to France, it is available for you:)

I guarantee you will feel the warmth of home, everytime you step inside the aparment.
house_rules:
- The earliest check-in time we can manage is 14:00 (2 pm), and the latest check-out time is 11:00 (am).
- Smoking is only possible outside, in the private garden.
- Please don't make too much noise after 10 PM, this is a residential area, with friendly people, be one yourself:)
description:
20 minutes from the city centre by bus!
Free parking on every day of the week is available 200m from the flat.

This lovely flat is in one of the greenest neighborhoods of Budapest.

We lived here for many years, with my husband and son, but as we moved to France, it is available for you:)

I guarantee you will feel the warmth of home, everytime you step inside the aparment.

This is not just another aparment, this flat will be your home for your stay.
It is well equipped with everything you'll need, and you'll feel like home, everytime you step inside.

We provide:
- Clean bedsheets
-Towels
-Comfortable pillows, and blankets
-Loving atmospehere

In the kitchen you'll find:
-Microwave oven
-Fridge
-Oven
-Dishwasher
-Coffe machine (with coffee provided)
-Plates & bowls
-Cutlery
-Kitchen cloth
-Glasses, mugs, cups

In the Bathroom you will find:
-Shower gel
-Shampoo
-Hairdryer
-Toilet paper
-Cleaning chemicals (just in case)

In the living room there is:
-An extendable sofa
-A coffee table
-TV
-Electric guitar
-Amplifier (for the guitar of course)
-Working desk with PC

You won't regret booking my place, I guarantee:)

You have access to the whole flat, as well as to the garden.

You can get in touch with Steven on the provided phone number, or here on Airbnb.

This flat is a family home, not just an apartment.
We lived here in great happiness for many years, and I hope you'll be just as happy with it, as we were.

Please let us know about your check in and check out times as soon as possible, this is neccesary to manage youor arrival and departure smoothly.

reviews_text:
Great place to stay during the holiday season, perfect location and the hosts were super responsive to questions. 

Despite of a technical problem with the communication through Airbnb, Andi tried her best to give me clear instructions of how to check in over the phone.
Thanks again, Andi!

The Apt was very central and is just a few minutes by foot to the Chain Bridge. Metro Station Vörösmarty ter is just few steps away while Deák Ferenc tér (which is the only transfer station) is also right in the corner.


Very cozy and interesting place and was perfect for me travelling alone. I really felt compfortable.
Definitely recommend it! :)

Perfect place, perfect location.

Andi and Anett where unable to be there to check us in however she sent clear instructions and photos of how to get into the apartment. The location is fantastic right in the middle of the square with just a short walk to everything and the apartment was very clean. The only thing that let it down were the pillows were scatter cushions with a sheet over it. But other than that great little apartment for a few days away. 

The apartment is really cozy and little, exactly how it looks at the pictures. It is in an excellent location, near the main attractions, metro, restaurants and stores. We would return for sure, even though the elevator was broken and at night there are some homeless people sleeping near the door. Andi was very nice with us, sending all the information before and answering our questions in time.

The location of this apartmant is unbelievable. Everything is so close! Highly recommend for everone who would like to enjoy a vacation in a nice small apartment in the most beautiful city I have ever been to. 
Just one thing. The apartment has a rather steep staircase leading to it. So people with limited ability to move may have problems getting up.

The apartment is in a great location especially for exploring the buda side, there are heaps of nice food places around too. The apartment is cozy and well equipped and a really nice space to relax after exploring all day 

Andi and Anett was fantastic and helpful. For me it's the best location in Budapest, very well situated for visiting, shopping, night life .. I was there with my son for two weeks and we had a very nice holidays. 

The apartment was Perfect!! We stayed in Budapest three nights and loved it all the time. The flat is great located and it is near to everything in  the centre. Walk distance to great restaurants, shopping streets, grocery stores, tourist attractions and Donau! Andi was a great host and answered all our questions quickly! She met us to give us the key and showed us the apartment and told us what we needed to know! Wonderful!

We really enjoyed our stay at this cozy little flat. The location was superb with the main shopping street just around the corner and plenty of wonderful restaurants to choose from within few blocks. The flat is small but had everything we needed for our stay. The bed was a sofa bed but was surprisingly comfy though maybe not the best for longer stays and the kitchen was adequately equipped for cooking simple things. The flat was clean and the hosts were lovely, always answering our questions quickly and helping us with everything. We wholeheartedly recommend staying here!
review_summary: Have you ever wondered how nice it'd be to visit BP being hosted by friendly people with up-to-date knowlage what's gonna happen downtown tonight? On the top of that it'd be cool to stay in a charming apartment? Than it's worth to read on!
description:
Have you ever wondered how nice it'd be to visit BP being hosted by friendly people with up-to-date knowlage what's gonna happen downtown tonight? On the top of that it'd be cool to stay in a charming apartment? Than it's worth to read on!

Check out some more details about Andi's apartment:

Location: "Location, location, location" as the old travellers' saying goes... 

Situated in the very center of Budapest, downtown is right at you doorstep thus the most popular places can be reached within 5-10 min on foot. Want to go some further? Public transport hub is just some minutes walk distance or why don't you call an UBER car for less than EUR 0.5/km. 

Apartment: 

In a 18th century Hungarain Classic building, at the top floor you will find a nice little apartment with no side-neighbors as it is the only flat on that floor.

Traveling alone or with who you LOVE you will feel the intimate atmosphare of the place.  

The apartment itself is a recently renovated studio with the sleeping area on the loft with a double bed. Fully equipped kitchen and bathroom with everything you would need. Free WIFI! Washing machine, fridge, kitchen utensils, pots, pans etc.    

Sheets and towels provided!

The apartment is on the 6th floor, an elevator goes to the 5th floor, and there's a stair between the 5th and the 6th floors.

If you have any further questions, just message me, I will be glad to assist you.

reviews_text:
The apartment was amazing! The location was perfect to visit sites, restaurants and Christmas markets! It had everything we needed, was comfortable and the host was wonderful! Thank you so much for having us!

Wonderful 3 day visit in Hungary. This location was perfect for the first time visit.  Centrally located in the city and walking distance to all the tourist sites. I loved all of the Christmas markets. The apartment is clean, well stocked and comfortable. Only thing needed was an electric adapter which I found at a phone store.  Will be back again.  

Very cozy apartment near all the good restaurants and some bars. Easy to get in and you're definitely living like a local. Within a 10 minute walk you can explore the Jewish quarter and eat all the great food there. Highly recommend this place! 

Great location, the apartment looks even besser than the photos. Great experience 

Perfect journey in her flat, everything clean and pretty. Zsé is really nice and always help you!! I will come back for sure

I had a great experience in Budapest and definitely a big reason for that is the apartment location and the prompt help that I received from Zsófia. The apartment was clean and exactly as described, that made me just focus on tourism which was what I was there for.
I will for sure contact Zsófia again for my next trip to Budapest.
 

Fantastic Little Apartment within walking distance of everything. Nice and quiet, easy acces to Zsé, answering all requests right away.
We enjoyed our stay, and will for sure recommend the Apartment to others.

Wonderful place, in the center of Budapest. Really close to the parlament and church. You have also a Metro to 50 mts. The apartment is cozy but have everything that you need. I recomended

Great neighorhood.

Zse was the perfect host, very quick in answering any question. The apartment is cosy and quiet, just a few minutes walk away from the Danube, the house of parliament, the opera and many other places. I spent a few days in Budapest to run the marathon, and Zses apartment was the perfect place to relax.
review_summary: It's a very nice apartment, to let in the heart of the city. Double bath, two steps walk from metro station, one minute walk from Basilika, Deák square Danube river, Parlament...ect. There are many restaurants and pubs.
description:
It's a very nice apartment, to let in the heart of the city. Double bath, two steps walk from metro station, one minute walk from Basilika, Deák square Danube river, Parlament...ect. There are many restaurants and pubs. 



Many people were interested to see what the "black thing" in the gallery ceiling.
Everyone is reassuring, not the camera, it's the alarm system motion sensor. To feel at all comfortable, discharged. :)

reviews_text:
We had a great time at Yvett's place! Very cozy, big bed and right near the metro, so it was easy to get to and from.

Yvett is very welcoming and helpful. She respects your privacy and makes sure you have a wonderful stay.

The place is very cozy, it has everything you need. The city center is close by and bus and subway stops are located a few minutes away.

Have a great stay! :)

The place is very cozy and Yvett was a very flexible and helpful host! We arrived late in the evening and it was not a problem for her. The house was quite full of people and due to that the kitchen was a bit messy. But this was propably 'cause we stayed here around Halloween time. The room was as in pictures, very clean and spacious. The area was quiet, close to metro and a grocerie store (Lidl). We stayed five nights and the first nights the room was a bit cold, but after turning on the heating it was perfectly fine. We defenitely recommend Yvett's place for anyone looking for a cozy and quiet place near downtown

Yvette made us very welcome.  Excellent at replying quickly to emails.  Always pleasant and very helpful during our whole stay.

I had an AMAZING experience staying at Yvett's place. She was a fantastic hostess. I will defiantly stay with her in the future and highly recommended her to anyone. She got out of her way to help me with the language barrier and to get around. She was welcoming and treated me like family.  She defiantly gave me the five start treatment!

Um, if i have to chance stay the home, i wont stay.

Overall I've had a good time at the place. It is a quiet neighbourhood in the center of the city. It was a short walk distance away from all the places I needed to go to. The hosts are really friendly and will give you privacy. The place looks nice, just like in the pictures. During my stay some of their home appliances were not working but I'm sure they'll get them fixed eventually

The environment is very quiet,whether it is very convenient to walk to the scenic spots or subway, thank you for your help, I like the city of Budapest.

Our stay in Yvett's place was wonderful! Her apartment is beautiful and in a very nice neighborhood. We were able to use the metro to get everywhere, but it was also easy to walk. There was a great coffee shop less than a block away that Yvett recommended - we went there daily. Would highly recommend her Airbnb!

We really appreciated that we could arrange earlier check in.the location is really perfect.we almost did not have to zde the public transport although we walked a lot.we enjoyed it.
review_summary: Cozy, spacious and clean flat in downtown Budapest. Metro, buses, nightbuses around the corner. Excellent location if you want to visit the city's main attractions. Elegant and very safe area with cafés, groceries, restaurants, shopping street.
house_rules:
1. Non-smoking apartment. 
2. I have no doubt you'll treat the apartment and the neighbours with respect. To us, that means no loud gatherings and leaving the space clean.
description:
Cozy, spacious and clean flat in downtown Budapest. Metro, buses, nightbuses around the corner. Excellent location if you want to visit the city's main attractions. Elegant and very safe area with cafés, groceries, restaurants, shopping street.

Spacious, comfortable and clean, great for two people or a single traveler. Comfortable sofas, working desk and a queen size bed and a big bathroom with hot tub awaits you.

You have 24/7 access to the flat. Excellent connections to public transport (metro, buses, nightbuses). Guests have access to on-street parking.

Usually my boyfriend and I stay in the flat's other room, but you will have full privacy with us staying out of your way. If you'd like us to offer recommendations, we will be happy to help!

The flat is in a classic and beautiful building in an elegant area of the city with private villas, cafés, restaurants and shops. It is an excellent choice if you are visiting the city, traveling for business, or stay for your studies as you will quickly get to any part of the city from the flat.

The flat is in the heart of Budapest with excellent public transport connections (metro, buses, nightbuses).

The flat is in a classic and beautiful building in an elegant area of the city with private villas, cafés, restaurants and shops. It is an excellent choice if you are visiting the city, traveling for business, or stay for your studies as you will quickly get to any part of the city from the flat.

reviews_text:
Fabio wasn't in Budapest so his friend Bence received us. It was a very smooth check-in, and communication was great. You can walk to centre Pest, but it is a long walk. However, Keleti train station and a number of buses and trams are 5 min away, and we had a very good experience with Budapest's public transportation. There's a supermarket on the same road and bakeries and other food spots around the area. The building is quite old and showing signs of needing a bit of work, but from what I saw that's common in Budapest. The apartment was clean, warm, and had everything we needed. The kitchen was decently equipped. The bathroom was clean. The bed was ok - the mattresses were a little thin. Overall it was a pleasant experience.

The flat was really nice and clean, also very close to the city centre. The host was helpful, hope I can stay there again.
Thank you.

Very nice. The place is exactly as shown in the picture. Very close to the subway station and you can take a longer walk to the city centre if you want.

The apartment is exactly as shown in the photos. Very spacious and sunny (even in the winter!). All amenities needed for a short city break and even for longer stays. Fabio was an excellent host, getting in contact during our stay and the arrival process was also very smooth. 
Close to the train/metro station and buses to the center, easy to reach. Walking distance (apt 25 min to the city centre) and 15 min (Jewish Quarter). Will definitely recommend this flat for a Budapest City Break! 

it was so nice and awsome house! the interior was exactly the same with the photos. me and my friend was very satisfied to stay in Fabio's flat. we couldn't meet Fabio, because he wasn't in budapest so we met his friend instead him. and he was also very kind and good :) * Fabio gave answer to us very quick ^^ * He didn't make us to wait for a long time and that was really great! i recommend this house for sure :D

I had an amazing stay at this place. It was extremely clean and I was able to cook and do laundry easily. The train station is about 2 mins away and it was extremely simple to get everywhere. Thanks so much for a great stay in Budapest!

well located apartment. cozy, clean, and perfect for 3 people.  it comes with all commodities. i will recommend it for all my friends who will want to visit Budapest. 

All was good !we are very satisfied !i love Budapest!:D

Fabio and Natalie weren't able to let us in to the apartment and so their friend Bence did. He was running late and so kept us waiting outside for about 30 minutes but once he arrived he was very helpful and friendly. Unfortunately I had the flu for my entire stay in Budapest and so I couldn't really do anything but the apartment was beautiful and my partner explored by himself and said that the location was very central and a 2 minute walk from Keleti station which was also great. Thank you Fabio and Natalie!!

I like this place. I was great weekend!!
availability: The minimum night stay for this listing varies.
review_summary: Our 35 sqm renovated studio is very conveniently located near Keleti railway station. From this place you can quickly and easily reach the city center and all the main touristic spots of Budapest.
house_rules:
Please respect our neighbors and do not make noise after 10:00PM.

The check-in and the check-out time is flexible. It depends on the leavings and arrivals of the previous and next guests.
If you arrive at the apartment later than 23:00 a supplement of 10 euros in cash is required on arrival.

Smoking is not allowed. 

Unfortunately no pets.

For security reasons, the guests who do not have verified idenfication before booking will have to bring a copy of their ID or accept that a copy will be made upon arrival. We cannot accept guests that will not show their identification.
description:
Our 35 sqm renovated studio is very conveniently located near Keleti railway station. From this place you can quickly and easily reach the city center and all the main touristic spots of Budapest.

Renovated and comfortable studio-apartment, very bright and sunny, 1st floor in a old, not renovated typical style building of Budapest . Free WIFI. The kitchen is fully equipped ( oven, kettle, fridge,washing machine...). There are 2 double beds.

If you have any questions you  can reach us or our friend by phone or by email during your stay. Feel free to ask tips for your trip.

The flat is near Keleti, one of the main train station of Budapest.
The area is typical of train station environment and allows quick and easy access to all areas of town as well as many international cities with train.

Very conveniently located near the train station and the metro, everything is within very easy reach with the local transport system.

For security reasons, the guests who do not have verified idenfication before booking will have to bring a copy of their ID or accept that a copy will be made upon arrival. We cannot accept guests that will not show their identification.

reviews_text: The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
review_summary: A helyem a következők közelében található: Café Csiga Cucc-used stuff&coffe, Rákóczi Téri Vásárcsarnok, Zoska Reggeliző Kávézó, Károlyi kert, Centrál Kávéház. A helyem erre megfelelő: párok, magányos kalandozók és üzleti utazók.
description: The spot is located near Café Snail-Stuff Used Stuff & coffe, Kossuth-Air Market, Zoska Breakfast Café Károlyi Garden, Central Café. The appropriate place for this: couples, lone adventurers and business travelers.

availability: The minimum night stay for this listing varies.
review_summary:
You can be the first guest of this newly renovated home!
In the center of beautiful Budapest, inside the flat there is more super apartments, with the same facilities. 
The subway and the tram is two minutes away. However you wont need it, because all the pubs, and clubs are in walking distance, but don't worry, the relaxation is garanteed.
There will be a briefing about the locations of the nearest minimarket, pharmacy, public transportation and where you should start in the city.

Guests need to pay 4% city tax upon arrival.
REGISTRATION:

No Smoking,
 No Pets,

No Parties

reviews_text:
I stayed one night only at hi5 apartments. This is a proper business not really a typical airbnb host, so you won't feel to be welcomed to some local house. The apartment is a studio with separate kitchen and bathroom. Very clean, silent, strategic central location, with all necessary amenities. The only little minus goes to the almost transparent  curtains which will let the light filter in at 7am in the morning. Besides this really minor issue, absolutely recommended. Enjoy!

Its almost nothing like the pictures

Nice location in the city, and good hosting service!
By the way, Budapest is just an awesome city to discover!

The location is peefect! The apartment is small but have everything You need: )  Great place to stay.

The apartment is cosy, perfectly located and equipped with everything you may need (even a fan which you WILL need for sure). In the pictures it looks a bit more colourful than it really is (table mat and wall poster were not there), but that is just a minor thing.

Fantastic location, cheap and cheerful. Perfect base to discover the city from

The location of the apartment is perfect. The apartment is small but has everything you need for a great city trip. 

The apartment was very simple and small, but it is ok, when you dont want to spend a lot. Everything is near. The location is very good. George was very kind - he met us in the company office. 

Great location! Very easy check in process. A bit of a hiccup our first day with the code to get into the building, but Hi5's office is a five minute walk from the apartment, and George's coworkers handled it beautifully; fixed the problem immediately, and everyone was very kind. Apartment was small and hot, but cooled off once we opened the window. Good for couples, great value. 

This was an 'all you need airbnb'! Small apartment with perfect location in the beautiful city! Very nice stay!
review_summary:
Renovated in December 2016.
Hi5 Apartment 05 is located in the District 5 district of Budapest. It is the ideal location for a holiday in the city. 
You've got everything: relatively close to center and away from the noise.
house_rules:
Attention regarding smokers: Smoking inside the apartment strictly prohibited. Please use the balcony or the sidewalk to go for a smoke. Thank you for your understanding! 
The heating has been properly set-up before you come in, and the flat is very well insulated, so please do not modify the heating sensor, it will be warm enough for you! 
Please keep noise levels down after 22:00.
There are house trash bins in the entrance corridor if you would like to remove excess rubbish from the apartment.
Housekeeping during your stay available upon request.
description:
Renovated in December 2016.
Hi5 Apartment 05 is located in the District 5 district of Budapest. It is the ideal location for a holiday in the city. 
You've got everything: relatively close to center and away from the noise.

This charming, cozy 20m² one-bedroom apartment is wonderfully located in the heart of the 5th district (the most central district of the city). You will be 2 minutes away by foot from the famous St. Stephen's Basilika and Andrássy avenue (the Hungarian "Champs Elysées”), the Danube and the Chain Bridge are 3 blocks away, the famous Vörösmarty Square (where the Christmas market takes place) is across the adjacent Nádor Square, and the Buda Castle is a 10 minute walk. This is the best central location you could possibly get in Budapest.

Helpful and cheerful hosts who are eager to help regarding anything.

The neighborhood is trendy and lively, crowded with bars, cafés, shops, supermarkets, and public gardens. The area is rich with Budapest’s newest and most modern restaurants, with cuisines ranging from Hungarian, Italian, French, burgers, burritos - the best of everything. There is a large supermarket1 blocks away. The Váci street, the main fashion shopping street in Budapest, with souvenir stores and breath-taking architecture is a few minutes away. The "Budapest Eye" ferris wheel stands right in the Erzsébet Square in the summertime. Public transportation (subway, trams, and buses) leave directly from the square (Deák Tér stop), and there are bicycle rental stations nearby. Guided tours leave from every nearby square. The airport shuttle arrives/departs straight from the square as well. The Zrínyi street (the next parallel street) is host to several nightclubs and bars, including Kraft, Ötkert, Nomuri, and Divino. We will give you suggestions of the best places to make the most of your stay, whether you want to eat, drink, have a coffee, or party! 

Have a look at the guide on this page, it references the main attractions in the city center around the apartment.

Subway: Deák Ferenc Tér (M2 and M3 subway lines), Vörösmarty Square (M1 Historic Underground line)
Trams: Line 2 (Runs adjacent to Danube), Line 47, 49
Railway Stations: 2 stops by metro from Nyugati Railway Station, 3 stops by metro from Keleti Railway Station
Buses: Buses to the castle area, Hop-On Hop-Off buses

We have transfer service from and to the airport / train station / bus station. The prices are below:

From the airport: EUR 25 / car up to 4 people
To the airport: EUR 22 / car up to 4 people
From the train / bus station: EUR 18 / car up to 4 people
To the train / bus station: EUR 15 /car up to 4 people

In this case we will need you flight / train / bus number and your arrival time to Budapest. Our driver will be at the required time inside the terminal with your name.

reviews_text:
Attila was so gracious and friendly, my friends and I truly had a GREAT stay in Budapest. The apartment was lovely and the room we stayed in was quite spacious. The location was perfect for us to catch the metro or go shopping at the mall 100m away. I would definitely stay here again!!

Attila was very committed to providing a positive experience for us. He was flexible with our arrival and informative for recommendation in Budapest. When we left, he was very authentic and sincere in asking us our opinion of his home and how other tenants might feel during their stay. I really appreciated the ambiance. It felt like we were in someone's home, not in a hotel. 

Attila war super informative about location and additional information. The place was very nice and I would definetly recommend him!

Attila was a gracious host.  He came down to meet us in the lobby and help with the luggage.  The room we occupied was spacious,  clean and comfortable.  All the necessary amenities were available to us.  However, he was upset that a previous airbnb tenant had damaged one of the large windows in the 100-year old building, and he had not had the opportunity to attend to the repairs.  The damage did not affect our comfort. When we left, Attila again helped with the luggage  and accompanied us all the way to the metro station.  This was a great deal of help, as our luggage was heavy and cumbersome.  I highly recommend    booking with Attila.

Attila was very nice and welcoming.  His apartment is very big and Hungarian like. It would be good to stay here to see a traditional Hungarian apartment.  The location of hia flat is very good and in the middle of all the action. Would recommend to stay here for 1-3 nights.

Nice location, very friendly host. Actually the very true balance price 
/quality)) but do not expect too much from this place) nice room to stay in for 1-2 nights

Attila is a very friendly and helpful person, and very funny. The room is very nice, comfortable and spacious. Property is in a nice location in a quiet neighbourhood with both a metro and big shopping centre right around the corner! Great value stay! Thankyou :)

Attila was a great host. Me and two friends visited Budapest for a weekend and we were well taken care of by Attila. He told us how to find his apartment and what to do in Budapest. Attila made our stay in Budapest great!

Attila is a great host to familiarize with Hungarian culture. He had great tips about what to see in the city and also a very hospitable person. We enjoyed reading his book 'Philosophy of Love' that gives you an insight on his ideas what community could entail in sharing space. The apartment sites in a beautiful building, and is located in a part of town with a lot of of gems, that you can discover through a nice walk in the neighborhood. Thank you Attila, hello hello!!!

Atilla is very kind and helpfull, we had a lovely time :-) The room  is clean, spacious and warm. Location close to metro and within walkingdistance from the center. The perfect base for visiting beautiful Budapest!
review_summary: The place (30m2*Práter street 9.) is situated in the centre of city: every thing is max 15-20 min from here. You find closed to our place Corvin sétány, Central Market Hall, river Duna, Museum of Applied Arts. The place is appropriate for couple, single, buisniss traveller, family (with children). I play flute, and learn clarinet. My favorit was Winettou. No lift. Simple kitchen, we are mostly vegetarian. Gas hobb with an electric fan oven, microwave fridge kettle toaster juicer.
house_rules: no drog, no smoke, no alkohol inside the room
description:
The place (30m2*Práter street 9.) is situated in the centre of city: every thing is max 15-20 min from here. You find closed to our place Corvin sétány, Central Market Hall, river Duna, Museum of Applied Arts. The place is appropriate for couple, single, buisniss traveller, family (with children). I play flute, and learn clarinet. My favorit was Winettou. No lift. Simple kitchen, we are mostly vegetarian. Gas hobb with an electric fan oven, microwave fridge kettle toaster juicer.

From guests: All the sights are within walking distance from the apartment. Great location, which is perfect to discover Budapest. You can walk to the city centre in about 20 minutes, or the tube station is about 3 minutes’ walk away. The house is easy to find and is conveniently located near the city centre. There's plenty of tram nearby. Beautiful old Art Deco building: the apartment block is a very typical Budapest 'udvar' (courtyard) block in the Art Nouveau style, built around 1905. It has a lot of character. Apartment is on the third floor and is a bit of a climb. The apartment has a lived-in, 'bohemian' feel to it. Don't expect a gleaming flat with IKEA furniture. There is also a very well behaved, quiet little dog and two lodgers, but it didn't feel crowded or noisy. The whole place was quiet and peaceful and the general feeling is a well-run postgraduate flat-share.

I'am working at home, so I can help if you ask.

Corvin, the City, Danube -everything is safe

reviews_text:
The best place ever! :) We will return for sure!! 

This flat is excellent value and quality for the low price that it has. It's simple and small, but has all of the necesities and doesn't feel cramped. It's well located in an area with many restaurants and bars, but is fairly silent inside of the flat. 
We visited in December and it was freezing, but the flat has a good heater that kept it warm. The only thing, is that you freeze to death waiting for the elevator as the whole building is open air, but really not a problem. 
Orsi was very friendly and welcoming when we arrived and gave us a detailed description of the map and where various things were located. 
Overall we loved Budapest and can't wait to go back (when it's warmer)!

We spent 4 nights at Maatee place and it was really nice. Great location in Jewish neighbourhood, clean, warm and cosy. 
Orchi took care of the communication, in french (which is a plus) and everything went super well, with fast answer. 
I recommend this airbnb for sure, it's a good place to stay during your stay in Budapest in order to enjoy a maximum.
Bed is confortable, and it's very calm for a good night of sleep.

Amazing stay in Budapest! The apartment was clean, tidy and very good location!

The apartment is as described.  Clean and comfortable, good location. Orsi is very friendly and communicative.  We were missing a cabin we could use.

Very nice and clean place, very well located it was very convenient for us. I didn't meet Máté, instead Orchi was very nice, she gave good indications about interesting places to visit, communication was very easy. Thank you so much, I would definetively come back.

Mate and Orsi are excellent and helpful hosts. Their place is great situated in the midle of Budapest nighte life but  is quiet. I'm sure that we will return there soon. 

We enjoyed mates place so much . Everything was close and perfect. Clean place nice people cheap price :) we will revisit for sure

Máté and Orsi were very friendly and helpful. The place is super central, but still absolutely quiet. We had a wonderful time in Budapest and would love to come back. Thank you!

I had a lovely little stay at Maté's apartment! Lovely cosy little flat, perfect for me to get a nice rest, had everything I needed and was very clean. Host was so helpful and came to meet me as I couldn't find the apartment at first, then gave me lots of advice on transport etc. Communication was fantastic and they even checked to make sure everything was ok in the evening. I would recommend if your looking for something basic and great value. Thanks!
house_rules: SMOKING OUTSIDE on the corridor only and STRICTLY NO GUESTS please. Flexible check-ins and check-outs depending on previous and next guests though.
description:
Bright and cosy studio w/great subway/bus/tram connections and is within walking distance to many nice bars & restaurants of the Jewish district and to all the major sights. 1 stop by M2 from Keleti, 40 mins €2 bus+metro ride from the airport. 

The studio is basic and quiet with simple kitchen and bathroom. It accommodates 2 persons. The apartment has great subway/bus/tram connections and is within walking distance to many nice bars & restaurants of the Jewish quarter. For the sporty ones, an amazing jogging track around Margaret Island's riverside is just 15 minutes away.

Wifi, maps and some useful flyers. Fully equipped kitchen including: fridge with freezer, microwave, coffee maker, dishes, bed sheets, towels and music player. Iron and ironing board also available upon request. 

Upon booking your stay you'll see my phone number and email address but you can also reach me via (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) or viber. I also like to meet and chat with my guests if you are interested meeting a well traveled local guy with lots of stories and interesting experiences to share.

The 7th district of Budapest has the name "Bar District" for a reason. It is a busy area inhabited by international young people and offers lot of  amenities. Practically anything you could need day and night.

Great subway/bus/tram connections and is within walking distance to many nice bars & restaurants of the Jewish district and to all the major sights. 1 stop by M2 from Keleti, 40 mins €2 bus+metro ride from the airport.

reviews_text:
Good

My husband and I stayed here for 3 nights in November. It was amazing! 
Emy & Pete were so accommodating and even allowed us to check in early due to our flight arrival. 
We were given lots of privacy and we rarely knew they were home. 
The apartment was very clean and it was lovely to have all the amenities required for a nice stay. 
We were in the perfect location. Public transport was very easy to follow and fairly close. 
My husband struggled a bit with the firmness of the bed and pillows however it didn't both me at all. 
All in all, a wonderful place to stay. Highly recommend!

Emy and Pete's quiet flat was great for our romantic city break. It was good value, in a great location near bus, rail and metro links and within walking distance from the main nightlife district. The flat itself was clean and compact. Recommended. 

Nice place with a cozy atmosphere..  E my is super kind and gave us our privacy..  The flat is super clean..  Recommended

Me and my friend have been very satisfied of our stay in  Emy & Pete`s flat. The flat is very modern and comfortable, warm and there was almost everything. so actually I can say that in the flat is missing nothing that you can need! The room is not big  but is ok for 2 people. The flat is very close  Metro line. Actually you are just 4/5 stops from the center of Budapest, we can say 10 minutes. I think that if you are visiting Budapest for a couple of days, This flat is a must where to stay, because the flat is cheap, beautiful and in a good area. If I will come back to Budapest I will consider for sure his flat as my first choice!

It was so nice! Emy and Pete are so sweet they even made us breakfast sandwiches for our 6 am flight. <3

The host canceled this reservation 14 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Emy and Pete were great hosts! It was a delight to stay with them, even if it was only for one night. The room was small, but clean and the bed was comfortable. The kitchen and apartment were great. Thank you so much for the brownies and breakfast sandwiches! Hopefully we'll be in Budapest again soon. 

Our stay was great! Would definitely recommend Emy & Pete's place. They were the most generous, helpful and nice hosts. They picked us up from the station when we arrived late and cooked delicious food for us. Their place is close to the metro (ten minutes to centre). The flat is small, but clean, modern and has everything you need. We loved our time in Budapest!! 

Nagyon kedves és közvetlen, segítőkész házigazdák,és bár csak 1 éjszakát töltöttünk náluk, de maximálisan  elégedettek vagyunk. A képeknek és a leírásnak teljesen megfelelő, nagyon tiszta, rendezett lakás. Reméljük lesz még lehetőségünk újra találkozni.

We offer a nice room in a freshly renewed brick loft flat in Budapest downtown. However it is centrally located, but the windows overlook the courtyard, so it's quiet. Next to the Eastern Railway Station and underground 2, 4, many buses, trams, trolleys. 

Nearby the traditional Garay market, supermarkets, shops, grocery, pharmacy, exchange, souvenir shop, hair dresser, hospital. Just 5 minutes walk is the Arena shopping mall with world brands and IMAX 3D cinema. 

Few minutes walk the City Park and Lake, Heroes' Square, Zoo, Vajdahunyad Castle, Széchenyi Termal Bath.

All you need is your toothbrush, because we will give you the rest (towel, fresh bed sheet, soap, shower gel, toilet paper, toothpaste, hair dryer, iron with board).

We take the cleannes seriously.

The apartment has been renovated recently and fully furnished. There are two bedrooms, the low and the loft bedroom, a living room with kitchen and a bathroom. You can rent the low bedroom, which fits for two person.

You can use washing machine, iron, fridge, moka pot and other kitchen equipment. You can enjoy our Fiber Power internet with WIFI and TV by UPC.

We can help you at any time.

The houses are built in eclectic style here.

1. From Eastern Railway Station: go straight to Bethlen Gábor street (there is in this street McDonald's, Burger King, Rossmann etc.) and the second cross street turn right and go straight to number 38.

2. From Liszt Ferenc Airport: get up the bus 200E, get down it's terminal, Kőbánya-Kispest. Here get up subway 3 (blue line) towards Újpest-Központ. Get down in Kálvin tér and here get over subway 4 (green line) towards Keleti Pályaudvar and get down it's terminal, Keleti Pályaudvar (Eastern Railway Station). Now follow the point 1. instructions.

3. From Népliget Bus Station: subway line 3 towards Újpest-Központ. Get down in Kálvin tér and here get over subway 4 towards Keleti station. Then follow 1. point.

Every day you can park free under the Arena Plaza in 0-24. You can park the car next to the house too. It cost about €1-2 /hour.

reviews_text:
This apatment is a very good place to stay in Budapest - located in city center, however, on a quiet street - ideal place to rest after sightseeing tour of city.  
The location of the apartment is a great advantage.
House is spacious, comfortable, cozy and clean. Fantastic host!  I recommend this apartment! :) :)

We enjoyed our time here in this clean and comfortable apartment. We would happily stay here again.

We had an amazing stay in Budapest at Frida & Andrea's place! It was in a perfect location close to tons of cafes and restaurants and was kept immaculately clean! Would highly recommend. 

Very attractive location, parking is next to the building. Its quite and spacious. Place is good for couple nights but not longer because beds were not comfortable. Between living room and bedroom, door is missing so its not for couples. Hosts were very flexible with check in. I would recommend this place for weekend getaways.

very nice place and district is great. comfortable for 4 people. 

Beautiful place in a great location in Budapest. We fit four comfortably and Frida and Andrea were perfect hosts. 

They were very easy to reach and super flexible. Our bus was 1 hour late and they were ok with it. Also they let us check out a little later.

The apartment's location was perfect, just in the Jewish quarter. Good bars and restaurants nearby.

I really recommend it!

Very good location and very convenient apartment. All the amenities worked well for us. 

The apartment was ok, it look s little bit better in the pictires than it does in real life, but what you see is what you get. I lacks a little maintainance (shades did not work in main room). Location is excelent, only minutes from Sant Stephen Basilica, metro stations and other important tourist places. Also a lot of restaurants and bars very close, we loved to be able to enjoy Buspest night life at walking distance. The building itself where the apartment is needs some renewal, nevertheless we felt save. 

Could not be better located, very nice area, the flat is at a walking distance from everything in the heart of the city. 
Flat is fully equiped with everything you need although not as bright as in the pictures. 
Overall a good quality / price.  
Also if you need a ride to the airport, frida's friend peter is of very good service !
availability: On Fridays and Saturdays the minimum stay is 3 nights.
review_summary: Located on the 1st floor in a calm area in the centre of Budapest, you will find this nicely decorated apartment. Only minutes away from The Synagogue, Danube and nice walking streets.The popular bar street Gozsdu Udvar is not far away.
house_rules:
Be free to use everything the apartment has to offer. Handle it with your love and care. 
Smoking is not allowed inside. But there is a courtyard where you can smoke.
description:
Located on the 1st floor in a calm area in the centre of Budapest, you will find this nicely decorated apartment. Only minutes away from The Synagogue, Danube and nice walking streets.The popular bar street Gozsdu Udvar is not far away.

The best location in Budapest. Walking distance to almost everything,or you will find buses and subways in the neighbourhood.  This nice apartment located on a calm street in the centre of Budapest has everything you seek for.  Easily fits a family or company of 4 people. 

Free wifi.
Nice court yard were you can leave a bike or wagon.
Always fresh towels and bed linens.

We will personally meet you for key handover. 24 h service. Dont hesitate to contact us if you have a problem or just want to ask us something about the apartment or the city. 

The apt is located on a nice and calm street not far away from the pulse of the city- great for walking. Grocery stores and restaurants just around the corner. Even an american diner in the same house if you need something to eat or drink and dont want to get dressed. 

Only some minutes away from the local public transport. Buses or subway. 
You will find taxi-cabs every second minute. 
From the airport we recommend you to take the airportshuttle. You can only buy your ticket on the airport-dont forget to buy your return ticket!
One day before your departure you call the airportshuttle to set a time for pick-up. 
Or, you can go by a normal taxi cab if it suits you better. 

The apartment has a washing machine- feel free to use if you like.

reviews_text:
Vilmos was a great host that made my experience in Budapest very memorable. There was a small issue with the shower that was quickly fixed. I appreciate Vilmos fixing the issue very fast it was like it never even happened. The location of his apartment is absolutely perfect. Beautiful view of the Parliament. Bed is very comfy. Smart TV! I highly recommend staying at this apartment! Thank you Vilmos and thank you Brigatta for an unforgettable experience!


Our experience was absolutely fantastic. Just like the pictures, clean & overlooking Buda Castle.
Brigitta met us and gave us the key and the codes to the building, and there was beer, bread, milk, water, and other goodies left for us. There is also a Nespresso which is a pleasant surprise!
We would definitely stay here again! Thank you for being such a great host, Vilmos!

Perfect location, reliable host. We enjoyed staying at Vilmos' place. Well equipped and highly recommended apartment!

Nice place and beautiful landscape !
Juste a bit hard to communicate with the person in charge ( daughter).

It was a fantastic apartment  First we were afraid that the lift might not work.  But it worked well. Apartment is fabulous Internet is fast and the host provided a fresh loaf of bread, Milk Tea Coffee and even a couple of beers. We never used them though. 

This location is great to stay in Budapest, quiet neighborhood but close to the metro and many attractions in Budapest, can't beat it. Villas was a great host, a bit of trouble checking in but everything was smoothed out after and was attentive when he away overseas. 

Everything was perfect. The apartment is full of every extra equipment (like nespresso capsules), is clean, the view is beautiful and it has a great position. Higly reccomended

Amazingly beautiful apartment. We were shocked at the value for money- fantastic!!!

Vilmos place is a real gem for the business traveler and the tourist alike. 
I travel often (3 times/yr) to Budapest for work and location is very important since I use public transportation.  Batthyány tér hub, a block away, with access to bus, metro and Hév makes ideal. I was actually staying at a hotel also a block away for years for that reason. The grocery store is a block and fruit shop, coffee shop and convenience store right outside! The Mammut mall is one subway stop (or 10min walk), 3-4 nice restaurants around the corner and for tourists, walk to the Castle district on 2 metro stops to Pest side Vaci Utca.
The apartment itself is in an older building, the entrance and the elevator not so fancy and difficult to find parking if you need. 
It's an IKEA showcase (but the good IKEA), newly renovated in very fashionable way (I'm an architect) with a quirky bed platform design. That may be my only doubtful part since I get up from the bed 2-3 times at night. 
The rest absolutely perfect! Water & some snacks available, squeaky clean, nice view from the little balcony over the Parliament, efficient and quiet mini split a/c, smart TV (bring your own Netflix account!), beautiful small restroom, the smell of new appliances, dishes, utensils.
I will stay again in November.

The place is right across the parliament building and as the flat is on the top floor, you can see the parliament from the flat. 

Location is 2 min walk from a metro station (and this station is only 2 stations away from the central station you have to get off when coming from the airport).

The place is very nice and modern, and the host is so kind to have prepared few bottles of water and nespresso capsules upon your arrival.
You get the whole place by yourself which was great as well.

I will definitely come back!

You’ll love my place because of The View, Panorama, 10 Minutes walk to The Buda Castle, Beautiful Clean modern apartman , the comfy bed, the light. reviews_text:
Árpád's home is beautiful, and in an excellent location. I was near a half hour late on checking in due to heading the wrong way but he was very kind in waiting for me. His home is clean, central and a great price. I truly enjoyed my stay, and would definitely visit again. I recommend his apartment for your trip to Budapest! 

directly in the heart of Budapest = ) perfect location for exploration of the town

Very nice flat, clean and no problem. Arpad is the nice host, at time, free and help you if you have need. Very good !

A flat really nice, clean and cosy !! Nice building, nice localization! 

The apartment was very nice and central. Arpad greeted us very friendly. Would definitely recommend this to anyone who is visiting Budapest! 

Great apartment in a great location, Árpád was very friendly and always responded quickly to any questions we had!

Pros: Location is great and very close to Nyugati metro stop.  Clean place.  Wifi was very good.  Description was accurate.  Host was good with communication and punctual upon arrival.
Cons: As described by the host there's no elevator...you'll need to walk up 3 flights of stairs to get to the unit.  A bit small...fine for 1 or 2 people but a little too close for comfort if more than that.

My family spent a couple of lovely days in Árpád's place. The apartment is just how it looks in the pictures. The location is absolutely great and Árpád gave them flexibility for checking and checkout. It couldn't be better, I highly recommend this place.  

Árpád´s flat is perfect, it was a really nice experience staying with him, he welcomed us very friendly in his place, gave us all the directions we needed to find his house very quickly and easy from Budapest Keletu train station, at the flat he gave us a map with all the instructions about public transportation and what to do and see in Budapest, the neighborhood is very nice and the apartment is clean and looks exactly like the pictures, thanks for everything Árpád!

We stayed at Arpad's place for five nights and this place really provides everything you need for a trip around the city. Also, it is very well located :) Arpad was quite in a rush when we arrived, but he still was very friendly and gave us some nice recommendations for food restaurants close by, thanks for that! I would come back to this place again.
review_summary:
The very center! 
Modern,beautiful, dowtown studio! This place is only few  minutes from everything: museums, most famous sights, Parliament, Basilica, ruin pubs, clubs... it is the perfect choice for YOU!
house_rules:
I have zero tolerance disturbance policy, so please do not disturb the residents of the building and avoid any noisy behavior after 8:00 pm and before 8:00 AM. We reserve the right to abort the service without refund if any established compliant arrives to us from the neighbours. 
Maximum 4 people can sleep in the apartment. 
Please let me know if anything happens, some disturbance,or if anything is missing,or if you have a question.
Please don't smoke inside the apartment. You can smoke in the corridor.
description:
The very center! 
Modern,beautiful, dowtown studio! This place is only few  minutes from everything: museums, most famous sights, Parliament, Basilica, ruin pubs, clubs... it is the perfect choice for YOU!

This cosy modern third floor apartment is located in the heart of the city. Despite the fact that this is one of the busiest streets in Budapest,the studio is very queit,because of the location. This is the last flat in the building. 

The town can be explored easily from here by walk (e.g.: synagogue in the Jewish district, St. Stephen Basilica, Parliament, Heroes Square, Andrássy Avenue, Széchenyi bath), however all the public transport is accessible nearby as well. The closest metro station and the tram no. 4-6 (which goes around the downtown) is at Nyugati Railway Station, quite close to the flat.
The city's most famous sushi bar called Wasabi is under the building. But you can find several quality or cheap restaurants in the neighbor. More supermarkets and the West End mall is just few minutes from the flat by walk.

Two persons can sleep in the king size bed on the gallery another two can sleep on the full size sleeper sofa. The kitchen is fully equipped. In the bathroom you can find fresh towels, shampoo, liquid soap and shower gel. 

free WIFI
free city map
free coffe and tea
international TV channels
secured parkhouse on the next corner

No elevator in the building!!


Enjoy your stay!

reviews_text:
Emese's place was fantastic to stay in. It was modern yet cozy. I had some issues with the bed and size of the duvet, which Emese and her husband responded to quickly and fixed for me. The place uses electric instead of gas for all heating which is awesome because the shower is hot instantly. 

There's not A LOT of food and bar options in the area, but there are some and you're a short walk to the main road and public transit, from which you can find anything you want.

The internet was great and the television has several English language channels to choose from. 

I lived the decor and lighting. 

The only thing I'd fix is that the bed is pretty squeaky. Even the slightest movement makes the bed creek. 

Emese and her husband were very kind and easy to get a hold of. They offered a lot of recommendations for things to see and places to eat. 

Would absolutely stay again. 

Emese's flat is very spacious and cozy. It's in old Hungarian style but renovated, so you can feel old style but with modern comfort. It was a pleasure to stay there.

Great location. Everything works well. Thanks!

As usual, it was a great stay in this flat. Clean, well equiped, good location....everything s here. 
Emese is very nice and the communication is very easy. 

What a great place to stay! Emese and Paul were very great hosts and the communication was immediate. The location is perfect!! You are directly by the train station, good gastropubs, and just a short walk or bus ride to the nightlife. Very comfortable and quiet in the evenings. 

The interior was very modern and clean, comfortable, and all new appliances and amenities! 



Emese was very friendly upon arrival. :-)
The apartment outside has and old retro charm, but the inside of the flat is completely renovated, spacious and comfortable. Perfect central location  with close availability for public transportation and it's still a very quite place to rest after sightseeing all day. 
Great price for a modern and clean apartment. Stores and restaurants  are less then 5 minutes walking distance away. 

It was my home away from home for 2 weeks and I had an amazing time in Budapest. 
I will definitely come back again! 
Thank you Emese! 

I booked this apartment for my mom. Emese was a great host! She was very friendly and informative. 
The location is very good - it is close to the train station, maybe 5 min by walk. The apartment was very clean, it was spotless! My mom was very happy. Thank you Emese! I will definitely come back soon!

Emese did a lot of effort to help us. She made sure she was there on the most convenient time. She helped us for finding a solution with our luggage the last day.

The appartment was very beautiful. We had everything we need (even more). We also got a brief eplanation about the best things of 
budapest.
The vacation already started very well because all of these things.

Amazing stay! Best Airbnb we have stayed in after traveling for 6 months! Very clean, spacious with plenty of room to spread out, relax, cook, etc. good wifi - hosts are incredibly accommodating and helpful everything you could ask for - walkable and local- very close to train station and metro- we walked everywhere. Thanks again Emese!! 

Everything was perfect in Emese flat is in the center clean and near everything you need to stay in Budapest.Reating AAA
review_summary:
A typical Budapest historical building the apartment is on the ground floor.
It is complete renovated with all nowadays luxe. The design is classic with modern elements.
The West railway station is only 150 mtr walking distance. Bus, tram, metro all within walking distance. Being in the hart of the city restaurants, bar, opera, theatre all easy to reach. Don't forget you swimming clothes for visiting one of Budapest world famous swimming pools. Or a romantic walk along the Danube.
