reviews_text:
Aida Is very accommodating (I arrived at midnight the first Day and it was not a problem, and I could do the check up whenever it was ok for me the Last Day!)
The appartment is very cute, easy to go to the public transport, not far from the centre. 
I recommand !!!

Aida is great host, I was deleyed but she waited me for two hours.  Apartment is clean,located, just two minutes walk from bus station, and 10-15 minutes drivinig by bus to city center.  

Great small cozy place for exploring the city.  

The best place I have stayed so far, reasonable price and location

Our time at Aidas place was great. The flat was very clean and had everything you could wish for. We would go there again at anytime

Great apartment, clean and close to public transport, so easy to get into the city.  The apartment is modern and in a quiet neighborhood. Aida was a great host - friendly and flexible and made it easy to organise everything!
Only small thing is there is no door to the toilet, but if you're on the mezzanine it's no problem.
We had a great stay there!

Aida is a nice host helpful and very responsive. 
The apartment is cozy and very clean, the only bad things that bothered us are that there was no door or curtains at the bathroom and the loud neighbors, but I think it was only temporary. The location is ok 15 minutes from Keleti train station and about 20 by foot from the city center, but you have a bus 1 minute walk from the apartment. 

A big plus is the mobile wifi Aida provided.

Aida's apartment is a nice spot to be in and about a 20 minute walk from the city centre. It was so nice to have a window out on to the street and the sleeping space upstairs was very cosy. Aida was also very helpful and accomodating. 

A lovely apartment with a comfy bed and lots of light during the day. A fab bathroom with washer and a great kitchen to use too! A beautiful space :) 

It's really lovely home))) 
Thank you for this home, nice view from window and good people's who live here)))

We had a great experience staying here, it had easy access to the city centre all day and there was a night bus. Clean and comfortable, it was very easy to relax here. The host was very generous in allowing us to take the WiFi when we left the apartment giving us Internet on the go. She also offered a map of the city, helping us to find different attractions. A great little place to stay.
availability: The minimum night stay for this listing varies.
review_summary:
It's a tiny, lovely apartment with a great atmosphere, located only 15 minutes from the center. 

Equipped with all the household stuff you'd need. Sheets and tovels included. There is a wifi available at the flat.

Parking: in front of the house, on weekdays between 8am and 6pm you have to pay, during the weekend it's free.

reviews_text:
Victor and his wife are really great hosts! They will make you feel very comfortable and give a lot of advice on what to do in Budapest. Their place is very close to transportation and getting to the main city center. They continued to check-in with us throughout our trip and explained the house rules very clearly. They are both very kind people and made our stay in Budapest quite lovely!

Victor and his wife are absolutely lovely people.They are really friendly and helpful.
Victor knows a lot about the city and knows how to get everywhere around and what is worth to visit.
The neighbourhood is peaceful and quiet,there is absolutelly no reason to be afraid go somewhere during the evening and night.
We really enjoyed staying in this flat. And we will definitely recommend to stay here to everybody,who would like to visit Budapest.
Thank you.

Absolutely enjoyed staying at Victor's and Judith's. It is a basic roomwith nothing fancy but the two of them are just top-notch hosts. Very nice and friendly people, extremely attentive and easy to talk to. They'll help ypu out with anything on your trip if you need tips or advice. The extremely beautiful neighbourhood right in the middle of Buda does its part.
I can only recommend to stay there.

Victor and his wife were absolutely lovely and very helpful, we really felt as home in their flat. Victor gave us many advices about the city and also helped is with transport Sistema information. The flat is very comfortable, the room was clean, comfortable bed, warm and quite. Location the best! We couldn't be in a better place close to the main places in the city, in fact I just took public transport in my arrival and my depart, always we reached everything by foot. It was one of the best airbnb  we have been! Thank you very much! 

We liked the stay at Victor'splace. He and his wife are hospitable hosts, warm and communicative. Location is perfect. If we come again, we will s choose one of his apartments. That's for sure! Victor is great for giving advice, recommendation of places to visit.

Victor and his wife were amazing hosts! Their apartment is in a great location. They provided lots of information about Budapest upon our arrival and told us the best ways to get around the city. They made our trip to Budapest so much better! Would definitely stay here again! 

We arrived in Budapest on October 11th, around 1:30 pm. We had no difficulty locating our accommodations as, Victor provided us with very clear directions to reach his flat and a local gentleman we met on the Metro, very kindly escorted us to the very corner of the street we needed to reach the flat. It was an easy walk from the station. Although, some may find the uphill walk might leave you a bit winded, we are both in our mid-50's and had no difficulty. Also, the flat is on the third floor and there is no elevator in the buildings, which would be of concern to some, particularly if you have heavy luggage or several bags to carry up and back down when leaving. 

We were very warmly welcomed by Judith.  Who showed us to our room for us to stow our bags. They had upgraded us at no additional charge to their larger double room, closer to the bath. She also showed us the WC and the kitchen. She let us know the water on tap was safe to drink and offered us coffee, tea or a glass of water. We gladly accepted large, refreshing glasses of water.  In spite of Judith's warning that her English was not so good, we felt she communicated well. We had no difficulty understanding her or making ourselves understood. She asked us our plans for the remainder of the day, and provided us with a quick summary of tourist highlights and how best to get around. We retired to our room for a quick nap to recuperate from our journey. 

The room was bright with natural light from a large window overlooking a garden courtyard. The curtains darkened the room enough to sleep during the day. While the flat is not new, it is very clean and provided good value for the money. We did find it chilly, but the cold whether had arrived earlier than usually expected and the building's heating system had not yet been turned on. Our hosts apologized and promptly provided us with extra blankets that allowed for a comfortably warm slumber. It is a very quiet building, where we were able to relax peacefully after our day exploring the city. Being from Canada, we had experienced similar heating issues in rental accommodations, where tenants are at the landlord's discretion as to when the heat is turned on, usually as late as the law allows!  We were quite comfortable with our sweaters on, when relaxing in the evening. 

We met Victor on our second evening and enjoyed a pleasant couple of hours conversing comfortably in English over many things.  We would certainly recommend this accommodation, which is very near to the Danube, Fisherman's Bastion, pubs, cafes, restaurants, a supermarket, the M euro and trams. Judith and Victor are excellent hosts and we would be comfortable staying with them again. 

Victor was absolutely great with us !! Very welcoming, kind, full of good advices ! He made our stay in Budapest really good. The flat is really well placed in the city, walking distance from the most important place to see.

Victor helped us with touristguides and we could ask him all the time for insidertipps

Very warm and friendly host who helped me out with everything I wanted to know. The place is very central and within 5 minutes walk you see the whole town at your feet.
review_summary: My place is above the city in Castle Hill. You’ll love my place because of it is just steps away from the famous Fisherman Bastion which offers you the nicest view over Budapest. The river Danube is just a 5 minutes walk if you walk down from your apartment to the river. I am absoultely in the most preferred area of Budapest with it's historical sights just minutes away.
description:
My place is above the city in Castle Hill. You’ll love my place because of it is just steps away from the famous Fisherman Bastion which offers you the nicest view over Budapest. The river Danube is just a 5 minutes walk if you walk down from your apartment to the river. I am absoultely in the most preferred area of Budapest with it's historical sights just minutes away.

You will have your own room with a double bed the windows look at a nice garden and in the direction of the Danube. Free wifi is available in the room for guests everywhere.

You will be able to use kitchen and bathroom but this will be used by the other guests as well. This has never been a problem as there is only one more room for rent in the apartment.

During your stay I can offer you 24/7 assistance and if your flight is late or you want to check out early that is not a problem.

The neighbourhood is one of the nicest and mostly preferred area it is not a party district it is just steps away from the famous buildings and monuments of the Castle hill.

You can come here by publict transportation bus stop of number 16 is just steps away.

No smoking or noisy behaviour after 10pm the area is not a party area if you want to party no problem the pubs in the city are just 2km away you can do it there.

reviews_text: Our room was wonderfully decorated and warm despite the cold weather outside. Kamilla was easy to contact and always friendly, offering advice on the best places to eat and the nicest places to go. We absolutely got the most out of Budapest staying here and would love to come back.
review_summary:
Looking for a holiday rental where you 
- are in the centre, 
- have your privacy (separate room&own bath), 
- can enjoy the vintage design pieces of furniture and decoration, 
- have all the comfort that a modern, renewed aparment can offer?
description:
Looking for a holiday rental where you 
- are in the centre, 
- have your privacy (separate room&own bath), 
- can enjoy the vintage design pieces of furniture and decoration, 
- have all the comfort that a modern, renewed aparment can offer?

Welcome to our vintage design room! It has two totally separate rooms and bathrooms, so you can have the desired privacy even if renting only one room. The flat is on the ground floor of a tipical old building in the center of Budapest. The building itself is also renovated and has a small green courtyard that you can see from the window.

What we offer?
- fast internet connection (wifi)
- flat screen TVs with foreign language channels
- Clean sheets, bed linen, towells
- Maps, brochures
- Instructions, basic information and local tips 
- Equipped kitchen (fridge with freezer, stove, microwave, boiler, etc.)
- Tea, coffee, etc.
- No staircase to climb ( app. 3 stairs)

Who we are? 
We are two sisters, who had the dream to create a place where we can use our design ideas and host fellow travellers. During our travels we experienced what makes a holiday home comfortable and memorable and used it in this apartment. We are locals, who enjoy the city we live in - ask us for our tips about gastronomy, sites, hidden spots, etc!

You can walk to Opera in 3 min, Basilica in 5 min, Deak ter in 15 minutes.

You will be able to walk all the central sites, will not need to take public transport to visit the Parlament, Andrassy (fashion) street or have fun in the ruin bars of the Jewish district. Metro no. 1 and 3, and tram no. 4 and 6 (most frequent lines) also have a stop close.

Short note: it is a quiet house, not suitable for partying. Please avoid creating noise, listening load music in the apartment and on the courtyard.

reviews_text:
Cozy, central, clean and beautiful apartment and a great host who really cares! 

The better as it was it couldn't be

Zsuzsa was absolutely wonderful and incredibly sweet. She gave us some historical context for Hungary and recommendations on what to see. Her apartment was very cozy and quaint and is a few minutes away from the Parliament. In addition, the Jewish district is a 5 minute walk away and the downtown area is not more than 5-10 minutes away.

It was a perfect stay, in an awesome Building with a very clean flat and Szusza was the best host! Totally recommendable

Zsuzsa is a very good person and a perfect host. The house is quite well equipped and very comfortable. She thought about everything to make her guests comfortable. She welcomed us very warmly and made very good suggestions about places we should see in Budapest. Many thanks for everything Zsuzsa. Hope to see you again.

Only sentance: completely great!

Excellent experience. If you want to have an Airbnb experience for sure Zsuzsa and this lovely apartment is the right place: exactly like the photos and perfect located, plus so romantically decorated. Zsuzsa was amazing: we had easy and fast communication before and during our stay. Highly highly recommended!!! 

Zsuzsa was a great host. She went out of her way to be helpful and made us feel extremely welcome. When we arrived she took time out to sit with us and show us local places to go and answer any questions we had. 
When we left she ordered us a taxi and even waited outside with us to ensure we didn't have any problems. 
The apartment is less than a 5 minute walk to the Parliament Building and around 10-15 minute walk to the Basilica of St Stephen. It was a fantastic location and we felt safe walking around in the evening. It is perfect for a couple, we had everything we needed. 
Thank you Zsuzsa.

Our first experience on Airbnb was amazing, Thanks to our wonderful hostess, Zsuzsa.

Zsuzsa was kind & pleasant, guided us with tips and ideas for traveling and best coffee places.
The apt is super private and well designed. 
The apt is located in a great place, 3 minutes walk from the amazing parliament building.

We recommend you to arrive with good vibe and good energy 
If you wish to enjoy your stay.
And if you look for a warm feeling- you've got to the right place.

Situated bang in the centre of the historically significant places, Zsuzsa's place is beautiful. It has the most amazing vibes. It's almost a home away from home. 
Zsuzsa herself is an amazing lady, she took almost an hour off her busy schedule  to tell us all about her city and what we would love to do there. 
I think she made the experience of the city better for us! 
The home is close to restaurants, ruin bars, public transport and luxury shopping areas! 
It goes without saying, that when we visit Budapest again, and it will be soon, we will hope to stay here again!
review_summary:
Cosy apt in an elegant  house in the center. The Parliament, Danube, Margarete Island, Heroe,s square, the Liberty Park, 2 famous  thermal baths,Nyugati railwaystation and many more  are in walking distance.
I think the most beautiful buildings and the most amazing
architecture can be found here in this area of Budapest.
Many restaurants, cafés, pubs, theatres are nearby. 
The public transportation is great: M3, trams number 4,6, buses and trolleys are for 5 minutes. Perfect vacation for 2.
house_rules: Nice, peaceful  residents living in the building. After 10pm no loud programs, music,parties are allowed. No pets, no drugs, no additional guest are allowed.
description:
Cosy apt in an elegant  house in the center. The Parliament, Danube, Margarete Island, Heroe,s square, the Liberty Park, 2 famous  thermal baths,Nyugati railwaystation and many more  are in walking distance.
I think the most beautiful buildings and the most amazing
architecture can be found here in this area of Budapest.
Many restaurants, cafés, pubs, theatres are nearby. 
The public transportation is great: M3, trams number 4,6, buses and trolleys are for 5 minutes. Perfect vacation for 2.

The newly built and furnished apt is in the prime location of the downtown, in the 5th district in Budapest in the core of the lovely city.  It is on the first floor,   elevator is available.
In the bedroom  there is one very cosy king-size bed for 2 . Basic things like bedlinen, shampoo, soap, towels, slippers, hair-drier, iron, fan,  toaster, water boiler, coffee, tea, sugar, salt  are available.
Cleaned professionaly before each guest.
The windows look to the beautiful  inner  courtyard, please see the photos.

Metro line 3, buses, trams number 4 and 6,  trolleys and  the favourite meeting point in Nyugati square are in 5 minutes walking distance.
From the airport the taxi costs about 25 Euro. I suggest to take Főtaxi company. 
If you choose public transportation it is also very easy by using bus and metro3 .

The interaction with me is easy and as many as it is needed as my studio is in the neighbouring apt.

The neighbourhood speaks for itself. Great, central location, unique atmosphere, everything is available to have a perfect vacation in Budapest.
Margarete Island and 3 great thermal baths are easy to reach either by foot or few stops by tram/metro. 
 There is a Power Plate fitness club in the building on the groundfloor.
There is a good store called Manna ABC 3 minutes away which is open 24 hours a day. In the neighbouring houses you can find a good Hummus bar, DM store, Lidl store and an organic bakery/ coffee shop. The West End City Center can be reached in about 10 minutes walk. There  are many good restaurants nearby.
The Operetthouse, the Operahouse, the Basilica in which there are many great organ concerts, cinemas, museums, jazz club, etc. are nearby.

Metro 3 line, no.4-6 trams, buses, trolleys can be reached  in 5 minutes.
If you arrive to Budapest-Nyugati railwaystation it is about 6 minutes by walk. All the other railwaystations can easily be reached either by public transportation /metro is the easiest way/ or by taxi.
Nearby there are 2 depos for "Bubi" bike rental if you prefer discovering Budapest by bicycle.

Please let me know the time of your arrival and departure as soon as possible so that  I can organize everything accordingly.

The apartment can be occupied on the day of the arrival from 2pm and should be vacated before 11am on the day of departure.
Please let me know  your special requirements regarding check-in and check-out time as soon as possible. 
No smoking in the apartment but you can smoke outside of the door in the  covered corridor. Please keep the apt. clean.

reviews_text:
Szilvi's place is great and she is a great host. The appartment was very clean and modern exactly as in the pictures. We had a one night stay and the app had everything we needed. After we parked our car we walked to city center beacuse it was close. So overall it was a great experience

Szilvia si Andrei au fost cele mai bune gazde pe care le-am avut prin intermediul Airbnb. Apartamentul lor este perfect din toate punctele de vedere (foarte curat, extrem de frumos decorat, situat intr-o zona linistita la o distanta de 5-10 minute de mers pe jos de cele mai importante obiective turistice, sunt locuri de parcare chiar la intrarea in cladire, minimarket non stop la coltul strazii, etc.), fiind echipat cu tot ceea ce am avut nevoie in timpul sederii noastre acolo. Suportul si sfaturile oferite de ei ne-au facut vizita noastra in Budapesta sa fie una de 5*!

Szilvia and Andrei were the best host we've ever had through Airbnb. Their apartment it's perfect from all points of view (super clean, classy decorated, situated in a quiet zone, parking outside, 5-10 minutes walk from everything) and fully equipped with everything we needed. Their support through our stay was outstanding and made our trip to Budapest a 5* one! :)

Beautiful apartment! 

Great apartment, great location, helpful host!

Great place in central Budapest. Top facilities and Szilvia was really helpful in explaining what sites to see around town. Would stay again.  

First of all the host Szilvia is great. She is like angel who is there to provide any kind of help and informations. And the apartment is great. It is just like in the picture. Very beautiful and clean. We had great time being there for few days. I would definitely like to come there again if I happen to visit budapest again. And the location is in the center. It makes easy to walk every where. We just fall in love with the apartment.

Very nice apparment and Szilvia, the owner, is very friendly and helpful.

booked this trip for a friend of mine, she loved it!

Thanks Szilvia for everything. Incredible host, so nice and so ready to explain everything you need to know about Budapest. She waited outside the studio when we arrived and spent over 45 minutes to share with us her ideal itinerary when visiting Budapest.
Take her advices! Menza it's great to eat, Szechely baths are awesome, Szimpla ruin pub it's a cool place to hang out!
Flexible check-in time and check-out was also a big plus!

The studio is exactly like in the pictures, very clean, very organized and it has all that you need: washing machine, small kitchen etc. We did not use them, but they are there.

Thanks you again Szilvia!

Szilvia was very kind & helpful. Easy and fast to get information.
The studio was very nice, cozy and had everything you needed. Also very fresh and exactly like the pictures.
I think it was a very good location! You can Walk to everything you need.
We would stay here again for sure IF we are going back.
Really recommend this studio!
availability: The minimum night stay for this listing varies.
review_summary: NEW!! In the heart of Budapest, a cosy romantic studio apartment with airconditioning (A/C) is waiting for you to have rest after a busy day in the amazing city center of Budapest. The Basilica, Opera and Parlaiment is just 5-10 minutes walking distance. You can experiance the local Hungarian lifestyle. The flat is in a typical Hungarian building.
house_rules:
The apartment is in a building where there are other nice and quite people living. Therefore we kindly ask you to respect others. No parties and loud music after 10pm.
The flat is non-smoking, but you may smoke outside on the yard, or front of the building.
Pets are not allowed.
description:
NEW!! In the heart of Budapest, a cosy romantic studio apartment with airconditioning (A/C) is waiting for you to have rest after a busy day in the amazing city center of Budapest. The Basilica, Opera and Parlaiment is just 5-10 minutes walking distance. You can experiance the local Hungarian lifestyle. The flat is in a typical Hungarian building.

This is a brand new designer studio flat.  
This is the best choice you could make! Best location and the best designer apartment! Just 5-10 minutes walking distance from Opera, Parlaiment and the Basilica. The 72 Trolley bus stops in front of the house, which can take you easily to the Szécheny thermal bath.
If you like Marilyn Monroe and the late 50-60 style, you are at the right place. This monumental Marilyn Monroe picture dominates the whole room, with her charming smile. It is really romantic. It is a glass picture, which can be lighted at night from the back with hundreds of spot lights. It visualize and evoke the american luminous commercial boards. 

The Studio flat consists of one room with an american style kitchen, and a bathroom with shower.  All together 2 people can sleep in the flat. The kitchen is fully equipped with all necessary dishes and cutlery, microwave, toaster, water cooker, dishwasher. In the bathroom you will find a hair dryer, soap, toilet paper and fresh towels.

You will have access of free WIFI, and flat screen TV with international channels.

You will find a brochure in the apartment where I will list some important information, recommendations about the sights of Budapest to visit.

The flat is situated in the city center within walking distance to all sights of Budapest. The Parliament, Basilica and the Opera is just within 5-10 minutes walking distance. The building is in a nice green street with trees. Nearby you can find grocery stores, florist, hairdresser, beauty shop, bars, restaurans, cafees, and money exchange. Just some minutes from the flat there is a shopping center/ mall with clothes, shoes, food court, cinema, and moore leasure activities. It is the famous Westend City Center.
Ruin pubs are just a footstep away. Ruin pub "Instant" is just on the next street, Nagymező utca, only 5 minutes walking distance. Within 5-6 minutes walking there are 2 Gyms for those who like to make some excercise while they are on holiday.

Pay Parking on the street in front of the building. On the weekends it is free to park on the street.

Public transportation: 
In front of the house the 72 and 73 Trolley-bus stops. Number 72 takes you directly to the world famous Széchenyi thermal bath. Other puclic transportations within 5 minutes walking distance: Tram 4, tram 6, Metro 3. The tram 4 and 6 is working the whole night too.

If you have any further questions, do not hesitate to ask me!

reviews_text:
Great flat and awesome location

Beautiful cosy apartment right in the centre of Budapest ! Very friendly and helpful hosts. Clean, lots of open space and warm (includes heating and even heated flooring in the bathroom) . 5* would recommend and come back again! Amazing place! 

Very nice, charming, little apartment. We will come back.
Very good located.

I totally and unreservedly recommend Adrienn's apartment it's fantastic!!!
Conveniently situated near the beautiful chain bridge the apartment is also quiet and secluded.
The modern stylish apartment is warm (important for the Hungarian (URL HIDDEN) has great wifi a nice compact kitchen basically it has everything you would want for a city break .
Bogi who works for Adrienn organised us a chauffeur from the airport and suggested lots of  places to eat and visit (she is very nice and helpful).
To conclude Budapest is beautiful and so is Adrienn's apartment both are well worth a visit .

Thanks

Mark 

I recommend this place for those of you who want some wonderful days in Budapest. 
Great place in a very good location with  a very  nice  host. 

It was AWESOMEEE!!! Absolutely amazing. I enjoyed every day in Budapest and in this apartment. It's all nice, clean, new and comfortable. The host is so kind. She recommended lots of good places in Budapest. 
If you want to book this apt, go ahead you'll totally enjoy it. Thank you❤️
availability: The minimum night stay for this listing varies.
review_summary: Freshly renovated apartment literally steps away from the Unesco World Heritage-listed Buda Castle and the Zero Kilometer Stone of Budapest. Enjoy the open space and stylish interior as it was your home. Stay in a neighborhood where Queens and Kings of the Hungarian Empire used to live!
house_rules:
- No smoking! No parties. Please be aware that the apartment is located in a quiet residential building and neighbourhood, kindly keep noise level to a minimum from 10PM till 8AM. Please respect the property as it was yours. Thank you!
- No overnight visitors.
- Check-in after 12PM
- Check-out before 11AM
- You may check-in/out in different timings based on our bookings. We are flexible!
description:
Freshly renovated apartment literally steps away from the Unesco World Heritage-listed Buda Castle and the Zero Kilometer Stone of Budapest. Enjoy the open space and stylish interior as it was your home. Stay in a neighborhood where Queens and Kings of the Hungarian Empire used to live!

A compact and brand new design miniloft, completely renovated just now! Located in the UNESCO World Heritage Site of Buda Castle that guarantees its unique atmosphere.
The apartment has everything you will need during your stay. The open space with 4m height gives a cozy yet modern feeling, bedroom on a mezzanine level ensures enough privacy.

Enjoy all appliances during your stay including speed Wi-Fi, Bluetooth speaker, washing machine, dishwasher, microwave, iron and board. You don’t need to worry about washing liquid, soap, dishwasher tablets or hairdryer either as these are all available.
We provide you with high quality towels and hotel grade bed sheets and linen.
To help you start your day just as you were at home your morning coffee (Nespresso)&tea is on us!
Roller blinds completely block out light for your restful sleep.
Powerful inverter AC regulates the temperature of your choice summer and winter alike.

We would like to ensure you have a memorable stay from the very beginning. We meet you at check in and are available 24/7. Providing you with tips and hints about the area, nice cafes, best restaurants and generally anything about Budapest. As locals, we give you insights of places that are above and beyond of recommendations of those well-known travel sites.

Location! Location! Location!
It speaks for itself. If you are new to Budapest, you are at the best starting point. The building which was built more than 100 years ago situated only a few steps from Budapest’s famous Zero Kilometer Point, also the place where you can board the Buda Hill Funicular. Surrounded by the astounding stairways of Buda Castle, a neighborhood filled with monumental landmarks, this is a place of history. Fisherman’s Bastion, Matthias Church, Várkert Bazaar, Buda Castle Labyrinth just to name a few.
Apart from cute, hidden gems you will find renowned restaurants of the city in this area like Jamie Oliver’s restaurant or the famous patisserie Ruszwurm (est. 1827).
With a short walk across the Danube on the Chain Bridge – the most graceful of Budapest’s nine crossings – you reach downtown of Pest side for more fun in no time!
Metro station and suburban railway line are also within walking distance.
Taking a nice and romantic evening walk or a refreshing morning jog on the river bank is a block away from the place.

To and from the airport taxi is the most convenient way of transportation, one way is around 25EUR.
Due to its location most of the time you will not need public transportation, and if so you have bus, tram and metro options to get around.
5 minutes of walking you will find a BUBI (Budapest Bike) station as well. One of my favorite way of getting around as the network spreads across the city and costs little :)

review_summary: Small with warm atmoshpere in the city center of Budapest. Margaret Island 3 minutes walking distance. Parliament as well. Very good transport. Fully equipped kitchen, and a very comfortable bed waiting for you. Around you can find all types of restaurants and cafes. Supermarket in walking distance. Just crossing the Margaret bridge you can find two local thermal bath. One of them is my favorite called Kiraly  Bath. :) Wish you some beautiful days in Budapest.
description:
Small with warm atmoshpere in the city center of Budapest. Margaret Island 3 minutes walking distance. Parliament as well. Very good transport. Fully equipped kitchen, and a very comfortable bed waiting for you. Around you can find all types of restaurants and cafes. Supermarket in walking distance. Just crossing the Margaret bridge you can find two local thermal bath. One of them is my favorite called Kiraly  Bath. :) Wish you some beautiful days in Budapest.

You can use anything in the flat.

My friend, Stefi is the co-host of this flat, she will be available almost 0-24 on her phone (text messages or messaging apps).

The flat is located in Újlipótváros ("New Leopold Town") which is a neighborhood in the 13th district of Budapest, very close to the river. It has been a popular middle-class/intellectual residential district ever since it was built. The buildings are amazing, you can find  here the best display of modern Hungarian architecture! You can find nearby a lots of very good restaurants, bookstores and interesting shops too.

Direction from the Airport:
From Liszt Ferenc International Airport the local Airport Bus number 200E takes you to Kőbánya Kispest metro station, the terminal station of Metro 3 (blue line), which takes you directly to Nyugati pályaudvar (Western Railwaystation).  The flat is 8 min walk from here. You can use the airport shuttle bus or taxi too if you like.

The public transportation is perfect around the flat: metro (Line 3), a lot of buses, tram (4-6, 2) and trolley-buses (75, 76) gives you many possibilities even to go to Buda side. (If you need I will help you make it out and I also can give you insider tips about the city.) :-)

reviews_text:
They are extremely friendly and generous. They spent time explaining all the good parts of the city to me. Recommended!

The owner is a couple of old Chinese who are very friendly and nice. They will introduce the best of options for your travel in Budapest based on your schedule. They would also explain the history to you if you are the first time visiting the place. The hostel is perfectly located in the heart of downtown and just a 1 minute walk to the River Danube at which you can have panoramas of the Danube. For food, just downstairs are a lot of restaurants and bars to satisfy your gastronomic needs. All main scenic spots are all in walking distance. The owner would provide daily breakfast for free. If you want to taste Chinese food, they can make for you on request in a very less pay. The sleeping room is very neat and comfortable with quiet environment. Not noisy at all because their home is on top floor facing another side not the street side. I highly recommend this hostel for all Chinese and foreigners who want to have a budget stay in a warm family. 

I am back because it is a great place and the hostess and the family are truly wonderful. I highly recommend this Air B and B. 

One of my best experience on Airbnb, room is clean and tidy, good location to get access everywhere in Budapest. And most importantly, the host family are always prepared to take care of you! Strongly recommend 

It was like coming home in a whole new world. It didn't feel like I was away from my home. I came late at the night after partying and the Gao family was totally cool with it. We shared great conversations and now I have friends for life in Budapest. :) Fan also guided me some good spots to visit and were totally amazing. You cannot ask for a better neighbourhood than this. everything was so close by and lively. 
God bless you.

The host was nice, warm-heart, happy to give the information to the visitor. Just when I make the order, I thought was a private room but actually was a bed place. It's a good choice for the traveller want to experience familiar at home in China. The location is good, quite in the central.

The overall experience of staying in Ms Gao's home is very pleasant. Ms Gao is a very friendly and nice host. She assisted me in everything I needed. Especially when I told her that I would leave very early at the morning (7:00 am), she even prepared me some breakfast.  

This location is the best just minutes away from so many sights and restaurants.
The host are very welcoming and the bed was comfortable and clean. Wonderful breakfast. Worth the value.

good location. just near the church and M3 station

very good feelings here!Everyday have good breadfask!in the center of city and very safe!it is really convenient to come to many places!the host treats me well!i love here!
review_summary:
高阿姨华人家庭旅馆地处繁华市中心,毗邻国会大厦、链子桥、多瑙河,距链子桥和多瑙河边仅300米左右,居住地点环境十分优美。
高阿姨华人家庭旅馆交通便利,有沿着多瑙河行驶、被《国家地理》杂志评为“最美电车线路”的2路有轨电车,地铁1号线、2号线、3号线等;可10分钟内步行至布达佩斯著名景点布达皇宫、渔人堡、国会大厦、链子桥、瓦茨街、圣·伊斯特万大教堂、安德拉仕大街、国家歌剧院等。傍晚可在多瑙河畔漫步,享受布达佩斯浪漫迷人的美景。
高阿姨华人家庭旅馆房间设施齐全,提供免费中式或西式早餐,24小时WIf
description:
High aunt Chinese family hotel located in the bustling city center, next to the Parliament, Chain Bridge, the Danube, from the Chain Bridge and the Danube river is only about 300 meters from the residence environment is very beautiful. 
 High aunt Chinese guesthouse transportation convenient, traveling along the Danube, was named "National Geographic" magazine as "the most beautiful tram line" 2 tram, Metro Line 1, Line 2, Line 3, etc; Mark 10 walk within minutes to famous attractions Budapest Buda Royal Palace, Fisherman's Bastion, Parliament Building, chain bridge, Vaci street, St. Istvan cathedral, Andelashi street, the national Theatre and the like. Evening stroll in the Danube River, Budapest enjoy romantic and charming views. 
 High aunt Chinese guesthouse room facilities, Chinese or Western breakfast offers free 24-hour WIf

reviews_text:
Amazing place to stay. Location is great and very close to a strip of affordable restaurants offering a range of Hungarian foods but also options such as burgers, tapas and pizzas etc. A short walk from one of the main avenues with loads of shops, authentic restaurants and cafes. Every tourist site was within a 25 minute walk or you can catch the hop on hop off bus including boat river tour for a very affordable price. 

Favourites to visit were thermal baths, city ice rink, st Stephens basilica and the Christmas markets around the city.

The apartment was clean, comfortable with everything we needed including a hair dryer. 

Violeta and Robert were extremely helpful giving us a map and locating places for us that we should visit; very knowledgable about the city.

Visit circuzcs restaurant for breakfast!

Overall amazing holiday- very authentic, it was like living as a local.

100% would stay again

Roberto and Violeta were very kind and friendly hosts. Roberto welcomed us at the appartment and gave us a lot of information of the city. The appartment is very good located, in the middle of the city. Everything was maximum in 15-20 min walking distance, metro was not needed. Violeta gave us a nice handmaded gift at the end of our stay. We surely recommend this nice and clean appartment to others!

This apartment was great, very local and near to all the main sights! Robert and Violeta were fantastic at showing us multiple different places to go and what sights are worth visiting. I definitely would recommend staying here and would consider returning myself. The apartment itself was very clean, the beds were comfortable and we were equipped with everything we needed. Robert and Violeta are lovely hosts and thanks for having us!

Violeta and Robert were incredibly warm and friendly; taking the time to provide us with lots suggestions on places to visit. The apartment is well located, close to so many good restaurants and bars and a short walk to all of the major sightseeing attractions.

Violeta & Robert are great hosts & were extremely helpful during our stay in Budapest. They were quick to answer any of our questions and gave us some great advice about where to go. They were great allowing us to stay longer than the check out time as we had a later flight. 
They were both the most thoughtful hosts, giving me a little birthday present. I would recommend their apartment to anybody. It was lovely, clean & well equipped & in a great location. 

The apartment was very clean and inside a quiet courtyard. The kitchen was equipped with everything if you want to save on eating out and there are multiple supermarkets just around the corner. The bathroom was very nice as it was the bed. The interior is quite different from everything we've been to so it was exciting to stay in it. 
It's a walking distance from most major sights and landmarks. For some of the more distant, the metro is just two blocks away.

Robert was very kind and helpful. He explained and gave us tips for most of our stay.

I highly recommend it and will probably come back :)

We had the best time in this apartment!

Violeta and Robert are wonderful hosts that really care about your experience being top notch. We were greeted with a warm welcome and all the information we could dream of. They gifted us a map and suggested lots of places to visit, restaurants, thermal baths, etc.

The apartment is in the very heart of Budapest: everything is in walking distance, and you can feel the city vibrate around you. It is cozy and intimate, well-equipped and very modern.

Budapest was beautiful and the weather was so nice! We'll come back one day for sure. Thanks for everything!

We have just returned from our short trip to Budapest which is possibly the most fun and interesting city we have visited to date. The trip was made even better by our stay in this lovely apartment, right in the centre of Budaest in the Jewish district. The flat is surounded by fantastic places to eat, drink (about 10 minutes from the famous Szimpla ruin bar) and loads of street art. You are also about a 15 minute walk to both the baths and the river. The flat itself is perfect for two people, with great facilities and extras (like a coffee machine). Voileta and Robert are possibly the nicest hosts you could ask for and make you feel very welcome from the moment you get there. Thanks for a great trip! :)

Violeta and Robert ' s appartment is really perfect. The situation in Budapest is extraordinary. Moreover it s fully equiped and very clean.
I also want to thank Robert who welcomed us very late in the flat with the smile! You can book it right now ! 

We had the most wonderful stay at Robert and Violeta's place! They were extremely welcoming and friendly and took the time to show us the best places to go in Budapest. The apartment itself is spotlessly clean with everything you could need and located very conveniently for all the sights  and good bars and restaurants. Definitely recommended. Thank you for a wonderful time!!
availability: 2 nights minimum stay.From Mar 20 - Dec 31, 2017 the minimum stay is 3 nights.
review_summary:
Riva Studio is close to all the tourist landmarks and you’ll love it because of it's modern design and the vibrant location. Our flat is good for couples, solo and business travelers.
The Jewish Quarter is a great choice for travelers interested in Nightlife, Culture and Health Spas.
house_rules: Please inform Riva Studio of your expected arrival time in advance. You can use the message box when booking, or contact the property directly using the contact details provided. No Smoking in the Room please. Pets are allowed on request. This point is particularly important: Please pay respect to other residents of the house. Stay away from any behavior that can disturb any residents particularly after 10 p.m. You will find plenty of places to party around. :)
description:
Riva Studio is close to all the tourist landmarks and you’ll love it because of it's modern design and the vibrant location. Our flat is good for couples, solo and business travelers.
The Jewish Quarter is a great choice for travelers interested in Nightlife, Culture and Health Spas.

Riva Studio is located in a vibrant and cultural district, right in the heart of beautiful Budapest. The apartment has a fresh, modern design and is fully equipped with: towels, air conditioner, oven, microwave oven, coffee machine (coffee included), flat screen TV plus cable, free Wifi.
It is good to know that the height of the loft is 140cm (5 feet).

We can help our guests with useful information about what sites to visit, taxi information or airport transfer.

The Jewish quarter is renown for the many coffee shops, bars and terraces where you can chill in the mornings or have a good time in the evenings.

The flat is very close to all kind of public transportation (metro, bus, trolley, tram). 
Parking building is across the street and it costs 12 euros per day.

reviews_text:
Lovely apartment in a brilliant location on the Buda side of the city. Communication was outstanding and it couldn't have been easier to check in and out. Highly recommend for a city-break.

The apartment is very beautifully furnished, very clean and cozy with a large comfortable bed.  It's located in a great place for the castle, 5-10 mins walk to the metro for the other side of the river and a great vegan cafe nearby which we loved. We were unlucky that noisey building works were going on next door for 3 days of our stay but we understand this is out of the control of the owner. The actual apartment is really wonderful. We loved the whistling kettle too! 

Great place, with chic interior. Super location if you want to be on Buda. Very close to everything. 
As this is an old mansion block - from what I assume the last last century - and faces the inner courtyard, it is slightly colder in the apartment than I'd like it to be but easy to control the heating with the thermostat. (Also no radiator in the bedroom area if you close the partition doors)
Super stay overall.

The apartment was in the perfect location, tucked away on a quiet side street but walkable to the city and all major tourist locations. Overall it was an enjoyable stay, access to the building was very easy which made our arrival and departure time flexible and Noemi was quick to communicate.  Though there were a couple of negatives - there was construction happening in the apartment next door which was incredibly loud, this started around 8am every morning so we unable to sleep in. The shower also had poor drainage which caused minor flooding in the bathroom. Other than that we had a good time! 

Perfect beautifull quite and peacefull

Very nice apartment. Noemi was helpful and easy to contact on the phone.

Really enjoyed our stay here.

I loved Noemi's place especially the location. I love the sunrises and this apartment is close to the top of the  Buda hills from where you have the best view over Budapest and catching the best sunrises ever. The apartment is cozy, clean, has everything you need for a short gateway. Next is a charming place where you can eat or have a coffee and also a small friendly grocery shop where you can find to buy all needed to eat, drink. The place is also a walking distance to the chain bridge and other touristic venues, I loved my staying her and highly recommended.

The location was amazing and everything went as smoothly as we could have hoped for! We walked to all of the major historic places in both sides of the city from the apartment, even the City Park, Margaret Island, and the Citadella. 

Excellent appartment, good place

Really nice flat, clean and cosy. Highly recommended!
review_summary: In the heart of the city, just below the walls of the imposing castle district lies this charming and welcoming apartment. Near the castle and the centre alike, you will be minutes away on foot from Budapest's cultural sights and vibrant nightlife.
house_rules:
1. This is a non-smoking unit. 
2. Pets are not permitted. 
3. Do not throw anything in the toilet besides normal use (e.g.: no food,  paper towels, disposable dipers..etc).
4. Inclusive fees - Rates include a one-time linen-towel setup. 
5. Linens and bath towels are included in the unit, daily maid service is not included in the rental rate, however it is available at an additional rate. 
6. It is expected that guests maintain quiet hours after 22h. Your reservation only authorizes you and your travel partner(s) as confirmed in your reservation booking. 
For any unanswered questions please just contact me directly.
description:
In the heart of the city, just below the walls of the imposing castle district lies this charming and welcoming apartment. Near the castle and the centre alike, you will be minutes away on foot from Budapest's cultural sights and vibrant nightlife.

Looking for a quiet haven in the middle of Budapest's oldest and most historic neighborhood, but within the centre of the city? Then book now!
My new completely refurbished apartment is located on the 1st floor in a historic 19th century castle district home. It has a small balcony facing a quite courtyard.
Enjoy being in the heart of Budapest surrounded by markets, shops, bars and restaurants while relishing in peace and tranquility. Superb access to public transport facilities and within short walking distance to Budapest Central area.
My home has a bright living room, connected with fully equipped kitchen. One bedroom with queen sized is separated with a window wall, as visible on the pictures. I have an extra mattress in case needed.
Wifi is available, naturally. As fresh towels and linens are also included in the price.

I have permission to run airbnb, however in Hungary to be able to provide breakfast or any kind of food, beverages or alcohol requires an extended permission and different taxation has to be applied. 
Therefore please expect that no breakfast or any food/ drink is prepared in the apartment for this reason.

Please send me your planned date of arrival and departure. Early check-in and late check-out is rarely possible because of new guests arrival on the same day. Unfortunately I cannot provide luggage drop-off possibility. I have a space where it is possible but I cannot take responsibility as it is not a locked space. There are luggage drop off possibilities at the big train stations like Nyugati and Keleti pályaudvar for 1,50 EUR / day.

CHECK-IN, CHECK-OUT

For check-in I have a key lock outside the building. It is a black box mounted on the wall to the left of my door. The keys will be in there. So whenever you arrive you can check-in from 13.00. Check-out is the same, you just have to put back the key in the lock box. Check-out time is 10.30.

reviews_text:
The host canceled this reservation 23 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Niki's place was lovely. The kitchen was fully equipped and it was so nice to have a private living area in the bedroom. The room was light and airy and everything in it was as clean and nice as new. I would definitely stay there again if I'm ever back in Budapest!
review_summary:
My place is an amazing newly refurbished 3 bedroom apartment located on the 1st floor in Kiraly utca.

The Grey Room features a double bed in a sleeping box, a cool sofa, 32" LED TV, modern interiors, free Wifi.

Shared facilities:
- fully equipped kitchen (incl. ice in freezer)
- bathroom & WC 

Short walk to House of Terror,  Gozsdu Udvar, Ruin Bars. 

You’ll love my place because of the comfy bed, the kitchen, the coziness, the high ceilings and bc its trendy.

Perfect for couples and friends

Perfect for couples and friends

My place is a fantastic newly refurbished three bedroom apartment. In addition to this I have a separate self contained studio accessed from the same lobby and with a private entrance (listed separately). The whole place including the studio can accommodate 8 people (extra beds may be available on request at extra cost).

The main apartment has 3 separate bedrooms all with a private entrance - all rooms feature individual colour schemes. The rooms share a bathroom with a WC and also a separate WC and a fully equipped kitchen and a dining area.

The property is located on the main Kiraly utca on the first floor with street facing rooms with new double glazed windows to keep street noise to a minimum.

The property has undergone a complete makeover and contains all mod-cons which are:

-microwave
-dishwasher
-washing machine
-fully equipped Italian kitchen (kettle, toaster, coffee maker etc.)
-fridge/freezer
- modern stylish Italian and Spanish furniture and cool trendy design 
-32" LED TV
-free WiFi
-freezer compartment regularly filled with ice

Upon arrival you will receive:

-clean linen
-towels
-free bottle of local wine
-free mineral water
-post card
-tourist brochures

You will find at the property's doorstep:

-all conveniences (food stores, take away shops, ice cream etc.)
- night life is just a 10 minute walk away (Hello Baby, Gozsdu Udvar, ruin bars)
- Attractions (House of Terror, Hero's Square with all the museums is either a 15 mins walk or a quick bus ride away)
- Transport links (4-6 tram line, underground yellow tram, buses),

You’ll love my place because of the light, the comfy bed, the kitchen, the coziness, the high ceilings, trendy, newly refurbished to high standards, brand new stylish Italian and Spanish furniture, daily cleaning, clean bed linen and towels on arrival and changed every three days, close to Budapest nightlife. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, families (with kids), and big groups.

I do not live in this apartment but am only 5 mins away.

You will not be disappointed with my place - have a lovely stay :)

Sorry but the Government ask for a 4% tourist tax ;( this is payable locally when you arrive.

reviews_text:
Enjoyed staying at Eyals place! It was central to alot of places and was able to walk and get transport. So many delicious food places right around the corner.
Place was really clean and everything we needed was there. I enjoyed the stay and would recommend staying here!! Had a blast!

We couldn't have found a more perfect place for our weekend break it Budapest! This place is AMAZING! It's so close to everything - the sights, right next to the nightlife (but on a quiet side street so very peaceful), great choice of restaurants nearby and the area felt very safe.
The apartment itself is wonderful - spotlessly clean and has everything you need. The hosts were wonderful and couldn't have been more helpful - they even let us leave our bags for the day as we had a late flight. 
I couldn't recommend it highly enough and we will definitely be returning! Thank you! :)









Everything was great, the place is in a great location and the hosts are wonderfull.

Eyal is a great host with a perfect place to stay in the very center of the beautiful Budapest. There is nothing to complain or to reproach. Fast and friendly responding, nice clean light flat which is close to everything you want to see or visit. Very friendly price. Once I will travel to BUD one more time (and I hope, it will be soon) I hope that he will have free room for me once again. :) 

How about this for service? I write a message to Eyal at 3am, and at 5am he writes back and apologises for the late reply! Thanks so much to you Eyal and to Raz, also for being so understanding when I overslept and checked  out late. Thoroughly looking forward to my return around May.

bed and breakfast.... no breakfast, only bed.
anyhow, very nice apartament, quiet, and clean.
I will retourn if possible.


This was the first time using Airbnb and it perfect everything I needed was at Eyal's place and they waited for me to make sure everything was fine and up to my standard and I hope I can stay again, definitely recommend this place, next to everything right in the city! 

Eyal was very helpful and sweet during all our stay. The house is very cozy, comfortable and clean. Its very central and well communicated. We were very happy with our stay, super recommend!

It`s a great place to stay. It feels like home, and it was super clean. Meanwhile it is in the middle of the city centre, you have the luxury that the apartment is facing to a backstreet, and it`s dead quiet.Shops and public transport are in walking distance. 

The apartment looked exactly as shown in the pics. It was warm and cosy and the host was friendly and easy to communicate with. It's in a great area with lots of bars and places to eat but it also very quiet and safe. It's easy to get to from the airport on the blue metro line. Would recommend for the price and location.
review_summary:
At the best location in Budapest, NEW cozy and bright studio apartment with a balcony. 
We invite you to stay in a fully furnished and equipped place, which obligated to provide you good hospitality :) 
kitchenette with a microwave and refrigerator, coffee maker, kettle and eating utensils. The bathrooms have a shower and washing machine. 
located on the 5th floor in a modern building next to the Gozsdu udavr surrounded by hundred trendy restaurants, cafe's, shops and bars.

reviews_text:
Great location with stunning views! Thanks for hosting 

We spend 5 nights at Zsuzsa 's house and we were amazed by the view from the small terrace. The location is really exclusive, close to the Castle, the street quiet, the house clean and comfortable. On our arrival there were no electricity in the neighborhood till 4 pm, so we had to ask the host to help us with the heat, wifi and the electronic  door's key and she was very kind and helpful every time we call her. Thank you so much Zsuzsa , for the help and for the bottle of red wine that we appreciate very much. We recommend definitely this house and it's host : if you want to spend a relaxing holiday living in the center that's the place.

Amazing apartment just on the castle with incredible view and the bus station next to the building. Zsuzsa@Lili was a great hosts, they left us some spirits an juice in the frydge and the wi-fi conection was good. Evrythink clean and a lot of towels.


The view is stunning even though I was there in november. the beds are a bit hard, but other than that the room was just perfect. 

The apartment was really nice and offered a stunning view,  a nespresso machine with a few capsules (you probably have to buy more - can be bought opposite to the Opera at nespresso) It's a roof top aparment so naturally the space is a little special but works fine. for a person with bad knees it's not recommended but then again it might be better Living in the more flat pest side. The host was very helpful and answered quickly. Everything was clean and the beds where comfy. I do recommend this place and don't forget to stop by for a drink at the tiny pub close by. (URL HIDDEN)

Very nice hosts!!!

Zsuzsa is a very nice person super attentive that your stay will be a good one. Extremely responsive if you need anything ! The flat and the terasse were just amazing, while not in the city center (so no noise) but next to the castle. I would really recommend this place

Great views over Pest - the Istvan Church and the Parliament buildings which tower out of the city.  The flat has a wonderful little balcony with nice views. Well equipped kitchen and two bedrooms.  The kitchen is also the sitting room.  There is no couch so we used the balcony chairs inside when it was cool.  Easily reachable with public transit (bus 16 which runs every few minutes and stops 100 metres from the flat.  Easy and pretty walk to the Chain Bridge to cross into Pest. There is a little grocery steps away and a few restaurants although we ate on the Pest side. 

Zsuzsa was very helpful with suggestions. 

I would recommend staying here definitely.  

This is a terrific flat in the best location and with the most wonderful view. It is beautifully decorated and thoughtfully equipped with everything you need. Can't recommend highly enough.

We had a fantastic time at Zsuzsa's. Such a fantastic location, wonderful view and nice space. Would definitely stay here again!

This is a perfectly located 50 sqm apartment with 2 separated double-bed rooms and a breathtaking terrace, exceptional views to the Parliament and River Danube. It is located in the historical 1'st district just a few steps from the Fishermen's Bastion and Matthias Church. Bus 16 stops at the entrance of the house, M2 subway, shops ,banks, foodstores, churches, restaurants are in walking distance.  The apartment good for couples, business people and also for families with two children.

This is a perfectly located rooftop apartment with breathtaking views to
River Danube, Parliament, Margaret Island and the whole Pest side. Matthias
Church, Fishermen's Bastion are about 5 minute walk. The property has 2 double rooms, 1 bathroom, a kitchen and a balcony.
The apartment is equipped with a dishwasher, an electric cooking panel, a
microwave oven, fridge, equipped kitchen, cooking pots, a hairdryer, a
toaster, a kettle, satellite TV-s in both rooms and there is free WIFI. A small foodstore is 1 minutes walk. 
The apartment is located on the top 3rd floor ( no elevator). NO Pet or smoking is allowed, please use the terrace if you are a smoker.

Guest acces the whole apartment, it's only you who stay there. Flexible check-in and -out time based on availability.
Brand new furnitures and equipments.
Kitchen: dishwasher, an electric cooking panel, a microwave oven, fridge, equipped kitchen, cooking pots, a
toaster, washing-up liquid
Room: bed linen, blankets, pillows, bed clothes, 2 TV sets, ironing machine with ironing-board.
Bathroom: towels, a hairdryer, washing machine, schampoo, shower gel.

If you need assistance I'm available for you.

It is located in the historical part of Budapest, very quiet, but near to the city center.

Bus 16 right at the entrance, M2 Metro line, Batthyanyi Square, HEV H5,
Boats D11,D12,D13 are all about 15 minutes walk.

reviews_text:
Great location

We had to wait some time till host arrived and let us in but otherwise everything was perfect, flat was nice and clean.

Cosy and comfortable apartment with great location - walking distance to everything what Budapest has best. 

What this apartment lacks in terms of charm or personality, it makes up for in location. Minutes from the Grand Central Market (great for cheap lunch options + fresh produce!) and walking distance to the Jewish Quarter, Gellert baths, Gerbeaud Cafe, opera house, etc. It's on the main pedestrian shopping street, which meant it was nice and quiet at night, though, of course, very touristy. 

The apartment itself was spotlessly clean but a bit sparse (read: a few pieces of Ikea furniture). The photos make the flat look a bit more decorated than it actually is. Definitely not a space to hang out in, though thankfully there are plenty of cafes for that. 

For a depths of winter visit, it was plenty warm and even edged a little too warm at night (the central heating is not adjustable). There were a few helpful touches, including plenty of towels and a hair dryer, but I didn't use the mini-kitchen at all as it was only minimally equipped.

If you want to spend most of the day out exploring the city, this is a good option for a single traveller. 

Wszyscy pracownicy byli bardzo mili. Zostaliśmy zaprowadzeni na miejsce. Apartament bardzo dobrze wyposażony, czysty, w centrum Budapesztu. W opisie było podane, że pracownicy mówią tylko w angielskim i węgierskim, ale pracuje tam przemiła Pani mówiąca bardzo dobrze po niemiecku, chyba ma a imię Susanne. Udzieliła mi różnych dodatkowych informacji dot połączeń do Szentendre. Jeśli pojedziemy następnym razem do Budapesztu, na pewno skorzystam również z usług tego samego gospodarza:)
review_summary:
Renovated in 2016 October
Hi5 Apartments 33 is located in the District 5 district of Budapest. It is the ideal location for a holiday in the city. 
You've got everything: relatively close to center and away from the noise.
house_rules:
Guests should give their exact arrival time and meet the host (or his delegate) at check-in. There is no reception!!
Attention regarding smokers: Smoking inside the apartment strictly prohibited. Please use the sidewalk to go for a smoke. Thank you for your understanding! 
The heating has been properly set-up before you come in, and the flat is very well insulated, so please do not modify the heating sensor, it will be warm enough for you! 
Please keep noise levels down after 22:00.
There are house trash bins in the entrance corridor if you would like to remove excess rubbish from the apartment.
Housekeeping during your stay available upon request.
description:
Renovated in 2016 October
Hi5 Apartments 33 is located in the District 5 district of Budapest. It is the ideal location for a holiday in the city. 
You've got everything: relatively close to center and away from the noise.

This cozy 30 m² studio apartment is wonderfully located in the heart of the 5th district (the most central district of the city). You are on the famous Váci Street, the main fashion shopping street in Budapest, with souvenir stores and breath-taking architecture. The Central Market Hall is 5 minutes away, the famous St. Stephen's Basilika and Andrássy Avenue (the Hungarian "Champs Elysées”) is about 15 minutes, the Danube and the Elizabeth Bridge are a few blocks away, the famous Vörösmarty Square (where the Christmas market takes place) is about 10 minutes. This is the best location you could possibly get in Budapest. You have a great view of Gellért Hill from the studio. 

Dorottya Apartment 17 is also in this building.

The building is a classic post-War modernist residential house, typical of downtown Budapest with an interior courtyard and hanging corridors. The neighborhood is safe with foot traffic, strong security, locked gates after 10pm, and a coded entry door. The apartment is well-lit from the windows facing Váci Street.

Helpful and cheerful hosts who are eager to help with anything.

The neighbourhood is trendy and lively, crowded with bars, cafés, shops, supermarkets, and public gardens. There is a large supermarket down the street. Restaurants and confectionaries, such as the famous Gerbaud are a few blocks away. The Hungarian National Gallery is 5 minutes away. Public transportation (subway, trams, and buses) leave directly from the Ferenciek Square, and there are bicycle rental stations nearby. The airport shuttle arrives/departs straight from the square as well. We will give you suggestions of the best places to make the most of your stay, whether you want to eat, drink, have a coffee, or party! 

Have a look at the guide on this page, it references the main attractions in the city center around the apartment.

Subway: Ferenciek Tere (M3 subway line)
Trams: Line 2 (Runs adjacent to Danube), Line 47, 49 at Central Market
Railway Stations: 3 stops by metro from Nyugati Railway Station
Buses: Buses to the castle area, Hop-On Hop-Off buses

We have transfer service from and to the airport / train station / bus station. The prices are below:

From the airport: EUR 25 / car up to 4 people
To the airport: EUR 22 / car up to 4 people
From the train / bus station: EUR 18 / car up to 4 people
To the train / bus station: EUR 15 /car up to 4 people

In this case we will need you flight / train / bus number and your arrival time to Budapest. Our driver will be at the required time inside the terminal with your name.

availability: On Fridays and Saturdays the minimum stay is 2 nights.
review_summary:
Our design studio is very good located! By walk you can reach almost all of the sights, and very good, famous areas with great bars, restaurants, night clubs, ruin pubs and baths. Very close you can find all kind of public transport.

name of apartment: CozyYellowCube
description:
Our design studio is very good located! By walk you can reach almost all of the sights, and very good, famous areas with great bars, restaurants, night clubs, ruin pubs and baths. Very close you can find all kind of public transport.

name of apartment: CozyYellowCube

Here you will find a very friendly, cosy in a traditional, authentic building block centraly located in Budapest 6th district. The flat is situated on the 2nd floor accessible by lift or foot via stairs at the opposite of the main entrance accross the internal balcony yard where smoking is allowed. Steppin out to the street you will be at the heart of a very vibrant day and night life 4 minutes away from the underground.

Our Team offers you special services like
| airport or other transfers,
| breakfast and food service,
| thematic programs,
| car and bike hire and
| non-stop customer service.

You can call us anytime you need help or instructions, we are available all day long.

Not only you will be in the very center of the city within close walking distance of almost all tourist attractions and the river Danube. You will also be in the heart of the Old Jewish District that one of the most unique and currently the hippest neighborhood of Budapest. Home to the world famous ruin bars and other amazing places, including the best bars, restaurants and clubs in town.

Almost all major tourist attractions are within close walking distance (the Gozsdu court, Dohany Street Synagogue, Europe's biggest and the World 2nd biggest synagogue and the National Museum is literally a five minute walk for instance).

Should you want to venture further the area is close to a major public transportation with connection to all subway lines and other major bus and tram lines. Making sure you get even the furthest parts of Budapest fairly quickly.

::TRAM
47 | 49 name of station: "Deák Ferenc tér"
4 | 6 name of station: "Király utca"

::METRO
M1 - name of station: "Opera"
M3 | M4 - name of station: "Deák Ferenc tér"


------------------------------------------
::PARKING - on the street
workdays: 440 HUF/hour between 8am and 20:00pm after free
weekend: free

::PARKING - parking house
every day: 5500 HUF/day.

reviews_text:
Felt great again! Third time staying at Judit's and counting. Really special place

Judiit's apartment is a happy place in Budapest ! After a busy day in Budapest I would kick back on the comfy couch and enjoy the funky decor of the living room . Great, little terrace as well , if you are coming in the warmer months. The location is so good,  just a bit off the beaten path but very close to everything as well . Does not have a full kitchen, but Judit  will update you on everything  the kitchen does have , including fridge ,coffee maker and utensils. She is an EXCELLENT hostess and always available to your needs. Maybe one drawback would be not the the most comfortable bed according to American standards but perfectly adequate for my two weeks stay . ( the couch also pulls out into a sleeper ) 

Great again. Second stay, will come back

Judit was very nice and welcoming persons, and nice to speak with our.
It was an absolute pleasure staying in your flat. I am surely come back.
A great location, clean, organised and comfortable, good atmosphere, quiet, all ok. 


We had a great experience staying in Judit's apartment. 
It's in a great location! Very central and convenient to catch any public transport.
The apartment has a very tasteful interior, and felt quite comfortable. Even though it only has sofa bed, it was surprisingly pleasant to sleep on.
Judit was a great hostess, gave us lots of useful recommendations and tips for our traveling.
If you want to try out an insightful local experience in Budapest, we would highly recommending her charming apartment. 
Ying & Jerry 


I had a two weeks stay at Judit, in a very quiet area and close to the stunning castle view. I really enjoyed the stay and Judit was a great host. 

Great location with very accommodating hosts. The Budapest Castle district is an amazing area for anyone. Romantic, quiet, with direct transportation to the party district (Bus 16 stops on the corner, or you can jump on almost anything from the square 2 minutes away). Public transportation runs all night. Make sure that you try the little confectionery down the street.

Our stay at Judith apartment was very pleasant.  We were welcomed by her son Boldizsar. He assisted us throughout the whole trip and it was very nice to have such a support.  The apartment itself is very well designed and has everything you may need through a 2wk stay.  (if not Judith will kindly help).  Also we enjoyed places that Judith recommended to us. Riso restaurant was really good. One of the things that we enjoyed a lot is the location - really near the Buda castel and still close to metro and easy to travel everywhere.  Mammut shopping center was a big help as well (grocery is there).  We would really recommend everyone to stay at Judith place. It's one of the best.

We enjoyed our stay in Judit's well decorated and funky apartment.  She and her son were very welcoming!  The location is great - close to the old city core, and a major public transportation station. Very good value.  

I've been living in Budapest and now I do returning to the city as a visitor. I choosed Judit's place because I'm convinced this location is among the best around. It's very relaxed, safe and at the same time is very near of the main 24 hours operating traffic hub of Buda side. Frankly speaking, there are many places under the Castle Hill, but only this certain area (the Vienna Gate neighborhood) combines these two essentials.  The apartment itself is a secret shelter, quiet, convenient and tastefully designed as shown in the pictures. Cool on sommer heat, and there is a possibility for smoking outside on the backyard garden. The pull out sofa provides a surprisingly good quality of sleep and the Castle Walkway is a priceless experience of Budapest city.I would recommend anyone who is planning to stay calm.
availability: The minimum night stay for this listing varies.
review_summary: Castle Hill is one of the most beautiful part of the city. The apartment is literally  3 minutes from the entranyce and also 3 minutes from the main traffic hub. Splendid but central.
house_rules: - Please note it is a residential area.
description:
Castle Hill is one of the most beautiful part of the city. The apartment is literally  3 minutes from the entranyce and also 3 minutes from the main traffic hub. Splendid but central.

This home is located next door to our main place and now also serves as a guest home for our friends. We just finished its refurbishment: it has a separate smaller bedroom and a large living room, plus a dining area, a basic kitchenette for breakfast, a bathroom and a patio.

The interior is a contemporary mixture of the collectibles of the Hungarian recent past, vintage style, and high-quality design items. It serves as a private Home Gallery as well - with Hungarian artist's original works.

Buda Castle area is a special blend in the city: a green residential area, a lively historical place and a well located urban homestay. The one-way street we settled in is very quiet, the most beautiful walkway and breathtaking panoramic view of the city are just right above us in 3 minutes walking distance.
 
The apartment itself located in a Bauhaus building, on the ground floor. That’s why it has a garden connection through the all window wall: it is very pleasant to sit outside, listen to the birds and hedgehogs and have some fresh air especially in the morning with a cup of coffee.

Budapest is not a big city: you can reach the famous cosmopolitan downtown "ruin pubs" area in 15 minutes by bus or tram or subway. Or you can simply walk through the castle hill down to the Danube under the trees.
Our place luckily doesn't lie on the main mass tourist routes but close enough to have a splendid evening walk in the at this unique part of the city when the tour buses left it.

reviews_text:
The apartment was as exactly as described and shown on the pictures and everything was totally clean. 
The location of the apartment is very good as it is only a few train stations from the city center. I even walked there by foot. :) 
Also the way from the airport to the apartment is very easy and takes about 30-40 minutes.
The communication with Kitty was perfect, she gives very good hints of what to do in Budapest and replies super fast to messages. 
Thank you so much for the perfect hospitality! 

It was excellent. Totally excellent.

Wonderful flat, quite near to Danube, some lovely coffee places in the neighborhood and a really kind host Kitti. We enjoyed our stay!!

Kitti is a great host, even though we never met. She was always quick to respond and supplied us not just with a smooth arrival (very late at night), but also gave good recommendations and e.g. helped us where to find lockers for our suitcases in the south of Budapest (go to Nepliget station). The place is clean, comfy and the location is great to explore the city! Thanks a lot again, Kitti!

Kitti is a great host, she was really communicative prior to our arrival and was there to meet us when we arrived. She had even prepared a list of all her and Viktor's favourite places to eat in the city and things to see and do as well- which was really helpful. 

There were 3 of us and we slept comfortably, two on the bed upstairs and one on the sofa bed downstairs. The kitchen was the most well-equipped kitchen I've ever seen in an Airbnb so if you wanted to stay in and make your own meals you could easily do so. 

The apartment is about a 30 minute walk to all the main tourist spots but there are plenty of more local spots on the way and you can take the metro into the centre of town in about 10 minutes. We walked everywhere but a 72hr ticket should you want to catch the metro, tram or bus costs as little as £10 for all 3! 

We would definitely recommend staying here and will certainly be back should we ever come back to Budapest. Thank you Kitti! 

Great place and Kitti is a really nice host. Thank you very much!

Myself and my partner stayed in this lovely apartment for 3 nights! Although I never got the pleasure of meeting Kitti she was only a text message away and was always very quick to respond and always helpful. The apartment is located in a perfect area very central to everything. The apartment was perfect and immaculate upon arrival we couldn't be happier! Kitti left a list of places to visit , of which we visited most and were very pleased. We definitely  recommend Szimpla Kert which is a funky cool pub, the Doblo wine bar is another must if you visit , and also the Vintage Garden (restaurant) they are all located very close to each other. Overall we are extremely happy with our stay here and would definitely recommend the apartment to anyone! 

Lovely apartment, very nice decor. Easy walking distance to the Parliament building and a huge shopping centre. Despite a little problem with a leak from the upstairs flat, Kitti was fantastic and very communicative. Gave us a discount for the issue and let us stay late to accommodate our later flight. Great value, would stay again

Thanks for having us and for all the helpful recommendations and good communication Kitti, the flat was very conveniently located and clean. 

Beautiful flat .!! Motto was so friendly and always answer to our questions... I recommend 1000%  thanks for all kitti and Victor !!
availability: 3 nights minimum stay.From Dec 10, 2016 - Jan 31, 2017 the minimum stay is 2 nights.
review_summary: Quiet neighborhood, unique, own designed flat.
description:
Quiet neighborhood, unique, own designed flat.

~~What we Offer~~

- WiFi
