reviews_text:
Generally a very nice apartment. Absolute no problems through our stay, and the place was clean and cosy. 

Good location to choose  in Budapest ,the landlord is great ,thank you very much.

It was a great appartement at a great location. the hostess was very kind and welcome. subway was very close and the supermarket is just around the corner. if you want a good and cheap location deffinetly go here!!!

Nice, small and practical apartment. Nice and clean and pleasant owners. Would visit again! 

Agnes was so nice and very helpful with recommendations and directions, plus very quick to respond! The apartment was really cute and was well located. The pictures show the space well. Would definitely recommend this apartment to anyone staying in Budapest! Thanks, Agnes!

We had a very nice stay in this supersweet apartment. Everything was as described and Agnes was very nice and helpful. 
I would definitely stay there again!

It was a good stay! The area is awesome and we house perfec for holidays. Thanks for all ;) 

I had a lovely stay in Agnes' apartment. The place is incredibly central and close to a metro and main train station. The flat itself is warm and comfortable. When I first arrived, Agnes was very helpful -- waiting when my flight was delayed and then spending time recommending places to visit. A great place to spend time in a beautiful city! Thanks again, Agnes.

First of all Agnes is such a great host! She is very sweet and the communication with her was good. The apartment is cute and big enough. The location is nice you can walk most things within 10 min. I had a perfect stay thanks to Agnes:) I reccomend this place for sure!
Love from Holland.

Host's son was waiting for me for check in and very kind.
The room was just same as the pictures on the web.
Many attractions was located near the flat. It was nice experience.
review_summary: I love my flat and if you choose me, you will get to know my style and my soul. Almost everything in the flat was created or renovated by me. I love DIY staffs, giving a second chance to old, used things. You are warmly welcome !
house_rules:
1. We have no reception desk, the key is given at a pre-arranged time. The apartment can be occupied on the day of the arrival from 2PM and should be left before 10AM on the day of departure. 
2. We provide bedlinen and 2 towels (50x100cm and 70x140cm)/guest. 
3. We kindly ask all our guest to fill in our registration card upon arrival. 
4. Please return all the keys received as agreed previously at the handover. 
5. Please always lock the doors to your apartment, i.e. corridor door, the apartment door. In case any apartment key would be lost you should inform us immediately; the necessary lock and key changes will be charged to you. 
6. The apartment can be used only by our checked-in guests. 
7. Please leave the apartment in the same general condition as you found it on arrival. Any damage caused during your stay must be compensated by you. Please respect the cleanliness. 
8. Should you face any problem with the apartment while your stay, please inform us immediately. 
9. We accept no responsibility for your valuables left in the apartment. 
10. At the check out please wash any used dishes and remove any rubbish, leaving the apartment in the same condition as you occupied it. 
11. Pets are not allowed in the apartment.
12. Smoking in the apartment is strictly forbidden.
13. This point is particularly important and no concessions will be made: Please pay respect to other residents of the house. Please close the doors carefully and silently, stay away from any behaviour that can disturb any residents particularly after 10PM. We reserve the right to cancel the service immediately with keeping the whole fee of the rental if we receive any valid complaints from other residents of the house. 
14. We do not accept reservations of people who rent the apartments for illegal activities or to invite escorts during the stay.
15. Strictly NO GUESTS , please!
description:
I love my flat and if you choose me, you will get to know my style and my soul. Almost everything in the flat was created or renovated by me. I love DIY staffs, giving a second chance to old, used things. You are warmly welcome !

You can use the entire flat.
Please kindly note, that in the 16m2 big room there is a comfortable sofa bed for 2 people, and  if it is necessary I can put in one extra bed too.

If you need any help or need any information during your stay, you can either reach me via messenger, via mobile phone, or you can just ring at the second door, when I am living with my family. :)

Although my flat is located in the city center of Budapest, but in a quite quite part of it, close to the Heroes' square, the Opera House to lots of museums, cafés, restaurants, shops etc. and last but not least it's just withing 15 minutes walking distance to the milling night crowds ( ruin pubs ) in the 6th, 7th district.

The flat has a very good access to everywhere in Budapest. The tram Nr. 4,6 ( going on the main boulevard ) is just a few minutes walk ( Oktogon or Nyugati station ), the Millenium undergrand ( Vörösmarty station ) is at the second corner from here, the Metro line nr.3  ( Nyugati  station ) at the Nyugati Railway Station is also 10 minues walk from the flat. And of course there are further bus and trolley-bus lines in the neighborhood.
If you come from the Airport, there are the following possibilities to find me: 
1, Catch a taxi .... price. ca. between HUF (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) / transfer
The certified taxi cars are all yellow, and they mostly accept also credit card.
City Taxi / +(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)
Főtaxi / +(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)
TaxiPlus / +(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) Taxi / +(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN), By public transportation...
From 4:00 a.m. to 11:00 p.m., bus number 200E commutes between Terminal 2 and the Kőbánya-Kispest metro terminal (metro line M3), via the Ferihegy train station(trains to the Nyugati railway station in Budapest). From here the flat is within 10 minutes walk.
From 11:00 p.m.to 1:00 a.m. bus 200E, from 1:00 a.m. to 4:00 a.m. night bus number 900 operates between Budapest Airport Terminal 2 and the South Pest bus garage. It is possible to change to night buses 950 and 950A, operating to the inner city.

Tickets:
Tickets for public transportation priced 350 HUF are available at the airport from BKK at its customer service points, from the post office, the newsagents (Relay) and from ticket machines at the bus stop. It is also possible to purchase a ticket from the bus driver for 450 HUF.

The post office is located on the mezzanine level of Terminal 2A, where 24 and 72-hour, weekly and monthly travel passes for Budapest public transport are also available. 
Newsagents only sell single tickets, 10-piece ticket booklets and short section tickets.
 At the Tourist Information – Budapest Info Point counters located on the arrivals levels of Terminals 2A and 2B, 24, 48 and 72-hour Budapest Cards are also available, which, in addition to numerous discounts, offer unlimited use of public transportation during the period of validity. For more information, please visit (URL HIDDEN)
3, By train...
The closest train station to Budapest Airport Terminal 2 is Ferihegy, with trains operating to and from the Nyugati railway station in Budapest. Nearly 100 trains per day, including InterCity services, provide easy access to and from the city in less than half an hour, for a few hundred HUF.
From the Ferihegy train station, Terminal 2 is accessible by bus number 200E during the daytime and with night bus number 900 at night time.

Tickets 
Train tickets are not available for purchase at Terminal 2. However, trains operating between the Ferihegy train station and the Nyugati railway station may be used with Budapest travel cards, so the 24 and 72-hour, weekly and monthly travel passes for Budapest public transport available at the  post office on the mezzanine level of Terminal 2A are also valid for these services.

Hungarian state railway company MÁV operates a domestic ticket office at the Ferihegy train station every day from 6:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. In addition, train tickets can also be purchased from the ticket machines located on the platforms. Tickets for destinations not shown on the ticket machines and supplementary tickets for premium category trains are available from the conductor on board the trains, without a surcharge.

If you come by car, please note that during weekdays ( Mon.- Fri. ) parking fee must be paid at the parking automat, between 08.00am - 6.00p.m.
In the house there is a quite big food store ( Coop ) and Tobacconist's shop. There are also small shops in the nearby, which are open till late evening ( or non-stop ) and even on Sundays, when almost every shops are closed.

reviews_text:
Andrea was very helpful at all times. She gave me some advise before my arrival and stayed in touch with me during my stay. I really appreciated her flexiblity to my needs. Her flat is very ckean and cosy and it is very well connected to the centre. I will definitely recommend her flat.


Andrea was a perfect host, communicate with her was easy, she helped us with everything. The flat is comfortable and perfectly located. I highly recommend her for an unforgettable experience in Budapest!

Apartament is great located near to metro station and some attractions  for example parliament. Flat is exactly the same like in the pictures. Andrea is very helpful and kind person. She gave us very useful tips. I definitely recommend that place. 

Andreas apartment was perfect. Location was extremely good being close to many bars and restaurants. The beds were comfortable, the shower very warm and powerful. 

Andrea was a truly excellent host. Communication was prompt and contained very useful and clear information. She was extremely generous with us and happy to offer local advice. We followed her recommendation and had an excellent dinner at Menza. 

Thank you Andrea! 

Everything was good when we lived in Andrea's apartment. Good location, cozy apartment and excellent host. Highly recommend!

Andrea is very welcoming, helpful, friendly and accomodating. She really explained everything to us. The apartment is cozy, well located and clean. Perfect for a pleasant stay in this beautiful city.

The perfect host! Really nice location, cute little flat, perfect for a couple. Andrea helps you with whatever you need. I highly recommend this place!

Nice little place, in a great location. Andrea was a very welcoming, gave us a great introduction to Budapest, listing interesting things and places nearby. Very communicative and helpful. Ideal place for exploring Budapest.

Great apartment, with a great host.
Andrea was very nice and her flat has everything you need for a short trip to Budapest! 

Place was really amazing as same as Andrea!! Thank You for everything
review_summary:
Hi everyone! 
Enjoy your stay right in the heart of the city and really be a part of it! 
With dream location next to Andrassy Avenue and the Opera.
description:
Hi everyone! 

Enjoy your stay right in the heart of the city and really be a part of it! 

With dream location next to Andrassy Avenue and the Opera.

My stunning 30 m2 apartment is ideal for couples and friends. 

Up to 2 persons could sleep in the mezzanine bed (160x200 cm) and there is an extra foldable IKEA Ektorp sofa in the living room. Sleeping area is 140x200 cm on the sofa, very comfortable too. I think the apartment is ideal for three persons, there is room for +1 person if you don't mind the size of the apartment. 

All beds, sofas, matraces are of high quality from IKEA, give a cool place to have a rest after a busy day in Budapest.

The streets around the apartment are full of very nice restaurants, coffee shops, bars and terraces (Andrássy st, Hajós st, Mozsár st, Nagymező st). 

Just renewed, the apartment has all you can ask to enjoy your stay. 

Situated in the first floor with a nice living room with cable TV, wi-fi, a mezzanine bedroom for two, a bathroom with walk in shower. An open concept kitchen featuring all appliances: induction stove, microwave, fridge and all the necessary utensils (dishes, glasses, cups ,...), Nespresso coffee machine with capsules, ... and if any item is missing, I can provide it.

You have access to everything my apartment has to offer.

-wireless internet

-hair drier

-fresh linens and bath towels are provided to guests upon check-in. 

Also extra towels and linens.

I am happy to provide you with information related to visiting the main attractions of the city, transportation, as well as tour advice, recommendations for restaurants or products to taste, etc... from a local point of view! 

I am available over e-mail and phone. I am usually in town and will meet you personally during check-in. It makes you available to ask questions.

Should you have any special requests, please don't hesitate to ask!

The neighborhood is one of the best places to get to know Budapest. Most of the city tourist attractions are within walking distance. It is an area with a great atmosphere with a lot of lovely restaurants, bars, terraces and clubs. In any season, anytime there are people on the street.

What's nearby? You can find all the wonders of Budapest in walking distance!

Also easy to reach with all types of public transport. The historical underground station (yellow line Nr1) is 2 minute walk from the apartment at Oktogon.

Some examples to feel the distances: 

Basilica is in the end of this street - 6 minutes

Opera House - 3 min walk 

Deák square - metro hub - 10 min walk 

Andrassy street with designer shops - 2 min walk

"Ruin pubs" like the famous Instant at Nagymenző street - 2 min walk 

Széchenyi Bath - 10 min by M1

Gellért bath- 10 min by tram 

Parliament - 10 min walk

If you have any questions, let me know. Have a great trip!

How to get there from the airport:

With public transportation bus Nr 200E stops at the airport. Bus number 200E goes from the airport to a metro station called Kőbánya-Kispest metro terminal (metro blue). With metro blue you can reach the city center ( go to Deák Ferenc tér) than change to metro yellow (M1) and go to Octogon (3 stops). Then 3 min walk to the apartment.

You can also go with airport minibus, costs could be 15EUR/person. You can book a shuffle here

(URL HIDDEN)

Parking:

You can find a parking place at the street, hourly fees are HUF 440 between 8am-8pm.. Opposite my apartment there is a 4*Hotel Bliss, their private parking garage can be used too, it costs HUF 390/hour daytime and HUF 160/hour during the weekend, fees are capped at HUF 4500/day.

reviews_text:
Great room, great host and great location! Couldn't ask for anything more.

I really enjoyed Szilvia's place. Quite neighborhood with many good places to eat close by. Easy access to public transportation too. Very warm and inviting home, grateful that I had a couple of nights to stay. 

I recommend 

Very good experience.
I recommend.

I really loved to stay in this apartment. Szilvia and her boyfriend helped me wherever I needed it. They also gave me information about the neighborhood, where I could go for dinner, shopping and beauty. I could use everything in the place and feel like home. I didn't even close my room because I felt so welcomed and comfortable. For that reason, thank you so much for your cosy room in Budapest. Puszi 

Szilvia's apartment was clean and bright and quiet! Perfect for my three night stay. I would highly recommend it to anyone who is just looking for a comfortable room to sleep in after a long day of walking around. Thanks Szilvia!

The hosts were helpful and pleasant. The room was comfortable and clean. I can recommend it.

The flat is very nice, clean and well located. Szilvia and her husband are very kind and help me in everything that I needed it ;) For sure I will go back!!!

Szilvia was good to me and wonderful woman. That room was very clean and great, bathroom too! Apartment located near from the metro station, tram and bus. And near to big market and shopping center. so comfortable. I had a great time in Budapest. Thanks to szilvia and her husband :)


Szylvia and her husband are great hosts, well organised, very friendly and helpful.The apartment is very clean. The room nice. The location is good with a mall nearby and metro and tramway not far. I can highly recommend this place. When I will return to budapest I would like to stay again with them.
review_summary: This private room accommodates 1 person. The room is very clean and close to Corvin shopping mall. This is in the center of Budapest. Metro walking distance 2 minutes.
house_rules:
Smoking inside the apartment not allowed. Only outside on the balcony.
Please don't walk with shoes in the apartment. I have slippers available for free.
Pets not allowed.
Don't bring in uninvited people in the apartment and room. Please ask for permission first.
Turn off the airconditioning when you leave the room.
Don't run the airconditioning when you have the window or door open.
When you finished in the shower, please make sure that you don't leave anything behind.
If you come home in the night, please try to get in as quiet as possible.
Don't party in the room/apartment.
Turn off the light when you leave the room.
description:
This private room accommodates 1 person. The room is very clean and close to Corvin shopping mall. This is in the center of Budapest. Metro walking distance 2 minutes.

This is a private room in an apartment. It has 1 bed for 1 person only. The room is very clear and sunny.

Guest can make use of the 2 toilets available in the apartment, can use the kitchen and the shower.

The room is very close to metro line 3 (Corvin Negyed). You can also use the tram 4 or 6. from there it is 2 to 3 minutes walking distance.

reviews_text:
We had a great time in Aron's apartment! I never met him but it wasn't a big problem because he left a lock in which we could find the keys: Aron is very kind but not so present. The apartment is good but a bit dirty. 

Aron is great host he is kind and very helpful. i love the house and the location 

It was a very nice and clean apartment, a nice old stairwell in the apt.building. Great location, everything was easy to find. Aron is a really helpful and generous host. We were glad to have chosen this apt. 

Really good place, clean and nice appartement. 
We had a great time there. I recommande Aaron's appartement.

Aron is a great host. All was perfect during our stay!!

The flat is located very well in the city center. It's perfect for city trips. It's quiet and comfortable.

Nice apartment in central Budapest, with walking distance from everything. I guess the host does not live there, so the place has an ambiance of an apartment hotel and not someones home, but that's really no big issue. Other than it was perfect. 

The apartment is in a nice location. It is quiet and spacious, is well equipped for longer stays. It is close to many restaurants and bars, and even though it could have been closer to the Danube, it's okay since public transportation is great.
However, i cannot recommend staying here, unless the host does something about the cleanliness of the apartment. The curtains were stained and dusty, the furniture was dusty, many of the plates, cutlery and cooking pots were dirty. There was a hole in one of the interior walls, a bad smell came from the bathroom sometimes during the day and there was food and cosmetic products left in the cabinets by other guests. 
As a positive side, the bed linens were clean.

The host met us and was great, showed us around as well as places to avoid. Great city, 

walkable to most places but in a very busy/iffy area.
availability: 3 nights minimum stay.From Dec 20, 2016 - Jan 10, 2017 the minimum stay is 4 nights.
review_summary: At a great location in the city center, this fully furnished comforatble new apartment offers ideal space for up to 4 people. In front of the building there is a stop for the hop on hop off bus service with which you can already start your tour of Bp
description:
At a great location in the city center, this fully furnished comforatble new apartment offers ideal space for up to 4 people. In front of the building there is a stop for the hop on hop off bus service with which you can already start your tour of Bp

The Apartment is located in a very popular neighbourhood, the area is part of the bar district with its great night life experience, however the apartment is very quiet, therefore you won't hear anything from the street the noise. The apartment has a seperate bedroom with a double bed and the living room can accomodate further 2 people with its big sofa that can be made into a comfortable double bed. these 2 rooms are seperated by a door, and the bathroom also is between the 2 rooms. The kitchen is fully equipped, so you can prepare meals for yourself. The apartment includes:
- Free WIFI
- Bed linen
- Towels
- No extra costs

When you arrive, I will be sure to help you with any questions you might have, give you recommendations, and make sure you have a great stay at my newly furnished apartment.

reviews_text:
Its a nice place at an awesome location. 

Levente is a very kind person. He did the best for my welcome and quick answers for any doubt or questions I asked him.
The apartment is very beautiful and perfect located in the heart of the city.

This flat is in a very busy area in Budapest. If you like to be in the center where things are happening, this is a good choice. Easy to walk to the most parts of the city, good communications by subway, tram and busses.
The flat itself is big enough for two, with a comfortable bathroom.

There are some things to notice though. The location means even a busy night life on the street in front of the house. I woke up late night/early morning several times of loud voices caused by gangs of well-oiled people, in part because of the old windows, that block neither cold or noise very well. That happened both weekend and weekday nights.
The flat is not too well equipped, you will find a pair of plates with the belonging utensils, but don't hope to find anything in the kitchen cabinets and drawers. You get practically what you see on the pictures, no more.
The washing machine belongs to a museum, I doubt anyone else than those who are familiar with it would dare to use it. There is only one key to the apartment, so if you have different errands at the same time, you have to arrange a solution so you both can enter the apartment anytime you come home.
I found even the towels and the bed-linens would need an update.
Parking is an other challenge, the hard to find parking places are expensive and you have to pay 12 hours per day.

Levente turned out to be a reliable, responsible person, who was easy to come in contact with when we needed his assistance.

To submit my impressions; this apartment can be a good choice for the right person, but some details need definitely an update, to make the place worth it’s price.

Leventes apartment is as described: spacious, clean and with the necessary equipment for everyday life. Nearby you will find a bakery with fresh bread as well as small supermarkets. The apartment is in the center of the citiy, but quiet enough so that you can sleep without being disturbed by constant traffic. Communication was easy. When I had to change my time of arrival Levente was flexible enough to accept the new date. I only can recommend Leventes apartment and thank him for an enjoyable stay.


This was my first Airbnb experience and thanks to Levente it was an excellent one! I booked very last minute but there was no hassle. He went out of his way to provide me clear directions and gave great advice on places to go and see, as this was also my first time in Budapest. Couldn't have asked for a friendlier host, Levente made me feel so welcome.

The apartment itself was beautiful and even bigger than it looks in the pictures! In such a good location with shops, restaurants and bars right on your doorstep. 

Have recommended to a friend and would definitely book again if I return to Budapest!

The house is in an excellent location and very close to acces. Exactly how it looked in the pictures; even bigger! Levente is the best host: always ready to help in everything. A really nice person.Answering very quickly and always dispo to make your stay perfect.  Definitely recommended! And his gift is amazing ;) Thanks a lot Levente.

Levente's apartment is stunning! A beautiful, Parisian Style apartment, right in the heart of Budapest. It is close to Metro stops and easy to walk everywhere. Levente was very accommodating with meeting for the keys.

The apartment is very lovely and it is exactly how it appears in the photos. Levente was very kind, He provide me a lot of information on the city, the transports and the services and he help me in arrange the travel between the airport and the apartment. The apartment is in a pedestrian area and it is very central, It is the heart of the Hungarian Broadway with a lot of public transports and there are nice places in which have dinner or a drink. There is also a very uselful supermarket in few meters from the house opened from 7 a.m. to 22 p.m. 

I have loved the breakfast provided in the bar in front of the apartment where you may choose between sweet or salted breakfast and you may enjoy it in the internal tables or in the outside ones 

It is the perfect place in which stay to discover the city and enjoy the night life

Great place in a great location. Very responsive host. I'd recommend s stay 

Levente was a nice and helpful host. The apartment is located in a small street with a lot of bars. You can reach almost everything by foot.
review_summary: This lovely apartment perfectly located on  the famous pedestrian area of the theater quarter.  The apartment is right next to the Andrassy Boulevard, walking distance to the National Opera House, and the Jewish quarter very close to the Synagogue. All the main Tourist spots are just steps away. Perfect for couples, good friends who are thirsty to exploore the beautiful city of Budapest.
description:
This lovely apartment perfectly located on  the famous pedestrian area of the theater quarter.  The apartment is right next to the Andrassy Boulevard, walking distance to the National Opera House, and the Jewish quarter very close to the Synagogue. All the main Tourist spots are just steps away. Perfect for couples, good friends who are thirsty to exploore the beautiful city of Budapest.

THE SPACE

This beautiful condo is the perfect choise, if you want to enjoy your stay in a lovely way. All the small decorations, and object are ready to serve you, in order to provide an unforgettable experience in the very heart of the historical Budapest city.
Perfect for couples, good friends who are thirsty to exploore 
the beautiful city of Budapest.

GUEST ACCESS

The whole place (63 squaremetres) is all yours. Just feel yourself at home.
Bathroom with a shower and a toilet, and a fully equipped kitchen with a tiny dining table, 
microwave, cooker, oven. 
Fresh towels and bed sheets also included.
Free WIFI is also included.

INTERACTION WITH GUESTS

I normally meet with the guests personally to hand over they keys and provide a brief tour. If required they keys can be left for pickup at an agreed location instead.
For further information about the city:transfer service from the Airport, sightseeing tours (Hop On/Hop Off tickets), cruises on the river, car rental service,please feel free to contact me.

THE NEIGHBORHOOD

This lovely apartment perfectly located on  the famous pedestrian area of the theater quartel. 
As you step out of the building, open bars, caffees, restaurants are surround you.
This place is right next to the Andrassy Boulevard, walking distance to the Opera House, Deák Square and St. Stephen's Cathedral. Actually, all the main tourist spots, restaurants and bars are just steps away.

You will only need not more than 2 minutes to reach the famous 4-6 tram lines and metro stations of th three metrolines.

OTHER IMPORTANT THINGS


Private airport transfer available - A driver will wait for you in the arrival hall with a sign and will take you directly to the apartment: €35 (Please let me know in advance so I can make a reservation for you).

For further information about the city:transfer service from the Airport, sightseeing tours (Hop On/Hop Off tickets), cruises on the river, car rental service,please feel free to contact me.

review_summary: Il mio alloggio è vicino a Danube River, Unikum Factory Museum, Dandar Spa Thermal Baths.
description: My accommodation is close to Danube River, Unikum Factory Museum, Dandar Spa Thermal Baths.

reviews_text:
I was the first guest in this newly renovated apartment and it was a great experience overall. Tamas was kind enough to meet me very late at night and show me around. I can only recommend!

We had a quick one day visit in Budapest and Tamas was an amazing & flexible host. His apartment is exceptionally cosy and friendly, just as advertised on the pix. The flat is tidy & clean, feels like you stay in a brand new home.

Another surprise was the spot: while the address is in the middle of the noisy city, still the street is so quiet and when you're in the flat you have no idea you are in the busy capital of Hungary. Big thumbs up, 100% recommended!

The flat is awesome, has a very good ambient with its clear design. It is newly renovated and fully equipped  with all necessary things, i.e. toaster, kettle (with carbon filter), washing machine, even with projector. It was great to just chill and watch a movie after a busy day. 

The flat is clean and comfortable. The bed especially, is excellent. The location is great. As it is in a center many attractions are within just a short walk. Lots of restaurants and bars are around the neighborhood. 
Public transport is just around the corner. Trams, buses, tubes take you to everywhere in the city. Also Keleti train station is near - useful if you arrive by train from abroad. 
Tamás is very kind and friendly. He explains very well all that is necessary to know in order to visit the best of Budapest. He did everything to make my arrival easy by giving me really good explanation. I recommend you to stay in this lovely flat :)
review_summary:
Recently renovated flat in an old traditional building located in the heart of the city.  The place is perfect for a travelling couple. You can have your own island of harmony in central Budapest.

Great Location!
In 5 minutes walk you can find yourselves in the liveliest night scene at Király street, which is considered the Soho of Budapest with plenty of bars, local restaurants and ruin pubs. Major tourist attractions are also in a comfortable walking distance.
house_rules:
Please always lock the doors of the apartment and the entrance gate

In case any apartment key is lost you should inform me immediately; the necessary lock and key changes will be charged to you.

This point is particularly important and no concessions will be made: Please pay respect to other residents of the house. Please close the doors carefully and silently, refrain from any behavior that can disturb any residents particularly after 9PM (i.e.: loud music). We reserve the right to cancel the service immediately, with holding the whole rental fee if we receive any valid complaints from other residents of the house.

The apartment can be used by checked-in guests only

Please leave the apartment in the same general condition as you found it upon arrival. Any damage caused during your stay must be compensated by you.

Should you face any problem with the apartment during your stay, please inform me immediately.

We cannot accept any responsibility for your valuables left in the apartment.

Please take care of the cleanliness and tidiness of the apartment. At the check-out please do not leave any used dishes, leaving the apartment in the same condition as you occupied it.

Smoking in the apartment is strictly forbidden.

We terminate the reservations for people who rent the apartments for illegal activities.
description:
Recently renovated flat in an old traditional building located in the heart of the city.  The place is perfect for a travelling couple. You can have your own island of harmony in central Budapest.

Great Location!
In 5 minutes walk you can find yourselves in the liveliest night scene at Király street, which is considered the Soho of Budapest with plenty of bars, local restaurants and ruin pubs. Major tourist attractions are also in a comfortable walking distance.

Built in sound system and projector – plug and play!
Towels and bed sheets are provided.

I give the keys to my guests personally. You can call or email me any time. I'm happy to help and give some advice what is worthy to visit - there are so many things to do in the city of Budapest. :)

You will find lot of interesting place just within walking distance - i.e Heros Square and the City park; Roses square with the Erzsébet Church and lots of restaurants, bars, coffee shops and the famous ruin pubs, the famous New York Coffee, etc.

Also there are lot of place close by where you can let steam off. :) Like the Szimpla the most well known ruin pub: (URL HIDDEN)
If you hungry you can drop by at Bors for a great sandwich  - the streetfood bistro: (URL HIDDEN)

The flat is well connected with public transportation. You can easily find the flat when you arrive to Budapest. Also, getting around in the city is simple as well. There are many big transportation hubs nearby - trams (4-6), trains, undergrounds (M2-M4).

reviews_text:
Perfect place for a visit in Budapest. You will find everything nearby. Especially if you are looking for party and nightlife. 
Apartment is very modern, clean and comfortable. Small bathroom but sufficient. 
Lóránt is a very friendly and conscientious host.

Good place in city centre, well and nicely renovated in old building - which gives a scent of what its like to live in Budapest. One thing to note is the noise during sat night thanks to club next to it, however if you are a party person that would be just plus :)) thanks to Lorant he is a good host!
availability: On Fridays and Saturdays the minimum stay is 2 nights.
review_summary: The apartment location is very good, exactly in the center of Budapest. Close to the sights in the city. Ex: House of the Parliament, Danube, Andrassy Avenue, House of Terror etc. Restaurants, pubs, bars, clubs.
description:
The apartment location is very good, exactly in the center of Budapest. Close to the sights in the city. Ex: House of the Parliament, Danube, Andrassy Avenue, House of Terror etc. Restaurants, pubs, bars, clubs.

The apartment is well equipped. You can find everything what you need for a good holiday or for business. You can find tow separated bedroom, one living room with kitchen and in the kitchen you can find everything what you need for a good cooking. 

You can find a private garden, belongs to the apartment.

In the flat you can use everything :)

You can contact me anytime under your stay! :) (email, sms, (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN), Viber)

The location is one of the best in the city. Safe but crowded. Many shops, bars,clubs, restaurants are just few minutes from the flat. 
The night life is perfect, so many party places. 
Also close to the sights. Parliament, Danube, Andrássy Avenue, etc.

reviews_text:
I really enjoyed our stay in Leventes cozy flat .. You cam even walk to town by feet within half an hour - next to the river ;-) Thank you again for everything!

Place was as advertised. Nice, clean little apartment with a loft bed & very good internet. Safe and quiet. Walking distance to many markets and easy access to subway and street cars. Thanks, Levente, hope to stay here again in the near future!

We stayed very well in this appartment. It's really comfortable and cosy and, having walked all the day around Budapest, staying there was very relaxing.
Levente has been very kind to us, he helped us a lot to find the appartment, and he has been also very flexible in timetables.
I recommend this appartment!!

I went with a friend to Budapest and we really enjoyed our stray. Levente is a great host i only can recommend to stay at his aribnb :)

Nice and modern apartment, clean, close to the subway, cheap!

mr.levente is good man,he is fast and hostly to me,that i need anything he try to help me,we are friend already, the house is near to metra we can easily to go city and also can cook in the room,all is nice,enjoy it,


Levente is a very kind and helpfull host.

Best stay ever. Great flat clean and funkcional. Really nice and warm as well.

Cute place and good price.

It was a nice place to stay, cozy for 2 or maximum 3 persons, placed in a quiet neighborhood, very near of public transportation. Levente was a kind and helpful host. I recommend.
review_summary: Near my apartment: Margaret Island, Centrum, Lehel Market. The apartment is perfect for couples, business travelers. The city center is just 4 stops away by subway train.
description:
Near my apartment: Margaret Island, Centrum, Lehel Market. The apartment is perfect for couples, business travelers. The city center is just 4 stops away by subway train.

Cozy studio apartment where most neighbors are locals. It is easily accessible due to the fact that it is located on ground floor.

You can rent the whole apartment.

You can contact me on the phone always, someone will be there in an hour if there is any urgent problem.

Danube is just 10 minutes away by walking.

Dozsa Gyorgy ut subway station is just 3 minutes away by walking, this station is just 4 stops from the city center. Only paid parking near the flat, it is free on the weekends and every day between 18:00-8:00. Otherwise it is 265HUF/h or 440HUF/h (depends on which street are you parking).

reviews_text:
One of my best Airbnb experiences. Very friendly, cosy, clean, easy to find. It's actually on the second floor of a private house, with a separate entrance. Csaba offered me a drink the moment I walked in, also he allowed a very late checkout the next day. There's a fridge in the room, fresh towels, clean bathroom. A little bit away from the center, around 15 stops with bus 5 but it took me just 30 mins. Well worth the price!

Csaba is a very nice and friendly host.
The room was very comfortable, friendly and clean. Useful to have cooler in it. 
Public transportation is close by, and easy to use. Quickly you can get to the city center because of the direct bus services.
A supermarket close to the house where all the relevant available.
Csaba's language skills are really good, because he lived in Belgium for six months. We had very good conversations, he was talking about Budapest and foreign experiences. He also gave me a gift, chocolates and fresh bread.
Csaba presented to the family, who are very hospitable and they also speak English.
I am glad that I was the first guest. I would definitely recommend a stay here!

Minden rendben volt, Csaba nagyon kedves és közvetlen. A szállás csendes, nyugodt környéken talàlható, rövidebb ott-tartózkodásra ideális. Szívből ajànlom.

Alles in Ordnung, Csaba ist sehr nett und kommunikativ. Die Unterkunft befindet sich in ruhiger Umgebung, ist ideal zur kürzeren Aufenthalt. Mit herzlicher Empfehlung.
review_summary:
Our gardened house is situated in a calm area of Budapest. There is a cosy bedroom with a fridge on the second floor for you!!!
The house is not far away from the Szechenyi Spa and the Heroes' Square. You can directly go to the downtown area with 'Bus 5' or 'Trolleybus 74'.
Parking lots are free on the street.

reviews_text:
Great place! 

It was wonderful, Agnes´ service before and during our vacacions. The apartment is sooo lovely, very clean and it is situated perfect (near the metro/bus/train-stations, city park, free parking district, shopping mall, and only a 20 minutes walk to the city). 

10/10 greate place and very nice host. 

We stayed In this apartment early December. Given that it was freezing outside, the apartment was lovely and warm on arrival. It looks exactly like the pictures. Very good location, easy to jump on the metro for two stops and then you are central. It had everything we needed and was perfect for a long weekend. Agnes was a great host, although we never met her she was very helpful and was very responsive if we had any questions. Highly recommend! 

The  apartment  was  absolutely perfect,  exactly as  you can see  form the  pictures!  The  furniture are  all new,  there  is everything  you need  for  your  staying and the  bed  is  comfortable.  
We also want to thank our host because she was  very nice,  fast  to reply and  helped us  a lot.  
 Strongly recommended!!  

It was a great experience!
Everything was very clean and we did not lack anything! It is a beautiful house with a lot of charm! We really enjoyed it!
Agnes made everything easy and everything was in order!
A great hostess
Recommended 100%

Ágnes was a really nice and helpful host during our stay in Budapest. The flat is very cosy and perfecly located, with great transport connections. Pretty recommendable. 

Really close to the station and walking distance. 
Gigi also let me check in early!
Everything was great. 

Agnes is the best host ever. Extremly helpful, organized, detailed, caring. Apartment is nice and cosy place in a original Old building. 10 minutes from metro and train station,  3 minutes from the bus stop to the center. We had a nice time there. Thanks again Agnes!

Everything was absolutely great! I really loved the place and very glad I prefer that variant of housing. The biggest thanks to Ágnes!
review_summary: This 25 m2 studio is ideal for travellers who want to reach the city center easy and quick, but want to sleep well in peaceful silence.
description: This 25 m2 studio is ideal for travellers who want to reach the city center easy and quick, but want to sleep well in peaceful silence.

reviews_text:
The place was amazing, exactly like the picture and better. Perfect location in a beautiful area in Budapest. Walking distance to everything you need like cafes restaurants and bars. The place was well stocked and had everything you need in it. Communication was easy with tibor. Overall 10/10 would stay again. 

The flat was absolutely beautiful- and so close to the main attractions in Budapest. The view from the balcony is stunning, and the flat is brilliant value for money. Tibor was a great host- stayed in contact with us to allow an easy check in/check out, stocked the fridge with goodies and gave us recommendations of the best places to go. We'd definitely come back!

Beautiful apartment and Perfect located! We stayed in tibor 's House better then in our home. Tibor is a really Super Host!we Will return for sure !

Made us very welcome and provided a very welcome bottle of wine and snacks.

Tibor's apartment is very nice and has an amazing view. Tibor was also a great host and made us feel at home.

Tibor was extremely welcoming, and went above and beyond in making sure that every conceivable need or want was covered. The fridge was fully stocked with snacks and drinks (including two exceptional wines) when we arrived and the view from the terrace was breathtaking.

Staying here was an experience that could not be improved upon. Thank you, Tibor!

What an amazing apartment, and what an amazing host. We could not have been happier with our stay in Budapest. The photos do not do the place justice, you truly cannot find a better place to stay there. Tibor showed us amazing hospitality, this apartment is truly a home away from home, with Netflix, a personal 3G wifi gadget to carry with you, some snacks and drinks in the fridge. We couldn't praise higher. 

Tibor is a great host and his appartement is exactly as described and plus. FANTASTIC terrace in heart of the city.

Absolutely fantastic Airbnb experience. We've stayed at plenty of Airbnb properties and this one, without a doubt, tops the list. Everything was perfect - from views to shower and amenities, to a complete relaxing atmosphere and a fantastic host! The view from the terrace is and the location of the apartment is absolutely perfect. The host, Tibor, is an outstanding host. He was so accommodating and welcoming and went above and beyond to make us feel right at home!

With all the previous rave reviews, I feared that the apartment was over-hyped. Not so! Tibor and his apartment lived up to their reputation. If anything, the apartment looks better than the pictures. 

I have three must-have criteria:
1. Very clean
2. Comfortable bed
3. Good wi-fi

This apartment exceeded my expectations in all three categories. And the location is fantastic. 

I will definitely try to stay here again the next time I pass through Budapest.
review_summary: Retreat to my Budapest one bedroom penthouse apartment (60 m2, 640 sqft) with sprawling panorama . Recline on the balcony (20 m2, 215 sqft.), enjoy the view of the bustling metropolis and the castle on Buda hill in the background. (Must emphasize there is hardly any other terrace in downtown area with  this size or with this kind of view!) My apartment offers breathtaking views of Elizabeth Square, Gellert Hill, Liberty Statue, Buda Castle, Ritz. Unlike all others it is a real estate Gem!!!!!!!
house_rules:
House rules: 
•Smoking is allowed only on the terrace, not in the flat. 
•Maximum two persons, including entertaining guests.
•Pets are not allowed on the premises.
description:
Retreat to my Budapest one bedroom penthouse apartment (60 m2, 640 sqft) with sprawling panorama . Recline on the balcony (20 m2, 215 sqft.), enjoy the view of the bustling metropolis and the castle on Buda hill in the background. (Must emphasize there is hardly any other terrace in downtown area with  this size or with this kind of view!) My apartment offers breathtaking views of Elizabeth Square, Gellert Hill, Liberty Statue, Buda Castle, Ritz. Unlike all others it is a real estate Gem!!!!!!!

Retreat to my Budapest one bedroom penthouse apartment (60 m2, 640 soft) with sprawling panorama. Recline on the balcony (20 m2, 215 sqft. 10m 33feet long), enjoy the view of the bustling metropolis and the castle on Buda hill in the background. The spacious studio (60 m2, 640 sqft.) has been newly remodelled and equipped with full amenities, including a queen-bed, fully-equipped kitchen, flat screen television,appletv, air conditioning, satellite channels and high speed Internet. 
My apartment offers breathtaking views of Elizabeth Square, Liberty Statue, Buda Castle, Gellert Hill, Ritz.
Unlike all others it is a real estate Gem,one can only inherit anything like that nowadays! Believe me it is not over-hyped statement!
Amenities like no where else ! (portable wi-fi rooter so you can stay connected at all times makes your life easier to circumnavigate around the city,full fridge sodas,vine ,beers etc quality ones)
Enjoy viewing nightlife from huge panoramic windows. Alternatively, take a walk in the neighbourhood and get involved in vibrant city life. A Michelin-rated restaurant is steps away from the door. Both the synagogue and the cathedral are minutes away on foot.  The underground station to all directions are across the square. 

This is your home for an easy access and hassle-free trip to Budapest. 

House rules: 
•Smoking is allowed only on the terrace, not in the flat. 
•Maximum two persons, including entertaining guests.
•Pets are not allowed on the premises.

A city of contrasts that blend together beautifully, Budapest sits along the River Danube, where each bank offers a unique settings. Buda, built on two hills sits across from the flat Pest with the city's lively shopping, business districts. Offering easy access to both is our apartment, set within the heart of Budapest.
Public transportation, including bus, tram, train, bicycle, allows visitors to explore all downtown Budapest has to offer, from shopping and music to history and art. Budapest named the City of Spas for ist rich thermal waters.
The beauty of Budapest is undeniable, from the Danube riverfront to the elegant historical buildings. From our centrally located apartment is an array of opportunities to explore the past and discover the present, including art museums, boutque shopping and historic landmarks such as Vörösmarty Square and Chain Bridge.
Distances:
St. Stepen's Basilica: 0,1 km
Dohány Street Synagogue: 0,4 km
Fashion Street:0,2 km
Opera House: 0,8 km
Andrássy Avenue: 0,1 km
Chain Bridge: 0,6 km
Hungarian Parliament: 1,5 km
Sightseeing Danube Cruises: 0,4 km
Castle District: 3 km
Heroes Square: 2,5 km
Széchenyi Thermal Baths: 3 km

The apartment is located in the center of Budapest and is easily accessible arriving by plane, train or car.
Liszt Ferenc International Airport is about 16 km from the apartment (40 minutes both Taxi or public transport). 
Public transport: The bus 200E is running between Kőbánya-Kispest metro station and the airport and the ride is taking about 20 minutes. With the blue metro line in the direction of Újpest-Központ takes about 20 minutes to reach the apartment at the Deák Ferenc tér stop. On the Deák Ferenc tér you just cross over the park (200 m, 5 minutes) to the Sas street.

review_summary:
In the heart of Buda, at the foot of Rozsadomb, 2 minutes from Szell Kalman ter we offer the ideal accommodation for a holiday or a business trip.

.
house_rules:
Treat our home like your home.
We ask our guests to observe quiet time following 10.00 pm.
No smoking in the apartment.
Pets are not allowed.
description:
In the heart of Buda, at the foot of Rozsadomb, 2 minutes from Szell Kalman ter we offer the ideal accommodation for a holiday or a business trip.

. 

Our stylish, air-conditioned apartment has a spacious living room with sofa bed, well-equipped kitchen, bedroom with double bed, bathroom with douche. We have thought of everything you might need.All amenities are easily accessible – couple minutes walk and you are at the Mammut Shopping Center, Market of Feny utca, Millenaris Park, Varosmajor. Nearby pedestrian only streets boasts a wide range of cafes, restaurants and pubs. A bit longer walk would get you to the Castle District or Margaret Island (or a couple of mins on public transport).

We are here to help you enjoy your stay

Budapest has excellent – even at night – public transport, which makes life easy for the traveler.
The Szell Kalman ter is one of the main traffic junction of Budapest.

reviews_text:
Lori's place is perfect for getting to know Budapest. It's in a nice, old building and the view from her balkony is spectacular! You really get the spirit of living in Budapest when you have the possibility to get inside a house like this. The bed is a bit narrow, but as a couple it's romantic I guess :) Lori is very obliging and it was fun having a drink with her in a cute bar nearby her flat. We'd love to come again sometime! Thanks for everything.

As a single traveler on a tight budget, this room was perfect for my stay in Budapest. Lori's apartment was very clean, comfortable, and well equipped. The city is very accessible by the metro, and the apartment is conveniently a two minute walk to one metro line and a six minute walk to another metro line (there are only four metro lines in total). Lori is also a very warm and friendly person and I was grateful to spend the holidays with her through my travels. Highly recommend staying here when visiting Budapest!

Lori was a wonderful host - welcoming, extremely kind and helpful. Her warm and cozy apartment literally made me feel right at home (especially the comfy guest bed)! Am sure the balcony will be nice to enjoy during warmer season. It is just a 2 min walk away from the subway station with a supermarket right downstairs. Lori was very kind to offer sightseeing suggestions and even her swimsuits for me to experience the must-try thermal bath. Highly recommended for any English-speaking travelers or anyone else visiting Budapest!

The room is wonderful, the host is bright and generous, the apartment is clean and fun to explore, the building is an east-bloc gem (don't miss the elevator), and the panoramic view of the park and the Budapest skyline is impressive. Everything I wanted to see or eat was in walking distance, and the metro almost to the doorstep makes it easy to come home when I've had enough. Lori should be charging twice what I paid, at least.
review_summary: A cosy room in a large, sunny 7th floor apartment in the 8th district. You have a metro line just a minute away (10 minutes to the main sights), Keleti railway station 7 minute walk, and nice neighborhood spots right nearby.
house_rules: Smoking is allowed on the balcony.
description:
A cosy room in a large, sunny 7th floor apartment in the 8th district. You have a metro line just a minute away (10 minutes to the main sights), Keleti railway station 7 minute walk, and nice neighborhood spots right nearby.

One room in a shared flat with a friendly host. 
The bed can fold up into a couch if you'd like.

Other than your bedroom, you have access to the fully-equipped kitchen, where you are welcome to cook as you please, the bathrooms, the dining room, and the balcony.

I will be here during your stay and can welcome you and arrange with the keys. I am happy to help if you have any problems or want advice on what to do in Budapest!

1 minute walk to the closest metro station 
7 minute walk from the Keleti railway station 
5 minute walk to the 4/6 tramline

reviews_text:
I went to Budapest for seightsseings, and the train station and metro was close to the appartment so it wasn't problem to find it at the night or get around in the day time and the neighbourhood felt safe as well.

I havent met Eszter personally becaouse she wasn't able to meet me, but the check in ran very smoothly, she gave me all the details about how to do it and it was really easy.  I loved the place, everything is new, it even had that "new" smell to it :)

I loved my 2 month stay at this cozy apartment. It's completely renovated so the furnishings and equipment are brand new. Fully equipped kitchen with all the appliances (Elevator, quiet building, great wifi, new washer, great water pressure and heating). The hosts were very helpful and caring with excellent communication. They were so friendly and welcoming! Public transportation (buses, trams, metro) all within 2-3 blocks! There is also big shopping mall 10 mins walking distance also which was convenient for shopping needs. Overall, I'd recommend this for short-term or long-term stays!

I loved Gábor's apartment. It was even nicer than I expected. The location and the facilities were superb. It's really easy to reach any part of the city by public transport. Thank you so much Eszter and Gábor for your caring attitude and always being ready to help. I definitely will stay in your apartment next time. See you soon. 

I had a warm welcome from Zita and Andrew. The place has been my best Airbnb experience. Newly furnished apartment and of cos furnished with a luxurious taste and great dedication to details. I bet anyone who stays here will say the same. It has everything u need absolutely anything u expect to find in a house.
The apartment is well Connected. 5 mins away from underground and 5 mins away from the most connecting tram station Snell Kalman ter. U have a Spar express (supermarket) at the corner and the big one 5 mins walking. 
This apartment made my stay in Budapest fantastic cos it felt so nice coming back home. Home away from home was the feeling. 
I loved my stay and will definitely rebook and advice anybody going to budapest to book. You will never regret the money spent.

Our Budapest trip has been amazing, also thanks to Zita (Gábor's daughter). She was so kind and helped us a lot. 

The apartment is new and very beautiful. The location is great, just a 5 minute walk down the street and you are at the metro station. 

Zita maked sure that you had everything you need in the apartment, from shampoo to wine and snacks. 

If we come back to Budapest, we are definetaly messaging Zita again! 

Chantal & Lisa
review_summary:
Our lovely apartment is located in the heart of Buda, but it's still peaceful and quiet. The biggest transportation hub can be reached within 5 minutes walk, from there only 3 stops with the underground and you are  already in the pulsing city centre. 
Find your second home in this cozy, newly renovated, fully equipped flat with a nice balcony where you can have your morning coffee.
Reach shops, cafés and bakeries down the street to buy your everyday needs.
house_rules:
Pets and smoking are strictly not allowed in the apartment.

This is a residential building, please, respect our neighbours and avoid being loud after 21:00 o'clock.
description:
Our lovely apartment is located in the heart of Buda, but it's still peaceful and quiet. The biggest transportation hub can be reached within 5 minutes walk, from there only 3 stops with the underground and you are  already in the pulsing city centre. 
Find your second home in this cozy, newly renovated, fully equipped flat with a nice balcony where you can have your morning coffee.
Reach shops, cafés and bakeries down the street to buy your everyday needs.

Our lovely apartment is located in the heart of Buda, but it's still quiet and peaceful.  Find your second home away from your real one in this cozy, newly renovated, fully equipped flat with a nice balcony where you can have your morning coffee or enjoy your glass of wine in the evening.

Reach shops down the street to buy your every day grocery. Find cafés and bakeries only a few steps away from the house. 

If you are a fan of sports, you can even do a little exercise in the neighbouring sport center, or have a jog in the neighbouring Városmajor Park.

To reach the city center, just take the metroline 2 (M2-red line) what is only a 5 minutes walk away, and within 3 stops you already find yourself in the pulsing city center, called Deák Ferenc square. 

Visit the hungarian House of Parliament (only 2 stops by M2 underground form your apartment). 
Just take the bus nearby and explore the historical Castle district -wich is even reachable within walking distance- and enjoy the amazing view to the river and the city.

Enjoy our beloved capital and discover all of our famous sights around. Walk through the famous Váci street full with shops,restaurants, bars or have a dinner on a cruise at the gorgeous Danube river and be amazed by the world heritage Danube view.

When you are tired of discovering Budapest, visit a green spot in approx. 8 minutes walk away, next to the newly renowated Széll Kálmán sqaure, called Millenáris Park with a nice pond in the middle or explore our green Margaret-island by taking a short trip by the tram. 

So first and last we can offer you:
 - luxuriously renovated apartment with balcony and every equipment for your everyday comfort (toaster, coffee machine, iron, washing machine, table ware and dishes, etc. )
  - great location and perfect public transport near the flat to reach all of the sights what Budapest can offer you.
  - Free wireless internet connection.
  
See you soon!:)

reviews_text:
Great house. Clean, chic, details we cares for and the bed is very comfortable. Our host was punctual and very catering. The blackout shutters were a plus and parking was very convenient. Would stay here again!

Rudolf was really uncomplitcated and the apartement was modern, clean and we had everything we need. It was a nice Trip to Budapest and if we will be there for a second time, we will stay at Rudolfs again.
review_summary: Completely renovated, sunny brick apartment with A/C, comfortable bed, and kitchen. It is located near the city center in the 14th district. The bus stop is 2 min walk distance, from where Keleti Pályaudvar (East Railway Station) and main metro lines are 10 minutes far.

reviews_text:
Very nice place with a lot of personality

It was a great place. Very clean and the welcome was warm and friendly. Great location, everything I needed. I would love to come again!

This was our first airbnb stay anywhere. I think you've got it just right. The location is spot-on, especially with the no. 16 bus going past the door. It's quirky and it works.

Everything was according to what has been described by Attila.
We felt really like home!

Attila was a great host and very knowledgable about the area. He made sure the check in and check out process were both very smooth. The space is great and get's a lot of sun but means it get's a little hot if you are used to having air condition like myself. 

Attila was a great host, his appartment was really nice. 

Although we never got to meet Attila, were were made feel very welcome by his brother. Attila's home is centrally located in a wonderful part of Buda, it has a real community feel about it. Attila's apartment is just like in the photos, clean and modern and well equipped. I would happily stay there again if given the opportunity. 

Highly recommend this Airbnb! Perfect location and very accommodating. 

The apartment was wonderful just as it looks on the photos. All of our questions/queries during our stay were answered within minutes of messaging Attila. We will be coming back as we thoroughly enjoyed our stay!

Attila's flat is perfectly situated in Buda and really gorgeous and confortable. More particularly the glass bathroom  which make the one place. Unfortunately we don't met him, it was his mother who welcomed us and she was so sweet when we arrived.  We spent an awesome week-end in Budapest. You can go there with your eyes shut.
review_summary: The apartment is located in the Castle Hill, walking distance from the Chain Bridge and the most popular sights of Budapest.
house_rules: The house is in a historical area with a very nice community. I want you to feel at home, but please remember to respect the neighbors and keep the noise level to a minimum in the night (excessive drinking, drugs, house party, shouting is not welcome).
description:
The apartment is located in the Castle Hill, walking distance from the Chain Bridge and the most popular sights of Budapest.

Very sunny all day as it has southwest view,  the windows look at the buildings in the Castle. These togehter give a special flavour - historic, calm surroundings and bird tweet despite being in the center of Budapest. 

The apartment is fully-equipped: kitchen, dishwasher, washing machine, microwave, electric cooktop, coffee machine, oven, smart TV, Wifi, electric shutters with remote control, electric thermostat, king size bathtub, automated hoods in the toilette, kitchen and bathroom.

Fresh bed linen and towels are provided.

Excellent location - very central / close to the Danube, most of Budapest's main sights are all in walking distance.  The street is very quiet in the night, the whole area belongs to the World Heritage.
You can take the stairs up to the Castle right in front of the building. Fisherman's Bastion and Mathias Church are just at the end of the street, while Chain Bridge, Castle Funicular and the Danube are at the other end of the street.

The underground n.2 (red line) is nearby and you can find good connections at the Tunnel roundabout (Chain Bridge) to other parts of the city.

You can contact me anytime, always online and available.

Deposit is handled by airbnb and I have absolutely no access to it unless a damage is documented and proven to airbnb.

reviews_text:
Our experience staying at Noémi's place was lovely. She was very helpful and sent us all we need to know to arrive to her place. Since the first minute she was very kind and even showed us what we could do in the city. The place is pretty clean and comfy, what you see in the photos is what you get. Very recommendable place to stay if you visit Budapest.

Thanks Noémi!

We had a nice time at Noemi's place, as the host she was very interesting and helpful with her travel tips. The appartment is very centrally located and it was super easy to get there from the airport  and back as we used the minibus service. The building itself is a historical monument and it was really cool to be and live there. 

Our stay at Noemis house was very nice. She was super helpful and very friendly. The room was spacious and the flat was very tiedy and clean. The location is right in the center of Budapest with a lot of cute Bars and Cafes around. We had a great time, thank you Noemi!! 

We, me and my wife, were in Noemi's flat very happy with the place, room and other equipment. So there's only one thing. Clear recommendation to make a reservation.

Impeccable!!
We had a comfortable stay at Noemi's place. Her flat is not quite far from the city centre and is well connected to public transport. It takes around 20 minutes by walking to the city centre and nearest metro station is at 3-4 mins walking distance. Our room was clean and bed was comfortable. Noemi was helpful to suggest some nice addresses. We had a great time at Noemi's place!!! 

Noemi was very friendly and made us feel very welcomed in her home. She also gave us a great introduction to Budapest and told us about a number of attractions to see and places to eat at. Her flat is very central and we were able to walk to both the Buda side and the Szechenyi baths with ease. 

Noemi is a very nice host. I stayed with my girlfriend. Emailcontact in front of our arrival was very detailed, she gave clear instructions how to get to her apartment. She answers her email fast.
Clean and authentic is the main description of her apartment. Location is great, 10 min walk from main centre (with ruin bars and a lot of places to eat). Metro 2 min walk, Lidl around the corner. Perfect spot to discover Budapest.

Noémi's apartment is located in a very good neighborhood, very close to metro and walking distantance to bars, restaurants and nice places.
The apartment is freshly renovated and very clean. Noémi is a very polite educated girl, speaks Rnglish and super helpful. She did everythin to make my stay pleasant. Thank you dear.

Noemi was very welcoming, she gave us many recommendations, she was nice and caring. We loved our stay at her place, which was well situated in the city (we did everything by foot) and cool.

Noémi was so welcoming, approachable, and reachable. She was also incredibly helpful with sightseeing and travel tips, supplying us with a map and recommendations of what to do. The flat was clean, comfortable, and in a great location.
review_summary: My apartment is a cosy, 87 sqm apartment with lift access built at the beginning of 20th century with classical architecture, in the heart of Downtown Budapest. Elegant and nice room is waiting for guests all around the world, comfortable even for 2 people. Andrássy street, Széchenyi thermal bath, ST Stephnas's Basilica, Liszt Academy, Hungarian State Opera 5-10 minutes walk. It’s close to the metro (M1), tram (4/6).Trolleybuses(78/70) stop in front of the house. A well equipped shared kitchen.

reviews_text:
The place is in a perfect spot in budapest. Old building, but the room abd the appartment so comfortable ans clean. I met magdelyen lidi's friend she was the most welcoming and helpful person. Overall, it's just great experince. 

I cannot give any other rating than 5 stars for this room. Extremely friendly and helpful host, clean room and facilities and located right in the city center. Definitely recommended to anyone!

The whole process through from booking - staying and checking out was great! We never met Lidl but she was very helpful and really responsive to messages so we were very happy with the stay. I had heard that Budapest was notorious for dodgy Airbnb's but Lidl's place was as described. She has a friend called Magdelena gave us all the information we needed when we arrived. 

I was very grateful as I was unwell so was able to stay an extra couple of hours after check out. Lidl also let us keep our bags in the flat the whole day even after we left the room. 

It was right near a metro so easy to get around and on a main road so felt safe and was walking distance to many sights as well. I would recommend staying here to others looking in the same price bracket. 

The best option if you are planning to visit Budapest. We met lidi the day that we arrived and she was really nice with us. If we come back to Budapest, we will stay with lidi again for sure!!!

Very central clean tidy apartment. Close to all main attractions. Lidi was very helpful. Beds are approx 100mm foam depends what you like but I could feel the wooden slats underneath so needed two foam pads. Washing machine and deep relaxing bath. 

I would definitely recommend staying here. The location was perfect, the room and apartment were spacious and exactly as described. Lidi checked us in and gave us the run through which was very helpful. She also gave us great recommendations that lead to some of the best meals we had in our time in Europe.

This has been among the best airbnb experiences so far. The house was located in the city center close to the best restaurants in the area and less than 3 min walk to the metro station. The house was very clean and had all the facilities you need (kitcken, dish washer, fridge, hair dryer, A/C...). Would definitely book again.

Lidi's apartment is in a great location and very clean with great amenities. Lidi provided great recommendations for food and drinks in the area.

The house is great,  the location is perfect exactly I'm the main square of Budapest.  Is very clean and comfortable. 
Lidi was always available and give us a lot of advices of places restaurants and things to do

The place to sleep in Budapest ! The host really helped us to discover her city. Good situation next to Metro station and the center. Very clean and quiet. Thank you Lidi !
availability: 2 nights minimum stay.From Dec 29, 2016 - Jan 04, 2017 the minimum stay is 3 nights.
review_summary:
Unique jewelry box with beautiful view on main attractions.
The room is well equipped: Shelf, comfortable bed, fragrant freshly laundered linens, towels, window shutter, tables, chairs, racks, floor lamp and even mobile air-conditioning, fast wifi!
description:
Unique jewelry box with beautiful view on main attractions.
The room is well equipped: Shelf, comfortable bed, fragrant freshly laundered linens, towels, window shutter, tables, chairs, racks, floor lamp and even mobile air-conditioning, fast wifi!

Outstanding location in the city center, but still quiet on the fourth floor. 

Wake up to a beautiful panorama and see the main attractions of the city directly from your bed: the Citadel, Statue of Liberty, Buda Castle, Fisherman's Bastion, Matthias Church, Elisabeth Lookout, all the Buda Hills and during afternoons: the beautiful Buda sunset.

The hostel consist of four separate bedrooms, spacious dining room, two toilets, an atmospheric corridor and a bathroom with shower and bath tub. The modern kitchen is fully equipped with microwave, ceramic hob, dishwasher, combined refrigerator.

The rooms are also well equipped: Shelf, comfortable bed, fragrant freshly laundered linens, window shutter, tables, chairs, racks and even mobile air-conditioning, fast, unlimited internet.

The bathroom also has a great panoramic view, so you can enjoy the outlook to the city while taking a bath or shower.

I warmly welcome everyone with a lot of love! Highly recommended for both the young and the elder: couples, honeymooners, families, friends, single travelers, groups, business people, students and everyone who wants to become a part of the city's vibrant whirl and enjoy this peaceful island in the heart of Budapest.

reviews_text: A bit of stress on the day I was leaving Budapest as I received an alert saying I needed to be moved to another apartment as there was an issue with the heating in the apartment I booked. But the new apartment was similar and the host ensured it was near where I needed to be and a bottle of red wine was thrown in for good measure. Taxi was booked for me by the host.  The heating in the flat did not work the first night I arrived but luckily there were extra duvets. The host was in regular contact and got the issue resolved so that the next and subsequent nights were nice and toasty. A great, simple flat, no frills but all you need and a beautiful high ceilings and a great location for a reasonable price. I would definitely stay again.
review_summary:
This fully renovated studio offers a high-class experience in the center of Budapest.

The studio includes a mezzanine-level sleeping area with a king-sized bed, a convertible sofa in the lounge, a fully equipped kitchenette, high-class bathroom and a comfy dining area. 

This homey and comfortable studio is a part of a larger apartment complex which can be also rented out if needed.
house_rules:
Booking: Please do not exceed the amount of people that you booked for.

Smoking: This is a non-smoking property, please do not smoke inside.

Neighbours: Please watch the noise levels and keep quiet between 22:00 - 07:00, we care about our neighbours.

Family: We treat our guests as family, please take care of our property and treat it with respect.

Borrowing: If you borrow anything from our property, please bring it back as it was.
description:
This fully renovated studio offers a high-class experience in the center of Budapest.

The studio includes a mezzanine-level sleeping area with a king-sized bed, a convertible sofa in the lounge, a fully equipped kitchenette, high-class bathroom and a comfy dining area. 

This homey and comfortable studio is a part of a larger apartment complex which can be also rented out if needed.

The mezzanine-level area provides privacy and added space.
There's a convertible sofa which can sleep another 2 people and a comfortable and homey lounge area.

The studio includes a free high-speed wifi connection and a small, fully equipped kitchen.

The entire apartment is for your use. Please read and respect our house rules.

Upon your arrival we will discuss the exact time and place we should meet, or we can offer you a self check in option. We are generally flexible about the check-in and check-out times, so let us know if you have any special requests. We will do our best to accommodate your needs if the schedule allows it.

The neighborhood features some great restaurants, which will allow you to discover our unique Hungarian cuisine. You will also be able to find a few interesting nightlife spots within a walking distance from the apartment.

The public transportation system of the city is really great and easily accessible.

reviews_text:
Ideal location for easy access to  great food and nightlife. The apartment is located on "culture street". Close to main attractions in Budapest. 15-20 minute walk to the Danube. The street this apartment is located on has several excellent restaurants and bars including Szimpla Kert, a trendy restaurant and bar. The apartment faces the street and can be quite noisy at night from the nearby nightlife. Awesome value and loved the location!

We enjoyed our staying in this comfortable apartment. Also the host was very responsive for our questions and flexible on checkout. As stated in description, apartment is located in the district called the centre of nightlife which unfortunately also has its shortcomings.

the host was polite, businesslike. the apartment is like on the picture., at the very center of the city, with garage. I'm very pleased. I would recommend it to everyone.

Very comfortable apartment in the center of Budapest. Walk 10 minutes to the historic city center. Everything was very good. Be sure to stop here next time. Thank you.

Nagyon jó szàllás, bulinegyed szívében

Teljesen korrekt házigazda, rugalmas érkezés, távozás. Segítőkészek, próbálnak mindent megtenni a bérlő igényei szerint. Vannak hiányosságok, de ettől függetlenül ajánlani tudom azoknak, akik szeretnének jó helyen (bulis, kicsit hangos) mindenhez közel megszállni.

The apartment is fully equipped. Most of the attractions of Budapest can be found in a 15-minute walk. There is also a deep-level garage under the building.

description:
Fully renovated modern two-level apartment in the most central, safe and trendy part of the city, between Opera House and Basilica Church. Nearby (50 m) there are many restaurants, pubs, shops, underground stations and bus stops, Few minutes of walking there are most beautiful buildings in Budapest.  This apartment "is the perfect place for families or 4-6 persons.  The building was built at the and of the XIX. century and it was totally renovated two years ago.

If you would like transfer from the airport to our appartment we can provide it (20 €. - max. 4 person) You need give to us your arriving time and we wait for you at the airport. Other possibility is to get shuttle bus at the airport.

reviews_text:
Really nice and cozy apartment close to city park and metro stations. Erzsebet is a very genuine and really trusting host and we couldn't have asked for anything more. Thanks a lot for everything. 

This was a perfect little place for us to stay in Budapest. It's in a quaint neighborhood right next to the metro and your minutes walk away from the park. The apartment had everything we needed and we enjoyed having a kitchen to cook breakfast in. We also had a lot of fun in in the jacuzzi and sauna. Checkin and checkout could not have been easier too! 

A very cosy place with a sauna and jacuzzi..will definitely be back..

Тихий район, рядом станция метро и остановка автобуса до центра. Чисто, квартира - студия, все в одной комнате, прихожая, спальня кухня. Полуподвальное помещение, двери двойные, вторые двери застеклённые матовым стеклом, днём первые двери можно открыть для света, окон нет. Одна нормальная подушка и две очень маленькие двоим взрослым спать неудобно. Джакузи огромная, работает, но бойлер 60 л , наливается через душ,приходилось час наливать, потом два часа греть воду самой джакузи, что неудобно, так как шумит здорово. Сауна работает, после длительных прогулок осенью было хорошо потом погреться.

Dziękujemy za bardzo miły pobyt. Pani Gospodarz bardzo miła komunikatywna i bez problemu doradziła we wszystkich pytaniach. Miejsce bardzo dobrze skomunikowane(łatwy dojazd samochodem), bardzo blisko stacji metra. Czysto i przyjemnie.

A lakás csöndes, nyugodt helyen van. A közlekedés tökéletes, busz 3 percre, 1-es metro 5 percre.
A lakás szépen berendezett, tiszta komfortos. Saját jacuzzival és infraszaunával rendelkezik. :) Igazi kis gyöngyszem. 
A házigazda rugalmas volt az érkezést és a távozást illetően. 
Nagyon kedvesek voltak!
Ajánlom Mindenkinek!

Die Wohnung ist ruhig, ruhigen Ort. Verkehr ist perfekt, nur 3 Minuten vom Bus, U-Bahn-Linie 5 Minuten.
Die Wohnung ist schön eingerichtet, sauber und komfortabel. Private Jacuzzi und Infrarotsauna . :) Ein richtiges kleines Schmuckkästchen.
Die Gastgeber waren flexible An- und Abreise der betreffenden.
Sie waren sehr nett!
review_summary:
My place is a renovated and fully equipped small SPA APARTEMENT  located next to the City Park. From here you are within minutes by foot from Heroes Square, Szechenyi Spa, the Museum of Fine Arts or Gundel and Robinson, while  the other tourist attractions are also within a few minutes by public transport.  
It is perfect for couples or individual travelers that like to indulge in their own sauna and jacuzzi after a long day of sightseeing or work.
