reviews_text:
Perfect apartment to do tourism in Budapest. We had a great time there, it is perfectly located, clean and confortable 

This apartment was in a great spot to see the sites, and for good food and drinks. We really enjoyed it and would stay again.

We were welcomed by the cleaning lady who was very kind and even gave us recommendations and places to sightsee. Csilla was also very kind and gave us great flexibility in our check out time! The location of the airbnb was very central- close to many attractions by walking distance. Would definitely recommend

Csilla's home was lovely - spacious and exactly as described. The location couldn't be beat - close to lots of great restaurants, bars and shops. Csilla was also flexible and allowed a later checkout time for us given a late flight on the day of our departure. 

Csilla's place is in the heart of the Jewish district and is really close to many bars and restaurants. It is also close to public transport.
The Apartment was clean and cozy, with everything you need for a weekend away. I would definitely stay there again. 

Perfect location and apartment, would definitely stay here again and recommend to friends.

The place is nice, big enough and equipped. It is part of an atrium gathering several appartment, wish we liked. It is ideally located to join the centre by feet and several attractions are not far incl. pubs thought it won't disturb your sleep. 
The appartment is as the pictures show and the owner answers quickly to your questions and is flexible (late check-in etc).
The kitchen, tv etc makes it easy to spend a nice evening at home in case you would not wish to enjoy Pest by night tonight. 
Only real problem was the smell; once you open the door, a kind of old plastic-smell treats you bad but you open the windows and quickly get used to. 
Globally, we spent a nice time in Budapest and recommend the place!

I was there For a few day and I can to say just was all perfect. Csilla is very very available!!!The flat close to the center but also very quiet. 
I recomend it !! 

Thanks Csilla!! ;P

Csilla's place is very comfortable, clean and nice. It is located in the very central location but the windows are facing the backyard so all the noise from the lively centre does not reach you. Csilla is a very helpful host, ready to answer the questions, explain you how to turn on the TV and all the tiny details. We only communicated through internet but everythig was taked care of. Highly recommended, very good value for money, comfort and great location!

Great position. Quiet as promised, close to public transport and a lot of sights.
In apartment you will find everything you need to stay in comfort.
review_summary:
This nicely renovated quite flat is situated in the beating heart of Budapest. It is a perfect place to discover the city from and also perfect to go home and relax.

reviews_text:
Everything was perfect and we had awesome time in Budapest. The apartment seemed a bit old (also considering the area) but it was very clean and well organized stay. I highly recommend this place. Thanks  Réka :)

The Reka's place was a very good location in the centre and near the metro, shops and all traffic. Comunication about arrival was very good and they speak english. The room was good and as described. In the appartment was a very big friendly dog also with the owners, i just love dogs but that should maybe be stated also in the add, because  some guest have alergies or don't love dogs. I would recommend this place for a quick stay for night or two but maybe not for a week or longer because the owners live there also and it is a shared bathroom and kitchen. They are very friendly though and i had no problems at all with this accomodation.

Everything was good and confortable.

I will definitely recommend Reka's house for a nice and easygoing week end in Budapest!

Also, the flat was located right next to a shopping mall if you need an ATM, a SIM card, and some groceries when you arrive. We had a great time and would recommend to others planning to visit Budapest.

great place- all worked fine. just perfect for our short trip to Budapest. thank you!

The apartment is very clean, quiet and in the perfect location. We did most of the sightseeing on foot. Reka is very nice and hospitable person. I really recommend staying here.

There is Corvin Cinema 5 minutes by walk from here where you can find the main metro station and the main tram stop.

reviews_text:
Ideal apartment with an excellent landlord !
We stayed 4 people, 3 nights. We cooked and relaxed between our trips.
It's a beautiful place with everything you need and even more features than written on airbnb (e.g.:iron, washing machine). It's really close to Mathiass Church and using the 16th bus you can easily get into the Inner City.

All in all, it's simply GREAT !

We stayed three nights in Mates appartment and we had a great time in Budapest. We seriously fell in love with this city, its buildings and its people. The appartment is the perfect starting point for exploring the city. If you walk out the door you are almost directly at the beautiful Matthias Church and the Fisherman's Bastion. The Bus 16 stops - in the direction coming from Pest - directly in front of the appartment. Nevertheless the appartment, the house and the surroundings are really calm. The appartment has everything that you need for your stay and for cooking.
Unfortunately we were not able to meet Mate or his mother, as our flight was delayed, but they left the key at a nearby restaurant.
I would totally recommend Mates appartment, we will definitly come back.

The place was nice, quiet and clean. We stayed here as a couple but it is spacious so you can easily stay here with more people. Besides a little misunderstanding at the check in, our stay was great and the place very comfy and centrally located in the castle district. 

Great flat in an excellent location! Enjoyed our stay here. Flat is clean and tidy.

We spend 4 lovely days in Budapest. Máté was very receptive and made things easy for us in terms of arrival. Although we couldn't meet him directly as he is living abroad, her friend was very nice and was waiting for us quite late at night when we arrived.
The flat is very nice, clean, fully equiped and very well located, just 5 minutes walking from Mathias Church in Buda and 5 minutes from the river. 


We really enjoyed our stay in this clean and well situated apartment. The location really was perfect. The communication with Mate and his mother was prompt and very helpful.
I would certainly recommend others to stay here. 

Mates apartment is in a great location in Budapest and made our stay amazing. The flat is really spacious, with a large sitting area, bathroom, kitchen, and bedroom. The location of the flat is also nice, we had dinner one night at the restaurant directly below the flat and and also spent a few hours in the beer garden on the corner of his building(about 30 feet away). The bus stop is a minute away from his flat and the metro is a 10 minute walk. Mate and his mom were very accommodating and quick to communicate with us. I would stay here again for any future trip to Budapest! 

The location of the apartment is great, you're at a 5min walk away from the Batthyany Metro and trem stations and  20 meters away from the Fisherman's Bastion and the Castle District! The apartment is spacious, clean, modern and very comfy. You've got everything you need including a very fast wifi. We only had email communication with the owner, unfortunately it was not possible to meet, but every time we needed to ask, she answered our emails quickly. I absolutely recommend this apartment! 

Thank you for everything. The Apartment was perfect

Great host and lovely, modern, clean apartment. Good location and restaurants and shops close by.

The room is spacious and lots of light through big windows as you see on the picture. Great value. Would definitely stay again. Thank you, Shanyi.

The apartment is tidy and convince ,nearby the city center,and Sanyi is nice,we arrived in Budapest airport and choosed Sanyi  to pick us up,it's better than taxi . It's a nice trip in Budapest.

Very nice location in the center of Budapest with a great view. Host was very flexible and kind

This house just before the chain bridge, and when you open the window ,you can see the parliament right opposite. The beautiful Danue river in front of the house. Tram 19 can take you along the river bank. Good location. Kind host Sanyi waiting for me at the house when I arrived,and have good communication between us. I will recommend my friends stay here next journey. Thank you  Sanyi, thank you Budapest.

Sandor was great, he met us at the airport for a better deal than the taxis and all that trouble of finding one, we really appreciated that.
The apartment was exactly as the pictures apart from the pictures on the wall as he was redecorating and the spaciousness of the main bed/sitting room suited us down to the ground. The bed was very comfortable and big. The views were wonderful of the bridge and part of the Parliament building. Access by walking to the castle area of Buda was another plus. All in all a 5 star for us. Thank you Sandor
review_summary:
It's a homey flat with the BEST location in the middle of the city. 
Our district is the part of the World Harritage. It's a unique feeling to live at near neighbourhood of the cca. 750 years old Castle District. 
The most recommended sights are within your reach.
house_rules: Smoking is prohibited in the flat but allowed in front of it on the corridor.
description:
It's a homey flat with the BEST location in the middle of the city. 
Our district is the part of the World Harritage. It's a unique feeling to live at near neighbourhood of the cca. 750 years old Castle District. 
The most recommended sights are within your reach.

About the flat:
The 30 m2 room has a unique, breath-taking view of the river Danube, the Chain-bridge and the Hungarian Parliament. The room has a double bed and a comfortable sofa bed which could be also used as a double bed, so it can house 2+2 persons. 
Here is the enterance of the smaller bedroom ( with the same view). There are two more single beds.
The flat has a fully equipped kitchen (refrigerator, small freezer, gas oven, microwave, coffee maker, kitchen appliances, bowls, dishes and cutlery).
The bathroom has a toilet, a bathtub, a sink, a washing machine and a hair drier.

About the house:
This intimate two-storied building, in which the apartment is located on the first floor, was built in the second half of the 19th century based on Hugó Máltás’s designs. Some of the famous residents were: Mr & Mrs John Andrew Masjon, Ödön Lenck, Count Gyula Károlyi, Dr. Andrássy Mihályné.
This slice of the bank of the Danube is part of the World Heritage. The walls of the house had witnessed the 20th century’s history of Hungary and Budapest, survived wars and revolutions. It is one of the most honoured buildings in the district, a monument with a long history.

The owners of the flat are two brothers, Árpád and Sándor Babusa. They grew up and lived here for most of their youth.
Árpád, after many years of being a sportsman, works now as a sales manager. One of his hobbies is gastronomy. He had his own restaurant for several years. He speaks English on a higher degree.

Sándor attended classes at two polytechnic universities of Budapest. Beside hosting and hospitality he is developing and controlling computer networks at an IT company. He speaks English at intermediate level. His main hobby is music, he plays the guitar, sings and composes songs. He’s an active sportsman and always has a happy personality.

About the neighbourhood:
It is located in the most beautiful district of Budapest (District I.). The gorgeous Chainbridge is just a few steps away, just like the breath-taking scenic section of Budapest, the Buda Castle (Budai Vár) with the National Gallery (Nemzeti Galéria), Matthias-temple  (Mátyás-templom), Fishermen's Bastion (Halász-bástya). 
In front of the house runs the river Danube and on the far bank you can enjoy the magnificent view of the Gresham Palace, the Hungarian Academy of Science (MTA) and the unique Parliament. These buildings are all parts of the World Heritage.
The famous parks, restaurants, pubs and cafes of the district are easily accessible. The ruin-pubs, liked amongst students, are within reach on the far bank of the Danube.
The flat is located in the centre of Budapest so most of the attractions could be reached quickly by public transportation. Some notables are for example:  Heroes’ Square (Hősök tere), Margit Island (Margitsziget), Museum of Fine Arts (Szépművészeti Múzeum), Budapest Zoo (Budapesti Állatkert), Gellért Hill (Gellért-hegy), Citadella, some baths, the beautiful bridges and many more things to see.
Every necessity is within reach, like ATM, Change, pharmacy, supermarket, non-stop shops, important bus and tram stops and the metro.


Metro line is 5 minutes, and the bus- and tram lines are 1 minute by walk.

We can pick the guests up at the airport, or railway station by car, and deliver them to the apartment.

reviews_text:
It was a lovely stay in a wonderful city! Everything was more than okay! 

She is ver rudeness and irresponseble.

My check-in time is 11:00am. So I wait Check-in in front of her house at 11:00. But she don't coming. And don't send a message. So I send a message to her. That time she say 'Check-in time at 12:00'. I think if she want to exted the limit, she should send a message to me. But she didn't do it. So I just wait 1 hour. When she come, she didn't say 'sorry'. I recommend this house who want to angry.

Perfect spot for discovering the city. We stayed for two nights and enjoyed a lot. A little bit noisy late at night. Fanni was helpful when settling in and showing us a place where to leave our bags the last day. 

Fanni is a great host who is always on hand should you need to get in contact. I had an issue with the key to the apartment in which Fanni helped via iMessage. 
The location was great despite getting lost on the way to the apartment, but due to Budapests great transport system and the information Fanni gave prior to arrival i soon found the place. 
Only issue I had was having the room next to the kitchen I heard all the other guests having breakfast and talking but then this isn't fanni's fault maybe the other guests should be more courteous. But overall, a great apartment, in a great location with a great host.

All good. No outside window so was stuffy but this was expected.

Shower filled up with water so could have done with a plunge!

Otherwise a pleasant stay in this really well located apartment!

Lovely location close to most of the sights. Lots of great restaurants and bars close by the apartment. We stayed in the room with no window for 5 nights, would not recommend it for that many nights. Air quality is bad, and the walls are paper thin so every tiny movement in the kitchen you can hear loud and clear in the bedroom. Not for light sleepers. 
Would stay here again, but in another room with a window of course. Remember to bring your own towel, as the towels here are small and look dirty (although they are not).
Fanni was easy to reach and quick to reply whenever we had any questions.

Fanni's place is very comfortable and well located. Nice place to stay for some days!

she is very kind host ! The house is close to the centre of Pest. All it's clean, bathroom,bedroom and kitchen! absolutely recommended:)

The room is quite small with no windows and can be suffocating for some however that's not Fanni's fault and I guess you get what you pay for as the price of this room is half of the others. Location is great and room was clean.

The room is spacious and comfortable with the attached bathroom. There is a nearby supermarket and train line which is convenient. Some of the attractions are walk able from this place. Overall it as a pleasant stay.

The Space

reviews_text:
The house is clean and well-equipped. All facilities inside are brand new. Definitely a good choice ever made in the trip.

Tibor was a very gracious host! He didn't hesitate to swing by and bring an extra blanket when I asked him for one. The flat is clean and comfortable. 

Lovely stay! Great location! 

Great flat in a handy location. Tibor made sure we had everything we needed as well as maps and information about the local area before leaving us to enjoy the spotlessly clean flat for our four night stay. Everything worked well and we enjoyed our visit,  especially how handy it was to pop back to the apartment at ease .  A  very professional host and a comfortable experience certainly for the price! 

Tibor is exactly how he describes himself, a great guy and the flat is just perfect and exactly as advertised, a lovely place in the middle of the city. 

Tibor's flat was exactly as advertised.  Absolutely beautiful place in the city center that felt safe.  It had everything my friend and I needed in our time there and Tibor was incredibly quick at responding when I had questions.  Definitely recommend staying.  

Tibor met me exactly on time and was very welcoming.  Absolutely perfect location. Steps away from many attractions as well as public transport.  Clean, comfortable & quiet. 

Lovely flat, great location, very helpful and friendly owner. Would definitely recommend.

The apartment was well located, close to everything. Tibor was quick to respond to any questions and provided suggestions for places to go and see in Budapest. As depicted in the images and noted in Tibor's description, the apartment was clean and lovely. I highly recommend anyone to stay at his place!

The place is in an excellent location. We manage to get everywhere just walking or by tram. 

It was cold outside but fortunately we've been explained how to use the heating by Tibor, as well as  another items in the house. 

I can't think in any single detailed that I've missed in that apartment during my holidays. 

And of course all looked very clean and tidy. I would definitely pick up this apartment again if I have the chance of come back to Budapest.
availability: 3 nights minimum stay.From Feb 16 - 17, 2017 the minimum stay is 2 nights.
review_summary: Newly renovated flat in the city center.  Great place to enjoy the life of an exciting city.
house_rules: Please do not smoke in the flat. Please take care of the silence after 10:00 pm.
description:
Newly renovated flat in the city center.  Great place to enjoy the life of an exciting city.

You can reach me during your stay in any time.

Apartment is conveniently and centrally located. The Central Market is nearby, which is an architectural masterpiece and very pleasant place to have breakfast. Supermarket and bakery are just across the street. Kalvin square, metro and tram stations are really close to the flat. It is easy to get around to see all the city sights. MANY restaurants are right outside the flat, that are excellent so you can taste some delicious Hungarian food. Within 20 minutes walk you can reach lots of top tourist destinations in Budapest.  River Danube, Gellert spa, the biggest Synagogue in Europe, the entertainment district and so on.

To reach the flat from Airport is very simple. Just take the 200E bus from Airport to Metro line 3 (Blue). It takes about 20 minutes. Then with the same Metro go to Kalvin square. The flat is 5 minutes walk. It takes about 50 minutes together.  By taxi is 25 minutes and 22 Euros.

Towels, bed linen, shower gel, dish soap included.

reviews_text: The flat was amazing. So clean, comfortable and friendly atmosphere. The  location is perfect because u can catch the bus immediately. My host was so communicative and helpful, gave me some information about the city. I hope so we will meet again with Zsuzsanna. Thanks for everything. :)
review_summary:
This cozy apartment is situated directly in the green belt area of Budapest.
The apartment (40m2) is fully equipped and exclusively furbished, so you have to just enjoy your stay with your friends.
description:
This cozy apartment is situated directly in the green belt area of Budapest.

The apartment (40m2) is fully equipped and exclusively furbished, so you have to just enjoy your stay with your friends.

It has 1 bedroom and a very confortable living room with 1 sofabed and american kitchen. This mini flat is homelike and leisurely.

I will be available on mobile or email and of course personally during check-in and out time.

You can find many shops and bakeries here. This place is very quiet but you can reach the heart of the city in 15 min.  In the steert there is one currency exchange, two ATM and tobacco shop.

The public transport is the best because the bus station is situated in front of the flat. People can parking on the street which is free for  everyone.

This apartment can be accommodated up to 4 persons. There is 1 bedroom (for 2) and a living room with 1sofabed (for 2). There is a fully furnished, equppied kitchen (washing machine, stove, microwave, fridge, kettle and coffee machine, dinnerware set) and a bathroom with douche. The guest comfort serve more the 40 LED TV with cable system and the free Wifi internet. The host provides to the guests towels, iron with deck, hairdryer.

reviews_text:
The apartment has a perfect location in the Jewish quarter and absolutely perfect for a weekend in Budapest!
It was clean, welcoming and the check-in was uncomplicated. I'd totally recommend it :)

Very nice location. Close to city center, pubs, restaurants, etc. 

Great apartment in an excellent location. Everything was clean, the communication was excellent and they were flexible regarding our check-out time. I can definitely recommend it!

Apartment of Kati and Fisel was the first our traveling experience through Airbnb. We were so lucky to stay at their flat, it exceeded all our expectations! The apartment looked even better than in the pictures because when we saw it personally, we noticed many beautiful interior design details which made an impression of comlete coziness. There was everything we needed for comfort living, the apartment was clean and tidy. 
We experienced the feeling of real home with Kati and Fisel!
Thank you! You made our trip! 

Lolita and Dmytro

Kati and Fisel were most accomodating and welcoming. We arrived very late at night and they had no problem waiting up for us. Even though it was after 1 in the morning, they still took the time to show us around and talk to us about the best ways to get around Budapest. They had even left us a bottle of hungarian liquer to help us celebrate our anniversary. 
The apartment is exactly as described. Lovely and clean and warm. It is in a fantastic location with restaurants and bars only 5 minutes walk away.


As mentioned by others, the place looks exactly like the photos.
The hosts could not be any more accommodating. They met us at 1 a.m for check-in and allowed us to stay until 4 p.m. on check-out day, and consistently kept in contact with us throughout our stay.
The place was a little humid, but the dehumidifier took care of the problem. Location was great, near many restaurants and bars, and close to several metro stations. Very easy to travel back to the airport. The place was pretty quiet considering there were bars on the other side of the building which you couldn't hear. Not 100% sound-proof, but what place is?  We highly recommend this place.

After following Kati's clear and precise directions to this gem of an apartment I was greeted there by Fisel, whom I found very courteous and generous in her knowledge of the area and her advice.

The area was very well centrally located close to all public transport links, shopping, restaurants , bars and facilities! 

The apartment itself is set in a quite courtyard setting that leads into a busy, vibrant street . Totally ideal for the Budapest experience!

I would recommend this apartment to any future guests as being a friendly, clean , safe, home from home experience.

Thank you Kati and Fisel for such a pleasant and memorable stay x

This apartment was a great choice, fantastic location, clean and near to public transport. The house was a bit wet, but using dehumidifier and opening the windows it disappeared in a short time.

Thanks to Kati and Fisel for the excelent comunication and flexibility

Im picky when I choose apartments, cause I work in renting and hosting for a long time, but freely I can say whit this one you can not make mistake.
First of all Fisel, our host who was so nice, and had  patience for our late train and early arrival that actually was early train and latte arrival :) She was so flexible for our check in.
After check in she showed a map and give us a lot of useful information.
All the time she was  just message away for everything we need.
Apartment is spotlessly clean, perfectly designed, comfortable for four people, in a perfect location for exploring city.
It is based in a party area, but in total silence, cause it is orientated to the garden. Moment when you step on the street you are  surrounded with "ruinpubs",  bars, restaurants, and the main historical attractions are on a walking distance. Also public transport is just two minutes away.
So all in all, great host, clean and comfortable apartment in a strategic place for exploring history and night life but on quiet side so you can have good sleep. For us that's a holy trinity of perfect stay in some city.
Thanks guys you have made our stay memorable one. From possible five  stars you have ten from us !

Everything was excellent! We are very pleased with apartment and hospitality. We'll be  happy to come here again! Thank you, Kati and Fisel!
availability: 2 nights minimum stay.From Dec 01, 2016 - Feb 28, 2017 the minimum stay is 3 nights.
review_summary:
A cosy place in Budapest Soho, the most chic & bustling downtown region, yet silent as the windows face the inner courtyard. Newly renovated. 
TWIN FLAT (APT2) NEXT DOOR! 
3 mins. from metro, tram, bus stops. 
Eco-friendly.
house_rules:
No smoking inside please! You can smoke in the common courtyard by the entrance door, but please don't be noisy and be nice to the neighbours.
No house parties or overnight guests please!
CHECK-IN/OUT between 10 a.m. - 8p.m.
(in special cases we try to be flexible, feel free to let us know!)
Try to leave the place as you found it please!
description:
A cosy place in Budapest Soho, the most chic & bustling downtown region, yet silent as the windows face the inner courtyard. Newly renovated. 
TWIN FLAT (APT2) NEXT DOOR! 
3 mins. from metro, tram, bus stops. 
Eco-friendly.

TWIN FLAT (APT2) NEXT DOOR! 

There is another twin apartment right next door (APT2).

BASIC NEEDS
The apartment has a 4m high, open-space living room with a dining area, a convertible sofa bed and a kitchen, plus an upper floor bedroom with a double bed, a chest of drawers, bedside table and a clothes stand. Kitchen is equipped with cooking facilities, kettle, toaster, oven, fridge, dishwasher, espresso machine, dishes, plates, cutlery etc. There is no washing machine in the apartment, but there is a laundromat in the building for common use, against charge (around 2.5 Euros /wash). Bathroom has a wash-basin with mirror, a toilet, electric towel drier and a shower cabin.

ECO-FRIENDLY
- We use eco- and skin-friendly cleaning stuff
- Led and energy efficient lighting
- Water-saving taps (with aerator)
- Induction hobs
- Separate bins for waste sorting

- CHILD-FRIENDLY
- Children's cutlery and plates 
- Potty
- Step stool
- Toys
- Baby bassinet /cradle available upon request

Entire aptartment can be used without any restrictions. There is one closed  cupboard (in the storage room on the ground floor) where we keep the excess bedding, towels, cleaning facilities, official documents etc.

Guests receive at least 2 contacts for easier access. Fastest way to keep in touch is email, messenger or text-message.

Centrally located. Part of the Old Jewish quarter. Easily accessible and close to great restaurants, street food, bars, cafes, clubs, groceries, bakeries, shopping possibilities.
Many touristic places are within walking distance, such as cult streets of ruin pubs (Kazinczy, Király, Wesselényi, Gozsdu yard etc), Synagogues and other Jewsih memorial sights, St Stephen's Basilica, Váci street, Opera House, Andrássy Avenue etc.
Big Bus sightseeing tour bus is a few minutes away.

City & Transportation maps provided!

AIRPORT
Taxi is approx. 20-25 Euros, credit cards accepted. Airport Shuttle Minibus is 18 Euros for 2 people. By local transportation around 5 Euros.

CITY CENTRE
Tram nr. 4-6 is within 3-5mins. walking distance, goes on main ring line day and night. Metro station Blaha Lujza square is also 3-5 mins. away, with several bus and trolley stops nearby as well, going to sights such as the Castle district, Heroes squre, Danube, Parliament, Margit Island etc. 
Various BIKE rentals can be found nearby.
PARKING: 440 HUF /hour in the streets (free at the weekend). Or the best option is to use the Nonstop Parking lot across the street, against charge.

reviews_text:
Very nice stay, apartment is centrally located and looked bright and spacious. Hosts are wonderful and laid back ppl that we're very helpful with everything.

The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
availability: On Fridays and Saturdays the minimum stay is 1 night.
review_summary:
Greeting guests! we offer you a lovely bedroom in our cozy apartment located in the 7th district,Conveniently located by trains, subway and bus station.
If you want a cheap separate room to live the Budapest experience, then this is the right place for you.
We are clean, respectful, and happy to accommodate you.

reviews_text:
A lovely apartment in a fantastic location. We were able to walk almost everywhere from here but the apartment feels homely and secluded. David is a very approachable host with lots of helpful tips if you ask

David and Kata's place was a beautiful, high ceilinged apartment approx 2 minutes walk away from the famous Chain Bridge and just below the Castle district. David met us upon our arrival with a lovely dog, Mischa. David was very thorough at check-in, making sure we were comfortable and well supported with active encouragement to contact him if we had questions. HE had a lot of helpful suggestions and really made our first night easy. I would stay again for sure. 

We enjoyed a lot staying in Kata's Appartement. It is just as described and although the building is quite old, everything is functional and clean. The location is great, there is also a small minimarket right in the roundabout so we could get our shopping done a few meters away from the house. Everything is well maintained and really quiet any time. David was very welcoming and had great recommendations tailored for us.

David was an excellent host and apartment had everything we needed. The location was fine, at the Buda side of the river and next to the chainbridge. If you're not afraid of a little walk you can explore the whole city center by foot. The decoration was youthfull and all the supplies were there. The only downfall was that there wasn't a lot of natural light coming in the apartment, there were no windows at the streetside.

The apartment is truly lovely! Located perfectly on the Buda side next to the Chain Bridge.
This is honestly our favorite place to stay in Budapest not only for its beauty, but for its charm, location, and cleanliness. 
David was a wonderful host, and went far and beyond to help us celebrate my birthday!
Thank you so much for a perfect and lovely weekend :)

Nothing but good things to say. David was friendly, helpful, efficient and always on hand. The flat was lovely and spacious and in an excellent location to explore both Buda and Pest. Highly recommended.

David was a perfect host! He was always very responsive and helpful.

The apartment was very spacious and cosy. He had a great time there! 

David was truly lovely. Very helpful with recommendations about where to go. The apartment was fantastic. Great location. And beautiful 

We had a wonderful time in Budapest, and the location of this flat is great! Right next to the chain bridge, and easy walking to the sights on the Buda side of the city. The flat was quiet and comfortable, and the internet is very fast for researching local sights. And thank you for the suggestion of the restaurant Klassz. We had a wonderful meal there, and I will try to find it again the next time I visit Budapest. David is very prompt with communications, and helpful with all questions asked.

Everything was cool, David is a very good host.
availability: The minimum night stay for this listing varies.
review_summary: In the epicentre of Budapest, 20 meters from the Chain Bridge our stylish, spacious and comfortable apartment is a great choice for a stay. The house has a certain beautiful decadence while the apartment is modern, beautiful and feels home immediately. The location is simply great: you have many famous sites at walking distance and just hop on a bus to reach everything in 15 minutes. We are experienced AirBnB hosts who are passionate about providing the best experience :-)

reviews_text: Good value for money. Central location. Close to the public transport.
review_summary:
A lovely studio apartment with a nice gallery in the heart of Budapest. Ideal for family, friends or business trip. 

The apartment is about 100 meters from the Deák tér, which is the heart of Budapest and everything is in walking distance from here.

Fully equipment and the hosts help you to start easier your time in the city.
description:
A lovely studio apartment with a nice gallery in the heart of Budapest. Ideal for family, friends or business trip. 

The apartment is about 100 meters from the Deák tér, which is the heart of Budapest and everything is in walking distance from here.

Fully equipment and the hosts help you to start easier your time in the city.

When you arrive I will show you everything (restaurants, pubs, public transportation etc.) on a map or I might give you a small tour of Budapest!

The Király Street is one of the most popular area in the city. You can find there the citylife in the 'Gozsdu udvar' and try different hungarian specialty like the traditional hungarian foods. Or you can try the beer bike with your friends etc. We can tell you about these things a lot later! :)

It's the main point of the public transport thanks for the 3 metrolines from here. Trams and buses go to different parts of the city. But almost everything is in walking distance. So it is really easy to go anywhere from here.

reviews_text: Máté's apartment is in a perfect location to discover Budapest by walk or public transport. I got the keys at exactly the agreed time and received enough information for the apartment. It was super clean and kitchen is beautiful and nicely refurbished! The room is spacious enough for two people.
availability: 3 nights minimum stay.From Dec 26, 2016 - Jan 03, 2017 the minimum stay is 4 nights.
review_summary: Stay at my beautiful, fully renovated, cosy and calm apartment with 1 separate bedroom for two, well-equiped kitchen and a bathroom woth a shower and toilet. Perfect and comfy place for a couple or for two friends.
house_rules:
Please note that this is a private apartment in a non-commercial building, which means that people are living there with their families trying to enjoy their free time out of their workplace. Therefore loud parties and heavy drinking is NOT permitted in the flat. If you come to Budapest for these activities please book another apartment!

Pets and smoking are forbidden.
description:
Stay at my beautiful, fully renovated, cosy and calm apartment with 1 separate bedroom for two, well-equiped kitchen and a bathroom woth a shower and toilet. Perfect and comfy place for a couple or for two friends.

Relax in my cute apartment. It has a bedroom, a well-equipped eat-in kitchen a bathroom with a shower and a toilet. This place is perfect for a couple or for two friends.

The kitchen has all appliances including microwave, oven, stove, fridge, freezer.

The apartment is on the ground floor so you don't need to use the staircase. Public parking is available around the building or in a parking garage just next to the apartment's building.

The whole apartment is yours! Just make yourself at home :)

The followings are provided by me:
* High-speed internet (WLAN, WiFi)
* Sheets (freshly made beds for you!)
* Bath and hand towels, dish towels, soap and washing up liquid, toilet paper.
* Liquid soap also for showering
* You will get two pair of keys

I will be waiting for you in the apartment when you arrive, give you the keys and show you the whole flat.

You can contact me 0-24 during your stay. I live nearby and am quite happy to pop around if anything is needed.

Walking distance:
* 2 minutes to Budapest's main tram (line 4-6) 
* 2 minutes to metro M3 stop "Corvin negyed"
* Danube riverside is 10 minutes walk
* Shops and services around the corner: shopping mall, supermarket, bakery, post office and taxi stand.

In the apartment, you have a detailed area map, so you can easily find your way around.

Member of Bridges Bed & Food Budapest Apartment House.

review_summary: This nice flat is at the Keleti railway station in the centre.The apartment is located right in the heart of Budapest.  Anything you would like to do is within a few minutes walk or public transport. We are close to the ruin bar area, restaurants, most sights, and the shopping district. this is a brand new apartment in a new building, ideal for 2.
description:
This nice flat is at the Keleti railway station in the centre.The apartment is located right in the heart of Budapest.  Anything you would like to do is within a few minutes walk or public transport. We are close to the ruin bar area, restaurants, most sights, and the shopping district. this is a brand new apartment in a new building, ideal for 2.

All you need is a good communication, clean and comfortable apartment and a good location. We have it all, and waiting for You!

You can rich us any time you need assistance.

review_summary: A newly redesigned, cosy 48 sqm apartment located on the Buda side, in the surroundings of Gellert Hill and Spa. An ideal place with excellent transportation links. A perfect choice for active holidays and business trips.

reviews_text:
Fantastic place in a perfect location, close to all the sights and in a great neighborhood to explore at night.  The apartment was modern and unique.  Gyorgy was a great host and very helpful.  Definitely recommended!

Gyorgy place is wonderful! If very clean, big, nice and modern areas, very good WiFi, location is extremely good, lost of restaurants, shop, tourist attractions, night  life, metro. The place has washer and dryer machine, iron and iron board, great coffee machine. Perfect place in Budapest!!! 

Our stay in Gyorgy´s apartment was great. Everything was as described, best location, would recommend it!!! 

György was waiting for us in the apartment as we agreed, showed us the place and was very nice and helpful. Apartment was great and location was perfect, really would recommend it to everyone especially if you are traveling with car as you have posibillity to use garage parking very near to the aparmtement for free, this was big plus. 

One of the best Airbnb we have ever stayed in. George and his wife met us on arrival and explained everything including places to eat. Car park is 2 mins walk. The apartment is stunning. Great location. Walking distance to everything. We liked it so much we extended our stay. 

Fantastic apartment in great location close to everything. George and his wife met us and explained everything including great restaurant recommendation. Apartment had all mod cons and everything you could need - including welcome chocolate. Safe parking spot provided a real bonus. The best AirBnB we have stayed in Europe so far so extended one further night - highly recommended.

Everything was great. George was very accommodating and helpful. It was a little warm and stuffy when we first got there but he brought a fan over for us and it was great after that. The location is very close to the metro and there are lots of great restaurants and bars nearby as well. The ability to park our car in a parking garage about a block away from the apartment was also a huge plus. 

George was a fantastic host. He greeted us upon arrival with his family and walked us through his property and provided us all pertinent info, which I appreciated. He also provided ample household supplies (i.e., laundry detergent, US to EU wall converter, etc) which we found to be very helpful as well. He also allowed me to keep the converter as I was unable to locate another in Budapest and was continuing to travel after my stay here. Thanks again for that!

The property is in a great location in the old Jewish quarter with a lot of nearby restaurants and bars and access to public transportation via the Deak Ference Ter underground station. 

I would highly recommend the property and George to anyone considering the property for their upcoming trip to Budapest.  

My girlfriend met Gyorgy, she said he was both professional and friendly :)

The apartment was exactly as described, we loved the shower and beds. The street is quiet and close to popular Kiraly Street and Andrassy Avenue.  

However at late night foot traffic can be loud on weekends but given the proximity to bars/clubs/restaurants this is to be expected :) It wasn't anything city dwellers would be unused to.  We can certainly recommend the Trofea Grill nearby!

An additional benefit is the complimentary guaranteed parking  in a public garage one block from the apartment.

Basically a fantastic apartment for people looking to explore Budapest nightlife, you won't go wrong here.

György was very welcoming. Even though we have requested late check-in, he was there on time and spent enough time explaining us all details that we needed. 
The listing was very accurate. We came by car and were also using private parking. 
Location was perfect. It was close to everything, but also not noise in the evening.
review_summary: Recently renovated, fully furnished, modern design loft apartment in the heart of downtown, just 50 meters from the famous Andrassy Avenue which is part of the World Heritage and Gozsdu Courtyard, the newest entertainment district of Budapest.
description: Recently renovated, fully furnished, modern design loft apartment in the heart of downtown, just 50 meters from the famous Andrassy Avenue which is part of the World Heritage and Gozsdu Courtyard, the newest entertainment district of Budapest.

reviews_text:
The apartment was fantastic, very nice and clean apartment , located in the best area ,flat is exactly as shown on the pictures, the host Kata was very welcoming and communicative, the apartment is very central,Easy walk to a lot of place... restaurants clubs, coffee house, the river and many beautiful places , thank you Kata !

Kata responded very quickly and was very easy to reach on arriving in Budapest, which is great since I wasn't familiar with the city. She had a map at the apartment and recommended some nearby streets for restaurants. As well, she had very kindly stocked the apartment with some fruits, drinks and snacks which made staying very easy and homey. Finally, she and her family live nearby and she offered to be available in case anything came up, which was great. Checking out was quick and painless.

The apartment is extremely convenient to the centre of the city and to transit for anything further away while the building itself is an atmospheric old building right next to the basilica. The unit is on the top (3rd) floor and faces the courtyard, so it's bright and quiet except for church bells. 

Kata is the perfect host for a great little apartment right in the middle of Pest. 

The apartment is very well located close to the Saint Stephans Cathedral. Surrounded by good restaurants (as well as places to spend the evening) we were quite lucky considering the late arrival.

Kata was very friendly and welcoming albeit we did not make the meeting by the agreed time.

The apartment is neat and clean. It makes you feel like you are at home.
availability: The minimum night stay for this listing varies.
review_summary:
Our lovely, classic style home is located in the heart of the city, on the top floor of a very calm house, right next to the Basilica.
You can enjoy a beautiful panorama from the armchair day and night, there is the St. Stefan Basilica cupola on show.
The house has an elevator, and the flat itself is located in the brightest, most peaceful part of the house.
This is a great apartment for couples or business travellers, who love the vibe of the downtown, and also like to sleep in silence.

reviews_text:
The host was very welcoming before we arrived and the apartment was exactly how it looked online...modern and completely spotless, it was so lovely! 
Ideal location, close to lively city centre.

Great place to stay fantastic location, we walked to the Christmas market and over to the ruin bars so much to see and do from here. Building felt safe and had everything we needed. No noise from the city at all. Very warm in the winter which was nice and the windows opened wide to air the place too. 

There are many other places you can find better than this one. Wouldn't stay here again.

Good location though

Cozy flat really near to all central attractions from Budapest like the central market, chain bridge, citadel and parliament and also accessible to all public transport. Highly recommend the apartment!

Lovey apartment 

Not at all what the listing depicts. The building is rundown and feels dangerous, the inside of the apartment feels as if it's in the middle of a renovation - there's no shower door so water goes everywhere, there's a door and it's hinges leaning against a wall, there is no bed just a small pulled out coach. Would not recommend.

The space was very clean and very new. The kitchen was great, and so were the amenities. We did not have wifi for the first night (out of the host's control) but George did a great job in repairing the issue promptly and efficiently. The neighbourhood was in a great location and close to pretty much everything we wanted to see on the "Pest" side of the Danube (10-15 minutes walking distance maximum). Would definitely recommend!

Flat was as described and check in was made easy by having a reception area to report to. 

Lovely apartment right in the city centre of the lively Pest. We found it clean and tidy.
The host has also kindly organised the transfer from and to the airport, also didn't mind a late check in.

Highly recommend.

all right, great location, no complaints
availability: On Fridays and Saturdays the minimum stay is 2 nights.
review_summary: This cozy 40 m² 1 bedroom apartment is wonderfully located in the heart of the 5th district (the most central district of the city).
description:
This cozy 40 m² 1 bedroom apartment is wonderfully located in the heart of the 5th district (the most central district of the city).

You are close to the famous Váci Street, the main fashion shopping street in Budapest, with souvenir stores and breath-taking architecture. The St. Stephen's Basilika and Andrássy Avenue (the Hungarian "Champs Elysées”) is about 5 minutes by walk, the Danube and the Chain Bridge and the famous Vörösmarty Square (where the Christmas market takes place) is around the corner. This is the best location you could possibly get in Budapest. The building is a classic post-War modernist residential house, typical of downtown Budapest with an interior courtyard and hanging corridors. The neighborhood is safe with foot traffic, strong security, locked gates after 10pm, and a coded entry door.

Helpful and cheerful hosts who are eager to help with anything.

"The neighborhood is trendy and lively, crowded with bars, cafés, shops, supermarkets, and public gardens. The area is rich with Budapest’s newest and most modern restaurants, with cuisines ranging from Hungarian, Italian, French, burgers, burritos - the best of everything. The "Budapest Eye" ferris wheel is 1 block away in the summer time. The famous Central café is 1 minute walk. Public transportation (subway, trams, and buses) leave directly from Deák Square, and there are bicycle rental stations 20 meters away. The airport shuttle arrives/departs straight from the square as well. We will give you suggestions of the best places to make the most of your stay, whether you want to eat, drink, have a coffee, or party! 

Have a look at the guide on this page, it references the main attractions in the city center around the apartment."

"Subway: Deák Ferenc Tér (M2 and M3 subway lines, M1 historic metro line)
Trams: Line 2 (Runs adjacent to Danube), Line 47, 49
Railway Stations: 2 stops by metro from Nyugati Railway Station, 3 stops by metro from Keleti Railway Station
Buses: Buses to the castle area, Hop-On Hop-Off buses"

We provide towels, bed linens and hair-dryer in our apartment.

You can order breakfast the price is EUR 5 / day / person. You can order it when you check in.

reviews_text:
Amazing neighborhood, couldn't be more practical, both to visit the city and enjoy the night. The flat is quite modern and everything works just fine. Attila was completely available through the app and mobile and willing to help.

Cute place but clean and nicely laid out and plenty big enough for two. Is in such a good location and can get from there to nearly everything within a short walk. Had a lovely Christmassy weekend stay! 

Everything was fine, only the drain in the bathroom was stinking.
The apartement is very good located, you can reach everything by feet. 

Amazing location. And perfect communication. Perfect. 

Good flat in a good location

Very clean and comfortable place. Super convenient location, we didn't have to take the train around (except to the szechenyi bath). We felt right at home in this house. 

Very nice and stylish apartment. Great location right in the city center! It is a bit smaller then looks at the pictures. Apartment is situated in a ground floor, that why it is a bit cold there. Gas heater helps, but floor is cold anyway. Bathroom is too small, and there is no heater, so very wet there all the time! Owner is very nice and helpful!
Отличная квартира, красивая, уютная. Местоположение супер, напротив оперы! Метро в двух шагах и много кафе, ресторанов и достопримечательностей в пешей доступности! 
На самом деле квартира меньше, чем выглядит на фото! Первый этаж, потому очень холодный пол! Старый газовый обогреватель не работал один день, было ужасно холодно, потом хозяин починил. Очень маленькая душевая совмещенная с туалетом, там отопления нет вообще, очень сыро.

Attila's apartment is as good as the photos of the ad. The space was just what we needed for the days we stayed in Budapest: comfortable, quiet and clean.

The kitchen had all the necessary utensils to cook easily (there was a supermarket a few blocks away). Still, on the board in one of the walls there was good recommendations of restaurants to visit in the neighborhood.
You could walk easily to many interesting places of the city from the apartment. It was a great choice and definitely I will stay there again.

The flat is at 1 minute walking distance to the high street having big fashion stores like Gucci, LV etc. It was a nice and cozy place. I totally recommend this place to everyone visiting Budapest. Unfortunately we were unable to meet Attila but his friend Gina helped us in check-in and explained all necessary details.

The flat is super well located! Nice and clean and the host is really reactive in any case! Thank you for this Nice Stay!
review_summary: Our studio with a loft is a newly refurbished, stylish little hub. It's for 2 people, but can fit 4, as the couch folds out.  The flat is located less than 1 minute walk from the Opera, from Andrassy road and most importantly the vibrating Gozsdu.
description: Our studio with a loft is a newly refurbished, stylish little hub. It's for 2 people, but can fit 4, as the couch folds out.  The flat is located less than 1 minute walk from the Opera, from Andrassy road and most importantly the vibrating Gozsdu.

reviews_text:
Everything was just like advertised. Location was great, just below the castle. Apartment is on the ground floor which was nice. Plenty of hot water for showers, bed is in the loft but was comfortable...we slept great! Adam's sister was waiting for us upon arrival so check in was easy! Adam helped us arrange a taxi for our departure. Everything went smoothly! We enjoyed our stay!

Adam is a kind host. It's a really great place to couple or single tourist! Near with popular tourist attractions. Clean and wonderful place!!

Very nice location of the apartments, very close to the Old Town. All the best tourist attractions of Buda are very close to this place. Apartments has everything you need - fridge, microwave, coffee machine. There is always a hot water in shower, house has calm and quiet private yard, so it's really quiet  in the evening and sleeping hours.
Small store is nearby, and big Spar supermarket is close to the subway station. My mom didn't see Adam in person, but his instructions in message and email were very detail and friendly. I can totally recommend this place from my mother's words about this accommodation. If I will go to Budapest by myself, I will definately stay there. 

Прекрасное расположение квартиры, очень близко от старого города. Все главные туристические достопримечательности Буды - рядом, можно передвигаться пешком по центру, до Цепного моста - около 2 минут тихим ходом. Квартира оборудована всем необходимым - холодильник, микроволновка, кофеварка, всегда есть горячая вода в душе; спокойный тихий двор. Небольшой магазин находится совсем рядом, большой супермаркер Шпар - у метро. 
С Адамом встретиться не получилось, инструкции пришли по переписке, все очень подробно и доброжелательно. 
Могу рекомендовать это место всем, кто едет в Будапешт.

The location of the flat is perfect with regards to the Buda castle. It's within waking distance. The place was very clean and tidy when I arrived. My only complaint is the bed. Although the bedsheets seemed clean, after my first night I woke up with flea bites. I was very annoyed. If the mattress and duvet are changed are changed, I would definitely recommend the place.  

This was an interesting little flat. The description and pictures in the listing were accurate and Ádám was a great airbnb host. 

Adam is a good Host, he was really friendly. The location of apartment was great and the flat is so kind of sweet.

Adams’s appartment is in the very center of budapest, really in the middle of main attractions, but also a quiet place. It was great to book on the same day I arrived. Adam confirmed quickly and came personally to welcome me. I had a great stay, thanks!


Ádám is a great host, very accommodating. Let us leave our bags at the accommodation for a few hours after our stay. The place was perfect for us. Well equipped kitchen and free coffee. If you're wanting to stay in Buda this is a great location, close to the Castle, Danube and some of the baths, however as we spent most of our time in Pest there was a fair bit of walking for us. The place was clean and tidy, would definitely recommend staying here.

The flat is really convenient because of it geographic situation. The flat has everything, sweet details from the host. 
However, there are only 2 little windows and no view

Adam was amazingly nice. We arrived a few hours late for check in but he was nice enough to meet us at the place.
The location is TOTALLY AMAZING, near to an arabic restaurant (which we found really convenient) and close to the bus stop. Close as in around 3-4 minutes, it is that close. The place is also really close to the castle.
We loved out stay and really recommend his place.
review_summary: Small studio flat for a low price. Ideal for low budget tourists who wants to stay in a friendly apartment right in the city center (2 minutes walk from Zero Kilometre Stone, Clark Adam square). 2-3 minutes walk to the Castle and to the Danube.
description:
Small studio flat for a low price. Ideal for low budget tourists who wants to stay in a friendly apartment right in the city center (2 minutes walk from Zero Kilometre Stone, Clark Adam square). 2-3 minutes walk to the Castle and to the Danube.

The apartment is recommended for solo travelers or couples. The bed is on a sleeping gallery where you can get on by steep stairs (as shown on the photos). Please consider this before booking.

Nice restaurants cafés and pubs with a beautiful view to the Danube and the Parliament, 0-24 shop, supermarket, post office, pharmacy, underground and HÉV station, all within a few minutes walk.

If you arrive by car you can easily find free parking places at the Danube bank.

Nescafé Dolce Gusto caffee machine and capsules.

reviews_text:
thank you very much Oasis team and personally to Dasha, who did stay in the new city comfortable and memorable. the apartment we found everything you need. and welcome coffee was very handy)) Apartment small but very thoughtful zoning, interior design, nice natural colors, kitchen, wardrobe and bed. apartments are very convenient to all attractions. lost only once - when they got to the station :). But the "call a friend", that is, the Oasis team, saved us! pleased useful option - a smartphone with Internet access and local sim-cards, which can be enjoyed while staying in Budapest and do not get lost thanks to (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) map
happy to advise our friends this apartment

Really amazing apartment, spacious but cozy and in a great location! Our main host Ella was incredible and so so helpful, always accessible on the phone they supplied to us. It offered us easy access to (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) maps and Internet to help with translation and attractions near by. The apartment was clean, and very modern- just upstairs to some really good quality restaurants and places to get breakfast. On the second to last day there was a problem with the buildings water and our taps and showers were off for an hour- at the time we were desperate for showers but our host was amazing and offered us there nearby apartment while this problem had arose. 
 Overall the trip was complete with this cute little apartment that we could go back to at the end of a long day. Definitely recommend, and will return to next time in Budapest 

Great service, I would totally recommend it! Loved the area and the apartment, very cozy and clean! 

The hosts assisted me in airport connections, meetup for entry to the apartment, and everything else.  The apartment was comfortable and clean, bright and cheerful, great kitchen, super convenient and beautiful location.  Would definitely go back!

Absolutely lovely apartment, in a great location. The hosts impressed from the moment we booked, and where very friendly and helpful. If we came back to Budapest we would definitely stay here again! 

It was great to be welcomed so warmly. And to feel that we could reach out if we needed anything. Very very nice place!!

The apartment was in a great location and in a good condition.

The phone they gave us was fantastic specially with a free internet 

However, if you have a luggage, beware that there are few stare steps before entering the apartment.
Restaurants are near by.


Team Oasis was really responsive and available when i arrived. Gave me a detailed tour of the listing and provided the information i needed for a good trip. I thought their provision of a cell phone was a great and thoughtful addition to the trip for people who otherwise would not have the ability to communicate. I had to leave early, and they were very understanding. Good place to stay for the price, and if you like nightlife, the location would be perfect for you. 

The rental is exactly as in the pictures, great light and the washer and other amenities really came in handy. Consider a visit to 360 bar just around the corner if you want a stunning view of the city at sunset (or anytime!). In general, the location was outstanding, very central, metro-accessible, and walking distance to lots of excellent food and shopping opportunities. We would definitely consider staying here again on our next visit to beautiful Budapest!

Allan and crew run a tight ship.  The apartment was clean and exactly as pictured.  Allan's team organized an airport pickup and also set up a dinner cruise for us.  The location of the apartment was great for exploring Pest.  We loved the ruin bars and so many were in walking distance.  The only slight drawback was the noise from other tenants/guests in the building.  Some of the tenants or guests were obscenely load at very late hours.  Singing at the tops of their lungs.
review_summary: A sublime penthouse suite - calm and cosy, with a luxurious bed and skylight with a view onto the Franz Liszt Academy of Music. Superbly located on Liszt Ferenc Square in Central Budapest, with all the square's restaurants and cafes at your doorstep.
house_rules:
1. We have no reception desk, the key is given at a pre-arranged time. The apartment can be occupied on the day of the arrival from 3PM and should be left before 11AM on the day of departure. Late check-in after 9pm has an extra charge of 15 euro. When possible we are flexible with these times so please advise us of your requirements in advance.  

2. The apartment can be used only by our checked-in guests. 

3. Please always lock the doors to the apartment, i.e. the street door & the apartment door. 

4. We accept no responsibility for your valuables left in the apartment.

5. This point is particularly important and no concessions will be made: Please pay respect to other residents of the house. Please close the doors carefully and silently, stay away from any behavior that can disturb any residents particularly after 9PM. We reserve the right to cancel the service immediately with keeping the whole fee of the rental if we receive any valid complaints from other residents of the house. 

6. Should you face any problem with the apartment during your stay, please inform us immediately, so we can do our best to resolve it as quickly as possible :)
 
7. At the check out please leave the apartment in the same condition as you found it on arrival. Any damage caused during your stay must be compensated by you. Please respect the cleanliness. 

8. Please return all the keys received as agreed previously at the handover. 

9. Pets are not allowed in the apartment, unless formerly agreed with us. 

10. Smoking in the apartment is strictly forbidden. 

11. We do not accept reservations for stag/hen parties or for football supporters coming to European Championship matches. Thank you for your understanding.

12. €50 charge for loss of keys

13. €150 charge for lost or damaged smart phone
description:
A sublime penthouse suite - calm and cosy, with a luxurious bed and skylight with a view onto the Franz Liszt Academy of Music. Superbly located on Liszt Ferenc Square in Central Budapest, with all the square's restaurants and cafes at your doorstep.

Look out onto the rooftop of the recently restored and stunningly beautiful Academy of music!

The apartment has a luxurious and very comfortable queen size divan bed that sleeps 2, and a fold-out sofa bed that can accommodate 2 more people, allowing up to 4 people to stay.

Free WIFI is available throughout the apartment and  there is also an HD TV with satellite TV with English, German, French, and Spanish channels. The breakfast table seats 2.

The modern kitchen comes fully equipped with a toaster, kettle, oven, microwave, and built in washing machine. For coffee lovers there's a Nespresso coffee machine with complimentary capsules.

Essentials such as shampoo, quality bed linens, hairdryer and soft white fluffy towels are all provided, just bring your suitcase :)

In addition to the free in-house wifi, the apartment also comes with a guest smartphone with free 3G data, preloaded with useful apps such as translate and maps, to help you stay connected when exploring the city.

- We also provide airport transfer service.Please mention at booking if you'd like one. Your driver will wait for you in arrivals and will be holding a sign with your name
Standard Car - €28 per trip
Executive VIP Saloon (Mercedes E-Class or equivalent) - €47 per trip

- Nespresso machine with complimentary capsules.
- LCD TV with HDMI connectivity
- Cable TV with English channels 
- Free, high-speed Wi-Fi internet connection
- Washing machine
- Oven/Cooker
- Microwave
- Refrigerator/Freezer
- Kettle
- Toaster
- Hairdryer
- All our guests receive 10% of all meals at Cafe Vian downstairs

WE LOVE TO HELP!

You'll be met at the property for check-in by one of our team members, who'll be able to answer any questions you may have.

You'll also be provided with a guest smartphone with free 3G data, so if you need anything we're just a short message away

Superbly located and in the heart of the city, the apartment is next door to the Franz Liszt Academy of Music.

Just 10 minutes walk away are the famous ruin bars of Budapest, as well as the restaurants, cafes and nightlife of Kiraly Street and Gozdu Udvar.

You will also find the State Opera House less than 10 minutes away by foot. Other attractions such as St. Stephens Cathedral, Castle Hill, and Parliament are also easily accessible.

Getting around the city is easy as you'll find most places of interest within walking distance. For public transport, Oktogon metro stop is less than 5 minutes the Kirlay Street 4-6 tram stop is less than 2 minutes away.

-  Please note that this is strictly a non-smoking apartment.

- Please note that we charge 10 euro for check-ins after 9 PM.

- Please note that we will charge 15 euro for charger loss/damage.

-Please note that we will charge 100 euro if you smoke inside the apartment.

reviews_text:
What a sweet place! Beautiful entrance and modern, light filled space. We loved it!

Gergely's apartment is the prefect place for a couple visiting Budapest. The apartment is located in a perfect location, tidy clean, well equipped and very comfortable. Gergely was a perfect host, responded promptly to my messages and met me right on time both on check in and check out. Highly recommended!

Gergely est un hôte très accueillant. La description qu'il fait de sa location ressemble totalement à la réalité. Appartement très jolie, grand, agréable et très bien situé: au coeur de Budapest près de l'opéra. D'ici, nous avons tout put faire à pied afin de visiter la ville. 

Всем привет, уважаемые путешественники! Снимали квартиру с подругой на 6 дней. Расположение отличное! Рядом находятся венгерский оперный театр, проспект Андраши, различные пабы. Базилика Св. Иштвана в 7 минутах ходьбы. Квартира очень чистая, светлая и уютная, есть все необходимое. Находится в старинном особняке. Гергелий очень вежливый, внимательный и гостеприимный хост. Встретил нас ранее обозначенного времени заезда в квартиру и был очень любезен при отъезде, заказав нам такси по моей просьбе, т.к. вылет у нас был ранним утром. Квартира в реальности выглядит лучше, чем на фото. Strongly recommend!
review_summary:
This pretty apartment is in the heart of the city's shopping, nightlife and cultural district next to Hungarian State Opera House and few steps from the Basilica.
This flat is equipped dishwasher, washing machine, cattle, Internet cable / wifi (20Mbit/s) and built-in loudspeakers in all rooms.

Новые апартаменты, центр, тишина, комфорт, отдельная спальня, гостиная, кухня. Все оборудовано. / New apartments. City center.  Separate bedroom, living room, kitchen. There are everything you need to relax.

WiFi, кабельное и спутниковое тв., оборудованная кухня.  Индивидуальный трансфер на Мерседес купе и Лексус (дополнительная оплата). И многое другое! / WiFi, cable and satellite TV, equipped kitchen. Private transfer by Mercedes coupe and Lexus (additional charge). And much more!
