Центр города. Шаговая доступность до большинства достопримечательностей, магазинов, ресторанов, купален, клубов. / City center. Walking distance to most attractions, shops, restaurants, bathhouses, clubs.

Три линии метро в 400 метрах. / Three metro station lines within 400 meters.

Мы сделаем Ваш отдых комфортным. / We will make your vacation a comfortable.

review_summary:
I am offering a quiet double room (11 sqm) close to the downtown. The location is close to malls, cafes, shops. The public transport is excellent in 24/7, you can reach the metro or trams within 5 minutes walk.
I live in the flat, so we will share the kitchen and bathroom.

The checking in basically is flexible, but it needs to be arranged before arrival or booking.
description:
I am offering a quiet double room (11 sqm) close to the downtown. The location is close to malls, cafes, shops. The public transport is excellent in 24/7, you can reach the metro or trams within 5 minutes walk.
I live in the flat, so we will share the kitchen and bathroom.

The checking in basically is flexible, but it needs to be arranged before arrival or booking.

The flat is fully furnished and equipped as I live here.

The location is close to malls, cafes, shops. The public transport is excellent 24/7.

reviews_text:
It was great stay at Stella's apartment for ouf short holiday in Budapest. 
The location of the apartment is very close to the famous chain bridge, by 5 minutes walking and also close to yhe Buda Castle hill, one of a must visit place in Hungaria, and near to the groceries store & bus station. Its a big & cozy apartment with a complete facility.

From the apartment after crossing the bridge, there's a open market and also mini centrum when you can find many variant food & stores. Also by walking distance, you can find St S. Basilica, one of the famous church in Budapest.

Stella is a superhost, she was really nice by feed us about all the info that we need to know..and the bonus is she pick us up at the aiport on 23:30 by her car, and take us to the Apartement.

Definetly will comeback to stella's place if we visit Budapest next time. :)




A very nice and lightly flat, Excellent locatio.the flat situated in a quiet street,Public traffic and shopping is very convenient, It is about 10 minutes to the Chain bridge by walk .Stella is a kindness and good communication owner. I like the flat very much!
review_summary: Welcome to this lovely, quiet apartment near the beautiful Chain Bridge! You are in the historical Castle District and only a short walk away from the center or from the most amazing panorama of Budapest.
description:
Welcome to this beautiful, quiet apartment near the beautiful Chain Bridge! You are the historical Castle District and just a short walk from the center or the most beautiful panorama of Budapest. 

 Both rooms have a balcony as a beautiful garden and two bathrooms.

reviews_text: The host canceled this reservation 24 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
review_summary: A helyem a következők közelében található: Városliget, Heroes' Square, Városligeti Műjégpálya, Szépművészeti Múzeum és Hősök tere. Emiatt fog tetszeni neked a helyem: az otthonosság, i have a great bath , the location is really great.
description: The spot is located near: City Park, Heroes 'Square, City Park Ice Rink, Heroes' Square and the Museum of Fine Arts. For this reason, you will like my place: the familiarity, i have a great bath, the location is really great.

reviews_text:
The apartment is really great, very clean, and the location is one of the best in Budapest (very close to the Margaret Island and other nice attractions). I really enjoyed my time there. Moreover, Reka is an amazing host. Definitely recommend it.

Definitely the best airbnb experience!!!
Everything is good.
We recommend you this apartament.
Nice and clean place and complete with everything you needed.


Everything was great. Thank you!

Lovely bright, sunny flat in a great location. Peaceful and quiet. Exactly as shown in the photos. Public transit right outside the door. Communication with Reka was great. She met me at the flat on my arrival, and again when I left. When I had a question, she'd call me within minutes. I highly recommend Reka's apartment -I would certainly stay here again!

The host canceled this reservation 24 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Réka is a great host ; very kind and always ready to help and in a very timely manner. The flat is even cosier than what one can think when seeing the photos! Perfect for a short stay or even for a longer rent with a very convenient location.

Great and friendly host. Excellent apartment. I would definitely recommend staying here.

Reka's flat has been my home for the past 2.5 months. The space is ideal for one person and when my girlfriend came over for a couple of weeks it has been good as well. Everything I needed was there and the bed is comfortable and large, the place is well insulated and there are new radiators. Obviously during the winter days are short but in daylight hours the apartment is in a great position to let light in through its three windows, especially on sunny days and I can only imagine how it is like during the summer months. The location is also great: whilst not in the centre of the tourist area it is nevertheless very convenient for most places of interest. Public transport is very good, trams 4 and 6 are a few minutes walk away and trams 17 and 19 have just started running again after some works, they stop in front of the building, and there are other options too. The local area is also nice with its hills and there is a wide choice of cafes, there are a couple of thermal baths very close by, Lucaks being next door. Margaret Island is a short walk and across the river there is another interesting area with more cafes and restaurants and the Jazz Club. Batthiany and the palace are also easy to reach. I could continue but I will stop here, I will only add that Reka is lovely and has always been there to make sure everything went well. Thank you Reka, I will definitely miss the flat and Budapest!

The apartment is great, clean, well equipped and very comfortable bed, and with a lot of light. The location is very convenient, close to Margaret bridge and island. Reka is an excellent host, we had an excellent communication and she was very friendly and helpful from the very beginning and all the way long. I will definitely come back!

We loved staying at Reka's apartment. The location was wonderful, and she was a lovely and accommodating host. The flat was clean and everything the listing promised. I would love to stay there again if I am lucky enough to visit Budapest in the future, it is such a beautiful city. I only wish we had stayed longer, as there is so much to do and 5 days was not enough!
review_summary:
My apt is ideal for a couple or 1 person as well:)
The apartment is in a historical building at the river side, with 2 thermal bathes nearby.  It is bright and spacious, fully equipped.
house_rules:
The building is large, with about 200 apartments, which means that you should respect others' privacy and comfort zone. 
The neighbours are young, and lovely, and luckily very flexible.
Smoking is not allowed in the apartment, but it is OK on the corridor, at open windows.
description:
My apt is ideal for a couple or 1 person as well:)
The apartment is in a historical building at the river side, with 2 thermal bathes nearby.  It is bright and spacious, fully equipped.

It's a real shelter :)
A quite, sunny, simple style 5th floor apartment in the older part of the city, on the Buda side. The river bank (Danube) is in a stone's throw, as well as 2 thermal baths (Lukács, and the intimate treasure, the  Veli Bej Bath)
The famous ruin pub area is on the Pest side, but the 4/6 tram line, or nr 9 bus line gives you easy, and quick access. Both the tram and bus stops are whithin 3 minutes walk; public bike (Bubi) spot is at the river bank, same distance from the apartment.
You can easily get to the Buda castle too, I'd recommend it by walking on the bank - it is really beautiful:)

The apartment is 40 sqm, that gives optimal space for 1 or 2 person. The living room, and the kitchen are opened into one large space. The kitchen is well equipped, you can cook a fine dinner if you choose to stay at home instead of trying the lovely restaurants nearby. There is one bedroom, with a very comfortable double bed. The bathroom is really tiny, but super clean.

You are going to get the keys to the whole apartment (including gate code). You can get to the 5th floor by elevator. 

The apartment is well equipped with everything what you just need during your stay, like:
-shampoo, shower cream, and soap
-clean towels
-toilet papers
-bed sheets
-full kitchen equipment 
-dish washing liquid
-washing machine with detergent and softener
-free wi-fi hotspot

Pets are very welcome in the apartment, since I'm  a big dog lover :) Doggy bed for small sized dog is available too.

If you need anything else, do not hesitate to contact me.

When you arrive I will handover the keys personally, and tell you everything about the apartment and the city. 
I will happily give you some extra information about the public transportation, restaurants, party places, or clubs.  

If you have any question before your arrival, I will gladly help you out!

The apartment is situated in a quite street, with two spas at it's northern end. One of the most hidden synagogue in the city, and a beautyful muslim pilgrim's tomb, the Gül Baba türbe is just a light walk away. You can get to the city's biggest island, the Margaret Island through the Margaret bridge, where you will find pools, beautiful gardens, parks with squirrels, a recently renovated 5.3k long running track, and many possibilities to eat, or enjoying the Budapest nighlife during the summer time at open air clubs.

Public transport is perfect in this area in 0-24 hrs. Several buslines are heading toward the southern Buda side, or to PEST , as well as the main tram line 4/6.
It takes about 40-50 min. form Liszt Ferenc airport to get to the apartment. You can choose from several options:
- Airport shuttle, that gives you door to door service
-Taxi
-public transport 

Once you get to the Nyugati Railway Station, you only need to take the 4/6 tram to the Margaret bridge direction, take off at the 3rd stop, and make a 300 m long walk to the apartment, it's easy-peasy:)

There is only pay parking from 8 am to 8 pm on the weekdays.

reviews_text:
We had a great time at Jeremy's flat :) everything went well

Great experience! Jérémy was very communicative and hospitable. His place was very clean, close to a couple metro stops, and very quiet at night. Would highly recommend!

Excellent flat, great location 

Jeremy`s apartment was just as described, very well located, possessing all the important items and in a quiet cozy environment. The host was reacting very quickly and effectively in communication and was helpful even though we did not meet him in person. The only downside was a strange smell in one of bedrooms - I think coming from the boiler.. So we had to have an open window for most of the time. 

Jeremy is a nice and caring host. He gave us very detailed instructions about everything and allowed to check in earlier (due to the sleepless night at the airport prior to arrival). 
The apartment is comfortable and clean, has a washing machine, an iron and a hairdryer. One room is comfortable for a couple, another one - for 1-2 persons with one luggage or without it, because the space is very small.
Good location, between 2 metro stations, in the city center.

Jeremy was very helpful and communicative, the flat is located ona very good part of Budapest near to Oktogon. The flat was very clean and comfortable. 

A good home base for all your Budapest adventures, conveniently located and with all the stuff you need.

Jérémy's flat is lovely! Clean, compact, light, and minutes away from the metro lines. Located next to a museum overlooking a beautiful courtyard, this is the perfect place to stay for a trip to Budapest! 
Jérémy's always really quick to respond to messages and a great host. Make sure to check out the late night food market 5 minutes away :)

Great flat, fantastic location 10 stars for everything.

The flat was in a good place. Except for not having elevator everything was nice.
availability: On Fridays and Saturdays the minimum stay is 2 nights.
review_summary:
Welcome in my newly renovated, cosy and comfortable flat in the heart of Budapest.
In the best part of District VI, this apartment that facing the inner courtyard is very quiet and luminous. 
The flat is located very close to the Muzeum.
house_rules:
No smoking flat

- Please use my flat as your own appartment :)

>> Check-out: 11: 00 h
description:
Welcome in my newly renovated, cosy and comfortable flat in the heart of Budapest.
In the best part of District VI, this apartment that facing the inner courtyard is very quiet and luminous. 
The flat is located very close to the Muzeum.

This gorgeous apartment has two bedrooms - one of which have a large dressing -, a large living room, a bright kitchen, a bathroom. Each bedroom has different sleeping arrangements (master bedroom with a large bed,  and one bedroom with2 person sofa ). The flat facing the inner courtyard and therefore is very quiet and luminous.

I am free to give you advices and more informations if needed during your stay.

I am reachable during all your stay through email or by phone.
Please feel free to contact me !

Flat located in the V District which is considered the most prestigious district of the capital as it concentrates many public institutions (Hungarian Parliament, ministries, libraries, universities, Hungarian Academy of Sciences), but also numerous palaces and luxurious buildings. The pedestrian area around Váci utca and Vörösmarty tér and the Duna Korzo along the Danube make it an essential area for tourists.

This comfortable flat is also strategically placed near multiple means of public transportations:

-3 minutes walk from the  main subway lines. (Astoria & Kalvin Tér)
- 3 minutes walk from the main bus lines.

Wi-Fi, stove, microwave, TV, fridge, wash-machine, kettle, bed-linen, towels,
Should you have any questions, do not hesitate to write to or call us.

reviews_text:
Great cozy apartment with a very good location (very close to a metro station). 

The apartment is very clean and well-equipped and Daniel is a great host. 

The flat is perfectly clean et perfectly located. Daniel is very helpful and always answer your questions. 
I recommend this flat. 

Thank you very much Daniel, for being a very good host. We were very lucky to find this lovely, warm and quit apartment with both a double- and a very comfortabel sofabed. 
As mentioned there are a lot of public transportation right outside the door and it is very easy to get around both day and night. This place is a super choise, and we highly recomment it.
Pia

Great, super cozy and warm (in the winter) place. Super close to the lively Keleti station but still very, very quiet and calm. Me and my girlfriend spent 8 nights here in November 2016 and if we need a place in Budapest again we will surely choose this. Thank you!

Daniel and his girl friend gives really good impression on Budapest :) Everytime we can contact to them when we need some advices or helps! Also the location of the apartment is super convenient next to the station. If we visit again, I really want to stay there as well :) Thanks a lot :D

Wonderful room in a great location. The host was easy to talk to and plan with. 

Nice cosy place to spend some time in Budapest :) The host Dániel was friendly and eager to help. 

Квартира отлично расположена - прямо напротив центрального вокзала, но окна выходят внутрь двора, поэтому дома очень тихо. Метро и прочий транспорт в 5 минутах. Квартира просторная, чистая, светлая. Видно, что сделан недавно ремонт. Есть абсолютно все, что нужно для жизни: от микроволновки и плиты до мелочей типа специй. Рекомендую точно!
review_summary:
Dear Visitors!
Newly renovated apartment located right at Keleti Railway station (50 meters). It is a perfect location to discover Budapest as the apartment is in the city center. The metro station (2 and 4 lines) and bus stops are in exactly front of the house, but there is no traffic noise, because opens are overlook to the spacious internal courtyard.
There are also lot of buses too. Very well known ruin pubs in walking distance.

reviews_text:
Great little unit in a fantastic location, easy walk to everything and pretty much in city centre.  We walked everywhere. 

The place is clean, nice, well arranged and big enough for 4 people but only if your intention is not to spend all the time at home. 
It is also pretty quiet and very well situated in Budapest. 
I think that due to lots of booking requests Itamar was not able to answer right away to all my questions, but he gave us information about parking and price ranges. Also we were not able to check in immediately at 4 pm because the guests before us left later than expected which delayed the cleaning. However we were able to leave our suitcases in the apartment so it was not a big problem. 
In overall, very happy with the stay and I would definitely recommend booking this apartment.

We had a terrific stay at this accommodation. The location was central to all major attractions and food. The host was polite and gave valuable advice. A great value!

The host was very flexible with check-in which was appreciated. The apartment is great for a couple people with everything you need. The wifi was fast, bd was comfortable and the shower was good. Definitely a good choice for a stay in Budapest. 

My stay at the blue design apartment was very nice. The apartment is located in the center of Budapast which makes it the ideal spot to discover the city. The room itself is small but cosy and has everything you need for a short stay in the city. Definitely would stay here again.

The place was great. Very nice and in a great location. We enjoyed our stay. 

Good location, close to the chain bridge and the tram that goes along the waterline. Very nice apartment, clean and modern; a bit humid but with the humidity machine on for a few hours it was much better. We had a very nice stay in the apartment and Budapest over all! We will definitely go back! 

Very good location, we've gone every where by foot. Itamar's friend gave us the keys when we arrive at the city. We would recommend this place and stay there if we return to Budapest for sure. 

Nice apartment in a good neighborhood. You can find anything you need nearby, everything is walking distance. The place looks just like the pictures, really cosy. One small negative; we were four, but there were not enough bed linnen (blankets and pillows). For the rest, everything was perfect!

The place was great. The outside of the building is deceptive, but the room is very clean and modern. It is located within walking distance of almost all attractions.

We were greeted by an American which was nice, and we were shown a couple of hotspots. Check out was easy as we just left the key in a mailbox. Would recommend.
review_summary:
one bedroom fully furnished and fully renovated apartment Located in the heart of the city center.
Walking distance from the main tourists attractions, 3 minutes walk from the main metro station - the deak ter.
the best location for your vacation.
house_rules:
Feel good, feel free!
And take care of the apartment please, because we will move back once. :-)
description:
one bedroom fully furnished and fully renovated apartment Located in the heart of the city center.
Walking distance from the main tourists attractions, 3 minutes walk from the main metro station - the deak ter.
the best location for your vacation.

A Full renovation of the apartment had been completed short ago (2014) with modern interior design using luxurious quality in every details.
 Our house was built in 1854 in Classical style with very high ceiling. We composed some modernity into carefully keeping the touch of the 19th century.

Spacious living room, well equipped custom made kitchen with modern dining and TV corner.
Front of the door, you can take a sit and smoke, in your half-private yard but I am not sure if it is good for your health.

What will you find in our apartment:
- Free Internet, wifi and cable TV.
- Fully equipped kitchen.
- Nespresso coffee machine.
- Half private yard with seating chair and table.
- Clean towels and sheets.
- Hair dryer.
- Washing machine.

LOCAL AREA:

The apartment is located in district 5. , the historical Downtown of Pest side (Pest, Buda and Óbuda united Budapest in 1873). Few minutes walk to many of the famous sights as Szabadság tér (square), Kossuth Lajos tér (the place of house of Parliament), St. Stephen's Basilica, Chain bridge the highly loved Vörösmarty square, the along walking Váci utca (street), Andrassy út (avenue) with the House of Opera, and the experienced river Danube. Grocery store round the corner, fine dining restaurants, high end cafés, pubs and many more.

TRANSPORTATION: 
Unique connection of public transport, metroline M2, M1 (first underground on the continental Europe since 1896) the scenic line tram 2 takes you all along on the river side (part of the World Heritage of Budapest), bus number 15, trolleybus to the Városliget with the Zoo and to the Gundel restaurant. But easy access to Buda side as well with the bus no.:16. or even on foot.

The area is the safest and most wanted place in Budapest, few steps from most visited sigts, restaurants, theaters, opera, restaurants, bars and the metro station as well.

I will try my best to get back to you A.S.A.P and I usually manage to answer within a few hours on all requests!!!

I am here to help and assist you during your stay, I can arrange for transfer pick up for you, and have tickets for some cool parties and other fantastic tours for you to make sure you discover the city for real! I will be your 24 hour reception during your stay always available on phone. I live about 15 minutes from the apartment so I can come anytime if you need help.

Absolute city center walking distance to major sights of Budapest. Area full of clubs and bars, vivid night life. Shopping and walking street by the Basilic and the famous Vaci street. You will loooove the location!

We have a great public transport system, not neccessery to use, because of the location (everything is in a walking distance), but you can meet locals, save time and energy. (Don't miss the yellow underground line, it is nice from 1896.)
We are within 5 minutes walk to Metro 3 (Nyugati railway station, airport), Metro 2 (Keleti railway station, ...), tram 2 (Chain bridge, Margaret island and National theater, Müpa ), electric bus 72 (Heroes square, Zoo, Museum of fine arts, ...), bus 16 (to tha Castle hill).

reviews_text:
Great place to stay in Budapest!
The appartement is really awesome. Modern and stylish in a simple and comfortable way. Good bed. Nice kitchen. Super rainshower. :) The hosts are super friendly with quick communication and flexible. E.g. we were able to check in at 0:30 and they ordered a taxi transfer etc. 
This place is highly recommended!


Katarina and Thomas were very quick in replying to all kind of questions I had before and during my stay. They were very welcoming and offered their help in whatever was needed, even arranged for a taxi on the day of our departure. Also they were giving great recommendations where to find what in the immediate neighbourhood and put a bottle of wine in the fridge. What a nice treat! 
When I asked for a warmer blanket after the first night, they were immediately coming over with another, warmer one, that was just perfect. 
The apartment is best for a couple but there would be space for children or friends on a sofa bed.
It has a wonderful shower and with all those thermal baths easily reachable by foot or public transportation I didn't miss a bathtub in the end. 
The location was perfect for us and for what we wanted from Budapest. Directly at the steps to Budapest castle, chain bridge within 5 min walking distance. Direct bus to Opera (5-10min), by walking 20-30 min. Many other bus lines next to the house that bring you to Gellert, train station, or other sights. 
In the end we did most by foot as all parts of town with their different sights were easily reachable. 
Overall a great stay with lovely hosts that did their best in assisting with whatever was needed if asked. I can definitely recommend the place to others and would also come back anytime.  

The location is ideal for walking around and seeing all the sights that Budapest has to offer! It was very clean and spacious an awesome apartment overall. Katarina and Thomas were so helpful, accommodating and friendly. We had a great time here!

We had a wonderful time in Budapest, the apartment hosted by Katarina and Thomas exceeded our expectations!! The apartment is beautiful and the location is perfect for exploring this amazing city. 

Thank you so much! 

Megan & Emily 

Apartment is built in a beautiful style and modernly decorated. Furthermore, at a beautiful location, just 100 meters from the stairs to the castle. Great 24/7 local restaurant with authentic meals next to the apartment. Thomas and Katarina were helpful (with ordering a taxi and being able to check-out later) and quick response on all our questions.

The apartament was fantastic, beautiful, very spacious. It is conveniently located near the Var ( historic area of Budapest). Thomas and Katarina, were very helpful. I will fully recommended to others.

Great hosts. Place was great. Location excellent.

Fantastic experience at this place! Beautiful and stylish flat, very clean and well located. Thomas and Katherine were very helpful and easy with everything. Fully recommended!

I travel to Budapest quite regualry and have stayed in several appartments all over the city. This appartment is certainly the most stylish and grand I have stayed in so far. 

The location is very good - close to the chain bridge in Buda - which is a lovely part of the city and walkable to the centre.

The appartment itself has been done out to a very high standard - the style is minimalist - but with everything you need for an ideal stay. Netflix on tap is a nice touch as was the edible treats to welcome guests. 

The hosts, Katarina and Thomas were lovely, helpful and answered our questions instantly.

This appartment is at the higher price range of places in Budapest, but you are getting a really nice location and a very nice flat. I would recommend it for couples wanting to treat themselves.

Katarina communicated very quickly and answered all the questions. They were very welcoming. The flat was cool and cozy, as we love this black- white style and high ceilings.
availability: On Fridays and Saturdays the minimum stay is 2 nights.
review_summary:
This 90sqm. luxuriously renovated and fully equipped apartment is located right by the foot of the Buda Castle. From here you are within minutes by foot from everything this beautiful city has to offer.

Within 100m you have the castle, ATM's, several restaurants (incl. non-stop), super markets, non-stop mini market, pharmacy, public transportation etc.

Fully loaded with fast wifi, netflix and nespresso.

Bottom line; fab apartment, awesome location !

Welcome!
house_rules:
- Right outside the front door is a common terrace where smoking is possible
- We love our apartment so treat it well please

reviews_text:
We had an amazing weekend in Anna's massive apartment in the heart of Budapest. I stayed with my boyfriend and we had more than enough room to really settle in and relax and have a great home base for our long weekend in the city.  Anna has made a lovely, warm apartment for her guests and goes above and beyond to make you feel right at home for your stay. I would highly recommend, best airbnb I've stayed after months of European travel. 

Awesome flat with some quirky little surprises including an arty advent calendar to open up on days stayed. It was super homely too and was a great base to walk everywhere! Had some fun on the bikes on Margaret island too. Anna gave loads of tips of places to go, visit, eat etc which we used and loved them all. We fell in love with Budapest and the flat certainly contributed to that. Thanks Anna we will be back! 

Anna's place was great for a short term stay and is the kind of place perfect for a longer stay as well. The kitchen isn't done justice when described as 'fully equipped' - this thing is ready for a chef! We had a great stay and it's very well located - if you pack walking shoes you wont need to take any transport. The young neighbours seemed like fun too.

Anna's beautiful apartment was in an excellent location, spotlessly clean, spacious, warm, comfortable and cosy, and we loved spending time there. Budapest is also amazing, we loved exploring and could walk everywhere from the apartment. Anna was friendly and very welcoming and we certainly hope to be able to stay at her apartment another time. Thanks Anna :)

This was our second visit to Anna's gorgeous apartment, and we loved it even more the second time around. There is something so lovely about walking in the door to a place you've stayed and enjoyed before, and the wifi just connects, it feels like a home away from home. Anna is an amazing host too, so so lovely. Thanks again Anna! 

This is a very chic apartment, I loved its design and decoration. Very functional and clean, too. Anna is a wonderful person, very reachable and sweet. The apartment is on the centre of Budapest, steps away from the nearest metro station. Very easy to find, when you are coming from airport. You can walk almost anywhere. On the corner, you will find a market, a cute coffee shop and about 4-10 minutes away there are lots of breakfast/lunch/dinner restaurants, cafes etc. Anna makes sure you have all the information you need. And needless to say, there are two bikes ready for you. It was one of the best, maybe the best AIRBNB experience I've ever had. Thank you, Anna.

Fantastic clean and bright apartment in a great area within walking distance of everywhere you need to go. 

Recommendations re where to go and eat were perfect. Thank you 
St Andrea, at the end of the road, is a MUST

Anna's place is perfect. Its a little bit outside of the main tourist area with plenty of restaurants and bars. It's within walking distance to everything you would want to see in Budapest. It's spacious with a cool edgy design and has a separate room with balcony that is perfect  for a couple.  The bed was super comfy, and the kitchen had everything you need. Nothing to fault! Anna was lovely and the perfect helpful host. Thank you!! 

I absolutely loved Anna's flat. It is decorated so nicely, and the details you notice once inside, are even better than the photos. Anna was able to meet me a little early to let me drop my luggage ad show me around. Her description of everything was so detailed, and she even made sure there was laundry powder, as I did need to wash some clothes. She has a great stereo to connect your music to, which was a big bonus for me (I love to start my mornings with music). That coupled with the amazing espresso machine and a quaint little balcony, made me want to lounge at the flat every morning! I will keep this flat fondly in my memories, until I am able to return again to the city I so dearly fell in love with. 

What a great and lovely place to stay!! Anna's appartment is really wonderful! The beds are great and we love the kitchen!! 
Central located, and there are bikes in the appartment avalaible, great to explore the city!! The communication with Anna was really good, she gave us a lot of good tips where to go, see and eat!! If you go to Budapest, go to Anna :)
review_summary: The 83 sqm flat is situated in the heart of Budapest, which is furnished by unique and design furniture. In the kitchen guests can cook from all ingredients they find. There are two bikes for free of charge. Free wifi, and the best coffee machine!

description:
The 83 sqm flat is situated in the heart of Budapest, which is furnished by unique and design furniture. In the kitchen guests can cook from all ingredients they find. There are two bikes for free of charge. Free wifi, and the best coffee machine!

The flat offers a very comfortable staying for two people. It is ideal for those who like to eat, to cook, but also to discover by bike, to relax and being in the city center at the same time.

The 83 sqm apartment provides a big and fully equipped kitchen, a dining room with a panorama on an inner garden, a living room linked to the dining room, and a bedroom with a terrace. To be flexible, we use two single beds, that can be used separate or pushed together. The bathroom provides a bathtub and a toilet, plus there is an extra separated toilet.
The flat is furnished with unique pieces of furniture and objects.

Free wifi!
Free bikes!
Free laundry!
There are as well:
- towels
- hairdryer
- iron
- ventilator
- bedlinen 
- kitchen equipment (oven, micro, kettle, toaster, blender etc.)
- italian professional coffee machine
- high quality coffee

Dear Guests! You can reach me 24 hours a day, by phone, by email, viber, whattsapp, iphone messenger. My number is: +(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)
At your arrival I will be present at the flat to give you the keys and explain everything that you could need during your stay.

The apartment is situated in the heart of Budapest, 5 min. walking from the Parliament, 3 min. from the Danube, 3 min. from the Nyugati train station, 10 min. from the Margaret island, 15 min. from the Basilica and the party area.
In case you do not want to walk, you can use the two bikes which are at your disposal.

The area is full of good wineries, restaurants, bars, shops, antiquities. 

When you reserve the flat, I send you a list of places to visit, to eat and to discover. At your arrival I will give you lots of brochures about Budapest and the city life.

The public transportation is just behind the corner. Trams, buses, metro etc.
It is very easy to reach the flat from the airport, both with public transport or airport shuttle. If you come by public transit, you just have to take a bus, than a metro that drops you off very close to my flat.

I am happy if you choose my flat for your staying.
There are no special house rules, I just wish you to respect the apartment and the neighborhood as it was yours. Please, don't be loud after 10pm.
In case you have any kind of problems, you can call me day and night.

review_summary: The apartment is optimal for couples, business travelers and for families with kinder. The apartment can accommodate for four persons.

reviews_text:
Andreas place was in a great location for us, middle way between downtown and friends and family. The place was very comfortable and spacious for us. The only problem we had was that the internet didnt work while we were there. 

Good place, Very comfortable and spatious. Andréa is Friendly and open mind. Better to get to the place with a Taxy.

Andrea is a sweet and welcoming lady! She ensured that I was safe and comfortable and waited for me to pick me up from the metro station even when my train was late. She explained everything about the beautiful and quiet house and left me to enjoy it afterward. She was helpful in pointing out tips about transportation and how to get to the airport. Thank you Andrea! 

Amazing place! But even more amazing was Andrea. She was so helpful and so nice. Thank you Andrea, we really appreciated the ride from the station and the recommendations that were sent to us. The place had everything that we needed and we were very happy. 

Beautiful apartment hid away near an industrial estate. Andrea gave us lots of information about getting round in Budapest. Really helpful. The neighbours were also really friendly and helped us start our car after the battery died.

A accommodation was just right like an offer, only it´s difficult to find for me. The flat is very nice, clean and with Andrea is very good communication.

Me and my boyfriend stayed 20 days in the apartment's Andrea. She is an amazing person and from day one was keen to help us in whatever it took. The apartment is very large and full, moreover, it is in an area with plenty of space and have to barbecue in the backyard.
I recommend this apartment for those who have a car or are staying more days in Budapest, it is a bit far to go to the center and if you have a few days to explore the city, you'll probably lose a lot of time with the offset. As we stayed 20 days was perfect and we highly recommend. Thanks for everything, Andrea.

Andrea est une personne très sympathique, qui s'est rendu disponible au maximum pour nous. Son logement est très propre, très neuf, fonctionnel et très satisfaisant. Nous avons passé une semaine très agréable. Notez quand même une forte humidité dans la maison, quelque peu gênante. 
Toutefois, le centre du Budapest est facile d'accès bien qu'un peu éloigné (pour les personnes voulant profiter du centre de Budapest en soirée, ce n'est pas le meilleur logement). 
Nous sommes en tous les cas ravis de notre séjour, et vous recommandons grandement le logement d'Andrea !

Хозяйка очень гостеприимная. Район достаточно далёк от центра. Вечерами шумный, много квакающих лягушек, летающих самолётов и т.п. Дом очень комфортный, однако на диванах спать неудобно.

description:

Can be used for parking for free and safe in-side, and it’s only 25 minutes away from the downtown.
 
It has a mostly industrial environment, which means there is no need to keep quite. You can have parties here, or you can bring noise kids too.
 
There is a large comfortable double bed in the bedroom and two sofa beds in the living room. Additional more option is a sofaben in art studio.
If there is a need for it, 4 people can sleep on the couch in the living room. We also have 3 mattresses if the sleeping places are not enough. We also have a closeable baby bed and a feeder.
 
The kitchen is suitable for cooking. Seasonings are always available.

The washing machine using is feasible in agree time. (outside flat, inside house)
 
The shower is in the same place with the toilet. The space is not too big, but it’s clean and nice. Toilet paper and soup are also provided.
 
Free Wi-Fi.
 
New. clean sheets and towels are provided every week. Furthermore you can also ask for extra washing services, and for sheets/towels.
 
If there is a need for it, I will fill the fridge by the time of arrival an extra cost.
 
The place will be clean before someone arrives, but while it is rented cleaning is not provided. If needed for It is possible to ask for cleaning, but it will have an extra cost.
 
I will be happy to help in the orientation, or I can advise some local activities too.
 
The place is good for LAN and other gamer party organisation.

If there is a need for painting or sculpturing, please ask me and we can talk about using the studio in the same place.

-bedroom // 16 sm
-living room   // 21 sm
-bathroom // 3 sm
-garden(for parking also) // 30 sm
-if needed atellier (painter sculptor), the painter studio is applicable to sleep.

You can reach by phone or e-mail 8am-10p.
Only emergency situation you can call by phone in any time.

There is a grocery store, a pharmacy, and a restaurant nearby.
Also you can go anywhere from the Örs vezér square. There is also public transport hub, a hypermarket, shopping center, a cinema, and a medical station there.

by H8/H9 local train 1 station away. Or
44, 45 bus 3 station away.
+ 10 minutes walking

Liszt Ferenc airport / 25 minuter
Keletei Pályaudvar train station / 20 minutes
Downtown / 25 minutes

Arriving can be done from 14 hours, leaving is by 11 hours.
I will give you the keys personally here, and that is also how I want to get is back.
If you want to come in a different time, ask for it, and we will talk it over.

reviews_text:
It was very good and private place to stay. 

My stay was absolutely fantastic, easily the best hostel experience I've ever had!

Almos greeted me upon arrival, explained everything clearly, was very helpful with any questions I had, and always contactable.

The bedroom, bathroom and communal areas were spotlessly clean and it felt almost like staying in a hotel. The bedroom was cosy and nicely decorated, and nice and warm too.

The facilities were great, all very modern, and the building itself is beautiful. The location was also fantastic (just across the river from the Parliament Building, so it was like staying in Westminster if you were in London!)

Susanna met me to check out and was also very friendly and helpful!

The price was also great, so in summary you will definitely not be disappointed when you stay here!

A very nice, clean and private room in an excellent location - near the chains bridge, the Danube and a lot of public transport options. I would highly recommend this place to others.

My experience was the perfect b&b stay: clean, well organised, discreet, private, central. Lajos and Suzanna were intelligent and helpful hosts and not at all intrusive. What more could you ask for!

Great apartment in walking distance of everything you want to see in Budapest. The hosts are  lovely and make you feel at home. Place feels very secure, cleam and welcoming.

Lajos is a very professionel host,he helps us a lot.We can always connect him in any time,his suggestion about travelling in Budapest is also perfect. We love the city and also the apartment, it is clean and equipment. Thank you!


We stayed for a long weekend for Sziget Festival.

The flat is about 10 mins walk to the Metro line, you can walk next to the Danube and see the Houses of Parliament while on you´re on your way. :)

Lajos was flexible and let us arrive during the night to pick up the keys and check in. What we really liked is how clean the flat was.

Lajos was very welcoming and the apartment and bathroom were extremely clean. Great neighbourhood and location and I felt very safe walking home at night. 

What a wonderful ecperience! Lajos and his family are so helpful and gracious. His apartment is beautiful clean and in the best and most convenient part of Budapest!I will certainly be back.I highly recommend staying with Lajos!

I visited Budapest first time and I was looking for some apartment for 2 days in nice and quiet place. So I found it! Apartment where I was living in time I was in Budapest was nicely and great localized. Contact with owner was fantastic. Definitely I'll back there when I go to Hungary capitol city once again.
availability: The minimum night stay for this listing varies.
review_summary: Located in Andrassy Palace on the Danube bank, just next to the Chain Bridge. SEPARATE, VERY CLEAN PRIVATE ROOMS with modern furnitures, comfortable beds, soft WHITE TOWELS & nice PRIVATE BATHROOM opening from the common corridor. Common kitchenette for preparing tea and simple breakfast. The CITY CENTER is only 5 minutes walk, where non-stop services are available for any age group. Watertown is located between the CASTLE and Danube. Romantic streets and stairs make a really cosy atmosphere.
house_rules: Our service is coupled with principles of cleanliness, calmness, security and fairness, our policy expects the same from our guests in return. Please, avoid any loud activity respecting others living in the building. Smoking is permitted on the outdoor corridor, pets can not be accepted. Please, take care of the carpets (avoid street shoes) in the private rooms, and always keep the entrance door closed. The guests acknowledges that CCTV operates only on the corridors for safety reasons. Only the staff can adjust the heating for the request of the guest.
description:
Located in Andrassy Palace on the Danube bank, just next to the Chain Bridge. SEPARATE, VERY CLEAN PRIVATE ROOMS with modern furnitures, comfortable beds, soft WHITE TOWELS & nice PRIVATE BATHROOM opening from the common corridor. Common kitchenette for preparing tea and simple breakfast. The CITY CENTER is only 5 minutes walk, where non-stop services are available for any age group. Watertown is located between the CASTLE and Danube. Romantic streets and stairs make a really cosy atmosphere.

Our hostel has more separate private guest rooms (16 square metre/room), each advertised on Airbnb. These private guest rooms are next to each other & open from the common corridor of the facility. Each guest room has a modern private bathroom (shower, basin and toilet), but these dedicated bathrooms are available on the common corridor just near your private guest room (external bathrooms). VERY COMFORTABLE BEDS can be twin or double, as you wish. 100% COTTON sheets, linens and towels. Private rooms have nice & modern, new furnitures, comfortable beds.

Our guests have access to their private room, private bathroom and toilet, furthermore the common hall. They may have access to the common kitchenette and fridge.

We provide periodic lessors presence and constant telephone / Viber / e-mail customer service. We recommend having a phone call or using the intercom at arrival.

The Andrassy Palace is located just on the bank of River Danube 200 meter far from the Chain Bridge, in Watertown, the nearest surrounding of the Royal Castle District. Stepping out of the building you can admire the very nice view of Parliament, the historical bridges of Budapest and the Gellert Hill with Liberty Statue. The Buda Castle, the Fisher's Bastillon and its district is accessible on foot within 15 minutes. The Castle Garden Bazaar is 5 minutes walk. Some of the thermal baths can be reached on foot. Several tidy cafe and restaurant offers even breakfast under friendly conditions just next to Andassy Palace. Non-stop food stores are also available. The district is clean, the public safety is outstanding.

-M2 metro line (Station Batthyany Ter): you can approach us on foot from the station.
-16 or 105 bus line (stop Clark Adam Ter) from the direction of the city.
-19 or 41 tram line (stop either Clark Adam Ter or Halasz utca) from other directions.
-Bicycle path and MOL-Bubi public bicycle points in the district. Parking on the street for public parking fees. To find an empty parking place depends on the period of the day, it might be easy or even difficult.

Wheel chair access in not possible unfortunately. Heating works only within the heating season (30th Sept - 1st May).

reviews_text:
Very nice, warm, comfortable and clean apartment in a quiet neighborhood in a great location! Agnes was an excellent host! We were close to lots of great little restaurants and shops, and a nice walk from Buda Castle. We really enjoyed everything about our stay! Thank you, Agnes!

Agnes is an amazing host. Super friendly and helpful. The flat is modern, clean, warm and has all the things you might need for a short or long stay. The location is amazing, very close to the Castle and to the Danube, but also to the metro station so you can reach easily any place in Budapest. We will definitively be back!

Very nice and comfortable place, great neighbourhood, safe, quiet, good public transport. Maximum recommendation!

Really nice and cosy apartment very close the castle and public transport. 

The apartment  was wonderful,very clean and has a good location. Everything in The apartament is new!I had a great stay there! I  recomandat this ap.!

Agnes's place delivered more than expected. Its in the perfect location on the Buda side, near to public transport and in no more than 20 minutes you are in the perfect center of Budapest. The apartment is cozy and with all the amenities we needed. We had an amazing time there.

Agnes is very friendly, the communication went really easy, because she replies quickly. 
The apartment is just wonderful! Clean, big, perfectly equipped, new.. Two separated bedrooms and big living room with kitchen is just perfect for two couples! And we were really excited about location of the flat - grocery, bakery, metro station is about 5 mins of walking. Historical city centre was also easily reachable by foot. 
I would really recommend staying there. Agnes is great host. Thank you very much once again. 

Dear travellers,

I warmly recommend you to book the accomodation. Me and my friends were lucky:

• the flat is newly renovated, its very modern and fully equiped
• you have everything you need within a 1-3 min walk (bakery, supermarket, restaurants, metro station, parliament)
• David and Agi were very friendly and cool people, the communication was great

All in all we really enjoyed our stay at batthyany utca: thank you Agi and David!

We had a great time in Budapest, and we were absolutely pleased with our host!
Agnes was really nice and friendly. We could easily contact her and she always replied really fast. The flat is close to all local amenities, metro stations, tourist attractions and in walking distance of everything on the Danube. The rooms were neat and tidy. I unhesitatingly recommend this apartment to other travellers.

Even better than in the pictures! The place is brand newly renovated, with style and care for the needs of short term guests. The beds were comfortable, the living room huge and the kitchen well equipped. My favourite was the big bathroom, and the Bauhaus style elevator in the house.
Quite neighbourhood, walking distance to metros and sites.
Agnes was a great host. Maximum recommendations, we will be back!
review_summary:
We warmly welcome you to our newly renovated flat at the Castle District. For your pleasent stay we offer you a comfortable, cosy appartement even if you arrive with your family, friends or collegues. 
The flat has a magnificent location because it is only 5 minutes walk to Batthyány Square where you can have a breathtaking view to the Danube and the Parliament (which is the other side of the river) and 5 minutes walk to the Castle. These are all part of the World Heritage.
description:
We warmly welcome you to our newly renovated flat at the Castle District. For your pleasent stay we offer you a comfortable, cosy appartement even if you arrive with your family, friends or collegues. 
The flat has a magnificent location because it is only 5 minutes walk to Batthyány Square where you can have a breathtaking view to the Danube and the Parliament (which is the other side of the river) and 5 minutes walk to the Castle. These are all part of the World Heritage.

There are 2 bedrooms with double-bed and a huge living room with sofabed.
Good location, brand new furnitures, large open spaces.

Non-stop on the airbnb message board

Public transportation is nearby - metro, buses, trams, boat
Mammut Shopping Center, restaurants, cafés, groceries, confectionery, bakery

M2 metro line - Batthyány Square stop
Bus 11 - Fazekas utca stop

In front of the house the parking is free on weekends and national holidays and on workdays form 6 pm till 8 am.
Free parking is just 5 minutes walk from the flat at Batthyány Square.

All equipments are available for our guests, 
Free WIFI, TV, fully equipped kitchen.

reviews_text:
Anna has several apartments so it might not look exactly as on the picture.. But all of them (could choose between two of them) are very stylish, clean and centrally located. Most sights are in walking distance.. I would/will definitely stay again at Anna's apartment(s). 

The lovely apartment did not disappoint me, my husband and I stayed for three nights and we did appreciate the modern decoration as well as the great location of it. The old-style building and elevator were also awesome. Although we did not meet Katalin, her collguage Dorina was very nice to call the taxi picking us up from the airport to the apartment when we were arriving, which made us be fond of the city from the first sight.

The apartment was a perfect place to stay whilst we were in Budapest, it was so conveniently located that you could walk to all of the main tourist places, and it is within easy reach of some great cafes and restaurants. The apartment itself was lovely, it looks exactly as the pictures show and is very spacious for two people. Would definitely stay here again if I was to come back to Budapest! 

Its was great! good location and beautiful apartment.

Katalins apartment was totally perfect for me and my boyfriend. Clean, modern and very very central. Her colleague also arranged airport transfers for us which was very uesful. Katalin herself is also very welcoming. Would reccomend.

Our stay in Katalin's home was absolutely amazing!
It is beautiful, tidy, much larger than the pictures and so perfectly located.
The staff in charge of running the accommodation were lovely and helpful and gave us so many great recommendations, and were only a text away throughout the stay.
I couldn't recommend her place more if you want to stay somewhere beautiful and totally, totally central. 
Thank you Katalin!

The apartment from katalin is one of the best Airbnb's I ever stayed in. True value for money. The apartment is clean, well equipped and the location is superb! We bought tickets for the hop on and hop off bus but you don't really need it as all the sites are in walking distance or just a few metro stops away.
 Katalin is very quick to respond  and I will definitely recommend this airbnb to my friends. I will book again when I return to this amazing city

Great location within walking distance of most major sites and convenient to the metro. Old Jewish Quarter was great for bars/restaurants. Would stay again.

The house itself was wonderful; very clean, beautifully decorated, and brightly lit. It couldn't have been in a more perfect location, literally right next to the basilica and some great restaurants. Katalin was very accommodating and helpful!! I would recommend this place to anyone.

Everything was perfect! Great flat
review_summary:
Located in the middle of the downtown of Budapest,just next to the Basilica,close to Deak Ferenc square Metro
46sqm recently refurbished,warm and comfortable flat.Light colours,nature feeling,lot of plants
Tea,coffee,fresh towels,bed linen included.
house_rules: Smoking is not allowed
description:
Located in the middle of the downtown of Budapest,just next to the Basilica,close to Deak Ferenc square Metro
46sqm recently refurbished,warm and comfortable flat.Light colours,nature feeling,lot of plants
Tea,coffee,fresh towels,bed linen included.

This snug apartment is made of brick-bat and from wood to feel comfortable and feels like home even if you are far from your hometown.
The light colours and the lot of plants gives the flat a special harmony,which i love...
For every guests available tea,coffee,sugar,salt in the kitchen,(supermarket is just oposite of our buinding,if you need anything else)
Fresh towels and bed linen,and detergent for the washing machine included also.
You can find the iron and the hairdryer in the bathroom. Feel free to use them
Water boiler, microwave , and burner gives you more comfort at the kitchen.

You can use the whole apartment

I am available on whatsupp and viber for free if you have internet connection. Dont hesitate to ask if you have any question or need my recommendation :)
My mobile is available 0-24 hours

This is the most frequented area in Budapest!
The middle of downtown. It is good if you like to discover the city, and also if you like to come for a weekend to have a party,and even if you like to have a big shopping in Budapest.
Because the jewish quarter is 5 minutes walk, which is now the most beloved party area.No need taxi or public transfer to going out! You are in a perfect place: :)
For city explorers also the best place to live just by the famous Saint Stephans Basilica, very close to the beautiful Danube and the grandiose Chain bridge.Lot of sights are walking distance: Parliament,Synagoge,Opera,National Gallery....
Our famous and elegant street,Andrassy street is just started from our building,where you can have a nice walk trough the biggest luxury stores, fancy restaurants,the beautiful Opera hause till the Heroes Square, where you will find the Széchenyi Bath to have a rest :)

If you choose Public transfer from the Airport,the easiest way to my apartment is fisrt 200E bus till Kőbánya Kispest, than M3 metro till Deák Ferenc tér stop.From the metro stop my apartment is just 5 minutes walk,but will be joyful cause this is already the most frequented area.
If you like to take a taxi, please use the official taxi at the airport,name FŐTAXI, and ask a car at the desk! Dont use other fake taxis,casue it could be double price!
The apartment is in the right place in every way,because the biggest metro stop Deák Ferenc tér is where 3 metro lines crosses just 5 minutes walk from the apartment.
Metro line1(yellow) is just the other side of the street.
BIG BUS tour bus stop is 1minute, just behind the Basilica

The heating is central. In winter 23 degree. If you have warm you can open a window or turn off the radiator.
In summer there is an aircondition.

reviews_text:
A great apartment in a handy and central location. It was very clean and well appointed. Might not be ideal for light sleepers as the mezzanine bedroom is adjacent to the building's main door, which makes a long, loud squeaking noise when closing (might just need oiling). More generally, could be worth booking an airport transfer, as our taxi driver was a really dangerous driver!

A little gem in a beautiful city. Within walking distance to many places in the city. We walked everywhere and didn't need a taxi once! 

Wonderful little apartment, perfect for any trip

Great apartment! Bigger than the pictures and had everything we needed. Location was ideal with short walks everywhere and especially to the ruin bars. 

Airport transfer both ways was ideal and communication was great.

Thank you 

Fantastic apartment right in the heart of everything! Walking distance to good bars, restaurants and much more. Hosts were very helpful and were easy to communicate with. They supported us in setting up a taxi transfer to and from the airport. Can not fault any part of our experience and would go back in a heartbeat!

Nice and clean. Easy to contact hosts. Great location!

Great apartment. Amazing decor, clean and really good location. 

Roof of the loft bedroom is very low. Missing some kitchen items for cooking such as tea towels and utensils.  Also shared laundry facilities with another apartment which isn't ideal in an AirBnB from our perspective but other than that we had a great time.

Andras and Andi are great hosts who go out of their way to ensure your visit is perfect. The flat is as shown in the pictures and in a fantastic location. 

The street, where the flat is located, is surrounded by great restaurants, pubs, ruin bars and easy to get to famous landmarks. The map on the wall gives an indicator of how to get to everywhere you need to go. You can avoid being in the street with a map and having neon signs above you saying 'tourist'. 

I would recommend gaining a basic grasp of Hungarian to speak to locals. It goes a long way to making you stand out from rude tourists singing football style chants and being intoxicated on cheap local beer. 

A fantastic stay. Would highly recommend.

Amazing Apartment 
If I returned back it will be my choice again 

I highly recommend everything.  Andras and Andi’s flat is exactly as presented on Airbnb.  Besides the usual things one wants in a property, such as cleanliness and a great location, this apartment has a great amount of style as well as comfort and practicality.  Everything from the large, well-appointed bathroom, to the fun and helpful mural map on the kitchen wall shows the amount of care and attention to detail that was taken.  You can tell the construction of this apartment was a labor of love.

The neighborhood has a great vibe with lots of cool things to see and do nearby.  We also appreciated the small convenience markets which stayed open late for those unexpected needs like a drink or a snack.  Because of timing, we checked ourselves in and out.  This was not a problem as the instructions provided by Andras and Andi were very clear.  All in all, a great experience!


Listing description was accurate.
review_summary:
Spend your time in our artist designed industrial style brand new luxury apartman in the heart of the city
Air conditioned, floor heat, underground, pubs, restaurants, museums, ect..
description:
Spend your time in our artist designed industrial style brand new luxury apartman in the heart of the city
Air conditioned, floor heat, underground, pubs, restaurants, museums, ect..

reviews_text:
Veronica was an amazing host, very helpful, providing us with everything we need. 
Apartment even more beautiful than in pictures and location perfect.
If we come back to Budapest, definitely would love to stay here again.

Guest from Swizterland, Brazil and Spain.
We had chosen that house because we felt in love with the pictures.
When we got home, Veronika was really nice, she cares a lot about her guests and always she is for you whatever you need.
The house is exactly as the pictures
Perfect localization, you can go walking but it is better by public transport because Budapest is really big and it isn't too expensive.
We recommend this house for every couple, you will realize when you are there.
But even you can enjoy it with friends.
If we go back to Budapest, for sure we are going to choose again this accommodation.
Thank you so much Veronika.
Ester  & Co.

Great location, unique and cozy apartment, wonderful, helpful and communicative host. We spent there only one night, but I hope that we will come again soon and rent the same apartment!

Staying in this apartment was possibly the highlight of our trip! It was ideal was for us, because we wanted something different to the typical basic room, and we're really glad we chose this cool apartment with lots of quirky details. For three people there was plenty of room, with a double bed and a double sofa bed which was equipped with lots of extra blankets/pillows. 

The neighbourhood (the Jewish Quarter) was perfect for us. We walked everywhere (except the Szechneyi baths) and discovered some of the city's best ruin bars such as Fogashaz, Mazel Tov, Szimpla Kert and Ellato Kert just around the corner. Definitely the area to be if you're in Budapest for the cool street art/bars/coffee shops/clubs.

Veronika was a great host and was really flexible with arrival and departure times, which really benefited us considering both of our flights were late at night. She was quick to reply and made our trip as stress-free as possible, even booking airport transfers. 

Thanks Veronika, we hope to visit again!

Great host. The place was exactly as advertised if not better. Truly in the heart of Budapest with all the ruined pubs in short distance. Highly recommended. 

Veronika is a great host, very polite and helpfull, gave us instructions and tips for getting around the city and even let us stayed longer than usual time, which was very nice of her. We had a great time and we loved her place. It's in the great neighbourhood, so close to the city center, restaurants and bars (everything within walking distance), and yet just enough away not to be surrounded with heavy traffic, and those street sellers and thiefs, so one can feel safe and as at home. The place is exact as it looks at the photos, very warm and easy to find. We would definitelly recommend it to everyone!

Veronika was extremely welcoming and flexible with our check in time! Showed us all we needed to know about the place and made us feel right at home. The location was also perfect. 

Veronika is just lovely, very responsive and caring. Her place which she has called home for years really has a special touch. Funky lighting and high quality finishings and furniture make for a pleasant and entertaining stay. Location was great for exploring Pest and there's a great Thai Soup restaurant on Kiraly that is great value and delicious. Bambus is a great spot and I stayed 2 extra nights I liked it so much!

Great appartment , photos are trustworthy, very well located . Veronika welcomed us very nicely and politely. Highly recommended, when I return to Budapest I expect to stay here again .

The apartment was perfect for our short trip for 4 of us. We had everything we needed from wifi to kitchen appliances to a washing machine. It's very central and so everything was at our finger tips. The owner, Veronika, was also very helpful and kept in touch in case we needed anything.
review_summary:
The apartment is in the heart of the city.  
Near to the famous Gozsdu Udvar, full of restaurants, bars, pubs, 5 minutes walk to Synagoge, 10 minutes walk to Parliament and Opera,  3 minutes to Kazinczy Street, in the center of ruin pubs, restaurants, all sight is in the near, so you can go sight-seeing by walk.
If you have any question, I'm happy to answer it! :)

Bambus design, full equipped, cozy, exactly in the center.

Internet
