reviews_text:
Lovely place! Few steps from metro station, area surrounded by everything you need! Place was very spacious, clean and tide.
I totally recommend! 
Gergely was waiting for us, gave us all instructions we need and we felt very welcome. 
I will go back again to Gergely place! 

Gergely was there to welcome us, the flat was in a great location near the centre and it was warm and cosy, despite the crazy cold outside! Would definitely come back again. 

Couldn't ask for a better location - the apartment is very cool, clean and convenient. 

Thanks a bunch Gergely! 

We are so thankful to Gergely! We had a quite late check in, and got lost on the way to find his apartment, but he waited for us and made our check in fast and easy. Thank you so much! 
It was a beautiful and clean apartment with a perfect location right outside the synagogue. We would love to stay here again if we come back to Budapest. 

Gergely's apartment is very comfortable, clean and stylish. Moreover, it is very well equipped with all the needed things. Almost all the major attractions and the city center can be reached by walk, which was very important for us. We really liked our stay and I will recommend this place!

We liked our stay in Gergely's apartment a lot. It was clean and very well equipped in the kitchen. 
Also the location is perfect. In that district there are lots of bars and cafés. Great attractions are nearby. Most of the time we reached our goals by feet and didn't have to take bus or train. If we repeat visiting Budapest some time, we would like to book Gergely's apartment again!

Great location, lovely apartment. Had a very good time there.

The apartment felt very welcoming and modern. The building is also nice and quiet and secure.

Had a perfect time in Budapest! Georgous flat, superfriendly host and great location! 

The neighborhood is awesome, the apartment is small but nice, clean and very stylish! Ideal for any couple who want to be in the centre of the city! I would return anytime!
review_summary: A brand new apartment in the heart of the city. The Dohány Street Synagogue is right in front of the house on the other side of the street and metro stations "Astoria" and "Deák Ferenc tér" are extremely close, around 3 minutes of walk.
house_rules:
1.This is non-smoking apartment. Keep it this way please.
2.Pets are not allowed inside.
3.Check in after 13:00.
4.Check out before 11:00.
5.Please try and keep this place as nice as it was when you moved in. Do not make any damage to it if it is possible.
6.Respect the neighbours. They are probably as hard-working as you are.
7.Please be quiet after 22:00.
8.Please do not use this flat for parties. There are lots of clubs and bars out there just a few meters from the apartment.

Thank you for your understanding!
Enjoy your stay
description:
A brand new apartment in the heart of the city. The Dohány Street Synagogue is right in front of the house on the other side of the street and metro stations "Astoria" and "Deák Ferenc tér" are extremely close, around 3 minutes of walk.

A brand new apartment in the heart of the city. The Dohány Street Synagogue is right in front of the house on the other side of the street and metro stations "Astoria" and "Deák Ferenc tér" are extremely close, around 3 minutes of walk. Altough the house is located in a very popular area of the city, the apartment is perfectly quiet.

A perfect place for those who would like to enjoy exploring the city!

-Fully equipped kitchen and bathroom
-We provide bed linens and towels.
-There is a free wifi
-TV with international channels
-Radio

Breakfast is available at the café beside the apartment. There are different menus and guests can buy discounted coupons at my place for a price of 4 or 6 euros. 
Almost every tourist attraction is in a walking distance.

My guests get access to everything - just like at home.

My guests can reach me anytime, even at night.

Quiet and nice neighbours and the house itself is also renovated.

Metro lines M1, M2 and M3 are in a 3 minute walking range. Also many buses, night buses, trams, sightseeing buses stop here since it is the downtown.

reviews_text:
We really enjoyed our stay in Viki's apartment. It is cosy and cery clean. Unfortunately we did not manage to meet Viki, maybe next time :-)

Viki's flat is located in the best location possible. It is very convenient to all the sights. Did not even have to take public transportation. The flat itself was very clean and cozy. Loved coming home to it after a long day. Never got a chance to meet Viki, but she was always quick to reply whenever I had questions in regards to tips/suggestions. Don't hesitate to book her place! You will not be disappointed. 

The best AirBnB experience I've had so far...

This apartment is just so great, in an amazing location, beautifully decorated, and with a great host.

The location is in the center of BUdapest just a few minutes away from St. Stephens Basilica, with a lot of great restaurants and bars in the area. It is also within walking distance of most of Budapest's main attractions, as well as being close to several metro stations. Despite being very central, since the apartment is located in a courtyard building, its very quiet inside.

The decor is exactly as pictured, and it was very clean when we arrived. The heating system is great, the bathroom is very modern, and there is a washer-dryer if you need to do laundry.

The host was also great, allowing us to check in slightly earlier than our original check in time. She was great in letting us know things to do in the city, arranging for an extra cleaning (as we stayed for a long time), and also promptly let us know when there was a problem with the water supply (a burst mains pipe, not the hosts problem in any way, but it effected the whole neighborhood so she let us know about it).

I highly recommend this place to anyone visiting Budapest... its well worth it!

Viki is nice and helpful , I enjoyed my trip while staying in her place . Very clean and in great location . Highly recommend ! 

Perfect location and everything else... will return and recommend to others.

Fantastic stay, Apartment was exactly as listed and pictured, was a perfect location to explore Budapest. Myself and my boyfriend went for our 1yr anniversary, and literally had everything on our doorstep, restaurants, bars, shops, coffee shops, beautiful Basilica building 50metres up the road, couldn't of asked for more, majority of the top 10 places to visit in Budapest were within walking distance. Viki stayed in touch everyday to make sure we were enjoying our time, recommended some gorgeous restaurants and places to visit, asked if we needed anything and if we were comfortable. Had an amazing time and will definitely come back in the near future. Thankyou so much Viki for all of your help, our time in Budapest was made so much better with your kindness and guidance. 

Location is excellent.  Apartment is modern and clean.  Would have been nice to have had some personal recommendations from Viki on what to see and do and where to eat but we too never met her.  Also, we could have used more towels.  There was only one towel per person for our stay of four days but the apartment itself and location are perfect.

Great location. Beautiful apartment, as nice as it is shown in the pictures. Safe area. Quiet building. Wifi works perfect. Very clean. Viki is a great host, replying very quick at any enquiry. When I come back I will definitely check if availability! Thks for everything Viki! Köszönöm! 

The location is really convenient and u can walk or take a bus to anywhere in 20-30mins. The flat is clean and just like the picture u see. Very safe and quite.Vick is a nice host .She is really warm and nice person as well.If my friends will go to Budapest I will recommend they to live here. It was a wonderful experience. 這裡的地理位置非常好,去哪裡都很方便,而且房間非常整潔乾淨。Viki人很好,有什麼問題都可以問她,如果有朋友要去布達佩斯,還是會建議他們住在這裡!

We did not get a chance to meet Viki in person but she was very kind to drop me all the instructions for a smooth check in. She was also very helpful to send us some recommendations for food, tours, etc. 

The location is great. It is a short walk to the metro and the famous rose gelato is just right on the street beside. 

The only small problem we have is with the door. It is hard to lock and open sometimes. But other than that, everything is perfect. I would totally recommend people to stay here.
review_summary: This apartment is located in Sas street, which is in the heart of Budapest. It is only 200 meters from St. Stephens Basilica and very close to the district which is known to have the best restaurants, bars, shops & other attractions in the city.
house_rules: Smoking is not allowed in the apartment.
description:
This apartment is located in Sas street, which is in the heart of Budapest. It is only 200 meters from St. Stephens Basilica and very close to the district which is known to have the best restaurants, bars, shops & other attractions in the city.

The newly renovated  flat located on the 2nd floor overlooking the very calm inner courtyard. It’s suitable for up to 2 people to enjoy their holidays.  The apartment has an open structure with a queen size bed and a cozy living room area. It is very quiet and you will definitely be able to get a good night sleep here. In this new flat you will have everything you need for a great getaway trip to Budapest! 

The studio features:
 - Air-conditioning 
- Free Wi-Fi 
- Flat-screen TV (with international chanels) 
- Well equipped kitchen (water boiler, coffee machine, electric stove with 2 spots, fridge, plates, pans, cupboards) 
- Bathroom with shower 
- Clean sheets, towels provided 
- Washing machine
- Iron

When you check in, I will provide you a map and recommend things to do and see, helping you make the very best of your time in Budapest.

As mentioned earlier the apartment is in Sas street in the 5th district which is very central, where you can reach quite a few of the most famous attractions by foot:
- St. Stephens Basilica (2 minutes walk) 
- Erzsébet Square with the Sziget Eye (65 meter giant wheel) (2 minutes walk) 
- Danube (5 minutes walk) 
- Chain Bridge (5 minutes walk) 
- Andrassy Avenue with the Opera building (5 minutes walk) 
- Váci Street with shops (8 minutes walk) 
- Kazinczy street with the famous ruin pubs (8 minutes walk) 
- One of the best markets, the Downtown Market (8 minutes walk)
- Budapest's coolest pub/bar/restaurant district, e.g. Gozsdu Courtyard (10 minutes walk) 
- Dohány Synagogue (10 minutes walk) 
- The Hungarian Parliament Building (10 minutes walk) 
- Super markets (grocery), bars and restaurants on the street and all around the area

The location is well connected to public transportation: Deak Ter metro station is a 5 minute walk which is one of the largest transportation hubs, subway interchange Metro1, M2, M3, numerous buses and trams. The metro line 1 is the oldest subway of Continental Europe. It is 116 years old and it takes you to the Heroes Square and the Széchenyi thermal baths in a few minutes. 


If you need further information about the apartmant, please do not hesitate to contact me, I would be glad to help you.

I have two apartments in this house directly next to each other. The link of the 2nd Apartment is this here: 
https://www.airbnb.hu/rooms/8600016

In general each Apartment is suitable for 2 people.  If you are more than 2 people you can book also both apartments together.


If you need further information about the apartment, please do not hesitate to contact me, I would be glad to help you.

reviews_text:
The apartment was clean, comfy and well-equipped. Orsi is very helpful and kind host. We had a great time! :) 

Orsolya was very welcoming and helpful before and during our stay in Budapest. It was really easy to check in and out.

The flat is very clean and modern, well located in Budapest, and comfy for 2 persons.

Our stay in this city was a great experience, especially in this lovely flat !

We highly recommend Orsolya's flat for few days in Budapest :)

very good

As agreed one friend of Orsolya was waiting for us at the arrival. took us at the apartment and showed us around the studio. The flat is small  but very cosy, perfect for 2 people, we stayed 3 nights and was just perfect. The location is great, just 5 minutes walk from the main basilica and next door a 24hrs shop which is great. everything was clean and very well organized, many thanks! :)

The flat was great and very clean! It was very close to everything and Orsolya was great. She met us at the flat and was very helpful with information about the city.

I had a very nice time at Orsi's flat! Orsi was very communicative before arrival and during my stay. Checking in and out was very easy. 

Overall, the flat is newly renovated, very clean, tastefully decorated. The fan in the flat helps keep the temperature cool enough during the warm days and nights. Automatic lights turn on and off during the night outside the flat, which can disturb sleep, but it wasn't a big issue. 

The flat is very close to the city center and public transportation. I would recommend staying here! 


Orsolya was extremely friendly, welcoming and helpful! She was there to greet us at the flat, and left us a lovely bottle of Rosé. We were also given advice on where to go to eat and look around. We had a slight problem with the wifi but Orsolya was very quick to help us out with it and she came straight away to fix the problem. 

Orsolya was a great host, very welcoming and gave us great information on the city and things to do! The flat was very clean and modern and in a perfect location in the centre of Budapest. Would definitely recommend to others and visit again!

Orsolya is a really nice hoster! She explained all details about the flat and tried her best to make our stay comfortable. The apartment is new but not big. Ideal for 1-2 persons. Very clean! It has everything you need to stay for 4-6 days. Kitchen is well-equiped, coffee-mashine, dishes, iron, hair dryer, strong shower, ventilator. Wi-fi works also good. Although during the nights it was extremly hot. It is possible to open the windows but then you can hear neighboor's dog and talks. Also automatic lights outside the apartment reacts all the time so it was difficult to fall asleep. But if the weather is not so hot as it was during our stay - it must be quite comfortable to sleep. The apartment is quite close to the railway station and you can reach all main attractions by foot. In general, it is safe. I recomend it! 

We really enjoyed staying in Orsolya's apartment. It is located in our favourite location to stay in Budapest - in downtown Pest, close to bars, restaurants and theatres, close to the main railway station, to the Metro and to trams. The apartment is small, but very compact and beautifully finished and presented, clean and modern. Orsolya was lovely, she met us at the flat, she left us wine and brought us things we needed for our stay, she was really lovely throughout our stay and communication was great.

I have lovely neighbors. I kindly ask you to respect others and take care of your environment. No party or loud music are allowed after 10 pm.

Pets are not allowed. The flat is non-smoking.

reviews_text:
The location was perfect. Everything was within walking distance, 5-10 minutes ( markets, chain bridge, parliament, the castle etc). The place itself was very clean and welcoming. The host was very friendly and left us alone.I would definitely recommend this place to anybody wanting to explore Budapest 

Peter Peter's apartment was a nice and warm place to stay for 3 days in november in Budapest. We were 4 persons. Peter directions for finding the apartment, getting the key, enter the building were very precise. We didn't even met him. Everything was ok except for the shower, it's a little bit "old". 
Thank you Peter for Peter Peter's apartment.

All questions which I asked in advance were answered speedily and accurately. We had all the information we required to find the apartment and settle in. The Airport Shuttle is a great service -  thanks for recommending it.
The apartment is as all the reviews led us to believe it would be. Simple but spacious and comfortable. We felt we were staying in the sort of home ordinary people in Budapest occupied - and I mean that in a good way.
The area is superb. Every evening we found somewhere interesting to eat within a few minutes walk.  Buda felt peaceful in comparison to the more frantic Pest but no less interesting. As two women, we felt safe day and night, inside and outside the apartment.
We had one minor problem with the water,  due more to our lack of familiarity with the system than an equipment fault. Peter and Attila guided us through this promptly and effectively.

Peter's apartment was perfect, exactly as described. Clean, bright, spacious with a lovely living room. The kitchen could have been better equipped, but for ordinary, everyday use was ok.
In terms of location was great, so close to  Fisherman’s Bastion and Buda Castle. The best part was an absolutely stunning view of the Parlament, Danube River, and bridges, just two minutes walk from the flat.
The only minus point was weird, bothering smell of gas in the lobby.


Apartment spacious and climate . Clean and neat . Well equipped kitchen. Attractive location. I would recommend for a weekend.

Peters apartment was lovely and clean and in a great location. There were a few minor things that could have been better, like only one bed was made up on arrival (however peters mum did drop off another sheet), the place is noisy from the street and the curtains in the second bedroom are thin so all the light comes in. Apart from that all was lovely and clean and Attila was very communicative. 


Overall we liked it and felt it was good value for money, however, the washing machine didn't work and the shower was very old and not very good. It would have been much better if these were working properly. 
More concerning though, was the smell of gas every time we turned the hot tap on! 
We were impressed with the speed of communication though, all our questions were answered which helped us to enjoy our short stay in Budapest. The apartment was located perfectly, we walked 25 miles in 3 days, and only got on a tram and train once! Loads on your doorstep, a truly beautiful location! :)


The location was perfect! So close to the water and a great view of parliament. Having a whole apartment for such a cheap price was a real luxury. 

Great neighbourhood in Buda close to all major sight seeing. Five minutes walk to the M2 subway station. The apartment was clean and spacious with two hard working fans to keep the space cool. I would recommend and return.

Staying at Peter's place was very nice. The location of the apartment is exactly under the Buda Castle as suggested by its name. Very close to the city center and other touristic points. Also, it was very easy to find , due to the precise information I have received from Attila (Peter's assistant). I recommend it to anyone who wants to visit Budapest and wants to be near the most visited attractions of the city.
review_summary: Classy, one bedroom apartment (two different rooms) is located at the foot of the castle hill in Buda, boasting spectacular views of the Mathias Church and the Fisherman’s Bastion. It is just a stone throw away from the Parliament / Chain bridge.
description:
Classy, one bedroom apartment (two different rooms) is located at the foot of the castle hill in Buda, boasting spectacular views of the Mathias Church and the Fisherman’s Bastion. It is just a stone throw away from the Parliament / Chain bridge.

Location, location, location


If you plan to visit Budapest to explore it for its unique architecture and history then look no further.  This classy, one bedroom apartment (two different rooms) is located at the foot of the castle hill in Buda, boasting spectacular views of the Mathias Temple and the Fisherman’s Bastion. Furthermore, it is just a stone throw away from the Parliament building and the Chain bridge.


The neighbourhood is also surrounded by numerous restaurants, cafes, trendy bars and food outlets and is well served by public transport (metro, bus and trams). 

Guests can also enjoy a varied breakfast selection for a discounted price of 3 Euros at the neighbouring Café Piaf. 


The apartment is equipped to facilitate for 5 people. It has a queen bed, a single bed and a double bed. It also has a kitchen, bathroom and toilet. 

Linen and towels are provided.

reviews_text:
I really recommend Dice apartments ! Our stay was fabulous, we really enjoyed it. If we ever come back, we will for sure check if one of the apartments is available. It's in the center, near to everything. Thanks a lot again,
our best regards!

The apartment was super clean,warm,cozy,exactly the same as the photos!The owners answered me every message very fast! I defently recommend this one for your trip to Budapest guys!

It was my first time using AirBnB and I'm totally happy. The Apartment is amazing. Clean, cozy, full equipped, quiet and central, close to the river and the pedestrian zone. The public transport is very close too within 5 minutes. I felt totally home there and the hosts are so friendly and very welcoming. They took care you feel like you were home. I'm extremely happy i found this beautiful place. It was my 3rd stay in Budapest but sadly my 1st stay here. When i come back, i will def stay here again. Thank you so much for your warm hearted welcome! Köszi

Klara and Tunde were real helpful with everything i needed. 
The apartment is very cool, clean and literally the same as it was presented on the pictures.

I recommend Dice Apartments dearly, and will most surely use their services again.

My partner and I had a wonderful stay here! Tundra was a fantastic host who made us feel welcome. The apartment was in a really great location and was extremely clean. Would highly recommend! 

The apartment was well located and also very comfortable. They make us feel as we were home.

I would strongly recommend it.

Thank you very much!

Great location super cool house

Amazing location in a newly renovated heritage building, my friend and I truly enjoyed our time at Dice! Our apartment was spotless and gorgeous - these ladies have seriously thought of everything! On top of that, if one evening you'd like a quiet evening in, they seriously have any board game you can imagine!

From the lovely, friendly reception at check in, great suggestions, and flexibility, I will definitely book with them again next time I come back to Budapest! Thank you a lot ladies, we had such an excellent time! Xx

Very kind, helpfull and nice ! Great place. 

The week spent in Dice apartments was a great one. The apartment was very fresh (the whole operation is just a month old) with a great living room, with two sofas, and a bedroom with a comfortable bed. The bathroom was also nice and modern, with excellent water pressure in the shower. The whole thing is housed in a historic building in a very central location. 

We would happily stay here again.
review_summary: We offer you a recently renovated apartment with cheerful atmosphere in the center of Budapest. The flat is very close to the Danube, to the Liberty Bridge (one of the nicest bridges of Budapest), to the famous Váci street and to the Great Market Hall. The environment of the apartment is peaceful, still it is located on a perfect spot from the point of view of transportation.We, the hosts inform you with pleasure about the current cultural, gastronomic or entertainment possibilities of the city.
description:
We offer you a recently renovated apartment with cheerful atmosphere in the center of Budapest. The flat is very close to the Danube, to the Liberty Bridge (one of the nicest bridges of Budapest), to the famous Váci street and to the Great Market Hall. The environment of the apartment is peaceful, still it is located on a perfect spot from the point of view of transportation.We, the hosts inform you with pleasure about the current cultural, gastronomic or entertainment possibilities of the city.

Our apartment is in the heart of the city (5th district), but still in a quiet area. The building was constructed in 1868 and it is considered a historical monument. The Danube and the Liberty Bridge are at a few minutes walking distance from the flat. Going that direction, you can cross Váci Street. The Grand Market Hall, which is also very close, gives you great opportunity to shop and to buy food from the local producers. In the neighbourhood there are more cultural institutions you can visit (like the National Hungarian Museum), and many quality restaurants, cafeterias you can go to. As for entertainment and fun: the ruin pub area, namely the 7th district is only ten minutes walking distance from the apartment. You can go to good parties close by, but you will be still able to have a good sleep whenever you feel like. In a rainy day if you and your mates don’t feel like going out, just take a table game down from the shelf and play with it. We are looking forward to host you!

The cousy basement apartment has a warm atmosphere. On some parts of the wall it’s visible the original impregnated bricks of the building. There is good ventilation system. . The flat has a separated bedroom with a big comfortable double bed, a practical living room with sofa, a well equipped kitchen, and a bathroom with shower.

During your staying you can reach us, and we help you in case you have problems. After the booking we will send you an email with all the important information and our contact.

How to get to the apartment with public tarnsportation:

- From Liszt Ferenc Airport: - Take the airport bus (no. 200 E), to the last station "Kőbánya Kispest", then take the blue line underground (M3) in the direction of Újpest-Központ, go 8 stops, get off at station "Kálvin tér", and then walk to Veres Pálné street (about 6 minutes towards the Danube).

- From:"Keleti" railway station: - Take the green line underground (M4) in the direction of Kelenföld Vasútállomás. go 3 stops and get off at "Kálvin tér” station an and then walk to Veres Pálné street (about 6 minutes towards the Danube).

- From "Nyugati" railway station: - Take take the blue line underground (M3) in the direction of Kőbánya-Kispest, go 4 stops, get off at station "Kálvin tér", and then walk to Veres Pálné street (about 6 minutes towards the Danube).

-From “Kelenföld” railway station: -Take the green line underground (M4) in the direction of Keleti pályaudvar, go 5 stops, get off at station “Fővám tér”, and then walk to Veres Pálné street (about 6 minutes towards the Danube).

- From "Népliget" International Bus Station: - ", then take the blue line underground (M3) in the direction of Újpest-Központ, go 4 stops, get off at station "Kálvin tér", and then walk to Veres Pálné street (about 6 minutes towards the Danube).

Our Address is: 1053, Budapest, Veres Pálné street 35, 
It is important for you to know that the ENTRANCE is from Szarka street 9.

Parking:
If you arrive by car you should know these things: In the area you have to pay for parking from 8 o'clock till 20 o'clock. (We can help you to buy a ticket.) Weekends: FREE

reviews_text:
This listing was a little different from the Airbnb's I have used in the past, but it was an excellent situation and worked out very well. As described, it was more like a hotel room, but just down the street from the hotel. The property was very cozy but still modern and up-to-date. Any questions you have about Budapest, dining, shopping, or just being a tourist are more than adequately answered by the front desk staff. My friend and I stayed here and they were most accommodating in holding our bags for us until check-in time and after check-out in order to allow us to not lose any time exploring the city. The communication was excellent prior to arrival and throughout the trip. The location is excellent, about a 5 min walk to St. Stephan's, 5 min to the Opera house and metro, and probably 10-15 to the Parliament building.  Excellent options for food in the area just be willing to explore a little bit. I would definitely stay here again, I wish we had had more time to stay here this time around. Excellent property.

I really enjoyed my stay. The location is ideal
for walking around the city and visiting the local attractions. Recommend staying. 

I booked this accomodation for my parents to celebrate my
Dad's 60th. The lady they met (unfortunately they cannot remember her name) was friendly and helpful. The accommodation was beautiful and comfortable and they certainly enjoyed there stay in Budapest.

Szuper volt minden! Máskor is igényt fogok tartani a szállásra.

description: Urban Spirit Apartments offers self-catering accommodation in the centre of Budapest. Free WiFi access is available. Check in and check out at Opera Garden Hotel & Apartments (1065 Budapest, Hajos street 24.).

reviews_text:
I can't stay the apartment which I booked everytime this time. I stayed another one. I have very noisy and crowded neigbours at nights and I can't slept well.

We had a nice stay at the apartment room.  It was clean, new, and convenient. Be mindful that since the apartment is brand new, it is still a work in progress. For example, we didn't have wi-fi because it was not yet set up, the room may also be a little bit stuffy , the bathroom may also smell due to plumbing issues. Krisztina was great, she quickly responded to all my queries and also gave us tips about Budapest.

Perfect place for staying while your trip to Budapest. We were happy to be the first guests at Martina's place. So everything was brand new. The decoration is beautiful, modern style. The apartment itself is not so big, but there 2 beds, small kitchen and a bathroom - you will find everything you need. The location is also great. Highly reccommended!
review_summary: This amazing luxury apartment is located in the heart of Budapest. You can enjoy your holiday in a very unique atmosphere for a reasonable price. Make your stay unforgettable by choosing us and luxuriate yourself for a down-to-earth price!
description:
This amazing luxury apartment is located in the heart of Budapest. You can enjoy your holiday in a very unique atmosphere for a reasonable price. Make your stay unforgettable by choosing us and luxuriate yourself for a down-to-earth price!

KrisCo Luxury Apartments takes pride in offering the highest quality luxury rentals in Budapest's most prestigious areas. Our apartments are not only pleasing to the eye, but also comfortable and affordable for your holiday or business trips. We provide an alternative 4**** quality option for those, who are willing to go without the extra services of a large hotel in order to spend their time in a unique, more private and  luxurious atmosphere for cheaper price.

We are happy to provide a personal welcome meeting on arrival to make your stay as unique as possible. If you would love to take a vacation in Budapest, but would hate the idea of becoming a tourist: KrisCo’s hosts can give you hot tips which cannot be found in the popular guidebooks. Stay in your own luxury apartment and experience a holiday like never before! By day explore the famous shops, cafes, museums, theatres and sights of the city. By night loose yourself in the best clubs, unique bars and fizzy night life, just around the corner!

All our Budapest accommodations are perfectly placed for you to take full advantage of the city. Our properties are located in the heart of the city, in the most famous and desirable neighborhood which is easily accessible either by walking or public transport. Either you come as a couple, group of friends or family, you can feel like being a resident of Budapest and experience the joy of living here. Depending on the size of your group we offer many types of apartments and rooms.

reviews_text:
Everything ok! Conditions, location, cleanless - all at the highest level! Very good contact with the owner. I definitely recommend!

Very nice appartment, very clean and renovated ! It is well located, close to the principal places to see in Budapest ! Thank you very much for the reception and for your help :) I recommand this place 

Good studio within walking distance to all main attractions and nightlife. Two minute walk from the river. We used the little kitchen to cook some basic food and it worked fine. It is up 3 flights of stairs and there is no lift so be wary if you can't climb lots of stairs. 

Gizella was responding to all my messages quickly and provided me with all relevant information. 
The apartment perfectly corresponds with it's description. The biggest benefits from my perspective are: Excellent location - central, close the Pest city attractions, public transport and yet very quiet, comfortable bed, fast wi-fi and brand new interior. The apartment is suitable for travelers who expect quiet nights.
The only downside is that it is located on the 3rd floor with no elevator (100 steps), so it is not suitable for guests with some disabilities.
I fully recommend Gizella as a host and this apartment for solo travelers or pairs. If I visit Budapest again, I'd be happy to stay here.

Nous avons été très bien reçus dans ce petit appartement d'une pièce bien agencé. Il est très bien situé, propre et comme neuf. Petit bémol, la fenêtre donne sur une cour ainsi il manque un peu de luminosité.
Attention pour les personnes à mobilité réduite, il y a trois étages à monter pour accéder à l'appartement.

Rigtig god oplevelse. Der var styr på det hele og kommunikationen var god under hele opholdet. Vi blev mødt i opgangen og vist op til lejligheden og fik forklaret 'reglerne' og nogle små tips. Rigtig dejligt! Da vi skulle flyve hjem tidlig morgen blev vi hentet (mod betaling) og kørt direkte til lufthavnen. Dejlig nemt.  
Der er absolut intet at klage over! 

Modern szállás a belváros kellős közepén. 

Super neues Apartment, ruhig gelegen und in Toplage!!!

I was 1 week in Gizella's apartment and I was totally happy with it. 
Even though it small and everything combined, there is still everything you need. 
If you want to stay together or alone for a few days in Budapest I highly recommend this place, because it is really central, you can almost walk everywhere by foot and there are a lot of restaurants around! 

Gianluca

Ich war für eine Woche in Gizella's Apartment und bin super zufrieden damit gewesen.
Obwohl es nicht wirklich groß ist und alles kompakt, ist eben doch alles da was man braucht.
Grade wenn man eine Tage in Budapest zu zweit oder alleine sein möchte würde ich dieses Apartment empfehlen!
Durch die gute zentrale Lage war ich nie weit weg vom nächsten Restaurant und man kann sehr gut über all herum laufen. Doch auch selbst die Haupthaltestelle für die 3 großen Ubahn strecken, ist nur 7-10min zu Fuß entfernt und es ist auch sehr einfach ein Ticket zu kaufen und Ubahn zufahren! 

Gianluca

非常干净的房间,位于市中心,交通便利,房东还提供机场的接送服务。非常好的一段住宿经历
review_summary:
Brand new, 24 sq, fully equipped "shape" design studio located in the heart of Budapest in the 5th district. Central & quiet location. 

Luxury mattress, flat screen LED TV, fast wi-fi, sheets, towels, hairdryer, fully equipped kitchen provided.  

Ideal for 2 people !

The most of the sights are in walking distance. The most famous street of Budapest (Váci street) and the Vörösmarty Square just behind the studio. 
The metro lines (M1, M2, M3) and the tram 2 are just few step away!
house_rules:
PRINCIPAL RULES 

1.The apartment can be occupied on the day of the arrival from 2PM and should be vacated before 11AM on the day of departure. Wherever possible we are flexible with these times but please advise us of your requirements in advance! We reserve the right to charge an extra day payment if you stay later than 11 AM and it was not agreed with us formerly in email, in advance. 
2.We kindly ask all our guest to fill in our registration book upon arrival. 
3.Please leave all the keys received in the keybox, as agreed previously, at the handover. 
4.Please always lock the doors to your apartment, i.e. the street door and the apartment door. 
5.In case any apartment key is lost you should inform us immediately; the necessary lock and key changes will be charged to you.
6.The apartment can be used by our checked-in guests only. 
7.Please leave the apartment in the same general condition as you found it on arrival. No damaging the apartment's furniture or facilities. Any damage caused during your stay must be compensated by you. 
8.Should you face any problem with the apartment while your stay, please inform us immediately. 
9.We accept no responsibility for your valuables left in the apartment. Please use the safety-box.
10.Please take care of the cleanliness and tidiness of the apartment. At the check-out please wash any used dishes and remove any rubbish, leaving the apartment in the same condition as you occupied it. 
11.Please be so kind out of respect for other guests, take off your shoes after step into the appartment. Does not lie down in the shoes on the couch.
12.Pets are not allowed in the apartment. 
13.Smoking in the apartment is strictly forbidden. 
14.Remove your make-up with cotton wipper, not with the towel!
15.Please turn off the lights while u are away, for enviromental protection.
16.This point is particularly important and no concessions will be made: Please pay respect to other residents of the house. Please close the doors carefully and silently, refrain from any behavior that can disturb any residents particularly after 9PM. We reserve the right to cancel the service immediately, with holding the whole rental fee if we receive any valid complaints from other residents of the house. 
17.We do not accept reservations from people who rent the apartments for illegal activities or who plan invite escorts during their stay. Thank you for your understanding and wish you a great time in my property!


Arrival: From 14:30 onward
Check out: up to 11:00 AM
description:
Brand new, 24 sq, fully equipped "shape" design studio located in the heart of Budapest in the 5th district. Central & quiet location. 

Luxury mattress, flat screen LED TV, fast wi-fi, sheets, towels, hairdryer, fully equipped kitchen provided.  

Ideal for 2 people !

The most of the sights are in walking distance. The most famous street of Budapest (Váci street) and the Vörösmarty Square just behind the studio. 
The metro lines (M1, M2, M3) and the tram 2 are just few step away!

It is a very good mix that the modern style studio is in a beautiful old historical building. You can enjoy the old atmosphere and the modern lifestyle at the same time. 
This brand new 24 sq studio is in the heart of the 5th district (the most central district of the city). 
The studio has everything you need for an unforgettable staying in Budapest! The studio is quite, the beds are super comfy, the bathroom is large, the tv screen is big and the wi-fi is fast. 
This area is most probably the best part to stay in Budapest. This is the real downtown (city centre). The studio is situated only one street from the Danube and one corner from the famous Gerbaud cafe and is surrounded by restaurants (such as the Hard Rock Cafe) and cafes on Vörösmarty tér. The famous Vaci utca shopping street and Fashion Street are the next streets from the apartment is situated only one hundred metres from the Danube embankment. The famous Vigadó is 100 meters away as well. The big Market Hall is only 10 minutes walking distance. From the other direction there is the Erzsébet Square what is a meeting point for tourist and hungarians as well and 10 minutes walking distance from the famous ruin bars and the Gozsdu court -a chain of the buildings courts with bars, clubs, restaurants what is a currently a very hip area in Budapest and the best place to go out.

The brand new, non smoking, 24 sq meter studio can accomodate up to 2 people.
It consist of a room with a small kitchen + dining table. + a double bed for 2 people and a shower.

Kitchen is fully equipped with electric hob, fridge, microwave, toaster, kettle, saucepan, plates, glasses and cutlery. Complimentary coffe, tea, sugar, salt and pepper are available.
Bathroom with shower, towels, soap gel, shampoo, shower gel, hair-dryer and toilet paper.
LED Television with cable TV, WI-FI Internet access, safety-box, iron, as well as bed sheets and towels provided.

I normally meet guests personally to hand over they keys and provide a brief tour. If required they keys can be left for pickup at an agreed location instead. You will get also a lot of information about the sights, events, museums, locals. Enjoy your stay!

New and cozy studio that enjoys a great location right in the city center. 

All the main tourist spots, restaurants and bars are just steps away.
The neighborhood is trendy and lively, crowded with bars, cafés, shops, supermarkets, and public gardens. There is a 24/7 supermarket in the foot of the building. Restaurants and confectionaries, such as the famous Gerbaud are a few blocks away. Just behind the apt. is the Váci street, the main fashion shopping street in Budapest, with souvenir stores and breath-taking architecture. The Las Vegas Casino (one of the only casinos in Budapest) is in the Sofitel Hotel is across the street. The "Budapest Eye" ferris wheel stands right in the Erzsébet Square in the summertime. Public transportation (subway, trams, and buses) leave directly from the square (Deák Tér stop), and there are bicycle rental stations nearby. Guided tours leave from every nearby square. 
You will not be at a loss of choice for restaurants, pubs, night life, or top-brand shopping venues. 
The studio is located in the city center, so you will not have trouble getting around.

How to arrive to the studio:

From the Airport the access is very easy, after you take the shuttle bus (200E) from the airport which goes to Köbánya-Kispest metrostation, Metroline M3 will take you to Ferencziek tere. That's the stop you have to get off to come to the apartment (5 mins walk). 

Subway: Ferencziek tere (M3 subway line), Deák Ferenc Tér (M2 and M3 subway lines), Vörösmarty Square (M1 Historic Underground line)
Trams: Line 2 (Runs adjacent to Danube)
Railway Stations: 3 stops by metro from Nyugati Railway Station, 3 stops by metro from Keleti Railway Station
Buses: Buses to the castle area, Hop-On Hop-Off buses

We have transfer service from and to the airport / train station / bus station. The prices are below:
From the airport: EUR 25 / car up to 4 people
To the airport: EUR 25 / car up to 4 people
From the train / bus station: EUR 20 / car up to 4 people
To the train / bus station: EUR 20 / car up to 4 people

reviews_text:
Fantastic accomodation!! We find the apartment very clean and comfortable. The position is perfect to visit the centre by walking and the area is safe! It respects the description so we deeply recommend this accomodation!

We spent an amazing WE in Budapest! Andras' appartment is cosy and has a central location, near the subway station. Thank you Andras!!!

It was a clean and cozy apartment. Place is 10-15 minutes walk from all key places. Check in was smooth with a warm welcome from Andras.
Great place to spend time in Budapest.

The house is well located and has everything you need. Very comfortable bed and good wifi. Andras provides for  you all kinds of information about the city and what to do. 

Andras apartament was very nice, clean and comfortable.
It´s located in the center of Budapest and is very modern.
The communication was great and everything was easy to find.
We would recomend this apartament to anyone.


Super central Home in Budapest. Very new apartment, alla accessories.
In front of the Metro, in the heart of the city.
Very a gem for 3 days. A colleague kindly explained everything for the city and the apartment. 
Amazing holidays, thanks so much.
Best regards 
Michele

Andras is a very good host. He has a nice flat very well located in midtown Budapest.

A very nice welcome from Norbert who took time to show us where everything was. The location was fabulous and the apartment was lovely. We had a great stay.

András' colleague warmly welcomed us although it was in the middle of the night due to a delayed flight. He was very nice, told us everything we needed to know and gave us insider tips where to go out. The flat is super  central, modern, clean and well equipped. It couldnt have been better. Thanks a lot!

Excellent host, excellent location, excellent experience with this place.
 Recommended to everybody with highest grade!
availability: 3 nights minimum stay.From Dec 23 - 26, 2016 the minimum stay is 4 nights.
description:
- -  Welcome to my apartment in the city center !  - - 
(English speaking is expected to give the most important informations at arrival time. Please you or somebody from your travel partners have to speak English or Hungarian. Thank you!)
Fully equipped and furnished apartment in the centre of Budapest, just next to the Váci Street ( main walking street in the city ). The apartment is on the renovated new pedestrian street, the Petofi str.

Elegant and modern style apartment with own bathroom and well equipped kitchen. There are TV in every room, free wireless internet access. Free coffee and tea during your stay. We provide bed linen and towels also.
Air condition use is extra cost! It is optional for 5€/day.  (It is not include in the price of Airbnb!!!) You can ask this service at arrival time (or later as well) and pay in cash.

The location is perfect for holiday, it is in the middle of Budapest, the transportation junction of the city ( where the three metro lines meet ), Deak Square, is just 4 minute walk. There are a lot of bars and reastaurants and a 24 hours supermarket in the neighborhood. Raday Street with its great night life is close as well. 
Heating season: from 15th of October till 15th of April

Bed sizes: 
In the bedroom 160cm * 200cm normal double bed 
In the living room: 2 pce 140cm * 200cm confortable sofa bed with good matraces
If you book the apartment for 2 people and you will need 2 separeted beds please let me know before your arrival.

Check-in: From 1pm. To put the luggages and take the keys available from 11am. (early check in is available from 9pm in case no guest which leave the apartment) 

Check-out: normaly 11am or earlier. Luggages store in the apartment available till the next guest arrival time. Late check-out is also available in case no new guest or the next guest arrive later than you want to leave the apartment.
!!! Capacity of the apartment: 4 adults (1 adult+ 3 kids or baby) (2 adults+2 child or baby) ( 3 adults+1 child or baby) Please do not make booking if you are more than 4 together. Kids and babies can have discount till 12 years old. Discounted persons max for 2 persons. Please inform me about the no. of guests after the booking. !!!

reviews_text:
Impeccably clean and meticulously furnished to maximize every inch of space. The owner happens to be a talented architect. The flat is well lit, has strong water pressure and comfy clean linens.
 It's in a Fantastic location yet extremely quiet due to the double paned windows. 
 The host was kind enough to pick us up at the airport for a small fee and he also went out of his way to bring us a cell charger adaptor the very next day! 

 

Everything went smoothly and Zsolt helped us with pick up at the airport (cheaper than a taxi). The flat is strategically located to visit all of Budapest. Clean and comfortable, we had a good time.

Nice host! Got an awesome Hungarian treat from the host. Well decorated apartment with vintage elevator!!

Really nice apartment, the walk to the pest side is very short and nice, so it's nothing to worry about.  

Nice place and accommodating host! :)

amazing place close to the river!

The hosts replied to my queries timely, and a relative was there in person to hand over the key. 
It was very nice and sweet of them to leave welcome amenities, thanks! We did not come to enjoy all of them as we were out most of time, but appreciated the gesture. Many thanks to the hosts for the opportunity to spend these 5 days in their studio.

Thank you Zolt. You have an amazing place. Location is priceless. I hope to visit Budapest soon

The Jeannette apartment was both very spacious and well located. It truly lives up to the pictures and is a great "home base" for exploring both Buda and Pest. The apartment is newly renovated and has everything you need and more for a great stay in Budapest. Plus, the hosts left us chocolate croissants, coffee/tea, beer, and pálinka to drink! A very nice touch. Would highly recommend!

What a great experience in Budapest! The apartment looks exactly like depicted in the photos and is very thoughtfully designed. Everything we needed was provided, even air conditioning. Excellent location right by the metro and the Danube. 
Communication with our hosts went smoothly and they replied promptly whenever we had any questions. 
Something we really want to point out is that the WIFI connection was great! Not always a sure thing on Airbnb but it is fast and reliable. Big plus, escpecially if you want to (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) sights or restaurants and load maps!
Unfortunately the bathroom fan didn't really switch off so it kept running through the night and it was a little noisy but Zsolt told us it would get fixed next week so future guests won't have to worry about it!
review_summary: Be a downtown citizen of Budapest for a little time!:)Come and learn more about the Budapest mainstream lifestyle in this built in 1910 house.The studio has got a rustically elegant design,and it’s a comfortable,quiet home in the center
house_rules:
Please do not smoke in the apartment because we have developed a smoking area for you in front of the apartment. 
Thank you very much. 

Small pets are welcome, but remember to check with us first.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Kérlek ne  az apartmanban dohányozz, mert az apartman előtt kialakítottunk egy dohányzóhelyet a számodra!
Köszönjük szépen!

Kistestű háziállatot szívesen látunk vendégül, de előtte egyeztessünk!
description:
Be a downtown citizen of Budapest for a little time!:)Come and learn more about the Budapest mainstream lifestyle in this built in 1910 house.The studio has got a rustically elegant design,and it’s a comfortable,quiet home in the center
  
  
  

Be a downtown citizen of Budapest for a little time!:)Near to the castle, we are waiting to you with a real, authentic house with an atmosphere with chatterbox neighbours. Come and learn more about the Budapest mainstream lifestyle in this built in 1910 house. The studio has got a rustically elegant design, and it’s a comfortable, quiet home in the heart of Budapest. The house has got two entrance! If you step out one of the entrances, then just with a few minutes walk you are standing in the Danube shore with a beautiful view of the Hungarian Parliament, or if you step out from the other entrance, you can walk in the streets which are the part of the UNESCO World Heritage. The Matthias church is very close to the apartment, you can even see a little part of it from the house. Walking through the castle’s stairs going by only 750 m you can reach it. Lots of restaurants and cafés near to the apartment. Metro and tram, over and above a market hall with a big supermarket just only 100 m form the apartment. But from there you can travel straight to the beautiful Szentendre Skanzen. If you don’t want to go to the Buda Castle by walk, then you can use the nearby Budapest Castle Hill Funicular. The kitchen is well-equipped, but if you do not feel like to make your dinner, you can eat one of the nearby restaurants, even a Michelin rated restaurant is just a few minutes walk away. You can explore the city from there really easily. In the gallery there is a double seized bed, but if you travel with an older child, then we can make the couch in the living room into comfortable bed. Free wifi in the apartment!!! And free parking outside the house (Until May 1. 2015), but we can’t book a sure parking place to you!! But if you want to we go before you to the airport/station.  
---------------------------------------------------------
Legyél te is egy kis időre budapesti belvárosi polgár!:) A budai Várhegy lábánál, igazi hamisítatlan budapesti autentikus körgangos házban a csacsogó szomszédok bájos hangulatával várunk. Gyere, és ismerd meg a budapesti mainstream életstílust ebben a 1910-ben épült házban. A stúdió rusztikusan elegáns design stílusban berendezett, kényelmes, csendes otthon Budapest történelmi részén. A háznak két bejárata van! Ha kilépsz a házból az egyik bejáraton, akkor néhány méter séta után a Duna-part előtt állsz, ahonnan egy gyönyörű kilátás nyílik a magyar parlamentre, vagy a házból a másik bejáraton kilépve, már az Unesco világörökség részét is képező váraljában található utcákon barangolhatsz. A Mátyás-templom nagyon közel van, a házból kilépve lehet látni egy részét. A vár lépcsőin felfelé haladva a bejárati kaputól 750 méterre sétálva eléred. Számos étterem és kávézó a sarkon. Metró és a villamos, valamint a bevásárló csarnok egy nagy szupermarkettel 100 m-re a háztól. De innen akár a gyönyörű szentendrei skanzenbe is eltudsz jutni közvetlenül. Ha nem szeretnél a Budai Várba gyalogosan felmenni, akkor használhatod a közelben található budavári siklót. A konyha teljesen felszerelt, de ha nincs kedved elkészíteni a vacsorádat, akkor látogass el a számos közeli éttermek egyikébe, akár Michelin-díjas étterem is pár perces sétára található. Innen igazán könnyű lesz felfedezni a várost. A galérián van egy franciaágy, da ha nagyobb gyermekkel utazol, akkor a nappaliban a kanapét kényelmes ággyá tudjuk átalakítani a részére. Ingyenes Wifi van a lakásban !! És ingyenes parkolás a ház előtt(2015.május 1.-ig), a szabad helyek függvényében, sajnos előre foglalni nem lehet!! De akár szívesen elmegyünk érted a repülőtérre is.










-Free, high-speed internet and Wifi
-Free espresso coffee - Tchibo
-Laundered and ironed, fresh smelling bedding and towels
- Dressing gown and slippers
- Fully equipped kitchen
- Travel cot for babies. 
- Extra gifts, but let that be a surprise :)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-Ingyenes nagy sebességű internet és Wifi
-Ajándék eszpresszó kávé  - Tchibo
-Tiszta, vasalt jó illatú ágynemű és törölköző 
- Fürdőköpeny, na meg papucs
- Teljesen felszerelt konyha
- Baby utazóágy
- plusz ajándékok, de ez legyen meglepetés:)

We live 35 minutes from the apartment, so we can offer rapid, personal assistance, if necessary. But you can also phone or text us if you need urgent help.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
35 percre lakunk az apartmantól, így gyorsan a segítségedre tudunk lenni személyesen. De telefonon is tudsz hívni, ha sürgős segítségre van szükséged.

This is really a very quiet, safe and peaceful area, while at the same time it is still in the centre of the city. The district has great traditions. The local settlement of the Romans was destroyed by the Sarmatians in 3rd Century. In the Middle Ages a number of small settlements were developed in this area. The streets and buildings including the early 20th century block in which the apartment is situated really feels like cultural time travel :) The apartment is located at the foot of the Buda Castle Hill and an 8-10 minute pleasant walk will take you to the entrance of the Budapest tunnel, or, one of the jewels of our city, the beautiful Chain Bridge opposite the tunnel. You can also reach the Fisherman’s Bastion and the Matthias church with a comfortable walk, and this is where you can get the best view of the city. But you will have the most spectacular view of our Parliament building on the Pest side from Batthyány Square a hundred metres from here. Professional photographers also take their lavish evening shots of the illuminated Parliament from Batthyány Square. The ten most famous places in town are within walking distance. Dine in one of the grand restaurants, there are a lot of them in our neighbourhood, and then take a walk along the banks of the Danube. It’s a really romantic programme:)

Or would you like to prepare your own dinner? 
You can easily find the ingredients in the supermarket 100 metres from the apartment.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Tényleg nagyon csendes és biztonságos, nyugodt környék, de még is a város közepén. A városrész nagy hagyományokkal rendelkezik! A rómaiak itteni települését a szarmaták pusztították el a III. században. A középkorban már több kis település jött létre ezen a területen! Az utcák és épületek,  a  század elején épült ház amelyben az apartmanunk található, igazából olyan érzés, mint egy kulturális időutazás.:)


Az apartman a Budai Várhegy lábánál található, innen 8 - 10 perces kellemes sétával elérhető a Budapesti alagút bejárata, valamint vele szemben városunk egyik ékessége, a gyönyörű Lánchíd!  Halászbástyát és a Mátyás-templomot is kényelmes sétával eléred, ahonnan a legjobb kilátás nyílik a városra. 
De a Pesti oldalon található parlamentünk épületére a legszebb kilátást  a 100 méterre található Batthyány tér fogja nyújtani a számodra. Profi fotósok is  a Batthyány  térről készítik pazar esti felvételeiket a kivilágított parlament épületéről.



Séta távolságra található, az első 10 leghíresebb hely a városban! 

Vacsorázz valamelyik patinás étteremben, sok van a környékünkön, és utána sétálj a Duna parton! Igazán romantikus program!:)

Vagy te szeretnéd elkészíteni a vacsorád?
A hozzávaló élelmiszer alapanyagokat könnyen betudod szerezni az apartmantól 100 méterre található szupermarketben.

Two minutes’ walk from the block,

- buses (bus station)
- trams
- underground
- HÉV (suburban railway)
- hop on hop off bus
- pier
- public bicycle hire scheme (MOL BUBI)

Here is a little help for when you arrive 

How to get to Jeanette apartment by public transport,

From the airport:
-take bus 200 as far as the Kőbánya-Kispest stop (this is the terminal) – 9 stops
- from here take Metro 3 to Deák tér (in the direction of Újpest Központ) – 10 stops
- change to Metro 2, to Batthyány tér (in the direction of Déli pályaudvar – Southern Railway Station) – 2 stops
- a two minute walk from Batthyány tér 

From Népliget bus station:
-take Metro 3 to Deák tér (in the direction of Újpest Központ) –  6 stops
-change to Metro 2, as far as Batthyány tér (in the direction of Déli pályaudvar) – 2 stops
- a two minute walk from Batthyány tér 

From Nyugati pályaudvar (Western Railway Station):
-take Metro 3 to Deák tér  (in the direction of Kőbánya-Kispest) –  2 stops
-change to Metro 2, to Batthyány tér (in the direction of Déli pályaudvar) – 2 stops
- a two minute walk from Batthyány tér 

From Keleti pályaudvar (Eastern Railway Station):
-take Metro 2 to Batthyány tér (in the direction of Déli pályaudvar) – 5 stops
- a two minute walk from Batthyány tér 

From Déli pályaudvar (Southern Railway Station):
-take Metro 2 to Batthyány tér (in the direction of Örs vezér tere) – 2 stops
- a two minute walk from Batthyány tér 


If arriving by car,

You have to pay for parking in front of the building

GENERAL INFORMATION
Paying period:  8am to 6pm on work days 
Cars:  440 Ft/hour- 1.40 EUR
Minimum waiting time:   5 minutes
Maximum waiting time:   3 hours
(new tickets must be bought every three hours)

BUYING A PARKING TICKET
Paying in coins:
The ticket machine accepts 5 Ft, 10 Ft, 20 Ft, 50 Ft, 100 Ft, and 200 Ft coins

Insert coin
Once you have reached the minimum charge the machine will display the end of the parking period after inserting each coin. 
When you have reached the desired length of time press the green button (max. 180 minutes).
Take the ticket.
The ticket must be displayed in the area behind the windscreen – on the dashboard – in a place clearly visible from the outside.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- autóbuszok (buszpályaudvar)
- villamosok
- metró

a reptérről:

a Nyugati pályaudvarról:

Ha autóval érkezel,

Díjfizetési időszak:  munkanap 8-18 óra között

PARKOLÓJEGY VÁSÁRLÁS
Fizetés érmével:
Az automata 5 Ft, 10 Ft, 20 Ft, 50 Ft, 100 Ft, illetve 200 Ft-os érméket fogad el!

Dobd be az érmét!
Ha a minimális díjat elérted, akkor minden érme bedobása után az automata kijelzi a parkolási idő végét.

The completely refurbished apartment has a floor space of only 33 m2. There is a double bed in the gallery, but, if necessary, another one or two guests can sleep on the pull-out couch in the living room. 

If required I can provide a half price shuttle service to and from the airport. Feel free to let me know your requests, I am more than happy to help.

Please send you questions :)

The house is very old and beautiful but has not yet been renovated. On very rare occasions the lift may be out of order.

A galérián van egy franciaágy, de ha szükséges,   a nappaliban található  kihúzható kanapén további 1, de akár 2 vendég tud aludni.

Várom kérdéseidet!:)

reviews_text:
Everything was as marketed; great flat, great location and great communication with the hosts. A good choice!

Great spot! Cool neighborhood near many attractions. For those sensitive to noise while sleeping, earplugs may be prudent, but a wonderful place to stay altogether, with communicative and helpful hosts.

It's a really beautiful place, just like the pictures! We really couldn't fault it - clean, warm, safe, great location...
The only thing is that a few special host 'insider tips' would have been great. 
We definitely recommend taking the airport shuttle bus you can book from the airport, around HUF 4000 return and door to door service. Other recommendations - the river trip, Faust Cellar wine tour, Doblo wine bar, the baths! 

The apartment looks great from the inside. Like literally as the pictures, the paintings are amazing. The location is alright, it's very close to the city centre, but the street it is located seemed a bit dodgy. Also several occasions we've had random people ringing the doorbell. There is a hostel on the first floor, the apartment is ok the ground floor, just be aware of that. However, all together the apartment itself is very nice.

Don't let the state of the main entrance of the building scare you (kinda looks like an abandoned building from outside). The apartment is exactly as pictured if not better. It's quite spacious and very bright, adorable decor. Location is prime. Most places are walking distance. Close to St. Stephen's Basilica, several restaurants and pubs nearby. Occasionally you can hear some of the passerbyers in the street but it wasn't really noisy. The bed was comfy, heater worked well, nice big kitchen, big bathroom, awesome wifi. Loved it. The check in and check out process was easy breezy. I really recommend this place. 

Lovely apartment in a great location. Really helpful with our arrival when we got there early. We didn't meet the owners directly but the two colleagues from the same company we spoke to/met were very helpful. I would really recommend this place. 

The flat was lovely and extremely clean. We loved the quirky drawings on the walls! Meeting up to hand the key over went very smoothly. The flat was in a great location within walking distance of everything we wanted to see. Enjoyed having the Wifi.

We stayed in the apartment for 4 days and we had a really good time. The apartment is located perfectly and looks amazing! 

The apartment was light and modern as seen in the pictures. The location was perfect, in close proximity to a great selection of bars, restaurants and shops. Patri and Akos were great hosts and were flexible on meeting times when we experienced travel delays. Would highly recommend to travellers!

A great spot in the city well within walking distance to most tourist destinations.

The apartment was nicely decorated and very comfortable.
availability: On Fridays and Saturdays the minimum stay is 2 nights.
review_summary: Just 100 meters away from the UNESCO recognized Andrassy avenue and 30 meters away from the longest and most beautiful road of Budapest Terez korut with a 24 hour transportation is located this cosy and stylish (URL HIDDEN) will accommodate maximum 4 people and provide them with comfort, heating during the cold times and air conditioning in hot summer days, fully equipped kitchen and bathroom area.
description:
Just 100 meters away from the UNESCO recognized Andrassy avenue and 30 meters away from the longest and most beautiful road of Budapest Terez korut with a 24 hour transportation is located this cosy and stylish (URL HIDDEN) will accommodate maximum 4 people and provide them with comfort, heating during the cold times and air conditioning in hot summer days, fully equipped kitchen and bathroom area.

Just 100 meters away from the UNESCO recognized Andrassy avenue and 30 meters away from the longest and most beautiful road of Budapest Teréz körút with a 24 hour transportation is located this cosy and stylish (URL HIDDEN) will accommodate maximum 4 people and provide them with comfort, heating during the cold times and air conditioning in hot summer days, fully equipped kitchen and bathroom area.Next door one will find a small shop with everything most necessary and 5 to 10 seconds will provide you with a variety of restaurants of Hungarian,Indian, Thai, vegetarian cuisine.Don't forget that world famous Ruined Pubs of Budapest are in a walking distance, as well as the house of Opera,Parliament and Danube.
Be our guest and get a real feeling of the city in our modern apartment in the historic building of Budapest.

All equipments are available for our guests, 
WIFI, TV, fully equipped kitchen, travel baby cot, baby bath, feeding chair..etc.

Personal contact during check-in and check-out. In case of any questions, requests or problems you can contact me via mobile or meet personally any time during your stay.

Restaurants, main attractions, nightlife areas and recommended bars, museums, art galleries or places for events, Oktogon just 2 minutes

The apartment is located at Pest, in central District VI, a well-known budapestian meeting point full of restaurants, cafes, banks, exchange offices and attractions.
It is not far from Nyugati metro and railway station designed by Eiffel company. The entrance of the building is accessible from the Teréz Körút, the windows are facing the quiet Kármán Street.
The apartment is int he center of the city, you can access easily the main sights and the various entertainment possibilities of Budapest. 24h tram lines operate nearby, also the Nyugati M3 metrostation is within a minute of walking. From here you can go everywhere easily (for example to the airport by metro or train) but most importantly. You can walk around and enjoy the city and its main sights from here, or rent a bike and cycle the city.

services offered:
- tourist maps, tourist guide
- airport transfer: 29 euro one way (on demand)
-It's allowed to bring pet for 5€ per each day
-the wifi is available for free
-there is more option for the wifi (outside) for extra charge

reviews_text:
We had an amazing stay at George's appartment. The communication was great when wanting to book restaurants as we couldn't call from our English phone. The location was absolutely perfect, only a 5 minute walk away from most things. The appartment was a very clean, cosy & a cute place to stay, the only thing we were a little disappointed with was that the TV wasn't in English and we couldn't turn on any subtitles. All in all we had an amazing stay in Budapest, would definitely recommned

Fabulous location, great communication and nicely styled. You can walk everywhere from this apartment and it's especially well located for the Christmas Markets at this time of year. A few smaller details lacking that would really elevate the listing (no kitchen basics such as tea, coffee, salt or pepper, no soap in the bathroom and tired towels) but for the price and location it's good value overall.

Great apartment and location. We loved our trip and would stay again.

The apartment was just as described :)

Great location, lovely apartment!

A very cosy studio flat and a great location. Felt like a home.

Super cute apartment with all the essentials and I cannot express how perfect the location is! 2 minute walk from the Christmas markets and main shopping areas of the town, 5 minute walk from St Stephens Basilica and only 5 minutes from the chain bridge! Convenient 24hr newsagent just below also. Would definitely recommend. 

Really good experience, nice appartment and the location is just perfect. Close to all the sight and the Danube river (with the beautiful Royal Palace just across the water) and close to shopping street and the hipper part of Budapest. 

We had a fantastic few days in Budapest. The apartment was just as described beautiful and modern with everything you could want, to make it even better the apartment was in a great location. 
There were leaflets available in the apartment providing information about places to visit in Budapest. We had a fantastic time in the apartment and Budapest and look forward to our next visit. 

Perfect location. Very modern, clean and comfortable.

Really nice flat, near to everything!
review_summary:
Hi5 Apartment 47 is located in the 5th district of Budapest. It is the ideal location for a holiday in the city. 
You've got everything: relatively close to center and away from the noise.
house_rules:
Guests should give their exact arrival time and meet the host (or his delegate) at check-in. There is no reception!!
Attention regarding smokers: Smoking inside the apartment strictly prohibited. Please use the balcony or the sidewalk to go for a smoke. Thank you for your understanding! 
The heating has been properly set-up before you come in, and the flat is very well insulated, so please do not modify the heating sensor, it will be warm enough for you! 
Please keep noise levels down after 22:00.
There are house trash bins in the entrance corridor if you would like to remove excess rubbish from the apartment.
Housekeeping during your stay available upon request.
description:
Hi5 Apartment 47 is located in the 5th district of Budapest. It is the ideal location for a holiday in the city. 
You've got everything: relatively close to center and away from the noise.

This cozy 28m² one-bedroom apartment is wonderfully located in the heart of the 5th district (the most central district of the city). You will be 5 minutes away by foot from the famous St. Stephen's Basilika and Andrássy avenue (the Hungarian "Champs Elysées”), the Danube and the Chain Bridge are 1 block away, the famous Vörösmarty Square (where the Christmas market takes place) is around the corner of the building, and the Buda Castle is a 10 minute walk. This is the best location you could possibly get in Budapest. The flat is in the same building as Dorottya Apartments 1, 2 and 3.

Helpful and cheerful hosts who are eager to help with anything.

The neighbourhood is trendy and lively, crowded with bars, cafés, shops, supermarkets, and public gardens. There is a 24/7 supermarket in the foot of the building. Restaurants and confectionaries, such as the famous Gerbaud are a few blocks away. Dorottya street leads straight into the Váci street, the main fashion shopping street in Budapest, with souvenir stores and breath-taking architecture. The Las Vegas Casino (one of the only casinos in Budapest) is in the Sofitel Hotel is across the street. The "Budapest Eye" ferris wheel stands right in the Erzsébet Square in the summertime. Public transportation (subway, trams, and buses) leave directly from the square (Déak Tér stop), and there are bicycle rental stations nearby. Guided tours leave from every nearby square. The airport shuttle arrives/departs straight from the square as well. The Zrínyi street is host to several nightclubs and bars, including Kraft, Ötkert, Nomuri, and Divino. We will give you suggestions of the best places to make the most of your stay, whether you want to eat, drink, have a coffee, or party! 

Have a look at the guide on this page, it references the main attractions in the city center around the apartment.

Subway: Deák Ferenc Tér (M2 and M3 subway lines), Vörösmarty Square (M1 Historic Underground line)
Trams: Line 2 (Runs adjacent to Danube), Line 47, 49
Railway Stations: 2 stops by metro from Nyugati Railway Station, 3 stops by metro from Keleti Railway Station
Buses: Buses to the castle area, Hop-On Hop-Off buses

We have transfer service from and to the airport / train station / bus station. The prices are below:

From the airport: EUR 25 / car up to 4 people
To the airport: EUR 22 / car up to 4 people
From the train / bus station: EUR 18 / car up to 4 people
To the train / bus station: EUR 15 /car up to 4 people

In this case we will need you flight / train / bus number and your arrival time to Budapest. Our driver will be at the required time inside the terminal with your name.

reviews_text: Beautiful interior design and excellent conditions of the apt. Nice host too!
review_summary:
Welcome to the quiet luxury of Glamour Apartment. This is a brand new beautifully designed 80sqm, 2 bedroom apartment in the heart of Budapest, next to the Parliament. Everything is on doorstep, Liberty square, St.Stephen's Basilica, Andrássy Avenue, Váci Street, Jewish quarter. The Danube with the beautiful corso is just few steps away. Margaret Island, Olimpia Park is also easy acces.
The apartment itself is fully equipped.
description:
