reviews_text:
Adam is a great host and I enjoyed staying at his place. The location is quite convenient, south of Kossuth Lajos utca; you can use the public  transport or go on foot if your destination is in the center.

the place is in a great position and Adam has been a very good host!

Adam's apartment is located in a very convenient spot, clean and beautifully furnished. I want to thank him for showing me the ruins cafe and the lovely conversations we've had. I hope to see the completed painting in the near future!

Adam was -great-! 
He was super friendly and made me feel at home right away.
I had some trouble finding the place at first, but luck was on my side and the neighbors downstairs sorted me out.

The room is very warm (I stayed in fall/winter) and the location is super central to any place you could want to get to!

Adam was a very friendly and organised host. He is clearly on AirBnB to meet different people, and it was lovely hanging out with him. The room was really comfortable and his sense of decor is really cool.

Friendly host
Great location
Feel at home
It was great for staying there 

Adam is helpful and very kind person. The apartment is perfectly located, in the main street of Budapest, from which you can reach all tourist attractions by foot. But at the same time is a really quiet place with a beautiful courtyard ('con mucho encanto' ;D)  
Clean and comfortable, we'd recommend it for sure!
Thank you for everything Adam!

The apartment is perfectly situated in the very city center of Budapest and calm at the same time! Perfect combination! Adam keeps the apartment very clean, calm, and prepares everything you could possibly need for your stay and for visiting Budapest. I can recommend Adam and his apartment a lot! Thank you for our nice stay in Budapest!

Adam is a lovely, welcoming host who is very easy to talk to and will help you with as much as he can! His place is in a really good location near the chain bridge and was clean, clear (he had little post it notes for directions for things like the washing machine) and homely! We loved staying here and would recommend it to you all to:-)

The flat is good and is located nearly in Center of Budapest. Adam is a very kind and helpful person. We liked it very much there and enjoyed our days in budapest. Thank you for everything!
review_summary: Here you have the chance to book your private room in my shared appartment, located in the pedestrian zone, directly in the heart of Budapest. Only I am living there in my own private room. The appartment is calm and just right temperatured.
house_rules: Be calm as I am. Be clean as I am. Thanks for your interest in my listing. Have a nice day.
description:
Here you have the chance to book your private room in my shared appartment, located in the pedestrian zone, directly in the heart of Budapest. Only I am living there in my own private room. The appartment is calm and just right temperatured.

As stated the appartment is shared, i am living there too. The appartment has windows on 3 sides to the courtyard of the house with huge trees, no street, usually no people, more like an atmosphere in the forest with birds and owls singing at 5 am.

Your room has two beds for sleeping, two armchairs for relaxing/reading, and one table with an office chair for writing/working, there is also a TV inside your room, if you want to check out the news.
A lot of poweroutlets are avaiable in the room, all hungarian (same as german) standard.

The kitchen is big with a table and four chairs, you can cook, use the fridge, but please clean the dishes afterwards, I expect my guests to be as clean as I am. The bathroom is shared, too. There is a shower, a sink, a toilet and there is a washing machine inside the bathroom.

We share the kitchen and the bathroom and you can go to the balcony if you want to sit outside, the balcony is at my room, if i am sleeping and you are quiet you can also go out to the balcony, as my sleep is quite good :)

I can be your private guide, as I was to 100+ guests in Budapest already. Otherwise, if you want, I leave you alone. I am there or not, as you prefer. Usually during the day I am working, so no time usually, just in the mornings, evenings or weekends.

The best attraction which is located very close to the appartment is of course my vintage retro store which is something like a consignment store. Of course the danube is very close and you also need only a couple of minutes to the big market hall. You cross the danube to Buda and the Gellert hill is close with the Citadell and the Gellert spa. From there you can go to the castle and go back to the Pest side on the famous chainbridge. Not far from there you will find the parliament. And much more. Just ask me...

The public transport is very good in Budapest. Decide yourself if you want to buy a 10 ticket block or a 24h or for example 72h ticket, just dont get the Budapest Card, its a ripoff. Actually if you book this listing, you wont need public transport for your stay - walking rules in the city, even in rain!

Don´t change money at the trainstation, international busstation or airport when you arrive, either take out money from the ATM or wait until you get into the inner city to go to a normal Exchange Office. They will rip you off at the main arrival points for tourists. Also at some inner city Exchange Offices. Many smaller shops in Budapest still have no electronic payment, so some cash is mandatory :)

reviews_text:
Host answered quickly on the questions. However, no introduction into city or district attractions.

This place is probably one of the nicest airbnb in Budapest! Very clean and the hosts are very nice and easy to reach. They are great people and place is truly amazing! There are shades on all windows and even the door, you can make it really dark even at daytime. The bed is super-comfy  and there are plenty of places to put your stuff (there is a built-in storage place for you under the stairs). There is also a TV in there and AC. This unit is the 3rd floor but there is an elevator that takes you up there. The location is perfect, right by all the bars. The only thing I can say that you'll love staying here! I'll definitely stay here next summer when I come back to Hungary! Thanks Attila! :)

Everything was fine, I recommend Attila's place.

Great location, comfortable apartment. Overall, very nice place to stay
review_summary: Brand new, perfectly located apartment in the heart of the jewish quarter. It has a spacious livingroom, nice bathroom, fully equiped kitchen, Airconditioning, SUPERFAST INTERNET.
description:
Brand new, perfectly located apartment in the heart of the jewish quarter. It has a spacious livingroom, nice bathroom, fully equiped kitchen, Airconditioning, SUPERFAST INTERNET.

It is an entire apartment, which is all for your convinience

You can contact 24/7

It is in the middle of the area, where nightlife is concentrated. No need for public transport, all the major sightseeing places are in walking distance

reviews_text:
What a great location while you are visiting Budapest!  Easy access from the trains and bus terminals, the location is incredible, nestled at the base of Castle Hill and Fisherman's Bastion. From here you are just a short walk from many of the most amazing sites in this spectacular city.  The apartment is wonderful! Cozy and quaint with a spectacular veranda to overlook the center from across the river. And the place was well positioned and extremely accommodating with all the comforts of home. Wake up to the rising sun and enjoy your morning coffee on the veranda. Our host was exceptional and the ease of checking in was excellent. What a great experience! We will be coming back soon and we will be looking forward to reserving this incredible location again.

everything went smooth without much back-and-forth. not much conversation and discussion was neccesary. everything was just perfect from the beginning!

Among all hosts I was staying with Zsuzsa is definitely one of the best. She was very welcoming, providing all assistance that we needed just in perfect time!

The apartment itself is just stunning, perfect location in the old city just below the castle with a magnificent breathtaking view on the river, the parlaiment and churches. We were enjoying our rooftop terrace which feels rather like  rooftop garden. I would like to recommend everyone to stay with Zsuzsa at this beautiful apartment.  

Alles war perfekt!
Wir haben uns sehr, sehr wohl gefühlt und haben es genossen, auf der tollen Terasse unseren morgendlichen Cafe zu trinken, bzw. abends den Tag gemütlich ausklingen zu lassen.
Die Lage ist top. 
Zsuzsa  ist sehr hilfsbereit und zuvorkommend.
Viele lieben Dank für alles.
Liebe Grüße
Moni & Geri
review_summary:
This is a perfectly located 50 sqm apartment with 2 rooms and a breathtaking 43 sqm rooftop garden, views to the Parliament and
the Chain Bridge.  Just a few steps from the Fishermen's Bastion and Matthias Church. Bus 16 stops at the entrance of the house.
description:
This is a perfectly located 50 sqm apartment with 2 rooms and a breathtaking 43 sqm rooftop garden, views to the Parliament and
the Chain Bridge.  Just a few steps from the Fishermen's Bastion and Matthias Church. Bus 16 stops at the entrance of the house.

This is a perfectly located 50 sqm apartment with 1 separated double-bedroom and an other room with an american style kitchen and sleeping facilities. This room leads to a breathtaking 43 sqm rooftop garden with views to the Parliament and the Chain Bridge. The building is located in a quiet street in the historical 1'st district just a few steps from the Fishermen's Bastion and Matthias Church. Bus 16 stops at the entrance of the house, M2 subway, shops, banks, foodstores, churches, restaurants are in walking distance.
The apartment is equipped with a dishwasher, an electric cooking panel, a
microwave oven, fridge, equipped kitchen, cooking pots, a hairdryer, a
toaster, a kettle, satellite TV and there is free WIFI. 

The apartment is located on the top 3rd floor ( no elevator). 

Smoking is not allowed, please use the terrace if you are a smoker.

Guest acces the whole apartment, it's only you who stay there. Flexible check-in and -out time based on availability.
Brand new furnitures and equipments.

Kitchen: dishwasher, an electric cooking panel, a microwave oven, fridge, equipped kitchen, cooking pots, a
toaster, washing-up liquid, ironing machine with ironing-board
Room: bed linen, blankets, pillows, bed clothes, 1 TV sets.
Bathroom: towels, a hairdryer, washing machine, schampoo, shower gel.

If you need assistance I'm available for you.

Matthias Church, Fishermen's Bastion , Buda Castle , a lot of restaurants, coffe shops , exchange office, shop are all about 5 minute walk. Bus 16 right at the entrance that takes you to the center.

Bus 16 right at the entrance, M2 Metro line, Batthyanyi Square, HEV H5,
Boats D11,D12,D13 are all about 10-15 minutes walk.

reviews_text:
We had a wonderfull stay. Very clean appartment, good bed en shower. Nearby nice spots en easy acces to metro. 

We had a great time in Budapest. The appartment is beautiful, very clean en cozy. We had a lovely stay. The appartment has a great location. Near to all the hotspots of Budapest. The communication between Gabor and us was nice. He is a very nice host! 

I recommend it 100%.
We arrived very late, at 1 in the morning and Gabor waited for us to bring us in the apartment. Thank you Gabor, we apreciate it :) The apartment was very clean and very very good situated. Opera, Vaci utca and the christmas market were very close. 
It was a very good experience and I will recommed it to all my friends when they will want to visit Budapest. 

The place was great and Gabor is a perfect host.
We will definitely recommend it.
Thank you for everything! 

The flat is beautiful, the location is perfect for exploring everything by foot. The communication with Gábor was perfect. Also, the building and the area are gorgeous! 

We absolutely loved staying at Gábor's place. The location was perfectly central and the apartment was clean and equiped with everything you need. Gábor was very helpful in getting us settled and aquanted with the city. We would definitely stay there again in future.

Great apartment, clean, cosy and fantastic location! 

Lovely place to stay,  very central. 
Modern apartment and very clean. 
Gabor was friendly and will definitely be coming back soon. 

The apartment is in a prime location for sightseeing Budapest, and is exactly as one can see in pictures. The apartment clearly looks like it has been newly renovated as everything looks nice and modern. Gabor was further a great host, providing all help when needed. Highly recommendable.

I loved staying in this apartment. Beautiful city and the apartment was in a perfect spot . Close to all public transport and walking distance to everything. I was sad to leave Budapest. Thanks Gábor for your amazing Airbnb.
review_summary: Nice and comfortable brand new apartment (finished in 2016 March) in the heart of Budapest.
description: Nice and comfortable brand new apartment (finished in 2016 March) in the heart of Budapest.

reviews_text:
This place was great! We really enjoyed our stay in this stylish, spacious flat. Everything was fresh and new and all the basic amenities you may need are provided. The metro and trams are walking distance and for us, the whole city was walkable from this location.
Communicating with the owners was easy, and checking in and out went very smoothly.
Price worthy and worth recommending for short or longer stays in Budapest.

Hallo liebe Reisende, ich war das erste mal in Budapest.  Und passend zu dieser unglaublich schönen und facettenreichen Stadt, fand ich mit dieser wundervollen Wohnung das richtige Zuhause. Sie ist nicht nur sehr stilvoll und hochwertig eingerichtet, sondern hat eine Seele, die in den vielen kleinen Details auffällt. Die Wohnung ist sehr gepflegt und die Abwicklung mit Airbnb unkompliziert. Besonders genial ist der Standort.  Wenige Min zu genialen Orten wie Szimpla Kert oder in die historische Innenstadt. Auch der Bahnhof ist um die Ecke. Es war meine perfekte Basis für meine Ausflüge.  Und da es soviel zu sehen in unmittelbarer Nähe gibt, werde ich diese Wohnung wieder besuchen. LG Dominik

Hello dear travelers, I was the first time in Budapest. And to match this incredibly beautiful and multifaceted city, I found with this wonderful apartment the right home. It is not only very stylish and high-quality furnished, but has a soul, which is noticeable in the many small details. The apartment is very well maintained and the handling with Airbnb uncomplicated. Particularly ingenious is the location. A few minutes to places like Szimpla Kert or to the historic city center. Also the train station is around the corner. It was my perfect base for my trips. And since there is so much to see in the immediate vicinity, I will visit this apartment again. LG Dominik
availability: The minimum night stay for this listing varies.
review_summary: Enjoy your stay in Budapest in style. This apartment on the edge of the city centre has its own refined character down to its details, defined by clear retro lines and subdued colours, giving the place a pure but warm masculine feel.
description:
Enjoy your stay in Budapest in style. This apartment on the edge of the city centre has its own refined character down to its details, defined by clear retro lines and subdued colours, giving the place a pure but warm masculine feel.

The apartment is available to up to 4 persons. It has one bedroom with a large wardrobe and a double bed, while the living room has a little lounge section with sofa that can be opened to a bed for two, and a dining section. The kitchen is fully equipped, and the place also has a broadband wifi and cable TV for you to use. 


ROOMS:
+ living room with sofa bed
+ bedroom with double bed
+ bathroom with shower
+ separate toilet
+ equipped kitchen


Style does not only lie in interior decoration details. We proud ourselves in the cleanliness of our apartment and provide crispy towels and bed linen to all guests, along with complimentary basic amenities.

COMFORT:
+ fresh towels and bed linen for all guests
+ basic amenities (soap, toilet paper, shampoo)
+ hair dryer
+ washing machine
+ iron
+ cable TV
+ high-speed wifi
+ air conditioning
+ 24/7 assistance by phone and email

We will meet during the check-in/out, and are available throughout your stay 24/7 via phone and email.

The apartment is found on the edge of the city centre, 200 metres from public transport hub Blaha Lujza Square, where you’ll also find a small shopping centre. The Jewish District is also at walking distance, just across Grand Boulevard. Trolley line 74 running along Dohány Street will take you to City Park in the nick of time, or to the very heart of the city (right up to Dohány Street Synagogue) along Wesselényi Street in a heartbeat.

LOCATION:
+ on the edge of city centre
+ good public transportation (buses, trams and metro line 200m)
+ ideal for sightseeing and pub crawls

DISTANCES BY FOOT:
Broadway/SOHO - 1 min
Oktogon - 2 mins
Opera house - 2 mins
Jewish district (and ruin pubs) - 4 mins
Basilica - 5 mins
Deák Ferenc square - 6 mins
Parliament - 11 mins
Chain Bridge - 12 mins

DISTANCES BY PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION:
Heroes' Square - 8 mins
Margaret Island - 15 mins

Tourist tax is included in the price.

reviews_text:
The apartment was exactly as pictured - very nice place to stay. The coffee machine / pads were a nice touch!

The location is a 5 min walk from a Metro station and within walking distance of most the main sights within Pest. Initially the neighborhood seemed very messy - lots of old property on the streets. It turns out this was a one-a-year city event called lomtalanítás which roughly meeting "get rid of your junk day". 

There are a number of nice restaurants and ruin pubs nearby and the whole atmosphere was very cool. 


I recommend this apartment!
This is the best apartment in Budapest! they are in the center, close to many bars and restaurants! The apartments have everything you need to tourists. apartment in excellent condition. great bed! the owner is very polite and helped with all the question arises, including a taxi order in the airport! many thanks!
-------
On Russian:
Рекомендую эти апартаменты!
Это самые лучшие апартаменты в Будапеште! Они находятся в центре, рядом много баров и ресторанов! В апартаментах есть все, что нужно для туристов. Квартира в отличном состоянии. отличная кровать! Хозяин очень вежливый и помог со всеми возникавшими вопросами, в том числе и с заказом такси в аэропорт! большое спасибо!

The flat is located in the walking distance  from the major  attractions.  Flat is newly refurbished and has all the amenities that u might need to stay in Budapesht.  Weiner has been very easy and fast to contact as well . Overall very satisfied. Thumbs up

Fantastic appartment, clean and has a good location. Host was cool and nice, he let us in earlyer so we didnt have to wait few hours. In appartment was esspresso machine and cold water so we could chill from our trip, thanks for that. If you choose to visit Budapest and u need a place to stay, choose this appartment, you will not regret it. 

Staying at Weiner was a perfect example of an exceptional customer service from an Airbnb host. The check-in went perfectly smooth and quick. The listing look exactly the same as stated, and it's perfect for a couple, but still good for 4 people. We experienced a slight issue during our stay, but that was resolved in a blink of an eye by the help of the host and didn't ruin our experience a bit. Could only recommend!

I had a really nice stay at Weiner Leo.  The flat is in great location, quiet, and brand new inside with everything you need for a pleasant stay in Budapest. Lovely shower!

Very nice flat, clean, new, the communication with owner is very good. 

The contrast was huge when coming from dilapidated corridor to just renovated stylish and clean apartment. Perfect place and situation for a couple who wants to discover the city.
From Weiner and Giovanni we got fast and friendly answers to our questions.  When coming next time to Budapest we will ask for this apartment.

This apartment was absolutely perfect.  Clean, cute, and comfortable. It was quiet apartment, but also in the best area of Budapest. Giovanni was also  attentive and available to answer any of my questions. Would highly recommend this apartment to anyone wanting to visit Budapest. Thanks everything!

Ho soggiornato in questo appartamento per 5 notti.
Devo dire che ho trovato tutto molto organizzato e funzionale. L'appartamento è esattamente come descritto nel sito, centrale, vicino alla metropolitana ma anche alle principali attrazioni monumentali.
Chi ci ha accolto è stato disponibile nell'aspettarci (l'aereo aveva due ore di ritardo!) e così carino da darci indicazioni su cosa fare e dove mangiare.
La casa era perfettamente pulita e accogliente. Una bella cucina, una spaziosissima camera ed il bagno davvero carino e funzionale. Non ci si deve fare ingannare dall'esterno, che invece avrebbe bisogno di qualche intervento.
Esperienza positivissima.........da consigliare!
availability: 2 nights minimum stay.From Dec 28, 2016 - Jan 01, 2017 the minimum stay is 3 nights.
review_summary: Completely renovated apartment located in the heart of Budapest. It is an ideal place to discover the city, bars, restaurants and clubs are just steps away.
house_rules: The property is non-smoking. Please respect the residents, observe quiet time following 10.00 pm. Only the people booked in are entitled to spend the night in the apartment.
description:
Completely renovated apartment located in the heart of Budapest. It is an ideal place to discover the city, bars, restaurants and clubs are just steps away.

The apartment is in a typical Budapest building. has an inner court with side hanging corridors.   it is located in a great area, suitable for those who want to stay a short walk from all the restaurants, bars, pubs, tourist attractions, the best of the Budapest nightlife.

The apartment is in an old building of 1920 on the second floor (no elevator) but it is completely renovated. Everything is new, the furniture, the floors, doors and windows with electric shutters. The bedroom has a 180x200 king size bed. The living room is equipped with double sofa-bed 150x190(URL HIDDEN) Featuring free WIFI , a well-equipped kitchen and a dining table, the apartment also comes with a hairdryer, washing machine,iron, cooker, coffe machine Nespresso, kettle, mikrowave, oven. Towels, sheets, pillows and blankets are provided for our guests.

The apartment is close, (5 minutes walk) to the blue line (M3), tram 4 and 6, night buses and Western Train Station (Nyugati). The property is 10-minute walk from Oktogon square (metro M1 yellow) , State Opera House and parliament building. The nearest supermarket is 100 meters  and  is open 24 hours.

review_summary: Quiet, stylish bike apartment with best location, in the center of bohemian quarter
description:
Quiet, stylish bike apartment with best location, in the center of bohemian quarter

Our unique apartment is not a common, everyday flat. It has a specific layout and it is full of cozy solutions.  The flat's size is 65 sqm+gallery, and it has 3 large rooms and the bathroom. It is comfortable for 4 persons. You can find large kitchen and dining room, working station, bright living room with a sofa which can be used as a bed for 2 persons, a gallery where 2 guests can sleep comfortable. The rooms are connected to each other, there are no doors between them.

The location could not be better. The flat is in Kazinczy street which is the center of the jewish quarter. This is the bohemian part of Budapest full with restaurants, pubs, night clubs, etc. Everything is close by walk or by bike, but it has excellent connections to public transport as well. Even though the flat is in the downtown, it is very quaiet because it doesn't face the street, there is a court and front part of the building between them.

The flat is well equipped. Our guests can use 2 bicycles free to discover the city by bike. A coffee maker and kettle for making tea are available. In the kitchen there are micro wave, hot plates and dishwasher too. Using the 6 part audio system and a hookah with accessories are included as well.

reviews_text:
Magdi's apartment was beautiful, had great views and was located in a fantastic area. We were in walking distance from a ton of Budapest landmarks as well as bars and restaurants. Magdi was responsive, very helpful getting us checked in and an overall fantastic host. We'd love to come back and stay again some day! 

Very nice apartment in an excellent location, everything is within walking distance. Metrostation is across the street, very good if you arrive by train (only 4 stops from Keleti).
Place looks exactly like on the photos - nice and clean. Would definitely recommend this place.

Very nice place with a really cosy bed. Perfect location, close to sights and restaurants. 

The appartement was very nice and clean, Magdi was very accommodating with our schedule. We spent a very good week end there, I recommend !

Lovely Home and nice Hello from the Owner!
Everything fine!
Nice place near the Metro!

We really enjoyed our stay in Magdi's place and Budapest in general. The apartment itself is located in a neighborhood called Ruins which is filled with numerous bars and restaurants. Also it is really close to the the center of Budapest, basically in a walking distance to all the Budapest's main attractions. 
The apartment is comfortable and full of sun, also fully equipped with all the necessities you would need. It has that great vintage vibe that I appreciate wherever I go. There is a huge fish tank in the living room that makes the apartment even more appealing. 
Magdi was kind enough to welcome us in the apartment when we arrived, unfortunately we couldn't spend a lot of time getting to know her better since we were in a rush to a concert. 
All in  all, I would always come back to Magdi's place. :)


Magdi was very flexible with our time of arrival and very nice. The apartment is beautiful, very cosy and warm. It has all things needed. Super close to the center and in front of the metro station (very nice and easy to get there from the airport). We have enjoyed our stay a lot and we fully recommend it to everyone. One of the nicest places we've stayed in. 

Magdi was an absolutely amazing host! She was very flexible about the check- in and out time.. The location was spot on - in the center of pest - the metro station just across the street - and the best view from the balcony! The apartment was even more beautiful than the pictures showed and very clean! 
We loved Budapest!! Thank's Magdi for a wonderful stay! :)

An excellent apartment in an ideal and central location of Pest. 
Clean, comfortable, a good view from the balcony, easy to walk everywhere (right opposite a Subway station in fact but I never needed to use it) and contains everything needed for cooking (again, not that I used it as Hungarian food is so good!)
Magdi too was very helpful and communicated perfectly.
All brilliant and I loved Budapest! Thanks again Magdi 

Very nice place to stay. Pleasant, clean and close to everywhere. Thanks Magdi.
review_summary: Located in very cozy, sunny and extended attic(loft) with balcony and free wifi. In the heart of the city, 46sqm, near touristic sites, theaters, pubs, cofees shops and eccesible by public transports.

Centrally located within Budapest, you're 5 minutes away from the metro and main tramway line.

This 50m2 flat is on the 5th floor of a modern residence (with lift) and has its own balcony. 

Bright, calm and clean, it comes with a fully equipped American kitchen, a living room with a convertible sofa, a bedroom with a double bed and a bathroom with tube (toilets are separate). Wi-fi is available. Parking is possible in the underground garage, please ask for it during your reservation.

reviews_text:
The location of this place is great! 

The apartment is BIG....CLEAN...CONVENIENT for tourist. Hosts are very quick in responding and very helpful in eveything!!

Great apartment, great location! 

I was super welcome,Serafina husband was great, super nice!
It was perfect!

thank you for a beautiful Budapest experience!

It was a very good moment in the flat. So beautiful and comfortable. 
Serafina's husband is a very good person. It was a pleasure to meet him and stay in them place.

Perfect location, apartment just like the photos, you'll have all you need for a pleasant stay in these wonderful city. We'll definitely come back!!!

Great!

Good and fast communication. We were greeted at arrival by Aron  even though we arrived late. Very clean! The bed is good, but not suitable for couples, as it is two single beds put together with hard wood ind the middle. 

This is by far my best experience with an AirBnB listing. The hosts were unbelievably kind and helpful (I was even brought apples one day) and all of their recommendations were a blast. The apartment is in the heart of Budapest and is in/around so many amazing restaurants and museums. Budapest is a very easy city to get around in general and being here makes it even easier.

review_summary:
Located next to Nyugati Railway Station, close to the Parliament and several pubs, we offer you this apartment that we renovated in order meet your needs. When we travel we are always looking for a place like this.

Spacious room+kitchen+bathroom
description:
Located next to Nyugati Railway Station, close to the Parliament and several pubs, we offer you this apartment that we renovated in order meet your needs. When we travel we are always looking for a place like this.

Spacious room+kitchen+bathroom

The apartment is situated in a house that is typical for Budapest. The spacious bedroom, with its high ceiling is a feature of the city's architecture. We have renovated this place for the purpose of keeping that flair but at the same time to offer all the luxury that we would expect as guests.

We would like to make your stay in Budapest as pleasant as we have experienced it in other cities where we used Airbnb. Therefore we are happy to give you tips where to eat, shop, spend quality time. You can turn to us with your questions and we will answer them to the best of our knowledge.

This is a typical neighborhood of central Pest. A lot of residential buildings, a number of cafés and restarants, but also the biggest shoping mall of the city, Westend is in the area. You can reach most of the landmarks of central Budapest by walking and eat out at various exciting restaurants (there is a great sushi place and a turkish restaurant around the corner).

The apartment is next to Nyugati Pályaudvar Metro station and the tram stop with the same name. This is really a major public transport juncture so it will be easy to get here from the airport or other train stations. If you arrive by car then there is parking space in front of the house or in a garage down the street.

reviews_text:
Attila wa a great host. I can just recommend his place.

Good location, lovely apartment in the heart of Buda. Well designed flat for visiting Budapest. Close to Moricz square with excellent public transport opportunities.

Атіла - дуже гостинний і відповідальний господар. Квартира дуже чиста, повністю відповідає опису і фотографію, у ній є все необхідне, розташована у центральному кварталі близько до горомадського транспорту. Господар допомагає замовити транспорт якщо потрібно, з ним можно домовитися якщо потрібно залишити речі у квартири у день заїзду, але ще до зазначеного часу заїзду. Рекомендую всім.

Nice clean place that looks exactly as advertised

Attila is a really friendly person who was waiting for us outside the building to welcome us. The flat was spotless and this is my dream loft I wish I could live there.

This place is right in city centre and you can take the bus no 27 to go to Citadella outside the loft.

This cozy flat is perfect for a single person or a couple. Wonderfully located near many forms of public transport, it is easy to go anywhere. The bed is comfortable and Attila makes sure you are comfortable.

I was only checking in for short period so couldn't say much about the neighborhood other than that it seemed only a short distance from points of interest. The apartment itself is spacious and comfortable, and Attila was kind and communicative. Despite having to rush because of a delay on my part, he was helpful and cheerful when checking me in. The apartment was nice and clean Close to the city center with the tram close by. We were allowed a late check out which was great. Thanks for everything :)

Attila was a perfect host. He helped me with all the important stuff, since the trip from the airport to the house, to explain the best places to visit. 
The house was exactly like in the photos. Beautiful and very Cozy.
If i come back to Budapest i would love to return to that house!

description: The spot is located near: Bottomless Lake and A38. For this reason, you will like the spot: a comfortable bed, comfort, high ceilings and lighting. The appropriate place for this: couples, lone adventurers, business travelers and families (children).

description:
Apartment REGIPOSTA is a double bedroom 89 square meters apartment in the city center, 100 meters far from the river Danube. Restaurants, pubs, night clubs are in the surrounding of the flat, but does not disturb our guests in their relaxation. The famous Váci utca, or Vörösmarty square, but other attractions of Budapest are close by walk as well. The apartment can be easily reached by public transport, bus, tram and metro stops are near.

The best thing in the apartment is that it is very well located, close to all the attractions of Budapest. It is just in the city center, but in a really calm and nice atmosphere.

The apartment is totally for the guest, nobody else lives in the apartment.

The apartment does not have a reception, but we always give our contacts to our guests to be able to contact us any time.

The apartment can be easily reached by public transport. Metro, tram and bus stations are very close to the apartment.
Parcing can be sometimes a little bit problematic as it is not free unfortunately. If needed, our collegues can offer some parking garages in the surrounding.

reviews_text:
Atilla and Janos are extremely great hosts. The apartment is wonderfully designed, decorated and has beautiful high ceilings. It is also in a wonderful location.

They provided a very comprehensive useful guide to the city before we arrived and were there to welcome us (even though our arrival was delayed by a few hours - Janos was extremely patient and welcoming when we did eventually arrive).

They also helped arrange arrive taxi back to the airport and came to see us off. I can only say positive things about this stay - both the apartment and the hosts were wonderful!

Highly recommend.

We had a great stay in the apartment of Janos and Atilla. The apartment has all the facilities you need and the location is perfect. Close to the bars and restaurants. The guys were good hosts and they took the time to help us in finding the best places based on our preferences. We recommend this apartment to other visitors. 

Very clean and big place with great decoration; wifi was strong. Lots of useful information provided, where to visit, etc and walking distance to most attractions. Highly recommended! Thanks!

Great location, great appartement, great hosts! Very much recommended. 

Impeccable and very helpful hosts, great location and perfect cofortable base to explore the city. Highly recommendable!

We had an amazing first stay in Budapest. The apartment is beautiful and exactly as described!

The location is fantastic we walked everywhere and it is surrounded by great bars and restaurants.

Would highly reccommend - thanks for having us!

We loved our 5-night stay at Attila and Janos' apartment. The apartment is located in a really nice neighborhood. There are plenty of fun things to do very close by, but it is very quiet. The apartment is nice and clean, very neat, and very spacious. They were very welcoming and provided with everything we needed. We really appreciated the map of things to do they made for the guests. It was very very helpful. We definitely stay at this apartment again if we come back to Budapest.

The apartment is beautiful and exactly like the pictures. The location is very good with shops and bars close by and a 30min walk to the river. Check-in and out was very easy and the guys were very responsive. 

Our hosts were wonderful.
They were waiting for us almost an hour because of a delay at the airport, to bring the luggage to the third floor. A delicious bottle of wine waiting for us ... The apartment is tastefully furnished. Clean and aesthetically. The apartment really pleasant and bright. The area is also great, a lot of special bars, small cafes and restaurants of all kinds really close. The main sites are within a short walk, there is no need for public transportation. Highly recommended

We stayed here for 4 nights and it was exactly as it looks in the pictures - absolutely perfect! The location is ideal for sightseeing (we saw everything on foot) and also right next to great bars and restaurants (without any noise or disruption). Attila and Janos were extremely accommodating and helped with our late arrival and a taxi to the airport when we left, giving us great tips about the local bars and restaurants too. The apartment had everything we needed and was so quiet and relaxing, it really made our holiday - we would definitely recommend it.
availability: The minimum night stay for this listing varies.
review_summary: Bright, spacious 60 square meters apartment with two rooms in the heart of the VII. District's Jewish quarter of Budapest. The apartment – with a view to the sparkling street life -  is at the top floor of an old middle class three-storeyed building built in 1906.
house_rules:
- You can use anything in the apartment.
- Please respect the neighborhood.
- No party please in the apartment! Loud music, party, etc. in the apartment or loudness in the stairway is not tolerated by the community of the house.
- Please do not invite guest.
- Please do not smoke in the apartment!
- No pets please. Although we love pets, we do our best to keep the apartment very clean and fresh for all of our guests.
description:
Bright, spacious 60 square meters apartment with two rooms in the heart of the VII. District's Jewish quarter of Budapest. The apartment – with a view to the sparkling street life -  is at the top floor of an old middle class three-storeyed building built in 1906.

The apartment is located at the edge of the cultural and entertainment district of the city granting a peaceful shelter but with an easy and fast access to a variety of activities downtown Budapest can offer. 

The apartment is ideal for one or two couples, families of four. The kitchen is fully equipped (micro, oven, toaster, accessories). The spacious bathroom is built with a shower, in the drawer of the old kitchen wardrobe (that started a new life as a bathroom wardrobe) you will find hairdryer as well together with fresh towels and basic cleaning supplies. 

The large rooms are stylishly furnished. Almost all furniture is handmade and reclaimed combining the refreshed beauty of the rural style with the modern functionality. The apartment has two rooms. The large living room has a sofa that can be converted into a full size double bed and our Grannies old kitchen table that by opening it makes enough space for a lunch for four or even six persons. The sleeping room (that opens from the living room) has a small loft where you can retreat should you wish to be on your own for a while. The full size double bed is just under the loft forming a private chamber for your undisturbed sleep. 

The apartment is at the top floor of a 110 years old house with a view to the sparkling street life, still peaceful at night since it is on the third floor. The house is one of the architectural heritages of Budapest, there is neither elevator in the house nor air conditioning in the apartment.

Attila and / or János will be available during your stay. In the apartment you will find our house rules together with our availabilities and some useful information on the neighborhood.

Advent and Christmas Fair: Budapest’s biggest Advent and Christmas Fair is open between 11 November and 1 January in the downtown Vörösmarty Square (15 minutes walk from the apartment). The Fair offers a wide variety of wintery treats, besides the traditional chimney cake, mulled wine, hot chocolate, you will also find Hungarian handicrafts, ceramics and metalwork plus continuous family-friendly programs (concerts, workshops). 

Advent Feast: The Advent Feast at the Basilica on Saint Stephen's Square (20 minutes walk from the apartment) is open between 25 November and 2 January. The main attraction besides the Feast will be the light painting on the walls of the Basilica (after dusk) and the ice rink for children. 

Whatever is your interest, due to the apartment’s superb location you will reach it in a few minutes’ walk:

Sightseeing, cultural heritage
- Deák square, Erzsébet square (downtown) 10 minutes walk
- St. Stephen Cathedral 20 minutes walk
- Parliament (Kossuth square) 20 minutes walk
- Main Synagogue (Wesselényi Street) 5 minutes walk
- Hero’s Square (Museum of Fine Arts, Kunsthalle) and the City Park (with Vajdahunyad Casle, the Lake and Széchenyi Bath) through Andrássy Avenue 25 minutes walk

Culture
- National Opera 10 minutes walk
- Variety of theaters (Operett, Madách, Thália, Radnóti) within 10 minutes walk
- Liszt Ferenc Music Academy 5 minutes walk

Street Art / City life
- The unique ruin and garden pubs / beer gardens, dozens of street food restaurants within 10 minutes walk
- Discover the new wave street art of the painted firewalls of the houses within 10 minutes walk

Public transportation / connection to the City / Parking:
- Tram 4/6 circular tram service around downtown Budapest - 2 minutes walk
- Blaha Lujza square metro line 2 – 5 minutes walk
- Deák square (conjunction of all metro lines and main bus services) – 10 minutes walk

If you are with car, you can leave your car at a closed parking place next to the house (250 Ft / hour, appr. 0,8 Euro) or a parking house almost opposite to the house (290 Ft / hour, appr. 1 Euro).

review_summary:
This apartment is in the heart of Downtown, Budapest.

It is newly renovated and has a compact and well equipped kitchen, 2 clean and modern bathrooms one with a bath and the other is a shower, 3 bedrooms and a living room area. It is perfectly suitable for bigger families or for a larger group of friends.
description:
This apartment is in the heart of Downtown, Budapest.

It is newly renovated and has a compact and well equipped kitchen, 2 clean and modern bathrooms one with a bath and the other is a shower, 3 bedrooms and a living room area. It is perfectly suitable for bigger families or for a larger group of friends.

This newly renovated great located 4 bedroom apartment that has a fully equipped  2 kitchens and 2 bathrooms. can host up to 12 people with great comfort.

The entire apartment is for your use. Please read and respect our house rules.

Upon your arrival we will discuss the exact time and place we should meet, or we can offer you a self check in option. We are generally flexible about the check-in and check-out times, so let us know if you have any special requests. We will do our best to accommodate your needs if the schedule allows it.

The neighborhood features some great restaurants, which will allow you to discover our unique Hungarian cuisine. You will also be able to find a few interesting nightlife spots within a walking distance from the apartment.

The public transportation system of the city is really great and easily accessible.

reviews_text:
We spent a very nice time in Laura's apartment. She was quick to reply and to offer us help. The apartment was clean and had all the necessities. It was also located very centrally within walking distance from most of the tourist attractions. 

It was very clean and well thought out for us when we got there. The instructions were clear and the host was very nice. We were very comfortable there and the beds were so nice we had a hard time waking up!

review_summary: My name is Laura Czike I am 45 years old.I have a very nice apartment with two separeted bedrooms with two (URL HIDDEN) my opinion this flat's located is really good for the tourist.If you are intrested, don't hesitate I am waiting for you.
description:
My name is Laura Czike I am 45 years old.I have a very nice apartment with two separeted bedrooms with two (URL HIDDEN) my opinion this flat's located is really good for the tourist.If you are intrested, don't hesitate I am waiting for you.

Budapesting's Palatinus Palace Apartment is a newly renovated (in 2015) beautiful and spacious (90 sm) apartment with 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms on the fifth floor of its building. It is located in the very heart of the city, on the famous Pozsonyi út, right next to the Danube, just around the corner from the House of Parliament.

The apartment is special as it is located just 50 meters from the Danube. The apartment's big windows are letting in a lot of natural light and have nice views.

The other side of the apartment faces the courtyard of the building, its even more calm and faces south with a lot of light. The Lehel utca market is so close that you can even do your everyday morning shopping there, it has all the famous Hungarian delicies and fresh fruits, vegetables.

The apartment can accommodate 8 people in its 2 bedrooms with 3 king size double beds, and 2 single beds.

The dining table can sit 8 people so you can all have dinner, breakfast together.

Of course all the necessary bedding are free of charge (fresh sheets, blankets, pillows, towels as many as you like).

It’s on the 5th of the building but there is a newly refurbished elevator in the building.

The apartment has amazing views of the city's skyline as it is on the top floor of a higher building, you can have your morning coffee at the terrace of the apartment enjoying the sunrise the clouds and beautiful Budapest.

Upon arrival we wait for you in the apartment with your key, a map and some other useful information for your stay in Budapest. When you have put down your luggage we will sit down with you and explain the most important things you should know to make your stay more comfortable, like:

- best restaurants, bars, cafes, breakfast places

- best bath houses and museums

- most important and interesting sights and areas to visit

- public transport and taxi system

- where to exchange money

- where are the closest supermarkets, and 24H shops

After all the explanation we disappear until you leave but will be there for you to help in anything like booking a table at a restaurant or if you have any question, you just email, sms, call us and we answer all possible questions and help in any kind of problems.

It is important to know that you can arrive anytime, it is not a problem if you arrive with a flight or train even at 23.55, check in is from noon and on the day you leave you have to pack your luggage until 11.00, but you can keep your luggage at a safe place during the day in case you leave only later from Budapest.

We can pick you up by car at the airport for a fee of 29EUR.

You can use internet in the apartment free of charge of course and of course the use of laundry is free too. My brother can rent bikes for you too, it costs about 7EUR/day and they bring them to the apartment and you can give it back to them also at the flat when you wish.

The Újlipótváros (13th district), where the apartment is located is one of the most popular districts by locals, still its very central, it is located in the oldest part of Budapest's downtown, it has a very rich history and Jewish background, its located next to the Margaret Bridge, it is amazing to stroll on the beautiful streets or just have a coffee at a small corner coffee shop, every corner of the district offers you a new surprise and if you walk to the Danube it has beautiful views of the Margaret Island and the Castle Hill, which is just across the river, and the Margaret Bridge, and the Margaret Island are all located in the Újlipótváros area, just a few minutes away from the apartment.

Szent István tér and Pozsonyi út with many good bars, restaurants and cafes is around the corner from the the Basilica Corner Apartment.

Sights next to the Palatinus Palace Apartment: House of  Parliament, Margaret Island + any of the other sights of the city within 15 minutes walk.

The closest bathhouses: Lukács Baths and Veli Bej Baths, both accessible on foot within 10 minutes.

Near the building downstairs: 24 hours supermarket, coffee shop, local restaurants, pharmacy, exchange office.

The apartment has very good public transportation connection, as it is located next to the very central JASZAI MARI TER tram station, from where you can access the entire city and get there easily with tram 4/6 from the airport and main railway stations of the city. There are many more buses like bus 9 and the trolley bus family stopping next door.

There is 24H bus connection next to the apartment too.

The most important rule is to not to disturb the others living in the building and we take this serious, our apartments are located in buildings where the locals from Budapest are living, old people, babies sick and healthy, so the travelers who come and stay in our apartment should respect the building, the people and the most important part of it is not to be loud in the common areas and in the apartment after 8PM, of course you can stay out in the city as long as you wish, just please be very quite returning home and do not party in the apartment, this is the most important thing to share.

reviews_text:

Thank you Kertész !

description:
Enjoy your holiday, in this vintage new brand , modern apartment, right in the center of Budapest, where it all is happening. Just 200 meter from the tram station and 500 from River Danube.

Located  in the centre of Budapest, close to the Buda Castle. The property is located 500 meter from the River Danube. The nearest supermarket is 20 metres.  In the bilding there is no elevator but the appartman is on the 2nd flore which is  30 square meter and garden view included bed room with normal comfortable bed, living room with pull-out sofa for the 3rd and 4th persons, bath room and kitchen. Featuring flat-screen TV with cable channels, free WIFI as well , well-equipped kitchen and a dining table, the property also comes with a washing machine, cooker, kettle, mikrowave, oven.Accommodation will provide you sound system ( Iphone, Ipad or smart phone sound dock)  air-conditioning, Accommodation will provide you sound system ( Iphone, Ipad or smart phone sound dock)  air-conditioning.  Guests can make use of the hairdryer and the free toiletries provided in the bathroom.

The closest tram starion is 250 meters from the property.

The non-stop tram line 6 is 250 meter from the apartment. The closest metro startion is one step by tram. The River Danube is 500 meter from the apartment.  Budapest Liszt Ferenc Airport is located 19 km from the apartment.

reviews_text:
Margit and her husband are very kind. The palace is  a little bit old but the house is modern and reconstructed. The position is great because is in the centre of the city and the metro is near. The house was very clean and well stocked. I suggest this apartment.

Extremely clean, spacious and perfectly furnished. Everything's close by. Perfect location in town!

The place:
The place is beautiful. Spacious living room, clean, and have everything you need to cook. Greta apartment situated in a very perfect location. It's next to the stunning parliament building and metro station. It is also in the route of tram number 2, which is said to be a tram with the most beautiful view in Budapest. Spar and local supermarket are also nearby. 

The host:
Our bus to Budapest got delayed. We were meant to arrive at 11pm but we arrived at greta apartment at 12am. Margit and his husband was there waiting for us. They even gave us Hungarian wine. It was lovely!!

Margit nos puso todas las facilidades para recibirnos pese a las horas tardias a las que llegamos y tambien para abandonar la casa a la mejor hora para coger el vuelo de vuelta, el apartamento parece estar nuevo y esta muy limpio, ubicacion muy buena con todo transporte a escasos minutos del apartamento, sin duda repetiria.

Margit et son conjoint, un couple d'une gentillesse remarquable. 

Un appartement qui vient d'être rénové, propre et tranquille, très bien situé à distance de marche du centre. Je le recommande.
availability: The minimum night stay for this listing varies.
review_summary: This charming  30m2 with 1 bedroom recently fully refurbished apartment is situated next to the Danube and the Parlaiment in the heart of the City centre, away from noisy traffic - the best location for a tourist in Budapest!
description:
This charming  30m2 with 1 bedroom recently fully refurbished apartment is situated next to the Danube and the Parlaiment in the heart of the City centre, away from noisy traffic - the best location for a tourist in Budapest!

The location of the flat is perfect for those who wants to explore the city, becouse the city center, the Parliament (50m), the Danube (100m), the Margaret island, the Bazilica and lots of other places are very close, and also the red metro line (M2) is only 100m from the flat (stop Kossuth tér).
You going to be walking distance from the main attractions, such as Chainbridge, main shopping street /Váci Street/, and the Buda castle is on the other side of the Danube.
Newly renovated and tastefully decorated one bedroom flat in the heart (5. District) of Budapest. It is located next to the Parliament and the magnificent Liberty Square (Szabadság tér) and just a couple blocks from the romantic bank of the Danube river.

The apartment contains a separate bedroom with a double bed, a fully equipped kitchen with all the necessary equipment such as microwave, cooking place, fridge, pots and pans, cutleries, glasses, kettle and toaster. 
The living room is furnished with a convertible sofabed (comfortably accommodates for 2 people ) furthermore a cableTV and free WIFI. In the bathroom there is a shower and toilet.

This apartment is located at the first floor.
This is a quiet but central area. You can explore the city on foot!

Public transport is perfect in this area. All main lines is in a few minutes walk distance. From the Liszt Ferenc Airport it takes around 45 minutes.

Smoking is allowed only outside the flat, in the open air corridor.

Please respect the neighbours in this close-knit community. Please keep the noise to minimum between 9pm and 8am.

reviews_text:
Nice, flexible owner, ideal location to discover the Buda Castle!

Staying at Judit's was wonderful! My husband and I arrived a little earlier than the expected, but Judit did her best to help us as much as possible! The apartment was at a great location, walking distance from everything and close to public transportation, supermarket, etc. Judit and her husband are friendly and helpful, and made our stay as pleasant as possible! Super recommended! 

Judit and Victor are very friendly hosts and I can recommend staying with them. 

Good place~

Judit and Victor are very nice and hospitable. They provided huge information about Budapest for us. We had a chit chat during staying three nights. They are a quite warm and happy couple. The place is also very convenient, and close to metro as well the city centre. If you are into walk like us, you definitely want to choose this place. 

Judith was an amazing just, who was so friendly that it made being there inba scary new city not so bad! Greta location near everything I needed. 

Judit's  apartment was outstanding. The location is super convenient and perfect for tourists specially those who want to explore the romantic side of the city.  They made sure we got to the apartment easily and even gave so many tips on how and what best to see for our stay there. Highly recommended. If we come again we will be sure to book here.

Judit was a great host. She and her husband was really really friendly. She gave us perfect information on how to get around Budapest. The house is located at a great location. Do not bother getting on public transports because everything is walking distance! 

Judit is one of best hosts I've ever met. She welcomed me warmly and gave useful instruction about Budapest. The room is absolutely comfortable. Bright, fresh air, nice view and tranquility. Moreover, the location is perfect! Thanks Judit, I want to visit Budapest and stay with you again.

Judit and Victor are a realy good hosts. They gave us a map, explained where we can find something interesting and tried to recommend as much as possible. Room was very cozy and clean. Everything was the same as you can find on the photos. Location? Location is the best ever. Flat is 10 minutes from city centre. Everything was perfect. Thank you for such a lovely weekend!! :)
review_summary: My place is close to The famous Castle hill area. The Fisherman's Bastion which offers you the nicest view of Budapest is just steps away. The Royal Place, The Fisherman's Bastion is just steps away from my place and if you are in a good shape you can walk there in 10 minutes using the steps.
description:
My place is close to The famous Castle hill area. The Fisherman's Bastion which offers you the nicest view of Budapest is just steps away. The Royal Place, The Fisherman's Bastion is just steps away from my place and if you are in a good shape you can walk there in 10 minutes using the steps.

The room looks on a garden so no cars or smog will not bother you. The room actually look in the direction of the river Danube.

You will be able to use the bathroom the kitchen and the fridge.

24/7 assistance in case if you need help.

The neighborhood is rather in a conservative area where restaurants close around 10pm. If you want to go to party you just have to cross the Chain bridge a short walk and you will find vibrant night life in Pest.

My place is a 10 Min walk from Batthyany square a major point for buses and  Metro and trams. If you do not want to walk so much the stop of bus number 16 is just 2 minutes away.

review_summary: This simple studio apartment is perfect for couples on holiday, solo adventurers and casual business travellers. You will love the location and access to Budapest’s lively city-center.
description:
This simple studio apartment is perfect for couples on holiday, solo adventurers and casual business travellers. You will love the location and access to Budapest’s lively city-center.

Located on the second floor of a 19th century classical building, this renovated studio apartment comes equipped with all the comforts of home.

Upstairs the loft bedroom has a cozy twin bed and workstation. The living room features comfortable sofas, chairs and coffee table. Our kitchen has everything you need including plates, cups, utensils, toaster and an electric kettle.

We’re here to assist you with everything you need. Upon arrival we will meet with you to hand over the keys and give you a tour of the apartment. We're also happy to answer any questions you might have regarding the apartment or the neighbourhood!

This apartment is located in the heart of Budapest on the lively Ferenc korut. Hop on the 24 hour tram, and many of the city’s great attractions are accessible from your front door. Or stick around the neighbourhood and take a 5 minute walk down Tompa street where you will find many great local restaurants and pubs. The nearest grocery is also 10 minutes away down the korut.

Easy-access to public transportation – buses, metro and tram lines. The apartment is located on the 4/6 tram line which runs 24 hours. The nearest tram stop is Mester utca / Ferenc körút (4, 6) and a 5 minute walk from the apartment. Corvin–negyed (M3 - Blue) is the nearest metro stop and a 10 minute walk from the apartment.

In some cases a flexible check-in\check-out time may be possible. Please let us know and we will do our best arrange it.

Do you need an airport pick-up? Let us know and we can arrange a professional chauffeur to meet you in arrivals hall with a sign and take you directly to the flat.

reviews_text:
This was our first experience with AirB&B and we couln't pick up better. Apartment is really cosy, with everything you need for nice and easy stay. Location is even better with all sightsees reachable by walk. Anita is opened to all of your demands and we can highly recomend this place.

We had a great stay at Anita's place! She gave us spot-on directions to the place and was very good at communicating prior to the trip. The apartment is really cute and has everything you need. The beds were quite comfortable and the internet was consistently good. Anita even went above and beyond and left us wine and chocolate. Would absolutely recommend staying here!

All perfect!Anita is very nice and helpfull!perfect location!thx

Everything was perfect!Anita and her boyfriend are very nice!the apartment is in the best location in Bp!

So clean and kindly home. Looks like unsafe but the location and apartment is safe. Next to supermarket so you can buy cheap and easily 

Anita was a sweet and thoughtful host, she made sure we had everything we needed. The apartment is in a perfect location, with most attractions within walking distance. It's small but cosy and was absolutely perfect for us. I would stay here again in a minute!

Very central and cute apartment. Perfect for a city trip.

The place was great! Great location and very comfortable. However, I would not recommend staying here if you have trouble with mobility. You must climb a ladder in order to get up to the bedroom.

This apartment is great and wonderfully well kept. It's in the centre of everything and perfect for a short in Budapest.

Sam Hambridge 

Anita was an excellent host! Offered a lot of help with directions and suggestions. The apartment is in a great central location. Very easy to get around via bus or metro from the apartment. A lot also within walking distance. The apartment was clean and tidy. Great value for price.
review_summary:
Our well-situated, central located flat is suitable for couples, friends, business men. backpackers or any adventurers, who'd like to visit Budapest, and would like to taste our  sparkling hungarian life.
Every spectacles are easily approachabe, and within few minutes from the apartment. On the top of these, the apartment is very calme, quiet and pieceful like a pacific island in the ocean. Come, discover Budapest, enjoy daytime and nightlife, than rest in our friendly and cosy nest!
description:
Our well-situated, central located flat is suitable for couples, friends, business men. backpackers or any adventurers, who'd like to visit Budapest, and would like to taste our  sparkling hungarian life.

Every spectacles are easily approachabe, and within few minutes from the apartment. On the top of these, the apartment is very calme, quiet and pieceful like a pacific island in the ocean. Come, discover Budapest, enjoy daytime and nightlife, than rest in our friendly and cosy nest!

The apartment is a really cute, cosy bungalow- ideal for two people ( couples, friends, ony travellers, business men, backpackers etc.) The studio is 24 square meters. It is staffed with all the needed equipments which give you all the comfort during your stay.

From Liszt Ferenc Airport ... :

...travelling time by public transportation takes around 50 minutes. 

There is an airport shuttle bus, 200E which takes you to the Metro3 ( blue line metro). With that metro you should travel 9 stations and you have to descend at Ferenciek tere station.

The route on  map:

(URL HIDDEN)

The Taxi fees are between (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) Ft. You can chose that option too.

The public transportation takes two tickets, which is around 700 Ft.

From Keleti railway station:

You have to choose red line metro ( Metro3) at Keleti railway station, than you have to get off at the second station, called Astoria.

Here the route map:

(URL HIDDEN)

I am able anytime to help you in any issues, questions during your stay. Just write or call me anytime you need, I am available to help.

Both biggest metro lines ( Metro2-blue line and Metro3-red line) are situated next to the apartment, just 2 minutes walk.

There is a big parking house next to the apartment, but it is a bit expensive just because the studio is in the cuty centre.

There is a free option, 17 minutes from the apartment. Aréna Plaza is a big department store with free parking access, where you can leave your car in safety.

Here is the route from the Aréna Department Store to the flat:

(URL HIDDEN)

I'd like to mention again, that my studio is like an island of peace in the downtown area. 

The size of the flat is not like a family house, but I am pretty sure you won't be dissatisfied if you choose this cute treehouse in the heart of Budapest. :)

Plus possibility for you: There is no washing machine in the flat, so if you'd like to clean your clothes during your stay, I can manage it for you for free.

reviews_text:
Roland's flat was amazing, very clean and extremely spacious. There were only two of us, but it could easily house 4 people. The neighbourhood is clean and quiet, and yet you are minutes away from the busy town centre.

The location could not have been better - 5 minutes to the river down the hill, 5 minutes up the stairs to the castle.

I would defenitely recommend staying in this flat.

The host was also very quick to respond and very helpful with any questions we had prior and during the trip.

Spacious and in a fantastic location for exploring the city, and within easy walking distance from key attractions and great restaurants. Having the river so close feels very special. One thing to note is that there is no shower, but the bathtub is huge and makes up for it!

We had a very good stay in Budapest. The appartement is well located and there is a lot of Space.
I just regret the welcoming, meeting the host would be better to havé some advices for the city.
The Check out is early so i thune it's important that Roland find a solution to keep the luggage of the traveller's.
Thank 

Nice location very near tourist spot

Roland's apartment was big and comfortable and in a nice, central part of Budapest. We enjoyed our stay very much! The apartment can easily room four people and has most of things you could ask for. The entrance hall of the building is really amazing. All the practical things (key delivery etc.) worked out very smoothly. Really the only downside was a slight shortage of some kitchen utensils. Other than that I can recommend this place!

We did not get to meet Roland in person but he has a very nice and easy to use system to give the keys. The apartment was easy to find and just like the pictures. Can definitely recommend it for a trip to Budapest, great location close to the center and other sightseeing locations.

The flat is a really great size and in an amazing location within a short walk of the bridge. Roland kept in good contact with us before our stay and everything was ready in the flat when we arrived.

The first thing that strikes you about the apartment is its size. This place is huge. Not only is it spacious, it is a beautifully decorated, clean and very tidy place to stay, immediately justifying its impressive value for money.

There were only two minor qualms we could think of. Firstly, if you're not comfortable with having no shower then this may be an issue. There is only a large bath with a shower head hanging free; not the end of the world but maybe annoying for some.

Secondly, there are set of public steps outside that pass right by the bedroom window, but without any curtains or blinds, it may be a little unnerving for some being 'spied on' from outside.

Location wise the apartment is in a great place, albeit on the hilly Buda side of the city. Located right next to the famous chain bridge and the funicular railway to the top of the citadella, the apartment is in a prime location for the Buda side of the city, and only a 10 minute walk into the centre of Pest over the river.

Furthermore, there is an inexpensive supermarket at the foot of the hill on the road where the apartment lies.

Instructions left from the host were coherent and concise, making our arrival and departure an absolute breeze.

The apartment was excellent value for money, well located and these things coupled with a fantastic host made for an excellent stay in Budapest. (Oh and who can say no to a bottle of Hungarian wine left as a welcome gift!)

Roland's apartment was a beautiful place to stay in Budapest, in a wonderful location.  It was within walking distance of all the areas we wished to visit.  The pictures truly describe how lovely the space is, and we were thrilled to come home to it each night after a long day out.  Roland made us feel very welcome with birthday wishes and a bottle of Hungarian wine.  He also arranged an early morning airport transfer for us on our last day, which was a tremendous help to make our travel easier.  We would hope to stay here again for any future travels to Budapest.

The apartment was even better than expected and very large. The four of us had a wonderful time staying here. Roland was very communicative over message and was there to answer every question that we had.
