reviews_text:
Good communication before arrival. When we arrived Gabbi showed us on a map the key things to see during our time in Budapest and answered any questions we had. The apartment was well equipped and located. It was close to transport links but we were able to get to everywhere we wanted to on foot.
Would highly recommend both Gabbi and her apartment.

A fantastic, cosy Studio, centrally located made even better by the warm and friendly welcome we received. Gabi was very informative and gave great suggestions on things to see and do. 
The Studio was the perfect place to come back to after braving the cold outside! 
Highly recommend staying here! 

We had a wonderful time staying at Gabi's. The apartment was in very a good condition and was well located for exploring the city.

Gabi met us at the apartment and gave us plenty of 'insider tips' of where to go, what to do, what not to do, how much to expect to pay for things, which was all really helpful.

We loved budapest and would highly recommend Novak Studio as an Airbnb apartment!

What a great place to stay.  The apartment was clean and well appointed and the location was fantastic.  Met by Anika who gave us an excellent introduction to Budapest.  Anika and Gabi were very helpful.  Right around the corner from some excellent Hungarian restaurants.  So good we never cooked a meal at the apartment.  Would definately recommend this spot when visiting Budapest.

Excellent location and hostess, would 100% return !

We arrived late because of flight delay and our fault as well,  Gabriella waited for us at the apartment until we arrived and explained everything about the apartment and trip options in the city until we understood everything. She was also available during our stay via the airbnb site and helped us. A 5 

We were made to feel very welcome with plenty of information about the city given to us. The location was perfect. Gabriella was very helpful with advising us on transport around the city and to the airport.

We could not recommend Gabi's place more! The place is really lovely and had everything we needed - easy access to everything, perfect location, and Gabi is amazing - the most wonderful host. We loved Budapest and our time here was all the better by being at Gabi's flat- thank you!

The apartment is right in the heart of Budapest but equally in a neighbourhood that isn't noisy at night which is more than ideal. Walking distance from most things and with a convenient tube station less than 25m away. The apartment itself is incredible and exactly how it looks in the photos. Pretty much perfect for romantic getaways and the best thing to come back to at the end of each evening. Upon arrival Gabi is friendly and very welcoming, giving a quick rundown of where things are and throwing in some pretty worthwhile recommendations of what to explore. Overall was exceptionally happy with staying here and would recommend to anyone. 

We had a great stay and the host was absolutely brilliant 
Great location. 
We enjoyed our stay. 
Thank u Gabi
availability: The minimum night stay for this listing varies.
review_summary: Cosy and renew splitlevel studioapartment in the downtown at Kálvin,a perfect base for your sightseeing, business, study or anniversary trip to Budapest, provides comfy stay for 2-3 people. Self catered and full equiped flat with free WIFI and A/C
house_rules:
Check-in: from 2pm - Earlier check-in is subject to availability, but we do our best to welcome you at an earlier time for your convenience. Please give us your possible prompt check in /arrival time, because I go to the apartment too from my home, to greet you. 
Check-out: until 11 am  - Please always leave the apartment by the time agreed to allow time to prepare property for next guests. 
Please note, we reserve the right to enter the apartment after agreed check-out time and move and store your belongings if necessary.
Children: Children under 12 years stay free of charge. A baby cot is available on request.
Cleaning: The apartments are not serviced during your stay as the apartments are not classified as “serviced apartments” or a “hotel”. You are responsible for keeping the apartment in clean condition. But for longer stays, weekly cleaning is incl., but additional cleanings can be arranged for request extra charge.
Guests and Code of Conduct: The guests staying in the apartment must be those indicated in your reservation e-mail. Guests are requested to maintain a "good neighbour" code of conduct, avoiding loud music, shouting, making noise and other behaviour which may disturb neighbours. Parties are strictly prohibited. In case we receive complaints from neighbours or the police, we may cancel your accommodation. In this event you will not be entitled to any refund or compensation. Damages and breakages are also the guests’ responsibility during their stay. The property should be left in a similar state to its condition on arrival.
Pets: Pets are not allowed unless specific arrangements have been made in writing in advance.

Parking: public streetparking very limited (and difficult since downtown) and extra charge, but secured deepgarage available at near hotels (can not be booked in advance) cca.20 €/day so please note: no parking and stop possibilities on the street in front of the house but a few meters away. 
Smoking: Our apartments are non-smoking.

No luggage storage facilities
description:
Cosy and renew splitlevel studioapartment in the downtown at Kálvin,a perfect base for your sightseeing, business, study or anniversary trip to Budapest, provides comfy stay for 2-3 people. Self catered and full equiped flat with free WIFI and A/C

We are close to the famous (it's a MUST) Grand Market Hall, at Kalvin tér(Metrostop bluelineNo:3and greenline No.4) Pest downtown, in a lively multicultural district with universities, museums (National Museum, Applied Arts Museum..), streets and little hidden squares full of local restaurantes, bistros, bars, inns and caféterracces nearby, with many local stores and antiquities, libraries..The Danube and the Liberty Bridge is about 5 minutes walking, too..
Perfect to walk everywhere - it is downtown, and perfect public transportation at Kalvin tér: MetroNo.3 and 4, tramlines (streetcars) No.47/49 and many buses, also a HOP On/Hop Off busline
Located at the beginning of very busy Üllői street - at Kalvin tér(Metrostop)- central downtown(our house is the 3rd building on the right side from the corner of Kálvin tér), in an average (before renovation, the inside: floors and staircase needed repaint as soon as possible - so not too nice now! but its safe and it has a very nice  residental community ) and tipical, old historical multiflat house (built in 1920's) on its first floor (no elevator !) where you can experience the real life in Budapest like a Budapester as you are also supposed to live the locals life with local urban residents and keep the order of the house. You will have a really strong impression when you enter the gateway from busy Üllöi street and you can get in touch immidiatelly with the past 80 years of Hungary. 
Our small,cosy split level studioflat/maisonette is on the first floor, entrance from courtyard corridor. The house is very safe and quiet and represents a perfect base to explore Budapest. However NovakStudio is located in the middle of busy downtown yet wonderfully peaceful and relaxing and feels like a true home from home. 
The studioflat size 32 sqm and was completely refurbished in May 2013, has a combined kitchenette, living area (one sofabed for 1-2) with an upstairs sleeping area (2 beds as a double or twin) and a small sleeper (+sofabed for 1 if needed) . The apartment situates up to 4 guests, however it is most comfortable for a couple. It has a small bathroom with a bathtub/shower, washbasin and WC. Fully equipped open plan kitchenette,a dining table with 4 chairs,further 2 barchairs and armchairs serve guests comfort.
Further apartment facilities:
No airconditioning (yet!)
Entry phone 
Windows can be opened 
Fully equipped kitchen 
Glasses, dishes, cups 
Pots & pans 
Cooking utensils 
Dining table with chairs 
Pillows, blankets, bed linen 
Towels & toiletries 
Bath tub & shower 
Iron & ironing board, washmaschine
tea and coffee making facilities, gratis tea sortiment 
free WIFI, screen TV with a few different foreign channels 
sofa and armchairs 
oven, stove, microwave, toaster, fridge,blender-juicemaker
umbrellas, slippers, hangers
-NO luggage storage facilities 
-Please note: no parking and stop possibilities on the street at the house so those coming by car-it is downtown :/ The nearest parking is in a hotel's deepgarage nearby for cca.20 € or 400 metres is an openaired guarded parking for cca.15 €/24 hours
-The house is before repaint/renovation- it is a tipical downtown multiflat house with such a conditions.  But safe and clean with kind local residents. You will be here not like a tourist but a Budapester !
-the flat -due to a noteasy steps up to the sleeping area - is not recommended for footsore/disabled people

After your check in and during your stay the apartment is your home: everything what you find in there is for your serve and comfort so use them and take care of them like yours.

Many famous sights are nearby in walking distance as National Museum, Grand Market Hall, Danube with Liberty Bridge, Gellért Spa, Ráday - restaurant -street....
It is the Unidistrict, too,  with Libraries, cafés, terracces, festivals and number of programmes...

By walking - by Metro Blueline and greenline- by tram No.47/47 - by bus No.9 - perfect location !

reviews_text:
What an amazing city to vist and staying at kati's made it even more memorable. The location was great with amazing views and such a quiet location. We used the buses and trams but mainly walked everywhere. Had a great time at the spar near heroes square then went skating in the park near by. We visited everything we wanted to over 3 days. 


Everything is as described. Good historical building. Peter picked us up at train station and tour around city a bit. Very nice of him. 
Small issue was the lock was broken when we went out one morning, Kati sent a person to fix immediately in 5mins so we managed to go out in a short time. Thumbs up to their efficiency. 

If you want to discover Budapest, this apartment is an ideal place to stay. The view is extremely beautiful and everything in walking distance. The apartment is beautifull  decorated and has everything you need. And Peter gave me some good advice about places to go and things to do. 
Kati I did not meet, but was quickly answering if I had any questions. I would definitely recommend this place for people wanting to visit Budapest. 

Dream city break! We had already read the amazing reviews so felt confident this trip was going to be a good one but it turned out to be even better. 

Peter and Kati couldn't have been better hosts. Kati was brilliant and answering my many questions and was always on hand to help. Peter collected us from the hotel with a guided tour of the city so by the time we were shown around the stunning flat we were so excited to begin our holiday. 

Budapest is an extremely easy city to walk around but Peter showed us how we can simply jump on the bus or metro from where the flat is. 

The bed is the comfiest bed we've slept in and the view from the window is breathtaking.

Thanks for such a memorable stay Kati and Peter and for all the little extras that made the trip one of our all time favourites. 

Will and Tash x


This flat is amazing with a stunning view. The location couldn't have been better! Walking distance to all major cites in the city, and situated right on the Danube. The hosts are quick to respond, attentive and offer any help you may need. Their shuttle service to the airport is also recommended. The bed isn't the most comfortable, but other than that the place is perfect. All in all, a great place to stay for one or two people visiting Budapest!

Highly recommend staying here. The place is beautiful and the location is unbelievably convenient. Kati and Peter are very nice and helpful. Don't hesitate to book! 

We had a wonderful stay at Kati's place.  Kati and Peter are awesome hosts and very responsive and helpful.  The place is in a great location right on the Danube and offers fantastic views of the "Pest" side of the city, especially at night with everything lit up.  The Chain Bridge is only steps away to get across the river to take in other sights.  On the Buda side there's plenty of attractions nearby, we also found some great dining and one of the best pubs I've ever been in.  Budapest is a terrific city to visit, and my only advice is to spend enough time to do the place justice.  

Our favourite Airbnb so far. The apartment is beautiful, the view is impeccable and Kati and Peter are gracious hosts. Our trip to Budapest was in incredible and the Apartment only made it more so. Can't recommend it enough! 

Host was very accommodating.  Saw our river boat from their window and called to arrange to pick us up.  Took us on a tour of the neighborhood - restaurants, grocery, etc.  Also took us to the airport.  Great views from the apt and walking distance to all sites and if instead, you wanted public transportation; it was conveniently located.


The best location in Budapest,by far. The tag is misleading the spectacular view-breathtaking in the dark- is of PEST, the  apt is on the BUDA side, right under the castle and a block from the Chain bridge, From there, you can ride the funicular, or take a bus , hop the tram or just walk across, as we did, If you have coffee and  great cake at the tiny cafe next to Marvelosa restaurant, the charming owner will tell you how to ride up to the castle for free,There are a half dozen terrific places to eat within a 10 minute walk . Walk 20 mins you ll have a choice of about 20. 

Take Peter's offer of a pickup at the airport or train, it will save you a fortune, and for the small price he charges
you will get a great orientation to the city. He rode us all through the city, providing some history and good 
suggestions for where to eat and where to visit, a wonderful way to start our visit,

We only met Kati and her beautiful children for a few minutes due to a big family event, but she is great at communicating, 

We loved it, If we ever get to return , we'll stay here. It is safe, clean , quiet, and oh so romantic!
review_summary: We offer an antique stile furnished one-room flat with extraordinary view of Danube and Chain Bridge, with renovated bathroom and retro stile kitchen. Home way from home.
description:
We offer an antique stile furnished one-room flat with extraordinary view of Danube and Chain Bridge, with renovated bathroom and retro stile kitchen. Home way from home. 

NEWS:
The apartement was elected in the 10 best places to stay with Airbnb on The Culturetrip website, thanks for all our guests!

Péter and Kati's aim is that guests arrive as distant acquaintances and leave as good friends. To those who are interested, they can tell more about the building, the country and their own life, accompanied by a glass of quality red wine from the famous Szekszárd wine region or a shot of pálinka.

From the 30 sq m bedroom / living room guests can enjoy an exceptional view of the Chain Bridge, the Gresham Palace, the Hungarian Academy of Sciences and the impressive Parliament Building. The apartment is both authentic – its kitchen being equipped with early 20th century tools, traditional Hungarian spices and a marble-topped dining table – and modern, with its bathroom’s beautiful 21st century minimalist design being of the highest standards. 
Guests may find many restaurants, coffee shops, pubs, wine shops and supermarkets nearby, and also pharmacies, currency changers, ATMs and different means of transport are also available in the area. The most important sights in the city are also within the walking distance of 5-15 minutes. From Clark Adam square just around the corner, there are a number of buses, trams – and the unique Buda Castle Funicular as well – that take you to the most well-known places of Budapest, like the Castle, the Heroes’ Square, the Basilica or the Mall in the city centre.

About the building: 
The history of the house is tightly intertwined with that of Hungary: it was built in the second half of the 19th century, in the close vicinity of one of the most beautiful bridges right in the heart of Budapest and functioned as the permanent residence of the Counts Andrássy until the 20th century. The apartment survived World War II and the communist dictatorship, finally becoming the property of a noble Hungarian family of artists. The owner’s father was a passionate collector of art, many of the apartment’s furniture and paintings are pieces of his collection. 
The owner, Péter Zsuffa (45) has played an active part in forming the Hungarian underground culture since the 1980s and ‘90s. Thus the apartment emits an eclectic vibe: it is both classic and modern, bohemian and reliable at the same time. Péter is an artist who has been making fire enamel paintings for 25 years, and his works of art have a quality guarantee of 500 years. His wife Kati is the host of the flat, who's the mom of their 3 children, graduated as an architect. They live  just around the corner, therefore they are quick to be at your service in three different languages (English, Italian and German).

It is an entire flat, guest just have to feel like home.

It is calm and safe district on the Buda side of the city, that's why we live also nearby. 

Main public transport stops are just around the corner.

reviews_text:
The apartment was amazing. Right in the center of Budapest. The flat has all necessary things for comfortable staying. And the design of the apartment is charming.
Marianna and Sandor are very helpful and kind people. 
In future Budapest visits we definitely will stay here.
I really recommend this place for have a good time in Budapest.

The hosts left us milk, bread, cheese and eggs as we arrived late at night, which was so kind of them. Budapest is an amazing city with plenty of do and see, and I recommend this apartment highly.

The apartment is exactly as in the photos and is very well located, there are supermarket, restaurant, pharmacy nearby and we can do many activities by walking and there are bus and train stops close. Marianna is very friendly and helpful, promptly answer our calls. Great experience in magyar land!

We spent an amazing time in Budapest. Great host, very helpful and kind. The flat is spacious, clean and cozy, fully equipped I Close to the Danube River and Margit Island. It's easy to walk in the city center or to take tram or subway. I would highly recommend it and hope to come back because it was too short! Merci Marianna!

Marianna and her husband Sándor were great host. Very helpful and always answering very quickly. The place is cozy, charming old flat, newly renovated and fully equipped !!! Placed in central location, at 300 m to Parliament House, and direct tram to Buda. It was a very enjoyable stay at Marianna's flat, and I would definitely recommend it, esp. to couple or a groupe of 3-4 peoples.

Its in the name, "home" ! This a comfortable relaxed and perfectly located place to stay. My son and I had a lovely time, especially as it is close to the Danube River and Margit Island.
Marianna and her husband are wonderful hosts, and looked after everything for me.
High recommended !

Es war alles perfekt.
Marianna ist eine sehr herzliche Gastgeberin, die uns sehr gastfreundlich empfangen hat. An alles war gedacht- wir haben uns von 
Anfang sehr wohl gefühlt.

Je remercie Mariann pour son accueil et sa gentillesse.


Notre hôte nous a très bien reçu. Connaissant un anglais moyen, je n'ai eu aucun problème pour communiquer avec Marrianna qui est très attentionnée et gentille.
L'appartement correspondait totalement à nos attentes. Tout y est parfait.
Seul un peu de bruit le soir pourrait perturber le sommeil de celui qui dormirait en façade, face à l'opéra et le passage de la rue.

reviews_text:
Great place! Central to the sights and nightlife and plenty of 24 hr convenience stores around. The apartment is beautiful and well equipped as advertised. I would definitely stay here again.

Very nice appartment, and very close to everything. The appartment has everything you need on a citytrip.

Wonderful place and very clean! Will be back!

Perfect apartment for exploring Budapest, immaculately decorated, well thought out and very clean. We walked everywhere and it's very close to some fantastic bars and restaurants. Great communication from the host- would recommend. Some loud music from downstairs bar on last night. 

The flat is awesome and the situation of it is central. It's really easy to find the apartment. Timi&Istvan's indications are perfect. The decoration in the flat is simple and beautiful. The bathtub in the bedroom is really cool. The plus is the bicycle pass, we use it everyday. The iMac is very practical too. We really enjoyed our stay in Budapest thanks to Timi&Istvan !

In 2 words: Amazing experience
The apartment is exactly as you can see on the pictures, very clean and organized, very close to some nice ruins pubs and the vibrant Jewish district.
Istvan is very helpful and answer our messages immediately.
We will defiantly will stay there on our next visit to Budapest.

Excellent apartment to discover Budapest! Istvan was always making sure we have a lovely Holiday and even called a Taxi to pick us from the airport :)

Definitely one of the most accurately described airbnb listings. The hosts were so responsive from start to end, and gave clear instructions on how to enter the place. At some point, I had to change my listing dates and they were really flexible with it. Incredibly accomodating! But I guess the real winner for me with Timi and Istvan's listing is how truly beautiful and Instagram worthy this place is :) loved it.

We had a very warm welcome ( literally) when we arrived because the heater was on; lovely on a cold evening in November.
The appartment is very spacious and clean, perfect situated (the Jewish quarter is very nice) and fully equipped. The shower has got two different heads (rain and normal), the floor is heated, the bed is very comfortable. The bath is a lovely bonus with these temperatures. 
The windows are at the street side, so it can be a little noisy. The subway, shops, many tourist attractions, restaurants and bars are closeby! We did everything by foot or bicycle; only used the subway to come and go to the airport. 

Istvan is a very good host; we received clear indications to reach and use the apartment and the bicycles. Istvan  solved the WiFi problem within half an hour after we informed him about it. 

We booked for the first time on Airbnb and it was a warm acquaintance; we will definitely book this appartment again. 
I highly recommend this place to all couples who want to discover Budapest :)


The apartment was amazing - clean, modern, cosy and right in the middle of the city. The bathtub in the bedroom was a fun element. Timi was very friendly and made sure we had everything we needed and made our stay just perfect. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone!

description:
Elizabeth Boulevard Apartment in Budapest is in full centre and even closer to the apartment metro line, tram Nr.4-6. Set in an old renovated building, it comes with modern furnishings and facilities. 
Free bikes are offered, and free WiFi, iMac 27"

THE EN-SUITE

Located centrally in zone 7 located next to the Blaha Lujza tér metro station and only 15 minutes walk from Deák tér centre of Budapest. 

This is a self-contained En-Suite with private door and its own keys within a large house. It is entirely private and you do not share your space with anybody. It has a luxury bathroom, a fridge and kettle for making hot drinks.

KEY FEATURES:

* New, clean, modern with private luxury bathroom
* Very comfortable big king size bed
* Powerful shower with unlimited hot water
* Apple iMac 27" computer
* Light with big window and nice views
* First Floor and easy access
* Tea/coffee making facilities and mini fridge
* Highly safe and secure building
* All linens and towels provided
* Toileteries provided (tissue and soap)
* Free WiFi
* TV, hairdryer
* Plenty of shops, cafes, pubs and restaurants around
* Fantastic location and near all transport

The En-Suite is totally private and self-contained with its own entrance and keys and private bathroom . It is a modern compact and comfortable clean base in a private house and ideal for travelers who want a comfortable bed, good shower and good quality sleep as the room is very peaceful. It is an ideal choice for guests on a budget who do not want to spend too much money on accommodation in Budapest in a lovely and safe location. The En-Suite is on the first floor within a large house. It is light and newly created with high quality fittings, modern high quality shower and WC. The room has very comfortable king size bed, full free view smart TV and built-in many englisch movie chanel (HBO). Fridge is also in the kitchen. Kettle, cups and glasses are also there to make a hot or cold drink. Fresh folded towels and bedding are provided. 

The local area is safe and wealthy with expensive houses around,  little shops and pubs. Central Budapest is 15 minutes away by walk.


******************************************************

INVENTORY AND WHAT YOU GET

Apart from listing description and photos below are details of the items you can expect in the apartment:

2 x duvet
2 x pillows
Clean and folded sheets and bedding covers for all the above
2 x king bed throw / cover on king bed
1 x bath towel per person
1 x bath/shower mat
mattress and pillow protectors for all bedding provided
1 x hairdryer
clothes hangers
toilet tissue on arrival only
bin liner/refuse bag on arrival only
hand soap on arrival only

We provide hairdryer

reviews_text:
Great apartment, the skylights make the rooms very inviting and the terrace is great as well

Balazs is friendly and helpful. The communication is problem free. The flat is very clean and well equipped. The location is very good. We has felt here very well.

This clean well equipped apartment is in a great location. Balazs was very welcoming, friendly and accommodating. Would definitely recommend this one.

Nice place in great location. Good communication from owner when had a problem with wifi and was resolved in a day. The rooftop terrace is actually a balcony to the inner courtyard of the building.

Apartment corresponds to the description. Very well located. Everything is at walking distance. You will enjoy your staying.

We stayed in Balazs and Fani's lovely apartment for six days in September.  Its huge, definitely large enough to accommodate two couples or a family, and its in a great neighbourhood. It has a full kitchen and two lovely bathrooms, with all of the associated amenities you could possibly need (including a washing machine and a hairdryer). 

Being just five minutes walk from Nyugati train station, all public transport options are easy to access. We loved being in this neighbourhood too - there were several supermarkets within 2-3 min walk from the apartment, as well as some great local places to eat (including Haveli - indian food - and Local Korner - pizza). If you're into board games, there's a great shop just along the street, and 10min walk away, a place called Game Up Pub, where you can play games and drink lovely beers! The apartment in the perfect location for exploring the city by foot - we walked everywhere, including to Margaret Island, and over the Chain Bridge to Buda. Bring comfy shoes, and get walking!

Balazs was very responsive to emails and texts, and was there to greet us when we arrived. He, Fani and their lovely son came to say goodbye when we left, and they even booked us a taxi to the airport, which was hugely appreciated.

We fell in love with Budapest on this trip, and a huge part of that was due to this lovely apartment. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a home from home along the Danube

We had a wonderful stay at Balazs. Definitely amazing! The house is huge and safe, with comfortable beds, well-equipped bathrooms and kitchen. They are so considerate that they had everything prepared(towels, toothpaste, shampoo, soap, etc. and they are of great quality!). Personally I do like the kitchen-clean, modern and easy to use. The snacks(musli and peanuts) and Hungarian wine and drinks in the refrigerator are what makes this stay even better! The location is superb! Metro line 1/3 are within walking distance. Quite a few mini/super markets are nearby, so are all kinds of restaurants. Highly recommended, if you want a decent and comfortable stay in Budapest!

Balasz has been the greatest help for my staying in Budapest. 
Apartment is on the top floor with terrace inside the apartment complex. Very quiet apartment, total of 3 A/C available in each room.
Kitchen stuff are not maximum equipped but enough to cook and serve people. 
Clean, new apartment fresh renovated with nice view from window of top floor. Apartment was great, but more than that, I am very thankful to the host himself! I had fun staying there. Thank you! 


When I booked Balazs's place he didn't have any reviews so I was a little worried, but in the end it turned out to be better than I expected.
I was on a business trip and had little time to look for places, so I had to book him in a rush, but it wasn't a problem for him.
 The apartment is almost brand new, there were some design parts, which I particularly liked. The terrace is neat, on the fifth floor, no one can bother you there.
 The bedrooms are quiet, you cannot hear the street noises.
 The kitchen is fully equipped, you could live here for a longer period as well. There were some snacks and drinks in the fridge.
 Balazs offered a friend who is a professional tourguide, but I didn't have time to spend days to visit the town so they offered to come to the appartment and show some 
 traditional hungarian cuisine, so the friend teached me how to make some excellent food.
 He has an Italian neighbor by the terrace, who wasn't home most of the time, but when we met one evening, he was extremely easy going and we had some nice talk.
 Balazs is not living around, he only come to let me in and check me out. It seemed that the cleanness is very important for him, he also made sure to give hotel quality 
 towels, bed-linen and a tons of other bathroom garments. Definitely recommended, for this price at this location this is a perfect place for business travelers or even for friends.
 The atmosphere and the extra things (like the cooking lesson at home) makes this place a unique one.

Balaz was a really nice host. Very helpful and friendly, answered fast and was easy to communicate with. The apartment was very nice and clean. In the fridge there was some juice and on the toilet there where toothpastes, shampoos and so on. Very nice. I would definitely recommend it.

We think one goal is our location for any kind of guests, second is the atmosphere. We pay attention for comfort and sanitation as well.
house_rules:

description:
Hi there!

Our flat is next to the best part of the grand boulevard of Pest, in a historic side street, parallel to the world heritage Andrassy Avenue, less than 5 min walk to Oktogon and West railway station. We think one goal is our location for any kind of guests, second is the atmosphere. We pay attention for comfort and sanitation as well.

Wood flooring around, except baths and kitchen where you find tile. The flat has three ACs, one at each bedrooms (2) and in the living room. High Speed Internet and free WIFI are included in the price. Real comfort for day to day living.

___________________________________________________________

BEDROOMS (2)
- Cardo matraces (double bed, 160cm)
- Antiallergic pillows
- Nightstand with lamp 
+ One bedroom got a work station: table & conference chair. 
+ On request we can give some comfort elements for babies also, like: safe wood baby bed,  baby tub, potty, side stand for the bathroom...

BATH#1 
- Shower 
- Toilet 
- Sink 
- Washing machine
- Disposable toothbrush, soap, shampoo etc...

BATH#2 
- Bathtub
- Sink 
- Toilet

Fully equipped KITCHEN with a four person round table, for eating or work. Dishwasher, toaster, classic coffee maker, wine glasses, mugs, cups, sharp knifes, plates, baking sheets, ca. 250l build in fridge with freezer, oven, basic spices, etc... Half of the accessories are NEW, others are in great shape. Also we keep here a fire extinguisher, and basic medical kit.

LIVING ROOM is with a comfortable corner sofa with pillows, coffee table, armchair and a 50' FullHD TV. That's the only place where you can find a TV in the flat. You can connect your gadgets easily to the sound system or video. Living plants and herbs. Full body mirror.

TERRACE got two collapsible table (2x4) with 6 pc. wooden chairs & pillows. Also you can find a 220v plug, like everywhere in the appartment. Terrace is facing to the house inner patio with a nice neighbor.

78 sq.m flat, with 15 sq.m terrace at the 5th floor (top). And the house has an elevator :)

This is a new flat (built in 2009). Originally the building was built in the early 1900's with 3 floors, according to the architectural style of the time.  

We decided to turn the flat into an unique apartment for overnights and business travellers. We pushed the reset and painted all the walls to white to start the design journey from here.   

NOW: You can get a clean flat, with comfort accessories like hotel quality bedding and a "beauty case" :) Kitchen is ready to work for families also. If you prefer things to be ready in the flat when you arrive just let us know.  

The street is safe, police station also just steps away, cameras are everywhere... As a side street of avenues, it's more quiet. The flat is well isolated for sound and heat. Peaceful nights are guaranteed.

If you are interested feel free to contact us with any questions any time.   
_____________________________________________________________

You can contact us 24/7, but we don't live in the building. If you are interested, we can recommend to you our experienced tour guide friend: she knows the city really well and up to any requested guidance, tour or cooking/teaching traditional foods together with you in the apartment, or just showing the best pubs around.

Everyday shops are in the street just steps away. Also restaurants, eating houses, bakery, pubs are in the street. 

From main enterance of the building:  
- Columbian coffee and drinks 10m 
- Local Corner pizza place 12m (one of the best pizzas in BP.)  
- Small 24/7 shop 20m, a bigger one is ca. 60m
- Tabac shop 80m 
- Pótkulcs pub 20m 
- Liquor stores 15m 
- Great thai food 50m 
- Indian restaurant 100m
- ca.200sm nice grocery store 50m   
- Market hall, for quality meat, and vegetables&fruits from farmers ca. 10min walk.
- Huge city mall (Westend City Center) ca. 10 min walk. 
- Island on danube (Margitsziget) two stops with tram. 
- Heroes Square, Zoo, Vajdahunyad Castle, Széchenyi Bath, just 2-3 stops by underground.

+ IN 500m WALKING AREA HOUNDREDS OF SHOPS AND CATERINGS, Real life shops and precious stores also.

It's downtown, so you have everything here, public transportation is easy, and quick. Even the Western long distance railway station is just minutes of walk away. (Nyugati pályaudvar)

Perfect apartment, clean and in a real good location. The owners were very friendly and easy with communication throughout the booking!

house_rules:
House Manual:

Looking for the welfare of all of you and the neighbors in the apartment is not allowed: 
* Smoking inside the house 
* Making parties and being loud- is a very calm building and we must ensure that this is for the welfare of all residents. 
* Bringing pets

The apartment has a deposit of 150 € which serves as a guarantee in case of faults.

According to the Hungarian legal regulation every guest has to fill out a data form with their personal datas (name, address, ID/Passport number, place and date of birth etc..), so we will ask for this at arrival.
description:
It is a cozy and nice apartment in a calm and quiet traditional residential building located in the heart of the city which can be accommodate 4 persons providing free WiFi. You can reach different important sights of the city in walking distance.

It is a cozy and nice two floor apartment for 4+1 persons situated in a calm and quiet traditional residential building located in the heart of the city, providing free WiFi. It has a kitchen+ living room with a sofabed (for 1 -2 persons), bathroom with a shower and a toilet (seperated from the bathroom) downstaris, and two bedrooms upstairs, on the mezzanine. Each bedroom has a double-bed.

Walk out into the street in 5 minutes you meet the Great Boulevard, which is the central avenue that runs through Budapest or the Andrássy Avenue (Unesco World Heritage). A few steps from the apartment you have all the services: - Cheap restaurants with Hungarian cuisine - Finest restaurants and of different nationalities - A deli supermarket - Do not miss the most beautiful Mc Donalds in Europe - A large shopping center where you will find everything... - And many more stores. We can also offer you touristic services during your stay, like: transfers from/to the airport/train station/bus station, guided tours in Budapest and in Hungary, concerts etc...

If you need more information, please contact me, I will help you with pleasure!

Erika & Robert

reviews_text:
The location is perfect and the apartment was so cosy and warm - especially at this time of year! Orsi was so kind and easy to speak to, we had the loveliest time. Loads of bars and restaurants near by, you can't go wrong . Thanks for having us!! 

We loved our three nights stay in this wonderful apartment! It was in a great, central location within walking distance to many interesting bars and restaurants which were just around the corner. When we arrived, Orsi recommended two places for dinner - which did not disappoint! The apartment was kept toasty and warm despite it being freezing (& very windy!) outside in the evenings, and we found all the basic amenities available for us to use. We will definately be recommending this place to friends and family should they ever visit Budapest, and we would love to return again some day. A perfect host. Thank you very much! Dawn and Elliot 

Orsi and Balazs place is a great apartment at the tip top of an apartment block a short walk away from the amazing Ruin's bars of Budapest. Its quiet and relaxing at night and has everything you need with a fully equipped kitchen and was warm, comfortable and cosy when we visited in November. You only have to read the chalk board covered with messages from happy visitors to know that this is a special place that people have enjoyed being in. Orsi was a great host and met us with the key when we arrived late in the evening, ran us through the apartment and some favourite places in Budapest and then left us to it- but she was easily reachable and not far away if needed - perfect! 

Right away from check-in, Orsi provided a warm welcome when I met her at the loft. She gave a great rundown of the city and expectations for the apartment.

Her recommendations for how to get to the apartment from the airport, which sites to see, and where to eat were all on point. I want to confirm that Köleves Vendéglö and Gettó Gulyás are both fantastic places to eat within a quick walk of her apartment. 

The apartment itself has a great energy, just like Orsi herself. It has bohemian/worldly type of decorations placed in a modern, clean apartment. The lofted bed makes you feel like you're in a treehouse, coupled with a rocking chair/reading nook. The best part of the decor was her black chalkboard in the kitchen (great alternative to a guest book) that had positive messages from fellow travelers who previously stayed at Orsi's place. 

If I ever make it back to Budapest, I'm definitely going to stay at Orsi's apartment again. Without question. And I highly recommend that you do the same. 

Our whole experience from booking to leaving was fantastic.  Orsi would respond immediately to any messages sent, was very accommodating to our arrival and departure times and made us feel very welcome.  The apartment was so cute and quirky.  It was spotlessly clean, comfortable and so central for a host of restaurants and bars.  We had a fabulous time and would highly recommend this apartment.  It was like a home away from home and we will definitely be back in the summer.

Although just for 1 night, accommodation at Orsi was a unique experience. Very cosy, clean and stylish. Thank you Orsi.

Very nice place in the middle of everything in Budapest. Everything worked very simple and easy. Very good stay for a weekend trip to Budapest. 

This is a wonderful place. The flat is absolutely lovely! Also, The host is incredible nice and helpful. I Highly recommend it! 

Orsi's place is amazing. So central, great decor and even better host. Orsi was able to answer any questions which allowed us to have a fantastic time. Thanks Orsi!!

We've spent a nice moment in the flat and we had a very warm welcome. There was a bit too much light from the outdoors even with the curtains, but we enjoyed our stay. The neighbourhood is fantastic.

Thank you for the warm welcoming;

Cheers

Paloma

house_rules:
A lot of elder people lives in this house, so please RESPECT THE SILENCE hours from 10 pm till 8 am, and BE POLITE with the other residents. 

RECYCLE!  :)
Hungary is just trying to grow up to be more environmental, and for that there are extra containers in the house for RECYCLING plastic, and paper+metal waste, so please try to collect your waste selectively too.

SMOKING
On the balcony (corridor), in front of the apartment's window there is a small table with chairs, there you can smoke. In the apartment it is not allowed.

EXTRA CLEANING 
If you stay longer than 5 days you can demand for extra cleaning and towels, it costs 15 EUR.

CHECK IN & CHECK OUT
If it is possible try to arrive between 2 pm and 11 pm, but in case we can  welcome you on any other discussed time too. :)
When you leave, please
- wash your dishes after yourself
- put everything to its place if you removed anything
- if you throw out your garbage I really appreciate it! :)
- leave us a message on the kitchen wall, we really love them!
THNX! :)

If it is possible you should leave the apartment before 11 am, so I can have enough time to prepare it for the new guests, but of course we can discuss everything, we are flexible! :)

EXTRA BED
There is the possibility to turn the sofa into a double bed for the 3rd  person. 
Extra bed costs 10 EUR / night.

PETS
If you want to have your pet with, it is allowed to stay in our apartment with you. Average cost is 4 EUR/night (depends on the size of your pet). Write me about that!

Thank you! :)
description:
It's a real shelter!...and your true home away home.
A quite, cozy bohemian style 5th floor apartment in the vivid heart of the city with balcony view to the cozy rooftops...
The best cultural places & popular ruin bars are just in a stone's throw!

Welcome to our little sanctuary :) If you are looking for a real home and a special Budapest apartment for your stay, you are on the right place!

The apartment is on the top floor in a more than 100-year-old five-storey building, and because the half of the building has just 4 stores, the view to the opposite site's rooftop and chimneys is very fabled. The building itself was built in 1910 so it survived 2 world wars and several smaller and bigger revolutions too... and it shows upon it of course, but it is its unique beauty :)

The apartment has FULL COMFORT, it's AIR-CONDITIONED to cool you down during the hot summer days and has an authentic heating facility to warm you up in the frosty winter. 

You can put down your shoes and clothes in the tiny hall, and have rest in the very bright living room, cook a fine dinner in the well-equipped kitchen or wash away the dust of the road in the super clean bathroom. 
In the front of the apartment's window there is a small area on the corridor where you can sit down and have your morning coffee too.

Upstairs, on the LOFT there is a DOUBLE BED for 2 person and in case downstairs there is a sofa which can be turned into an extra double bed. So here can sleep even 4 person but I say this apartment is optimal for 2 maximum 3 person. 

If you are coming for 3, please, inform me!

The apartment is 27qm with an 8 qm loft as bedroom. 
You are going to get the keys to the WHOLE APARTMENT and to the entrance gate. You can get to the 5th floor’s corridor by ELEVATOR. 
The corridor is very peaceful, used only by one dare neighbor and we ,and there is also a little GREEN CORNER BALCONY on the corridor right in front of the window with a little table and chairs to sit down and enjoy the calm evenings between the rooftops.

The apartment is WELL EQUIPPED with everything what you just need during your stay, like; 
- shampoo, shower cream, and soap, 
- hair dryer 
- bed sheets, linens, extra blankets and pillows 
- clean towels  (we use for towels and bed-linens just nature friendly, natural detergent and softener considering environmental protection and our guests with sensitive or allergic skin)
- toilet papers 
- guest slippers
- full kitchen equipment ( unfortunately no oven, but there is toaster and waffle maker too) 
- AeroPress® Coffee Maker -TRY IT! :)
- coffee, sugar, salt, spices, oil, some cereal...etc.
- dish-washing liquid 
- washing machine with detergent and softener 
- free WI-FI spot 
- cable TV channels
- and table games and cards for the lazy evenings

If you need anything else or special, contact me, and I will see what can I do for you. :)

This is your vacation, so we really won't disturb you, except it is your explicit wish! :) 

When you arrive we will hand over the keys PERSONALLY and tell you everything about the apartment and the city (if we will not able to be there in person, I will let you know the details of the access to the keys.)
I gladly help you to get familiar with the Hungarian habits, where to find a good restaurant or how to get to the Széchenyi Thermal-bath and other tips. 
After that it's your turn to discover the cozy streets of the downtown, getting lost in the amazing Budapest's nightlife, starring at the huge eagle at the Castle, climb the Gellér-hill or try out the Hungarian kitchen. 

If you have questions before or after your stay we gladly answer your!
Follow our Airbnb experience on instagram @tinyatelierapartment and like us on fcbook as well at Tiny Atelier Apartment ;)

SURROUNDING
The apartment situated in a small and quite street right on the junction of the Palace (8th) district and Erzsébetváros (7th) district where used to be the old Jewish ghetto during the 2nd World War. The biggest synagogue in Hungary, the Gozsdu-yard, and the famous and luxurious New York Palace are in a light walk away. Nowadays this inner part of the district is more mentioned as the "Ruin bar" or "Party" district, because here is the most vivid nightlife in the city. Lots of very good ruinbars and restaurants are in just 5-10 minutes walk from the apartment.

The other side, the Palace district is a real cultural recreation, it got the name because here were built the luxurious palaces of the old aristocrats, esquires and lords of Hungary during the 19th century by noble architects like Miklós Ybl or József Hild. So this area abounds of architectural sights like the neighboring beautiful art nouveau building of the Uránia National Film Theater . 
The top of that there is the National Museum of Hungary which is in 5 minutes walk from the accommodation.

PUBLIC TRANSPORT IS PERFECT in this area.
Here goes the Rákczi Street (which is one of the biggest avenues) and the two big boulevards of the city.

Right on the corner there is the BUST STOPS for several buses which are crossing the downtown and go to the Buda side so you can reach the Gellért-hill in less than 10 minutes, and the Buda Castle in 15 minutes. 

The METRO line 2 and line 4 are in 4-5 minutes walk, and the station of line 3 in 10 minutes walk. The main TRAM line (nr 4-6) is also reachable in 4-5 minutes. 

The PUBLIC BIKE system "Bubi" is right on the corner.

The KELETI RAILWAY-STATION is a 20-minute-walk, 5 minutes by bus (lines 7, 178, 5, 8...) or by metro line M2 to "Blaha Lujza tér" and from there 4 minutes extra walk. 
The NYUGATI RAILWAY-STATION 10 minutes with tram nr 4-6 from the stop Nyugati Railwaystation to "Balaha Lujza tér" and 4 minute extra walk to the house. 

From the LISZT FERENC AIRPORT it takes around 45 minutes. With public-transport take the Airport bus line 200E to the metro station of "Kőbánya-Kistpest", take the metro line M3 till "Ferenciek tere" and you can walk approximately 500 meters along the Rákóczi Street or you can take a bus till the 2nd stop,"Uránia".  
You can come by taxi or take the service of the airport shuttle service (for more info please visit the Budapest Airport's website)

In the downtown there is only PAY PARKING from 8 am to 8 pm weekdays. There are bigger parking lots and houses in the near which are cheaper, in case I'll help you gladly.

The price contains all the local taxes.

Follow our Airbnb experience on Instagram @tinyatelierapartment ;)

De woning is gelegen in het hart van Pest. Bezienswaardigheden zijn op loopafstand. Wanneer je met de auto reist is het goed om te weten dat je door de weeks altijd betaald parkeert van 08:00/20:00.  Op loopafstand veel eetgelegenheden en winkels. Een leuke plek om Boedapest te ontdekken.

Logement bien situé, avec deux stations de métro autour, dans un quartier plutot sympa. Facile d'accès depuis l'aéroport ou les gares. Appartement agréable, pour quelques nuits, possibilité d'y faire la cuisine.
 Pas d'intimité par contre, mais dispo pour 6 personnes (un canapé lit en bas coté salon et un autre à l'étage + un matelas au sol dans une pièce avec cloison ouverte dans une mezzanine).
Nous avons passer deux nuits avec un seul drap pour deux lits, et un des deux volets roulants était cassé mais outre ça, le logement est bien, et calme, et Zsuzsanna est trés sympathique. ! Les prix sont abordables (à noter qu'il s'agit d'une "agence" et non un particulier)

description:
.

I live in the flat with my sister and my boyfriend, and we have a spare room with a gallery-bed that we're listing. The room is really tiny, but the two-story structure gives it some space and makes the room feel cozy. The size of the bed is 140 x 220 cm.

The flat is fully equipped for everyday life and you can use and share everything in the apartment.

I will give you towels, tissues, lots of pillows, and extra covers, and there is a shelf, a drawer, and some hooks and clothes-hangers for your stuff.

I usually leave some foreign language books on the bedside shelf for the guests, if they want to read a bit before sleeping. :)

The house was built at the turn of the century with a really high ceiling and big windows so the flat is really spacious and bright. The living room and the other two bedrooms face south, so there is usually sun shining in during the whole day. There is plenty of room in the kitchen too, for cooking and eating.

The flat is well located (the metro line M3 is just around the corner) and you can basically reach all the sights and interesting parts of the city in less than 30 minutes by public transport.

Just right next to the building's gate, there is a little food store where you can get anything that you need right away. The owners are good friends of ours and they're very kind people. Next to the store, there is the area's pharmacy, hopefully you won't need that.

The flat is very spacious, and you are very welcome to make yourself at home.

There is a fully-equipped kitchen where your will be given a shelf in the fridge and in the kitchen cabinet for your food. You will also get a shelf in the bathroom so you can store your stuff there conveniently.

You are welcome to make use of the space and the music equipment in the living room as well.

If you're up for it, and I have the time I can gladly show you around and take you to some well-known or less-known places. But even if I'm not around I can give you a handful of tips about the city.

The area is an upcoming neighborhood and there are some nice bars and cafés in the neighboring streets offering hand-crafted beer and local wines.

The Trafo house of contemporary arts is at walking distance, and there is usually always something good going on there.

There is a newly renovated area "Corvin Negyed" starting a few streets away, with pubs, cafes, and shops, and with one of the oldest cinema buildings (Corvin Mozi) in the city. It also has a historical connotation, as it was one of the main locations of the  Hungarian revolution in 1956.

There is also a big park and a botanic garden nearby.

What I like about this area is that it's completely mixed, you can really meet all sorts of different things and people on the streets.

The metro line M3 is just around the corner (2-3 minutes walking). It will take you to Deák Ferenc square in about 10 minutes (4 stops), which is the ultimate centre of Pest in many ways. From there, you can basically reach every important point of Pest very easily.

The tram line 4-6 is also at walking distance (or 1 metro stop) which is a very useful line for getting around in Budapest, it goes right across the city in a half-circle, and it goes 24/7.

There are night buses as well, going from Üllői út (about 3 minutes walking) every 15 minutes, so the place is also well-connected during the night.

We don't smoke inside the flat, but settled a little smoking-talking area by the door on the balcony with two chairs, flowers, and candles. It can have a really cool atmosphere, especially in lazy summer nights.
