description:
Sweet apartment in the central location.

Our calendar is always updated, feel free to use instant book!

ATTRACTIONS NEAR US ON FOOT 

- 5 minutes: Lehel food-market, Metro blue line, non-stop shops, bakery, pharmacy 

-10-15 minutes: Trofea Grill Restaurant, Oriental Soup Restaura, Margaret Island, River Danube, Nyugati Railway Station, Westend Shopping Mall (biggest in BP) 

-20 minutes: Heroes Square, City Park, Széchenyi Bath and Spa, Hungarian National Museum, Museum of Fine Art, Andrassy Boulevard

 FREE BICYCLE for your use
 high speed internet + FREE WIFI + table computer
 free breakfast ( cereal, corn flakes, milk, tea, honey, jam)
 free sheets and towels
 free mobile phone for local communication
 free washing machine
 free hair dryer, iron and ironing board
 shower gel, shampoo, toothpaste, makeup remover, body lotion

I will have minimal contact with the guests, because I work during the day, but if you have any questions, feel free to contact me:)

Just around the corner:
pharmacy, bakery, Joga center

Everything is in the neighborhood:
theaters, bars, pubs,restaurants, bath, shops,
concerts, dance clubs, cafes, tea houses

Many great restaurants are nearby the apartment, like Okay Italia, Fridays, Leroy, or the famous Trófea Grill Restaurant whose motto is "All you can eat and drink for a fix price". The price contains free cocktails, wine, beer, soft drinks and more than 100 kinds of food. They have hungarian local
food, like Goulash, Chicken Paprika, Birkapörkölt and so on. This restaurant on the Visegrádi street, 2 streets from the apartment.

You can walk to everywhere, every important sightseeing point is in walking distance. Train line 4-6 is going 24h a day, so you can get home even at night easily. Public transport (Tram Nr. 4-6 (5 min) ), Metro line 3 (5 min )

reviews_text:
Apartment is very well located. You can reach all the center on foot. Host is very helpful and kind :) I liked the stereo which made it even more cozy. 

The apartment is very cozy, the description coincides with the reality. The situation is perfect to visit Budapest walking, because it is very central, near to the main tourist attractions and transport. Dorisz and Gery were very nice, and they helped us in everything!

Dorisz and Gery make us feeling at home in their apartment! Amazing accomodation in a really good location in Pest: near to the main tourist attractions and transport. I would highly reccomend this apartment for enjoying Budapest. 

A friend and I had a fantastic stay at Dorisz's apartment whilst travelling around Europe. The apartment was clean and in an amazing location. We were also welcomed by Dorisz's boyfriend Gary who showed us around the apartment and marked up a map of the best places to go in the area! All in all we had a fantastic stay in Budapest and would stay at Dorisz's apartment again!

First time in Budapest. When we arrived to the apartment we were met by the nice owners. They introduced us to the city and the apartment. The placement is amazing, it is in the centrum of the city. We would recommend the apartment :) 

I would highly recommend this apartment due to its convenient location to all of the main sights, the amenities at the apartment, and the price.  The host picked me up from the airport and gave me a full overview of the apartment.  Overall, the host was exceptionally welcoming and made me feel comfortable very quickly.  

Dorisz was waiting for us at the apartment. She and her husband gave some nice recommendations for eating typical hungarian food. They also recommended places to visit. If anything was needed, we could contact them.
General and clear instructions were available all the time for the check in, check out and internet. The place was clean and well located in the center of the city.  Everything is similar to what is shown in the pictures.
There were many shops and transports close to the place.
Thank you!

Great flat right in perfect location. The flat was very clean and has a great view to a square. It is also very bright and spacious (except for the bedroom, which is quite small). The kitchen is well equipped. The owners were very friendly and accessible. The important information on the fridge was a nice touch. My only suggestion would be to have extra sets of keys, so that guests can have more flexibility in coming back to the flat at different times.

Dorisz made us feel immediately at home on arriving and helped us decide on where to eat and explore. The flat was incredibly clean and comfortable in a very central location. If we were to return to Budapest we would look to see if the flat was available. 

I was not able to meet Dorisz but his patner Gery was wonderful. He explained everything in detail. Also he has arrange some fruits before our arrival which was very nice.  Now coming to the apartment. Best apartment at this price.Apartment is big enough. Very central near to the metro and bus station.
availability: On Fridays and Saturdays the minimum stay is 2 nights.
review_summary:
The Elegant and spacious apartment is located in the heart of the city, with a nice view to Madách Imre tér and Deák tér. 
Restaurants, bars, 24h shops, fashion street, party places, Danube, Gellért Bath within walking distance.
description:
The Elegant and spacious apartment is located in the heart of the city, with a nice view to Madách Imre tér and Deák tér. 
Restaurants, bars, 24h shops, fashion street, party places, Danube, Gellért Bath within walking distance.

Elegant, freshly renovated studio apartment with extra amenities:
- coffee machine
- washing machine
- dish-washer
- free wi-fi

This area of the city is the best choice if you would like to discover the city center and the main sights of Budapest. You can even walk to any of the places or you can use public transportation, if you get tired. Famous Hungarian traditional restaurants are located around the house and lots of vegan restaurants are also situated within short walking distance.

PUBLIC TRANSPORT

In front of the house:
Trams: 47, 49
Metro lines: 1,2,3
Bus: 9, 105, 16

From the airport:
Bus number 200E leaves for town in front of Arriving Terminal Hall of Liszt Ferenc Airport. It terminates at "Kőbánya-Kispest" traffic junction where you can access the M3 (blue) metro line to reach your destination: "Deák Ferenc tér". Traveling time is around 1 hour.

Please note that the last bus is leaving at 22:49 for the last connecting metro (23:26). The earliest bus for the first connecting metro is leaving at 4:09.

TRANSFER SERVICE

Budapest Airport is quite far from the city centre. If you need transfer service please send me your flight number, exact landing time, and phone number! I can only provide transfer service only If it is requested at least 24 hours prior to arrival. The rate depends on number of guests.


PARKING

Parking in nearby streets costs 440 HUF (1.4 €) / hour.  Parking lots are available for 13 € / day.

reviews_text:
The apartment was awesome, with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms there was plenty of space even for 6 of us. The flat is so central that we walked everywhere, Andrassy avenue and the christmas markets are easy to reach, the area offers many restaurants, bars, clubs. Our holiday was perfect, we will stay here again for sure if we return to budapest.

We had an amazing stay in the apartment. The host was very nice and helpful, we arrived late for check in but that was no problem. The apartment is really nice, spacious,  the interior is modern.  The location was excellent, city center is nearby, metro station, many bars pubs, clubs just a few minute walk so everything was easy to reach. 

This place is a little paradise where everyone can feel at home. Everything was perfect from the beginning to the end. The location is awesome, extremely central, we did not use public transport and did everything by feet!the decoration of the flat is super nice, it's clean, has everything one needs.  Beds are extremely comfortable and the dressing is amazing. I was used to Airbnb but this remains my favourite experience so far, Aron was always reachable if needed. He was quite flexible for the check out, and he ordered a cab for us from and to the airport for a fix rate of 25€.

Wonderful host, awesome apartment! We were amazed by how spacious it is and by its refined interior design. The host was friendly, took his time to show us around and explain everything and was quick to answer all emails. I cannot recommend this place enough!
review_summary: Spacious 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom premium apartment furnished by an interior designer for rent in downtown next to the famous Andrassy Avenue and the Opera House.
description:
Spacious 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom premium apartment furnished by an interior designer for rent in downtown next to the famous Andrassy Avenue and the Opera House.

This 2 bedroom 2 bathroom, 2 kitchen apartment was designed to have two separate living spaces so it is ideal for even two couples or two groups who want to have some of their own privacy and living space. The apartment consists of two units a studio with with a kitchen and a bathroom and a one bedroom apartment with a separate living room bedroom and bathroom. However the apartment essentially functions too as one big 2 bedroom apartment with the living room in the middle.

The apartment is fully equipped for both longer and shorter stay. 
It is furnished with high quality furniture and its design has been created by an interior designer. 
Your comfort is guaranteed with amenities such as a Nespresso coffee machine, or remote control thermostat.

The place is located in one of the most central parts of town just 2 minutes walk from the famous Andrassy Avenue and also very close to the Opeara House. The famous ruin pub Instant is also just a stone's throw away. Yes the apartment itself is very quiet as it is facing an interior courtyard.
There are dozens of restaurants, pubs, coffeeshops, clubs within a few minutes walk away.

The place is so central that you can get to most places easily on foot.
However if you need to use public transportation both Metro Line 1 & 3 are a short walk away, and several trolley buses stops are very close to the apartment.

reviews_text:
The apartment is beautiful with an amazing view. not to mention that that is the view from the spacious balcony and the master bedroom that you wake up to. it is well equipped and furnished. There is a supermarket 2-minute walk from the apartment, and Duna plaza mall a 10 minute walk away. 

The morning run on the river.

I would highly recommend this apartment to anybody visiting Budapest and values piece and quite. 


We had a great stay here.  The apartment is just what we expected with a fabulous view over the Danube from the balcony.  If you have a car there is an excellent, safe, clean garage under the apartments.  The Metro is only a 5 minute walk away which will get you in to the city centre in under 15 mins. Local shops are close by with bigger supermarkets [Tesco Extra] within a 5 minute drive.The apartment has all the things you need and the beds are very comfy and the water hot.  Bence [Bente] is a great host and he and Niki made us very welcome and kept in contact with us while we were in Budapest. Excellent Bence - may thanks.

Beautiful apartment overlooking the Danube. Hosts had provided thoughtful extras and Dorina was lovely and really easy to communicate with. Good location, although not central, a short walk and you are at the metro and into the centre. We really enjoyed our stay and would highly recommend. 

The apartement was wonderful with a lovely view at Donau. Bence had arranged someone to wait for us although we came very late. 
Everything was just fine and we had a lovely holiday.
Bence was a nice host and wrote several times just to ask if we were ok. Thank you. :-)

bence is a wonderful guy ,apartment is beautiful  as on photos ,but if you expect an good air conditioning system then look somewhere else, temperature never goes down below 28 Celsius,

Bence's place was everything that was described in the listing. He had it well stocked and prepared both rooms for our stay. The view was amazing and it was within a 10 minute walk to the metro. We used the metro to get to all of the major tourist attractions and was easy to use. I would absolutely recommend staying here!

Bence was a brilliant host. Made sure our stay here went as smoothly as we could hope and hugely contributed to making Hungary such a good place to visit. Would definitely recommend to anyone looking to stay in Hungary 

Bence was an amazing host who accommodated our every need. He even went above and beyond when we were running behind schedule and picked up some local goulash and a bottle of wine for us to enjoy upon late arrival.  Later during the stay he was able to help us with ordering pizza from one of the incredibly useful information sheets he had posted in the kitchen for us to familiarize ourselves with the area.

On to the home:

The apartment feels brand new inside and is nicely appointed with amenities like a wine cooler, air conditioning, coffee maker, and a washing machine to do laundry in case it's necessary.  The major selling point would be the view and balcony as shown in the many pictures, but another good point is the open feeling and the view from both bedroom windows as well as the LARGE private parking spot in the garage (accommodated my lifted Toyota Tacoma with no issues. I believe it is 2.0m tall).  We felt very safe in the immediate area and enjoyed walking on the boardwalk on the Danube and also the two children's playgrounds on the boardwalk. 

The only possible downside is the distance from downtown.  Cab rides ranged from about 10-20 USD depending on time of day and traffic, but all cab drivers were able to readily identify the apartment by saying "Marina Part" and the building number. As another side note, every cab driver commented on the wealth of the neighborhood for which the apartment is located.  Really enjoyed our stay and would come back to this apartment for sure if we make the long drive again.

Really great apartment ! We were 4 friends and it was perfect. The view is splendid, the Danube down your feet. Look at the boats passing, while the sun is going down with a fresh beer or local wine and you will live a great moment ! Bence is friendly and professional. He gave us places to see and told us how to get there. You can take a taxi (2000 Forints to get to the center) or the metro (a less than ten minutes walk from the apartment). If you want to visit Budapest with a nice place to sleep in, this one is made for you ! Thanks Bence !

We loved staying in this apartment. It gave us everything we expected. Have a look on budapest dot virtualtour dot city and have a look inside airbnb Bence
review_summary: This is a modern and cozy Apartment (78 M2) for 4 people on the coast of the Danube with an amazing view of the river and the city. After the whole day sightseeing you can relax on the huge balcony or  take a walk on the bank of the Danube.
house_rules: Little pet allowed, smoking allowed on the balcony.
description:
This is a modern and cozy Apartment (78 M2) for 4 people on the coast of the Danube with an amazing view of the river and the city. After the whole day sightseeing you can relax on the huge balcony or  take a walk on the bank of the Danube.

There is No Extra Cost and Free Garage Parking ! + FREE WIFI
Modern and luxury apartment with brand new furnitures , big balcony and BEAUTIFUL VIEW , fully equiped kitchen ( toast maker, kettle, coffee machine , stove , dishwasher) and air conditioner.

You can use the whole apartment and free parking in the garage.The metro station is just 8 minutes walk from the apartment and the city center is just 4 stations.

We can assist you everything you need , some advice of the city, restaurants, bars, pubs and must see places . On the arrival we meet you, introduce the apartment or we can do for you an airport pick up with a microbus if necessary.

The apartment takes places in a new and beautiful residential park surrounded with parks, playgrounds, sidewalks next to the Danube and a ship harbor. You can find nearby a beauty salon, fitness center, restaurants and a big mall.

The metro station is just 8 minutes walk from the flat and just 4 stations from the city center. You can reach the city center also by ships of the local transport company, because there is a stop on Marina beach.

review_summary: Super modern excellent location hub in the center of where you have to be. in the heart of the tourist quarter, yet in a quiet building. Nice view and convenient location. Walking distance to most of the sightseeing attractions. No need for public transport during your stay.
description:
Super modern excellent location hub in the center of where you have to be. in the heart of the tourist quarter, yet in a quiet building. Nice view and convenient location. Walking distance to most of the sightseeing attractions. No need for public transport during your stay.

A well designed 2 bedroom apartment with a spacious living room, open kitchen, couple friendly shower :) and many other hidden attributes that will make your stay spactacular

reviews_text:
Everything was as described, clean, comfortable and very convenient to all the sights. Our host Angela is a warm gracious and very helpful person with an excellent command of English. I hope only quality people book with her because she is just that nice.

Angéla was really friendly and welcomed us warmly. Since I was attending a half marathon, she was kind enough to let us check out later. 
The neighborhood is quiet amd safe, even though it is located in the city centre.

Everything about our stay in this property was excellent. The communication with Angela from the very start was great. The apartment was very clean, had everything in it that we needed and more importantly, it felt very homely. Unfortunately whilst in Budapest my girlfriend became ill and Angela was very caring and helpful during this time. I highly recommend this apartment to any couple wanting to visit Budapest. Superb value for money. 


Angela is a great host. Check in was smooth and she explained how things work. Also told us about the neighborhood in detail including transport options.  A 10 Mins walk from Keleti and 15 mins from Heroes Sqaure, its convenient option for a short stay and value for money. Bathroom is very clean. kitchen is well equipped. The room is cozy. Overall a good experience. 

Angela and her place were amazing!!  She was such a gracious host, explaining everything about the apartment and even welcomed us for New Years with a bottle of bubbly!  Even though the kitchen was small, it was very well stocked and we had no problem cooking a delicious meal for ourselves.  The bedroom/living space was cozy and comfortable and the bathroom was very clean and spacious!  Everything about our stay was absolutely perfect!  Angela was so kind and very accommodating with arrival, departures, and tourism info.  And, to top it off, a great location!!  Book this place now.

This was my  first stay with Airbnb, and I had a really good experience.  I was totally satisfied with the apartment .The apartment is situated in a nice, quiet area.It is just a short walk from Heroes' Square,and the metro station so a great location, even the centre was  only a short bus ride. On arrival I  met  Angela, and I was greeted with a glass of mulled wine, which I appreciated a lot. She explained a fewthings about the apartment, and gave me tips about restaurants and ruinbars in the area and made me feel totally welcome. She was really helpful and friendly. She recommended places to visit. The flat was spotlessly clean, beautiful, nicely decorated and comfortable. The wifi connection was great. I enjoyed my stay, and I would definitely come back to this place.

Barrio cerca del centro, limpio y cómodo!
review_summary: The beautiful, newly renovated apartment is centrally located, next to downtown. It is comfortable for two people. It can be a good choise for a shorter or  a longer stay in Budapest. It has all the necessery equipment.
house_rules: Smoking is only allowed outside at the balcony  No shoes shall be worn in the apartment except the kitchen. Please be sensible and keep the noise down and be considerate to our neighbours. I would much appreciate it if you could treat our place with respect as your own home.
description:
The beautiful, newly renovated apartment is centrally located, next to downtown. It is comfortable for two people. It can be a good choise for a shorter or  a longer stay in Budapest. It has all the necessery equipment.

We are in the heart of the City, in the 7th district, we can be reached very easily. The public transport is excellent. The Keleti metro station is 10 minutes far from our place.

The full apartment is accessible.

In case you need my help, you can reach me by telephone or personally.

Sigthseeings like  the City park, the Hero Square, the Szechenyi  Spa, Andrassy road are within walking distance. The 7th district is famous for it's ruin pubs, good restaurants.  The Keleti railway station, the Keleti underground is only 10 minutes by foot.  The New York coffee house, the most beautiful coffee house in the world and the Great Synagogue is 10-15 minutes far from our place. The downtown is also close to us. The Parliament, the Chain Bridge, Margaret Island, Buda Castle Hill are also in the proximity of the apartment.

If you arrive by train: The apartment  is  close to Keleti railwaystation,  only 10 minutes walk.  It takes 25 minutes by taxi from the airport to reach us.  The public transport is also excellent from the airport, you need to take bus 200E to Kőbánya-Kispest metro station (blue line), this is the terminus. Take the underground to Deak square, change the line  to  metro 2 (red line)  and you get off at Keleti station.

reviews_text:
Amazing location! Right next to Buda castle and just a walk away from the chain bridge and the tourist hotspots.

Dora was very welcoming and helpful, the apartment was perfect and clean. Bathroom with the sauna and bathtub was a real treat! Thank you for the lovely stay :) 

I can recommend everybody to book an accommodation with Gabor. The flat is brilliantly located, well equipped, modern and clean. Gabor is a great host. He organized us a private cap to the airport and we could leave our luggage at his place even after our check-out. Thanks again for a great weekend, Gabor.   

This was truly a beautiful and very safe place to stay. This was my first trip to Hungary and I stayed here for two weeks. The place was extremely well cleaned when I arrived. The host made sure someone was there to give me a set of keys and explain the basics despite my late arrival. The decor is as pictured. The kitchen was stocked with basics but lacked an oven. If I wanted anything cleaned all I had to do was ask and it was done promptly. The shower and sauna were amazing and I used both almost everyday. The hot water would occasionally not be available at night for some reason. I tried to use the big bath tub several times but couldn't get enough hot water to fill it up even halfway, but I only tried using it at night. Overall a great establishment very close to everything with great hosts. I highly recommend this place to anyone. 

I stayed at Gabor's with my partner and we both loved the place. It is a gorgeous apartment, very luminous and clean. It has a well equipped kitchen and the sauna and bathtub were a real treat. 
Also, the location was super convenient and we could walk everywhere. 
About Gabor, our host, we can only say big thank you!! He was incredibly helpful and friendly, we will never forget his hospitality. 

Very nice apartment in the center of Budapest, located in quiet area, walking distance everywhere. The place was nicely furbished, clean, with a huge bathroom ;). Gabor is a great host and I would recommend the place to anyone visiting Budapest.

Gabor is an amazing host and he provides an absolutely beautiful apartment.  

The apartment was clean, quiet and roomy with a private water closet and a separate, very fashionable spa that includes a sauna! The apartment is in a convenient location.  We were able to walk everywhere we wanted go - sightseeing, shopping, restaurants.

Gabor helped arrange a guide for us.  He also arranged for us to be picked up at the train station.

Gabor was a great host.  I was born in Hungary and left as a child, so he went out of his way to buy me some of my favorite childhood treats that I remembered from 30 years ago!! :)

The apartment was very clean, bright, modern, and elegant.  The location is super convenient close to the Chain Bridge and many restaurants and tourist destinations.  It was  little hard to find, as the building entrance is not very well marked.  

A potential visitor may keep in mind that this apartment doesn't have air conditioning, so on really hot summer nights like we had, this may be a problem for you as it was for me.  Also, make sure you bring a flashlight or your cell phone, as the entrance and foyer are not lit up at night, so it is very dark to make your way to the apartment.   Maybe Gabor can add some motion detection lighting in the wall for tenants coming in at night!

Overall, a great host and a really classy, nice place to stay!  I would definitely recommend

Die Wohnung war sehr schön, frisch renoviert und sauber. Außerdem liegt sie in einem wunderbaren historischen, sehr gepflegten Gebäude. Es ist auch eine Tiefgarage vorhanden. Auch die Lage ist prima. Gabor war sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. Er hat uns sogar zu einer Party im Haus eingeladen und für die Gäste selbst gekocht. Deshalb kann ich die Wohnung sehr herzlich empfehlen!
review_summary:
The perfect starting point for a wonderful sightseeing! 
A high level of comfort and safety for perfect relaxation !
The apartment is on the first floor of a beautiful two-storey villa.
description:
The perfect starting point for a wonderful sightseeing! 
A high level of comfort and safety for perfect relaxation !
The apartment is on the first floor of a beautiful two-storey villa.

The apartment is on the first floor of a beautiful 2-storey villa were found. American style kitchen, living room, a comfortable king-size sofa and luxurious bathrooms . The bathroom has a double sink ,  shower , sauna and corner bathtub . The bathroom is highlighted unique in that corner over the glass ceilings that will help an evening bath under a starry sky .

If you need airport transfer, sightseeing tour or a trip to Visegrád, contact with me! I have a 8-seater Mercedes Vito bus, I can help in anyway :)

The apartment is easily accessible by public transport. The Batthyany Square metro station is an 8 -minute walk , the Clark Ádám Square ( 105 , 116 bus) 3 minute walk , and the 17 tram stop is a 2-minute walk away.

reviews_text:
Laszlo was super great, very welcoming. He's always answer to the phone immediately if there is a question or a problem.He made sure we had everything we needed.
The neighborhood is not amazing, but we are closed Jewish quarter with a lot of bars and restaurants.
The flat is perfect for a couple, we spent great time in Budapest !
Thank you so much Laszlo 


Nice stay in Budapest, the host helpful, the appartment not very very far from the centre. The building can seem a bit shabby but the apartment itself is nice. The host lives next door. Thanks Laszlo! 

Laszlo was great, he made time to explain everything and meet myself and my friends even though we arrived at different times of the day. He was always a phone call or message away. He made sure we had everything we needed. The apartment was about 5 minutes from Tesco, 10 minutes to the main road and 20 mins to the main square. The main train station isn't too far away either. Transportation is super cheap compare to taxi. Overall, it was a great trip! Thanks for the wonderful host!!

The apartment was really nice. I like it though! László is attentive owner. If you will have some problems, he will help you immediately! 

It was i nice stay, friendly owner. Drinks in the fridge. Thank u

This flat is really nice and it has everything you need. There is even a huge closet for clothes with ironning board and dryer rack and that was not on the photos. We really enjoyed our stay.

Good experience in budapest

What a fantastic stay in Budapest we had - only made better by Laszlo's wonderful flat. We felt very welcomed and looked after before we even arrived as Laszlo contacted us with all the details needed for how I get to the flat from the airport etc. The flat was really clean and so well equipped with everything we needed to make our stay great. Good location within walking distance of loads of shops and restaurants but there is also the metro and trams right on your doorstep too if you need it. Thank you so much Laszlo! Rachel and Tom

Laszlo is a very attentive and helpful host. The flat is spacious, very clean and comfortable, it has all you need to feel yourself like a local. Bakery, grocery store, metro is just a few blocks from the house. Although the place is 5 min from Blaha Luiza Ter, the street is full of homeless people and it really attracts your attention. Nevertheless, we would definitely recommend staying at Laszlo's place!

The communication prior to my arrival was great and Laszlo provided many helpful information on how to transfer from and to the airport. The apartment was exactly as described in the listing and as shown on the photos. Quiet, clean and located in about 10min walking distance from the VII. quarter with all the bars a restaurants. The Metro to down town is about 5min away. The host was available for any questions I had as he lives next door and he provided me with a great welcoming package as well. Altogether I has really happy with my stay and can very much recommend this home.
review_summary: 60 sqm very nice apartment close to Keleti P.U., Subway line 4, Tram line 6/4, Tesco Market. Emiatt fog tetszeni neked a helyem: a kényelmes ágy, a konyha, az otthonosság, a magas mennyezet,. A helyem erre megfelelő: párok, magányos kalandozók és üzleti utazók. Two person bed is on the galeria and one collapsible bed is in livingroom. Under the galeria there is a small work place and a wardrobe. From 20th of Oct till 20th of Apr the heating charge based upon the consumption. Official gas price.

review_summary:
Amazing loft style apartment completely renovated in October 2016. Located just steps away from Budapest's main shopping street, the world famous market hall, restaurants and many more. Equipped with every comfort it’s the ideal place to spend a wonderful holiday in Budapest.

Enjoy the 2 living areas designed in industrial style with a bit of touch of Budapest. Connect to our fast internet or browse Netflix. Relax in our super comfy beds so you can take city refreshed!
description:
Amazing loft style apartment completely renovated in October 2016. Located just steps away from Budapest's main shopping street, the world famous market hall, restaurants and many more. Equipped with every comfort it’s the ideal place to spend a wonderful holiday in Budapest.

Enjoy the 2 living areas designed in industrial style with a bit of touch of Budapest. Connect to our fast internet or browse Netflix. Relax in our super comfy beds so you can take city refreshed!

We are here to help. Let us know by mail, phone, (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN), Viber or in any other forms you prefer what you are up to. Being locals we can give you the latest hotspots of the city.

reviews_text:
Our stay at Krisztinas apartment made our stay in Budapest great! It is in such a central location site seeing and travelling was so easy. Krisztina welcomed us on our arrival and made us feel at home straight away. We didn't want to leave! :( 

Krisztina's apartment is just brilliant. It is very spacious with lovely high ceilings.  The location is excellent, all within walking distance of the main restaurants/markets/bars. Krisztina as a host was incredibly reliable and was always available to contact if we needed anything. My girlfriend and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay here and if we return to Budapest in the near future then we would not hesitate to book this apartment again!   

Krisztina´s place was amazing! :) Flat was clean and really beautiful :) We did not meet Krisztina in person, but communication with her was great. Apartment´s location is amazing - directly in the city center. I will recommend this place everywhere :) Thank you Kriszitina for the nice time in your apartment :) 

It was a Nice location everything was oke. I would recoment this to other travelers.

This was a great apartment, in a fantastic location right off vaci street, close to transit, and walking distance to city sights and restaurants.

Apartment was clean and spacious, quiet, and in a safe neighbourhood. Krisztina was very responsive and met me on time with keys. She also gave me some great food recommendations for my stay!

Thank you Krisztina we enjoyed staying in your apartment.  Even though the location was central and lively but our apartment was quiet which was perfect.  The beds and pillows comfortable for a good nights rest so we could charge up for exploring lovely Budapest.  We loved all the shops and restaurants outside our building--the location is excellent.  Everything we wanted to do was 10 minutes away either by foot, taxi or public transportation.  Thank you for being a great host. 

I had a great stay in Krisztina's apartment, it was very comfortable and had everything I needed.
The location is good too, close to public transport with a number of decent restaurants close by and in easy walking distance to the main sights. Communication was excellent, precise and prompt, and I'd be more than happy to stay again in the future.

The stay at Krisztina's flat was perfect; Clean, top location, nicely decorated with high ceilings. The flat does look even better that on the pictures.

The house made us feel very welcome. Even nicer than the pictures and the neighbourhood very nice and in a very centric area. Great location! Kristina was very nice and helpful. 

The apartment is amazingly decorated, very spacious and  very quiet. It's right in the center of the city, near the Vaci street and walking distance from almost anywhere. We definitely enjoyed our stay here and we recommend it.
review_summary: Luxury Apartment a few meters from the famous Vaci street. Live as a lokal in the very heart of the city and relax in a spacious superior quality two bathroom apartment. With its location at Parizsi street, you can live in the best part of...
description:
Luxury Apartment a few meters from the famous Vaci street. Live as a lokal in the very heart of the city and relax in a spacious superior quality two bathroom apartment. With its location at Parizsi street, you can live in the best part of...

In this superior quality 2 bathroom apartment you can live in the best part of central Budapest. All you need is within a few meters, close to many great cafes, restaurants, shops, sights and the Danube Corso. 

There is a king size bed in the bedroom and a pull-out sofa in the living room. The second bathroom with a shower is near the entrance and provides full privacy to the second guest. This is ideal for 2 or more guests, you don't need to wait to have a shower when your friend or most significant one is busy in the other bathroom.

The kitchen has all appliances including microwave, oven, stove, fridge and kettles, everything you need to make delicious meals.

The apartment is on the 3rd floor and there is an elevator, thus, access to the apartment is easy, don't worry about heavy bags.

You can use the kitchen, dining nook, two bathrooms, bedroom and living room exclusively, the whole apartment is provided to you.

I'm usually staying in the city, you can contact me during the day.

The famous and well known Samos is in front of the house. For sightseeing and river trips the apartment is also in easy walking distance to the Danube boat stations.

A few meters from the lively Vaci street (Váci utca) there are excellent shopping places, pavement cafes and restaurants. The best coffee houses like the historical Central Kaveház and fabolous restaurants like Gerlóczy are within 300meters.

Public parking is available around the building or in parking garages at an hourly fee.

Ferenciek tere is within 2 min walk distance, metro (blue) stops there. Deák tér is also close to, 5 min on foot, you just need to go along the famous Váci street to get there. Bus stop and tram(Nr2) is also next corner.

From the airport you can get bus E200 and then subway blue to Ferenciek tere. Only one change and afterwards  3 min walk.

reviews_text:
Kata's place was very nice, had lots of helpful books, and some bonus amenities (like tea, coffee, salt, chocolate croissants, toothpaste, etc.) that make these stays even better.  Her description of how to get to her place was accurate (we never did meet her however). For the price, it is hard to beat.

We had a fantastic week in Budapest and used many of Kata's recommendations (Szimpla Kert was a fun place for drinks and we got a delicious pizza just outside the flat one evening when we were tired). 
The place was super clean and the courtyard was gorgeous! The flat is a 20 minute walk from heros square which is right next to the amazing baths! Transport in Budapest is super and we had no problem getting around with the help of maps and books from Kata's flat. Couldn't recommend this place more to anyone hoping to stay in the beautiful city of Budapest. 
Tessa and Charles x  

Kata's place was great, and well placed for transport and access to great parts of Budapest. She was a fantastic host - even had snacks and things for me when I arrived - and responded quickly to any questions I had. The building was nice, quiet, and comfortable. Would definitely stay again. Thanks, Kata.

It was a great stay that I've ever done. The landlady was really nice . I hope everyone could have a stay experience there who could go to Budapest.

Best holidays ever

Had a lovely stay. Great set up and excellent location! Kata was friendly and communicative and gave us excellent recommendations for food and activities.

This airbnb abode compliments of Kata is just wonderful. From the very beginning of contact all communication was 100% perfection. Although we never met Kata in person as she was in another country everything worked like clockwork because Kata is very dedicated to customer care and satisfaction. Her airbnb site information leaves nothing to chance and as one is with her from start to completion on the site all goes smoothly. We got the shuttle service from the airport (very efficient) which both dropped us at her door and picked us up from there on departure. Accessing the complex and apartment is so easy. Kata's place is so central, just a short walk from Keleti railway station with excellent connections. We were there for the 2016 European La Crosse Championships in Godollo. Her place in light, airy, spacious, spotlessly clean, has a wonderful shower and full self catering facilities if required but eh Budapest is great for eating out. 
The space is very safe and extra quiet. They are no ifs or buts, it is magnificent and at a most wonderful price for a major exciting European capital. Thank you so much Kata for a very positive experience. 

I had a wonderful time, the flat itself was beautiful and Kata was an excellent host, very quick to respond and pleasant.

Kata was so welcoming that she had food in the fridge that was a total curtesy and was nice to come straight into after a long travel. She checked in on me to make sure everything was operational and was even incredibly understanding after an accident on my part. Excellent host!

We had an excellent stay at Kata's apartment.  She was very responsive and helpful before our trip, offering some great and unique advice about places to visit on our first visit to Budapest.

The appartment was easy to find with Kata's instructions and in a good location. It's just a short walk from city park which has one of the main thermal spas.

The apartment was incredibly clean and well equiped with everything that we needed, including towels and some strawberries in the fridge to enjoy when we arrived! 

I would highly recommend Kata's apartment as a place to stay whilst in Budapest - thank you!
review_summary:
Bright studio apartment, fully equipped bathroom and kitchen, generously spaced living room and gallery with a futon-bed that comfortably fit two. Experience a historic old building with high ceilings, internal courtyard, hanging corridors.

A short stroll from Heroes' Square, City Park, Andrássy boulevard and Keleti train station, you're close to many trendy or traditional restaurants, sights, museums, bath, zoo, iceskating, with excellent transport links to other parts of the city and beyond.
house_rules: This is a non-smoking space, with neighbours who let each other rest peacefully in evenings/weekends. Pets are not permitted. Feel free to use anything you find in the apartment, read the books, or raid the kitchen supplies.
description:
Bright studio apartment, fully equipped bathroom and kitchen, generously spaced living room and gallery with a futon-bed that comfortably fit two. Experience a historic old building with high ceilings, internal courtyard, hanging corridors.

A short stroll from Heroes' Square, City Park, Andrássy boulevard and Keleti train station, you're close to many trendy or traditional restaurants, sights, museums, bath, zoo, iceskating, with excellent transport links to other parts of the city and beyond.

Great location and careful fit-out to cater for a single person or a couple's needs. Located in a historic building that's been recently renovated, with quiet neighbours and lots of sunlight.

You'll have full use of the apartment and everything you find inside. 

The bathroom is equipped with shower gel, shampoo, soap, laundry detergent, and toilet paper. Fresh linen, towels, hair dryer, iron and ironing board are also provided.

You'll find tea and coffee in the kitchen, and basic dry ingredients.

I will leave the keys in a key lock for you and send on details of exactly where you'll find it. So don't worry if you don't have a specific arrival time, or it is in the early hours or late at night! You will find the detailed 'house rules' on the kitchen table, with a short description of how everything works in the apartment.

Most of the time I'm abroad for work, but when I'm home, I will be happy to meet and greet you, and tell you about the city and the neighbourhood if you need any insights or tips. When I'm away, my lovely mum kindly looks after my guests for me :)

Very easy to reach all major sights with excellent public transport links, and night buses also stop on the doorstep. 

The apartment is in an old historic building which has recently been renovated, towards the back on the 2nd floor, away from the hustle and bustle of the street. There's no lift in the building, just a lovely big stone staircase. The aristocratic high ceiling and large windows of the apartments ensure it is lovely and bright during the day.

The windows overlook a school with some activity during the day at the breaks (you may hear them in the summer with windows open), but complete peace and quiet in the evenings and weekends. 

There is free parking nearby on a large square, few minutes walk away if you need it. On street parking is generally safe in the area, there are a few embassies and office buildings around there. Watch out for signs, some streets have free parking but you may need to pay when you turn the corner.

Heroes Square station of the M1 metro line and the Eastern Railway Station (Keleti) with M3 metro line are both about 10-15 mins walk away. 11 lines of buses and trolley buses to and from the city centre stop nearly on the doorstep ((PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)) , with 2 night buses also (907, 973).

Taxis can be a bit overpriced, especially if hailed on the street. If you prefer to get around that way in Budapest, I recommend using the Uber app. Uber cars tend to be clean with reliable drivers, at a reasonable price.

Water pipes run in the kitchen wall shared with the next door neighbour - when they turn on the tap in their kitchen, you can hear that on my side too. It's not an intrusive house noise but good to know!

review_summary:
happy home is more than just a place to stay, it comes with extra services, and one single focus: your happiness.
*brand new & fully equipped
*One cosy double bed and one comfortable sofa-bed
*80's pinball machine
*free Dolce Gusto Coffee/Tea, free minibar 
*shampoo/soap, hairdryer, towels, washer/dryer
*HiSpeed Wifi, Led TV & free Netflix (!), Bluetooth Hifi/audio
*Mobile Hot Spot device (you can bring it with you and be online anywhere in town with your own phone/tablet/laptop!)
house_rules:
This section provides rules for a clear understanding of obligations related to your stay. We say thank you for your cooperation by offering you our welcome-pack, including a bottle of quality Hungarian wine, mini-bar basics, and your own happy home pen!
1. The apartment can only be used by checked-in guests. 
Check-in time is from 2pm, check-out time is by 11am, when our cleaner arrives. For late check-in after 9pm there is an additional charge of 10€. Late check-out at 6pm is 20€, provided the next guests’ arrival time allows it. We don’t have a reception desk; therefore times are pre-arranged.
2. Guests need to pay full respect to other residents of the building and avoid loud music (hifi, guitar/keyboard) or other noise disturbance, particularly after 9pm. We reserve the right to cancel the booking immediately, without booking fee reimbursement, in case of valid complaints from other residents.
3. Smoking in the apartment is strictly forbidden. We recommend smoking in the court yard of the building, or outside the building. Kindly keep the place clean – do not leave behind any cigarette ends. We provide an ashtray.  
4. Please always lock the doors and switch off all lighting and air-conditioning when leaving the apartment. Kindly use the air-condition economically and help us protect mother earth ;)
5. We take no responsibility for your valuables left in the apartment and for accidents and/or injuries. A first aid kit can be found in the kitchen. 
6. Pets are not allowed in the apartment, unless formally agreed with us by forehand.
7. Should you face any problem during your stay, please inform us immediately. 
8. Please keep the apartment clean and leave it in the same condition as upon arrival. We recommend you take off your shoes in the apartment (a local tradition). Please do not put any objects/drinks on the Pinball machine – it’s very sensitive.
9. Any damage caused during your stay must be notified and compensated by you. A security deposit of 100€ is required. That deposit is returned 100% upon check-out, subject to returning all items provided, and the apartment not being damaged. A lost key will be charged 25€.
description:
happy home is more than just a place to stay, it comes with extra services, and one single focus: your happiness.
*brand new & fully equipped
*One cosy double bed and one comfortable sofa-bed
*80's pinball machine
*free Dolce Gusto Coffee/Tea, free minibar 
*shampoo/soap, hairdryer, towels, washer/dryer
*HiSpeed Wifi, Led TV & free Netflix (!), Bluetooth Hifi/audio
*Mobile Hot Spot device (you can bring it with you and be online anywhere in town with your own phone/tablet/laptop!)

Happy Home is different. Centrally located in a traditional Budapest building, this apartment comes with top standards on a surface of 26m², completed with an extra 10m² mezzanine (ceiling 1.75m) for great sleep :) Simply the perfect deal in the heart of the city !

Full access - the apartment has a trendy living area, a modern bathroom, a fully equipped kitchen, free HiSpeed Wifi, and an original 80's pinball machine for free play & fun!
Accessing the apartment is easy - it is ground floor, no stairs!

"Do things that make others happy" – the happy home teams loves to share the great vibes of Budapest and to meet people. Our mission is to make every guest smile, and happy! We gladly give you advice - we love to help.

Ideally located – in the middle of city essentials, nearby public transport, restaurants, bars and supermarkets, happy home is just a stone drop away from anything you might be looking for!

Airport: 25min drive (you can book a quality transfer with us at a good price).
Keleti railway station is just a good 5min walk away, other railway stations are about 5 minutes by taxi (about 5€), metro & tramway are just a 3min walk.

Upon reservation, we send you lots of additional info. Here are the basics to start with:
SERENITY
Although centrally located, happy home is part of a traditional Budapest-style building with nice and quiet neighborhood, away from the noise. We then also ask our guests to be respectful in return, and to observe our house rule relating to silence. 
BREAKFAST
At only 9€ pp, you can buy vouchers for breakfast, served at Café Vian at 3 downtown locations, so you can dive into your happy day in Budapest just anywhere! Breakfast vouchers are provided upon request, at check-in. 
PARTNERS
We have various partnerships in the city, offering discount for happy home guests : restaurants, bars, massage, facials, Hop-on Hop-off and other services.
MEZZANINE 
The sleeping mezzanine of this unit offers an extra space of 10m2 with a head-height of 175cm
KITCHEN & MORE
*microwave *electrical cooker top *pots&pans, mugs, glasses, cutlery *dishwasher *fridge/freezer *washing machine & dryer (combined) *iron & ironing board *hair dryer. 
INTERNET GENERATION
*free Internet Smartphone or mobile hot spot provided during your stay (so you’ll be online anywhere, anytime!) * free HiSpeed-Wifi *Bluetooth-Hifi System
NETFLIX
Our Led TV is SMART and (instead of TV channels) includes Netflix...for free! Enjoy your favorite TV shows and movies at no extra cost!
PARKING
Parking on the street in front of happy home is easy, safe and free during the weekend, but on weekdays it is paying between 8am and 6pm, just as anywhere else in the city center! That costs 1€/h, but the maximum is 3 hours - so you need to personally renew the ticket every 3 hours. We therefore recommend, for weekdays, a nearby parking garage, 300m away at 12€ per day.
PINBALL
Each happy home has its own, real & working 80's pinball. Guests can play and enjoy anytime. All we ask for is to handle this little beauty with extreme care. It’s very old and hard to fix when broken - spare parts are hard to find and require international shipping. Therefore, we cannot guarantee that the Pinball will work at all times.
INSTRUMENTS
happy home has its own instruments for you! A nylon-string-guitar and a keyboard with good piano-sound. For musicians, this is a true survival kit :) And it's fun for anyone else!
TRANSFERS
If you arrive by airplane, we can arrange transfers for you, both ways, at a very fair price! Why book the transfers with us?
* no need to wait upon arrival * our driver welcomes you at arrivals with a happy home sign * you get a trustworthy driver with a comfy car * our driver is familiar with happy home * good coordination between transfer and check-in * no extra charge for luggage * for your return transfer, we can pre-arrange pick-up from happy home to to the airport.
HOUSE RULES
This section provides rules for a clear understanding of obligations related to your stay. We say thank you for your cooperation by offering you our welcome-pack, including a bottle of quality Hungarian wine, mini-bar basics, and your own happy home pen!
1. The apartment can only be used by checked-in guests. 
Check-in time is from 2pm, check-out time is by 11am, when our cleaner arrives. For late check-in after 9pm there is an additional charge of 10€, to make staff available after working hours. We don’t have a reception desk; therefore times are pre-arranged.
2. Guests need to pay full respect to other residents of the building and avoid loud music (hifi, guitar/keyboard) or other noise disturbance, particularly after 9pm. We reserve the right to cancel the booking immediately, without booking fee reimbursement, in case of valid complaints from other residents.
3. Smoking in the apartment is strictly forbidden. We recommend smoking in the court yard of the building, or outside the building. Kindly keep the place clean – do not leave behind any cigarette ends. We provide an ashtray.  
4. Please always lock the doors and switch off all lighting and air-conditioning when leaving the apartment. Kindly use the air-condition economically and help us protect mother earth ;)
5. We take no responsibility for your valuables left in the apartment and for accidents and/or injuries. A first aid kit can be found in the kitchen. 
6. Pets are not allowed in the apartment, unless formally agreed with us by forehand.
7. Should you face any problem during your stay, please inform us immediately. 
8. Please keep the apartment clean and leave it in the same condition as upon arrival. We recommend you take off your shoes in the apartment (a local tradition). Please do not put any objects/drinks on the Pinball machine – it’s very sensitive.
9. Any damage caused during your stay must be notified and compensated by you(URL HIDDEN)
Upon check-out, the apartment’s good condition is subject to possible inspection. A lost key will be charged 25€, a lost phone or mobile hotspot 50€.
Please note that we charge 10 euro for check-ins after 9 PM.

The location, is excellent, just steps from Heroes square and the yellow metro line.Great for couples, solo and business travellers and families with kids.  Located right in the diplomatic district on a quiet narrow one way street this is the perfect place for a quiet relaxing holiday which is off the beaten path yet close to the major sights.

reviews_text:
I had a great stay at Tamas/Marta's place.  As other reviewers have noted it is in a lively area and just meters to pubs and restaurants but is in a secure quiet building so noise is no issue and is safe and easily accessible.  The flat is rustic and unique but with everything one needs.  Tamas made some good suggestions for things to do and was responsive to my questions and concerns.  There isn't much headroom in the upstairs sleeping area, but wasn't a problem or concern for me.  They've done the best they can with the small space and should work very well for a solo traveler or couple.  

Marie and I throughly enjoyed our stay at the apartment. Not only is it in a fabulous location, walking distance to cafes, shops, bars etc..
But it's a beautiful place, very clean and our hosts were most accommodating. We felt very welcome, we will stay here next time we visit Budapest! 

Location-excellent, bustling area but very quiet peaceful house. It felt very secure and has a great look. It is in a perfect position for exploring the city, very close to transport links, make sure you use them it is so easy and efficient to do.

Everything was perfect.
Marta was sick at the time I arrived but he managed to find the way to get the key at the right time we scheduled…

Cool apartment and a great location. Tamas was very accomodating and super nice. 

Everything you need and the best location in the city, what's more important is its beautiful architecture and decoration that make you be willing to live here just like home.

The location is perfect. The apartment clean, tidy and a lovely rustic feel with all the modern amenities that I needed. I was welcomed with a beer, and met Tamas. Tamas' communication is fantastic, at no point was I left wondering what to do or where to be, he's incredibly friendly and if you get a chance sit and have a coffee with him, awesome dude!

Matyas and Tamas went ABOVE and beyond! I cannot begin to describe their kindness and help. My experience in Budapest was amazing in large part because of them. The flat is beautiful, so clean, and just as it appears in photos. You will have everything you need here. I highly recommend! 

Matyas met us right outside of the apartment even though we were a little late and couldn't communicate as well as we'd hoped (the wifi at the Budapest airport is spotty). He was incredibly friendly and made us feel at home. His house is small but lovely - perfect for one or two people. The location is superb! The only thing I would point out is that the sleeping arrangements are a bit cramped (for a tall person) and there's only a mattress in the loft (which the pictures make completely clear). I would still stay again at Matyas's place as he was a great host and the house was wonderful! 

Mátyás was so friendly and outgoing, communicated quickly and effectively, and his home went beyond my expectations. The apartment was in a perfect location for going out (especially for food, coffeeshops, transport, and nightlife), but still was quiet and homey. I would absolutely come back again!
review_summary: This fully equipped apartment is located on Budapest's city centre (5 minutes walk from Deak Square, just a few steps from the party quarter), in the famous Jewish district.

Don't break anything 
Don't lose keys:)
description:
This fully equipped apartment is located on Budapest's city centre (5 minutes walk from Deak Square, just a few steps from the party quarter), in the famous Jewish district.

This fully equipped apartment is located on Budapest city centre (5 minutes walk from Deak Square, just a few steps from the party quarter), in the famous Jewish district. The Rumbach Provence is excellent for two people, or couples. The apartment overlooks a lighted courtyard, it has a terrace where guests have the opportunity to smoke, and parking.

I will have minimal contact with the guests, because I work during the day, but if you have any questions, feel free to contact me:)

The apartment is at the heart of the city, only only 300 meters away from Deak Ferenc ter (3 metro lines – red, blue and yellow), and 250 meters from the Andrassy avenue which is part of the Word heritage. Furthermore the Opera, Dohany Synagogue, Fashion Street, Vaci Street, Vorosmarty square, St. Stephens Basilica, River Danube, Chainbridge and the Parliament are also in a short walking distance (5-20 minutes walk).

Located also just 300 meters from the "Deák Tér" subway stop.

The Rumbach Provence is in a very save area, close to restaurants, cafés, bars, supermarkets, and gym. Although the apartment is in a quite area, the windows look into the inner courtyard.

Never hesitate to ask:)

reviews_text:
Very comfortable and enjoyable stay in Franz's apartment. Beautifully decorated and maintained. Host staff were amazing and always on hand for advice. We had a late afternoon flight home, and Team Oasis organised a free taxi to their offices for us to store our luggage for the afternoon. Smartphone is a great idea! Thank you so, so much. See you next time. 

We loved our stay here . It's so close to everything you don't need to get a bus tour ticket ! Personal touches like the champagne for my wife as it was her birthday and having  the mobile phone to use was really  helpful 
 communication was outstanding right down to organising taxis for us 

We will be back 100%  

This is an exceptional spot - quiet, very well located with all mod cons including very comfortable beds, couch, excellent showers. I honestly could not fault it. Hosts were flawless too.

This was the nicest AirBnB I have stayed in both from the apartment itself to the little extra that were provided for us.  

The details were amazing, nice bathroom products, the pressure of the shower, the comfortableness of the bedsheets, the quietness of the apartment altogether.  A rare gem! Congrats on providing an exceptional experience at a good price.  Well done.

Lovely, warm, practical and pretty flat. We enjoyed staying on the quieter side of the river so there was no noise at night and we enjoyed the walk across the bridge. Very helpful host and the mobile phone was a useful addition. Thank you!

We loved this apartment! Perfect for two couples or two persons because of the two separat bed- and bathrooms. Thanks for having us!

Communication very easy and quick.
Check in and out very smooth 
Very helpful stuff
The place it's as in the pictures, spacious, clean and very quite.

Great location, totally recommend it 

Stay was amazing. Close to everything, but on the quieter Buda side. Easy access to tram and metro to get where ever you want. Highly recommend this flat!

A great apartment that has been put together in a very thoughtful and stylish way, everything is well done and of lovely quality.  The location, in a very quiet neighbourhood, was perfect for us being within in easy walking distance of the river area, the Chain Bridge and the beautiful Castle/Royal Palace area.  There are a good selection of restaurants/cafes/bars which are again within easy walking distance of the apartment.
Organisation was great too, and the taxi transfers that were arranged were exactly as requested.  Franz is obviously a host who takes a real pride in his apartment.  All in all a lovely stay.  Thank you :)

Fantastic apartment, great location and excellent service / communication from our hosts! Very helpful to offer advice & make arrangements on our behalf (the introduction booklet was very handy, giving you good suggestions on what and where to go). Could not fault them at all, I would highly recommend this apartment.
availability: 2 nights minimum stay.From Dec 29 - 30, 2016 the minimum stay is 1 night.
review_summary: Live Like a King! Superbly located in the Castle district just 120m from the Danube riverbank & 350m from the Chain Bridge. A true gem - This unique luxury & modern flat retains vintage details such as the original stone walls & wooden beam ceilings.
house_rules:
Live like a King (but keep music down after 22.00 :)

- Late check-in fee after 21:00, €15
- Late check-out fee until 19:00 (subject to availability). €25
- Charge for lost or damaged smartphone €150
- Charge for lost keys €50
description:
Live Like a King! Superbly located in the Castle district just 120m from the Danube riverbank & 350m from the Chain Bridge. A true gem - This unique luxury & modern flat retains vintage details such as the original stone walls & wooden beam ceilings.

Up to 4 people can live like Kings & Queens in this truly unique, 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom, luxury vintage apartment. If you're feeling romantic, cosy up to the open-air fireplace with a bottle of wine in the evening.

Located at the foot of the Buda Castle, its just 10 minutes to the top of the Castle district, where you'll find magnificent views of the city from Fisherman's Bastion. Also just a stones throw away are the Danube riverbank and Chain Bridge.

Each bedroom has comfortable custom-made queen size divan beds, and private ensuite / bathrooms featuring vintage tiles and furniture. Just bring your suitcase - A hairdryer, and luxury linens and towels are provided!

The kitchen is fully equipped with modern Electrolux appliances - oven, electric stovetop, toaster, microwave, Samsung digital fridge, and all the equipment needed to cook yourself a gourmet meal.

For coffee lovers there's a Nespresso machine and milk frother - Complimentary capsules are provided, let me know in advance what flavour coffee pods you prefer and I'll try to have them ready for your arrival :)

Chill out in the living room and dining area - There's a 3 seater leather sofa, a dining table that seats 4, relaxing oversize beanbags, custom stained wooden parquet flooring, original stone walls, and wooden beam ceilings.

The apartment is completely private and is entirely yours for the duration of your stay.

Free, high-speed WIFI internet is available throughout the flat.

In addition to the free in-house wifi, the apartment also comes with a guest smartphone with free 4G data, preloaded with useful apps such as translate and maps, to help you stay connected when exploring the city.

- We also provide airport transfer service.Please mention at booking if you'd like one. Your driver will wait for you in arrivals and will be holding a sign with your name
Standard Car - €28 per trip
Executive VIP Saloon (Mercedes E-Class or equivalent) - €47 per trip

As I am mostly away taking care of my guest house at Lake Balaton (Check my profile for more info!), you'll be taken care of by my friend Allan or one of his team members who manage the apartment.

This apartment is an excellent base to start exploring both Buda and Pest.

A UNESCO world heritage site, the Castle District, with its cobblestone streets, the Old Palace, Fishermans Bastion, St Matthias Church, is a must see for visitors to Budapest.

Living on the Buda side of the Danube ensures a relaxing and quiet stay. In just 10 minutes, crossing the Chain bridge you'll find yourself in the heart of lively Pest.

Buda riverside tram 6, and bus 16 and 105 (to Pest) are just 2 minutes walking distance away. Walking across the Chain Bridge (15 minutes) will also take you to Pest.

- Please note that we charge 10 euro for check-ins after 9 PM.

- Please note that we will charge 15 euro for charger loss/damage.

-Please note that we will charge 100 euro if you smoke inside the apartment.

-Please note that we will charge 200 euros in case of smartphone damage.

review_summary:
There is a wonderful love story about Helen and Frank, which makes the atmosphere magical, with antique and modern design interior. There is a queen size double bed and a single bed in the room. You can lock your room with a key.
There are no local people living in the apartment, only for guests. The apartment located in the heart of Budapest, from a walking distance of the Parliament, Morrison's Music Pub, Night life area, Ruin Bars The room is good for couples, singles, friends, and groups.
house_rules: - There are no special house rules, just please do everything like home. In the whole city you need to keep the rules like, please be silence after 8:00pm.  Enjoy your stay:)

reviews_text:
Location is perfect, You can reach the city centre easily. Area is local and you can find local taste. Regarding the location highly recommended. 

Laura has a great apartment, in a great location in Budapest. It was very clean and the beds were super comfy! It was also great to be able to leave our bags in the apartment the day we checked out as we had a evening flight.

Laura is just hands down an excellent host. He is extremely helpful and available when needed, and also offers as much privacy in the stay as your require. The place is in a great calm location, close to shops and the tram and easy to find and get checked in. It's probably the most accommodating place available between location, host, and cost. Room and the flat was really clean.Great stay and travel experience! Thanks Laura!

Pěkné ubytování v centru. Skvělá dostupnost a moc hezký, světlý a prostorný pokoj.

review_summary: My name is Laura Czike I am 45 years old.I have a very nice apartment with two separeted bedrooms with two (URL HIDDEN) my opinion this flat's located is really good for the tourist.If you are intrested, don't hesitate I am waiting for you.
description:
My name is Laura Czike I am 45 years old.I have a very nice apartment with two separeted bedrooms with two (URL HIDDEN) my opinion this flat's located is really good for the tourist.If you are intrested, don't hesitate I am waiting for you.

Budapesting's Palatinus Palace Apartment is a newly renovated (in 2015) beautiful and spacious (90 sm) apartment with 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms on the fifth floor of its building. It is located in the very heart of the city, on the famous Pozsonyi út, right next to the Danube, just around the corner from the House of Parliament.

The apartment is special as it is located just 50 meters from the Danube. The apartment's big windows are letting in a lot of natural light and have nice views.

The other side of the apartment faces the courtyard of the building, its even more calm and faces south with a lot of light. The Lehel utca market is so close that you can even do your everyday morning shopping there, it has all the famous Hungarian delicies and fresh fruits, vegetables.

The apartment can accommodate 8 people in its 2 bedrooms with 3 king size double beds, and 2 single beds.

The dining table can sit 8 people so you can all have dinner, breakfast together.

Of course all the necessary bedding are free of charge (fresh sheets, blankets, pillows, towels as many as you like).

It’s on the 5th of the building but there is a newly refurbished elevator in the building.

The apartment has amazing views of the city's skyline as it is on the top floor of a higher building, you can have your morning coffee at the terrace of the apartment enjoying the sunrise the clouds and beautiful Budapest.

Upon arrival we wait for you in the apartment with your key, a map and some other useful information for your stay in Budapest. When you have put down your luggage we will sit down with you and explain the most important things you should know to make your stay more comfortable, like:

- best restaurants, bars, cafes, breakfast places

- best bath houses and museums

- most important and interesting sights and areas to visit

- public transport and taxi system

- where to exchange money

- where are the closest supermarkets, and 24H shops

After all the explanation we disappear until you leave but will be there for you to help in anything like booking a table at a restaurant or if you have any question, you just email, sms, call us and we answer all possible questions and help in any kind of problems.

It is important to know that you can arrive anytime, it is not a problem if you arrive with a flight or train even at 23.55, check in is from noon and on the day you leave you have to pack your luggage until 11.00, but you can keep your luggage at a safe place during the day in case you leave only later from Budapest.

We can pick you up by car at the airport for a fee of 29EUR.

You can use internet in the apartment free of charge of course and of course the use of laundry is free too. My brother can rent bikes for you too, it costs about 7EUR/day and they bring them to the apartment and you can give it back to them also at the flat when you wish.

The Újlipótváros (13th district), where the apartment is located is one of the most popular districts by locals, still its very central, it is located in the oldest part of Budapest's downtown, it has a very rich history and Jewish background, its located next to the Margaret Bridge, it is amazing to stroll on the beautiful streets or just have a coffee at a small corner coffee shop, every corner of the district offers you a new surprise and if you walk to the Danube it has beautiful views of the Margaret Island and the Castle Hill, which is just across the river, and the Margaret Bridge, and the Margaret Island are all located in the Újlipótváros area, just a few minutes away from the apartment.

Szent István tér and Pozsonyi út with many good bars, restaurants and cafes is around the corner from the the Basilica Corner Apartment.

Sights next to the Palatinus Palace Apartment: House of  Parliament, Margaret Island + any of the other sights of the city within 15 minutes walk.

The closest bathhouses: Lukács Baths and Veli Bej Baths, both accessible on foot within 10 minutes.

Near the building downstairs: 24 hours supermarket, coffee shop, local restaurants, pharmacy, exchange office.

The apartment has very good public transportation connection, as it is located next to the very central JASZAI MARI TER tram station, from where you can access the entire city and get there easily with tram 4/6 from the airport and main railway stations of the city. There are many more buses like bus 9 and the trolley bus family stopping next door.

There is 24H bus connection next to the apartment too.

The most important rule is to not to disturb the others living in the building and we take this serious, our apartments are located in buildings where the locals from Budapest are living, old people, babies sick and healthy, so the travelers who come and stay in our apartment should respect the building, the people and the most important part of it is not to be loud in the common areas and in the apartment after 8PM, of course you can stay out in the city as long as you wish, just please be very quite returning home and do not party in the apartment, this is the most important thing to share.

reviews_text:
Flora's apartment is a beautiful, modern, and extremely well equipped little hideaway! Her directions on how to get to the apartment and retrieve the key were very clear and easy! We didn't have to arrange a meet up time or drag our luggage around town and the key was available to us at the apartment. The apartment is really comfortable and located very close to beautiful sights such as the Fisherman's Bastion, and is right across the water from the Parliament building which lights up at night and is stunning! The apartment is a 2-5 minute walk from restaurants with great ratings on trip advisor as well as a convenience store that is open late for some basic groceries and snacks! Also, we were about a 20 minute walk from pretty much any major sight we wanted to see, but were lucky enough to be on the quiet side of the river and could escape the hustle and bustle to get a good night's rest after a night at the ruin bar! All around a lovely, comfortable stay! I definitely recommend this to anyone visiting Budapest!

Everything was great. The apartment and location were awesome.

Best air B and B we have ever stayed in. It was perfect. Perfect location, perfect apartment. I would highly recommend it for your stay in Budapest.


It's a very good accommodation experience. Thank you~

Our stay at Flora's apartment was absolutely wonderful! The apartment is stunning - simply amazing! Its located in the Castle District with amazing walking routes nearby. Communication with Flora was excellent - thank you very much! We would come back anytime. 

Beautiful apartment in a perfect location, right under the castle/old town. Communication with Flora was very easy and the arrival went smoothly. We had a wonderful stay and I would most definitely recommend this place to anyone visiting Budapest! 

very nice apartment, full of light, quiet, clean, unique furniture, good heating. fotos give realistic impressions. communication with hosts fast, flawless, friendly, reliable. very good organization of check-in and check-out, flexible hours. helpful informations on hand, even a lonely planet on the desk ... I would always come back here. lovely place!

This is a fantastic AirBNB place, located just near the chain bridge. The apartment is beautiful with large living area and kitchen, has one bedroom but also a couch that folds out into a double bed in the living area. We did not meet Flora but she gave really clear instructions on how to enter the apartment. She also really quickly to any questions we had and also organised an airport transfer for us. There was lots of tourist info in the flat. Highly recommend Flora's place! 


I was in town for a wedding and Flora's place was perfect.  It was a great location and had everything I needed.  The place is updated and comfortable.

The host canceled this reservation 76 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

reviews_text:
