Very cosy stay!

Favourite air b n b I've stayed in , George and his team were very friendly and helpful hosts would definitely stay again 

Nice apartment, perfect for at least a weekend stay. It's spacious, comfortable and well furnished.

Had a small problem with transfer from BUD airport to the flat, however that was resolved quickly. Arriving at this amazing flat completely made up for that, well maintained, decorated and had all that one would need for a comfortable stay. Central location and very walkable to all the main attractions. Had an amazing stay in Budapest and thank you George!

It is so beautiful, fresh and new - feels like home! I love it! Everything is exactly like on the pictures. There is so much space. Next time I am renting an Airbnb in Budapest, I will stay here again!

Amazing apartment in a great location. We loved our stay in Budapest. 

Our stay at the apartment was absolutely superb. I cannot recommend the apartment and the agency enough - the apartment itself is huge, wonderfully designed, spotlessly clean and even towels were provided. The area is very central with lots of nice cafes around.
Many thanks for making our stay so wonderful - we would come back anytime! 


Such a beautiful apartment in a great area. Metro was 5mins away with a great Italian on the corner of the street and Heroes square and the baths a walking distance. George was at hand to answer any questions we had in good time and the apartment was just perfect. 

Gorgeous apartment -- clean and spacious and in a great location. We loved staying here and would highly recommend it to others!

Great apt in a great area- perfekt to visit the city- clean, near the metro an supermarkets
review_summary: My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).
description:
My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).

This cozy apartment is wonderfully located in the 6th district (one of the most central district of the city). You will be few minutes away by foot from the famous Oktogon square and Andrássy avenue is just around the corner (the Hungarian "Champs Elysées”), the Danube and the Chain Bridge are a short walk away, the famous Szimpla kert is very close too, and the Buda Castle is a 15 minute travel. This is the best location you could possibly get in Budapest.

The neighborhood is trendy and lively, crowded with bars, cafés, shops, supermarkets, and public gardens. There is a 24/7 supermarket close to the the building. Restaurants and confectionaries, such as the famous Szimpla are a few blocks away. Dob street leads straight into the Váci street, the main fashion shopping street in Budapest, with souvenir stores and breath-taking architecture.  The "Budapest Eye" ferris wheel stands right in the Erzsébet Square in the summertime. Public transportation (subway, trams, and buses) leave directly from the square (Déak Tér stop), and there are bicycle rental stations nearby. Guided tours leave from every nearby square. The airport shuttle arrives/departs straight from the square as well. The Zrínyi street is host to several nightclubs and bars, including Kraft, Ötkert, Nomuri, and Divino. We will give you suggestions of the best places to make the most of your stay, whether you want to eat, drink, have a coffee, or party! 

Have a look at the guide on this page, it references the main attractions in the city center around the apartment.

"Subway: Kodály körönd (M1 subway lines), 
Trams: Line 2 (Runs adjacent to Danube), Line 47, 49
Railway Stations: 3 stops by metro from Nyugati Railway Station, 2 stops by metro from Keleti Railway Station
Buses: Buses to the castle area, Hop-On Hop-Off buses"

reviews_text:
We had a wonderful stay! Ludwig met us at the apartment and showed us everything. Agota was available to email all through the trip and even booked us a taxi back to the airport. The location was perfect for seeing everything we wanted to and the apartment has everything we needed. 
Would definitely recommend to others looking for a city break in Budapest! Wrap up warm! 

We had an amazing stay in this apartment! István showed us in and was incredibly welcoming. He made sure that we knew how everything worked and on top of that, there was food, fruit and water waiting for us. The apartment is in a very convenient location, with restaurants and public transport nearby. Super comfortable studio with all the amenities we required. Definitely recommend this place!! 

Everything was perfect!!!  The apartment exceed our expectations,  room is even bigger than on photos. Big comfortable bad, all necessary equipment - teapot,  microwave,  fridge,  hair dryer... A lot of towels,  soap, shampoo,  and even teeth brushes. When we checked in a variety of fruits was waiting for us,  it was so nice)))  and we had access to maps and guides. And there was flowers and Christmas staff near the entrance to apartment,  in the evening we saw candels. The location was also perfect - 2 minutes walk to St Istvan Basilica. 
Next time we visit Budapest,  we will stay here again!  
And a big thanks to Istvan,  who met us,  he is the kindest man I've ever seen ❤

The apartment was brilliant, the location allowed us to explore Budapest without the hassle of public transport. Bars and restaurants were literally around the corner and the castle was only a 20 minute walk away! 
The apartment itself was cosy and offered all the amenities we required during our stay! 
I would definitely recommend to a friend and hope to visit again soon! 

The room was very convenient to the main places to visit, it was very private and we thoroughly enjoyed our visit.   The shower and toilet are very cramped but adequate 

Ludwig and Agota are really good hosts, their apartment is really nice, perfectly located and it has all the amenities and equipment one could desire. They were extremely helpful and very fast at replying to our calls or messages. All in all, this was a perfect stay at a perfect apartment with perfect hosts! Thank you for sharing this apartment with us and thanks for everything! :)

It's a wonderful flat, with an excellent location in the main street of the Budapest. 

The flat is wonderful, full equiped and ideally situated. We were very well received. If you are 2 and you want to go to Budapest, choose this one ! 

Ludwig, the owner and Istavn, the neighbor are very friendly and nice, if you need anything just text Ludwig or knock at Istvan's window! The apartment is perfectly situated, well stocked and nicely decorated! Although it is situated on one of Budapest's main roads, it is very quite and safe. Would definitely recommend this apartment for everyone (also a little child bed is available, if needed) and would come back! 
Thanks to Ludwig and Istvan =)

We had a great stay here. We were met by her dad, he stayed to show us how to work everything and he made sure we could do it. The beds were comfortable, the place is incredibly cute. The location was amazing! Across from the opera and the metro, we had a great time. Would recommend.
review_summary: Apartment Dora is a smart 35m2 studio in the absolute center of Budapest, located on the main avenue of the city. The apartment offers compact living at its best. Sleep comfortable in this beautiful, quiet house and enjoy waking up in the heart of Budapest.
house_rules: Please respect the neighbours! Try not to talk too loud when entering the yard or the staircase.
description:
Apartment Dora is a smart 35m2 studio in the absolute center of Budapest, located on the main avenue of the city. The apartment offers compact living at its best. Sleep comfortable in this beautiful, quiet house and enjoy waking up in the heart of Budapest.

Even though the apartment is small it has everything you need. The multifunctional bar table is fully equipped with a TV, a dishwasher and a washing machine. The kitchen offers you the possibilities to cook everything from both smaller to bigger meals. Sleep comfortable in our 180 cm wide bed.

The apartment is located on the main boulevard of Budapest, which is part of the UNESCO's World Heritage. You are in walking distance to the Hungarian State Opera, the St. Stephen Basilica, the Great Synagogue, the old Jewish quarter, Gozsdu Court and the main shopping street, Váci utca. Even tough the apartment is right in the middle of the center, surrounded with lots of restaurants and bars it's really quiet. You can enjoy waking up every morning in this beautiful, quiet house facing the gorgeous courtyard even though you are in the middle of the city.

Apartment Dora is located in the beginning of Andrássy út, just a three minute walk from the Hungarian State Opera. All the famous sights the Pest side of Budapest has to offer are in walking distance from the apartment. 

Just a few meters from the front door you can easily connect with metro line 1. 

You are just a few streets away from Budapests famous jewish district and the Great Synagogue, where you will also find Budapests famous restaurants, ruinpubs and rooftop bars.

The apartment is on the ground floor of a historical building from 1883 built during the Austrian-Hungarian Monarchy. And the house is located on Andrássy avenue which is part of UNESCO's world heritage site.

reviews_text:
Nice cosy flat in a lively and lovely neighborhood (kiraly utca). It was clean and everything needed inside.  

Very nice accommodation for two people, directly in the centre, 10 min from subway. Adrienn was very communicative, responding immediately. If you are looking for a nice place to stay in Budapest, I recommend this one! 

The location of this flat is amazing, right in the center of town. There's plenty of bars and restaurants all around the area, it's in the middle of everything.

It's on a private courtyard, so even when it's busy right outside on the street, it's nice and quiet inside. The room can be a little dark, there's only a small window above the door, and the door itself has some frosted glass that lets in light too.

The bed (really just a mattress) is up on a loft above the main room, and is pretty comfortable.

The kitchen is in the main room, and there's plenty of dishes, pots, pans etc. There's an electric double hotplate on the counter for cooking, which is functional but don't expect to cook masterpieces here. Fridge and washer both work as expected (no dryer though).

The bathroom is small but everything works, water pressure and heat are both great.

There's a small table and two chairs in the main room, great for meals. Unfortunately no couch or armchairs, so lounging isn't really possible except up on the loft bed.

There's plenty of storage to unpack your things, shelves and a dresser and some hangers and hooks.

Adrienn's place is a great location to be amongst the vibe of the city, while also being able to retreat to a cozy quiet home when it's time to sleep. Her place was perfect for me, and would definitely stay her again. Adrienn was attentive with communication and made sure I was happy throughout the stay. I definitely recommend this place!

The flat was a bit smaller than we expected,but big enough for 2persons and really nice.It is also pretty close to some of the atractions and if it hadn't been raining most of the time,we wouldn't have used the taxi or the metro.
If you tend to be the not-so-quiet type you could consider either being quiet or searching for another place since the walls are pretty thin.We could sometimes hear our neighbours' morning routine and talk,but the place is overall really  quiet.
We didn't meet the owner,but she replied quickly to our texts and even allowed us to have an earlier check in.

cozy apartment and great location to enjoy the beautiful city of Budapest.  Nice and helpful host.

Feeling like home 

We loved staying here! The pictures don't do the flat justice; it was more spacious than we thought it would be, especially the bed upstairs which was very comfy. We never met Adrienn but we didnt need to; all communication was fantastic, good instructions to find the flat, wifi was excellent, washing machine was good and drying space was ample. Great value for money too :)

Super nice and centrally located apartment, perfect for a long weekend. We had a great time in Budapest! 

Absolutely great location and lovely little place. Everything clean and welcoming for our stay. Very hot during the night however so be prepared.

Tolle Unterkunft in bester Lage! Adrienn haben wir leider nicht getroffen, aber ihre Beschreibung und Hinweise waren einwandfrei, um alles zu finden. Sie hat uns außerdem darauf hingewiesen, dass gleich in der Nähe ein Gepäckaufbewahrungsservice ist, den wir genutzt haben, da am Tag des Check outs neue Gäste angereist sind und wir unser Gepäck nicht länger in der Wohnung lassen konnten. Adrienn ist super hilfsbereit und ihre Wohnung perfekt für ein langes Wochenende.
availability: On Fridays and Saturdays the minimum stay is 2 nights.

The emplacement is the best in the city and the neighbourhood is so quite, so we were very pleased to stay in the Kitti and Viktor's apartment. We strogly recommend it!!!!


The flat is central, warm and cozy just like the photos. Kitti is very responsive and helpful as a good host must be. I recomend.

Incredible good attention. Until now, for two years in Airbnb, my best experience has been with Kitti and Viktor. Care to the last detail. 

This is a lovely little apartment within walking distance of the city center. Very welcoming and knowledgeable hosts. I would highly recommend.

Thanks for the great time in Budapest 

We were welcomed very well. 
The apartment looked as nice and comfortable as on the photos. 
The location and the neighbourhood was very convenient since we had all  we need close by and always enjoyed coming back 'home' after a long day trip :) 

Very nice apartment and close to the central parts of Budapest . I really recommend it . 

Very Nice Apartment in Central Location. Flat worked perfectly for 3 Persons. Would also fit for 4 Persons. Kitti was very Kind and offered many Different Insider Tips and recomendations. The Communication worked perfectly. 
I recommend that Place 100%. 

This apartment was perfect for our 3-night stay in Budapest, and Kitti was a great host. The flat was very clean and plenty spacious for the two of us. The location was a short walk to the restaurants and bars in the city center and convenient to public transportation for getting to Buda for sightseeing. Kitti had some great recommendations for dining and even messaged us to let us know about a festival in the area. Overall, definitely recommend! 

First of all - Kitti is a perfect host. She made our stay easy and without any problems. Detailed instructions, maps, advices, etc. were very helpful and lovely. Kitti replied immediately to each letter and each question. 

Flat is nice in a cute yard. Everything necessary was inside. Even tea and coffee were in the kitchen. Location is good - close to the Andrassy street. 

The only bad thing was with the parking. We did not know rules so good and had a fine about 11eur for the parking near the house (we did not pay for the parking). 

Whole description of the flat is 100% truth. The flat is super for a couple.
availability: 3 nights minimum stay.From Dec 10, 2016 - Jan 31, 2017 the minimum stay is 2 nights.
review_summary: Bright flat with original parquet floor and high ceiling.
description:
Bright flat with original parquet floor and high ceiling.

Welcome to Retro Retreat Budapest! A light, spacious one bedroom flat with high ceilings, original parquet flooring and traditional tile chimney stove opening up into a bright & quiet courtyard.

Should you have any special requirements please let us know and we will be happy to assist. 

Please note this is a strictly non-smoking flat. 

To make your stay as relaxed as possible, the flat is equipped with all the essentials:

-WiFi
-radio
-hairdryer
-iron/ironing board
-microwave
-washing machine with dryer
-fully equipped kitchen

The bedroom has a double bed with Egyptian cotton bedding and the living room has a comfortable double sofa bed. 
Retro Retreat Budapest is perfect for a couple or a group up to four people. 

Budapest is a city rich in culture and history, which the Magyarok are very proud of. Our flat aims to reflect some of this heritage, and we hope you delight in its treasures, retrieved from Nagyika’s (Grandmother’s) attic. 

The flat is situated in the popular VII. District of Budapest, just 20 minutes walk from the river Duna (Danube). There is a lush green park a stone’s throw away on Almássy Tér (Almássy Square), where you can sit and enjoy freshly baked pastries from the local bakery. Zeke Pékség makes traditional favourites. We recommend the black cherry and cottage cheese filled pastry (meggyes túrós kalács). Finom! (Delicious!) 

We hope you have a wonderful stay and enjoy discovering the unique place that is Budapest.

Neighborhood:  
-Metro 2 (Blaha Lujza Tér), Metro 1 (Vörösmarty Utca-Andrássy Út), 
-Trolley 74 and 76, 
-Bus 7, 5, 112, 
-Tram 4, 6.

review_summary: My place is close to City Centre, 2 min by walk to Corvin- Negyed Metro and Tram station. You can go to the Central Market (5-10 min walking). It's next to Applied Arts Museum, National Museum.. You’ll love my place because of the ambiance, it's really close to pubs and restaurants, the light, the neighbourhood... My place is good solo adventurers, business travelers and couples (have an extra mattress)

reviews_text:
This is a very nice apartment. We didn't have any problem finding it, the location was perfect. The apartment is very spacious and comfortable, exactly like in the pictures. It is very clean and has all basic stuff a person needs. We enjoyed our staying. Eszter was very easy to communicate with and a nice host. I would certainly recommend this appartment.

Everything was super awesome. THX Eszter. 

Communication were good. From the airport it is about an hour on a bus and the metro.  (I had to take a taxi to the airport to catch my flight. It was 40 euros from the apartment.) It was a little confusing to find the main street coming out of the metro as it is very large but after about 30 minutes of walking I found it. (Note: I recommend taking exit “A” out of the metro and then just walking along Katona Jozsef several blocks until you hit the street. This is much easier than trying to find Szant Istvan.) Eszter met me and showed me to the apartment. Note: where were some drunk me around the building and the street and there is public urination. This is not a reflection on the apartment but just so you know what to expect. A female colleague who lives in the neighborhood said this was just typical and I did see a lot of other drunk men in other parts of the city I visited so it would not deter me from staying here again and I never felt unsafe. There are lots of nice businesses on the street but I think it is just common to have people on the street. The apartment is very clean but without much decoration so it feels little sterile. However, everything works well, good wifi, and the location is good. One reason I booked here was to be able to run on Margaret Island and it will really nice, plus there is a gym where you can workout for about 4 Euro. You are also close to St. Stephen’s Basilica and the Parliament building. There are also lots of small but nice supermarkets in the neighborhood.  I had to work the entire time I was there and could not do much but it is a nice location adn I recommend Eszter and her apartment. 

Eszter welcomed us on Sunday Evening. She invited us for a nice drink at the restaurant at the street corner "The Blue Tomato"  with her husband. We spoke about many subject just as old friends. She had prepared for us coffee, bread, butter and jam in the kitchen for the 3 breakfasts. The building is very nice, with Art Deco Facade and the appartement is warm, clean, and very spacious. Wifi works very well and it's a high speed connection system. The neighborhood is great too, with all the facilities (transport, restaurants, shopping center, historical sites, cinemas). Thanks a lot Ezster and hope to see you again.


We stayed in Eszters apartment after the Christmas days through new year 2015/16. The apartment is clean,  with basic equipment, the apartment is located very central, close to Donau, parlament, tram no. 2 and other significant public transportation, in a quiet neighbourhood with local atmosphere, shops and restaurants. We would definitely recommend the apartment and the neighborhood. Eszter are friendly and reliable, and willing to assist in any questions.0

We had great days in Budapest and in Eszter's flat. It is very tidy and clean. The localization of the flat is perfect. Everything was good, Eszter is a great host, she answers quickly and she is very helpful. Thank you very much. I won't hesitate to come again ! 

Eszter is a perfect host. The place was clean and tidy. Near the parliament. The couch it's very well. Wifi works perfect and she had no problem helping me with my change of plans. So patience. Budapest its beautiful if I come back of course I'll be in the Quiet Oasis! 

She helps our check in and answers all our questions promptly so we are very comfortable. Apartment is very big and in good location to see all the sightseeing area by foot if you like to walk. Only down side for us (we are there for 6days) is that kitchen facility are aged and missing because we hope to make many dishes(has all the basic stuff) other than that, it's all good and good value for price.

My friend and I really felt at home in Eszter's flat. It is clean, light and comfortable, just like on the photos. It's close to nearly everywhere in a walking distance, but also busses, tram and metro are nearby. The contact to Eszter was always quick, easy and very friendly.  If in the future I should come back to Budapest, this is my place to stay!

Great place to stay in BP. Very close to public transport. Surely recommend to stay here.
house_rules:
Please don't disturb other residents after 22:00 by being very loud
- If something is damaged, let me know, so that I can replace it
- Please take care of the apartment as you would of your own
- No smoking is allowed inside the apartment
- If there are any problems with any of the facilities, please let me know asap
description:
We offer a cosy, medium sized appartment for two people. It has a balcony facing the street, a fully equipped mini kitchen with foldaway dining table, fridge, toaster, kettle. The bathroom has a tub and toilet. The room has a dining table, that can also be used as a work area. The corner sofa is convertable to a very comfortable bed for two. The room is very well lit, with lots of sunshine. The flat is on the first floor, the building has an elevator. It is close to the city center, very easily accessed via public transport, yet very quiet.

Facilities:
-Clean bed linen and towels 
-Microwave owen 
-Refrigerator 
-Kettle 
-Toaster 
-Wireless high speed internet  

You can rent a bike just in front of the building. Face: molbubi

There are a lot of nice restaurants and cafés nearby. You can also find grocery stores (some 24/7), pharmacies, a big market, ATM, shops and specialized boutiques. Pozsonyi street, which is two streets away, is worth a trip because of its special atmosphere, cafés and bookstores.
All touristic attractions are easily reachable. The Grand Boulevard is one corner away. On this corner is the Comedy Theatre, that has an impressive, elegant, late 19th century building. 
The St. Stephen park or the Margaret Island is 5 minutes away. The famous ruin pubs of the 7th district are 20 minutes away. The Buda side can be accessed via the tram, through the Margaret bridge in just two stops. The Buda Castle is 20 minutes away, while the Gellért Hill is 30 minutes.

How can you get to the apartment from the airport by public transport?
1.Take the bus 200E from Ferihegy to Kobanya Kispest.
2.Take the Metro (M3) from Kobanya Kispest to Nyugati tér.  
3.From Nyugati tér, walk along Szt István körút (the Bouleward where the tram goes), towards the Margaret bridge. The third street on the right is Pannónia street.
It takes about 55min.

If you arrive to Keleti palyaudvar (station), you can get to the apartment:
1.Take the metro (M2) from Keleti palyaudvar to Deak Ferenc ter.
2.Take the Metro (M3) from Deak ter to Nyugati palyaudvar. 
3.From Nyugati palyaudvar (Nyugati ter), walk along Szt István körút (the Boulevard where the tram goes), towards the Margaret bridge. The third street on the right side is Pannónia street. 

Please let me know if you have any questions, concerns or requests. You will receive my response quickly and I will do my best to make your stay in Budapest wonderful!

review_summary:
Funhouse Comfort is located in the beautiful Palota District, in the very heart of the historical Budapest. With the party district  (including the most famous ruin bars, pubs and streetfood places) only a few hundred meters away we can say that this apartment is located in the center, yet not on a busy street. 
Sightseeing, going out and enjoying Budapest only by walking, then having a good night sleep in a kingsize bed with good matraces... that is our offer :)
Come and stay with us!!!
description:
Funhouse Comfort is located in the beautiful Palota District, in the very heart of the historical Budapest. With the party district  (including the most famous ruin bars, pubs and streetfood places) only a few hundred meters away we can say that this apartment is located in the center, yet not on a busy street. 
Sightseeing, going out and enjoying Budapest only by walking, then having a good night sleep in a kingsize bed with good matraces... that is our offer :)
Come and stay with us!!!

About the apartment:
Our brand new cosy apartment got completely renovated in June 2016.
It is a whole flat just under your control :)
The apartment has a big (180x200) kingsize bed with proper matraces to ensure that you can have a good night sleep, so we can host a maximum of 2 guests.
There is a completely equipped kitchen, with 2 sets of everything, microwave owen, a dual electiral heater and the needed pans as well.
We grant you fresh towels and everything for the good sleep. We have a washing machine so you can clean your clothes if you need to.

About the house:
As this is a very old historical house, the inner height is above 4 meters, so we created an inner floor for the bedroom. Both inner floors are completely comfortable and standing height (most of the time more then 4m), the stairs are big and wide, so it is absolutely convinient to walk up and down.
The house itself is the oldest house in the street, and back then at the end of the 19th century it was a luxory resort built buy the citys major to host himself and his family. The guy was called Szentkiralyi Moric, and the street where the house is located, got named after him. We have a big tree in the middle of garden of the house, which got planted by the granddaughter of Moric more then a hundred years ago.

You will have your own keys, and noone else can access the apartment.
You have your own shower, toilet, kitchen, and everything what you can see on the pictures.

Our policy is to have at least one personal interaction with our guests, so we can make sure that you arrived safe and everything is ok with the apartment.
On top of that you can always reach us through phone, sms, email, etc.

It is fair to say that the apartment is in the center. The main rules about things in Budapest are pretty easy:
- Most of things are in Pest, Buda is more residential and there are basically two things to check there: the Castle and the Geller Hill. But those are must sees :)
- Pest is basically divided by half rings. If you look at the map it becomes pretty easy to understand. The big circle called "Hungaria ring", and that is more the industrial area. Almost everything what is interesting in Pest is located inside the 2nd ring, which is called the "Grand Boulevard", it goes from Margit bridge to Petofi bridge. And then we have the "Small Boulevard" which is basically the very center of the city. The apartment is located between the Small and the Grand, closer to the Small Boulevard.
It is very close to the "Party district" which is the most vibrant part of the city, full of bars, ruin pubs and very nice streetfood places (the party district is basically that part of the VII-th district that is located between the Small and the Grand Boulevard. Our apartment is on the very border of the VII-th and the VIII-th. So you need to walk roughly 400m-s to be in the vibrant place, but yet you can still sleep in a more relaxed area, called the "Palota District" which used to be the richest area of the city 150 years ago, so its full of very nice buildings.
Bottom line: the center of Budapest is rather small, everything is in walking distance. You can grab your bag in the morning, have a good coffe, and then just walk around very easily, as you are right there :)
Some key spots, and the distance of them from our apartment according to (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN):
- Nepliget Bus Station - 35min with Metro line 2 (blue line)
- National Museum - 300m, 2mins walk
- The Grand Synagog - 500m, 7mins walk 
- Simpla Kert, the most famous bar in Budapest - 750m, 8mins walk
- Gozsdu Garden, the best bars in the city - 850m, 10mins walk
- Deak Square, the very very center and best open space bars - 1000m, 11mins walk
- The Danube Riverfront - 1500m, 15mins walk
- The Castle, for this you may want to catch a bus, but still it is much better on foot - 2,9km, 35mins walk

Some usefull places around:
- Supermarket - we have Spar on the corner of the Szentkiralyi and Rakoczi str, some 200m walking
- We have a pharmacy on Rakoczi str, next to the Spar some 250m walking
Finally some recommendations on what to do and where to eat, nearby:
- Best cheap streetfood - Bors Gastrobar
- Best bistro restaurant - Fricska
- Best coctail - Farm Gastrobar
- Best pub (elected by tripadvisor as best in the WORLD) - Szimpla Kert
- Best winebar - DiVino in Gozsdu or DiVino next to the Basilica
- Best coffee - Budapest Baristas
- Best todo in the morning - Grand marketplace, next to Fovam square
- Best todo in the afternoon - Climb the Gellert hill and watch the sunset from the Citadell
The metro line 3, 4 is just 2 minutes far.

How to get here?
0. The address again:
1088 Budapest, Szentkirályi str. 10. 
It is in the VIII-th district.

1. From the airport:
If you arrive before lets say 11pm, you can come by public transport. 
Catch the 200E bus (the only bus :) from the AP), and get to "KOKI Terminal", which is the last station. There you get on the Blue metroline (Line 2), and come to "Kalvin Ter" stop. From there we are in walking distance. This will cost you two tickets, so around 2 EUR per person.
If you arrive by the night, or you are not on extreme budget, you can come buy taxi, which will cost you around 20-25 EUR. Taxis in the airport and heavily controlled, so you don't have to be affraid of pirates.

2. By Bus:
Most probably you will arrive to the "Nepliget Terminal". There you get on the Blue metroline (Line 2), and come to "Kalvin Ter" stop. From there we are in walking distance. This will cost you two tickets, so around 2 EUR per person.

3. By car
Just type in the address to your GPS, it will get to the right place.
You can park on the street easily, but it is a pay zone from 8am to 8pm, and the tariff is the highest class, as we are in the center :( 440 HUF per hour, some 1,3 EUR per hour.
There is a guarded parking place next to our house as well, on Brody Sandor str. Here: (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)"E.

4. By train:
Most probably you will arrive to "Keleti station".
From there you can take plenty of different busses to our apartment:
(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN). You can buy tickets on the bus or in any kiosk.
One trip will cost you 1 EUR.

How to move around?
1. Easiest is for sure: by foot! Everything is so close, and you can catch the vibe much better.
2. You can get a Budapest Card (URL HIDDEN) with free public transport and multiple free entrances included
3. You can just buy a big bunch of tickets and move around as needed by our superior public transport system, called BKV (URL HIDDEN)
4. You can rent a bike from our BUBI system (URL HIDDEN)

Who are we and what is the FunHouse group?
This is a family owned business, ran by Lilla and Akos (Thats us :) ) a young couple working in the IT industry. We travel a lot, and been to a lot of places around the globe, so we know exactly what a traveled needs. We decided to start our own apartments here in Budapest, and they prooved to be a success :)
If you stay in one of the members of the FunHouse group you will always have the same experience driven the following core values:
- Central location, main attractions in a waling distance, yet not on a busy street to ensure a good night sleep
- "Life tested", which means that we spent several weeks in every apartment as a guest of our own, to fine tune the details, and find out what you would need as a guest
- Designed by us, we don't believe in mass production living spaces, so all of the apartments are finished and decorated by us, so you will always have the personal touch that makes things a bit unique

reviews_text:
This flat is absolutely nice, clean and comfortable, and the area is very safe. It's excellent location enabled us to reach every important sights within minutes. Julia and Abel were very kind and helpful host. I really recommend it.

Nice flat in a perfect area of Budapest. Flat is bigger then what I expected and was very well equipped. There was even some good coffee and good tea, something I love.
The only drawback, for what Julia can't do anything: the heating is centralized, which means that you can't regulated it on your own. For my taste the heating was too warm and I needed to open the windows regularly to get some cold air inside (central heating is something typical in Budapest). 

I would absolutely recommend Julia's place to anyone spending some time in Budapest. It was an easy walk to two different metro stations, and was a great base for exploring the city. You're right on the Danube! My hosts were responsive and attentive and the apartment was great.

Good location and cominication with the host. Julia and Abel were friendly and helping, answering quickly and in detail. Overall possitive experience.


Highly recomended.

My stay at Julia's lovely flat has been absolutely amazing. The moment I entered the flat I was so happy. It had everything I needed and more. The flat is cosy, yet spacious, nicely decorated and very clean. The neighbourhood is also perfect. The flat is perfectly located. I was able to walk anywhere I needed; and for those who do not want to walk, then the public transportation is really close as well. I felt really safe in the area even quite late at night.
Abel, who welcomed me inside the house upon my arrival and also who let me out, was very helpful. Communication with him was very easy. Both Julia and Abel were very helpful throughout my stay. So thank you both very much. I recommend the flat to everyone and I would definetely very happily stay there again.  
Köszönöm!

Although I was not able to meet Julia, she was very helpful in providing all information necessary to make my trip one of ease. The apartment is beautiful and in a fantastic location within walking distance of all ideal placed in Budapest city.

The apartment is a very clean and pleasant one. Its excellent location enabled us to reach every important sights within minutes. Julia is a very kind host and when she is not there, her agent is also very helpful and patient. Always available to help and give information. I would recommend this apartment to everyone.

Julia was an incredible host, even though we did not meet. Her communication was absolutely top shelf, and her emails exuded kindness and thoroughness. Her friend Abel helped me check in and out, and he too was very helpful. They were both understanding about the limitations on my phone and wifi while I was traveling around, which I appreciated! The apartment itself is lovely and comfortable, and in a very nice neighborhood that is central to heading out to many places (try the Hungarikum Bistro just around the corner at the very least!). Everything was in beautiful working order, and ready for a guest. I ended my trip here and felt very happy in the space, re-grouping and resting before heading home.

Probably one of the best flats I ever stayed in - and one of the best AirBnB experiences. Julia was a great, thoughtful, and considerate host. The flat is in a fantastic location, right be the river, just round the corner from the Parliament. All major city attractions are within walking distance - and there is also good access to public transport. We really enjoyed the little coffee shop downstairs - and cake from the raw vegan restaurant round the corner. The flat is just great - everything you need is there, there is plenty of space for yourself and your belongings, and there are a lot of thoughtful little touches (coffee, spices, bin bags,extra pillows, maps of the city). We also really loved your decoration and artwork. Check-in etc. was a breeze, Julia and Abel were always available (and had no problem dealing with delayed flights). Overall, we had a great time!

Perfect stay

The flat itself is great, nice and clean - a little chilly when we were there (late October) but nothing terrible. Really nice apartment and perfect for a few days in Budapest. Really clean and has everything you need. Host is helpfull and everything is good organized.

We have had a great time at Tamas' appartement. Everything was like described ... good price and good location. Although we did not meet Tamas in person everything went smoothly with our arrival and departure. Thanks.

First of all we are very.. very satisfied being guest of Tamas in his apartment! The flat is comfortable and tastefully arranged and equipped. Fully-equipped kitchen, clean bathroom with awesome showers and comfortable bed – that’s all necessary to spend great holiday-time in Budapest. Some extra cool staff is probably the broadest staircase in the building I’ve ever seen!:) Thank you very much Tamas!

description:
Comfortable, Berlin style mixed with Hungarian folk art studio flat just 8 minutes walking distance from the city's central road - Erzsébet körût. Good for having rest in the city park but in the meantime being just on the corner of the downtown.

The apartment is newly renovated and 452 Sq Ft / 42 Sq M large. 
The heart of the flat is the kitchen on the two sides with two rooms. One of it is a bedroom with a kingsize bed, the other is a living room with two single beds. 
* If there are more than 2 persons of you, then the other 2 sleep in the living room on the singles.

The guests have everything that for an everyday life or for a perfect holiday is needed. A fully equipped kitchen with oven, coffee machine, electric dishwasher, toaster etc...

High speed wireless internet is included. 

The tv is able to play media files, has english and german broadcasts and CHROMECAST connection.

We are always there in case you need any help. Feel free to contact us via mail, phone or personal.

The city park is very close, which is a good place for doing sport, or just walking a bit. You can find a Zoo, the Luna park and a great thermal bath (SZÉCHENYI FÜRDÔ) there. It is in walking distance, takes about 10 minutes to get there. Like getting to one of the most famous square to the Heroes square...

There is only one street where the parking is free. Unfortunately it is full most of the time.  But there are several garages around and on the street pay parking is possible.

reviews_text:
Wow!!  What a great Airbnb experience!!  Nandor was the best host!  Arrived to find wine and treats in the frig as well as a basket of fresh fruit!  Bathrooms were well stocked with shampoo, soap, all the essentials!  Nandor was very responsive!  Apartment was super clean!  Amazing space and in a prime location!  Would definitely stay here again!
One note...there is no elevator. A couple of flights of stairs. Not difficult unless you cannot traverse stairs. 

Beautiful apartment!  Top location,great host. Highly recommended !!

Perfect place with perfect host, its worth it carrying your luggage up 2 floors !! 

Was lovely staying at the place. Very clean and well appointed. Nandor and his mother mad sure that everything was in place. 
Had a great welcome package of drinks, fruits etc.
Location was the biggest plus point with some great restaurants located in the street below.
Very comfortable stay.  

This is one of the nicest places I've ever stayed. The attention to detail in this flat is amazing. It has everything you could need and if there is something you want all you need to do is ask Nándor, he or his mother will take care of it. Great location nice building. Everything you could ask for. Great host and overall perfect experience. THANK YOU!!

This was an amazing space in the perfect part of Budapest to explore the city.  Great host, made arriving and leaving as easy as possible.  Cannot recommend more highly.  

The apartment is in a great location, right in the center of the city, close to nice restaurants and it is still very quiet during the week. Nandor's mother helped us with check-in, she was so kind and helpful. The apartment is very clean and there are food and drinks prepared for us. The communication with Nandor also went very well.
We had a very pleasant stay.


Very good experience.
Host was great.  Place was really clean and he was there to great us at check in.  They even stocked the fridge for our arrival with various items.  

Da ich generell ein Mensch bin, der offen bestimmte Thematiken anspricht, möchte ich mich auch hier nicht mit meiner Beurteilung zurückhalten.
Wer nur kurz lesen möchte, wie unser Gesamteindruck war: Wir haben uns wie zu Hause gefühlt.
Empfangen wurden wir herzlichst schon auf der Straße mit Hinweisen zu Parksituation und Kosten. Wer mit dem Auto anreist, der kann dieses in der Tiefgarage direkt vor der Wohnung parken (Zusätzliche Kosten).
Nach der Einweisung in der Wohnung hatten wir die Möglichkeit Fragen zu stellen, die Wifi-Anbindung (Schnelle Datenübertragung) wurde uns erklärt und das Hauseigene Alarmsystem. 
Bereits am Anfang standen Lebensmittel, Kaffee und Champagner bereit, damit am Folgetag keine Hektik zum Frühstück entsteht.

Die Wohnung ist sehr sauber gehalten und dank der Heizung und der Klimaanlage auch recht warm. Wer Fernsehen mag erhält ein Internationales Programm - darunter auch deutsches und britisches Fernsehen.

Generell kann vermerkt werden, dass wir zu jeder Zeit einen Ansprechpartner hatten - falls gewünscht auch in deutscher Sprache.
Nándor selber ist ein kluger und gebildeter junger Mann, mit dem man sich auch Unterhalten kann und der direkt auf Wünsche und Anregungen eingeht.

Wir für unseren Teil sind begeistert gewesen - Über die Gastgeber, der Wohnung, die großartige Stadt, dem Essen und der schönen Zeit, die wir vor Ort zu Silvester erleben durften.

Letzendlich noch einen Tipp zu Taxis: Taxis sind recht günstig - es gibt allerdings auch "private" Taxifahrer, die einem gerne das 4-fache des Preises berechnen. 
Achtet darauf, dass ihr ein Taxi mit Unternehmung im Hintergrund wählt oder fragt nach einem preis für die Fahrt.

Ich wünsche einen schönen Aufenthalt vor Ort.
review_summary: A luxurious, huge and light flat. It's a great place for relaxing, and is located next to the Basilica. The best pubs and restaurants of Budapest are near at hand. The flat is 100m2, with 2 big separated bedrooms and bathrooms.
house_rules: Smoking in the flat and pets are prohibited! There is a weekly cleaning also, but my cleaning service is one of the most flexible one.
description:
A luxurious, huge and light flat. It's a great place for relaxing, and is located next to the Basilica. The best pubs and restaurants of Budapest are near at hand. The flat is 100m2, with 2 big separated bedrooms and bathrooms.

A freshly renovated, 100 m2 flat with the latest design elements. There are 2 big separated bedrooms with bathrooms, a great, spacious living room and kitchen.

There are 2 big televisions, and a very reliable and quick Wi-fi. In the flat there are also household appliances, such as coffee machine, microwave oven, washing machine with tumbler-drier, etc.

Good cafés and restaurants are near at hand! The most beautiful sightseeings of Budapest like Fashion Street, Andrássy street, Opera, Gerbeaud, Basilica etc. can be reached by a 5-10 minutes walk from the flat.

Deák Ferenc square is just a 2 minute walk, and here are the metro lines 1, 2 and 3 so you can reach the whole city from here!

reviews_text:
Couldn't have asked for better.  A total privilege to be able to stay in such a noble and well presented apartment. Hajnal is the perfect host in every respect. Attentive to detail, faultlessly polite and a joy to meet.

This is a fantastic apartment in a fantastic location and is a great base for exploring the beautiful city of Budapest.

Hajnal was a great host, was waiting for us on arrival even after a small delay on our flight and provided us some great recommendations on where to go and what to do in Budapest. Subsequent communication was prompt, friendly and very helpful.

Would not hesitate to stay here again and would recommend it to anyone looking for a place to stay.

Hajnal was very hospitable, was very responsive with my questions and met me outside to greet me. The apartment was fabulous! It had such a great charm to it. She had everything there I could possibly want and more. The tall ceilings and double doors inside the apartment made me feel a bit like a princess. Almost daily I used the record player she had there with a great selection of classics! The balcony was fun too but the weather was too cold to really enjoy it. She gave me a great tip on a local farmers market that was a highlight to my stay. The location is off a quieter side street, but was a close enough distance from the center that I walked there and back every day, sometimes multiple times. Next door (on either side) was an Indian restaurant and a coffee shop...both good! I've already recommended this place to a few friends and would love to come back myself the next time I'm in the area!

Hajnal was a great host and responded beyond our needs. She went out her way to make sure we had everything we needed for our baby which was much appriciated. The apartment is beautiful and spacious but still has a really cosy feeling. Really nice record collection as well. Would highly recommend.

Hajnal's place is perfect, like a home away from home, great location, if your looking for a place in Budapest, this is definitely it.
 Will totally be looking to rebook when back in Budapest.

Everything was fine for us. The apartment was amazing and situation just perfect. Hajnal was very caring and lovely host.

Hajnal is a wonderful person! The apartment is beautiful. I really really recommend this apartment, it is so close to the downtown, is bigger and also you find everything you want outside de building. If you need something, Hajnal is always available.  

We had a lovely time in the apartment. It was a great space, very attractive and had everything we needed. The location was good and our hostess very helpful. We loved our stay and the city. 

Hajnal was very helpful during the booking process very quick to respond and answered all our questions. She was there to greet us into her beautiful apartment which is both spacious and very clean. Hajnal had kindly provided tea,coffee wine ,water and nice chocolate biscuits. There were additional toiletries also. The apartment is nicely located to reach all parts of the city and we found it easy to navigate our way around. Budapest was fun we wish Hajnal and family all the best in future and thanks for allowing us to use your lovely place. Cheers MIke & Elaine 

We received emails ahead of time from Hajnal looking forward to our visit and asking about the time & method of our arrival as well as if there as anything she could do or provide for us for our arrival.  The amenities in the apartment were excellent as well as little extras like fruit, coffee, cream, sugar, spices, beer.
Hajnal was very available for questions and we feel we have made good friends with her and her family!
review_summary:
High-ceilinged apartment (60m2), with large private balcony, in the heart of Budapest's Palace District. This very feminine, historic building, was specially built in 1898 for the Transylvanian countess, Ilona Balási. It was also home to Hungarian writer, Mór Jókai.

We welcome all guests.

We're a few minute's walk from trams and metros. Atmospheric market halls, hidden squares, playgrounds, a lively café quarter, restaurants and bars all nearby. The River Danube is a short walk away.
house_rules:
No extra, unregistered guests. You can only bring the number of guests you have booked in your reservation. If you bring in or invite extra guests after your booking, we will ask you to find another place to stay.

Let us know when you are going to arrive, so that we can plan to meet you on time, show you around and give you the keys.

Check out is 11 am. If you would like to stay longer, it is often possible, but please ask first.
description:
High-ceilinged apartment (60m2), with large private balcony, in the heart of Budapest's Palace District. This very feminine, historic building, was specially built in 1898 for the Transylvanian countess, Ilona Balási. It was also home to Hungarian writer, Mór Jókai.

We welcome all guests.

We're a few minute's walk from trams and metros. Atmospheric market halls, hidden squares, playgrounds, a lively café quarter, restaurants and bars all nearby. The River Danube is a short walk away.

The apartment is in one of the palaces that give Budapest's 'Palace District' its name. The building, built in 1898 as the city residence of a Transylvanian aristocrat, has kept its charm. 

The apartment is on the first floor, and has the building's main balcony over-looking the street.

I live with my family two streets away from this apartment, so we're nearby to help out with any problems, last-minute requests, and so on.

Budapest's Palace District is a hidden treasure. In the 1800s, aristocrats, and rich citizens built their palaces here, and you can still see them today. This was also the site of the original Hungarian parliament building, which you can still see in our street – Brody Sandor utca.

Today, it's an up-and-coming area once again. You can still see the elegant old buildings, but now there is a new, arty, Bohemian culture here. There are many unique shops, galleries, restaurants and cafés, along with a vibrant student presence.

There are four metro stations nearby, and major tram lines, so getting around Budapest is easy. The nearest metro is just two minutes away and you're just a quick walk from the centre and the River Danube.
Parking is available on the street, which is free on weekends, or 440 HUF / hour on weekdays.

If you're arriving from Vienna or Prague by train, get off at Kelenfold train station, and take the metro to Rakoczi Ter metro (10 minutes). From there, it's a 2 minute walk to the apartment. 

From the airport, there are three options:
• Public transport (about €5 per person, one way). Take Bus 200 from the airport to Kobanya Metro stop. Then take the metro to  Kalvin Ter. Then, it's a 10 minute walk to our apartment. This is the cheapest option, but takes over an hour and is not recommended if you have heavy bags. It's not useful after 23:00, because the metro closes down.
• Shuttle bus (about €10 euro per person, one way). Follow the signs in the airport to the 'miniBUD' airport shuttle desk. This takes about 60 minutes. It will drop you off outside our apartment. You will need to give our address (Brody Sandor utca, 19. VIII District).
• Taxi (about €25, one way). This takes about 30 minutes. There is a taxi kiosk directly outside the airport arrivals area.

reviews_text:
Team at Hi5 were helpful but apartment was dirty. Nice location and cute spec just needed some TLC. 

Great location! Didn't have much contact with the host other than getting the keys. It was more set up like a rental company, but that was fine with us. We used the transport service from the airport to the house and it was very convenient and a good deal.

We had a great time at George's appartement. It is located in the best part to the city. We definitely recommend it! 

Nice appartment in a nice area of Budapest. Very closed to the nightlife area and the City Center. We had a great stay. Transfer was organized well.
Thanks a lot!!!
Best regards 
Gela

Good apartment in a convenient location, would recommend. Thank you very much.

The apartment was exaclty like shown on the pictures (very nicek). The apartment was central and in walking distance of the main street. And just down the corner, there was a very nice Street Food Market which you will have to try. Would recommend to everyone!

Great area and great place to stay, huge bed in the loft available if you don't mind sharing a bed; if you do then a smaller group would be better. George was very accessible and made check in and check out super easy, he even let us keep our luggage there before check in! Location was right in the center of the party district making it super fun!

Does what it says on the tin. Really impressed. Thanks 

The Apartment is nice, looks just as the pictures but with more beds now, and really close to the ruin bars and nightlife areas of Budapest.  

That said there is a ton of noise from the streets that the windows don't keep out.  We stayed on a Friday night and there was people singing and shouting and glass breaking outside all night.  If you will be partying every night it should be fine. 

Also the agency says they were busy on the day we arrived and very difficult to get updates from, so we were left waiting 45 minutes with no updates until someone arrived.  

Overall flat is nice, but experience was ehhhh.  

Szuper volt!!
review_summary:
Hi5 Apartment 65 is located in the 7th district of Budapest. It is the ideal location for a holiday in the city. This is just next to the central.
You've got everything: relatively close to center and away from the noise.
description:
Hi5 Apartment 65 is located in the 7th district of Budapest. It is the ideal location for a holiday in the city. This is just next to the central.
You've got everything: relatively close to center and away from the noise.

This cozy apartment is wonderfully located in the 7th district (one of the most central district of the city). You will be few minutes away by foot from the famous Opera and Andrássy avenue (the Hungarian "Champs Elysées”), the Danube and the Chain Bridge are few block away, the famous Szimpla kert is around the corner of the building, and the Buda Castle is a 20 minute walk. This is the best location you could possibly get in Budapest.

Helpful and cheerful hosts who are eager to help with anything.

The neighborhood is trendy and lively, crowded with bars, cafés, shops, supermarkets, and public gardens. There is a 24/7 supermarket in the foot of the building. Restaurants and confectionaries, such as the famous Gerbaud are a few blocks away. Dorottya street leads straight into the Váci street, the main fashion shopping street in Budapest, with souvenir stores and breath-taking architecture. The Las Vegas Casino (one of the only casinos in Budapest) is in the Sofitel Hotel is across the street. The "Budapest Eye" ferris wheel stands right in the Erzsébet Square in the summertime. Public transportation (subway, trams, and buses) leave directly from the square (Déak Tér stop), and there are bicycle rental stations nearby. Guided tours leave from every nearby square. The airport shuttle arrives/departs straight from the square as well. The Zrínyi street is host to several nightclubs and bars, including Kraft, Ötkert, Nomuri, and Divino. We will give you suggestions of the best places to make the most of your stay, whether you want to eat, drink, have a coffee, or party! 

Have a look at the guide on this page, it references the main attractions in the city center around the apartment.

"Subway: Deák Ferenc Tér and Astoria (M2 and M3 subway lines), Vörösmarty Tér (M1 historic metro line)
Trams: Line 2 (Runs adjacent to Danube), Line 47, 49
Railway Stations: 3 stops by metro from Nyugati Railway Station, 2 stops by metro from Keleti Railway Station
Buses: Buses to the castle area, Hop-On Hop-Off buses"

We have transfer service from and to the airport / train station / bus station. The prices are below:

From the airport: EUR 25 / car up to 4 people
To the airport: EUR 22 / car up to 4 people
From the train / bus station: EUR 18 / car up to 4 people
To the train / bus station: EUR 15 /car up to 4 people

In this case we will need you flight / train / bus number and your arrival time to Budapest. Our driver will be at the required time inside the terminal with your name.

reviews_text:
I stayed 5 weeks in Daniel's place. It didn't take me that much to feel it was also my place. It's a cozy flat, well located, easy to get public transport and I always felt safe walking in the neighborhood. I had all the services and a really good company, Dániel is super nice and kind. I feel really happy I found this place and Dániel. 

Like others reviews, Daniel is a super friendly host. You may feel like your home during the stay. I met other couples stayed at the other room. And even the other guests were very kind too. Daniel's vibe seems to influence everyone stay at this house. We all shared our food(if u want, of course) and had dinner, beer together.  It was a really great experience to me. I highly recommend his place :)

Daniel is a very friendly and helpful host. His appartment is very close to the Parliament Building at to Margitsziget (Margaret Island), has good tram and bus links, and is just a bit of a walk from the Nyugati station (which lies on Metro Line 3). I recommend it to anyone who wants to visit Budapest !

Daniel is a very friendly host and basically a nice guy. He is very flexible about arrival and departure, done everything he could even though my arrival plans changed in last moment. The apartment is very old but clean. The room is very small but enough, I worked on my laptop in the kitchen. The location is great, very close to bus, trams and even M3 metro line. Neighbourhood is quiet and there are some places with good food and great beer (Mosselen!) close by.

Nice place in the center of Budapest to stay. 
Unfortunately I didn´t meet Dániel, but everything was well-organised and clean.
I will come back :)

Daniel was very responsive to all possible inquiries. He's very sympathetic person. The room I spent 8 day in is cozy. For a person who is just settling  down in Budapest is just great. The location is very convenient in terms of logistics and entertainment. 

Don't think twice :) 

Room was perfect for my requirements. Only main issue was that it is far from the wifi router, so internet is not always working in the room. Daniel was a nice host and the other guests made for a nice atmosphere.

Daniel is just.. just great! Thank you for letting me feel like Home, Big Brother:)

L'emplacement est bon, il y a pas mal de café et restaurants à proximité, à deux pas des transports en communs et d'un gigantesque centre commercial pour les adeptes du shopping :)
L'appartement est cosy et homey, Daniél est une personne très sympathique et réactive, il répondait positivement au moindre besoin et m'avait filé tous les tuyaux pour une visite efficace de la ville!
Je recommanderai volontiers cette endroit!

Daniel fue muy atento, acogedor y simpático. Dispuesto a responder mis consultas de manera amable y paciente. Su hogar es limpio, ordenado y cómodo. El barrio me encantó, es hermoso, seguro y bastante central. Lo recomiendo 100%.
review_summary: Room for rent in a big, cozy apartment close to the center of Budapest. If you don't want to go to a hostel but still get a cheap place and also enjoy some hospitality come! Happy to hang and show you around if I'm free! The apartment is in one of the best parts of the city called Újlipótváros. Close to Nyugati train station.  Public transport 5 min. Public bicycles 2 min. Danube river 5 min. The Parliament 10 min. Margit Island 10 min.  Cafes, mall, shops, clubs also 5-10 minutes.
description:
Room for rent in a big, cozy apartment close to the center of Budapest. If you don't want to go to a hostel but still get a cheap place and also enjoy some hospitality come! Happy to hang and show you around if I'm free! The apartment is in one of the best parts of the city called Újlipótváros. Close to Nyugati train station.  Public transport 5 min. Public bicycles 2 min. Danube river 5 min. The Parliament 10 min. Margit Island 10 min.  Cafes, mall, shops, clubs also 5-10 minutes.

This place is real home sharing not just a hotel like airbnb place. This means it is not so fancy but there is real hospitality. The room is a beautiful small room with a window at the back of the apartment. Silent and sunny. The living room and an other room is also rented out ocassionally so you will have a chance to meet other travelers if you like to! You are free to use the living room during your time here.  Also if more of you coming, don't hesitate to ask! The apartment slowly goes through renovations so the kitchen and bathroom furnitures are still old style but each year I approve something. So some things are new some things are still old but the place has seen many joy, good fellowships, rest, friendships happen inside! I love it :)

The guest will receive their own key. Can use everything in the flat. :) You can cook alone, or we can cook together. If I'm free, happy to hang out, give tips, take you around the city.

If time allows I'm happy to hag out. I had many joyful nights with guest going out to walk around, or to a good restaurant, craft beer pub or wine bar or one of the great Budapest thermal bath. I'm in to a culinary so feel free to ask about places in Budapest!

availability: The minimum night stay for this listing varies.
review_summary: Located in Andrassy Palace on the Danube bank, just next to the Chain Bridge. SEPARATE, VERY CLEAN PRIVATE ROOMS with modern furnitures, comfortable beds, soft WHITE TOWELS & nice PRIVATE BATHROOM opening from the common corridor. Common kitchenette for preparing tea and simple breakfast. The CITY CENTER is only 5 minutes walk, where non-stop services are available for any age group. Watertown is located between the CASTLE and Danube. Romantic streets and stairs make a really cosy atmosphere.
house_rules: Our service is coupled with principles of cleanliness, calmness, security and fairness, our policy expects the same from our guests in return. Please, avoid any loud activity respecting others living in the building. Smoking is permitted on the outdoor corridor, pets can not be accepted. Please, take care of the carpets (avoid street shoes) in the private rooms, and always keep the entrance door closed. The guests acknowledges that CCTV operates only on the corridors for safety reasons. Only the staff can adjust the heating for the request of the guest.
description:
Located in Andrassy Palace on the Danube bank, just next to the Chain Bridge. SEPARATE, VERY CLEAN PRIVATE ROOMS with modern furnitures, comfortable beds, soft WHITE TOWELS & nice PRIVATE BATHROOM opening from the common corridor. Common kitchenette for preparing tea and simple breakfast. The CITY CENTER is only 5 minutes walk, where non-stop services are available for any age group. Watertown is located between the CASTLE and Danube. Romantic streets and stairs make a really cosy atmosphere.

Our hostel has more separate private guest rooms (16 square metre/room), each advertised on Airbnb. These private guest rooms are next to each other & open from the common corridor of the facility. Each guest room has a modern private bathroom (shower, basin and toilet), but these dedicated bathrooms are available on the common corridor just near your private guest room (external bathrooms). VERY COMFORTABLE BEDS can be twin or double, as you wish. 100% COTTON sheets, linens and towels. Private rooms have nice & modern, new furnitures, comfortable beds.

Our guests have access to their private room, private bathroom and toilet, furthermore the common hall. They may have access to the common kitchenette and fridge.

We provide periodic lessors presence and constant telephone / Viber / e-mail customer service. We recommend having a phone call or using the intercom at arrival.

The Andrassy Palace is located just on the bank of River Danube 200 meter far from the Chain Bridge, in Watertown, the nearest surrounding of the Royal Castle District. Stepping out of the building you can admire the very nice view of Parliament, the historical bridges of Budapest and the Gellert Hill with Liberty Statue. The Buda Castle, the Fisher's Bastillon and its district is accessible on foot within 15 minutes. The Castle Garden Bazaar is 5 minutes walk. Some of the thermal baths can be reached on foot. Several tidy cafe and restaurant offers even breakfast under friendly conditions just next to Andassy Palace. Non-stop food stores are also available. The district is clean, the public safety is outstanding.

-M2 metro line (Station Batthyany Ter): you can approach us on foot from the station.
-16 or 105 bus line (stop Clark Adam Ter) from the direction of the city.
-19 or 41 tram line (stop either Clark Adam Ter or Halasz utca) from other directions.
-Bicycle path and MOL-Bubi public bicycle points in the district. Parking on the street for public parking fees. To find an empty parking place depends on the period of the day, it might be easy or even difficult.

Wheel chair access in not possible unfortunately. Heating works only within the heating season (30th Sept - 1st May).

reviews_text:
Great place to stay, very comfortable, simple, clean and central. We walked most places from here but it's also just near a metro stop. Yoel's instructions on how to find the place were clear and very easy to follow. We had a great stay in Budapest!

My friend and I had a great stay at Yoel's place. The apartment was very comfortable and we loved the loft layout. It was also extremely clean and had all the amenities. The location was quite central and close to metro stops. It was very quiet in the apartment.

Although we did not get a chance to meet Yoel, he was extremely responsive and answered all of our questions. I would definitely recommend his place!

Yoel's flat was a lovely modern studio, well equipped with everything we needed for our short stay. It is a short walk from the main Centre of he city and close to all the sights. 

He was super helpful with the check in process and left us to it for the majority of the holiday. 

We visited in December and so was a little chilly but the city made up front with the winter markets and warm mulled wine!! :) 

One to recommend!! 

The location of this flat is amazing! I walked everywhere. 
It's super super clean to!

The flat itself is beautiful, very tastefully renovated and spotlessly clean. It is in a beautiful complex located in a safe, quiet area. We were able to walk to almost everywhere we wanted to see from the flat and didn't really need to use public transport.

We loved our stay here and would gladly stay again!

Very clean and comfortable. The apartment was easy to find, because of good explanations. I recommend this apartment to everyone how wants to be close to the city center. 

Yoel was a massive help when trying to find the apartment due to the taxi dropping us off in the wrong place. The apartment and the building itself is wonderful, very clean and homely. The apartment is right at the heart of the city centre, (we loved this). 
Would definitely stay here again, thank you for hosting us Yoel! 

I had really good time in this studio. it's located in the heart of Budapest literally so you can go to any place you might want to visit by walking. Host Yoel is very nice person as well. When I was confused with misbooking which was my mistake, he nicely helped me. If I go back to Budapest I would stay this place again :)

Had a wonderful stay in the magnificent city of Budapest. The apartment is ideally located in the city and is close to some really good transport links (Nyugati Palyaudvar Metro - 8 mins walk). The room is cosy, warm and very comfortable. It has a good size bed and excellent bathroom facilities. I would happily recommend staying in this apartment. It was close to everywhere we wanted to be and we had a very peaceful and relaxing stay too.
availability: On Fridays and Saturdays the minimum stay is 2 nights.
review_summary:
The loft studio definitely provides a comfy yet spacious vibe. With tall ceilings and huge windows it's bright atmosphere will be refreshing after a day of exploring Budapest. 

You'll never need to walk to far to find anything you might crave.
house_rules:
- Smoking in the apartment is forbidden - you are welcome to smoke in the porch outside
-  This point is particularly important- the residents of the building are all nice people that enjoy their well deserved peace. please avoid any behaviour that might disturb the building residents use your judgement and be respectful. 
- I wont accept reservations for stag or hen parties, or for football supporters coming to European Championship matches. Thank you for your understanding
- The apt can be occupied on the day of the arrival from 2PM and should be left by 11AM on the day of departure. I am flexible when possible please inform me of your requirements in advance.
- Valuables left in the apartment are your responsibility
- Always lock all doors and windows when leaving the apartment.
- Please make sure, that lights, AC and other electric appliances are turned off before leaving the apartment. Thank you
description:
The loft studio definitely provides a comfy yet spacious vibe. With tall ceilings and huge windows it's bright atmosphere will be refreshing after a day of exploring Budapest. 

You'll never need to walk to far to find anything you might crave.

This beautiful studio apartment is situated in one of Budapest's best kept historic buildings.

 the facade and Court yard are a true marvel! The Apartment has high (3.7 meter) ceilings that provide a spacious atmosphere. Original refurbished hardwood floors, built shower, heating for the cold winter days and AC for the hot Budapest summers. Designed with functionality and style in mind this apartment is a the perfect spot to unwind after a long day (or night) out on the town.

ITS ALL YOURS :) enjoy!

I am an expat student in Budapest. I have been living here for over a year and can proudly say I know this city very well! I will be more then happy to help with recommendations for tours, sites, restaurants, concerts, night life, bars, clubs, Opera shows ( and how to see one quite well for under 5 euros). I can help with reservations at your choice restaurant, how to get to different places in the city and in Hungary. - Bottom line, ask me anything.

The apartment is situated right between Nyugati ter and world famous Andrassy boulavard and the Westend shoping center (the biggest in eastern Europe). Within a short walk you’ll be able to reach -Andrassy, Nyugati ter, Oktogon, Margaret Island, west-end mall. Cafés and restaurants are a short walk along with super markets- Its the perfect spot to explore both Pest and Buda

the 4/6 tram line that runs 24/7 will take you to most essential spots in pest and is within a 3 minute walk. 
M3 metro line leaves from nyugati ter 
M1 ( world heritage millenium metro)  is 6 minutes walk to Vorosmarty Utca Station or a 8 minute to Oktogon.

Various Trolleybuses and bus lines pass within a 5 minute walk radius. getting anywhere is easy - Just don’t forget to validate your tickets :)

Very cozy apartment with a great location. The flat is  really big and perfectly clean. The host is very warm and friendly. We really enjoyed. I would definitely recommend staying at Terri's place.

When my friend and I came to Budapest Terri made us feel very welcome. She was waiting for us outside the apartment, gave us useful information and great recommendations for where to eat in the area.
