reviews_text:
Máté was very nice, kind and helpful with us. The apartment is very cute and comfortable, just like the pictures and also the area is not bad. It was also very helpful with check-in and check-out since our flight home was late in the evening.
It is easy to get in touch with him and was always available. He made us feel at home and we were very well during our stay :)

We were very welcome by the host, everything was organised to suit our arrival and departure hour and the hosts were very friendly and open. We were happy with the place, good value for money and very clean and quiet place fairly centrally located.

The apartment was absolutly same as in pictures, very nice and clean. There was everything what you can need during the weekend trip. The location was absolutely great and close everywhere, we just walked. The communication wit the owner was very smooth and quick. We were really satisfy and could recommend to stay here. 

It was easy to communicate with Mate through airbnb site. He made us feel welcome. The place was just like in pictures. Location was good and easy to find. Metro stop was quite near and it was easy to go anywhere from there. A little minus was that there was some construction work going on in the building but that didnt bother us too much. Otherwise the location and the building was peaceful.

Overall a good place to stay. Near the subway/trams and walkable distance to many cool things. Basic apartment, but comfortable. There were a couple small 'hiccups,' but both were resolved quickly and professionally. 

Great location. Close to Buda, pubs and everything that you want to be around in Budapest. Very neat and clean apartment with all necessary items.Good for two people. Definitely recommended.

The communication with Máté was smooth. The appartment lies in a great area of Budapest with lots of nice restaurants in the neighbourhood. The room was very basic, but everything you need is there.

Máté was very friendly and flexible with our early check-in and late check-out. The apartment is very well located, was VERY clean and cozy. We would return here anytime! We also loved the bed which was "on top" of the kitchen.

Byt bol super, presne to, čo sme očakávali podla fotiek a popisu. Blízko bary, reštaurácie a hlavne zástavky, takže nebol problém sa rýchlo kamkoľvek dostať. Celkovo sme boli spokojné.

Great flat in a great location near public transport. There is many pubs and restaurants around. We enjoy the flat, very calm and cosy. Thanks to Maté who gives us some tips. Budapest is a beautiful city
review_summary: This modern, fully renovated, cozy and calm apartment is placed near to the center of Budapest (between Király and Wesselényi street) in walking distance from many restaurants and bars. Easily accessible by public transport, just 5 minutes walk the tram 4-6.
house_rules: Please note that this is a private apartment in a non-commercial building, which means that people are living there with their families trying to enjoy their free time out of their workplace. Therefore loud parties and heavy drinking is NOT permitted in the flat. If you come to Budapest for these activities please book another apartment! Pets and smoking are forbidden.
description: This modern, fully renovated, cozy and calm apartment is placed near to the center of Budapest (between Király and Wesselényi street) in walking distance from many restaurants and bars. Easily accessible by public transport, just 5 minutes walk the tram 4-6.

reviews_text: Peter is an amazing host and so is Panna. They made sure we had everything we would need and more. From little things such as arranging for a shuttle to sharing advices, they are the best. Much more than the coziness of the place, I loved the warmth of these two chaps!
availability: On Fridays and Saturdays the minimum stay is 2 nights.
review_summary:
Welcome on the Hill!

Truly a home away from home, this cozy apartment is fully equipped with all you might need on a laid-back Sunday afternoon. Located in one of the most beautiful area of the city, in the Castle district - formal residence of the Hungarian kings, part of the world heritage - with excellent transportation to the downtown/ party area.
Great for couples, solo travelers, families or business travelers.
house_rules:
-Pets are allowed ON REQUEST, please contact us beforehand if you are planning to stay with a pet. - (no extra charge after pets)
- Smoking is allowed on the balcony
description:
Welcome on the Hill!

Truly a home away from home, this cozy apartment is fully equipped with all you might need on a laid-back Sunday afternoon. Located in one of the most beautiful area of the city, in the Castle district - formal residence of the Hungarian kings, part of the world heritage - with excellent transportation to the downtown/ party area.
Great for couples, solo travelers, families or business travelers.

Apart from the must-have WIFI, there is a hifi stereo and speakers in case you would like to listen to music from your own devices. You will find a chess board, playing cards and dice in the living room along with a fine selection of Hungarian literature in English for a quiet night in. You may want to get a glimpse of the “Hungarian spirit” reading these short stories and poems curled up on the comfy sofa with a blanket and some tea. The kitchen is all set up for cooking with everything from apron to tupperware, and coffee and tea are provided free of charge. If you are on a business trip, you might find useful the iron and the ironing board – and if you are in the middle of your backpacking Euro-trip, you can use the washing machine to get your laundry done (hypoallergenic detergent is also provided). In the bedroom there is a double bed with hypoallergenic pillows and reading lights.

Guests have access to all parts of the flat.

Though I'm living off site, me and my friends, who help me managing the apartment, are available if guests have any questions or issues that they need some help with.

The apartment is situated in the heart of the historic city, on Castle Hill in Buda – in a quiet residential building. The area is full of prestigious restaurants, but we always have some insider hints and tips for those travelling on a budget.

Transportation is excellent, frequent buses will take you to downtown Budapest in 10 minutes, with direct connections to the main underground and tram lines. And best of all: the bus stop is right next to Mathias Church, one of the most beautiful buildings in Hungary.

reviews_text:
My friend and I had a wonderful time staying at Lilla's place. It was in a very old beautiful building, but the inside was modern and very clean. It was also great location wise, as it was easy walking distance to all the main attractions. Lilla was also very helpful recommending places to see and things to do in Budapest. Hope to be back soon! 

Everything was brilliant! The apartment was absolutely great and really well located. Lilla was really helpful and gave very detailed instructions on how to get to the apartment and was easily contactable. Great value for money and would 100% recommend! 

Nice and cozy place, good location, friendly host. Thanks :-)

Didn't catch Lilla and met her friend Helen who was awesome; she facilitatedmy stay. I had great communication with Lilla, she's been very responsive and helpful. Apartment is well located, greatly equipped, I recommend you guys to stay at Lilla's to enjoy the beautiful BudaPest even more! 

Great location, perfectly described flat. The flat is very modern but sits in an old Hungarian development so you get to experience the best of both. 

From beginning to end Helen (Lilla's friend) was fast to respond, super helpful, and an all around perfect host. The apartment is within walking distance of the metro and ruin pub district, exactly as described, and ridiculously quiet. I highly recommend staying here! 

It was great

Lilla was very helpful both before and during our stay.
The apartment was very clean and in a great location.
Would highly recommend staying here! 


Very good experience staying in this apartment

Lillas apartment was the perfect little space for our Budapest getaway! We had everything we needed, it was in a great location and nice and quiet at night.

Lilla was very helpful in offering suggestions for us to!
availability: The minimum night stay for this listing varies.
review_summary:
Funhouse Adventure is located in the beautiful Palota District, in the very heart of the historical Budapest. With the party district  (including the most famous ruin bars, pubs and streetfood places) only a few hundred meters away we can say that this apartment is located in the center, yet not on a busy street. 
Sightseeing, going out and enjoying Budapest only by walking, then having a good night sleep in a kingsize bed with good matraces... that is our offer :)
Come and stay with us!!!
house_rules:
Smoking is not allowed in the flat.
Please keep calm after 10pm. This house is an old historical place, not for house parties, but more for sleeping and relaxing.
Please inform us if you arrive after 8pm, as we are not living next to the apartment. If you arrive after 8pm, we will probably provide you the keys through a keykeeper.
Thank you :):)
description:
Funhouse Adventure is located in the beautiful Palota District, in the very heart of the historical Budapest. With the party district  (including the most famous ruin bars, pubs and streetfood places) only a few hundred meters away we can say that this apartment is located in the center, yet not on a busy street. 
Sightseeing, going out and enjoying Budapest only by walking, then having a good night sleep in a kingsize bed with good matraces... that is our offer :)
Come and stay with us!!!

About the apartment:
Our brand new cosy apartment got completely renovated in June 2016.
It is a whole flat just under your control :)
The apartment has a big (180x200) kingsize bed with proper matraces, and a collapseable sofa bed (140x200), in order to ensure that you can have a good night sleep, so we can host a maximum of 4 guests.
There is a completely equipped kitchen, with 4 sets of everything, microwave owen, a dual electiral heater and the needed pans as well.
We grant you fresh towels and everything for the good sleep. We have a washing machine so you can clean your clothes if you need to.

About the house:
As this is a very old historical house, the inner height is above 4 meters, so we created an inner floor for the bedroom. Both inner floors are completely comfortable and standing height (most of the time more then 4m), the stairs are big and wide, so it is absolutely convinient to walk up and down.
The house itself is the oldest house in the street, and back then at the end of the 19th century it was a luxory resort built buy the citys major to host himself and his family. The guy was called Szentkiralyi Moric, and the street where the house is located, got named after him. We have a big tree in the middle of garden of the house, which got planted by the granddaughter of Moric more then a hundred years ago.

You will have your own keys, and noone else can access the apartment.
You have your own shower, toilet, kitchen, and everything what you can see on the pictures.

Our policy is to have at least one personal interaction with our guests, so we can make sure that you arrived safe and everything is ok with the apartment.
On top of that you can always reach us through phone, sms, email, etc.

It is fair to say that the apartment is in the center. The main rules about things in Budapest are pretty easy:
- Most of things are in Pest, Buda is more residential and there are basically two things to check there: the Castle and the Geller Hill. But those are must sees :)
- Pest is basically divided by half rings. If you look at the map it becomes pretty easy to understand. The big circle called "Hungaria ring", and that is more the industrial area. Almost everything what is interesting in Pest is located inside the 2nd ring, which is called the "Grand Boulevard", it goes from Margit bridge to Petofi bridge. And then we have the "Small Boulevard" which is basically the very center of the city. The apartment is located between the Small and the Grand, closer to the Small Boulevard.
It is very close to the "Party district" which is the most vibrant part of the city, full of bars, ruin pubs and very nice streetfood places (the party district is basically that part of the VII-th district that is located between the Small and the Grand Boulevard. Our apartment is on the very border of the VII-th and the VIII-th. So you need to walk roughly 400m-s to be in the vibrant place, but yet you can still sleep in a more relaxed area, called the "Palota District" which used to be the richest area of the city 150 years ago, so its full of very nice buildings.
Bottom line: the center of Budapest is rather small, everything is in walking distance. You can grab your bag in the morning, have a good coffe, and then just walk around very easily, as you are right there :)
Some key spots, and the distance of them from our apartment according to (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN):
- Nepliget Bus Station - 35min with Metro line 2 (blue line)
- National Museum - 300m, 2mins walk
- The Grand Synagog - 500m, 7mins walk 
- Simpla Kert, the most famous bar in Budapest - 750m, 8mins walk
- Gozsdu Garden, the best bars in the city - 850m, 10mins walk
- Deak Square, the very very center and best open space bars - 1000m, 11mins walk
- The Danube Riverfront - 1500m, 15mins walk
- The Castle, for this you may want to catch a bus, but still it is much better on foot - 2,9km, 35mins walk

Some usefull places around:
- Supermarket - we have Spar on the corner of the Szentkiralyi and Rakoczi str, some 200m walking
- We have a pharmacy on Rakoczi str, next to the Spar some 250m walking
Finally some recommendations on what to do and where to eat, nearby:
- Best cheap streetfood - Bors Gastrobar
- Best bistro restaurant - Fricska
- Best coctail - Farm Gastrobar
- Best pub (elected by tripadvisor as best in the WORLD) - Szimpla Kert
- Best winebar - DiVino in Gozsdu or DiVino next to the Basilica
- Best coffee - Budapest Baristas
- Best todo in the morning - Grand marketplace, next to Fovam square
- Best todo in the afternoon - Climb the Gellert hill and watch the sunset from the Citadell
The metro line 3, 4 is just 2 minutes far.

How to get here?
0. The address again:
1088 Budapest, Szentkirályi str. 10. 
It is in the VIII-th district.

1. From the airport:
If you arrive before lets say 11pm, you can come by public transport. 
Catch the 200E bus (the only bus :) from the AP), and get to "KOKI Terminal", which is the last station. There you get on the Blue metroline (Line 2), and come to "Kalvin Ter" stop. From there we are in walking distance. This will cost you two tickets, so around 2 EUR per person.
If you arrive by the night, or you are not on extreme budget, you can come buy taxi, which will cost you around 20-25 EUR. Taxis in the airport and heavily controlled, so you don't have to be affraid of pirates.

2. By Bus:
Most probably you will arrive to the "Nepliget Terminal". There you get on the Blue metroline (Line 2), and come to "Kalvin Ter" stop. From there we are in walking distance. This will cost you two tickets, so around 2 EUR per person.

3. By car
Just type in the address to your GPS, it will get to the right place.
You can park on the street easily, but it is a pay zone from 8am to 8pm, and the tariff is the highest class, as we are in the center :( 440 HUF per hour, some 1,3 EUR per hour.
There is a guarded parking place next to our house as well, on Brody Sandor str. Here: (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)"E.

4. By train:
Most probably you will arrive to "Keleti station".
From there you can take plenty of different busses to our apartment:
(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN). You can buy tickets on the bus or in any kiosk.
One trip will cost you 1 EUR.

How to move around?
1. Easiest is for sure: by foot! Everything is so close, and you can catch the vibe much better.
2. You can get a Budapest Card (URL HIDDEN) with free public transport and multiple free entrances included
3. You can just buy a big bunch of tickets and move around as needed by our superior public transport system, called BKV (URL HIDDEN)
4. You can rent a bike from our BUBI system (URL HIDDEN)

Who are we and what is the FunHouse group?
This is a family owned business, ran by Lilla and Akos (Thats us :) ) a young couple working in the IT industry. We travel a lot, and been to a lot of places around the globe, so we know exactly what a traveled needs. We decided to start our own apartments here in Budapest, and they prooved to be a success :)
If you stay in one of the members of the FunHouse group you will always have the same experience driven the following core values:
- Central location, main attractions in a waling distance, yet not on a busy street to ensure a good night sleep
- "Life tested", which means that we spent several weeks in every apartment as a guest of our own, to fine tune the details, and find out what you would need as a guest
- Designed by us, we don't believe in mass production living spaces, so all of the apartments are finished and decorated by us, so you will always have the personal touch that makes things a bit unique

reviews_text:
Marcell responded very quickly to any questions we had and the apartment was very nice. Would definitely recommend and would definitely stay here again.  

Great city centre location

The appartment is perfect located. Next to the main train station of Budapest. For those who are shoppoholic, there is a huge shopping mall in 10mins-walk from the appartment. 
The appartment itself is very nice. Very well equipped, clean, big enough for 2 people. There is a smart tv so don't be afraid to have to suffer in watching series ou anything else un Hungarian!! 

This was the first air bnb we had stayed in and we weren't disappointed. Marcell was a great host and really attentive in the lead up to and during our stay, always quick to respond if we needed him/advice. The apartment was clean, really well renovated and only ever a maximum 20 min walk from anywhere you could want to visit (west end centre, heroes square, fashion street etc), perfect location! We will definitely be back

Many thanks Marcell for everything! Great Host!

Perfect situated in the heart of Budapest and easy to find.  Soon arrival found the apartment clean and equipped with all the mod cons-would highly recommend staying here.

Really lovely apartment, great location and very clean! Highly recommend staying here for a long weekend 

Lovely host who recommended lots of things to us and gave us nice tips plus the apartment was beautifully furnished and perfect for a city trip. 
As the apartment is very technical with air condition and co, we would just recommend to leave a leaflet with instruction hints for the guests so that it's easier to use it. 
All in all an amazing air bnb experience and definitely worth a second visit!  

Top host, top apartment! Would definitely recommend. Lovely place, fantastic location, right in the centre of Budapest, close to all the tourist spots. Marcell was a great host and was easy to get in touch with. Gave us great tips on where to eat etc. We also went to the thermal spa baths which Marcell arranged a 30% discount for us. Could not have asked anymore, exactly what you would want from an Airbnb.

Marcell's apartment is ideally situated in the centre of budapest and is within easy reach of all the attractions, restaurants and amenities that Budapest to offer. The apartment is secure and pristinely presented, making it a much more attractive offer than any hotel could offer. I could not  recommend Marcell and his apartment any more highly, with fantastic levels of communication throughout. Definitely the best Airbnb experience so far :0)
availability: 1 night minimum stay.From Dec 01, 2016 - Feb 28, 2017 the minimum stay is 2 nights.
review_summary: Beautiful, modern, newly furnished apartment available for rent. Sheets, towels, hairdryer, etc all included. Brand new, modern furniture. Free Wifi. In a renovated building, great location, @very center of Budapest, easy to get anywhere, groceries, restaurants, bars all next.
description:
Beautiful, modern, newly furnished apartment available for rent. Sheets, towels, hairdryer, etc all included. Brand new, modern furniture. Free Wifi. In a renovated building, great location, @very center of Budapest, easy to get anywhere, groceries, restaurants, bars all next.

We offer to our Guests a special 30% discount, to Budapest's best thermal bath included an extra rooftop pool with a beautiful view to the Danub and to the Elisabeth Bridge. (As you can see in the first picture)

Metro, Bus, Train station only 2 minutes by walking from the apartment. (Nyugati Pályaudvar) You could easily can get everywhere by using the public transport.

Free Parking on Saturday, Sunday, 

From Monday to Friday after 6pm until 8am.

There is a street next to the building where the parking is free every time, but its not easy to find a place...

reviews_text:
A fantastic place and everyone was so so helpful during my trip! 8
I will 100% come back

The hostel is very nice and the location is perfect for taking public transport. Overall I will recommend this hostel.

This place probably has the best value for money in Budapest, especially because it's close to a major station. The host was great and helpful, and overall it was a great experience. 

Nice little hostel. Ideal place to meet students from all over the world, cook together, have interesting conversations etc., all in a private atmosphere. 
Five minutes from Keleti Trainstation and Metro. This place is ideal for a quick stop over to see Budapest main attraction. Tiny little place, nice and safe. Had a great time. Thumbs up!

The host is excellent, he responds fast to my request online and shows me the most famous places to visit when I arrive there. I enjoy my stay there because of its quietness and tranquility, to me very beneficial after spending time in the center area. 

The guests are polite and respectful to each other, and I also got to know some interesting person there. 

It's situated in the eastern part of the city centre, takes about 20 minutes walk to the center, about 30 minutes walk to Buda castle, and it's on the main street so I feel totally safe walking even in the dead of the night.

Overall, my experience with everything when I stayed there is wonderful and I would recommend it for everyone to visit Budapest if you want to find some place to rest well during your stay there. 

There is hardly any privacy obviously since it's a dormitory! Good stay but i would not recommend to people who is looking for a long stay since many people are going in and out, and I was relocated several times, moving all around the hostel, from room to room due to lack of beds, etc, which was very frustrating. :( Overall, the host was kind and nice, and i would like to recommend for a short stay!

This place is a good choice if you want to rest and not be bothered by rowdy travelers.

A very nice cosy hostel, would definitely recommend. Room was exactly as described, it was fairly spacious, it didn't feel cramped or anything like that, there was space to put my luggage/ things. The toilettes/washrooms were fine, water was nice and hot and the shower had a good pressure. There was a kitchen you could use to prepare food + tables to sit at and eat your food. The hosts/staff were very kind + helpful.

The location was great, literally opposite the main train station which was so so helpful. Also really close the city centre / main party district, it was only a 10 minute walk if that!

The hostel is quite small and cosy though, it's doesn't hold that many guests, and therefore doesn't have a bar/large sociable area where you can sit and chat of an evening and meet follower travellers. If you're looking for somewhere nice and quiet where you can rest then this is the hostel for you! Though if you're travelling by yourself for example, and want to stay in a social hostel where you can easily meet lots of new people, this may not be the best place to stay. Though other than that, it's a fantastic hostel, would definitely recommend!

You guys should know that this place offers very reasonable price in Budapest. I mean, the place is not neat and super comfortable place, however, it is worth being a bit uncomfortable because of super cheap price. If you are looking for just sleeping and taking a shower and going out to the city, this place is the one of the best ones.

The host was really friendly and helpful. The price is very good. The room was little messy but it's not really a big problem.
review_summary: Our Hostel is located right in the downtown, very close to the International Train Station Keleti Pu. The very central location and the proximity to the stations, tram and bus lines, make our hostel for an ideal place for your crawls in the City.
description: Our Hostel is located right in the downtown, very close to the International Train Station Keleti Pu. The very central location and the proximity to the stations, tram and bus lines, make our hostel for an ideal place for your crawls in the City.

reviews_text:
Brigitta and Daniel are very kind. They allowed us an early check in and they did everything to make us feel welcome. The appartment was slightly smaller than we thought but it was enough for us. To reach the bed, which was a mattress on the floor, you had to climb a staircase that we thought was rather uncomfortable. No handrail and very steep so we went up and down on hands and feet. Not suitable for elderly people but we managed and could laugh about it. We were pleasantly surprised to find the appartment had been cleaned again halfway through our stay with clean towels and a dishcloth. Metro and essential shops are literally around the corner wich Daniel was kind enough to point out to us.

Their apartment is wonderful, you can find everything you need and the apartment is clean and quiet. David waited for us before house and showed us our "new temporary address". He also told something about transport and city and he recommended some places of interest. He was very kind. If we return to Budapest one day, we will ask them for the accommodation.

Absolutely agree with previous guests. Nothing to complain. And I didn't notice that it was very noisy. Recommended!

The apartment was perfect for me and my sister! 
David was very helpful and met us outside the metro stop - he rang and was in contact with us once we had landed and gave us great tips for exploring the city. 
The apartment is very modern and well equipped (hair dryer, tea/coffee, towels, microwave, fridge) which made our stay more relaxing. 
The metro is literally across the road however we walked everywhere in order to see all the sights. 
The stairs are slightly narrow and a bit tricky to get up and down to the bed but just be extra careful and you'll be fine!! 
Thoroughly enjoyed our stay in Budapest, thank you!! 

It was a very nice place and it was clean. The bed was comfortable and it was a nice place to relax. Would definitely recommend. 

We had a great time in Budapest and enjoyed the apartment very much, it's close to the subway and center city too, clean, new, tiny but nice - with two people enough place for a comfi stay. Brigitta and David were good hosts, friendly and available for any question. We definitely can recommend to stay with this apartment!

Brigitta was helpful in organizing a cab ride for us from the airport which made arriving at her place very easy. The apartment is clean and looks exactly like the pictures. Very good for the price. Not right in the city center, but ~10-15 minutes by car. David provided some recommendations for things to do and marked up a map so we could use it over our visit. 

We had a wonderful time on Brigitta's place! Very clean, organized and silent. Very close to the metro station... less then 1 minute walking!!! In front of the appartment. there is a Tesco market and a bakery! David received us and gave us all the information we needed: places to go  (and places to avoid), public transport, restaurants, bakery, markets, thermal baths, everything!!! On our last day, he rented a taxi to take us to the airport! 100% recommended!

This apartment looks exactly how it is listed. However, I did have a few issues. The location of the apartment is not the most desirable as it is a poor area. The apartment is also one apartment split into several smaller apartments. This means that the walls are very thin and everything is clear to hear between the walls. On the plus side it is only a 2 minute walk to the metro station, which can be used to get into the city centre and it is a good base for a short term stay. Our host Davide was extremely nice and gave us great recommendations for places to eat and how to travel around.

Really great apartment! 
Everything exactly as at photos. It's very clean and stylish, a bit small, but well organized and furnished. There is everything you may need. 
Location is perfect: less than 1 min from subway station, bus and tram stops near the house, the city center within walking distance. 
Host David is super positive and energetic! He gave us all the information we needed.
Next time will stay only here!
review_summary: Our accommodation has four separated, modern and private fully equipped really comfortable apartments. The shops, entertainment facilities near to the flat combined with the excellent infrastructure will make your time pleasur able here.
description:
Our accommodation has four separated, modern and private fully equipped really comfortable apartments. The shops, entertainment facilities near to the flat combined with the excellent infrastructure will make your time pleasur able here.

The Corner Apartments located in front of the metro 4 and John Paul pope II Square. 
Trams, buses and Budapest's bicycle system, the Bubi also provide some fast transportation opportunities to our guests in the city. The bus, tram and metro stops are next to the entrance of the building.
The apartments are fully equipped and cozy. The Red Apartment has private bathroom and kitchen too. The apartment is suitable for 2 people since it has a double bed and and a smaller sofa.

The John Paul Pope II.  Square is an excellent location for an easy walk. For people who prefer spend time with some culture, The Operetta Theatre provides a really good opportunity. Blaha Lujza Square and the Keleti Railway Station are a few minutes' walk from the apartment. The Teleki Market is a couple of minutes from there, but the Market Hall is also two metro stops only.

reviews_text:
Beautifully decorated apartment with up-cycled and innovative vibe! Perfect for young couples. Very clean and a very helpful host! Even booked our cab back to the airport for us! Very grateful, thanks a lot!

Istvan is an exceptional host.  We loved everything about him. His punctuality, ease of communicating with and his genuine hospitality, was wonderful. He definitely went over and above our expectations.  The Taxi he ordered for us arrived on time. Istvan certainly made our stay in Budapest so much easier and enjoyable. 

This apartment was my best airbnb experience! István is a great person and he helped us with everything we needed. The apartment is wonderful, warm and so so pretty.. Book this house if you want to have (for sure) a good time in Budapest!!

Well, what a perfect place to stay! If we come back to Budapest, we will definitely try and stay here again. István was very helpful, he came and met us at the nearest metro station (which is very easy to get to from the airport) and showed us some local spots for groceries, a couple of bars and where to go. The flat was beautifully furnished, very clean, cosy and up to date and exactly how it looks in the pictures. 5* all the way! 

Istvàn is a perfect host - thanks for everything! The apartment is like on the pictures and the description. Very central and comfortable. We will come back next year!!!

Perfect trip :) Location is very good, the flat is also very good, we have everything we need. Thanks!!

Istvan was an amazing host, met us From the metro station and showed us to the house. He also got us a map and showed us all the best places to go, which was incredibly useful. The flat is absolutely beautiful, all decorated with so much attention to detail, full of everything you would need for your visit, and in a perfect location. Would love to stay again! 

Istvan's apartment was very comfortable, tastefully decorated and easy to access. Istvan was quite helpful and always responded to our questions immediately. He also picked us from the metro and helped us get acquainted to the neighborhood. Istvan also provided us very good recommendations. Overall it was a great experience and we would highly recommend it! 

István is a perfect host who waited for us when we arrived. His apartment is really nice, lovely and charming, perfect for a couple. It is very clean and comfortable, well located in Budapest (3 min from the subway station, 20min from the city center by walk).
thanks a lot István ! we had a great weekend thanks to you !

Istvan greeted us at the metro with a tour of the neighborhood. He was extremely helpful with all our questions and needs. The apartment was an excellent location close to the center. Had a very pleasant stay!
review_summary: This beautiful jewelry box is a magical place for those who wants to spend a few days peacefully.Our apartment provides comfort and a well equipped kitchen what can serve all your needs.We offer you a morning capsule nespresso coffee and tea just to help you start your next exciting day in the city.In one minute walk you can reach  Café Csiga,Rákóczi Square Market Hall,grocery store,Lipóti bakery,the main tram what goes around the downtown and the metro.Enjoy it :)
description:
This beautiful jewelry box is a magical place for those who wants to spend a few days peacefully.Our apartment provides comfort and a well equipped kitchen what can serve all your needs.We offer you a morning capsule nespresso coffee and tea just to help you start your next exciting day in the city.In one minute walk you can reach  Café Csiga,Rákóczi Square Market Hall,grocery store,Lipóti bakery,the main tram what goes around the downtown and the metro.Enjoy it :)

Our place is a freshly renovated apartment with new furnitures,new comfortable bed,new kitchen and new bathroom.
This apartment is one minute walk from Rákoczi tér where you can find market hall with Spar(grocery store),Rossman,bakery,fruits and vegetables.Plus it has a famous Italian restaurant and wine bar,The Oinos.
The square has another two restaurants,The Csiga which is very cozy, friendly and has awesome food,and the Rákóczi restaurant what is a traditional Hungarian cuisine whit real Hungarian tastes.
There is underground parking next door,very close and cheap,what you can use 24/7.

I'm available for 24 hours.

availability: The minimum night stay for this listing varies.
review_summary:
Fantastic location in the heart of Budapest.
Few steps from the main street Vaci street.
Numbers famos restaurants, butics and shops.

reviews_text:
Eszter is very nice and helpful.  The flat is nice and simple, great location. There is a lot of cafe's and restaurants near the apartment. Oh, and spar market, which is great.  

We met Ezster and Gyorgy too, they are very kind and nice. The apartment is central, near two metro lines but you can visit the city by foot too, near the apartment there are a supermarket and many pubs and reasturants. The apartment and the room are clean, there are two bathrooms and it is very usefull, you can use the kitchen and wifi is very fast. We recommend it also for the good price. Greetings from Italy, Antonio and Veronica

A great stay in a nice and comfortable place ;) The bed was really nice, and there was everything we needed in the flat. The host was nice and realy helpful, she was willing to keep our luggage after the check-out and we could leave it before the check-in, which was really convenient. I highly recommed it! :) The place is center located, and everything is very close.

Its very lovely place and great location Esther is very helpful

Eszter is very friendly and helpful, the room is very clean and comfortable, and the flat is very central. Definitely recommend!

Gyorgy's place was fantastic. Great kitchen, perfect location, comfy bed, and friendly people. Can't ask for more than that. Thank you for the honey, it tastes delicious!

Great host, we met just eszter but she was always ready to answer our questions. We needed medicine that I couldn't get without a prescription, but eszter got it for us. Highly recommended!

Honey Hostel is a really nice place. The hosts were very welcoming and the apartment is really cozy. It's also really close to the train station, which connects you to the whole city. I would definitely recommend to stay here.

Nice and small room, as expected. Clean and tidy. Located in the jewish quarter.

Best thing about the flat is its neighbourhood. It is right in the center, walking distance to many main attractions and good transport connection. Going out in the evening was easy, the area is filled with cafe & bars. Downside is the room which is very small and the flat is basically a big hostel and feels weird at times. Human interaction is minimal. It could also be cleaner and tidier.
availability: 1 night minimum stay.From Dec 23, 2016 - Jan 02, 2017 the minimum stay is 4 nights.
review_summary: Small roomfor two people. Please note that this is a private room in a larger apartment, not a whole apartment.
description:
Small roomfor two people. Please note that this is a private room in a larger apartment, not a whole apartment.

A small double room in a 4-bed room flat. Also known as Honey Hostel, because the owner keeps bees in the Hungarian countryside.
The flat is in the middle of the famous 7th district of Budapest, the best area for finding entertainment. Whenever you arrive to the city there is always something going on in the streets of this district, there are always open bars and also the typical, cool "ruin pubs".
This is the best welcome a city can offer you.
You have shared bathroom (2 bathroom for 4 rooms). The bathrooms are modern, comfortable.
There is also a fully equipped kitchen at you disposal, you can buy and cook your own food and breakfast. You also have access to a fridge to store your food and we give you free tea and coffee!

reviews_text:
Location is great; central but quiet ( at least during the week ). Difficult to find a parking place and even if you find one is expensive.
Small bedroom, but comfortable bed and ok for short stays.
Thank you Orsi for hosting us !

This is one of the best airbnb's we've ever stayed at. It's right next to the basilica (which had a lovely Christmas market when we were there) and near 3 subway stations! It's also really close to everything and you can walk everywhere from there. The apartment is very cosy, cute and just perfect! I highly recommend this place to everyone!

This is a great location - it's in a safe, popular area - just beside the basilica. While we were visiting there was a Christmas Market in front of the basilica. It's two minutes from the metro - and it's easy to walk to the river from the apartment.

The apartment is lovely - the lift is just outside the door - so no stairs! It's a clean quiet building - and the apartment is spacious and bright. There's a lovely kitchen (which we didn't use) and a clean shower room. The bed and the sofa were comfortable and the place was warm - so we didn't need extra blankets. The wifi was excellent and it had everything we needed.  

Great location. Almost can reach all the sightseeing in walkable distance. It also close to metro and bus station (but don't really need it, except from airport). There is not many seasoning, so better to eat outside, especially the Hungarian food is so delicious. We have our breakfast at the cafe at street corner near metro station, was big portion and taste good! 

Better to bring your shampoo & conditioner if you needed. There have only shower gels in bathroom. Check in by ourselves with no trouble. 

Christmas market is opened now, great atmosphere started few steps outside of downstairs. My experience, the food in the market is more expensive than in local restaurant. 

Overall good experience, Budapest is so beautiful. We would like to come here again.

We loved this apartment, it was very central so just a short walk away from nice restaurants and bars. It was well equipped with everything we'd need and surprisingly quiet considering the great location. We'd happily stay here again. 

Nice flat, the ubication is perfect! the flat are really complete, everithing it's ok but the owner clean the flat too late anf if you want use the flat before it's uncomfortable.

Nice apartment, really good location, hard to find parking in the area. Thanks Fekete for everything, 

It was very nice to stay at Fekete's place, she has prepared everything before we arrived. Her place is big and cosy, and it's close to the city center.

This apartment was lovely. It's in a perfect location, you can walk easily to all major attractions. Fekete had the place set up and organised for us and the directions and instructions were very clear. Fekete was easily contactable for any concerns we had. Would definitely recommend! 

Thank you Fekete for stay! Place is super central, would recommend to stay for everyone who's looking for a place in city centre and for affordable price. The place is clean and lovely, highly recommend;)
review_summary: Nice apartment is for rent in the heart of Budapest, near to the the Basilica. The db flat is situated on the 1 floor, has 2 rooms, new renovated and equipped with new,stilish (URL HIDDEN) extremely central and practical for short staying guests.
description:
Nice apartment is for rent in the heart of Budapest, near to the the Basilica. The db flat is situated on the 1 floor, has 2 rooms, new renovated and equipped with new,stilish (URL HIDDEN) extremely central and practical for short staying guests.

Very quiet apartment in the heart of the city! It is easy to reach from the airport also with public transport. You should take the bus line nbr. 200 from the Airport to Kőbánya-Kispest metro staion, where you have to change to the metro line nbr. 3. You shuld travel with it till to the staion "ARANY JÁNOS UTCA", just get off, and Hercegprimas str. is just on the corner. The whole takes about 45 minutes!

The whole apartment is free for you, you can enjoy every advantages of a self-catering accomodation. It's no matter if you will arrive back late in the evening, or you would like to be just alone, and relaxe? It's easy in our calm and quiet apartment. 
Or would you cook your own meals? You can use the kitchen - equipped with everithing you need. (Pots, every kind of cuttleries, coffee-maker, pans.) 
There is a washing machine, iron, dishwasher-machine in our apartment.

You can reach me on my phone during your holiday spending in my apartment.

The Basilica is only 50 metres away, the Synagouge 800 metres, the Parliament 800 metres, the Chaim Bridge and the River Danube 500 metres from the apartment. Pubs, bars little grocery stores are in the neighbourhood.

Everything is reachable on foot! But metro station main public transport lines are also 5 min.!

Very clean, newly renovated house.

reviews_text:
Nice place to stay !

Small flat in a decent location, very basic but for the value can't complain you get what you pay for.Good communication.

Has everthing you need when you just want to shower and sleep

Great location. Easy to work with 

The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The apartment is right in the middle of the city centre - perfect location. Communication went smoothly with the host, he is perfectly available and ready to help in case there is an issue. The price-cost ratio is adequate as the apartment is not entirely renovated. 

Goed appartement en mooi gelegen

Excelente! muy recomendable!

Rendben ment minden a megbeszéltek szerint, kommunikáció folyamatos Gyurival, átadást recepciós hölgy végzi a helyszínen.

Een prima appartement om een paar dagen te vertoeven in Boedapest. Lekker centraal gelegen in een rustige wijk. Bij aankomst schoon en wel.
review_summary:
Renovated in 2016. October!!!!
Hi5 Apartment 11 is located in the District 5 district of Budapest. It is the ideal location for a holiday in the city. 
You've got everything: relatively close to center and away from the noise.
house_rules:
Attention regarding smokers: Smoking inside the apartment strictly prohibited. Please use the interior balcony or the sidewalk to go for a smoke. Thank you for your understanding! 
The heating has been properly set-up before you come in, and the flat is very well insulated, so please do not modify the heating sensor, it will be warm enough for you! 
Please keep noise levels down after 22:00.
There are house trash bins in the entrance corridor if you would like to remove excess rubbish from the apartment.
Housekeeping during your stay available upon request.
description:
Renovated in 2016. October!!!!
Hi5 Apartment 11 is located in the District 5 district of Budapest. It is the ideal location for a holiday in the city. 
You've got everything: relatively close to center and away from the noise.

This stylish, cozy 20 m² studio apartment is wonderfully located in the heart of the 5th district (the most central district of the city). You will be 2 minutes away by foot from the world-famous Parliament, 5 minutes away from St. Stephen's Basilika and Andrássy avenue (the Hungarian "Champs Elysées”), the Danube and the Chain Bridge are 5 blocks away, and the Buda Castle is a 15 minute walk.

This is a ground-floor apartment, so it stays nice and cool in the summertime.

Please note: This is a studio apartment with the bed on a gallery level that is only accessible by steep stairs.

Helpful and cheerful hosts who are eager to help with anything.

"The neighborhood is trendy and lively, crowded with bars, cafés, shops, supermarkets, and public gardens. The Szabadság square is a large park perfect for walks, 1 block away. The neighboring Basilika area is rich with Budapest’s newest and most modern restaurants. The Zrínyi street (a few minutes from the apartment) is host to several nightclubs and bars. Some of the best neighborhood bakeries in Budapest are in this area. Public transportation (subway, trams, and buses) leave from the Parliament, and there are bicycle rental stations nearby in the Deák Ferenc Square. Hop-on hop-off buses also leave from this square. The newly renovated Hold Utca Market is around the corner from the building with all the best Hungarian delicacies. We will give you suggestions of the best places to make the most of your stay, whether you want to eat, drink, have a coffee, or party! 

Have a look at the guide on this page, it references the main attractions in the city center around the apartment."

Subway: Kossuth Square (M2 subway line), Arany János Street (M3 subway line)
Railway Stations: 1 stop by metro from Nyugati Railway Station, 4 stops from Keleti Railway Station
Buses: Buses to the castle area

We have transfer service from and to the airport / train station / bus station. The prices are below:

From the airport: EUR 25 / car up to 4 people
To the airport: EUR 22 / car up to 4 people
From the train / bus station: EUR 18 / car up to 4 people
To the train / bus station: EUR 15 /car up to 4 people

In this case we will need you flight / train / bus number and your arrival time to Budapest. Our driver will be at the required time inside the terminal with your name.

reviews_text:
Georgia is super sweet and cool.  She was very attentive and willing to answer any questions about Budapest.  The apartment was just like the pictures, clean, cozy and well appointed.  It felt like home.  The location was awesome, literally across the street from Starbucks, Hummus Bar, Costa Coffee and dozen cafes and restos.  Seriously great location.


this is a very nice apartment!you can find everything you need! and also a welcome champagne!the location is fantastic!lots of great restaurants near by!Ireally enjoy the days here

Pearl in the city is just as adorable as pictured and I absolutely LOVED the location. Georgia is by far one of the best hosts and I truly couldn't say enough good things. From her airport transportation arrangements to the warm welcoming, she is beyond kind and made everything so comfortable. Communication was amazing and she shares so much information to guide you through your stay. I fell in love with Budapest and hope to visit again and I would definitely
Come back to Pearl. 

Georgia is a genuine and lovely person! She makes such an effort for her guests to feel welcome! The apartment is great and located in the perfect spot of the city. We were provided with everything we needed and are really pleased we chose this apartment for our stay in Budapest.

Nice location, accommodating, small apartment with the essentials. Host was very helpful. 

Pearl in the City is very ideal place to stay. Upon arrival Georgia welcomed us nicely with a bag of fresh cherries and bottle of wine. She has been very helpful and sweet. The apartment is perfectly located in the center, maximum 5mins. walk from the nearest Metro M3. Right across the apartment you'll find different restaurants, you will never run out of options. Everything is basically walking distance from the apartment (if youre fit enough just walk around, no need to buy travel card). The apartment itself is clean, we love everything about it it feels like little home away from home. Highly recommended place to stay when you're in Budapest.

Had an amazing time and the apartment was absolutely perfect! So central, we walked everywhere and had everything we needed. Would recommend for anyone to stay there. Thank you so much! X

Pearl in the City is indeed an actual Pearl in the heart of Budapest. It was a short visit, but a very nice one thanks to Györgyi's exceptional hospitality. The house is as described, cozy and absolutely perfect for couples to getaway within one of Budapest's best area. 

Great little apartment close to the main shopping street 15 minutes walk to most attractions on the Pest side of town. Györgyi and Balint have thought of everything with some nice touches such as a welcome bottle of wine, torches, information to assist with the stay, umbrellas, plenty of utensils etc. Balint greeted us and helped us settle in. Highly recommended propery and great value for money.

We had a great visit at Pearl in the City Apartment. It had a great location in a very nice neighbourhood and was close to everything. The apartment was very nice and the very kind host gave us many tips about what to do in this amazing city!
review_summary:
BRAND NEW!

If you want to be in the center, now you can be there! 

PEARL in the city apartment (email hidden)-build, brand new, modern and trendy apartment in the cultural centre of Budapest, at Kálvin Square. Ideal for up to 4 people
house_rules:
NO overnight guests; Surcharge is 30 EUR for check-in/check-out between 23:00 and 8:00.
Non registered persons must leave by 9 pm.
Check-out time: Until 11:00am.
Flexible check-out (after 11am) depends on whether new guests are booked to stay to stay in the apartment. However luggage can be stored safely in the house of the day of check-out till the cleaning will have been done
Be quiet after 10 pm!
Pillows, duvets with linen and towels provided. 
Cleaning service available for charge.
Please in every case let us know your flight number and the exact landing time. Please be informed, that we will go to the apartment for welcoming you, just after your call or text.
Minimum 3 nights required. 
Cancellation Policy: untill 1 week before the stay, 50% refund, in 1 week there is no refund.
See our strict policy about cancellation.
For bilogical contamination, we charge 10 EUR/pcs of contaminated materials.
Using slippers in the apartment is mandatory!
It is strictly prohibited to switch on/off the furnace and the internet device.
Please note, that based on the Hungarian tax regulations we have to provide some information about our guests. (Name, Passport number, Date of birth, Time of arrival, Time of leave) and we have to pay the tourist tax based on that - the price includes that, you do not need to pay anything more. We kindly ask you to help us with fulfilling our official Guest Book with the above data.If you feel uncomfortable with it, please tell us. Thank you very much for your cooperation.
description:
BRAND NEW!

If you want to be in the center, now you can be there! 

PEARL in the city apartment (email hidden)-build, brand new, modern and trendy apartment in the cultural centre of Budapest, at Kálvin Square. Ideal for up to 4 people

On the new main street of Budapest, just a few minutes walk from the metro and tram station, where two metro lines, several tram and bus stop are located. Kálvin Square is one of the transportation center of Budapest, so the apartment is easily accessible both by public transportation and on foot.
It is also a few minutes walk from Ráday Street, which is one of the most famous pedestrian streets of Budapest, as charming and diverse restaurants and pubs are housed here. They are a mix of cheap, cheerful and upmarket, so good for any level of budget. The world-famous "ruin pubs" of the seventh district, all just in a stone throw's. 
The capital's most popular shopping/pedestrian street, the Váci Street is also available just a few minutes from the apartment. If you are looking for culture or entertainment thanks to the apartment’s central location you can reach many of Budapest's sights on foot in 15 minutes.
By public transportation, it takes only two stops to Deák Square, the Elizabeth Square and Basilica, and this area is the gateway to the city's entertainment center, as numerous ruin pubs and clubs offer an opportunity to relax up all night. 
On giant screens you can enjoy the different sporting events as well.

The PEARL in the city apartment is located in an imposing downtown house, on the 3rd floor, in a calm and quiet area.
The apartment is modern and fully furnished, it provides space for 4 people with a fully equipped kitchen (refrigerator, stove, microwave, coffee maker, toaster and plates and cutlery). The bathroom has a shower and a washing machine. 
Towels and bed linen are also provided.
Since the communication is very important, of course I provide you WIFI connection.
In the apartment you will find useful maps, brochures and program suggestions.

The PEARL in the city apartment is located right next to my other apartment, the Red PEARL in the City. The two units can be joined together on demand, so up to 8 people can make use of our services. To do so, please check each apartment's calendar to make sure both of the apartments are free during the visit. If you book in time you have a great choice to find both of them available. 

After a long exhausting day the apartment will provide you a quite place to rest.

Feel free to use all the equipments and of course the provided herbs, sugar, sauces, tea and coffee.

Internet Speed: 120/sec

You can call or e-mail me any time and if you need my help I can personally come and assist you. Make yourself at home, enjoy the apartment and treat the place like if it were yours. 
I will personally meet you when you check in and let's stay in touch during your stay. I can be reached by phone or email anytime. If I’m abroad my assistant Balint will help you check in and be your host during your holyday. It takes few minutes both of us to be at the apartment. In case of emergency, you can reach Anikó the Hungarian speaking cleaning lady. 
You'll be given the best advice on where to go, visit, eat and drink. I provide you brochures and personal advices as well.


The locality also has lots of great pubs, bars, cafes and places to eat or drink. If you're tired you can eat in the restaurants directly located at the foot of the house in which they offer discounts for my guests. Morning meals are also simple to procure, there is a bakery opposite of the entrance of the house, and you can find a café serving breakfast and there is a grocery store as well.

As you can see there is a several possibility to spent you time but if you want to relax a bit, you will find quiescence in the beautiful apartment to sleep after an exhausting city tour through the marvelous Budapest.

The public transportation of the city is one of the best in the world. You should get off at stops called KÁLVIN Square. You can reach the apartment by 2 metro lines (Line 3 and line 4), trams number: 47, 48 and 49. And by bus Numb(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) and numb(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) at night. But as the apartment is in the City Center you can reach your destination on foot. Parking is available in front of the house. You have to pay 440 HUF/hour from 8:00 until 20:00 on weekdays and working days. 
To reach the apartment from the airport/railwaystation take a taxi/shuttle. In case if you request it we can organize either for you.


Grocery shopping can be easily done, since there is a shop opposite to the house. In addition there is an ATM, Bank, Post Office, Pharmacy etc… near the apartment.
You can use your DISCOUNT in the nearby restaurants. I provide you detailed information and map. 
Bankomat is downstairs next house to the right.

reviews_text:
We've stayed at the appartment for one day,me,my husband and a son and everything was as described on the picture.We arrived earlier than  chek-in time ,but  were gladly met, and we were really pleased. Julia is very communicative and easily got us all needed information about a location, helped with ordering a taxi. That day was national Hungarian holiday and we were lucky to see the best firework over the Danub!!  The appartment is in the inner yard,very quiet ,comfortable,in an  ancient building and  very close to the Parliament. It"s easy  to reach to different sites  on foot too. So, I just say many thanks to our host for such a pleasant staying. Aleksandra

nice flat very clean and tidy close to the center

Gyöngyi was so helpful to us and gave us a lot of tips. The apartment is very near to the subway and railway station. It was our first time in Budapest and we loved it especially because after a long bus trip we arrived to a clean, lovely flat.
review_summary: Stylish, elegant but also modern apartments steps from Danube, close to all sights and public transportation. The apartments are on the second floor facing to a beautiful and quiet courtyard of a 110 years old building. Restaurants, shops are around.
house_rules: No smoking, no parties, no pets please! Enjoy your stay! :)
description:
Stylish, elegant but also modern apartments steps from Danube, close to all sights and public transportation. The apartments are on the second floor facing to a beautiful and quiet courtyard of a 110 years old building. Restaurants, shops are around.

We'll meet front of the building upon your arrival. For that reason, please make sure we set an appointment at least two days in advance.

Thank you!

We'll be available for you via email and over the phone any time during your stay. :)

This is one of the most popular residential neighborhood in Pest. Close to restaurants, cafe's, shopping and most sights in city. Great public transport fro/to the airport and train/bus stations.

reviews_text:
The hotel gives a beautiful panoramic view of the city which I did not know about befor I came here, ,friendly staff, romantic atmosphere. This time I stayed alone, but I can not wait to bring my girlfriend here ,next time when I travel to or across Budapest.
It is an old building so it has thing what might not work in the way most people would expect (like water pressure in the shower) but it so insignificant. 
If you stay I would recommend to take breakfast. It is overkill. :D 

nice accomodation and kind persons.

Very nice and clean place. Nice view to Budapest. Out of the city crowd.

The hotel is situated on Buda with very nice night overview of Budapest.The personal were very nice and polite.

Beautifully situated on a quiet hill within 15 mins drive of Budapest city center. Upon our arrival the staff were very friendly and helpful. It was a pleasant change to wake up in such a lovely place after staying within the busy city

Clean room, quiet place and great view. It's really complicated to arrive by bus. You need to walk like 10mins in a dark street.

The room was clean, tidy and great, specially for travelers, we enjoyed also the morning breakfast and the hospitality! Recommend it to travelers!

Very cute hotel!
We were very satisfied from our stay. It's a really calm and cosy place in Buda. You wake up with an amazing view in the morning. You can park your car in front of the hotel which is very convenient. The people working in this place are really nice and trying. We can highly recommend- especially if you are with a car

Very nice and helpful people although only one young lady speaking English.
The room and the hotel in general could be a bit cleaner. It was top floor in hot days so lack of air conditioning was painful. No water in the room and nothing to buy, eat or drink around after late arrival. Breakfast additionally paid was hotel typical but coffee could be stronger. Nice terrace view having breakfast. 

Great place and friendly personal. The room had amazing view. Comfortable.
availability: 1 night minimum stay.From Dec 30, 2016 - Jan 01, 2017 the minimum stay is 3 nights.
review_summary:
Are you looking for a familiar hotel with a panoramic view, free WiFi and parking located in a peaceful environment?

This is a double room with 1 double bed in Budai Hotel.

*The price doesn't include breakfast. Optional buffet breakfast is 6 EUR / guest / day.*
house_rules:
The displayed price does not include breakfast! The optional buffet breakfast costs an additional 6 EUR / guest / day. You can order breakfast upon arrival, at the hotel.
Entire hotel is non-smoking.
No pets are allowed.
The hotel is not wheelchair accessible.
Check-in: from 14:00 PM.
Check-out: until 11:00 AM.
Free parking in front of the hotel. Free Wifi is available in the entire hotel.
This is a private room in a 3-star hotel.
This double room can accommodate max. 2 guests, and it has 1 double bed.
description:
Are you looking for a familiar hotel with a panoramic view, free WiFi and parking located in a peaceful environment?

This is a double room with 1 double bed in Budai Hotel.

*The price doesn't include breakfast. Optional buffet breakfast is 6 EUR / guest / day.*

Are you looking for a familiar hotel with a panoramic view, free WiFi and parking located in a peaceful environment?

You have just found the right place! Let us tell you why it is worth choosing the Budai Hotel:

We are waiting for your arrival in a calm, peaceful environment on the Széchenyi Hill located in the XII. district (Rácz Aladár street 45.). Our establishment is a 3 star hotel classified by the HotelStars Union which provides transparency and security for the guests.

From most of our rooms you can enjoy the fantastic panorama of Budapest. You can start your day with a lavish breakfast buffet while you are admiring the view of our capital.

This is a small hotel with a familiar atmosphere where we deal with our guests individually. The Budai Hotel is an ideal option for those who do not like big, impersonal places.

We have double and single bed rooms and we can also provide our guests with extra-beds if necessary. We have altogether 12 rooms so our hotel is an ideal place for families, friends, small groups or business travelers.

Our rooms are equipped with free internet access (WiFi), television sets (with both Hungarian and International TV channels), refrigerators and desks with chairs. All our rooms are en-suit. We also provide bed linen, towels, wardrobes and if needed, we can also provide hairdryers, flat-irons and ironing-boards.

Our guests can park their cars in front of the hotel which is free of charge, or they can use our closed and roofed parking lot (max. 4 cars) for a fee.

Our visitors can relax in our coffee-room and drink bar where they can try out different coffee drinks, beers, wines and spirits. (also non-alcoholic drinks for kids) If our guests are looking for a bit of relaxation, they can play a game of billiards, table football, darts or badminton. We also have a spacious hall where all our guests can be together. At the reception desk the visitors can buy tickets for various programs in Budapest.

Payment options: cash (Forint, Euro); credit card; money transfer.

We have three conference rooms that are suitable for weddings, business meetings, birthdays and parties.

The downtown of Budapest is 5.9 km away from the hotel. It takes approximately 14 minutes to get to the city center by car; it takes approximately 30 minutes by public transport.

We recommend our hotel to:

Business travelers who can use our conference room, photocopier, printing machine, scanner and internet access to go about their lawful occasions easier.

Through passenger who would like to spend a quiet evening in our town.

Couples who would like to enjoy the panorama of Budapest from their terrace.

Families who would like spend their holiday together in rooms that have two separate chambers.

Tourists who are interested in sight-seeing.

Groups who are looking for a place that can provide comfortable accommodation for all of them and where they can spend valuable time together.

Private room, public (shared) terrace with panorama, game room with table football, billiards, table tennis.

Reception is open from 7:00 AM until midnight. Reception is available non-stop via phone.

Quiet, elegant, green area, panorama, far from the noise and polluted air of the city.

The downtown of Budapest is 5.9 km away from the hotel. It takes approximately 14 minutes to get to the city center by car; it takes approximately 30 minutes by public transport. The nearest bus station is 400 m away, the nearest tram station is 900 m away.

This is a private double room in the 3-star Budai Hotel. It has 1 double bed for 2 guests. Room amenities: private bathroom, free Wifi, flat-screen TV, refrigerator, desk, chairs, hairdryer, bed linen, towels, free parking.

reviews_text:
Everything as promised! My wife and I travelled to Budapest for the first time with our friend. We were in communication with Zita before our arrival and helped us with the location. She met us at the door to the flat and was most welcoming! The location is perfect! A short walk to anything worthwile! Excellent neighborhood for shops, cafe's, and the touristic sites. The flat was clean, spacious, and just an overall great stay. Would stay here again without any hesitation!

This was a great stay with a very informative and helpful host. Would recommend to all visitors.

We can't say enough about our stay at Budflat Asgard. We met with Sofie at check-in (Zita was away), and she warmly welcomed us and showed us around the flat. Zita and Sofie ensured that we had all the extras for our 14-month-old daughter. The flat itself is nicely maintained, spacious and with many amenities to make the stay comfortable. The location is excellent - in walking distance to main attractions and close to numerous restaurants, shops and grocery store. We really enjoyed the whole experience and would recommend the flat to anyone. Thanks Sofie and Zita!

Zita's flat was exactly as described. We appreciated the character of the apartment, the many thoughtful amenities that were included and how clean the unit was. We also very much enjoyed the central location, fast wifi and close proximity to many good restaurants and sights in the area. Don't hesitate to book with Zita if you are traveling to this beautiful city!

Couldn't have been better! The apartment is very clean and in a great location in the center of Budapest. This place is exactly as it is described. Zita was super nice and very helpful. We got fruits, candy, bottle of wine
and a lot of very useful information about Budapest. key transfer process went smoothly without any problem.
  I would absolutely stay here again and recommend it 100%.


Although we were a late arrival, zita's friend (Sofie) was there for us. She showed us around, had some nice chilled grape juice, and kept in account we might be tired after our journey.

Sofie made herself available if there would be anything we needed through iMessage.

The neighbourhood is also perfect. This is where the better restaurants are, away from the tourist trap areas. It's safe and close by the major sights.

We can only recommend everybody to stay here :)

Beautiful, clean and spacious apartment in an ideal location. The apartment is bigger than the perception you get when look at the pictures. Lots of great coffee places, restaurants , metro and trams within 10 mins walking distance. A few tourist spots are within 10 mins walking as well. Zita welcomed us on our arrival and showed us the place and answered all questions that we had. In spite of the proximity to all the places, the apartment is in a large building with a huge courtyard in the middle and is very quiet. The Italian restaurant next door was quite good as well. Would definitely stay if I'm back again in Budapest. Highly recommended!

Very nice apartment, super clean and comfortable! Location is amazing especially for tourists. It's very close to a lot of nice bars, restaurants and tourist sites!

beautiful flat with perfect location. best apartments I have ever rent with very delicate landlord.
very spacious and aesthetic flat, excellent choice for 2+1 or 2+2 companies or for family with children. separated shower and WC (for me it s important, especially if you're not just with your partner). I recommend it for everyone who wants realy great stay in Budapest.

I highly recommended this apartment; very spacious, clean, excellent location. A supermarket is around the corner.
review_summary:
The closest metro station (5 min walk) is only 5 stations away from the main venue of the  2017 FINA World Aquatics Championships.

This apartment combines all the best features the other apartments of Zita (Budflat Midgard and Budflat Walhalla) have.
It is located in the heart of downtown Budapest, all the main tourist attractions like the Chain Bridge, Parliament building, Saint Stephen's Basilica are just a few minutes walk from there.

reviews_text:
We really liked the apartment. Located in the heart of the city, nice, cozy, clean... A lot of thanks to Beata!

Nice apartment in a lovely, central area. Easy communication before our stay. I'd imagine the place will be quite cold in winter time, though, as there's only one heat source, and it's not enough for the whole apartment. Definitely good value for money, though! 

Stay here if you want a great location, and don't plan on spending a lot of time inside. 

Beáta has been an amazing host. She sent me a lot of information before our arrival and make it easy for us to have a pleasant experience.  She allowed us to arrive and leave the flat according to our schedule.
The apartment is exactly as in the pictures: cozy and comfortable.
Located in the city center of Budapest, surrounded by the main attractions, ruin bars and restaurants, I definitely recommend Beáta's flat for your stay in Budapest.
Another small note, a couple of meter closed to the flat visit the Frici Papa, amazing local restaurant.   

The appartment is very cheap. It id not perfect and the furniture made a lot of noice, but to the price it is alright.

Bea's apartment was perfect for a weekend in Budapest. Clean, comfy, and had all the necessities were provided. The only critique I have is that the mattresses were ver squeaky. However the mattress itself was extremely comfortable! I would definitely recommend this apartment as a place to stay!

Every thing was as described. An excellent, central base to explore Budapest. Area is great for the younger crowd - so lively and busy in the evening. However the flat was nice and quiet.

 


Host was very accommodating with check-in & check-out times,  which we really appreciated.  The flat was clean & the location is great.

The flat has an excellent location. It's basic but good for the price. However the beds were really creaky which made it a little hard to sleep at night! Overall a good airbnb though.

Clearly this place is a business all is set up for rbnb - mattress are awful consequently beds are unconfortable and are really noisy! there is no TV and there is nothing inside the flat - kitchen is not that clean - couldnt even do a coffee with sugar! we didnt enjoy as much the flat but the location was excellent - it's not a cosy flat and balconny is just a table space! but will recomment if you need to spend time inside... great location 

This flat is in a great location, and the host's communication in advance was perfect to ensure that we knew exactly what to expect. 

The flat was very cosy for 6 people staying in it, but in good condition and with good amenities.

Budapest is a terrific city, and I would heartily recommend staying there if you get the opportunity.
review_summary: Friendly, private apartment in the heart of Budapest's historical center, every sight just a few minute walk away. Excellent traffic, many shops, bars, restaurants, ruinpubs at the doorstep! New and youthful equipment, privat terrace :)
house_rules:
Please, respect residents of the house, this is a quiet and friendly house, and we would like to keep it that way. :) 
Pets can come but only after a preliminary discussion. 
The apartment's inside is a non-smoking area, you can smoke on the private terrace.
description:
Friendly, private apartment in the heart of Budapest's historical center, every sight just a few minute walk away. Excellent traffic, many shops, bars, restaurants, ruinpubs at the doorstep! New and youthful equipment, privat terrace :) 


Friendly, private apartment in the heart of Budapest's historical center, every sight just a few minute walk away. Excellent traffic, many shops, bars, restaurants at the doorstep! If you want to visit the special Hungarian ruin-pubs, it's your place! :) 
The flat is sunny and quiet, in a peaceful garden environment; it is fully equipped with new, comfortable and youthful furniture. New kitchen with all accessories, walk-in wardrobe, bathroom, and the main room where 6 people can sleep (on two double beds and a double sofa bed). 
We have washing machine, fridge, microwave, Wi-fi, and the kitchen is equipped with all necessary items.
We have a private terrace, where you can relax over the rooftop of the city.


If you need any help, just call me, and I will try to do my best for your excellent and unforgettable holiday here: I can recommend lots of programs or way how you can see the best part of the city.


Close to the apartment (max. 3-5 sec. by walk) is the metro center with all of metrolines, the main trolley line, bus station and stops, etc, if you want to explore sites further away. But the main sight are really close, so you only need your feet to see them.. :)
The flat is peaceful, quiet, with garden environment, but in the heart of city's life :)

Prices:
There is a basic price depending on the length of your stay. The basic price covers the apartment for 1 or 2 person. For every extra person is 8 euro extra per night.
The basic price for one night stay is 40 euro and 36 euro if you stay just two nights.
For 3 night to one week stays the basic price is 32 euro per night.
If you stay more than one week the basic price is 28 euro per night, for more than one month stay the basic price is 24 euro per night.
The cleaning fee is 10 euro, what you have to pay in cash when you check-in.

reviews_text:
Excellent location and apartment was great. Tibor was very welcoming and accommodating. 

Had the most amazing time in Budapest in this cosy and quaint apartment. Tibor was a fantastic host. The only little point to note is the cooking facility does not get very hot. But that was only a minor point. We are already planning our next trip back.

Absolutely fantastic place! Super central, within walking distance to everything you need. Lovely spacious and clean home. Highly recommend! 

Great location, close to everything. Easy to arrive and great host.

House was more than I expected. Great quiet neighborhood, really close to city center. Everywhere is walking distance. And tibor is a great host. I definitely suggest here 

Perfect, cozy place. Perfect location. Thank you Tibor!

Tibor was very communicative and answered with very short notice on all questions we had before arriving - that was great! And the lady that was waiting for us when arrived was very nice and explained everything we needed to know. The apartment is perfect for three people and is located very in a very nice neighborhood basicly with everything we  wanted to see within short range. Thanks a lot!

We didn't actually meet the host as we arrived early and met the other guests leaving. The apartment is in a brilliant location, within walking distance of every important site and is 500m from the National Museum. It is warm and the separate shower area is nice , with warm water. The space has plenty of room and is really good value. The bed is comfortable, nice couch, working TV. I would certainly stay again. Taxi rank is right outside the entrance gate.

Awesome place! Right in city center, close to everything! Bus stop right in front, metro and tram very close. The apartment has everything, better than a hotel room. Nice welcome amenity and advice about places. Currency exchange at golden exchange left from Blaha Lujza ter. One block to Szimpla Kert. Best stay so far.

A great stay, lovely hosts 
Perfect location
review_summary: Classy and cozy, one-bedroom, bare-brick home's true city experience! Two people can fit comfortably in it, and a central location, a wide avenue, not far short walk  from the Danube ...
