The check-in and the check-out time is very flexible. It only depends on the leavings and arrivals of the previous and next guests.
Loud music and a party is not allowed after 20.00h.
The capacity of the apartment is maximum 3 pers
persons to sleep. Extra persons, friends and guest certainly are Tibor
description:
Classy and cozy, one-bedroom, bare-brick home's true city experience! Two people can fit comfortably in it, and a central location, a wide avenue, not far short walk  from the Danube ...

Popular ruin pubs can be found in large numbers by the in vicinity. Classy and comfortable! One bedroom, brick patterned our home, real urban experience. 2-3 people can fit comfortably inside. Live in the city center, in a quiet apartment, a short walk away! .. But near the Elizabeth bridge. Enjoy a modern kitchen! With excellent public transport. But you can see  here to the best interesting sights of Budapest. From there.. in a trip home a few minutes you can ...

   in the  apartment ,is located  a microwave hair dryer refrigerator, vacuum cleaner, modern television shower, sink toilet stove, paper  blinds, bedside lamps sink rack mirrors, comfortable beds, sofa chair, clothes dryers pots pans plates glasses chairs flowers pictures of coffee, tea sugar toalett.papír travel books, maps napkin salt  kettle tea makers can be found ...

Personal contact on arrival or departure! The key transmission, the flat presentation, and information for all our guests!only the guests reside in the apartment. The host, starts and goes 

 To the street door located next to the the Urania cinema is on the 110 year-old building!  Is an easy walk to museums, thermal baths, the magnificent panorama of the Danube, and the Central Market too! Supermarkets are shops, money changers, restaurants, are very close! Countless  ruin pubs and discos, pubs and clubs ,provide recreational opportunities! An unforgettable in the night  Budapest..

Metro stops, 200m away, all quickly easily and cheaply accessible! Get off at the Uránia! And There is in the apartment! Thank you! Welcome! :) 

Cafes pubs in the area are, close to ruin pubs ,popular with young people, and the Great Synagogue, and the beautiful Boulevard Charles too! Romantic walks   available .

reviews_text:
Claudia is a great host with a wonderful house right in the center of the city. The design of the house is fantastic, thank you.

We had an amazing time in Claudia's flat. The location couldn't be better.  The flat was very clean, good size, central, and very very comfortable! We didn't meet Claudia but she always responded to our questions and requests immediately. We would love to come back to Budapest and stay in this flat again. Thank you Claudia for being such a great host.

UNBELIEVABLE apartment!!! 
The BEST location in Budapest. Walking distance from most sites, and very close by to tram and metro. 
This was our 4th Airbnb apartment and by far the best one (and we've stayed in beautiful apartments). 
The pictures dose not show how incredibly large and spacious this apartment is. Wherever you look you will find beautiful art pieces, all with great taste, to give you a feeling of home away from home. 
The Mini Mouse room is awesome! The kids enjoyed sleeping there, and in general really loved exploring the flat. 
We didn't had the chance to meet Claudia, but was welcomed by a nice girl.  Claudia  was available online  trough the whole time, and helped with great tips. She even booked a taxi to the airport. 
We defiantly recommend this apartment, and hope to come back one day.  

This was our return stay. We were looking forward to getting back to Budapest and the apartment. It did not disappoint on our return.
Again neatly presented, clean - could have had a bit more washing powder for guests convenience - previous people had used it all up. A bar of soap in the bathroom would be great, too.

This apartment is suitable for couples or a couple with children. The second double bed is just the children's double bunk/ cubby pictured in images, and would not suffice for adults. 

All said a great place, with pleasant hosts and a convenient location, almost directly opposite the Opera House and a few steps from the metro. 

The gentle shudder of the metro is felt in the walls/ building, but I suspect, this would be the case anywhere along the metro line. You do not hear street noise despite being on busy Andrassy Avenue. Double glazing ensures quiet living in a great central location. 

Lots of great places to eat around, including Bistro Fine & Ket Szerencen (just around the corner) plus 360 Bar - a stunning Rooftop bar with amazing views is just a short stroll at 39 Andrassy Utca.

My remarks are all very minor comments to what is a great place to stay in Budapest. 
I wouldn't hesitate to recommend it.

Host insisted on 10am checkout, but allowed storage of our bags til 1pm, which was perfect!

Thank you Szab and Claudia - this is a great place to stay 

Listing details accurate. Lovely, bright and spacious in a good central location. Could not fault it. Fanny who checked us in was very kind and showed flexibility to accommodate our return timings and departure requests. Claudia communicated efficiently with us & and addressed our queries. We found the apartment very comfortable and in a great location, with a little coffee house next door where we ate breakfast, got coffees, etc. Located directly opposite the Opera House, so easy access via metro to the city centre and all key tourist locations.

Stunning, massive apartment -- your jaw will drop upon entering it.

Great, helpful hosts. I arrived late, but someone was there to meet me with a key and introduce me to the apartment. Claudia was available by email for any questions I had.

The best Airbnb experience I've ever had.

Quite consistent with description.
Great location. Very quiet although in a busy street. 
Clean, well arranged with all the equipment necessary.
Supplies to cook without go shopping on arrival.
Cordial welcome, care and attention during our stay.


 


This was a very good experience. Host communication and organisation was first class. The flat itself was very good indeed. It's hard not to get into hyperbole about it, but it's probably the best Airbnb place we've ever stayed in.
It's situated in one of the best streets in Budapest , with plenty of good bars and restaurants. Transport links are great too, with an underground station 2 minutes walk from the flat.
Host left us a bottle of wine and a few essentials to set us off.
The flat is beautifully finished and furnished , clean , modern and stylish. Very comfortable. Bathroom furnishings and kitchen are superb.

It's on a busy street, so there's plenty to see and do , but when inside the flat you wouldn't realise it. It's very well noise insulated and almost totally silent.  

We'd definitely recommend this flat to anyone thinking of visiting Budapest !

The best of the best... What else to say then that it is perfect and Hosts are also unbelievable... Everything was just perfect!

The flat was better than the pictures.  The pictures do not give you a sense of scale.  Claudia and Szab's space is massive, and tastefully decorated.  The finishes feel high end, and don't only look good for the photos.  Internet connection was fast enough, stable, and a high-powered router meant a strong signal throughout the property.  The space is in an upmarket building with offices and is very quiet.  Good sound insolation means you will not be disturbed, despite being on a main street.  The location is excellent, with a metro stop around the corner, and a supermarket across the street.  Szab and Claudia were readily available and very attentive. The flat is well appointed, with everything you need.  All you need to bring is a toothbrush.  Very thoughtful.
review_summary:
Footsteps from the Opera House, the apartment offers prime downtown luxury for couples and families. With 4 meter high ceilings, this unique design flat offers a perfect, stylish base to explore the very heart of downtown Budapest.

See our the reviews for what our guests have had to say about their stay.
house_rules:
Check out time is 10am, and check-in time is 2 pm (but will try to be flexible whenever possible). 

No smoking permitted at all, smoke detectors installed. 

Inquisitive guests preferred!

It's close to all the main attractions or else very easily accessible. Felt very secure in the apartment it's very safe. The apartment was very clean and the wifi is excellent. Check in was very easy as was checkout, lovely hosts would definitely recommend staying here. 

It is a brilliant flat. You are so central for going out or going to shopping. The flat is very clean and everything was so nice and easy to handle!

Michael

Great location, clean and nice flat, helpful hosts! Surely recommend it! 

This listing is in the heart of the Budapest! I was a little worried as I arrived at 1:00 AM and the neighborhood was bustling with nightlife and all I wanted to do was sleep, but the moment I stepped inside the apartment it was completely silent. This was a great place to call home while in Budapest. I fell in love with Budapest and would definitely stay here again on my next visit if its available. 

Thank you very much Henry and Zinka, for beautiful apartment.
Budapesth is amazing city. Flat is in good place. 
Everything is available by foot.
Thank you 

The Service was excellent, really felt like a 5 star accomodation 

I truly loved staying in this apartment! We're welcomed very kindly and the apartment was perfect- clean, modern, well equipped and especially in a super comfortable area. Located in a street which is mentioned in every travel guide, close to bars and restaurants and from where you can reach almost everything by foot.
Such a great experience with such friendly hosts! Honest Recommendation!! 

Henry and Gabriel were so welcoming and helpful.
We had a problem with the electricity supply and Henry dealt with the situation promptly and efficiently.
The apartment is perfect for a couple wanting a very central place to stay

Very nice apartment location is very good...
everything was close.



Very nice apt, top location, clean and stilish

There are 2 same apartments side by side, so it is a perfect place for friends, families, and couples
