description:
Our luxury design studio is very good located! By walk you can reach almost all of the sights, and very good, famous areas with great bars, restaurants, night clubs, ruin pubs and baths. Very close you can find all kind of public transport.

There are 2 same apartments side by side, so it is a perfect place for friends, families, and couples

Here you will find a very friendly, cosy in a traditional, authentic building block centraly located in Budapest 7th district. The flat is situated on the 1st floor accessible by lift or foot via stairs at the opposite of the main entrance accross the internal balcony yard where smoking is allowed. Steppin out to the street you will be at the heart of a very vibrant day and night life 4 minutes away from the underground.

Our Team offers you special services like
| airport or other transfers,
| breakfast and food service,
| thematic programs,
| car and bike hire and
| non-stop customer service.

You can call us anytime you need help or instructions, we are available all day long.

Not only you will be in the very center of the city within close walking distance of almost all tourist attractions and the river Danube. You will also be in the heart of the Old Jewish District that one of the most unique and currently the hippest neighborhood of Budapest. Home to the world famous ruin bars and other amazing places, including the best bars, restaurants and clubs in town.

Almost all major tourist attractions are within close walking distance (the Gozsdu court, Dohany Street Synagogue, Europe's biggest and the World 2nd biggest synagogue and the National Museum is literally a five minute walk for instance).

Should you want to venture further the area is close to a major public transportation with connection to all subway lines and other major bus and tram lines. Making sure you get even the furthest parts of Budapest fairly quickly.

::TRAM
47 | 49 name of station: "Deák Ferenc tér"
4 | 6 name of station: "Király utca"

::METRO
M1 - name of station: "Opera"
M3 | M4 - name of station: "Deák Ferenc tér"


------------------------------------------
::PARKING - on the street
workdays: 440 HUF/hour between 8am and 20:00pm after free
weekend: free

::PARKING - parking house
every day: 5500 HUF/day.

reviews_text:
Enjoyed my stay very much!

It was a really nice stay jn the appartement. The kitchen was well furnished.
Just the bed upside is not a bed.. it s a mattrass, but anway it was comfortable. All in all a nice stay.

Don't waste your money. This is not privately managed, but rather by a company.  Dirty, sewer odor, building construction, etc. etc. etc. Certain items in the pictures do not come with the apartment. 

Great place! Clean, modern interior, central, and walking distance to most of the downtown places to see specifically the Market hall and the Danube river are just 5min walk. It's managed by a real estate company that has agents for late check in. Defineitely recommended 

The apartment looked as it was listed and was in a nice area, Great location within walking distance to restaurants.

Host was great, I would highly recommend this place to anyone, good location, all facilities are available, description fully ties to the actual condition of the apartment. 

Nice modern apartment perfect place to explore the city afoot. if I visit budapest again...Will stay same place ;-)

Small but comfy place. Clean and quit, in a beautiful backyard. 

Good place, great location but there are some small problems. The place is operated by a company. Upon arrival there was some miscommunications among the departments so some towels and bed sheets had to be brought in 30 minutes after we checked in. The staff was super friendly and they ran to make sure we had those sheets as soon as possible. I think the apartment is newly renovated. Some small issues such as bathroom door hard to close.
Overall very friendly staff and a great experience!

The location was perfect, walking distance from the sights and very quiet at night.  I will definitely stay there again.
review_summary:
Hi5 Apartment 64 is located in the 5 district of Budapest. It is the ideal location for a holiday in the city. 
You've got everything: right in the center and away from the noise.
description:
Hi5 Apartment 64 is located in the 5 district of Budapest. It is the ideal location for a holiday in the city. 
You've got everything: right in the center and away from the noise.

"This apartment is wonderfully located in the heart of the 5th district (the most central district of the city). You are close to the famous Váci Street, the main fashion shopping street in Budapest, with souvenir stores and breath-taking architecture. The St. Stephen's Basilika and Andrássy Avenue (the Hungarian "Champs Elysées”) is about 5 minutes with the subway, the Danube and the Chain Bridge and the famous Vörösmarty Square (where the Christmas market takes place) is around the corner. This is the best location you could possibly get in Budapest. 

The apartment is on the ground floor, so it stays nice and cool in the summer months."

"The neighborhood is trendy and lively, crowded with bars, cafés, shops, supermarkets, and public gardens. The area is rich with Budapest’s newest and most modern restaurants, with cuisines ranging from Hungarian, Italian, French, burgers, burritos - the best of everything. The "Budapest Eye" ferris wheel is 1 block away in the summer time. The famous Central café is 1 minute walk. Public transportation (subway, trams, and buses) leave directly from Deák Square, and there are bicycle rental stations nearby. The airport shuttle arrives/departs straight from the square as well. We will give you suggestions of the best places to make the most of your stay, whether you want to eat, drink, have a coffee, or party! 

Have a look at the guide on this page, it references the main attractions in the city center around the apartment."

"Subway: Ferenciek tere metro station (M3)
Trams: Line 47, 49 
Railway Stations: 3 stops by metro from Nyugati Railway Station
Buses: Buses to the castle area, Hop-On Hop-Off buses"

reviews_text:
This is an amazing apartment! It is so close to everything (main sights, the chain bridge, public transport) plus there were so many christmas Markets around it was just magical. There was a little complication with check in, but beyond that the apartment and vacation was amazing. Definitely stay here!!! 

Everything as advertised, fast service and communication

Great spot, next to so many restaurants, and sites. Check in and check out was extremely easy. Would definitely stay here again. Thank you!

The apartment is in the center and everything is nearby; all the sightseeing places and bars and restaurants. We even found a parking for the car nearby.

Good location!

Everything excellent! Nice apartment in the heart of Budapest.
Recommended.

Hi,

the house was very well located, warm enough and neat. We stayed in the heart of the city. Just two streeets away from cathedral, two streets from Danube and chain bridge. In my next trip to Budapest i can stay in the same house.

Thanks for everything.

Excellent organisation, simple, flexible and effective welcome :-)

Great location. We had little technical issues but Hi5 apartment team always try to help so much. 

The apartment is very nice and clean. It's in the center of Budapest, so you can walk to restaurants and bars. Everything is ok, only bathroom/toilet - there is no window or ventilation and it's little awkward when you are with new girlfriend :)
review_summary:
Hi5 Apartment 07 is located in the District 5 district of Budapest. It is the ideal location for a holiday in the city. 
You've got everything: relatively close to center and away from the noise.
house_rules:
Attention regarding smokers: Smoking inside the apartment strictly prohibited. Please use the interior balcony or the sidewalk to go for a smoke. Thank you for your understanding! 
The heating has been properly set-up before you come in, and the flat is very well insulated, so please do not modify the heating sensor, it will be warm enough for you! 
Please keep noise levels down after 22:00.
There are house trash bins in the entrance corridor if you would like to remove excess rubbish from the apartment.
Housekeeping during your stay available upon request.
description:
Hi5 Apartment 07 is located in the District 5 district of Budapest. It is the ideal location for a holiday in the city. 
You've got everything: relatively close to center and away from the noise.

This cozy 22 m² one-bedroom apartment is wonderfully located in the heart of the 5th district (the most central district of the city). You will be 1 minute away by foot from the famous St. Stephen's Basilika and Andrássy avenue (the Hungarian "Champs Elysées”), the Danube and the Chain Bridge are 3 blocks away, the famous Vörösmarty Square (where the Christmas market takes place) is across the adjacent Nádor Square, and the Buda Castle is a 10 minute walk. This is the best central location you could possibly get in Budapest. Dorottya Apartment 15 and 22 are also in this building.



Helpful and cheerful hosts who are eager to help with anything.

The neighborhood is trendy and lively, crowded with bars, cafés, shops, supermarkets, and public gardens. The area is rich with Budapest’s newest and most modern restaurants, with cuisines ranging from Hungarian, Italian, French, burgers, burritos - the best of everything. There is a large supermarket 1 block away. The Váci street, the main fashion shopping street in Budapest, with souvenir stores and breath-taking architecture is a few minutes away. You can see the "Budapest Eye" ferris wheel from the window right in the summertime. Public transportation (subway, trams, and buses) leave directly from the square (Deák Tér stop), and there are bicycle rental stations nearby. Guided tours leave from every nearby square. The airport shuttle arrives/departs straight from the square as well. The Zrínyi street (which crosses Október 6. Street) is host to several nightclubs and bars, including Kraft, Ötkert, Nomuri, and Divino. We will give you suggestions of the best places to make the most of your stay, whether you want to eat, drink, have a coffee, or party! 

Have a look at the guide on this page, it references the main attractions in the city center around the apartment.

Subway: Deák Ferenc Tér (M2 and M3 subway lines)
Trams: Line 2 (Runs adjacent to Danube), Line 47, 49
Railway Stations: 2 stops by metro from Nyugati Railway Station, 3 stops by metro from Keleti Railway Station
Buses: Buses to the castle area, Hop-On Hop-Off buses

We have transfer service from and to the airport / train station / bus station. The prices are below:

From the airport: EUR 25 / car up to 4 people
To the airport: EUR 22 / car up to 4 people
From the train / bus station: EUR 18 / car up to 4 people
To the train / bus station: EUR 15 /car up to 4 people

In this case we will need you flight / train / bus number and your arrival time to Budapest. Our driver will be at the required time inside the terminal with your name.

reviews_text:
Das Apartment ist echt hübsch, eignet sich am besten für Pärchen und Geschäftsreisen. Es ist modern und geschmackvoll eingerichtet, viele Spotlights. Es befindet sich direkt an der andrassy utca, also sehr gute Lage und da das Apartment im 4. OG ist, kriegt man nichts von dem Trubel mit, alles sehr ruhig.
Fahrstuhl vorhanden. 
Alles in allem weiter zu empfehlen
availability: 1 night minimum stay.From Dec 23 - 25, 2016 the minimum stay is 3 nights.
review_summary: This cozy 40 m² 1 bedroom apartment is wonderfully located in the heart of the 6th district (the most central district of the city).
house_rules:
Guests should give their estimated arrival time and meet the host (or his delegate) at check-in, there is a reception. Attention regarding smokers: Smoking inside the apartment strictly prohibited. Please use the sidewalk to go for a smoke. Thank you for your understanding! 
The heating has been properly set-up before you come in, and the flat is very well insulated.
Please keep noise levels down after 22:00.
There are house trash bins in the entrance corridor if you would like to remove excess rubbish from the apartment.
Housekeeping during your stay available upon request.
description:
This cozy 40 m² 1 bedroom apartment is wonderfully located in the heart of the 6th district (the most central district of the city).

You are close to the famous Nagymező Street, the Broadway of Budapest, with restaurants, bars and stores and breath-taking architecture. Andrássy Avenue (the Hungarian "Champs Elysées”) is the name of the street where is the apartment, the Danube and the Chain Bridge and the famous Vörösmarty Square (where the Christmas market takes place) is around the corner. This is the best location you could possibly get in Budapest. The building is a classic post-War modernist residential house, typical of downtown Budapest with an interior courtyard and hanging corridors. The neighborhood is safe with foot traffic, strong security, locked gates after 10pm, and a coded entry door.

Helpful and cheerful hosts who are eager to help with anything.

The neighborhood is trendy and lively, crowded with bars, cafés, shops, supermarkets, and public gardens. The area is rich with Budapest’s newest and most modern restaurants, with cuisines ranging from Hungarian, Italian, French, burgers, burritos - the best of everything. The "Budapest Eye" ferris wheel is 1 block away in the summer time. The famous Central café is 1 minute walk. Public transportation (subway, trams, and buses) leave directly from Deák Square, and there are bicycle rental stations 20 meters away. The airport shuttle arrives/departs straight from the square as well. We will give you suggestions of the best places to make the most of your stay, whether you want to eat, drink, have a coffee, or party! 

Have a look at the guide on this page, it references the main attractions in the city center around the apartment.

Subway: Deák Ferenc Tér (M2 and M3 subway lines, M1 historic metro line)
Trams: Line 2 (Runs adjacent to Danube), Line 47, 49, 4, 6
Railway Stations: 2 stops by metro from Nyugati Railway Station, 3 stops by metro from Keleti Railway Station
Buses: Buses to the castle area, Hop-On Hop-Off buses

We provide towels, bed linens and hair-dryer in our apartment.

You can order breakfast the price is EUR 5 / day / person. You can order it when you check in.

reviews_text:
Balazs was very communicative and helped us very much providing exact information on how to reach the apartment, where also he had a friend to welcome us and show us around the place. He also arranged a shuttle that made our transport to the airport very easy, since our departure flight was at dawn.
The apartment was very central, right on Vaci street, walking distance from xmas markets, supermarkets, shops and the famous ruin pub district.
At the same time, the place was very clean, cozy and always warn, despite our visit was in mid-December.
I centainly recommend Balazs's place and looking forward to visiting Budapest again.

Amazing place, it's even better than shown in the pictures. Very clean and very stylish, also even though we visited in a period of pretty low temperatures, the heating was amazing and never troubled us. The neighbourhood is great, the apartment is literally in one of the most central areas of the city, with pretty much everything in walking distance, which is really convenient. I also liked the fact that the host arranged our transportation from the airport, it was a nice touch and made the overall process of getting to the flat pretty smooth. Also they were kind enough to give us various tips of places to go and visit around the city, and where to find restaurants, bars, pubs etc in reasonable prices. Overall, I highly recommend it!

This place is in an excellent location making it easy to visit shops, restuarants, and for site seeing. The host and his colleagues were very nice and made check in very easy. The pictures are accurate - the place is small but so cozy and perfect for one or maybe two people. Had a great time! 

An absolutely perfect base from which to explore Vienna! The apartment was exactly as pictured (as well as very cozy, thoughtfully furnished and easy to find), with all the amenities I needed on my short stay. Thank you!

We had some trouble at the airport but Balázs had organised a transfer from the airport and was very flexible about it. Our stay went very well, we loved the atmosphere of the apartment and having a nice breakfast in the little kitchen area! The apartment was also well located, just a 10 minutes walk from the Christmas markets that I would highly recommend! Thank you again for the hospitality! 

Very nice flat, very nice atmosphere, perfect situation, very calm, bed perfect. Thank you !

Absolutely lovely little apartment with all the facilities you need for a short stay.

Easily accessible and easy to communicate with the owner to arrange check ins and transport to and from the airport.

Experience leading up to our stay was excellent. Our host even arranged transport from the airport ( and back!)
Location was excellent - easy walking distance from the main attractions and surrounded by a great choice of bars and restuarants.
Flat was cosy and warm and very quiet.
No hesitation in recomending this property.

The best way to describe the place is "Cozy". Amazing place, small and comfortable - everything was exactly where it should be. Great location, friendly hosts, very communicative and responsive.
Amazing value for money, a great place for a couple!!

Thanks!

Nice and cosy place in a very centrical location. We loved it !
availability: The minimum night stay for this listing varies.
review_summary: Check this brand new apartment in the Váci street! This is the real city centre! The flat is in pedestrian zone, in the most famous street of Budapest! Shops, bars, restaurants are next to the flat. The most of the sights are in walking distance! :)
house_rules:
The flat is non-smoking. 
Arrival: From 14:00 onward
Check out: up to 10:00 AM
Upon prior request check in and check out times can be amended.
description:
Check this brand new apartment in the Váci street! This is the real city centre! The flat is in pedestrian zone, in the most famous street of Budapest! Shops, bars, restaurants are next to the flat. The most of the sights are in walking distance! :)

Totally renovated retro style flat combines old-time atmosphere with modern comfort.
It provides a fully equipped life space for two persons.

Children are the most important people in our lives. Cribs and high chairs are available upon request from now on in all of our apartments for our little baby guests!The extra equipment costs just 7EUR/night (cash).

The flat is located in a historical building in the famous Váci street. It faces to the garden, that's why it is quiet.
Váci street is a pedestrian area with full of restaurants, shops and boutiques next to the river Danube.


The location has very good public transportation.
Metro lines (M3, M4), buses and trams are in 2 minutes walking.

The apartment is equipped with flat screen TV, fridge/freezer, electric cooker, microwave oven, wi-fi,  electric kettle and hair dryer.

I normally meet guests personally to hand over they keys and provide a brief tour. If required they keys can be left for pickup at an agreed location instead.

The easiest way to come from the airport if you come with our transfer. If you would like to use the public transport system, it is also not complicated.
Take the bus nr. 200E until the station Köbánya-Kispest, than travel with the metro line nr 3. until the station Ferenciek tere!
Warning: Don't change to much money at the airport to pay for the public transport! The exchange rate is extremly bad there!

For further information about the city:transfer service from the Airport, sightseeing tours (Hop On/Hop Off tickets), cruises on the river, car rental service,please feel free to contact us.

I organise a lot of tour in Budapest and Hungary too.  F.e.: ruin pub tour, escape rooms, discover Budapest tour, jewish quarter, spa's, Visegrád, Esztergom, etc. Guide: english, german.
I have also pro photographer who can you lead on the tour and take beautiful photos about you and your group. 
If you require airport transfer this can be organized and if required events can be recommended and/or arranged.

reviews_text:
The host canceled this reservation 25 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

I had a great stay in a beautiful house, flat and environment. Ambrus and Alexandra are welcoming, considerate and open-minded hosts. Every information regarding arrival and departure and also during the stay was provided.

We had only 1 night in Budapest and really enjoyed our stay. Ambrus was really helpful with directions and we loved the apartment, which gave us a real insight into Budapest city living in a great location.

Good communication, friendly hosts, good location. Recommendation.

Felt very much welcomed and at ease in the Appt. The host are lovely and the location is fantastic. 

Ambrus and Alexandra are very friendly and accomodating. They have a  nice apartment in the city centre.

Ambrus was really helpful and kind host. Location was also perfect. I would recommend this room to people who will be travelling in Budapest.

Ambrus and Alexandra were great hosts. They responded very quickly to my inquiries and were extremely accommodating. The location of their flat is excellent and is only about 5 minutes from parliament. The room itself is quite small, but we didn't mind because of the great location. I highly recommend staying here and would gladly stay again if I return to Budapest.

This apartment has an amazing location! It is located in the street next to the parliament, you are just meters away from the river, parks, restaurants but also the next metro station is just steps away. Also the hosts are amazingly friendly and relaxed, and the apartment is nice too. Very recommendable

Ambrus and Alexandra were incredibly welcoming and kind to us. They gave us a great welcome to our first stay in the city and recommended their personal favourite places. The place was very well located, easy to find and comfortable. We would definitely stay again. Thanks for having us!
review_summary: My place is very close to the Parliament (250m), yet it is in a calm and quiet little street. The metro stop is in front of the Parliament (Kossuth square) and there are several buses, trams closeby. The neighbourhood is central, yet tranquil and you can find several great restaurants, shops and supermarkets. The Danube and the Duna Corso is also 300m from the apartment. The party district is also quite close, a 5-10 minute walk in a very safe area.
description:
My place is very close to the Parliament (250m), yet it is in a calm and quiet little street. The metro stop is in front of the Parliament (Kossuth square) and there are several buses, trams closeby. The neighbourhood is central, yet tranquil and you can find several great restaurants, shops and supermarkets. The Danube and the Duna Corso is also 300m from the apartment. The party district is also quite close, a 5-10 minute walk in a very safe area.

The room we are renting out is suitable for solo-travellers or couples (or wannabe couples:). It has a huge window which looks on to the inner court. We furnished it with a big comfy armchair and a huge double bed.

The guests can freely move in the apartment, which has a spacious living room and a romantic balcony.

We are a young couple who love to travel ourselves, therefore we can give tips about Budapest and Hungary as if we were tourists too.

The house was built in 1900s just as the surrounding buildings, this makes the so-called diplomatic neighbourhood so special.

Besides the Danube and the Parliament being just a few meters away, you can easily access any other parts of the city by the available metro, trams and buses we have close to our house. Most of the tourists sights are walking distance.

reviews_text:
This is an excellent flat in very good condition & very near to bus, metro & importantly the main railway station.. this is a true value for price flat.. this was my first booking through Airbnb and was excellently managed by Airbnb & the owner of the flat equally.. thank you again for the excellent stay in Budapest

We had a very comfortable stay in Zsuzsannas apartment!
They welcomed us and explained everything and offered to ask if we have any questions while our stay.
The apartment was clean, we only had two big towels for four persons but we managed it.
Walking distance to the city and to the szechenyi themal bath was around 25min and 5 minutes from the apartment was a little shopping center with a supermarket.
Only problem was the parking because we had to pay on Friday from 8.30am to 6pm and the maximum of hours for a parking ticket was 3 hours so we took the car with us to the city and found a parking house there that was also ok.
So all in all we had a very nice stay and can recommend the apartment!

Everything was perfect. Zsuzsannas daughter was waiting for us when we arrived. She was very friendly and described us everything we needed. The apartment is very clean and cozy, and it is exactly like on the photos. All in all a very nice and sympathetic flat. It is close to the railway station, but we decided to walk through Budapest, because the center isn´t far.

We would highly recommend this flat, and would allways choose to stay their again.

The place is very nice and cozy, suitable for four people. The apartment was very clean, it has comfortable beds, all the furniture is new and the shower is great. Just a little bit far from the city center on foot ( thirty minutes), but the metro station is like 5 minutes far from the flat. We had a great time!

Nice airbnb and nice host ;)

The floor is great, as in the photos. Zsuzsanna is very friendly, we arrived an hour late for a delay on the plane and she waited without problems. The floor is very clean and welcoming, and it's very close to the center.
I recommend it!

I really enjoyed staying in this apartment. It was very clean, cozy and nice. Location is very good, 5 min far from metro, 10 min far from Szechyni bath house and 20 min to city center!! The host was very quick in response, sensitive and very responsible!! Highly recommend!! 

The area of the apartment is very good, very close to Keleti, and as me & my friend arrived and left via the rail station it was perfect for us. The host was very friendly and welcome, providing us with communication and all the possible help during the entire stay. The apartment itself was very cozy and clean. A wonderful Budapest experience.

It was beautiful little flat in the heart of Erzhebetvarosh district. I'm fond of appartment's design - it's fantastic! All for your comfort jorney is here: towels, soap, iron, coffe machine, frizzer, dish washer... We were first who opened an iron :) It's no far from Secheny baths (around 20 munites by foot). You can take the city centre by foot around 1 hour. The bus stop is close to the flat. 

Zsuzsanna and her dougther are good persons! Thank you for hospitality and  help! :)

Good location
Nice appartment
review_summary: A totally renewed charming 28 sqm appartement in an old retro style house is available to 2 or 2+2 persons. The appartement is located in Budapest centre near to the Keleti railway station and about 1,5 Km from Central Park, 2,5 km from Heroes Square. Downtown, ruin pubs are also in reachable distance.
description: A totally renewed charming 28 sqm appartement in an old retro style house is available to 2 or 2+2 persons. The appartement is located in Budapest centre near to the Keleti railway station and about 1,5 Km from Central Park, 2,5 km from Heroes Square. Downtown, ruin pubs are also in reachable distance.

reviews_text: Felt great!
description:
Quiet, detached house with a large garden.

A family house with separate apartment.

I am always available to guests.

Wellness nearby sports center, shopping center, Citadel, Buda Castle. The city center is 15 minutes by bus.

reviews_text:
It was our First Time in Budapest and we really enjoyed our stay in Nikis cozy, clean and Comfy flat! Niki was very nice and she welcomed us with a letter - by the way GREAT Wifi Name :p the flat is near the Center of the City - You can reach everything with the Bus or the Tram. Thank You for Hosting us :-) we are definitly coming back to Budapest - its a really Great City and Maybe we Finally meet when we are coming back. Thanks for everything!
xx
Tamara and Sabrina from Austria. 

Great apartment. Cute and spacious enough for two without feeling on top of each other at all. Niki very sweetly left is some bread, fruit and water. 

The location was a bit far out from the city compared to some other places but transport links were so good (and we wanted to do a lot of walking ) that it wasn't an issue and I'd say shouldn't deter anyone from the apartment. 

Niki was great with responding to any queries before we arrived and processes for  checking in and out as our timings were very early or late were so easy and quick. 

Great clean apartment. Only thing, and tiny in the scheme of things, is that the shower head didn't fit in the bracket holder and so had to hold it when showering 

Overall an amazing and sweet apartment that is brilliant value. And would definitely stay again. 

The expirience in the Niki´s apartment was absolutely amazing! 
The studio is exactly the same as shown in the photos. It was also quite esay to get to. Unfortunaly, I didn´t get to know Niki in person but I am very thankful and would HIGHLY RECOMMEND this studio for your stay. 



Great communication, all questions were answered quickly. Apartment was easy to find and the photos showed it clearly. Not in the area we were expecting however this is down to our own lack of research and was a short taxi ride. Overall a very cute apartment, thanks for the lovely stay!

Niki was a lovely and helpful host. The flat was well located, it was easy to get into town and it had everything we needed. I would however say that the flat looks bigger and more comfortable in the photos that it did in real life. 

The host canceled this reservation 9 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

we spend 5 nights at Niki's flat. everything was good. it's near to public transport (tram and buses) and city center (deak square). we didnt meet Niki, but she was helpful and reactive. the flat is nice (like on pictures). checkin and checkout was pretty easy, we left keys on letterbox. I recommand. thank you Niki :)

Nice flat, very sweet and confortable as on pictures ! Very good location, calm and near the public transport. Niki is helpful and reactive :)
In short, we recommend !


Absolutely love Niki's place! Although we didn't get to meet Niki she was extremely helpful and quick to reply to all our questions. Great location with public transport close by that will take you to all the amazing places Budapest has to offer. The apartment was a home away from home with everything we needed! Didn't want to leave :)

The room was nice and we were even given fruit and wine on arrival. Excellent communication was really helpful with any issues too. Super place
review_summary:
In our studio home we are happy to welcome everybody who are staying sweet days in our beautiful capital city. 


This district- on the Pest side of the Danube and one of the city’s 23 districts " is a magnet for Budapest’s trendy bohemians, mixing soulful chic and shabby bourgeois..... "
-according to New York Times
description:
In our studio home we are happy to welcome everybody who are staying sweet days in our beautiful capital city. 


This district- on the Pest side of the Danube and one of the city’s 23 districts " is a magnet for Budapest’s trendy bohemians, mixing soulful chic and shabby bourgeois..... "
-according to New York Times

reviews_text:
Hajnalka is one of the great host I ever met. She is friendly, patient and willing to spend some time to give us more information about the city. The apartment is beautiful, spacious and clean. We had a great stay in Budapest and we really love the city. 
Just 5mins walk to Chain Bridge. 
Less than 10mins walk to Parliament/St Stephen. 
Opposite bus stop to Buda Castle Hill / Fisherman's Baption. 
Just around the corner: Main course, Coffee & Dessert at Gerbeaud Cafe Anno 1858 is excellent, reasonable price. Must try!

Perfect location for exploring Budapest. The Christmas markets were only a 2 minute walk away and the town centre on the other side of that. Lots of bars with cheap drinks close by. The underground station was only 400m away and an easy ride to the thermal baths and the airport. Would definitely stay in this lovely apartment again! 

Hajnalka and her place are lovely. It gives you a little glimpse into the apartments of the locals. Hajnalka (sunrise in Hungarian) was a gracious host and helped us with restaurant suggestions and getting a taxi on the last day. She was afraid her English was not good enough (it is) and was able to communicate more accurately with the help of her son on the telephone. There is a modern digital elevator in the building, which was a nice surprise. The apartment is clean and bright. The view out of the giant windows is of the lovely Chain Bridge and the St. Mathias church across the river. Lovely wood floors, comfortable bed with nice pillows. Had some friends staying next door at the Sofitel and they were JEALOUS of us and our accommodations. Christmas market was right around the corner as was the underground. We took a short trip to Szentendre on the train. Great trip. Thank you Hajnalka for a lovely visit.

At first I want to express our satisfaction not only for the apartment but also for ms Hajnalka,a perfect host and person of kindness and hospitality.She explained us everything in details and gave us useful tips for the accommodation.The apartment was perfect,right in the heart of the city and everything was really closed.Chain bridge was near the house and we had a great view. I definitely recommend and loved this house!!!! Thank you for everything ms Hajnalka 

Hajnalka's apartment was perfect! A great location and a lovely little space. Hajnalka was very warm and helpful when we arrived, and all the basics were on offer to make our stay comfortable. 

Hajnalka was very kind, very professional and efficient. The location of the apartment was right in the centre, and everything was within a walking distance which was great. Would highly recommend!

The apartment literally cannot be located better. Right in front of the chain bridge and amongst luxury hotels such as the four seasons and intercontinental, you cannot find a better location. Very large apartment with a window view of the bridge. Hajnalka was also amazingly accommodating. This is the ultimate location for a trip to Budapest!

Hajnalka was the perfect host. She helped us a lot with our lost baggage :(. We truly recommend this apartment if you have the chance to visit Budapest. The apartment is in a perfect location and easy to access. It has lift, which is not so common in Budapest.

We absolutely loved our stay at Hajnalkas' apartment. Even though there was 4 of us there was plenty of room! The flat is in the most central location for exploring the beautiful city, with lots to do just on your doorstep. 

We were very impressed with the way Hajnalka welcomed us and accommodated us throughout our stay. We would 100% recommend this fantastic apartment! Thanks once again Hajnalka! 

Hajnalka was a lovely, perfect host, and the flat is in an absolutely perfect spot for seeing Budapest. Hajnalka met us at the flat and went over everything with us. Everything was spotless and the pictures actually don't do the flat the justice. Comfortable bed and amazing view! 

We loved our stay here and would absolutely recommend Hajnalka's place to anyone staying in Budapest.
review_summary: The apartment is located in the heart of the city, only a few steps away from Vörösmarty-square, in the direct neighborhood of luxury hotels.
house_rules:
Smoking is not allowed. 
Check-out needs to be done until 11.00, whereas check-in is only managable after 14.00.
description:
The apartment is located in the heart of the city, only a few steps away from Vörösmarty-square, in the direct neighborhood of luxury hotels.  

The apartment is located in the center of the city, the Danube is only within a few minutes walking-distance, where you can have a wonderful view to the entire city. Most of the major sights are also easily accessible by foot: the Parliament at Kossuth Lajos Square, St.Stephen's Basilica, Synagogue,Váci Street and Ferenciek-Square. Whatever might be in need, you can get it right away, since there is a non-stop grocery store, pharmacy and a post office next to the building. If you'd rather aim at a further destination, it is easily approachable from Deák Ference square by public transportation, because it's a common area of interchange. 

Wifi, Cable Television, Washing-machine, Hair-dryer, Iron, microwave, boiler, coffee-maker.

We meet our guests in person at the apartment at the time of their arrival, so we can explain every necessary information in details which they might need during their staying. They are always provided with additional contact information, so they can get in touch with us if they need any help. 

Eventhough the apartment is located in the center of the city, in the fifth district, the neighbourhood is calm and quiet.
 

Paid parking is 200-300 meters from the apartment. Price: 12 EUR per day. Other paid parking (2 euro / day) could be provided which is accessible in 15 minutes by public transport.

reviews_text:
Viktor is a great host - very responsive to messages and helpful (arranging taxis etc). The apartment is perfect - spacious, clean, all mod cons, very close to a supermarket, and centrally located for visiting Budapest's sights. Really good value for money, and I'd definitely go back again!  

Viktor is a delightful person and an ideal host!!!  We were VERY fortunate to meet him and stay in his apartment.   You could not ask for a better location.   Two minutes and you are at the water looking across the river at the gorgeous Parliament building.   A large supermarket is likewise two minutes away.   Yet, the apartment is VERY quiet....very quiet.   In 10-15 minutes you can walk up a hill to the Castle area.  This is not to be missed and you are right there.   We would walk up there in the morning and enjoy the view before the river boat tour groups arrive.  It's really lovely.  Transportation is equally amazing...you are moments from the underground metro...very easy to travel anywhere yo want!   However, for (URL HIDDEN)  of the best parts of our stay ws meeting Viktor!  He a very nice person...just very pleasant and kind.  If you are visiting Budapest, you will love this spot.
Davis & Patti
September 2016

The department is beautiful, big (with a lot of windows) and has everything you need ( wash machine, for example). It is situated, two blocks from the subway and from the sigthseeing of the Parlament. Near there are many options to eat and a supermarket. The definition is: perfect !

I enjoyed my stay at Viktor's centrally-located Buda-side apartment. It was very spacious and clean. Communication with Viktor was brief and effective.

James

Absolutely brilliant in every respect! Location? You simply cannot do better in Budapest.  Its  in the heart of Budapest, the Buda Castle is 5 minutes by foot. All the cultural sights, museums, restaurants are easy to reach. 
Flat? Lovely, quiet, well-equipped and well-kept. Last, but by no means least: Viktor is a a very nice host. 
We hope to be back soon 

Viktor ist sehr freundlich und war wie verabredet pünktlich vor Ort! Hat uns sehr nett empfangen und seine Ferienwohnung gezeigt. Sehr nett eingerichtet mit einer Top-Lage direkt am Batthyány tér gegenüber vom Parlementsgebäude. Gerne kommen wir wieder.

//////////////////////////

Viktor is a very friendly person and he was punctually on the spot as we arranged. He show us his lovely apartment. It's nicely done up and the position is in the near of the Batthyány tér, vis-á-vis from the Parlament. We want to to stay here the next time again.

A localização é maravilhosa! O apartamento é exatamente como descrito, todo muito organizado, equipado e limpo!
Muito bom!

På egen initiativ kontaktet Viktor oss med spørsmål om han skulle ordne drosje fra flyplassen. Dette kostet 9000 forint (28 euro), og anbefales. Viktor snakket engelsk og tysk, møtte opp ved ankomst og ga oss gode råd og tips for oppholdet. Da vi hadde greid å omkode fjernkontrollen på aircondition var Viktor raskt på plass og ordnet dette. Den litt eldre leiligheten ligger i 5. og øverste etasje i en vanlig boligblokk. Leiligheta har alt du trenger, og var ren og ordentlig. Vi var kun et par, men den er stor nok til familie på 4. Heisen går 4,5 etasje, men det er gode trapper. Rolig strøk uten støy, men svært sentralt plassert. Restauranter og stor kolonialbutikk innen 100 meter. 2-300 meter til buss, metro, trikk, utleiesykler og båt. Dette gjorde det lett å komme seg rundt. Borgbyen er i kort gåavstand om du er i form til å gå i trapper. Vi ble anbefalt en båttur på Donau til Szentendre, noe som vi likte godt. Småbyen hadde hyggelige småbutikker i store mengder, dog mye beregnet på turister. Ta lokaltoget tilbake. Utleiesykler var en fin måte å komme seg rundt på, gjerne i kombinasjon med metro. Gellert spa bør du også få med deg (ta trikken).
description: The apartment features a king-size bed room with three lounge sofas. It sleeps two additional persons with separate beds in an extra bedroom. It has a bathroom, a separate toilet, a nice dining room in addition to a fully equipped kitchen, where you can prepare your own food. A small, sunny balcony is attached overlooking the Hotel Hilton and the tower of the Matthias Church.

reviews_text:
Nice apartment!!!

Thank you for a great time in the city and stay at your apartment. I can only recommend the flat and thank you for a good restaurant recommendation as well :)

Charlie was there to greet us on arrival and gave us a few helpful pointers about Budapest. We exchanged mobile numbers and so could be in contact had there been a problem. Fortunately everything went smoothly. We used three of Charlie's restaurant recommendations and they were all good quality. The flat was really quiet but well situated with trams and a metro station just a couple of minutes away. We would not hesitate to recommend this accommodation.

Charlie is a great host, communication was clear, and the apartment was very nice. I would definitely recommend to stay here!

Charlie was extremely helpful, replying very quickly to questions and solving any problems. He also gave great advice on where to go and eat. The flat was nice and quiet and well-located. Everything was within walking and cycling distance. I used the MOL BuBi cycle hire and never once had to use public transport other than to return to the airport.
Thanks for a great stay Charlie!


Charlie is a nice landlord. He makes it his job to make your way around the city. And through the Wathsapp always around for a question. It's a nice house to feel as Hungarian and it is in a nice part of town, close to public transport. Overall a good start for a nice trip.

We had a great time at Charlies appartement. The location is perfect for walking to main attractions as well as for going out at night - Lots of fancy bars and great restaurants are nearby.
The flat itself was super clean and spacious, the balcony a cute little extra. 
Also regarding the communication there are no complaints from our side: Charly is a nice and uncomplicated person, who provided us with useful tipps where to go and what to see (we highly recommend to follow his advices where to eat also! :-)) 
I would come back anytime. 


Charlie was a great host. He was in communication with us from when we booked right up to when we arrived. He was so informative and gave us lots of recommendations which were all great. 
The apartment was clean, spacious and in a perfect location. It was about a 15-20 min walk to the river but if you  fancied going further afield the metro and tram stop was only round the corner, where it was very easy to access the whole city. 
We had a fabulous time and wouldn't hesitate to recommend Charlie or his apartment.

Charlie is a fantastic host who had some great and detailed advice about what to see and eat in the city. 

The apartment is in an amazing old building which is very secure and safe. It's walking distance to most things so it's a nice and convenient location. Nice little balcony with a view and inside it's quite spacious.

I'd definitely recommend staying here!

The apartment in a hundred-years-old building is well located near to a 4/6 tram stop. The flat is close to cafes, restaurants, as well as to a typical Hungarian market with food store inside. It is quiet, clean and ideal for two, but possibly enough good for more people. Charlie is available for tips and may help if necessary. Another plus, he possibly might take you and drop you off at the airport.
review_summary: Spacious two room apartment in the one of the most beautiful house in the centre of Budapest.
house_rules: - Smoking is forbidden in the flat, you can do on the balcony. Moreover do not be to noisy, think of the families in the neighbourhood. Many thanks.
description:
Spacious two room apartment in the one of the most beautiful house in the centre of Budapest.

This apartment is ideal for any tourists or people coming for leisure as most of the interesting things of the city can be reached in 15 mins on foot.
The connection of the apartment is perfect. The metro and the main tram line (24 hours) is 2 min and the ruin pub area is 5 min on foot (the most popular ruin bar, the Szimpla is 8 min.)
From the Keleti railway station the apartment is 10 min. by public transport. From the airport is 30 min. by taxi and 70 min. by public transport.
The apartment has a bedroom and a huge living room.
Both of the two room have own door from the hall.
It is best for 4 person.
The apartment is on the fourth floor and the house has got two elevator.
The kitchen is well-equipped, you can find there everything you need.
The apartment has one 160 cm wide double bed and two 140 cm wide sofabed.
Naturally the apartment has got WiFi.
The house of the apartment has got two entrance door one after the other.
The first works with code and the second works with card.
Security camera works in the house.

You can reach me anytime during your holiday.
I'll give you map,  useful tripguides and lot of information about the city (interesting places, hungarian dishes you must try, best restaurants, bars, shops etc) at the check-in (and before your arrival if you want).
If you have questions please don't hesitate to write me.
Being parents we welcome children with pleasure. We can provide high chair, bed and bath for little children.
I like to help people to feeling good in my country, I can give you tips about where to go and how to get around as cheap as possible.
When going abroad I think it's important to have a clean apartment where I feel at home. Think about a warm welcome by the host(s), a comfortable bed, plenty of towels and a fully equiped kitchen to cook with fresh and local food. That is what I aim to achieve for my guests who visit Budapest.

You can find supermarket, pharmacy, change (one of the best in Budapest) 24hours shop, very good restaurants and a lovely market in 3 minutes from the apartment.

We can provide safety parking place in a yard in 5 min. from the apartment.

Please be aware that we work different price at New Years , Sziget Festival and Formula one. Thank you for understanding.

reviews_text:
Comfortable appartment in a great place. 
Clean, homeish, beautiful. Close to old city center.  
Next time will stay here with pleasure. 
Gabor is very nice and helpful.
A lot of good expressions from this trip.

Gabor's apartment was fabulous! It was very comfortable and in a great location that was within walking distance to a lot of the attractions. Gabor was very helpful and easy to communicate with. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay there and would return again soon!

Gábor was an amazing host! We felt so welcomed when he added little touches like just water bottles and chocolates served on the table. The place itself was beautiful, just as shown in the pictures. Beds were comfortable and cleanliness was at the very highest levels. He would check up on us daily to help us out, which definitely made the stay in Budapest so lovely. Would highly recommend! 

The place is the greatest and also Gabor is the nicest person I have ever met. I recommend this place to everyone to group of friends, families and for romantic trip. The apartament is just like in the photos. It's clear, modern and well organised. I can't find any disadvantage. 
Gorąco polecam! 

Flat was awesome. Everything for spending good time!

The host was very kind and helpful. The flat was beautiful, very clean,nice and pieceful.The flat is very modern.Quit (URL HIDDEN) was very close to the city center, and two minutes the Buda Castle. I highly recommend to everyone. 

Igen szívélyes, proaktív és egyben rugalmas házigazda, a lakás nagyon szép, kényelmes, optimális lokalizacióval. Teljesen elégedettek voltunk, legközelebb is Őket választjuk.
review_summary: Our White Dream Home Apartment is under the castle Hill. History, monuments! Be the part of the Word Heritage. The apartment was renovated in this October, so everything is new and cozy.
description:
Our White Dream Home Apartment is under the castle Hill. History, monuments! Be the part of the Word Heritage. The apartment was renovated in this October, so everything is new and cozy.

Be the part of the Word Heritage. The apartment is in the Castle District very close to Castle Buda, and to the main sights on Pest Side in the downtown (ChainBridge, St.Stephen Basilica, Vaci Street, Opera House). The enviroment is very peaceful, and friendly.

You can use the all apartment, with 1 bedroom and 1 living room. Towels and slippers are in the bathroom and of course you will find shampoo and shower gel. The kitchen is fully equipped with eletric oven and microwave oven, refregator, dishes, plates, glasses and coffee maker with complementery coffee.
There flat tv screen in the living room with BBC, CNN and many other digital channels.
You are able to use the free wifi connection in the whole apartment.

You can reach by phone, by email, by (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN), by (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) and by Viber, which is most comfortable for you.

If you arrive by car: You can park on streets with your car. It is safety, because this is a very safety district and the police station is very close to the apartment. The parking fee is: approax. 1,5 EUR/hour between 8.00 a.m. and 8.00 p.m. from Monday till Friday. At the weekend the parking is free everywhere in Budapest. You can by parking ticket at the parking automata. If you don't like to leave your car on the streets, there is a garage close to the apartment: (URL HIDDEN)
This is approax. 500 metres from the flat.
The fee: 14 EUR/day and they have a special weekend price: 8 EUR from Friday 14.00 till Monday 8.00 a.m.
The red line metro station and the Déli Railway Station is 500 metres from the flat. The downtown is only 3 stops from the Déli Railway station with the subway. There many buses and trams in the district, but the Castle and the downtown is close by walk.

This very important: This is a silent district and silent house. Of yourse if you like to enjoy the party time, you can do it in the party district. But please don't make party in the apartment.

reviews_text:
Really nice studio at a great location for a very low price. The studio has a lot of space and the bed is indeed very comfi. A lot of things are close by so the metro or tram wont be necessary in most cases. Adam was really nice and showed us around in the building & studio. I would stay here again next time!

The host canceled this reservation 12 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The host canceled this reservation 6 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Adam was very welcoming and understanding. His flat was incredible and big ! Perfectly situated with the Parlement very near. If I go back to Budapest I would choose his flat again. 

Adams place was great and he was very welcoming and friendly. The flat was clean and the bed was extremely comfortable - plus it's located only a short (and beautiful) walk from the center.  If I'm ever back in Budapest I'd love to stay at Adam's again.
review_summary: This river view one bedroom flat is situated next to Parliament on Kossuth Square. Quiet neighbourhood with great transportation and walking access to most landmarks in Budapest. Metro2 and 24hour tram  line is within 5min walk. Buses and Boat service is on the doorstep. Convenience store and restaurants are less then 2min.
description:
This river view one bedroom flat is situated next to Parliament on Kossuth Square. Quiet neighbourhood with great transportation and walking access to most landmarks in Budapest. Metro2 and 24hour tram  line is within 5min walk. Buses and Boat service is on the doorstep. Convenience store and restaurants are less then 2min.

very bright and spaces one bedroom with view to Danube.

Parliament and Metro station is 5min walk
Chain bridge 10min walk
Margaret Island 5 walk
Buda Castle 10 min by bus
Vaci shopping street is 15min walk

Very safe and central location with great transportation. The area is a Government area therefore its very quiet also.

24hour tram line 4-6 is 2min walk
Tram 2 is at your doorstep
Metro 2 is 5kin walk

reviews_text:
Paul and Chris were one of the best hosts that I‘ve met through airbnb. They asked me the approximate arrival time right after the reservation and made the check-in process very smooth. They welcomed us by telling all the information about Budapest; recommending several restaurants, stores and places to visit (even lended us a nice map of Budapest). Although we stayed there for just a night, we felt ourselves very welcomed by Paul and Chris! Not only the nice hosts, the overall house and room was very clean, well decorated, warm, and cozy. Also it‘s basically located in the center so we didn‘t have hard time traveling. Thanks for all! :)

우선 숙소 위치가 어부의 요새, 유람선 야경 등 주요 관광지와 가까워서 좋았어요. 인근에 레스토랑이랑 펍도 많고 사람이 꽤 있어서 늦게 다녔는데도 위험하다는 느낌은 못받았네요. 그리고 무엇보다 호스트인 폴과 크리스가 정말 정말 친절해요! 하루 묵었는데도 정말 홈스테이처럼 편하고 정겹게 묵었고 주위의 괜찮은 레스토랑들이랑 갈만한 곳도 추천해주셨어요. 숙소 자체도 엄청 깨끗하고 방이 정말 예쁘고 정갈하게 꾸며져 있습니다. 화장실도 실제 폴과 크리스가 사는 집이라서 따뜻한 물 잘나오고요! 언젠가 부다페스트에서 묵는다면 또 묵고 싶은 집입니다 추천해요 :)

We had a great stay at this apartment. Paul and Chris are very nice people, they showed us where to go on the map. We had nice breakfast together and really good talk. Our experience in Budapest was much better than we expected, thaks to Paul and Chris. Thanks guys :-)

Paul&Chris were very welcoming and easygoing. We enjoyed our stay. Thank you for the delicious breakfast! Helmut and Susan

Extremely clean and comfortable apartment and very pleasant hosts. Paul & Chris were very helpful and welcoming people. Everything you could ask for, for a great time in Budapest. 

the location was very close to city centre

Very nice place, good decoration, cosy and comfortable. Chris and Paul are very nice and could help you if you need anything, the room is lovely and you will feel very well, the flat is so clean and nice !! highly recommend this place, You will enjoy Budapest with the perfect central location,

xx
Emma

Great location, clean and beautiful apartment, flexible check-in check-out, friendly and attentive hosts! For sure good choice to stay in Budapest!=)

We had a great experience staying with Paul and Chris. They were able to provide us with great recommendations for restaurants and tips about the city. As two young women in a foreign country we felt safe the entire time! 

Absolutely loved staying here amazing place and amazingly kind people. Thank you both. 

We had a great time in Budapest - not least because of Chris and Paul. They are wonderful hosts - very welcoming, kind and always caring about how to make the stay at their flat as pleasant as possible. The appartment itself is also great and it's exellent located directly in the city center. That makes this place perfect to start for a pub crawl or to check out some of the awsome bars. Also the rooms look exactly as good as in the pictures. I would absolutely recommend this accommodation to all of my friends.
Thanks a lot for everything guys!
review_summary:
You are very welcome to stay with us  in our lovely restored 100sqm apartment in central District VII.
Overlooking Kazinczy Utca; Szimpla Kert, Jewish Synagogue, Gozdu Udvar, Andrassy Avenue, New York Cafe close by. 

Singles or couples are welcome to share our home with us for your holiday in Budapest!
house_rules:
You are welcome to smoke on the covered walkway just outside.

House trained pets & children  welcome by prior arrangement.

Flexible on check in and check out times, and flexible if for any reason you need to cancel a reservation  too! Please advise approximate arrival time in advance.

You are welcome to leave your luggage with us  after check out in the apartment to collect later in the day if you wish, or before check in too if necessary.

We hope you have a wonderful stay in Budapest!

We do hope you enjoy your stay with us!

Best wishes,

Paul & Chris
description:
You are very welcome to stay with us  in our lovely restored 100sqm apartment in central District VII.
Overlooking Kazinczy Utca; Szimpla Kert, Jewish Synagogue, Gozdu Udvar, Andrassy Avenue, New York Cafe close by. 

Singles or couples are welcome to share our home with us for your holiday in Budapest!

A top quality stay with us is our aim!

You will have your own large private double room with king size bed, night stands, wardrobe, complimentary dressing gowns, mineral water etc. Plus, shared use of the bathroom (complementary good quality Yves Rocher toiletries & decent hairdryer), plus another separate toilet, within our fully restored second floor apartment - with classic high ceilings and large windows facing the bustling streets of Budapest. 

We do also have a nice extra bedroom available, with a comfortable Queen size bed with new good quality mattress, wardrobe and a desk, so we can accommodate up to 4 people - (but we only take one group booking at a time so only you and us will normally be in the apartment, therefore if you book 3/4 persons you will have 2 adjoining rooms); plus you will have shared use of large fully equipt kitchen and living room with TV, Apple TV, Libratone sound system.

Original modern art throughout the apartment  by Nikola Rusev - a renowned Bulgarian artist.

Good Internet with complementary Wi-Fi throughout the apartment.

Free real tea and real coffee available 24/7!

Central heating, window shutters to keep warm and quiet!


We hope to welcome you to Budapest soon!

Wir hoffen, Sie bald in Budapest begrüßen zu dürfen!

Nous espérons vous accueillir à Budapest bientôt!

Speriamo di darvi il benvenuto a Budapest presto!

Esperamos darle la bienvenida a Budapest pronto!

Esperamos recebê-lo a Budapeste em breve!

Your own private large double bedroom with comfy King size bed with nice new mattress, fresh linen (King size quilt as standard or 2 single quilts are always available if you prefer on request), clean sheets, plenty of fresh towels and Yves Rocher toiletries for you. Plenty of storage space. We can also store your luggage after check out for you no problem, for free.

We have a lovely new bathroom with a nice corner bath tub and shower with as much hot water as you like. Plus toilet and washing machine, and we have another separate toilet too.

We are on the second floor with no lift.

Breakfast with us is always available on request, plus we have for you a free selection of mineral water, real teas and coffees (French press)  24/7. Join us for breakfast pancakes or maybe cinnamon buns and coffee!

24/7 Access no problem - this is the party district after all! Come and go as you please!

We can accommodate up to 4, as we have 2 guest rooms, but only take one booking at a time so it will normally only be yourselves and us in the apartment at a time unless there is a early check in/late check out crossover.

We are always here in person to meet and greet you on arrival and explain everything. We live in the apartment so are here to help in any way we can!

You are very welcome to share our living room and kitchen with us, we love to relax and meet new people from all over the world with a coffee, tea or wine!

Come and go as you wish 24 hours a day, 2 sets of keys supplied.

We are always available to help in any way we can 24/7 in person, on mobile, I - message, text or e-mail.

A top quality, comfortable, stress free stay with us is our aim!

Right in the heart of Budapest party district VII on the corner of Dohany Utca & Kazinczy Utca - Budapest's busiest party street. A short stroll to the metro, tram and bus stops, but we are so central you can easily walk to all the many attractions of Budapest. 

Christmas Markets now on!

Taxi from the airport is about 25 Euro, or we are easy to reach us on public transport.


If you are at all able do try to come for 2 or 3 days to enjoy the main attractions of Budapest. Everyone who stays one night only always says they wish they had stayed for longer!

Close to the M1, 2 & 3 metro, tram, buses & taxi ranks. We are so central though it is very easy to walk to all the main attractions in Budapest from here. Hop on - Hop off sightseeing bus stop is also available a few minutes walk at Astoria - the guys there speak English and sell tickets at the stop.

Astoria M2 Red  & Deak Ferenc Ter Interchange (M3 Blue/M2 Red/M1 Yellow) metro stations are both close by; trolley bus is right outside. No 4 Tram stop at the top of the street at Blaha Lujza Ter. 

Supermarkets - (Tesco, Spar, Kosher Market), lots of great cafes, restaurants, night clubs, bars all on the doorstep. We are happy to help with restaurant recommendations.

From Lizt Ferenc Airport :

4am - 11pm 200e bus outside terminal to Kobanya Kispest M3 Blue Metro Terminus. Then metro (only line and only goes into Budapest so you can't go wrong) to Deak Ferenc in the city centre. Use exit B. We are then a short walk straight ahead along Karoly Korut then bear left past the Jewish Synagogue and along Dohany Utca.
 
Or use the FoTaxi licensed yellow cabs - they   are right outside the terminal. Ask at the kiosk (They speak English) and they will help you. Just have our address and post code handy. About 25 Euro.
 

From Nepliget Bus station :

Take Metro M3 Blue towards Ujpest Kopont and get off at Deak Ferenc Ter.

By Rail :

From Nyugati :

Take M3 Blue Metro to Deak Ferenc Ter.

From Keleti :

Take M2 Red Metro to Astoria.

From Deli : 

Take M2 Red Metro to Astoria.

From Astoria walk along Rakoczi Utca and turn left into Sip Utca then right along Dohany and we are on the left.

On street car parking with meter, or there is a 24h carpark on nearby Kertesz Utca, or just past the Synagogue on the left at the bottom of Dohany Utca. Dohany Utca is a one way street (Synagogue towards Erzsebet Korut).

Taxi rank just along the street - 100m past Kazinczy Utca on the left, just before Blaha Luzia or just past the Synagogue on Karoly Korut. Fo Taxi is best for the airport.

Bike hire shop 50m along Kazinczy Utca.

You are welcome to use our washing machine, iron and ironing board!

You are always welcome to have coffee, tea or wine with us!

We are happy to store your luggage before or after check out!

Flexible on check in / check out times! Check in early, check out late if you need too!

Towels, toiletries, mineral water, tea, coffee, fruit bowl, all included. We are happy to share our breakfast with you too!

No cleaning fees, no extra charges!

We welcome your booking and are looking forward to hosting you for your stay in Budapest!

We are on the 2nd floor with no lift, but a wide shallow staircase. (American convention 3rd floor),

Maps etc available in the apartment.

Apple I-phone 4 & 5 chargers and adapters  available.

UK - Hungary mains plug adapters available.

Clean pets very welcome by prior arrangement with us - we can look after and walk your dog whilst you are out if you need.

If you have any questions just ask - we are usually available to answer right away anytime!

If you are new to Budapest we are here to guide you.

Single travellers welcome - we are here to help you.

If you like this apartment we have 2 more in District VIII & VI available in Budapest which we rent as entire apartments - see our profile.

See you soon!

Best wishes,

Paul & Chris

reviews_text:
Tim and Naz were super friendly and welcoming. The place was great and we enjoyed our stay! :)

Thanks for your kind hospitality.
The stay was really nice, we tried the places you recommended, it was really great !

My girlfriend and I had a wonderful time here. Both Tim and his girlfriend were very sweet, and gave us tons of suggestions to keep busy and eat well in the city. 

Tim was a superb host! He thoughtfully contacted me before our arrival to check what time we'd reach Budapest, so that he could stay in to welcome us. And his place is very comfortable: well-lit and spacious and absolutely spotless. Tim was also very friendly and accommodating of our many questions, and did everything he could to make our stay wonderful, including battling water dragons with us at midnight. Also, his girlfriend makes a MEAN cocktail. 10/10 would recommend his place!

Awesome host with a delightful room situated just a fun stroll from the "city center"...

Tim was a fantastic host! The room was big and had all we needed. He was gracious in making us feel just at home. We arrived early and he wasn't available to check in for a few hours; however he gave us great recommendations to begin our Budapest adventure, which was greatly appreciated!
The only semi-complaint we had was with the location. It was a bit of a hike to get to the main "touristy" areas of Buda and Pest (about 30 minutes), and about 15-20 minutes from the main area of the Jewish Quarter. However, this flat is close to a main bus line and not too far from a few metro stops, which was very nice. This is such a minor complaint, and at the price of the room, it was a great deal for all that we did get. Definitely recommend here for your stay!

Tims apartment was great, the room was a good size and it was easy to get to the city centre. Tim was a really easy going host, made us feel welcome and gave us some good tips for exploring the city. Would recommend!

Tim was a great host and helped point us toward some great sights in Budapest. His place was quiet and clean. Thank you for hosting us, Tim!

Tim is an excellent host. He cares about the comfort and needs of his guests and does his best to meet them. I'd recommend his place to anyone staying in Budapest. 

Although it was a spontanious booking, everything went perfectly well. It was a very clean and nicely styled room in the heart of Budapest, owned by a lovely couple who did everything to make us feel at home. For everyone who is trying to find a home in Budapest, this is the one!
review_summary: A bright, spacious room welcomes you in the diverse, alternative 8th district. It's equipped with a big bed, wardrobe, table and two armchairs for enjoying a caffeinated morning drink. The apartment was recently renovated. All is new though preserving the charm of the early 1900-cent building.
house_rules:
Basically there is 1 rule: My castle is your castle.

Please keep the common areas clean. A cleaning lady comes regularly.
description:
A bright, spacious room welcomes you in the diverse, alternative 8th district. It's equipped with a big bed, wardrobe, table and two armchairs for enjoying a caffeinated morning drink. The apartment was recently renovated. All is new though preserving the charm of the early 1900-cent building.

You have access to the kitchen, dining-area, bathroom, toilet and your private balcony. 120 MB/s Wifi is available. Make yourself anytime for free coffee or tea (plus fresh milk, sugar) in the kitchen.

You are always more than welcome to ask me for any kind of advice. I live, love the city and know where you should definitely go! :)

You find yourself central, but out of the 'Disneyland'-part of Budapest. In the building itself and along the street you find some mom-and-pop and do-it-yourself shops. Some hidden alternative bars and cafes with decent prices and a huge mall are accessible on foot within a few minutes. 

The bus 9 stops 50 m away from the building and takes you basically through the whole city. The metro 3 (to Liszt Ferenc Airport) and 4, tram 4/6 and Keleti train station are within med-easy-reach.

reviews_text:
Amazing host, apartment, location! We'll come again asap! High recommendation! Thanks Bance for your lovely hospitality! A+

Bence is a great host. He was ready to check us in right as we got there (even though we arrived about an hour after we the time we told him to meet us). The apartment is small but very nice. It felt completely safe and was in a great location with public transportation and good restaurants right near it. I highly recommend him for an airbnb host!

He was a really nice host I've ever met through Airbnb. He provide a lot of information about the city. The location is really centre of Budapest. It's easy to get anywhere, nice night view. I had a great time there! I'd like to visit again if I get one more chance to go there. Thanks for all!

We had such a lovely stay at ronnies home in Budapest. Everything worked out just perfect. Bence was so helpful with our late check in and even gave us a bunch of suggestions of great places to go out, eat and have fun. The apartment was so nice, clean, in a perfect location and just everything we needed for 3 days in Budapest.
We will be back :) 

Bence gave us directions and advice prior to our trip and met us outside the metro and escorted us straight to the flat which was 2 minutes walk. The flat was very nice, clean and cosy with everything we needed. Most places are within walking distance but the metro can get you further. Highly recommended this apartment, great value for money.

Bence was really nice and helpful. 

The place is nice, central, close to the metro stop and not far from interesting places. Bence is super available and he let you find everything you need in the house! My stay was perfect, the house is perfect and relaxing. I recommend it to everybody and for sure I'll choose this place again if I visit Budapest again in the future!

Bence offered a perfect accomodation: it is clean, neat, well-designed and smart, in a nice area of the city. The flat has everything the ad offered, it was a perfect choice me to spend a night on a reasonable price.  Within five minutes walk you can find supermarkets and catering places, and it is closely located to a metro station. The owner is a true host, he was helpful, he picked me up at the metro station, showed me the apartment, explained where can I find the most necessary things and offered his help for any case. I was very satisfied with the flat, I can recommend to anyone who spends a few nights in the city.

Nice apartment for single traveler or couple. Great placement: in the center of Pest, close to underground (metro), a lot of sights are in 5-10 minutes of walking. Highly recommended! 

The apartment is very good :-)!.Bence is a great host! Thank you...
availability: 1 night minimum stay.From Dec 24 - 26, 2016 the minimum stay is 2 nights.
review_summary:
Enjoy Ronnie's Home in the fabulous city of Budapest! ;) Our BRAND NEW cosy studio flat is located in the heart of the city, near the ruin pubs, close to the Danube and Gellért hill, Váci street, Kazinczy Street, Gozsdu udvar, Deák square, Vörösmarty square, National Museum, Parliament, Chain Bridge, A38, Dohany Street Synagoge, Buda Castle. 

As soon as you step outside of the house you can feel the vibration of the city. :)
house_rules: - Please leave the apartment in the same general condition as you found it on arrival. You must compensate any damage caused during your stay. Please be respectful with the neighbors and they will be the same with you! The flat is on the first floor so you are able to smoke outside. Smoking in the apartment is strictly forbidden! When you are leaving the apartment, please do not forget to lock the door to secure the house and your personal belongings.
description:
Enjoy Ronnie's Home in the fabulous city of Budapest! ;) Our BRAND NEW cosy studio flat is located in the heart of the city, near the ruin pubs, close to the Danube and Gellért hill, Váci street, Kazinczy Street, Gozsdu udvar, Deák square, Vörösmarty square, National Museum, Parliament, Chain Bridge, A38, Dohany Street Synagoge, Buda Castle. 

As soon as you step outside of the house you can feel the vibration of the city. :)

We made this home with all of our love for your pleasant stay in Budapest.
Our flat features a full-size comfortable and brandnew pullout sofa in the living room area, sleeping place 2 guests.

The kitchen is fully equipped with dishware. It also has a microwave and am electric kettle, and a hotplate with two burner.  

You can also find a minimum “complementary package" for your comfort: mineral water, tea, snacks or fruits :)…

I communicate only English. When you arrive, I'll present our flat.
Please treat my flat with the same care, as if it would be yours. 

The apartment can be occupied on the day of the arrival 
between 5pm and 9 pm and should be left before 12AM on the day of departure. Check out is possible by dropping the keys into the mailbox. 

When it is possible we are flexible with these timeframes, so please advise us of your requirements in advance. 

Smoking in the apartment is strictly forbidden! The flat is on the first floor so you are able to smoke outside.

Please leave the apartment in the same general condition as you found it on arrival. You must compensate any damage caused during your stay.
Please be respectful with the neighbors and they will be the same with you!

When you are leaving the apartment, please do not forget to lock the door to secure the house and your personal belongings. 

We provide you these facilities: 

Fridge
Bathroom with brand new shower 
Washing Machine
Hairdryer
Toilet
Towels, bed linens and sheets
free WIFI with fast and reliable internet connection. WIFI code is written on the router box.
Cleaning fee and tourism tax and welcome drink are included in the price.

My place is an appropriate accomodation for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.  As soon as you step outside of the house you can feel the vibration of the city.

In case of emergency, we are available on smartphone during your stay. You can send us  e-mails anytime.

Our flat is a BRAND NEW cosy studio flat at the heart of Budapest near the "ruin pubs", close to the Danube and Gellért hill, Váci street, Kazinczy Street, Gozsdu udvar, Deák square, Vörösmarty square, National Museum, Parliament, Chain Bridge, A38, restaurant ships, Dohany Street Synagoge ( Europe's biggest synagogue), and the wonderful Buda Castle, Costes Restaurant, Halkakas Halbisztró, Metropolitan Ervin Szabó Library, Stex Ház, and Trattoria Toscana.

Directions: Public transport is perfect at day and night. Nyugati Railway Station is only 4 metro stops away, Keleti Railway Station is 3 stops by Metro Line 4.

From the airport you can take a cab for HUF 7000 (EUR 20) to 1085 Budapest, Baross u. 6. or bus no. 200E to Kőbánya-Kispest (final station) and from there Metro line three (blue M3) to Kálvin square, and you have actually arrived (costs: HUF 700=EUR 2)! Door-to-door "Airport Shuttle Minibus" service at fixed prices. Pre-booked or on the spot. See their webpage for more. I would recommend the Smart City app if you have a smartphone to help you get around the city.

review_summary:

There is a perfect place for you, if you want to explore the city and nightlife, but willing to relax in a very nice and quiet atmosphere.
The apartment is also very close to the business area of Budapest called Vaci ut.

I prefer this neighborhood pretty much, because It's not located in the middle of the city, but very close to it.The location gives you an opportunity the reach any place in a very short time.
