reviews_text:
One of my best Airbnb experiences :) Dorottya and Gloria are both really friendly and welcoming. The apartment is beautiful and the location is really convenient - near to Buda Castle, and maybe 15 minutes walk over the bridge to the Pest side. I'd definitely stay here if I returned to Budapest. Thank you!

We enjoyed the location and had a great time in Budapest.

The best and Incredibly  place in Budapest. I was 5 days  in the apartament. All the time Dorottya and Gloria your house mate were sympathetic and friendly! The apartment is beautiful, spacious, tidy and calm. In the kitchen there are all necessary.  thank very much!! see you next time in Budapest 

This place is really well located in Budapest you can reach the inner city by bus or taking a short walk. It is just behind the Buda Castle and very close to the Chain Bridge.  
The room is very spacious and clean and the air conditioning was really welcome for the hot summer nights. 
Both Dorottya and Gloria are very nice and helpful. They know the city very well and gave me some tips to make my stay as pleasant as possible.  I felt really comfortable at their flat and had everything I needed to feel like home. 

Our stay at Dorottya's place was really nice. The location and the apartment itself have lots of charme and are really inspiring. Also the neighbourhood is really good. It is calm but at the same time near to everything we wanted to see in Budapest -  especially the castle is very close. We relly enjoyed staying at that place and would definately recomment it to other people. 

Incredibly sweet and sympathetic landlady! She shared all the information about the city. More told how to get to the apartment from the airport. She is a very nice person!
The apartment is very beautiful and spacious. There are all necessary. The courtyard garden is incredibly cute.
The apartment is very clean. We all really enjoyed it. We are happy to visit this place again if we are in Budapest.

Easily my best airbnb experience. The room was great - spacious, sunny and clean, with A/C to get through a couple of hot nights. Dorottya and flatmate Gloria were amazing hosts: the stay was well-organized, the communication easy and reliable, and it was fun just sitting at the kitchen table chatting with them. I definitely recommend this place!

Dorottya and Gloria are very friendly and generous people. They welcome and help us to feel good in their flat. The room is perfect and the location adapted to our wish. We recommend theie place ! 

The house was lovely with a great location, short walk from Hungarian national gallery, and air conditioning was welcome. Host was very nice 

It was really nice spending our time in Budapest at Dorottya's place. Her roommate was really helpful, she told us about interesting things to see. The flat and our room were clean and they looked like at the photos. I highly recommend her place to stay :)
review_summary: We are two creatives and we have a nice big flatshare just behind the castle, 10 minutes from the city center. We have  our 3rd room temporary free in December and beginning of January. Come and meet us !
house_rules: We are sharing our home, so we would like to feel good together. It is important though not to disturb each other or the neighbours.
description:
We are two creatives and we have a nice big flatshare just behind the castle, 10 minutes from the city center. We have  our 3rd room temporary free in December and beginning of January. Come and meet us !

The flat has a very nice ambiance. And it is can be nice to be with locals. 

You have access to everything you need. 

We are there during the stay, so we help as much as we can.

It is a very nice neighbourhood, just behind the castle. It is very central but there is a park in 2 mins distance, a cinema on the corner and a few restaurants.

There are several buslines to get to the Pest side in few mins. There is a tram line just in front of the door and metro is in 5 mins walking.

reviews_text:
Best place in town, very raccomanded!

Accoglienza e disponibilità. Un grazioso appartamento dalla posizione strategica (sia per i mezzi che per visitare la città a piedi), Laci è stato disponibile e premuroso nel fornirci consigli per farci trascorrere il soggiorno migliore possibile. Casa confortevole, estremamente tranquilla e silenziosa nonostante la posizione centralissima. Accessoriata di tutto e rispondente alle immagini del sito.
Un'esperienza consigliabile sia per la città che per la sistemazione. Spero proprio di tornare.

Our stay in Budapest was perfect. The flat is easy to find and Laci welcome us at the door. He give us good advices about what to do or not. The flat has a very well situation and you could do everything by foot, it's clean and nice.
Nothing wrong, thanks!

Fantastic apartment right in the centre of Budapest. Really spacious with great light and walking distance from everything. Laci was a great host too. 

Laci was a good host. Available when we needed him. Provided additional items when requested without disturbing us. Flat was functional and adequate as a base for our few days in Budapest. Handy for everywhere we wanted to get to. Good local amenities and safe neighbourhood.  We have been to Budapest many times and this apartment was the most basic we've stayed in but this is reflected in the price. Perfectly acceptable for visitors on a budget for sure. 

Our stay at Laci's was perfect. The location is ideal and the flat is very clean and spacious.

Laci and Ronald were very welcoming when we arrived. They were happy to give us suggestions for things to do as well as provide general information. The flat is a nice space with a well equipped kitchen and a nice bathroom. The kitchen is small however this is not a big problem for basic meals. Great location, you can save money on transport as a lot of the city was within walking distance. Overall a nice stay. 

The apartment has a super location- only couple of min from the Parliament building and at walking distance from most of the sightseeing places. It has everything as described.
At our arrival Laci was very punctual, welcomed us and answered to all our questions and gave a lot of tips :) Very friendly and hospitable, it was also easy to reach him if needed.
When I go again to Budapest I would definitely stay there again! :)
Recommend it :)

Laci and Ronald were wonderful hosts. They were very communicative prior to my arrival and made sure instructions for check in were clear. The apartment itself was very clean and in a very convenient location, near public transit, all the major sites in Budapest, and numerous restaurants. Thanks for a great stay, Laci and Ronald!

The listing description was accurate and communication with Laci and Ronald was smooth. The apartment is in a great location and would recommend it to others.
review_summary: We are a very comfortable place to stay while on your holiday.  We are not a hotel and do not profess to be,  however we have high standards to make our guests feel relaxed in their home away from home.  Our apartments are located in historic Budapest buildings and display their age very well.  Come try us for an experience of living like a Budapester.  There is no free parking available.
house_rules:
No smoking.  No parties.  No loud music. No nonpaying guests.  Treat the apartment as you would your home.

If extra items are requested there is a five euro charge for each and every requested item.  

Children are not free no matter the age.  They are considered as an extra person.  No infants stay for free - birth to age 21 will be considered as an extra person and charged assuming there are two other persons in the apartment.  We charge for any person in the apartment regardless of their age:  babies and infants pay extra if both parents or two adults are in the apartment.  Our rates are for one or two persons:  after that an additional charge of 10 euros each is required.

Text or call us when you arruve at the front door of our building and we shall arrive within a short time to pass the keys.
description:
We are a very comfortable place to stay while on your holiday.  We are not a hotel and do not profess to be,  however we have high standards to make our guests feel relaxed in their home away from home.  Our apartments are located in historic Budapest buildings and display their age very well.  Come try us for an experience of living like a Budapester.  There is no free parking available.

This is a  bright sunny  apartment 42 square meters  in the city center of Budapest located near the Basilica and Andrassy street.  It's address is 31 Bajcsy Zellinsky street

A spacious tiled entryway off the interior courtyard walkway leads to all of the apartment's rooms.  The bed-sitting-living room area is bright and sunny.  Within this space can be found  a real bed 160 cm x 200 cm.  The large room allows for much comfort.  We have also chosen art work that we hope  brings some fun to the interior design.  A  separate sleeping bedroom is located next to the main bed/sitting area.  It has a real bed 140 cm by 200 cm:  comfortable for two persons.  The bathroom has a standing shower, sink and w/c in an attractive tiled bathroom.  

Bajcsy is a major thoroughfare with the Parliament,  Danube River, Vorosmarty Square, Andrassy Street, Deak Square and the City Center  are all within a ten minute walk from your apartment.  The Instant and AnkerT ruin pubs are nearby.  Restaurants of all cuisines may be found in a three block circle.  A branch of Fruccola at 32 Arnay Janos street is known for its grilled chicken with vegetables.  Gerloczy Kavehoz is nearby.  Enjoy Hungarian country dishes at the Hold Utca market.  

The Blue line  Arany janos metro stop is located across the street.   No matter how you arrive in Budapest it is very easy to get to our apartment.    wifi  is complementary.   Come spend your vacation time with us.

The guest has total private access to the entire apartment.  Ğbbģghbhģģģgghģgbhhģğğhhbbb

The guest has our local phone number to contact us whenever necessary.  We live in nearby buildings so we are available to respond on short notice.

The Basilica ares is at the center of all activities in Budapest.  You are ten minutes walk from the Parliment and Danube river:  from Andrassy street and the City center (Vorosmarty Square).  The Liberty Square and Opera House are a ten minute walk.  The Instant ruin pub is ten minute walk.  The Jewish Quarter is 15 minute walk.  The Rudas and Szechenyi thermal baths are within 30 minutes by tram or underground.  Restaurants abound in the neighborhood.  The Arany Janos square has many if the most popular restaurants in the immediate vicinity:  Pomo D'oro, Olivia, la Pampas, etc.   We are located on the edge of District 5 and 7, so there are many government offices nearby.  CEU campus is a short walk away.

Suggested sites for more info.  (URL HIDDEN) and (URL HIDDEN)

The apartment building is immediately across the street from the blue line metro.  At the adjoining corner many buses have their end stations or stop so you can reach in all directions.  The long distance bus line that connects northern Buda with the 200e bus to the airport stops at Arany Janos.  The metro line is 11 stops from the airport connection to the 200e bus.  The yellow line metro has a station 10 minute walk:  this metro follows the historic site route from Deak square to the large City park that houses the zoo and Szchenyi baths.  Hero Square is the stop preceding the Szchenyi bath stop.  This line also stops near the House of Terror.  

We include in our rates Wifi. However we have no control over the equipment nor the provider's service.  Once notified of a problem we will strive to get the service operaional ASAP:  but the provider controls this schedule  we do not.

 
Children from age 0 to 21 are counted as a person by us and if you include them in your stay there is an additional charge for the third or fourth persons where appropriate.

reviews_text:
Ideally located apartment, 5-10 minute walk from all the major city attractions 

Very well located appartment in Buda near the Danube.
Greta gave us extra towels to go to the bath and had some beverages ready for us when we arrived.
However I would strongly recommand Greta and Andras to fix some stuff in the flat for future travelers:
- the light in the kitchen
- the hole in the bathroom floor: it creates a bad smell in the flat...
- the hole in the bathroom ceiling
- the light in the bathroom 
- the bell at the entrance
- the light near the bed that is quite useless when you want to read. 
Finally, you should dust the shelves, clean the mess in the cupboards (clothes mainly) and wash the dirty laundry that was in the basket when we arrived...

All was great :) We were even able to check out a little later! The location was extremely convenient for us. Hope to come back again :)

The location was fantastic. Clean sheets and very cozy apartment. András had quick answears so that was good. But he needs to fix the showeleak and the hole in the bathroom. We liked our stay in budapest very much xx

I highly recommend staying in this studio. The location is excellent, just short walk to the Buda Castle. András was very responsive and always in touch. 

Andras organized the checkin well, we arrived during the day time. Andras was a friendly host: He brought us some toilet paper when we were about to run out. Also, he replied fast to our messages. One thing that irritated us was that Andras said there would be a surprise waiting for us in the flat - but we did not find any.
The flat itself has nice furniture and the bed is comfortable. 
However, things need to get fixed: the kitchen light was broken, we could not find a trash can, there was a hole in the wall (you could see cables), the balcony door did not close properly. Most importantly the bathroom is a total mess. 
The shower was leaking and they "fixed" it by putting a towel in front of it. When the towel was so soaked that we put a new one there, there were small worms underneath it. Also, there was a small hole in the bathroom floor covered by a rug. The ceiling was moldy and it smelled disgusting.
Overall the flat has potential but we would not rent it again considering the current state of it.

The apartment is very well located, in good condition and quiet. However, the toilet leaks water -which is hazardous- and the hosts were not particularly attentive. In two occasions we asked them for help and they failed to fulfill our requests effectively and on time. 

Great location and good setup! Not a lot of natural light and kitchen light doesn't work so made it a bit dark at times, also kettle didn't work properly & shower (or something) was leaking making the bathroom floor quite wet. Other than that it's a good little studio with a comfy bed would recommend :)

Lovely apartment, waking up with th birds singing through the window. Perfect for visiting Budapest, close to everything. Spartan but practical and cosy, clean and handy, with everything you need, including Nespresso coffee machine. The hosts are kind and helpful and speak many languages, they are well travelled and therefore they understand your needs. Recommended. 

Andras and Greta were very kind hosts, although we couldn't meet they arranged everything for us perfectly and were easily reachable. The flat is very nice and conform to the description, perfectly located.
review_summary: A stunning Central studio apartment is becoming available in the highly popular Castle District area. Great atmosphere, all amenities included.
description: A stunning Central studio apartment is becoming available in the highly popular Castle District area. Great atmosphere, all amenities included.

reviews_text:
We had a great stay in Budapest.  The AirBNB was clean and tidy and looked like the photo.  Great value.  Close to transport and city.  All walkable .  Reasonably quiet at night.  Not on main road. Only 1.5 kms from train station.  We took a taxi - paid way too much.  We walked back to train.  Fanni was helpful and met us as arranged.

Good furnishing, near centre of the city. Close to public transportation. All in all a good place to stay

Easy to find,traffic is convenient,walk to tram station for only 3 minutes,and there are some restaurants and supermarkets nearby.House is clean but the heat conditioner doesn't work sometimes at night.

The room was clean, and everything needed was there. The flat has got a good location, close to the most interesting barstreets. Very good price!

The room was nice and clean. We enjoyed our stay in Budapest. Linden is not far from the city centre. 
Fanni is very nice person, ready to help anytime.
I recommend Fanni's accommodation for your stay in Budapest. 

Our room is clean and tidy. Fanni is friendly. We did not talk too much because she seemed to go for her trip.

a very nice flat! fanni was so kind to show us were we can find the things which we re looking for and she sad us which place we ve to visit. unfortunately the heating collector wasn't working for 2 nights and it was a littlebit cold.

This is a great room and facilities for a short stay in Budapest. Located close to the centre it is only a short distance on foot to most local amenities. The room is clean and spacious with a very modern and clean shower room. I highly recommend staying here!!

Fanni's place is well kept in a great location, walking distance to everything we visited. Wifi is great, room just like the photos. Some minor personal touches would make the stay more comfortable 

Fanni was helpful with directions in getting to the apartment, and in getting my bearings and figuring out where sites were.
The place was as advertised and photographed and convenient to get to the main sights in the city. 
No problems with my stay at all. Thank you!
review_summary: Hotel Linden is a new space for people who would like to visit Budapest, and stay in the heart of the city. There are 4 rooms (all has private bathroom, and double bed) and a shared kitchen with a fully equipped kitchen cabinet  + dining table.
house_rules:
Check in and Check out
Please try to arrive in the discussed time, if not please note me!
description:
Hotel Linden is a new space for people who would like to visit Budapest, and stay in the heart of the city. There are 4 rooms (all has private bathroom, and double bed) and a shared kitchen with a fully equipped kitchen cabinet  + dining table.

The apartment has 4 separated rooms all has private bathroom, all of them opens from the rooms. All the rooms has double bed, with fresh, brand new sheets and soft linens. 8 people can stay in the Hotel at one time. There are keys for each rooms. We also provide towels.

It also includes a fully fitted shared kitchen including fridge / freezer, electric cooker, microwave oven, kettle, toast maker and cutlery, you also can ask for iron and hair dryer.

reviews_text:
nice place, nice location! if i visit Buda, i will stay again!!!! 

The apartment is great, top location for exploring the city, everything is just 15min walking distance, tram, bus and metro stop just around the corner. The apartment is the same how is it described and on the photos. I stayed there with friends for a week and feel like we were home. Peter and Orsy are amazing hosts. 
The apartment is big, spacious and very clean. Good Wi-Fi connection, always hot water and amazing view on the river. 
Definitely recomend this place for other guest as well, 5 starts. 

Very good location: subway, trams close to the apartment. It is a hundred meters from the Parliament. When all of three rooms are occupied it can be a little bit noisy but it depends on the neighbors' culture of course. Furnitures are quite old. As a place to sleep between city research — great choice.

Orsi was extremely helpful and approachable. The apartment is splendid and very well located. It has a wonderful view as well. I would definitely recommend this place.

Well priced.
Great location.
Peter was great in helping us feel at home and giving some good tips.
Not fancy but great for the price.

Peter was available and responsive whenever required. He was very friendly and efficient and runs the place like clockwork! Most of the time there was a very friendly community feeling in the shared apartment and it was convenient being right in the centre of town. 

Thomas was very helpful and did hos best to make us feel at home in the apartment. The location is just amazing, just a few meters from the Danube and the Hungarian parliament. It looks just like on the pictures. 
The only drawback would be that at some point there were 9 guests in the apartment, us included, and it was too Much for the size of the place. (No hot water for shower,,busy kitchen all the time.) 
Great stay apart from that.

This place is conveniently located right next to the Parliament building. All key attractions are within walking distance or a short tram ride away. The apartment was functional and did its job really well. Peter was highly helpful and made our stay comfortable.

Had an amazing stay! Couldn't ask for a better location, tram stop is basically at your doorstep. The flat was clean and bigger than expected, exactly what we were looking for. Got a map and suggestions upon check in. Would recommend getting multiple day passes for metro and trams. 

 Our host Orsi could have met us downstairs to meet us instead we buzzed an intercom and asked us to come to the 4th floor. Thank goodness there was an elevator to use for heavy luggage. We were shown around the apartment and our suite and asked if there were any other questions & if we had we could call him on his cell. That was the only contact we had with our host. The suite that we were given for 3 days is not shown on his profile pictures, but it did have a nice view of the Danube River but no balcony that you could sit out on. The bed definately needs a thicker mattress because it was very hard & uncomfortable. The room did have air conditioning which was a blessing because it was pretty warm temp. The kitchen and bathroom are shared by two other suites that are rented out at the same time which we were not informed of but did meet very nice couples in the interm.
availability: The minimum night stay for this listing varies.
review_summary: Our Danube View Private Room is located behind the Parliament in the heart of the historical downtown surrounded by many nice restaurants and bars, the apartment is fully equipped and has an amazing panorama on the Danube river.
house_rules: The most important rule is to not to disturb the others living in the building and we take this serious, our apartments are located in buildings where the locals from Budapest are living, old people, babies sick and healthy, so the travelers who come and stay in our apartment should respect the building, the people and the most important part of it is not to be loud in the common areas and in the apartment after 8PM, of course you can stay out in the city as long as you wish, just please be very quite returning home and do not party in the apartment, this is the most important thing to share.
description:
Our Danube View Private Room is located behind the Parliament in the heart of the historical downtown surrounded by many nice restaurants and bars, the apartment is fully equipped and has an amazing panorama on the Danube river.

Our Danube View Private Room is located in the heart of the city, just 200 meters away from the House of Parliament, one of the main sights of the city. The area is mostly pedestrian with a lot of nice restaurants, cozy cafes and as it has a very central location, you can explore all the sights by walks from the apartment.

Our Danube View Private Room can accommodate 1, 2, 3, 4 or 5 persons, as it has 2 double bed and 1 single bed. You'll have a convenient location to reach all the sights of the city by foot. The city park with Budapest's best spa complex is an easy walk, as well as all of the other sights. Oktogon's great bars and restaurants will be within arm's reach if you choose Danube View Private Room for your stay in Budapest.

It is located in the historical old town of Budapest, next to the House of Parliament near Kossuth Lajos ter.

The room can accommodate up to 5 people in 2 double beds and 1 single beds.

The room has shared bathroom and kitchen, and if you rent the room only, the bathroom and the kitchen will be cleaned everyday by us so you will not even notice you are sharing it.

Of course all the necessary bedding are free of charge (fresh sheets, blankets, pillows, towels as many as you like).

It’s on the 4th floor of an old town palace, and there is an elevator in the building.

Our concept of hosting is unique in the way how we assist our guests in order for them to become a part of this special city. By staying with us you get the chance to discover the city with a perspective of a local. Our aim is to give our Guests a comprehensive insight on how life in Budapest is. In addition to that we firmly believe that each and every person is different therefore we take extra care in dealing with the special needs of our Guests and we have the chance to get to know all the people we are hosting so we can help them the way they need. Our small enterprise consists of apartments which are all set in the heart of the city amidst vibrant cultural and historical surroundings. Please explore our site and see what we can offer You if you choose to visit this wonderful Central European city.

The Danube View Private Room has access to a fully equipped kitchen and dining room and is sharing the bathroom with another room. The room is located within walking distance to all the sights.

You will have your own key to the apartment and to your room, so you can lock it yourself. The apartment has wireless internet and the kitchen is fully equipped, even with a washing machine (of course we will have washing powder, softener etc for you), there will be tea, coffee, sugar for free for you in the apartment and you can cook if you wish as all the equipment will be there for you with the possibility to store your food in the fridge.

There is hairdryer, iron and ironing board in the apartment of course.

Upon arrival we wait for you in the apartment with your key, a map and some other useful information for your stay in Budapest. When you have put down your luggage we will sit down with you and explain the most important things you should know to make your stay more comfortable, like:
- best restaurants, bars, cafes, breakfast places
- best bath houses and museums
- most important and interesting sights and areas to visit
- public transport and taxi system
- where to exchange money
- where are the closest supermarkets, and 24H shops

After all the explanation we disappear until you leave but will be there for you to help in anything like booking a table at a restaurant or if you have any question, you just email, sms, call us and we answer all possible questions and help in any kind of problems.

The Danube View Private Room is located in Lipótváros, which is one of the most elegant district of the city, where the Danube is running through with all the beautiful palaces and buildings and the house of Parliament.. Lipótváros has a lot to offer from the House of Parliament to the Basilica and it has some of the city's best restaurants and bars. It is amazing to stroll on the beautiful streets or just have a coffee at a small corner coffee shop, every corner of the district offers you a new surprise.

Sights next to the Danube View Private Room: Margaret Island, House of Parliament, Andrássy boulevard + any of the other sights of the city within 15 minutes walk.

The closest bathhouses: Széchenyi Baths and Lukács Baths, both accessible withing 15 minutes.

Near the building downstairs: 24 hours supermarket, coffee shop, local restaurants, pharmacy, exchange office.

The apartment has very good public transportation connection, as it is located close to KOSSUTH LAJOS TER, one of the main hub for public transport in the city where metroline M2 and tramline 2 are crossing each other.

There is 24H bus connection next to the apartment too.

It is important to know that we can receive guests 24H a day, so no problem with any late arrival, check in is from noon and on the day you leave you have to pack your luggage until 11.00, but you can keep your luggage at a safe place during the day in case you leave only later from Budapest.

We can pick you up by car at the airport for a fee of 29EUR.

You can use internet in the apartment free of charge of course and of course the use of laundry is free too. My brother can rent bikes for you too, it costs about 7EUR/day and they bring them to the apartment and you can give it back to them also at the flat when you wish.

reviews_text:
This place is perfect. This is on the Buda side, where the castle and old historic sites are and the Gellert hotel. The location is awesome. From the one side of the building you are next to the famous chain bridge and can walk across in 15 minutes to the best parts of Pest, including Váci street.  If you exit on the other side of the building you can walk up to the Matyas church and Var and fisherman's bastion in minutes. It's a wonderful place to stay. 

Very beautiful apartment , decorated with a lot of tastes and well situated, Ildikó was very nice with us, very helpfully and we really thank her! 

IIdikó was really helpful and friendly. The apartment was modern and clean in a really central location. 

Very nice apartment. Awesome location. We loved it. 

Ildiko is a attentive landload, her house is beautiful and cozy. Especially the locations is right in the sightseeing spots! Can go anywhere by walk and trams. I had a great experience in Budapest, will be back again. 

Stunning apartment set in a perfect location right next to the Chain Bridge and local transport (trams and buses). Everything you want to see & do (house of pariliament, royal palace, thermal baths etc) are at a stone throw away or easily accessible. 

We received fantastic service from Ildiko who contacted me a few days before to give me information. On arrival she greeted us at the door to show us to the apartment, eventhough we arrived very late at night. 
Ildiko is warm & welcoming despite her limited English & provided us with useful information (e.g map & bus routes etc) which was handy during our stay in Budapest. 

The modern apartment is beautifully decorated, immaculate & had everything you need for a comfortable stay. Ildiko even kindly stocked the fridge & cupboard with some much appreciated basics such as coffee, tea, sugar, lemon squash, snacks & fruits etc. 
She is always easily contactable and would reply straight away via email and text if you have any queries or concerns. As a host we cannot fault her! 

The building itself is a large traditional period property, full of old charm & character with an ornate elevator from a time gone by that is still functional. On the evening, it is very dark (you have to press light switches on the walls for light)  & quiet & in our opinion this apartment possibly may not be suitable for the lone female traveller as it can be a little creepy at night going into the building & make your way back to your apartment. Having said that once you walk into your apartment, you feel completely relaxed, safe & comfortable. So take note if you are a scaredy cat & travelling in wintertime!

Overall we as a group of three girls highly recommend this beautiful apartment & we wouldn't hesitate to book this apartment again.

Ildikó treated us with a warm welcome, including champagne. The apartment is absolutely beautiful and the location is the best in my opinion. It is beneath the royal palace and across the chain bridge. Only a 10 min beautiful walk over the bridge brings you in the city centre where you want to be. 

I highly recommend this apartment. 

Ildiko was a great host! She gave us great directions to the place and touched base with us to make sure everything was going good! The apartment is in a great location and she was very helpful to give us directions to any of the major sites!

Wonderful appartment, clean and friendly, Ildiko was a perfect Host... Welcome Drink ... Bottle of red wine...
She answered our SMS immidietly and Sent us a Perfect Description how to get there ...
I can recomend this appartment to anyone !!

Beautiful, quiet apartment in gorgeous old building, minutes away from the castle and the chain bridge. I'm a native of Budapest and took a few days trip back to my home town so believe me when I say it doesn't get much better than this. Massive bed, comfortable living area. Loved it.

description:
The 50 sqm apartment is situated in the heart of Budapest.
At the foot of The Chain Bridge, Danube River on the road to the royal Castle of Buda,half a minute from the Funicular train to the Castle, a three minute stroll to Mathew Church,Fishermans Bastion a stone’s throw from the Castle Garden Bazar,a fully renovated elegant apartment awaits you. Short walks Parlament, Opera House, St. Stephen Basilica, Deák square, Andrássy Boulevard, Synagogue, Ruinpubs,Metro,Thermal baths (Rudas,Gellért...)

In a heritage type building, a short stroll from anywhere, the owner has created an elegant apartment in the classical style where you stay in and be part of world heritage in the heart of Budapest.  Aside from the “turn of the century” feeling, you’ll find the most modern furnishings in this fully automated, wonderfully-stocked place.  

The living area boasts marble and decorated glass, a complete kitchen, washing machine and dishwasher.  This is the “Art Apartment” and, as such, you will be surrounded by real art objects – refined visual art and statues.

The unit houses 2 + 2 people.  The French bed (240x200) and the sofa is for 2+2 people. In the event of a larger group, a second apartment, “The Bridge and Castle” can be combined in order to accommodate up to 8 guests. With “The Bridge and Castle”, you get the very best quality in Budapest.

While in Budapest, visit our newly-renovated apartment and be surrounded by our hospitality.  

Included – flat screen SMART TV, several foreign language channels and free WiFi - Powerful 120/10 Mbit/s.

You have the opportunity to discover the real Budapest, sit on the balcony with a glass of wine, walk to the palace in the late evening, or enjoy the countless programmes in the area, the fabulous restaurants and the world-known sights of the Danube shore of Pest.

The casino and thermal baths (Gellert, Lukacs, Rudas, Kraly and Racz) are short walks away.  The nightlife area is a short, romantic stroll away.  A bicycle rental is 50 metres away.  The Buda cross-city streetcar stops 100 metre from the front door.  The traffic centrum of Budapest, the Deak square, is an 8 minute walk away.

If you rent a car or you arrived by own car, you can park before the house.  The sightseeing bus stops 30 metres from the hotel.

Taxi, bus 16, bus 105, bus 116, tram 41, tram 19, metro (yellow, red, blue), ship 11

FREE PARKING:  You can park your car in the closed courtyard of house, but just the small and medium car, because the width of the gate is 233 cm.

reviews_text:
Great experience in Budapest, Krisztina is a very nice host and super helpful and available. Very nice small apartment, perfect for max 4 people. Location of the apartment as well perfect, couple of nice places to drink and eat near by. Definitely great place for a long weekend in Budapest. 

Everything perfect. She waited for us and was always helpful if we had any question about the city. The location is very central and even there are many bars and restaurants around, the flat is very quiet. I fully recommend it. You can walk to every spot of the city like the Danube and the Heroes' Square.
Thanks a lot!

 

We were 4 girls for 5 days in Budapest! The flat was cozy,clean,comfortable and lovely. Krisztina was so kind and friendly. Excellent location!!! We recommend it:)

Great flat on 4th floor of an older bulding with a lift. Close to the public transport and with a plenty of nightlife options. Krisztina was very nice and we really enjoyed our stay!

We very much enjoyed our stay at Krisztina's place. She was incredibly helpful and kind. Her flat was very cute and cozy! Exactly as pictures show. Also clean and well equipped. It was in the bar district for those wanting to go out at night. Close to many bars and trendy student type cafe's, bars, pubs, etc. and then about 15-30min via public transit to the main attractions. Would come again! 

Krisztina was an amazing host. She even took care of booking a cab for our group of 4 to pick us (EMAIL HIDDEN)municating with her was very easy, and always responded within minutes of our inquiries. The apartment is in an excellent location (close to everything), and just a short distance from a couple of different hop-on / hop-off stops. The apartment is very clean, modern, and nicely decorated. The apartment first 4 adults comfortably, and even though we did not make use of the kitchen, it has everything one could possibly need.

Great location, lovely apartment and friendly host

We had a great time in Budapest. Excellent food and places, as well as Krisztinas's place. It's super cozy, very comfortable and it has all you need to make your stay as it were your home. The location is great, few blocks to subway and bus stop. The neighbourhood is full of bars and restaurants. 
Krisztina is an excellent host. She was very helpful all the time and she booked a cab for us to take us back to the airport! Thanks so much Krisztina!

My wife & I enjoyed Krisztina`s hospitality in early Oct`16. Location is good, on 4th floor.She could even arrange airport pick-up by private Cab for us to avoid navigating on arrival & had the Cab driver drop us off right outside the building gate until she came along. Kristina`s place is chic, functionally well equipped and clean. Help is very prompt and you can get all kind of information to make your visit a memorable one. The building in an old one which is what the neighbourhood is all about. The apartment is very modern and cheerful . Very close to the Jewish quarter and Bars etc, a short walk to the Metro Station / Trams / Bus Stop / Bank /SPAR Supermarket etc.Recommend the place for its location.

Great central location easy walking distance to main attractions and in the same area as ruin bars and great restaurants! Krisztina was so helpful and will definitely be recommending her home to anyone travelling to Budapest!

reviews_text:
The apartment was perfect and the location was great! The hosts were wonderful and extremely accommodating. We were able to explore the city and the apartment's location was perfect for walking everywhere. Definitely recommend! 

Had a fantastic stay here and a fantastic time in Budapest.  This apartment couldn't be more ideally located - even if you were to drop a pin on a map.  Close to everything but also quiet and on a side street, even a few minutes walk to the Metro.  The apartment was as descibed and worked perfectly for my stay.  I'd highly recommend the Kiraly Loft Studio to anyone visiting Budapest. 

We loved this apartment! It's the perfect location, close to all the restaurants and nightlife, the beautiful Jewish quarter and the city centre is within reach, it's right on the metro station and close to all the other public transportation. 
Kinga waited for us patiently late at night and explained eveything, she was great and friendly and when we asked for extra blankets she got us and brought them to the place. The hosts also made sure we had everything we needed, including heating and stoves for cooking because the gas system was down during our stay. They were caring and attentive. 
The apartment is very comfortable, the kitchen is great and well equipped and the washing machine has a fast program, which made our lives easier. 
This is a perfect find, would definitely recommend it. 

We loved our stay at this apartment, the arrival was smooth, the loft was cozy and clean, absolutely perfect for a weekend getaway. 

The Appartement is very comfortable, you can find everything you need and its very clean.The owner are very nice. They had good advices what to Do in Budapest!  The Location from the Appartement is great. Close to the City Center and lots of very good bars arround:) very easy to get from there to the airport.

tamas and kinga were great hosts ! they were able for any question . 
the flat is in just a perfect location, 1 min walking to opera, and just on a main street with lots of pubs and restaurants. about 10 min walkimg to vaci utca. 
 it was clean and had everything we needed.
we got bottle of wine and lots of travelling maps and magazines, which helped us alot in planning our trip . 
we highly recomend the flat.
couldnt ask for more. just perfect !

I had a great stay at Tamas & Kinga's place.  The loft has everything you need and located in a central position close to many shops, restaurants and public transportation as well as within walking distance to many attractions.

I had a great stay at their flat.  Room was comfortable and clean.  Kinga met me at the door and provided info on nearby attractions.  The location was especially convenient and would recommend it to others.  

One item to note, the nearby church for some reason rings their bells literally hundreds of times at 8pm.  I'm not sure why, most bell towers ring the equivalent number of times to signify the hour but this one is absurd...

The day before departure Tamas booked a private car for me to the airport (black car) which turned out even better than a yellow taxi.  Sammy, the driver was prompt and friendly and cheaper than expected.

Thanks again!

The apartment represented perfectly the add's photos, it was really well clean and decorated.
I enjoyed a lot my stay at Tamas & Kinga's place.

Overall it was a very positive airbnb experience and i would recommend Tamas&Kinga apartment!

We were coming quite late but that wasn't an issue for our hosts and they've organised the check in very well and we've communicated all the details up front so we got to the apartment without any problems.

The apartment is a comfortable studio, furnished, clean and equipped with all the necessities for a stay. It's a studio flat on the ground floor with  with double bed on entresol + additional sofa bed. 
Although its in lively neighborhood it was very quite and nothing disturbed us.
Nice touch- fruits and water waiting for us upon arrival.

We chose this apartment for its location and it was spot on! In the very heart of the old Jewish district it is few steps from great bars, pubs, restaurants etc. We had all that we wanted within 5 min walk which was exactly what we hoped for. Tamas & Kinga left us a simple guide with some tips on best places to eat, drink as well other things to do in Budapest.

Checking out was also quick and easy- we were leaving early, so we haven't met in person but communication was very good & we arranged everything.

If you're looking for a quite hideout in one of the best locations in Budapest i would recommend Tamas&Kinga apartment!
review_summary: Our newly refurbished cute studio is very comfortable for up to 3 people and situated in the very heart of Budapest downtown. The location is perfect. All the famous streets, city sights, restaurants, cafes, bars etc...are walking distance. It is just a few steps from Kiraly Street (the most famous bar street). Despite the central location it is very quiet because the flat is in a side street and the backside of the building. A helyem erre megfelelő: párok, magányos kalandozók és üzleti utazók.
description:
Our newly refurbished cute studio is very comfortable for up to 3 people and situated in the very heart of Budapest downtown. The location is perfect. All the famous streets, city sights, restaurants, cafes, bars etc...are walking distance. It is just a few steps from Kiraly Street (the most famous bar street). Despite the central location it is very quiet because the flat is in a side street and the backside of the building. A helyem erre megfelelő: párok, magányos kalandozók és üzleti utazók.

Despite the central location the building is quiet because it is in a side street. The studio is at the backside of the building and the windows face to the inner yard.  It offers a comortable living area up to 3 people. You will find a double bed for 2 people, a nice pull out sofa for 1 people, a fully equipped kitchen and the bathroom in the flat(URL HIDDEN)FACALITIES OF THE STUDIO: 
- wardrobe
- iron and ironing board 
- hairdryer 
- drying rack
- washing machine 
- dishwashing liquid  
- liquid soap
- bed linen and bed-sheets 
- towels 
- high speed wifi Internet 
- TV/Cable TV with many international channels 
- fully equipped kitchen (refrigerator, built-in oven, freezer, microwave oven, kettle, stove, complete dinnerware set)

We welcome our guests personally sharing our best tips on the city; best bars, nightclubs, restaurants, cafes, museums, exhibitions, outdoor activities, baths, city sights etc... We are ready for helping and assisting you regarding anything you need during your whole stay.

The location is just perfect. It is the very heart of Budapest. Our studio is situated next to Király street which is the most famous bar street in Budapest. All the famous city sights and popular places like the Parliament, Heroes' Square, Andrassy Avenue (UNESCO), Hungarian Opera House, Elisabeth Square (main central meeting point) Vaci Street, Chain Bridge, St Stephens Basilica, the Buda Castle etc…are within walking distance. Andrassy Avenue, The Opera House and the very popular Gozsdu Yard are all can be reached in 2 minutes by walk. The area offers everything what you need during your holiday: bars, gastro pubs, ruin bars, little restaurants with international and national cuisines, traditional restaurants, cafes, supermarkets, parks,0-24 supermarkets, bike rentals, money exchanges, banks, metro/tram/bus stations/stops etc…You can also enjoy Budapest's cultural life around the location (House of Opera, theaters, galleries, museums, exhibitions).  Old Town/Historic/Cultural/Ruin Bar quarter is just next door as well.

Everything is in walking distance but Metro 1/Opera Station, Bus 105/Opera stop, Trolley-bus 70/78 Opera stop are all just 2 minutes walk away.

*** Hop On Hop Off tickets are available at check in!
20 EUR for 48 hours 25 EUR for 72 hours
Including: unlimited usage for the chosen period, guided walking tour, guided biking tour, rivercruise, welcome drinks..

Best Restuarants: Menza, Halászbástya Étterem, Hungarikum Bistro, Columbus Pub, Zeller Bistro 

Best Cafes: New York Cafe, Espresso Embassy, Centrál Kávéház 

Best Museums and Exhibitions: Hungarian National Museum, Ethnographic Museum, Hospital in the Rock (Buda Castle), Müpa Budapest, Hungarian National Gallery (Buda Castle)  
   
Budapest is also famous about its thermal bath culture. Top thermal baths: 

Szechenyi Bath - it is the largest medicinal bath is Europe. It offers sevaral indoor and outdoor pools. Its water is supplied by two thermal springs. The bath is located in City Park and it was built in a Neo-baroque style. 

Rudas bath - it is a thermal and medicinal bath in Budapest, Hungary. It was first built in 1550, during the time of Ottoman rule. To date, it retains many of the key elements of a Turkish bath, exemplified by its Turkish dome and octagonal pool. It is located on the Buda side of Elisabeth Bridge. 

Gellért Bath -  part of the famous Hotel Gellért in Buda, the Gellért Thermal Baths and Swimming Pool is a bath complex in Budapest. The complex includes thermal baths, which are small pools containing water from Gellért hill's mineral hot springs. It is famous for its main hall with gallery and glass roof, built in Art-Nouveau style.

Prices - Public transport: 

Single ticket - 350 HUF
Single ticket bought on the spot - 450 HUF 
Transfer ticket - 530 HUF
24 hours travel card - 1 650 HUF
72 hours travel card - 4 150 HUF

review_summary:
Ciao!
I will be happy to host you in my beautiful apartment, located in the very city center of Budapest, walking distance to EVERYTHING. 
The bedroom is quiet and cute, your private bathroom super new, and the balcony overlooks Vaci Utca, the main shopping street of the city.
The apartment has been recently renovated in modern but cool style, and it's very bright.
You will be in a perfect position to fully enjoy the beauty of Budapest.
It is actually pretty awesome!
house_rules:
- Please, PRINT OR SAVE the informations about the door code and transports, for a perfect check-in. You will find this info on the confirm of the reservation.
- I suggest you also to read my Guide, in which I selected some of the best things you can visit in Budapest, and few good tips about nice bars and restaurant around our apartment.
description:
Ciao!
I will be happy to host you in my beautiful apartment, located in the very city center of Budapest, walking distance to EVERYTHING. 
The bedroom is quiet and cute, your private bathroom super new, and the balcony overlooks Vaci Utca, the main shopping street of the city.
The apartment has been recently renovated in modern but cool style, and it's very bright.
You will be in a perfect position to fully enjoy the beauty of Budapest.
It is actually pretty awesome!

It is located in the historical center of the city, so you can simply walk around to see basically everything, starting from the beautiful shores of the Danube, the famous Central Market Hall, the main square Deak Ferenc Ter, the beautiful Parliament building, and nightlife area of the ruin pubs in Kiraly utca.
The room at your disposal is tiny but cute, and it face a quiet and green courtyard.
The living room is furnished with record player, stero, play station 3, projector, computer, and it has a nice balcony overlooking Vaci Utca, the most famous shopping street of the city.
It is really a great view, with a surprising peace, especially considering the central location of the apartment!

In addition to your bedroom, you will have a private bathroom, which includes bath and bidet.
Even the beautiful kitchen and spacious living room will be at your disposal, but they will be shared with me, who will sleep in the other bedroom of the apartment.

I will give you tips and suggestions to enjoy this beautiful city. I will be in the apartment especially in the evening, and I hope there will be the chance to even have a few drinks together if you wish!

The district 5 is considered the true center of the city. 
The area is enriched by shops of some of the most important brands of the world, and it is the most clean and safe part of the Budapest. 
Vaci Utca in particular is the main pedestrian street of the city, known as "the shopping street".
The view from our balcony it is truly breathtaking!

 The Golden Choice apartment is also within walking distance to all the major sights Budapest has to offer. This neighbourhood is a must-see for all who visit Budapest, so why not live in the heart of it?

description:
If you want to feel the beat of the city of Budapest, if you want to live close to the most famous sights, close to festivals, great restaurants, cafés, ruin pubs this apartment is the best, a golden choice for you!
 The Golden Choice apartment is also within walking distance to all the major sights Budapest has to offer. This neighbourhood is a must-see for all who visit Budapest, so why not live in the heart of it?

If you want to feel the beat of the city of Budapest, if you want to live close to the most famous sights, close to festivals, great restaurants, cafés, ruin pubs this apartment is the best, a golden choice for you!
The Golden Choice apartment welcomes its guests in the heart of the city, on the first floor of a lovely building with typical Hungarian architecture, equipped with an elevator. These spacious 77 sqms loft hold two bedrooms, where 5 people can comfortably sleep on 4 beds. It's a quiet place to rest, but the party quarter is very near, barely 5 minutes by foot. The Golden Choice apartment is also within walking distance to all the major sights Budapest has to offer, the St Stephen Basilica, the Synagogue, the Parliament, the Hungarian State Opera House, Heroes' Square, Széchényi Thermal Baths, the Chain Bridge, the Castle District, Gellért Hill, Gellért Spa, the Danube Walkway and many more. To those who want to visit sights further away, the center of the public transport system is at your doorway. Deák Square, where 3 metrolines, many buses, trams, and even the Hop-on Hop-off bus meet is 2 minutes of walking away. The Golden choice apartment is surrounded by elegant shops, restaurants, cafés and souvenir shops. This neighbourhood is a must-see for all who visit Budapest, so why not live in the heart of it? Experience, adventure and nice memories are more treasured than gold.

The whole apartment.

review_summary: A beautiful apartment awaits you at one of the central locations in the charming Budapest. Situated next to tramline 4-6, the most popular line for tourists and locals alike in the capital, the apartment is within the proximity to many attractions: the great synagogue, Blaha Lujza square (where M2 metro can be connected), Oktogon (where M1 metro can be connected), Andrassy Boulevard, Corinthia Hotel and Thermal Spa, etc.
house_rules:
- According to local rules, no auditory disturbance should be imposed on the neighboring dwellers after 10pm (22:00).
- We hire a professional cleaning lady to look after your left-overs, but please be kind to her by not leaving too much work on her shoulder once you're gone. If the leftovers are too messy, we can't do anything in case she would ask for extra tips. This will be on you. We would really appreciate your cooperation.
- Turn off the light whenever you go out in order to save energy, the environment would be very happy if you do so. Also, check the stove and make sure everything is off in the kitchen! We don't wish to deal with any fire accident because the neighbors love their historical dwellings a lot.
- Lock the door carefully once you're out and keep the keys with you attentively. If you lose them, you will have to pay for the new lock as well as the new keys.
- Our place is smoking-prohibited in and out, so please do not smoke and leave your cigarette around the balcony.
- If you have a friend(s) in town, you're welcome to bring him/her(them) over for a visit. But, if they want to stay for a night, please let us know!
- Our house is already disinfected from possible allergens, please do not bring pets in because the next guest might suffer from allergic reaction. If you love to enjoy your trip, so do they. Help them out by not giving them a misery with running nose because of your beloved little friends!
- Our place is a NO for parties. If we get noticed from the neighbors of your unexpected party-time, we have to ask you to leave the place immediately without compensation.
- There are other guests who stay at the apartment as well, so do your bit of respect. Keep the common area clean and don't make too much loud noise at night.
description: A beautiful apartment awaits you at one of the central locations in the charming Budapest. Situated next to tramline 4-6, the most popular line for tourists and locals alike in the capital, the apartment is within the proximity to many attractions: the great synagogue, Blaha Lujza square (where M2 metro can be connected), Oktogon (where M1 metro can be connected), Andrassy Boulevard, Corinthia Hotel and Thermal Spa, etc.

鍵付きの大きなロッカーがあって便利でした。ただ、部屋はカーテンで仕切られているだけなので、他の部屋の音や光がかなり聞こえます。

It's a great location in the dawntown.

Great hostel! One of the best that I've ever been to. Great price, great location. Would highly recommend it.

Hostel  Is clean and well managed,  tremendously located.  Whole stay without bug issues. Late night access,  general safety,  WiFi,  everything spot on.  Only thing to have mind onto:  bring earplugs,  place gets quite loud.  There is some guy on second floor playing loud dubstep at night and tenants might have some weird sleeping patterns.

The ad is correct. Location ideal. Walking distances to everywhere. Didn't need to take the subway.

Nice, quiet and clean hostel. It's what pictures show. I recommend it.

nice hostel. the hostel that i have stayed. helpful staff and quite clean bed as well as bedroom. However, some other guest who arrived at late night, they laughed and talked loudly and noisy so it disturbed others' sleep. Anyway, strong recommend to solo and couple.

The location is amazing.  Near of the important touristic points and some parties. People that working in hostel are very attentive and simpathetic.  I recomend this place.

 The location is good but the space is quite small. Considering the price per night, it is good place to stay for two nights.

The hostel was great. In typical hostel fashion, there were lots of friendly people, and a lot of interesting memories to go along with that. The accommodations were fine as expected, including cleanliness and a safe place to store belongings. But also, the hostel is in a location that is central to the Pest side of town and near the metro. And the chain bridge over to the Buda side is just a few blocks away in walking distance. Great place, would definitely recommend it.
availability: The minimum night stay for this listing varies.
review_summary: A nice, clean, centrally located hostel at budget prices. The dorms are special, the bunk beds are separated from each other by thin walls, thus giving a kind of semi-privacy to my guests.
description: A nice, clean, centrally located hostel at budget prices. The dorms are special, the bunk beds are separated from each other by thin walls, thus giving a kind of semi-privacy to my guests.

reviews_text:
We spent two days in Ákos apartment this December. 

We had an early flight, thus we spent a half of the day with our luggage (I find 2 p.m. check in to be very late, but it was pre-discussed, so it was all right and led us to a very tourist-ish fotos with a suitcase on the Heroes' Square). 

Ákos not only helped us with documents to get a visa, he also responded very quickly and provided us with all information needed to find the apartment.   
The district around is very nice, we just walked there alone in the evening, wandering and trying to find some food, the view is also fantastic. For us it was a perfect place just to be together. Thank you!

Hi all, I suggestiva you this flat because in clean with nice forniture and really comfortable. It's situated in a safe a nice area where you can find restaurants and bars in add there metro station really close. Aikos is really available to reply to all requests.
I suggest you this accomodation, you will have a good permanence!

Location is great, as is WIFI. Good value for money-it is cheap! One should note it is on the 3rd floor with no elevator in case this is an issue.

Ákos apartment is in a great location in Buda cause the castle and also public transport is very close. His wife Patrícia showed me around and for the first look the flat was very nice. But after a bit my girlfriend and I saw that the bed sadly was in a bad condition (you could feel the frame of the left mattress). Also the hot water in the shower only worked while we used the tab in the bathroom at the same time (think the gas heating for the hot water should be adjusted). Besides those two issues the stay was really good and the communication with Patrícia was fine.

This apartment is in the heart of Budapest - you need to go only 5 minutes on foot from flat to the river bank (with unforgettable view to Parliament building. The flat is modern, clean and comfortable. The only minus was water in bathroom - firstly, it was hard to get warm water because it changed from very hot to very cold. But later everything was ok.
The view from the balcony is really adorable. I wish I could stay there few more times!

Akos is a very nice guy and great host, however the photos don't reflect the apartment so well... They look quite polished. And, in addition to that, we didn't have toilet paper in the apartment, which was a  bit annoying because we had to get some first... Overall it was a good experience though! Great neighbourhood, nice host and sufficient space in the apartment :)

This a wonderful area. Very close to the metro and also within a short walk to the Castle area.  The Apartment is equipped with everything that you would need for a short stay. 

The house is near of the center of city, we all enjoy these days in there

Although we had a big delay and Akos had another appointment, he was really understanding. So,he made possible for us to enter. The appartment was nice and clean; also small and basic, but that doesn't mean anything bad. It was perfect for a couple. We had a good time in Budapest thank's to this appartment because it was super close to everything (some minutes to fisherman's bastion area and a few in metro to the other side of the river). The batthyany station is about 3 minutes or so, and you can see everyday the parliament when you go there. The bridge is near too, nice for a walk to the Pest area. 
In the end, the location was one of the best points. I really recomend the stay. 

Everything was great! The apartment looks really like on the pictures. The communication with Akos in advance was perfect and he explained us all the doubts we have. The best thing of the apartment is the location, it's only about 15 minutes from the center. All in all: I definitely recommend it!!
review_summary:
Enjoy the splendid view of the Castle of Buda!
Welcome to my stylish, fully renovated modern apartment at the bottom of the Castle Hill of Budapest!
description:
Enjoy the splendid view of the Castle of Buda!
Welcome to my stylish, fully renovated modern apartment at the bottom of the Castle Hill of Budapest!

Enjoy the splendid view of the Castle of Buda!
Welcome to my stylish, fully renovated modern apartment at the bottom of the Castle Hill of Budapest! 
The flat is situated in the historical center of Buda in a tranquil street, 5 minutes walking from the river Danube, from subway, bus, ship and tram stations and a short walking distance from the Castle District of Buda, a World Heritage Site. From the windows and from my balcony you can enjoy a stunning view of the Fisherman's Bastion of the Castle of Buda. The studio is located on the third floor of a house bulit in the 1930s with newly decorated staircase.  The apartment is very sunshiny, it is convenient for 1 or 2 persons. It contains a living room with twin bed, a dining area, a balcony, a small but equipped kitchen suitable for small-scale cooking and a bathroom. I used to live in the apartment for 15 years, now I would like to offer it to people visiting Budapest. I hope you will like it as much as I did!

review_summary: Our loft style apartment is located in the heart of the bohemian district 7, the so called Ruin Bar district in a typical Budapest town house. It is the perfect spot to explore the city, all sights are within walking distance. It comfortably accomodates up to 4 guests with a fully equipped kitchen.
